Clan Protector.name: Clan Protector
Clan Protector.description: Your @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kJJvKm80KwWXPukV]{Clan Dagger}can protect your allies as easily as yourself. When you use an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to gain a circumstance bonus to AC from your clan dagger's parry trait, you can grant the circumstance bonus to an adjacent ally instead of gaining it yourself. You can use multiple Interact actions to protect multiple allies, or to protect yourself and an ally. The ally benefits from the bonus to AC only when they are adjacent to you.

Clan's Edge.name: Clan's Edge
Clan's Edge.description: By moving your clan dagger with rapid precision, you can protect yourself more effectively. Make two clan dagger Strikes against different targets. Your multiple attack penalty applies normally to these Strikes. You then use an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to gain the +1 circumstance bonus to your AC from your clan dagger's parrying trait.

Claws Of The Dragon.name: Claws Of The Dragon
Claws Of The Dragon.description: Your fingernails grow into razor-sharp claws, and scales speckle your fingers, hands, and wrists. Your claws are agile, finesse unarmed attacks that deal [[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 slashing damage} and are in the brawling weapon group.

Claws Of The Dragon (Draconic Bloodline).name: Claws Of The Dragon (Draconic Bloodline)
Claws Of The Dragon (Draconic Bloodline).description:
Your fingernails grow into razor-sharp claws, and scales speckle your fingers, hands, and wrists. Your claws are agile, finesse unarmed attacks that deal [[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 slashing damage} and are in the brawling weapon group.

When you cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws} spell, increase the slashing damage die from d4 to d6 and increase the resistance to 10 at 1st level, 15 at 5th level, and 20 at 9th level.

Cleansing Subroutine.name: Cleansing Subroutine
Cleansing Subroutine.description: Your nanites help purge your body of harmful chemicals and toxins. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing poison, you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a virulent poison. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing poison reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent poison.

Clear The Way.name: Clear The Way
Clear The Way.description:
Requirements You're wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path.

You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} up to five creatures adjacent to you, rolling a separate Athletics check for each target. Then Stride up to half your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions from any of the creatures you successfully Shoved.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description:
Trigger Your melee Strike kills a creature or knocks it unconscious, and another foe is adjacent to that creature.

You swing clear through one foe and into another. Make a melee Strike against the second foe.

Cleric Dedication.name: 牧师入门 Cleric Dedication
Cleric Dedication.description:
你像一个牧师一样施法，并获得施法Cast a Spell行动。你每天可以准备两个来自神术施法根源的常见戏法，这些戏法可以来自于本书或其他你学习或发现到的神术戏法。你在神术的法术攻击骰和法术DC中受训。你在牧师变体法术中的施法主属性是感知Wisdom，可以施展的是神术根源的牧师法术。你如牧师一样选择一个神祗。你受限于该神祗的禁忌。你在宗教Religion和所选神祗的偏好技能中受训；对于每一个你已经达成受训的上述技能，你都可以在你自选的另一个技能中受训。你不会得到所选神祗给予的其他能力。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从牧师变体中获得了其他两个专长。

Clever Counterspell.name: 精巧反制法术 Clever Counterspell
Clever Counterspell.description:
妳在使用已准备法术去 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EpBG4CFMNSZQx7vI]{反制法术 Counterspell} 敌对魔法时更具巧思，之前妳想要使用反制法术(Counterspell)去反制敌人的法术，唯有妳要准备与他所施展相同的法术，现在只要妳的法术书中有敌人施放的法术，妳就可以使用反制法术(Counterspell)。

当妳用这种方式使用反制法术(Counterspell)时，妳使用的法术必须与触发此行动的法术共享一项有别于根源的特性。

在GM的允许下，妳可以使用与触发法术有着对立特性，或在其他合乎逻辑的情况下能反制的法术(例如使用寒冷或水法术去反制火球，或使用移除恐惧去反制恐惧法术)。

无论你使用了什么法术，妳会在反制检定(counteract check)承受-2罚值，但如果你使用的法术特别合适，GM可以把此罚值抹掉。

Clever Gambit.name: Clever Gambit
Clever Gambit.description:
Trigger Your Strike critically hits and deals damage to a creature you've identified with @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}

Your battle tactics are aided by your assessment of your foes' capabilities, allowing you to instantly adjust your movements to maximum advantage.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} or Stride; this movement doesn't trigger reactions from the triggering creature.

Clever Improviser.name: 机智应变 Clever Improviser
Clever Improviser.description: 你学会了如何处理那些超出你能力范围的情况。你获得了即兴发挥 Untrained Improvisation通用专长。此外，即使没有受训，你也可以尝试那些通常需要你受训才能进行的技能动作。

Clever Shadow.name: Clever Shadow
Clever Shadow.description: You can perform simple Interact actions with your shadow, such as opening an unlocked door. Anything your shadow Interacts with must be within your reach. Your shadow can't perform actions that require significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and you can't use it to hold items.

Climbing Claws.name: Climbing Claws
Climbing Claws.description: You can extend your claws to aid you in climbing. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.

Clinch Strike.name: Clinch Strike
Clinch Strike.description:
Trigger A creature you had @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} successfully Escapes.

Your opponents can't slip your grasp without receiving further punishment. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the triggering creature.

Cling.name: Cling
Cling.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike.

You hang onto a foe to harry them into submission.

If your target moves while you're hanging onto it, you can choose to move with the target. The target is released if you choose not to move with it, at the start of your next turn, or if the target @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Attempts to Escape from a Cling follow the rules for Escape, but use your Acrobatics DC and end the Cling instead of the conditions normally ended by the Escape action.

Special You can use this action without a free hand if your preceding Strike was made with your jaws or a similar unarmed attack you could use to hang on. The GM determines which unarmed attacks apply. Hanging on in this way prevents you from using that unarmed attack.

Clinging Shadows Initiate.name: Clinging Shadows Initiate
Clinging Shadows Initiate.description:
You learn a mystical stance that transforms your ki into sticky smoke that shrouds your limbs, clinging to everything you touch.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. While entering the stance uses a ki spell, the shadow grasp attacks it grants are not, so you can use them as often as you like while in the stance.

Cloak Of Poison.name: Cloak Of Poison
Cloak Of Poison.description:
Frequency once per day

You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or melee weapon without the reach trait takes [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6 poison damage}.

Clockwork Celerity.name: Clockwork Celerity
Clockwork Celerity.description:
触发 你的回合开始

你可以使用大发明中不稳定的发条装置让你的发明更快地工作。你在这轮获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷} 状态。你使用额外动作的方式由你的大发明决定。

  • 护甲 Armor 你可以使用额外动作快步Step，行走Stride，或使用大发明提供给你的其他移动动作（例如游泳Swim，如果你有潜水护甲Diving Armor 专长）。
  • 构装体 Construct 你可以使用额外动作指挥Command你的构装体大发明（或如果你要花费2个动作指挥Command你的构装体，用额外动作来满足其中一个动作）。
  • 武器 Weapon 你可以使用额外动作使用你的大发明打击Strike，或装填Reload你的大发明。

Close Quarters.name: Close Quarters
Close Quarters.description: You've trained to fight with allies in tunnel warrens, dense undergrowth, or similarly cramped terrain. If you are Small or smaller, you can end your movement in the same square as a Small or smaller ally. No more than two creatures can share the same space when using this ability or a similar one.

Cloud Gazer.name: Cloud Gazer
Cloud Gazer.description: Your connection to air allows you to see through obscuring mists. You can see well enough through fog, mist, and clouds that would normally cause creatures to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} that you don't need to succeed at a flat check to target creatures benefiting from such concealment.

Cloud Jump.name: 梯云纵 Cloud Jump
Cloud Jump.description: 你举世无双的运动技艺可以让你跳跃凡人看似绝不可能的距离。当你跳远时，你可以跳跃的距离翻三倍（也就是说如果你成功通过DC20的技能检定，你可以跳60尺远）。在跳高时，你使用跳远动作的距离（不翻三倍）来计算你可以跳的高度。当你跳远或跳高时，你可以通过花费额外的动作来跳过比你的速度更远的距离。你每花费一个额外动作，都能添加一次速度到你能跳跃的最大距离限制上。

Cloud Step.name: Cloud Step
Cloud Step.description: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces. When you Stride, you can move across water, air, and solid surfaces that can hold only limited weight as if they were normal ground. If you Stride over a trap with a weight-sensitive pressure plate, you don't trigger it. At the end of your turn, you sink, fall, break fragile surfaces, or trigger traps as normal for your current location.

Cloud Walk.name: Cloud Walk
Cloud Walk.description: Your growing link to cloud dragons has granted you the ability to walk on clouds. Once per hour, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk} on yourself as an innate arcane spell, but only to walk on clouds or fog.

Clue Them All In.name: Clue Them All In
Clue Them All In.description: You can clue in all your allies at once. When you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} reaction, any of your allies who are attempting the same check to investigate a lead receive the circumstance bonus from Clue In. If you use this ability during an encounter, they must attempt their check within 1 round of when you Clued them In.

Coating Of Slime.name: Coating Of Slime
Coating Of Slime.description: An acidic ooze coats your limbs. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [[/r {1d4}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage} on a critical hit.

Cobble Dancer.name: Cobble Dancer
Cobble Dancer.description: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments. While in an outdoor urban environment, you can Step into difficult terrain and enemies in difficult terrain are flat-footed to you.

Cobra Envenom.name: Cobra Envenom
Cobra Envenom.description:
Frequency once per minute

Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}.

You lash out with devious intent and the power to envenom your foe. Make a cobra fang Strike. Your reach with this Strike is 5 feet greater than normal.

If this Strike hits, the target takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,poison]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} per weapon damage die.

Special If you have this feat, the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC granted by Cobra Stance increases from +1 to +2.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.2Qpt0CHuOMeL48rN]{Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)}

Cobra Stance.name: Cobra Stance
Cobra Stance.description:
You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.CgxYa0lrLUjS2ZhI]{Stance: Cobra Stance}

Cognitive Loophole.name: Cognitive Loophole
Cognitive Loophole.description:
Trigger Your turn ends.

Requirements You are currently affected by a mental effect that you gained by failing, but not critically failing, a saving throw.

You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it. Until the end of your next turn, you ignore a single mental effect that meets the requirement. You can suppress a particular effect using Cognitive Loophole only once.

Special You can use this reaction even if the mental effect is preventing you from using reactions.

Collapse Armor.name: 折叠式护甲 Collapse Armor
Collapse Armor.description:
需求 你穿戴着你的护甲大发明，或用双手持握着它的袖珍形态（见后文）。

你改造了你的护甲大发明，让他能够折叠成更袖珍的形态，让你能够快速穿上或脱下护甲。如果你折叠护甲时正穿戴着你的大发明，你立刻脱下它，它折叠成袖珍形态，并被你的双手持握（如果你并没能空出两只手，它会掉落在你的邻接空间中）。如果你持握着处于袖珍形态的护甲，并使用该动作，它会展开成护甲形态并套在你身上。

处于折叠形态中，你的护甲大发明更容易携带，其负载比护甲条目中列出的负载低1，最低到轻负载（携带的护甲的负载通常情况下比条目中列出的负载高1）。

Collapse Construct.name: 折叠式构装体 Collapse Construct
Collapse Construct.description:
你用轻质材料改造了你的构装伙伴，让你能将其折叠成一个手提箱或其他袖珍且无害的形态。你的构装体或你（如果你邻接它）都可以使用折叠构装体的动作将其变成袖珍形态或变回来。

在袖珍形态中，你的构装体无法行动，但能轻松携带，如果它是小体型，则负载为2，中体型为4，大体型为8。袖珍形态有轮子，你可以轻松以半速拖着它移动（而非通常拖曳时的较低速度）。

Collapse Wall.name: Collapse Wall
Collapse Wall.description:
Trigger A creature moves into the bombs' splash area.

Requirements You're within 30 feet of an area where you rigged bombs on a wall, cliff face, or similar vertical surface with Set Explosives or Demolition Charge.

You detonate the required bombs in order to bring a wall down on a creature. If your bombs deal enough damage to reduce the wall's Hit Points below its Broken Threshold, the wall partially collapses on the creature. The creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to the damage dealt to the wall (basic Reflex save; the DC for this save is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). On a failure, they must spend an Interact action to dig themselves out of the collapse, and on a critical failure, they must spend 2 Interact actions to do so.

Collateral Thrash.name: Collateral Thrash
Collateral Thrash.description: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby. Another foe adjacent to the grabbed foe also takes your Thrash damage, with a basic Reflex save against your class DC.

Combat Assessment.name: Combat Assessment
Combat Assessment.description:
You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

Make a melee Strike. On a hit, you can immediately attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} about the target. On a critical hit, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check to Recall Knowledge.

The target is temporarily immune to Combat Assessment for 1 day.

Combat Climber.name: 战斗攀爬 Combat Climber
Combat Climber.description: 你可以在火热的战斗中维持稳定地攀爬。你在攀爬时不会陷入措手不及状态并且可以在只有一只空手时进行攀爬。但是你仍然需要双脚和至少一只手维持攀爬。

Combat Grab.name: Combat Grab
Combat Grab.description:
Requirements You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand

You swipe at your opponent and grab at them.

Make a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, you grab the target using your free hand. The creature remains @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until the end of your next turn or until it @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.

Combat Reading.name: 辨析战斗 Combat Reading
Combat Reading.description:
你使用表演者的冷读技巧、阅读氛围还有其他能发掘敌人优势与劣势的各种伎俩。

GM要帮你骰一个秘密的神秘(Occultism)检定，对抗一个你选择的敌人的欺骗或隐密DC(取高者)，该敌人需参战，并且对你来说不为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}、 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}。GM可能会因为你和敌人的距离施加罚值。该敌人在接下来的一天会暂时免疫你的辨析战斗。

大成功 由GM选并告诉你下列两个有关敌人的消息：敌人弱点中最弱的那个、敌人豁免调整里最低的那个、一个敌人的免疫或敌人抗性中最高的那个。如果有不分高下的，由GM随机选一个。

成功 GM挑一个上面的消息告诉你。

大失败 GM告诉你错误的消息(消息由GM自己虚构)。

Combat Reflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
Combat Reflexes.description: You are particularly swift at punishing foes who leave you openings. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to make an @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O2MwufzEHbuThoGr]{Attack of Opportunity}.

Combination Finisher.name: Combination Finisher
Combination Finisher.description: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow. Your finishers' Strikes have a lower multiple attack penalty: -4 (or -3 with an agile weapon) if it's the second attack on your turn, or -8 (or -6 with an agile weapon) if it's the third or subsequent attack on your turn, instead of -5 and -10, respectively.

Combine Elixirs.name: 结合灵药 Combine Elixirs
Combine Elixirs.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发条件 你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{高速炼金 Quick Alchemy} 制作了一件具有灵药特征的炼金物品，它的等级至少比你的高阶炼金术等级低2级。

你发现了将两种灵药混合为一瓶合剂的方法。

你可以花费额外2批 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{灌注试剂 Infused Reagents} 将第二种灵药添加至你刚刚制作出的灵药中。第二种灵药的等级必须比你的高阶炼金术等级低2级，而这份结合灵药是一件比这两种灵药中等级较高的那种还要高2级的炼金物品。这份结合灵药被消耗时，构成它的两种灵药会同时生效。

例如，你能够将两份生命灵药结合为一瓶治疗量为通常两倍的结合灵药，或者你也可以将一份次等黑暗视觉灵药（Lesser darkvision elixir）与一份次等鹰眼灵药（Lesser eagle-eye elixir）结合来同时获得黑暗视觉与侦测密门的效果。

Come and Get Me.name: Come and Get Me
Come and Get Me.description: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn. Until your rage ends, you are flat-footed, and damage rolls against you gain a +2 circumstance bonus. If a creature hits you, that creature is flat-footed to you until the end of your next turn. If you hit it before the end of your next turn, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier, or double that on a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your rage.

Come at Me!.name: Come at Me!
Come at Me!.description: You're a legendary duelist, welcoming all challengers, enabling you to challenge many foes even while other challenges are active. There is no longer a limit to the number of Pistolero's Challenges you can have in effect at one time.

Command Attention.name: Command Attention
Command Attention.description:
You command the attention of all around you with style, ensuring their gaze falls only upon you until the end of your next turn.

When creatures within 30 feet of you attempt saving throws against other visual effects, they use the outcome for one degree of success better than the result they rolled.

An enemy within the area attempting to use a visual effect that involves focusing its attention on a particular creature (such as a medusa's Focus Gaze) must succeed at a Will save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, in order to target any creature except you.

Allies in the area can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} even if they don't have cover, as you are continually providing a distraction.

Command Undead.name: Command Undead
Command Undead.description:
You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} targeting one undead creature, you transform the effects of that harm spell.

Instead of harm's normal effects, the target becomes controlled by you if its level is equal to or lower than your level – 3. It can attempt a Will saving throw to resist being controlled by you.

If the target is already under someone else's command, the controlling creature also rolls a saving throw, and the undead uses the better result.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The undead creature becomes a minion under your control. The spell gains a duration of 1 minute, but it is dismissed if you or an ally attacks the minion undead.

Critical Failure As failure, but the duration is 1 hour.

Communal Healing.name: Communal Healing
Communal Healing.description:
You're a conduit for positive energy, and as you channel it through you, it heals some of your minor injuries.

When you cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to heal a single creature other than yourself, you regain Hit Points equal to the spell level of the heal spell.

Communal Sustain.name: Communal Sustain
Communal Sustain.description:
Frequency once per round

Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect. You must be within 30 feet of the chosen ally. The ally can Sustain the Spell once as a free action, triggered at the start of their next turn.

Communal Tale.name: Communal Tale
Communal Tale.description: Stories are an experience meant to be shared as a group. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spin a Tale}, you can designate up to six non-minion allies as the heroes of your story. Each hero, once during the tale, can continue the story in your stead by spending an action to Spin the Tale; if they do, the story continues for another round, as if you had Spun the Tale at the start of your turn. This could allow the story to continue for up to 6 additional rounds, if all possible allies Spin the Tale, though you can continue to Spin the Tale on your own as normal.

Companion's Cry.name: Companion's Cry
Companion's Cry.description: You can urge your companion to do its utmost. You can spend 2 actions to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} instead of 1 when commanding your animal companion. If you do, your animal companion uses an additional action.

Conceal Spell.name: 藏匿法术 Conceal Spell
Conceal Spell.description:
你以其它的动作和语句隐藏你的手势与咒语，你试着隐藏自己正在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Casting a Spell}的事实。

如果你下个动作是施放法术，你可以尝试隐秘技能检定对抗一个或数个观察者的察觉DC；如果法术有语言成分，你还必须尝试欺骗检定对抗观察者的察觉DC。如果你在和观察者的对抗检定成功(或好几个检定)，观察者就不会注意到你在施放法术，就算材料、姿势、语言成分通常引人注意，而有在感官方面呈现的法术还是会让附近的人感受到明显的施法迹象。

此能力只会隐藏法术的施法动作以及呈现，效果不会隐藏，所以观察者还是能看到有条射线从你那边飞射而出，或看到你消失在空气中。

Concealing Legerdemain.name: 藏物于动 Concealing Legerdemain
Concealing Legerdemain.description:
并非将物品藏到搜身者找不到的地方，而是不断转移物品让别人看不到。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{隐藏物件 Conceal an Object} 动作时，你可骰贼活检定而非隐秘检定来对抗搜查这的察觉检定。贼活检定只需骰1次，但你必须不断使用隐藏物件动作来保持这个状态。

Conceited Mindset.name: 倨傲桀骜 Conceited Mindset
Conceited Mindset.description:
你知道自己很高傲，你嘲弄任何想要改变你心理状态的人，可这股傲慢在你遇到麻烦时却是个优势。

你在对抗心灵效果时，在豁免上获得+2环境加值。如果你在对抗心灵效果的豁免上成功，那算做大成功；同样，如果你在对抗心灵效果的豁免上失败，那算做大失败。

Concentrated Assault.name: Concentrated Assault
Concentrated Assault.description: You and your spotter combine your efforts to bring down your target. If you and your spotter both use the Ready activity to make a Strike against the same opponent and choose the same trigger for the readied action, resolve your attacks at the same time. Each of you can use the higher of the two attack rolls for your Strikes, each using your own modifier; this is a fortune effect. If both attacks are successful, total the damage for both attacks for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

Confabulator.name: 天花乱坠 Confabulator
Confabulator.description: 即使被人戳穿，你也能现编出新的招数来掩饰你之前欺骗中的漏洞。当目标因为你之前已经进行过的尝试而在对抗你这一次的分神（Create a Diversion）或是说谎（Lie）检定时获得加值时，它们获得的加值从+4降低到+2。当你在欺骗技能上达到大师级熟练度时，这个加值被降低到+1。当你在欺骗技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，对方不会因为你之前的欺骗尝试而在这次对抗时获得任何加值。

Conflux Focus.name: 汇聚能量 Conflux Focus
Conflux Focus.description:
你设想如何编织魔法和战斗以应对未来的战斗，从而提升你的聚能点。

如果自上次你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{重聚能}后你已经消耗了至少2点聚能点，你的重聚能（Refocus）恢复2点聚能点而不是1点。

Conflux Wellspring.name: 汇聚源泉 Conflux Wellspring
Conflux Wellspring.description:
你已实现完美的法术和物理的平衡，得以让魔法更加轻松的汇入你的躯体。

如果自上次你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{重聚能} 后你已经消耗了至少3点聚能点，你的重聚能（Refocus）能恢复3点聚能点而不是1点。

Confounding Image.name: Confounding Image
Confounding Image.description: When you cast mirror image, you can modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute and modify its range to 30 feet. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You create an illusory duplicate of yourself that appears in an unoccupied square within range. The image takes up space and has a reach of 5 feet, and your allies can flank with the image. It doesn't have any other attributes a creature would normally have other than an AC equal to your spell DC and saving throw modifiers equal to your spell DC - 10. If the image is hit by an attack or fails a save, or if you ever move more than 30 feet from it, the spell ends. Creatures can move through its space without hindrance. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the image to an unoccupied square within range.

Connect The Dots.name: Connect The Dots
Connect The Dots.description:
Requirements You must be pursuing at least two leads.

Ephemeral connections between people, places, and concepts are invisible to most, but seeing them is your stock and trade.

You spend 10 minutes considering two different leads you're pursuing. You then attempt a check to investigate how connected the two are.

Unless the GM determines otherwise, this is a Crafting check if they're both items or a Society check for other combinations of leads. If any subjects are creatures, this check usually uses the highest DC among their Deception and Will DCs. If no subjects are creatures, but at least one is an item, the DC is usually a hard DC for the level of the highest-level item. If neither case applies, the DC is usually a hard expert or hard master DC (22 or 32).

Once you try to Connect the Dots between two particular leads, you can never try to Connect the Dots between those same leads again unless the GM allows it after you've learned a substantial amount of new information.

Critical Success The GM tells you how connected the two leads

are to one another: highly connected, somewhat connected,

tangentially connected, or not connected. The GM also tells

you one specific way in which they're connected, if they are.

Success As critical success, but the GM doesn't tell you a

specific connection.

Failure Your results are inconclusive.

Critical Failure You misconstrue the information. As success,

but the GM provides an incorrect degree of connection.

Connections.name: 关系户 Connections
Connections.description: 你强大的社交网络允许你在需要的时候走合适的关系，交换人情或是和重要的人物见面。当你在一个你建立过社会关系的定居点（通常，你需要一定的休整期时间在某地建立关系，有时你可以在同一国家内其他的地方利用你在异地的关系）中时，你可以进行一个社交技能检定来约见特定的重要人物，或是请求他人的帮助——欠一个未来你需要还的人情。GM回根据你要求人情的重要程度和你想要约见的人物的地位来决定该检定的DC。

Conrasu Lore.name: Conrasu Lore
Conrasu Lore.description:
You have learned about your history and your people from shapers. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting and Occultism. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Conrasu Lore.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill. You also need to manually enter the granted Lore skill.

Conrasu Weapon Expertise.name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
Conrasu Weapon Expertise.description: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, and all conrasu weapons(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7WRzbBTOCsJx5f7L]{Buugeng}) in which you are trained.

Conrasu Weapon Familiarity.name: Conrasu Weapon Familiarity
Conrasu Weapon Familiarity.description: You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}. You also gain access to all uncommon conrasu weapons(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7WRzbBTOCsJx5f7L]{Buugeng}). For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial conrasu weapons are simple weapons and advanced conrasu weapons are martial weapons.

Conrasu Weapon Understanding.name: Conrasu Weapon Understanding
Conrasu Weapon Understanding.description: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself. Whenever you critically hit using a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, or a conrasu weapon(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7WRzbBTOCsJx5f7L]{Buugeng}), you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Consistent Surge.name: Consistent Surge
Consistent Surge.description: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly. You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge} with a frequency of once per 10 minutes, rather than once per hour.

Constant Gaze.name: Constant Gaze
Constant Gaze.description: Your eyes keep a continual watch for dangers from all sides. You can't be flanked by creatures of your level or lower, even when you haven't used Watchful Gaze.

Constricting Hold.name: Constricting Hold
Constricting Hold.description:
Requirements Your eidolon has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

Your eidolon constricts the creature, dealing [[/r @actor.level+@actor.abilities.str.mod #bludgeoning]]{bludgeoning damage} equal to your eidolon's level plus its Strength modifier, with a basic Fortitude save against your spell DC.

Construct Shell.name: 构装外壳 Construct Shell
Construct Shell.description: 你调整了你的构装体大发明，当你骑乘它时，特殊的装甲板，空心外壳或其他类似的半屏障形态会为你提供额外的保护。你在骑乘构装体大发明时获得对所有攻击的次级掩蔽，而不仅仅针对构装体阻挡方向上的攻击。另外，如果你在骑乘构装体时，构装体使用了一种弥漫效果，例如爆炸Explode，你可以选择不被该弥漫效果影响。

Consult The Spirits.name: 请教精魂 Consult The Spirits
Consult The Spirits.description:
频率 每天一次

学习特殊仪式或冥想法的你，可以感知到地区内无形而微笑的精魂。

获得该专长时选择自然、神秘或宗教技能之一。

自然技能让你能与自然之灵沟通（例如莱西），这些诞生自生命本源而非精魂能量的自然之灵可以回答你关于自然的问题，例如最近的水源或植被特征。宗教技能让你和天使、恶魔、神使等秘密存在沟通，提供关于正能量和负能量的情报，关于圣化或亵渎的信息，关于不死生物的内容等等。神秘技能让你与地缚灵、思念体、远离现实的精魂进行沟通，获得关于特异灵光、效果和超自然存在的情报。

消耗10分钟并用所选技能进行一次 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回想知识 Recall Knowledge} 检定；DC由GM决定（通常为当前区域所以能遇到的最高等级生物的非常困难难度）。若你所选技能熟练等级为传奇，则每小时你都可以使用一次该专长而非每天，但不能重复在同一个区域使用该专长。

大成功 精魂在你面前现身，对你的态度为乐于帮助。只有你能察觉到这些精魂。它们会回答你3个关于周围100尺内环境的简单问题，具体取决于你的技能和呼唤来的精魂类型。回答通常是一个单词，它们的知识也受限于它们所处的环境。

成功 如同大成功，只是精魂态度为不关心，且只会回答1个问题。

失败 你没有沟通到此处的精魂。

大失败 你沟通到了一个或更多具有恶意的精魂。

它们对你的态度为敌意，它们也不会立刻现身。它们也能回答你3个问题，但会向有害的方向告诉你答案，具体由GM判断

特殊 该专长可以多次选择，每次必须选择不同的技能，且所选技能必须拥有大师熟练等级。每个所选技能都可每日使用该专长一次（传奇则为每小时1次）。

Consult The Stars.name: Consult The Stars
Consult The Stars.description: You find wisdom in the movements of the heavens. Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes to draw upon your readings of a recent night's sky to gain the trained proficiency rank in one skill of your choice; the chosen skill's key attribute must be Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom. This proficiency lasts until your next daily preparation. Since this proficiency is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or a permanent character option like a feat.

Consume Spell.name: Consume Spell
Consume Spell.description:
When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.deoHKUzpzT7iwWhL]{Counterspell} a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

When you do, you are nourished as if you had eaten a meal and regain Hit Points equal to twice the level of the counteracted spell.

Contagious Rage.name: Contagious Rage
Contagious Rage.description: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits. You can ignore the requirements on Share Rage, using it multiple times in a Rage. Allies affected by Share Rage who accept your anathema for the duration of the Rage gain your instinct ability and the specialization ability it gains from weapon specialization, but not greater weapon specialization.

Contingency Gadgets.name: 应变小装置 Contingency Gadgets
Contingency Gadgets.description:
你太聪明了，从不会慌乱，总是能找到可以解决现状的小装置。当你在每日准备中准备你的小装置时，你可以选择预留一个小装置以备不时之需，你不需要声明具体制作了什么小装置。使用交互Interact动作，你可以拿出这个小装置，此时你必须选择你预留的具体是什么小装置。

如果你在手艺Crafting上达到传奇，你可以在每日准备时预留2个小装置，而非1个。

Continual Recovery.name: 看护师 Continual Recovery
Continual Recovery.description: 你热切的看护可以让病人的伤病恢复更快。当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{治疗伤害 Treat Wounds}时，你的目标只会免疫该效果10分钟时间而非通常的一小时。本专长只对治疗伤害动作有效而不影响其他医疗技能动作。

Continuous Assault.name: Continuous Assault
Continuous Assault.description: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.

Contortionist.name: Contortionist
Contortionist.description:
You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3G8xUlgCjRmRJNfP]{Quick Squeeze} skill feat, and if you're a master in Acrobatics, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze} at full Speed.

Whenever you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

Control Tower.name: Control Tower
Control Tower.description:
Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.mkIamZGtQaSsUWLk]{Effect: Control Tower}

Controlled Blast.name: Controlled Blast
Controlled Blast.description: You maximize the effectiveness of your explosives by controlling every possible parameter of the blast meticulously. If you have the Directional Bombs feats, you can use it with Set Explosives or Demolition Charge, even though you didn't throw the bombs. If you have the Calculated Splash or Expanded Splash feats, you can apply the additional splash damage to one of the bombs when you Set Explosives or use Demolition Charge, and you can apply the increased splash area from Expanded Splash to all the bombs.

Controlled Bullet.name: Controlled Bullet
Controlled Bullet.description:
Frequency once per day

You create a direct magical connection with your beast gun, allowing you to guide the beast gun's next shot by taking control of the projectile directly, steering it through the air, and swerving and veering it to continue to hit target after target. Make a beast gun Strike against a creature within the first range increment. On a hit, the shot tears through the target and continues toward another target you can see. You make a Strike against this new target. The new target must be no farther from the previous target than a distance equal to the beast gun's range increment. For example, the new target must be within 150 feet of the previous target when attacking with a drake rifle. On a hit, you can direct the bullet toward a new target.

You can continue to make Strikes against new targets in this same way until your attack misses, at which point your shot dissipates. You can't make a Strike against a target you already attacked during this use of Controlled Bullet, but you can otherwise continue to make attacks against valid targets until you miss. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you've made all your attacks.

Converge.name: Converge
Converge.description:
Trigger You make a successful ranged attack against an opponent who is within your overwatch field, and who is within reach of one or more of your allies who is also within your overwatch field.

Informing your ally of an opening created by your shot, you coordinate to set them up to hit the target at the same time. Your ally can make a melee Strike against the triggering foe as a reaction. This Strike doesn't count toward that ally's multiple attack penalty, and their multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike. If your ally's Strike is successful, combine the damage from your successful ranged attack with the damage from your ally's melee attack for the purpose of determining resistances and weaknesses.

Convincing Illusion.name: 说假成真 Convincing Illusion
Convincing Illusion.description:
触发 一名生物在不相信由你施展的幻术，在察觉检定或意志豁免成功但没有大成功。

需求 你在观测者和幻术30呎内。

你用欺骗技能让你的幻术看上去更为真实。进行一次欺骗检定对抗目标的察觉DC。如果成功，目标在不相信该幻术上失败。

Cooperative Nature.name: 协作天性 Cooperative Nature
Cooperative Nature.description: 人类的短暂寿命让你高瞻远虑，这在你年轻的时候就教会了你通过求同存异来获取成功。你在援助时获得+4环境加值。

Cooperative Soul.name: 协作之魂 Cooperative Soul
Cooperative Soul.description: 你与你的伙伴建立了内心深处的联系，并且与他们保持了更大程度的合作。如果你在你所援助的技能拥有专家以上熟练度，那么你除了大成功外的检定结果都视为成功。

Coordinated Charge.name: Coordinated Charge
Coordinated Charge.description: You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow. You Stride up to your Speed and make a melee Strike. If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 60 feet who saw you hit can use a reaction to Stride, but they each must end their Stride closer to the creature you hit than where they started.

Coordinated Distraction.name: Coordinated Distraction
Coordinated Distraction.description:
Access Help either the Washboard Dogs or the Diobel Sweepers destroy their rival.

With a sharp whistle or wave of your hands, you distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them. Choose a target and an ally, both of whom must be within 30 feet. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the first Strike the ally makes on their next turn; if your ally doesn't Strike that target, the effect is lost. Depending on how you describe your distraction, this action gains either the auditory or visual trait.

Core Attunement.name: Core Attunement
Core Attunement.description:
Your core allows you to draw more power from it. Select one 1st-level arcane spell and one 2nd-level or lower arcane spell, to which you have access. You can cast your chosen spells as arcane innate spells each once per day.

Enhancement Your attunement grows stronger. Select one 5th-level or lower arcane spell and one 6th-level or lower arcane spell, to which you have access. You can cast them as arcane innate spells each once per day, in addition to the original spells.

Core Cannon.name: Core Cannon
Core Cannon.description:
Frequency once per day

Your body transforms into a powerful magical cannon. While immobile as a cannon, you can fire blasts of energy directly from your core, devastating your foes. You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until you use an Interact action to revert back to your standard form. While in your cannon form, the only actions you can use are to Strike with an energy blast unarmed attack or to Interact to revert back to your standard form. You can remain in your cannon form for up to 1 minute or until you take the action to revert back to your standard form, whichever comes first.

Energy blasts are a special ranged unarmed attack. You can only make energy blast Strikes while you're in your cannon form. Your energy blasts deal [[/r {3d8}[fire]]]{3d8 fire damage} and [[/r {3d6}[force]]]{3d6 force damage}, which increases to [[/r {4d8}[fire]]]{4d8 fire damage} and [[/r {3d6}[force]]]{3d6 force damage} at level 20. You gain the item bonus to attack rolls with your energy blasts from the highest potency rune on any @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows} you are wearing or any weapon you are wielding, but striking and property runes have no effect on your energy blasts. Energy blasts have a range increment of 120 feet. On a critical hit with an energy blast, the target takes 10 persistent fire damage. Your energy blast doesn't add critical specialization effects. If it matters for an effect dependent on weapon damage dice, an energy blast's number of weapon damage is three, or four at level 20.

Core Rejuvenation.name: Core Rejuvenation
Core Rejuvenation.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

Your soul taps into your core's power to push against the grasp of death and allow you to recover consciousness. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

Enhancement Your soul can draw even more power from your core, granting you additional benefits. When you use Core Rejuvenation, you also gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to three times your level. These Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Corgi Mount.name: Corgi Mount
Corgi Mount.description: The smallest of fey have ridden corgis as mounts since time immemorial, leading to a pattern on corgis' backs called a “faerie saddle.” You have formed a magical connection with a corgi that can serve as your mount. Your corgi familiar is Small rather than Tiny, and it's appropriate for use as your mount, unlike most familiars. It has the scent ability, which counts against your limit for familiar and master abilities as normal. Furthermore, it can never gain a familiar ability that grants it any Speeds other than a land Speed. If you're a pixie, you can't ride a corgi due to your Size, but you can take this feat to gain a corgi familiar.

Cornered Fury.name: Cornered Fury
Cornered Fury.description: When physically outmatched, you fight with unexpected ferocity. If a foe of a larger size than you critically hits and damages you, that foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to you for 1 round.

Corrupted Shield.name: 腐化之盾 Corrupted Shield
Corrupted Shield.description:
你的坚盾盟友不只一个守护之魂，它是致命的神术管道。

当你使用坚盾盟友进行 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block} ，抵达一次来自一名邻接生物的近战非武装攻击或近战武器打击时，攻击者受到 [[/r {1d6}[evil]]]{1d6 邪恶伤害} 或负能量伤害(由你选择)。

如果此攻击或打击打破或摧毁你的盾牌，这个额外伤害翻倍。

攻击者受到的伤害在11级变为 [[/r {2d6}]]{3d6 伤害} ，16级变为 [[/r {3d6}]]{3d6 伤害}。

Coughing Dragon Display.name: Coughing Dragon Display
Coughing Dragon Display.description: This display emits a cascade of loud bangs or glittering trails. While you initially designed the display to captivate your audience's attention, it turns out to have a surprisingly effective use in combat, suppressing auditory or visual effects behind your magnificent display. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.mech0dhb4eKbCAu0]{Coughing Dragon} fireworks display.

Counter Perform.name: 反制表演 Counter Perform
Counter Perform.description: 你获得反制表演Counter Performance组曲法术。如果你没有聚能池，你获得一个含有1点聚能点的聚能池，通过与缪斯交流，你可以再聚能Refocus。

Countercharm.name: Countercharm
Countercharm.description:
Trigger A creature Casts a Spell from the enchantment or illusion school.

Requirements You have an innate non-cantrip captivator spell of the same school.

Your enchantments and illusions are so dominant that you can use them to counteract similar magic cast by others. When a foe casts an enchantment or illusion spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own innate magic to disrupt it. You lose an innate, non-cantrip spell of the same school as the triggering spell as if you had Cast the Spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell with your spell.

Counterspell (Prepared).name: 反制法术（准备式施法） Counterspell (Prepared)
Counterspell (Prepared).description:
触发 有个生物进行施放法术(Casts a Spell)行动，而施放的法术是你已经准备好的。

当你看到有个敌人进行施放法术(Casts a Spell)的行动，你可以使用自己的魔法去中断她。你要消耗一个准备好的法术，去反制引起触发并且施放跟你同个法术的生物。你会失去你的法术位，如同你施放了这个引起触发的法术。接着你需要中和(counteract)这个引起触发的法术。

Counterspell (Sorcerer).name: Counterspell (Sorcerer)
Counterspell (Sorcerer).description:
Trigger A creature casts a spell that you have in your repertoire.

Requirements You have an unexpended spell slot you could use to cast the triggering spell.

When a foe Casts a Spell you know and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it. You expend one of your spell slots to counter the triggering creature's casting of a spell that you have in your repertoire. You lose your spell slot as if you had cast the triggering spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, natural, or occult).

Counterspell (Spontaneous).name: Counterspell (Spontaneous)
Counterspell (Spontaneous).description:
Trigger A creature casts a spell that you have in your repertoire.

Requirements You have an unexpended spell slot you could use to cast the triggering spell.

When a foe Casts a Spell you know and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it. You expend one of your spell slots to counter the triggering creature's casting of a spell that you have in your repertoire. You lose your spell slot as if you had cast the triggering spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, natural, or occult).

Courageous Advance.name: 奋勇向前 Courageous Advance
Courageous Advance.description: 伴随着昂扬的呼唤，你让一位盟友奋勇向前。如果你下一个动作是施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 组曲戏法，从该法术获得状态加值得一位盟友可以立即使用一个反应动作进行一次行走(Stride)。

Courageous Assault.name: 蛮勇猛袭 Courageous Assault
Courageous Assault.description:
你有力的战吼让你能激励一个盟友展开攻击。

如果你下一个动作是施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 组曲戏法，一名从此法术获得状态加值的盟友可以立即使用一个反应动作进行一次近战打击。

Courageous Onslaught.name: 勇猛突击 Courageous Onslaught
Courageous Onslaught.description: 你使用你的表演，精心安排一次用以对抗敌人的突击。如果你下一个动作是施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 组曲戏法，那一位从此法术获得状态加值的盟友可以立刻使用一个反应动作进行行走，然后进行一次近战打击。

Courageous Opportunity.name: 奋迅一击 Courageous Opportunity
Courageous Opportunity.description:
触发 一名在你触及内的生物使用一个听觉效果、操纵动作或移动动作；进行一次远程攻击；或在他的移动动作中离开一个格子。

需求 你被 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 影响。

你大声疾呼进入战斗状态，激励己身猛击敌人。对触发生物进行1次近战打击。如果此次攻击大成功，并且引起触发的是操纵动作，那打断该动作。

Courteous Comeback.name: Courteous Comeback
Courteous Comeback.description:
Access Keleshite nationality

Requirements You're in a settlement or community, and you haven't used Courteous Comeback in this settlement or community within the past month.

Trigger You critically fail a Diplomacy check.

You grew up in the proud Padishah Empire, where even insults have a certain poetic wit. Reroll the triggering Diplomacy check, using the second result.

Courtly Graces.name: 贵族风范 Courtly Graces
Courtly Graces.description: 你出身于贵族或是接受过足够多的社交礼节训练，这使你可以将自己的身段展现为一位贵族，参与复杂的社交和政治游戏。你可以使用社群技能来对一个贵族使用建立印象（Make an Impression）技能动作（见交涉技能）或是在贵族面前乔装（Impersonate）成一个贵族，如果你原本不是（见欺骗技能）。如果你想要乔装为一位特定的贵族人物，你仍然必须使用欺骗技能来乔装，并且可能需要说谎来支撑你的伪装。

Cover Fire.name: Cover Fire
Cover Fire.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

You lay down suppressive fire to protect allies by forcing foes to take cover from your wild attacks. Make a firearm or crossbow Strike; the target must decide before you roll your attack whether it will duck out of the way. If the target ducks, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against your attack, or a +4 circumstance bonus to AC if it has cover. It also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attack rolls until the end of its next turn. If the target chooses not to duck, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll for that Strike.

Craft Anything.name: 天工开物 Craft Anything
Craft Anything.description: 你几乎能做出任何你能想到的任何东西。只有你拥有相关的专长（比如为制作魔法物品，你需要制作魔导具专长），达到与物品等级相符的等级，以及技能熟练度，你就能随意制作物品，无视其他先决条件（如特定种族，需要特定法术，等等）。但是，你仍然需要满足一个特别的条件：制作物品可能的额外花费（包括施放法术需要的花费）或是必要的辅助器材（如那些必须需要贤者之石才能制作的物品）。GM对于你可以具体忽略的先决条件有最终解释权。

Craft Facsimile.name: Craft Facsimile
Craft Facsimile.description: You're renowned for your ability to recover important items, whether they're from a long-abandoned temple or a thieves' den, and sometimes that requires creating a stand-in. You can spend 1 minute to assemble a facsimile of an object of no more than 1 Bulk that you can see from available materials. The facsimile has the same shape and Bulk as the replaced object and can pass as the object if not examined. A creature familiar with the original who examines the object automatically realizes that it is a fake. A creature not familiar with the original can still tell it was a hastily jury-rigged stand-in of some kind, but they might not know the object was supposed to be something else.

Craft Philosopher's Stone.name: 制作贤者之石 Craft Philosopher's Stone
Craft Philosopher's Stone.description: 你的研究已见成效，最终抵达了炼金术的顶点——传说中的贤者之石。你学会了 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Fv97oB3iEIFAyzTu]{贤者之石 Philosopher's Stone} 的公式，并将它加入你的公式簿中。

Crafter's Appraisal.name: 工匠评估 Crafter's Appraisal
Crafter's Appraisal.description: 你对物品的知识储备让你可以辨识魔法效果。你可以使用手艺技能而非对应魔法根源的关联技能来对魔法物品使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{辨识魔法 Identify Magic} 行动，不过也只能对魔法物品。

Crafter's Instinct.name: Crafter's Instinct
Crafter's Instinct.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

Frequency once per day

Trigger You misfire with a firearm or you roll a failure on a Strike with a ranged weapon.

You sense a minor flaw in the weapon as you fire it, and quickly adjust your aim on the fly to avoid the flaw. If the triggering Strike was a misfire, you get a normal failure instead. If the triggering Strike was a failure, it becomes a glancing blow that deals minimum damage for the Strike (adding any bonuses as normal but getting a result of 1 for all damage dice that would be rolled on a success). The glancing blow does not apply other effects that would normally happen only on a hit.

Crane Flutter.name: Crane Flutter
Crane Flutter.description:
Trigger You are targeted with a melee attack by an attacker you can see.

Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}.

You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent. Your circumstance bonus to AC from Crane Stance increases to +3 against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can immediately make a crane wing Strike against the attacker at a -2 penalty, even if the attacker isn't within your reach.

Crane Stance.name: Crane Stance
Crane Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored

You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane's wings and using flowing, defensive motions.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Crane Stance, reduce the DC for High Jump and Long Jump by 5, and when you Leap, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.nwkYZs6YwXYAJ4ps]{Stance: Crane Stance}

Creative Prodigy.name: Creative Prodigy
Creative Prodigy.description: You have a powerful creative drive, useful for prevarication and performance. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Deception and Performance. If you are already trained in either of these skills, you become trained in a skill of your choice in its place. You also become trained in Art Lore.

Cremate Undead.name: Cremate Undead
Cremate Undead.description: Your positive energy sets undead alight. When you use a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to damage undead, each undead that takes damage also takes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} equal to the spell's level.

Criminal Connections.name: 犯罪网络 Criminal Connections
Criminal Connections.description: 你交了一群狐朋狗友，可以利用他们走货倒把或牵桥搭线。当处于你拥有联系的区域中时（通常为休整期建立联系网的聚居点或统一国家的其它地区），你可以尝试一次社群检定来计划和例如盗贼工会首领这样的犯罪大佬见面，或者根据交流内容卖个人情以后期要求获得回报。GM决定卖人情的DC和具体角色特征。

Crimson Shroud.name: Crimson Shroud
Crimson Shroud.description:
Frequency A number of times per day equal to your number of class feats from the Red Mantis assassin archetype

You swathe yourself in a veil of red mist for 1 minute. While the shroud is active, you gain fast healing equal to half your level. You can Interact with your shroud, swirling it around you, to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn. Finally, if you die while the shroud is active, you can choose to have your entire body vanish into red mist, leaving behind only your gear; you make this choice when you activate Crimson Shroud.

Cringe.name: Cringe
Cringe.description:
Trigger A creature you are aware of critically succeeds on a Strike against you and would deal damage to you.

With pitiful posturing, you cause your foe to pull back a deadly attack. The attacking creature takes a circumstance penalty to the damage of the triggering Strike equal to your level + 2. This penalty applies after doubling the damage for a critical hit. The attacker is then immune to your Cringe for 24 hours.

Critical Debilitation.name: Critical Debilitation
Critical Debilitation.description:
Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks. Whenever you critically succeed at an attack roll against an enemy and use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}, add the following debilitation to the list you can choose from.

Debilitation The target attempts a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} until the end of your next turn.

Critter Shape.name: Critter Shape
Critter Shape.description:
Once per hour, you can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape} to enter a critter shape. While in critter shape, you gain the effect of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}, except you can only transform into an animal matching your inherent animal.

You can remain in critter shape for up to 10 minutes, after which you transform back into your hybrid shape and can't enter your critter shape again for 1 hour. You can instead use Change Shape to return to your humanoid or hybrid shape at any time during the duration of Critter Shape.

If your inherent animal is normally larger than Tiny, you transform into a smaller, younger version of the animal, such as a Tiny bear cub. If your inherent animal has a fly Speed, you can turn into that animal (unlike normal for 1st-level pest form), but you still don't gain a fly Speed.

Crone's Cruelty.name: Crone's Cruelty
Crone's Cruelty.description: Filled with rancor and hate, you rend the minds of those who displease you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind} once per day as an occult innate spell.

Cross the Final Horizon.name: Cross the Final Horizon
Cross the Final Horizon.description:
Requirements You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

You Stride up to your Speed and your ki enshrouds your limbs in a terrifying stormy energy, increasing the reach of your Sky and Heaven Stance unarmed attacks by 5 feet.

At the end of your movement, make up to three Strikes against a target you can reach, each at a -2 penalty. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after you have made all your attacks. Instead of the usual slashing or piercing damage, the damage for these Strikes is either electricity or sonic, as you choose with each Strike. If you successfully hit with all three Strikes, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.

Cross the Threshold.name: Cross the Threshold
Cross the Threshold.description: You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} as an occult innate spell once per day. You don't need to Sustain the Spell; instead, it lasts for 10 minutes or until you choose to return to your material form as a free action.

Crossblooded Evolution.name: Crossblooded Evolution
Crossblooded Evolution.description: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells. You can have one spell in your spell repertoire from a tradition other than the one that matches your bloodline. You cast that spell as a spell from your bloodline's tradition. You can swap which spell you add and from which tradition as you could any other sorcerer spell, but you can't have more than one spell from another tradition in your spell repertoire at the same time using this feat.

Crossbow Ace.name: Crossbow Ace
Crossbow Ace.description:
You have a deep understanding of the crossbow. When you're wielding a crossbow and use Hunt Prey or use Interact to reload your crossbow, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the damage roll on your next Strike with that crossbow.

If the crossbow is a simple crossbow, also increase the damage die size for that attack by one step.

You must make the attack before the end of your next turn or these benefits are lost.

Crossbow Crack Shot.name: Crossbow Crack Shot
Crossbow Crack Shot.description: You have a deep understanding of the crossbow. When you're wielding a crossbow and Interact to reload it, including Interact actions as part of your slinger's reload and similar effects, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the damage roll on your next Strike with that crossbow. As normal, this isn't cumulative with the +1 circumstance bonus from singular expertise. If the crossbow is a simple crossbow, also increase the damage die size for that attack by one step. You must make the attack before the end of your turn or these benefits are lost.

Crossbow Terror.name: Crossbow Terror
Crossbow Terror.description:
You are a dynamo with the crossbow.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{Crossbows}.

If the crossbow is a simple weapon, also increase the damage die size for your attacks made with that crossbow by one step. As normal, this damage die increase can't be combined with other abilities that alter the weapon damage die (such as the ranger feat @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CpjN7v1QN8TQFcvI]{Crossbow Ace}).

Crowd Mastery.name: Crowd Mastery
Crowd Mastery.description: You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes' attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd. When determining if your foe is flanked, treat all squares occupied by a crowd as if they were occupied by an ally with a melee reach of 5 feet.

Crown of the Saumen Kar.name: Crown of the Saumen Kar
Crown of the Saumen Kar.description: Your body begins to evolve and adapt, taking the first steps towards blending your very self with the ancient curse of the saumen kar. You become larger and bulkier, pushing the very edge of height and weight for your size. You gain scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks made to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} in areas of forest and snow. You sprout a pair of horns from your forehead, gaining a horns unarmed attack that deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage. Your horns are in the brawling group and have the shove and trip traits.

Crude Communication.name: 原生交流法 Crude Communication
Crude Communication.description:
即便你不理解某生物的语言，也能够倚靠词形变化、构词和肢体语言来推断基本的意思。

若你与某人互动至少10分钟，且该生物能够说1门语言，GM要进行1次秘密社群（Society）检定，DC则根据该语言的稀有度来判定。

成功时，你就能理解其主旨，并且可以表达一些基本概念回应该生物；失败时，你误读或传达了错误的概念。

若你的社群熟练度为传奇，则不需要尝试社群检定便可以与其进行即时地沟通；即便你不理解该生物所使用的沟通手段（比如语音、手语，等等），你也能在他们尝试沟通时立即凭借直觉了解到这些信息。

Cruelty.name: 酷虐 Cruelty
Cruelty.description:
你用腐化之处造成的伤害还会掏空敌人的身体。

如果你下一个动作是对一个活物施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jFmWSIpJGGebim6y]{腐化之触 Touch of Corruption}，如果他豁免失败，目标会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 1} 持续1分钟(如果大失败就力竭 2)。

Crunch.name: Crunch
Crunch.description: Your jaws can crush bone and bite through armor. Your jaws unarmed attack deals 1d8 piercing damage instead of 1d6 and gains the grapple trait.

Crushing Grab.name: Crushing Grab
Crushing Grab.description: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp. When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature, you can deal bludgeoning damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier. You can make this attack nonlethal with no penalty.

Crystal Keeper Dedication.name: Crystal Keeper Dedication
Crystal Keeper Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.xNzNpPjeNSrXE7WG]{Crystal Keeper}

You can use Arcana, Occultism, Religion, or Society to Decipher Writing by meditating before a crystal, regardless of the type of writing. When you Decipher Writing and roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead, and when you Decipher Writing and roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Additionally, you gain resistance 10 to damage from hazards associated with crystals.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the crystal keeper archetype.

Crystal Ward Spells.name: Crystal Ward Spells
Crystal Ward Spells.description:
Your study of crystals and the energies held within a gem's facets grants you special arcane crystal ward spells, which are a type of focus spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell, and you start with a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You refill your focus pool when you make your next daily preparations, and you can regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to research and memorize the properties of gems.

Focus spells are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up. Certain feats can give you more focus spells and increase the size of your focus pool, though your focus pool can never hold more than 3 Focus Points. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.57ulIxg3Of2wCbEh]{Electrified Crystal Ward} focus spell, and you are trained in arcane spell attack rolls and spell DCs. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

Crystalline Cloud.name: Crystalline Cloud
Crystalline Cloud.description:
When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ewk7h9aQpKvy1RJo]{Crystalline Dust}, you can spend one additional action to disperse the motes as a 10-foot-radius cloud centered on you instead of as haze; the activity gains the concentrate trait.

All creatures within the cloud become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.

Crystalline Dust.name: Crystalline Dust
Crystalline Dust.description:
Frequency once per day

You've learned to disperse the crystalline motes coating your body as a haze.

You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, though you can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak, as normal for concealment where your position is still obvious.

The motes stay within an inch of your skin, move with you, and last for a number of rounds equal to half your level.

Cultural Adaptability.name: Cultural Adaptability
Cultural Adaptability.description: During your adventures, you've honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you. You gain the Adopted Ancestry general feat, and you also gain one 1st-level ancestry feat from the ancestry you chose for the Adopted Ancestry feat.

Cunning Climber.name: Cunning Climber
Cunning Climber.description: Whether you are climbing a ship's rigging, a jungle tree, or a clock tower, you have an uncanny knack for finding footholds and handholds where larger creatures can't. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.

Cunning Hair.name: Cunning Hair
Cunning Hair.description: Your hair moves under your control. You can perform simple @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} actions with your hair, such as opening an unlocked door. Your hair can't perform actions that require fingers or significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and you can't use it to hold items.

Cunning Tinker.name: Cunning Tinker
Cunning Tinker.description: Time spent tending to your own form has unlocked your ability to fix other things. You can cast 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{Mending} once per day as an arcane innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 3 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level. Even though you're alive and not an object, and you can't normally recover Hit Points from effects that repair objects (like the Repair skill), you can target yourself with this innate spell and use it to recover Hit Points.

Current Spell.name: Current Spell
Current Spell.description:
As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you divert some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with the air or water trait, until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. This effect has the air or water trait, or both, depending on the traits of the spell you cast.

You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait, water trait, or both until the start of your next turn, depending on the spell's traits.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.T5rsLTqS274B9Mly]{Effect: Current Spell (Air)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.DhvSMIFs6xifgQHX]{Effect: Current Spell (Water)}

Curse of the Saumen Kar.name: Curse of the Saumen Kar
Curse of the Saumen Kar.description:
Frequency once per day

You activate the runes on your body to create an icy prison around a Huge or smaller creature you can see within 60 feet. The prison is a sphere made of unmelting ice, just large enough to fit your target. The target, and any creatures sharing its space, must attempt a Reflex save, with a DC using the higher of your class DC and spell DC. A creature that fails becomes trapped inside the prison. If it succeeds, the creature is pushed outside the prison into a space of its choice. If the target shares its space with a gargantuan creature, the effect fails.

The dome has AC 10, Hardness 20, and 40 Hit Points; it's immune to cold, critical hits, and precision damage. The prison lasts until destroyed, until you use this ability to create a new prison, or until you die.

Cut From The Air.name: Cut From The Air
Cut From The Air.description:
Trigger You are the target of a physical ranged Strike.

Requirements You're aware of the attack, not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against it, and either have a hand free or are wielding a melee weapon.

You can knock aside ranged attacks.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you knocked or cut it out of the air.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.gWwG7MNAesJgpmRW]{Effect: Cut from the Air}

Cut the Bonds.name: Cut the Bonds
Cut the Bonds.description: Select a magical effect that has made an adjacent member of your crop clumsy, grabbed, paralyzed, restrained, or slowed. Attempt a counteract check using your attack modifier (including your multiple attack penalty) with a melee weapon with which you have expert proficiency. Your counteract level is half your level rounded up. On a success, you free that member from the effect; on a failure, you can't attempt to use Cut the Bonds on that effect on that crop member until 24 hours have passed.

Cynical.name: Cynical
Cynical.description: You've been approached with suspicion and distrust throughout your life and return these sentiments back to the strangers you encounter. As a result, you are difficult to deceive. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Perception DC against Lies and Impersonations.

Daemon Magic.name: 邪魔魔法 Daemon Magic
Daemon Magic.description: 启用流淌于血管之中的末日荒原魔力。每日各1次，你可以2环级神术内在法术的形式，施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dLdRqT6UxTKlsPgp]{死亡丧钟 Death Knell} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{虚假生命 False Life}。

Dance Underfoot.name: Dance Underfoot
Dance Underfoot.description:
You dart under the legs of your enemies in combat. You can end a successful @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} action in a Large or larger enemy's space.

Also, when using the Step Lively feat, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} into the triggering enemy's space. The enemy must have limbs or otherwise leave you enough room for this maneuver, as determined by the GM. For instance, you could share space with a giant or dragon, but not an ooze.

Dance of Intercession.name: Dance of Intercession
Dance of Intercession.description:
Frequency three times a day

You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power. You Stride in a dance up to half your Speed, attempting a Performance check. You can perform this dance up to three times per day. The second time you do so in the same day, use the degree of success one worse than your actual roll on the Performance check. The third time in a day, use the degree of success two lower than your actual roll.

Critical Success You perform the movements of the Dance of Intercession so gracefully that you evoke a glimmer of the memory of the Celestial Dragon's awesome power. You cast the 3-action version of either 9th-level harm or heal at any point during your Stride. This does not use any spell slots.

Success As critical success, but the spell is 7th level instead of 9th as you stumble through the movements.

Failure As critical success, but the spell is 5th level instead of 9th as you stumble through the movements.

Critical Failure You fail to remember the steps of the dance. You gain no additional effect beyond Striding half your Speed, and you can't attempt the Dance of Intercession again until your next daily preparations.

Dance of Thunder.name: Dance of Thunder
Dance of Thunder.description:
Frequency once per minute

Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow and are not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Your steps echo with the thunderous retort of exploding black powder as you dance a dance of death. Take any of the following actions you choose in any order: Step, Strike against a target within your firearm's first range increment, and Interact to reload. If you attempted a Strike and it succeeded, you can repeat these three actions again in any order. If you attempted a Strike in the second set and succeeded, you can repeat the actions one last time.

After using Dance of Thunder, you become fatigued for 1 minute.

Dancing Leaf.name: Dancing Leaf
Dancing Leaf.description: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} or succeed at a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}, increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from falling, don't count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.

Dandy Dedication.name: Dandy Dedication
Dandy Dedication.description:
You are a consummate student of dignity, etiquette, and fashion.

You can use the Diplomacy skill to perform the special downtime activity Influence Rumor, spending at least one day of downtime to manipulate the course, tone, or content of a rumor to your benefit.

The difficulty of Influencing a Rumor is determined by the GM based on the size of the community, the relative perceptiveness of the inhabitants, and the agency of other rumormongers, but it typically starts with at least DC 15 for a small village and increases to at least DC 20 for a town, at least DC 30 for a city, and at least DC 40 for a metropolis.

You become trained in Deception and Society; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead.

Special You can't select another Dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the dandy archetype.

Dangerous Sorcery.name: Dangerous Sorcery
Dangerous Sorcery.description: Your legacy grants you great destructive power. When you Cast a Spell from your spell slots, if the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, you gain a status bonus to that spell's damage equal to the spell's level.

Dangle.name: Dangle
Dangle.description: You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing. While hanging, you have free use of all your other limbs, so you can perform tasks that require both hands, such as firing a bow or swinging a greatsword.

Daredevil's Gambit.name: Daredevil's Gambit
Daredevil's Gambit.description: If you critically succeed at your Daring Act, you can enter the target's space and remain there until the beginning of your next turn or until the target moves, whichever comes first. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, and your target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks while you are sharing its space in this way. If any creature other than your target hits you with an attack roll while you are sharing your target's space, attempt a DC 15 flat check. On a success, resolve the attack against the target instead of you, using the same attack roll result that hit you.

Daring Act.name: Daring Act
Daring Act.description: You attempt a death-defying maneuver to distract your enemies. Select one foe within reach and attempt either an Acrobatics or Athletics check against your target's Reflex DC. If you succeed, you can Stride up to half your Speed (or up to your full Speed if you critically succeed) without triggering reactions from the target due to your movement, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.

Daring Flourish.name: Daring Flourish
Daring Flourish.description: You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts. At the end of a successful Daring Act, you can make a melee Strike against the target or attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the target. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the Strike you make during Daring Act as well as the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.

Darkseer.name: Darkseer
Darkseer.description: @Compendium[pf2e.deities.ZfN7jkK6boU1FuiS]{Zon-Kuthon} smiles upon you-even if you curse his name-granting you pitch-black eyes that allow you to see in shadows and darkness. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Daywalker.name: Daywalker
Daywalker.description: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light. When in an area of direct natural sunlight, your negative healing is suppressed, meaning you are healed by positive healing effects and harmed by negative energy.

Dazing Blow.name: Dazing Blow
Dazing Blow.description:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them. Make a melee Strike against a creature you have grabbed. The weapon damage from this Strike is bludgeoning damage.

If the Strike hits, the creature must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC; this is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Dazzling Block.name: 眩目格挡 Dazzling Block
Dazzling Block.description:
需求 你处于奥术奔涌架式中

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡}时，你可以在@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内产生一束耀眼、多彩的闪光。区域内每个生物必须进行一次强韧 豁免，同时具有下列效果。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物进入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩} 状态持续1轮

失败 生物进入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲}状态持续1轮并且目眩持续1分钟。生物可以花费一个交互（Interact）动作擦眼睛来终止目盲状态。

大失败 生物目盲持续1轮并且目眩持续1小时。

Dazzling Bullet.name: Dazzling Bullet
Dazzling Bullet.description: Your tricks discombobulate your opponent, leaving spots in their vision from the bright flash of your gunshot reflected straight into their eyes (or other visual organs). Attempt a Performance check against the target creature's Will DC and make a ranged firearm Strike against that target. If the Strike deals damage to the target creature and you succeed at the Performance check, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Dead Reckoning.name: Dead Reckoning
Dead Reckoning.description: You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a compass or see the sky above. You immediately intuit which direction is north (assuming the concept of north exists at your current location).

Deadeye.name: Deadeye
Deadeye.description: You relax your eyes, taking in the smallest movements of objects, stirring of grass and leaves, and other signs of the presence of @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} things, granting you the ability to locate @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures. Until the start of your next turn, you can see invisible creatures and objects as silhouettes defined by the movement of air, slight depressions in the ground, and other tells that less-keen eyes would overlook, which makes them merely @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you.

Deadly Aim.name: Deadly Aim
Deadly Aim.description:
You aim for your prey's weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit.

Make a ranged Strike against your hunted prey at a -2 penalty. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to damage on that Strike. This bonus increases to +6 at 11th level and +8 at 15th level.

Deadly Butterfly.name: Deadly Butterfly
Deadly Butterfly.description: You gain access to the butterfly sword's critical specialization effect. If you already had access to the critical specialization effect or you gain the effect at a later time, you also gain the critical specialization effect for knives when you critically hit with a butterfly sword. You can benefit from only one critical specialization effect at a time.

Deadly Grace.name: Deadly Grace
Deadly Grace.description:
Your graceful attacks are especially powerful.

When you score a critical hit with an agile or finesse melee weapon that has the deadly trait, you double the number of dice from that trait. When you wield an agile or finesse melee weapon that doesn't have the deadly trait, it gains the deadly d8 trait instead.
