Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Deadly Poison Weapon
Deadly Poison Weapon.description:
Your poisons are devastatingly potent. When you apply a simple poison with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}, the poison deals [[/r {4d4}[poison]]]{4d4 poison damage} instead of 1d4 poison damage.

When you apply an injury poison to your weapon, the DC to resist that poison increases by 2, to a maximum of your class DC.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ed9iJxdHuft6bDFF]{Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon}

Deadly Simplicity.name: Deadly Simplicity
Deadly Simplicity.description: Your deity's weapon is especially powerful in your hands. When you are wielding your deity's favored weapon, increase the damage die size of that weapon by one step. If your deity's favored weapon is an unarmed attack (such as a fist, if you worship Irori) and its damage die is smaller than d6, instead increase its damage die size to d6.

Deadly Strikes.name: Deadly Strikes
Deadly Strikes.description: You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus. Your unarmed attacks gain the deadly d10 trait, or you increase their deadly trait to d10 if the unarmed attack is already deadly with a smaller die size.

Death's Door.name: Death's Door
Death's Door.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You take damage that would reduce you to 0 Hit Points.

You continue to fight when others would fall. Just before taking the triggering damage, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. If you have Hit Points remaining after gaining these temporary Hit Points, you aren't knocked unconscious, nor do you suffer the other effects of being reduced to 0 Hit Points. Any temporary Hit Points that remain after applying the damage last for up to 4 rounds.

Death's Drums.name: Death's Drums
Death's Drums.description:
Your life has been spent challenging death itself, and proximity to that implacable foe only makes your heart beat harder.

When you are taking persistent damage or your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} value is 1 or greater, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Debilitating Bomb.name: 衰弱炸弹 Debilitating Bomb
Debilitating Bomb.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发条件 你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{高速炼金 Quick Alchemy} 制作了一件炼金炸弹，它的等级至少比你的高阶炼金术等级低2级。

你的炸弹会对敌人施加额外的影响。你将一种能够导致下述效果之一的物质添加至炸弹中： @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}， @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}，或者是在速度（Speed）上造成-5尺的状态减值。

如果这枚炸弹成功命中，目标必须在一次强韧豁免上取得成功，否则会在你下一回合开始之前承受所选效果的影响。使用你的职业DC作为这次豁免检定的DC（即使是其他人投掷了这枚炸弹）。

Debilitating Dichotomy.name: Debilitating Dichotomy
Debilitating Dichotomy.description: You can give others a glimpse of the impossible conflicts and unchecked power that courses through your body. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VmqdVWCb8zAUCW8S]{Debilitating Dichotomy} revelation spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Debilitating Shot.name: Debilitating Shot
Debilitating Shot.description:
Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot.

Make a ranged weapon Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

Deceptive Worship.name: 信仰欺诈 Deceptive Worship
Deceptive Worship.description: 你们教派的成员经常假装成其它教派的信徒。你可用神秘技能而非欺骗技能 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{乔装 Impersonate} 成另一种非特定信仰的信徒或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{说谎 Lie} 你是你正乔装的教派的信徒之一。但若要乔装成特定信仰的信徒或执行其它欺骗动作，你依然必须使用欺骗技能，例如说其它谎言等等。

Decry Thief.name: Decry Thief
Decry Thief.description:
When you attempt to Demoralize, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action's normal effects.

Critical Success For 1 round, the target takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.kAgUld9PcI4XkHbq]{Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)}

Success For 1 round, the target takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.FyaekbWsazkJhJda]{Effect: Decry Thief (Success)}

Dedication to the Five.name: Dedication to the Five
Dedication to the Five.description: Your dedication to @Compendium[pf2e.deities.JndhOIHnQoMwnsw3]{The Godclaw} borders on a cleric's. You gain the cleric's @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} feat but must select perfection, protection, tyranny, or zeal as your domain. In addition, you can use any religious symbol of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.d56paSkcwvll2OhR]{Abadar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.QRkcFciCOmFoxF1B]{Asmodeus}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.eErEiVmBqltYXFJ6]{Iomedae}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.qqqrbq4uCrelQvgH]{Irori}, or @Compendium[pf2e.deities.sZrdzh0ANQnZGXJb]{Torag} as your divine focus.

Deep Freeze.name: 深度冷冻 Deep Freeze
Deep Freeze.description:
你用你的大发明发射一束过冻液体，伤害敌人并减慢他的速度。瞄准1个60尺内的生物。该生物承受等于你的等级的寒冷伤害，其效果基于他的反射豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标受到一半伤害，并在速度上承受-5尺状态减值，持续1轮。

失败 目标承受完整伤害，并在速度上承受-10尺状态减值，持续1轮。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害，陷入持续1轮的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢1}，并在速度上承受-15尺状态减值，持续1轮。

不稳定功能 你的大发明喷出壮观的锥状过冻液体，这可能造成一连串的失败。在深度冷冻Deep Freeze上加上不稳定特征。该能力影响 @Template[type:cone|distance:60] 内的所有生物而非单一生物，且造成两倍于你等级的寒冷伤害，而非等于你的等级。

如果你有革命性大发明职业特性，你在使用不稳定深度冷冻Deep Freeze时可以选择60尺或 @Template[type:cone|distance:90]。

特殊 如果你的大发明是仆从，它而非你可以使用该动作。

Deep Lore.name: 深度学识 Deep Lore
Deep Lore.description: 你的法术库无比广阔，包含的法术数量远超常人。你给法术库中每个可以施展的法术等级上增加一个法术。

Deep Vision.name: Deep Vision
Deep Vision.description: Your vision is suited for night or the underground. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Deeper Dabbler.name: Deeper Dabbler
Deeper Dabbler.description:
With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day. You can create two additional talismans during your daily preparations.

Special You can select this feat a second time if you are 14th level or higher.

Defend Mount.name: Defend Mount
Defend Mount.description:
Trigger An enemy makes an attack roll against your mount while you're riding it.

You interpose yourself between an attacker and your mount, defending your mount from harm.

Use your own AC against the triggering attack instead your mount's AC. If the triggering attack hits, you take the effects of the attack instead of your mount.

Defend Summoner.name: Defend Summoner
Defend Summoner.description: Your eidolon blocks attacks against you. After your eidolon uses this action, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn. This bonus applies only while you're within your eidolon's reach (in most cases, this means your eidolon is adjacent to you or in your space).

Defensive Armaments.name: Defensive Armaments
Defensive Armaments.description: You use bulky firearms or crossbows to shield your body from your foes' attacks. Any two-handed firearms and two-handed crossbows you wield gain the parry trait. If an appropriate weapon already has the parry trait, increase the circumstance bonus to AC it grants when used to parry from +1 to +2.

Defensive Coordination.name: 协同防御 Defensive Coordination
Defensive Coordination.description:
如同故事中即使面对压倒性的劣势，仍屹立不摇的英雄，你和你的盟友同样坚忍不拔。

如果你下一个动作是施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{激发防御 Inspire Defense} 组曲戏法，你可以举盾，且一个从此法术中获得状态加值的盟友能立刻以一个反应动作举盾。

Defensive Instincts.name: Defensive Instincts
Defensive Instincts.description:
Requirements you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.pTYTanMHMwSgJ8TN]{Effect: Defensive Instincts}

Defensive Recovery.name: Defensive Recovery
Defensive Recovery.description:
Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing. If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.jwxurN6JPQm9wXug]{Effect: Defensive Recovery}

Defensive Roll.name: Defensive Roll
Defensive Roll.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger A physical attack would reduce you to 0 Hit Points.

Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious. You take half damage from the triggering attack.

Defiance Unto Death.name: Defiance Unto Death
Defiance Unto Death.description:
Access Spiresworn elf

You loathe the alghollthus and their mind magic, and you've been trained to be willing to die rather than give into mental manipulation. If you would start your turn @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} due to a failed Will save, you can attempt a Will save against the same DC; on a success, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} until your next turn, rather than act against your will.

Deflect Arrow.name: Deflect Arrow
Deflect Arrow.description:
Trigger You are the target of a physical ranged attack.

Requirements You're aware of the attack, are not flat-footed against it, and have a hand free.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you have deflected it. You cannot use this feat to deflect unusually massive ranged projectiles (such as boulders or ballista bolts).

Deflecting Cloud.name: Deflecting Cloud
Deflecting Cloud.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

Trigger You are the target of a ranged attack.

Requirements You are aware of the attack and currently have dragon wings active.

You've mastered a defensive technique unique to the ancient dragons of Bloodsalt: beating your wings to create a billowing cloud of mist. You become momentarily @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from the triggering attack if vision is the attacker's only precise sense. Normally this means the attacker must succeed at a Flat Check to target you. You also gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Deflecting Shot.name: Deflecting Shot
Deflecting Shot.description:
Trigger An ally within the first range increment of your firearm or crossbow is hit by an attack, and you can see the attacker.

Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

You're always ready to take a quick shot to deflect a weapon or distract a foe enough to render them off target. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack. You use this reaction after the result of the attack roll is revealed, so you know whether the +2 will make a sufficient difference.

Deft Cooperation.name: Deft Cooperation
Deft Cooperation.description: When you set things up to help your allies, you also gain some of the fruits of your labors. When you successfully Aid an attack roll or AC, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls or AC against that enemy until the end of your next turn, whichever you granted to your ally. When you successfully Aid a skill check, if you attempt the exact same skill check (not just using the same skill, but using it for the same purpose, for instance a check to Climb the same wall) on your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill check.

Defy Death.name: Defy Death
Defy Death.description:
You're exceptionally difficult to kill. The DC of your recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying value, or 8 + your dying value if you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AmP0qu7c5dlBSath]{Toughness} general feat.

In addition, whenever someone returns you to life using magic that would normally leave you debilitated for a week (such as raise dead or the resurrect ritual), you don't suffer that condition.

Defy The Darkness.name: Defy The Darkness
Defy The Darkness.description:
Using ancient dwarven methods developed to fight enemies wielding magical darkness, you've honed your darkvision and sworn not to use such magic yourself.

You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.vPhPgzpRjYDMT9Kq]{Greater Darkvision}, enabling you to see through magical darkness even if it normally hampers darkvision (such as the darkness created by a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness}spell). You can't cast spells with the darkness trait, use item activations with the darkness trait, or use any other ability with the darkness trait.

Deimatic Display.name: Deimatic Display
Deimatic Display.description:
Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

Roll one Intimidation check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} and compare the result to the Will DC of each animal, fungus, and plant creature in a 15-foot cone. When you do, Demoralize gains the visual trait, and creatures are affected if they can see you. You don't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand your language.

Deity's Domain.name: 神授领域 Deity's Domain
Deity's Domain.description: 你是神祇某一方面的具现。从你所侍奉的神祇的领域中选择一个。你获得这个领域的初始领域法术作为你的虔诚法术。

Deity's Protection.name: Deity's Protection
Deity's Protection.description: When you call upon your deity's power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection. After you cast a domain spell, you gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn. The amount of resistance is equal to the level of the domain spell you cast.

Delay Trap.name: Delay Trap
Delay Trap.description:
Trigger A trap within your reach is triggered.

You can jam the workings of a trap to delay its effects. Attempt a Thievery check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable Device} on the trap; the DC to do so is increased by 5, and the effects are as follows.

Critical Success You prevent the trap from being triggered, or you delay the activation until the start or end of your next turn (your choice).

Success You prevent the trap from being triggered, or you delay the activation until the end of your next turn (whichever is worse for you; GM's choice).

Failure No effect.

Critical Failure You're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.

Deliberate Death.name: Deliberate Death
Deliberate Death.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are about to gain the dying condition as a result of another creature's attack or ability, and that creature is within your melee reach.

Once, you died because someone—murderer or monster, soldier or executioner—chose to strike you down. Just before losing consciousness, make a melee Strike against the triggering creature.

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.

Delver.name: Delver
Delver.description: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water. You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet through loose soil or dirt.

Demanding Challenge.name: Demanding Challenge
Demanding Challenge.description: If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or -2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.

Demolition Charge.name: Demolition Charge
Demolition Charge.description:
You can rig your bombs to inanimate objects in order to cause destruction to the surrounding area.

As an activity that takes 1 minute, you attach between one and four bombs to an inanimate object within your reach, such as a chest, door, wall, or column.

This creates a hazard in one square occupied by or adjacent to the inanimate object, and the hazard's Stealth DC to detect it and Thievery DC to disable it are equal to your class DC.

The hazard has the following reaction, which you can also trigger as a single action so long as you are within 30 feet of the hazard. The hazard retains its potency until it's triggered, until the inanimate object moves from its space, or until you make your next daily preparations, whichever comes first.

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UEkGL7uAGYDPFNfK]{Fire in the Hole} R

Trigger A creature moves into the hazard's space

Effect The hazard explodes, dealing the bombs' damage and splash damage to the inanimate object. Combine this damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses, and this damage ignores an amount of the object's Hardness equal to your level. Any creatures adjacent to the hazard take the bombs' splash damage, similarly combined for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. As a reminder, since you didn't throw the bombs, Calculated Splash and similar effects don't apply.

Demolitionist.name: Demolitionist
Demolitionist.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You know how to destroy objects with a well-placed explosion. Whenever you hit with a bomb Strike against a trap or an unattended object, you ignore the first 5 points of the object's Hardness.

Demolitionist Dedication.name: Demolitionist Dedication
Demolitionist Dedication.description:
You know how to set explosives to cause the maximum possible damage to buildings and other structures. You become trained in Engineering Lore or become an expert in it if you were already trained. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vvYsE7OiSSCXhPdr]{Set Explosives} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the demolitionist archetype.

Demon Magic.name: 恶魔魔法 Demon Magic
Demon Magic.description: 你透过血缘引导深渊之力，创造出恐怖的实际效果。每日各1次，你可以2环级神术内在法术的形式，施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mkbq9xlAUxHUHyR2]{狂乱偏执 Paranoia} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{粉碎音波Shatter} 。

Demon's Hair.name: Demon's Hair
Demon's Hair.description:
Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes like that of your rival, Syu Tak-nwa. Your damage die of your hair unarmed Strike increases by one step and it gains the reach and versatile slashing traits. Your familiar assumes partial control over your hair; as long as your familiar is alive and within 30 feet, you are permanently quickened, and you can use the extra action only to make a hair Strike.

You can deliver hexes through your hair. When you successfully cast a non-cantrip hex that requires 2 or more actions to cast and that doesn't require a spell attack roll, if your target is within your reach, as part of the spellcasting activity you can make a hair Strike against them before applying any effects of the hex. If this Strike misses, the hex has no effect.

Special If your hair already has the reach trait, it instead gains the sweep trait.

Demonbane Warrior.name: Demonbane Warrior
Demonbane Warrior.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against demons. If your attack would deal more than one weapon die of damage (as is common at higher levels than 1st), the bonus is equal to the number of weapon dice or unarmed attack dice. If your actions force a demon to take damage from its sin vulnerability, increase that damage by 2.

Automatically implements +1 damage to weapons and unarmed strikes against demons

Demonblood Frenzy.name: Demonblood Frenzy
Demonblood Frenzy.description:
Access Matanji ethnicity

Frequency once per minute

Trigger You successfully Strike a living creature that has the fiend trait with your tusks unarmed attack.

Just the taste of fiendish blood is enough to send blood rushing through your veins in a supernatural fury. You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} until the end of your next turn and you can use the extra action to make a tusks Strike, Stride, or Step.

Denier of Destruction.name: Denier of Destruction
Denier of Destruction.description:
Requirements You have a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell prepared and you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to the source of the damage.

Trigger Any ally within 30 feet that you can heal with your heal spell would take damage from an attack or effect from a source you can observe.

You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life. You cast heal on the triggering target. Instead of its normal effects, the heal spell reduces the triggering damage by an amount equal to the Hit Points a 1-action heal spell of that level would have recovered. As usual, if this reduces the damage to 0, it might also remove additional effects of the triggering attack, such as injury poisons.

Deny Support.name: Deny Support
Deny Support.description:
Access Help either the Washboard Dogs or the Diobel Sweepers destroy their rival.

When you succeed or critically succeed at a Deception check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an opponent, that target can't flank with their allies until the beginning of your next turn.

Deny the Songs of War.name: Deny the Songs of War
Deny the Songs of War.description: To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fZPCv2VHuM2yPbC8]{Deafness} and 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} once per day each as innate spells. The tradition of these spells is the one you chose for the Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication feat.

Derring-do.name: Derring-do
Derring-do.description:
When you compound @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache} with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

When you already have panache, you can roll twice and use the higher result on checks to which the circumstance bonus for having panache applies (@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} and any skill actions listed in your swashbuckler's style).

Desperate Finisher.name: Desperate Finisher
Desperate Finisher.description:
Trigger You complete the last action on your turn, and your turn has not ended yet.

Requirements You meet the requirements to use an action with the press trait.

You throw everything into one last press. Use a single action that you know with the press trait as part of Desperate Finisher. You forgo the ability to use reactions until the start of your next turn.

Desperate Prayer.name: 绝望祈祷 Desperate Prayer
Desperate Prayer.description:
频率 每天1次

触发 你的回合开始，并且你的聚能池内没有任何聚能点。

你向你的神请求他的协助。你立刻恢复1点聚能点。

Destructive Block.name: Destructive Block
Destructive Block.description:
You can protect yourself more effectively, at the expense of your shield.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}, you can reduce the damage to yourself by double the shield's Hardness, but if you do, the shield takes double the normal amount of damage it would have taken (before applying its Hardness).

You can't use Destructive Block if your shield can't be broken or destroyed, such as if you're using an @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.SUbYk6B1iPoGyyjh]{Indestructible Shield}.

Detective's Readiness.name: Detective's Readiness
Detective's Readiness.description:
When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull.

You gain your circumstance bonus from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} on saving throws (and their DCs, as normal) against the subject of a lead, and you can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} to assist an ally's saving throw against that subject.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.rUKtp4q8y73AvCbo]{Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness)}

Determination.name: Determination
Determination.description:
Frequency once per day

Your training allows you to shrug off your foes' spells and conditions when the need is dire.

Choose a single nonpermanent spell or condition that is affecting you. If you chose a condition, its effect on you ends. If you chose a spell, attempt to counteract the spell (your counteract level is equal to half your level, rounded up, and you attempt a Will save as your counteract check).

This doesn't remove any Hit Point damage normally dealt by the spell or condition, and it doesn't prevent the spell or debilitating effect from affecting other allies or the environment around you.

It can't remove an ongoing affliction or prevent such an affliction from inflicting conditions on you later. It can't remove conditions from the situation (such as prone or flanked). If the effect comes from a creature, hazard, or item of 20th level or higher, Determination can't remove its effect on you

Determined Dash.name: Determined Dash
Determined Dash.description:
Nothing can keep you from your enemy. Stride twice. During this movement you ignore difficult terrain, greater difficult terrain, and any effects that would impose a penalty to Speed.

You can attempt an Athletics check instead of an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} when moving across narrow surfaces or uneven ground, using the same DC. This doesn't prevent you from being harmed by hazardous terrain.

You can increase the number of actions this activity takes to 3 to Stride three times instead.

Determined Lore Seeker.name: Determined Lore Seeker
Determined Lore Seeker.description: You've mastered useful spells that let you find hidden truths others might miss, and a preferred spell comes naturally to you. When you gain this feat, choose one of the innate spells granted by the Lore Seeker feat: comprehend language, restore senses, or see invisibility. You can cast this spell three times per day instead of once per day. When you cast any of the spells granted by Lore Seeker as innate spells, they gain additional effects. When you cast comprehend language, the spell is heightened to 4th level. When you cast restore senses,the spell is heightened to half your level, rounded up. When you cast see invisibility, for the duration of the spell you can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to see invisible creatures normally (instead of seeing them as translucent shapes that are concealed to you) until the end of your next turn.

Devastating Spellstrike.name: 破坏性法术打击 Devastating Spellstrike
Devastating Spellstrike.description:
需求 Y你处于奥术奔涌架式中并且你的法术打击已充能（charged）

你的法术打击横扫（sweep）如此宽广且具有破坏性，其溅射到了相邻的敌人。进行一次法术打击。目标相邻（adjacent）的敌人受到数值等于2+奥术奔涌额外伤害的溅射伤害。伤害类型与奥术奔涌相同；如果法术已经造成了相同类型的溅射伤害，在应用弱点（weakness）或抵抗（resistances）前将两次伤害合并计算。

Devastating Weaponry.name: 毁灭性武装 Devastating Weaponry
Devastating Weaponry.description: 你的武器释放出射弹风暴，或在战场上飞跃收割，对多个敌人同时打击Strike。使用你的武器大发明对你30尺内的每个敌人进行1次打击Strike。在你完成全部攻击之前都不要提升你的多次攻击减值。如果你的大发明是近战武器，或者任何一次攻击超出了你的触及，你在打击Strike前放开Release武器，它在全部完成后会回到你的手上。如果你的手在武器回归时被占用，它会掉在你的空间的地表上。如常，如果你的武器大发明在打击Strike之间需要1个或更多的动作来装填，你不能使用它通过毁灭性武装Devastating Weaponry来进行多次攻击。

Devil Allies.name: Devil Allies
Devil Allies.description: You can call in devils to assist your efforts. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.29ytKctjg7qSW2ff]{Summon Fiend} as an innate spell of a tradition of your choice, which you can cast once per day. When you cast this spell, you can summon only creatures that have the devil trait. At 16th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened by 1 level (to a maximum of 8th level when you reach 20th level).

Devil In Plain Sight.name: 化身常人 Devil In Plain Sight
Devil In Plain Sight.description: 你学会将体内的魔族妖气凝结成一颗秽血宝珠并藏匿于灵魂深处的手法。你明显的魔族特征会消失，例如尾巴、角、蹄等，但仍留下了些许异状(爪子会缩成锯齿状的指甲，眼色可能还是带着诡异光泽等)。你的外观会变成非魔裔版本的自己，就像该族裔的普通成员一般，但他人依然可以认出你的身分。使用此能力视为使用欺骗技能进行乔装而易了容，这个变身使你能自动击败辨识你是否为正常的族裔成员的察觉DC，只有主动向你骰察觉的生物才有可能识破这个易容。在此能力生效期间，你无法使用依存于魔裔生理特征的非武装攻击、内在法术或其他能力，例如 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aVRuchEAJIvnd70k]{灵活尾巴 Skillful Tail} 族裔专长。你可永久保持普通人形态，再次使用此能力能变回魔裔原形。

Devil Magic.name: 魔鬼魔法 Devil Magic
Devil Magic.description: 你汲取奸诈祖先的魔界威能，以魔法诈术欺骗敌人。每日各1次，你可以2环级神术内在法术的形式，施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.c2bTWBNO1BYX4Zfg]{误导术 Misdirection} 。

Devil's Advocate.name: Devil's Advocate
Devil's Advocate.description:
Access Chelaxian nationality

You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against devils and saving throws against their abilities. In addition, whenever you meet a devil in a social situation, you can immediately attempt a Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on that creature rather than needing to converse for 1 minute. You take a -5 penalty to the check. If you fail, you can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cc8O47KFsODReoBe]{Glad-Hand} skill feat, you don't take the penalty to your immediate Diplomacy check if the target is a devil.

Devilish Wiles.name: 魔族魅力 Devilish Wiles
Devilish Wiles.description: 传统上魔族十分擅长哄骗他人行事，即便苦主明知道自己是在找死依然免不了上当。你也很擅长晃点人，心虚体弱的人常被你逼去做事。每日1次，你可以1环级神术内在法术的形式施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm} 。

Devoted Focus.name: 虔诚集中 Devoted Focus
Devoted Focus.description: 你的虔诚如此强大，将你的聚能力提升至难以置信的境界。如果你自上次进行再聚能（Refocused）以来已经花费了至少2点聚能点，那么在你进行再聚能时会恢复2点聚能点而不是1点。

Diabolic Certitude.name: Diabolic Certitude
Diabolic Certitude.description:
Trigger Your turn begins and you can observe a devil.

Your Hellknight training drilled details of Hell's denizens deep into your mind. Make an attempt to Recall Knowledge about a devil you're observing. If you roll a critical failure on this check, you get a failure instead.

Diamond Fists.name: Diamond Fists
Diamond Fists.description: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging. Your unarmed attacks gain the forceful trait. Any that already had this trait instead increase their weapon damage dice by one step.

Diamond Soul.name: Diamond Soul
Diamond Soul.description: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic.

Didactic Strike.name: Didactic Strike
Didactic Strike.description:
When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N4wCUZH2KG6FoGqh]{Shared Stratagem}, you can designate up to 10 allies instead of just one. The foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the first attack from each designated ally before your next turn, and each ally's first attack deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.72THfaqak0F4XnON]{Effect: Didactic Strike}

Diehard.name: 死硬 Diehard
Diehard.description: 你很难被弄死。你在处于濒死（Dying）5时才会死亡而非通常的濒死4。

Different Worlds.name: Different Worlds
Different Worlds.description:
Your separate experiences in different societies have evolved into entirely separate lives. Create a second identity for yourself with a different name, history, and background. This identity must correspond to one of the ancestries whose ancestry feats you can select. You gain the trained proficiency rank in the Lore skill from the second background you chose (but you don't gain any of the background's other benefits), and you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks when making a statement that would be true of your second identity or when disguising yourself as your second identity.

Special At the GM's discretion, this feat can be used against non-humanoids if they have regular contact with humanoids or you are able to disguise yourself as a member of the target's ancestry or type of creature.

Dig Quickly.name: Dig Quickly
Dig Quickly.description:
Requirements You are standing on dirt, sand, snow, or similar particulate material.

Your hands work as effectively as shovels when you need to dig a quick hole. You dig a shallow pit in the square you currently occupy, turning the square into difficult terrain (including for you). In addition, you also kick up a cloud of grit in a direction of your choice. The cloud extinguishes small, unattended, non-magical fires and helps smother the flames on burning creatures located within the cone; creatures in this cone that are taking @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} can immediately attempt an additional flat DC 15 check to end the persistent damage.

Dig Up Secrets.name: Dig Up Secrets
Dig Up Secrets.description: You are an endless well of knowledge and can remember several vital pieces of information at once. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition} as an innate occult spell once per day.

Dimensional Disappearance.name: 次元无踪 Dimensional Disappearance
Dimensional Disappearance.description:
你利用传送来更好的隐藏自己所在之处。当你释放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5p9Y4ACrtRM4gTpN]{次元突袭 Dimensional Assault}时，你在传送结束时获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术} 效果。

你可以选择不去进行通常 次元突袭 dimensional assault的打击（Strike）部分。如果你进行一次打击，你的 隐形术 invisibility在打击后结束，一如通常的 隐形术 invisibility效果。

Dire Form.name: Dire Form
Dire Form.description: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast. While in your hybrid shape, you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}.

Directed Audience.name: 独乐乐众乐乐 Directed Audience
Directed Audience.description:
你能改变你组曲法术的区域。当你施放一个区域为弥漫的组曲法术时，你可以把法术的区域改成大10尺的锥形，最大到原始区域的两倍。

举例来说，你可以把一个30尺弥漫的组曲法术调成40尺锥形，但5尺弥漫最多只能变成10尺锥形。

Directed Channel.name: Directed Channel
Directed Channel.description: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion. When you cast a version of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} that has an area, you can make its area a 60-foot cone instead of a 30-foot emanation.

Directed Poison.name: Directed Poison
Directed Poison.description: When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Cloudkill}, modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute, and modify its standard effect to include the following: The cloud doesn't move away from you each round. Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the cloud 10 feet in the direction of your choice.

Directional Bombs.name: 定向爆破 Directional Bombs
Directional Bombs.description: 你能够投掷一枚威力巨大且精准定向的炸弹，它将向着某一方向的锥形范围内爆发溅射。 当投掷一枚具有溅射特征的炼金炸弹时，取代原本影响目标所有邻接方格的溅射，你可以将目标所在空间视作远离你的15尺锥形溅射范围的第一个受影响方格，这可能让你避开盟友并溅射到同一直线上的更远处的敌人。如果目标占据了不止一个方格，这个目标离你最近的方格被视作锥形范围内第一个受影响的方格。

Dirge of Doom.name: 末日丧歌 Dirge of Doom
Dirge of Doom.description: 你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1xLVcA8Y1onw7toT]{末日丧歌 Dirge of Doom} 戏法，能够让你的敌人恐惧。

Disarming Assault.name: Disarming Assault
Disarming Assault.description: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands. Make a melee Strike; if you hit, you can attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} that foe.

Disarming Block.name: Disarming Block
Disarming Block.description:
Trigger You Shield Block a melee Strike made with a held weapon.

You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with. You can do so even if you don't have a hand free.

Disarming Flair.name: Disarming Flair
Disarming Flair.description:
It's harder for your foes to regain their grip when you knock their weapon partially out of their hands.

When you succeed at an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, the circumstance bonus and penalty from Disarm last until the end of your next turn, instead of until the beginning of the target's next turn. The target can use an Interact action to adjust their grip and remove this effect.

If your swashbuckler's style is gymnast and you succeed at your Athletics check to Disarm a foe, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}.

Disarming Stance.name: Disarming Stance
Disarming Stance.description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon.

While you are in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you. In addition, you can attempt to Disarm creatures up to two sizes larger than you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.LxSev4GNKv26DbZw]{Stance: Disarming Stance}

Disarming Twist.name: Disarming Twist
Disarming Twist.description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

After your initial attack redirects your foe's defenses, your follow-up wrests their weapon from their grasp.

Make a melee Strike with the required weapon. In addition to its other effects, this Strike gains the success and critical success effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} action. The Strike also has the following failure effect.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your current turn.

Discerning Gaze.name: Discerning Gaze
Discerning Gaze.description:
You have a sense for when people are lying. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your secret Perception checks to Sense Motive.

If you use Sense Motive on a creature you have currently condemned with Harsh Judgment, your GM rolls the Perception check twice and takes the higher result (this is a fortune effect).

Discerning Strike.name: Discerning Strike
Discerning Strike.description:
Requirements You have successfully identified the target with Recall Knowledge during this combat.

Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses. Attempt a Strike against the target; if successful, you deal an additional [[/r {1d6}[precision]]]{1d6 precision damage}. If you have succeeded on a Recall Knowledge check against the target during this combat and their creature type was previously recorded using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0Dy8RlFqrzCVOTl4]{Thorough Reports}, you also deal [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. The creature is then temporarily immune to Discerning Strike for 1 day.

Disciple of Shade.name: Disciple of Shade
Disciple of Shade.description: You've delved deeper into the mysteries of shadow and become blessed with magical power that increases your skills in the arts of deception and persuasion. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YQWq1DZuLRk32M3h]{Inscrutable Mask} domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Disciple's Breath.name: Disciple's Breath
Disciple's Breath.description: You unleash your breath weapon without spending focus. This has the effects of your Dragon Breath sorcerer bloodline spell, though it deals [[/r 9d6]] damage instead of its usual damage, and you don't have to cast it or spend a Focus Point. You can't use Disciple's Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Discordant Voice.name: 不谐之音 Discordant Voice
Discordant Voice.description:
你的激发勇气让不谐的尖啸以强大的音波反射形式渗透于盟友的攻击中。

当你的盟友受到你 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 的影响，他们的武器打击还有非武装攻击会额外造成[[/r {1d6}[sonic]]]{1d6 音波伤害}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.oXG7eX26FmePmwUF]{Effect: Discordant Voice}

Discreet Inquiry.name: 谨慎发言 Discreet Inquiry
Discreet Inquiry.description:
你通过交际获取信息的方式十分谨慎。

在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{收集信息 Gather Information}时，你能够将真实目标隐藏于其他无用话题之中，且不会增加检定难度或时间消耗。

任何人若想通过收集信息来了解是否有人在询问该话题内容，他必须超过你的欺骗DC或者你收集信息时的正常DC，取较高者，才能知晓你的询问。否则，他们对你的活动一无所知。

Disengaging Twist.name: Disengaging Twist
Disengaging Twist.description:
Trigger A creature gives you the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} condition.

Your ability to twist your opponents' bodies into painful locks and holds makes you particularly adept at escaping such predicaments. Attempt an Athletics check to Escape the triggering condition. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.

Disillusionment.name: Disillusionment
Disillusionment.description: Dreams are pointless illusions you seek to quash. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an illusion or dream effect or a Perception check to disbelieve an illusion, you get a critical success instead. If you roll a critical failure on any of those checks, you get a failure instead.

Disk Rider.name: Disk Rider
Disk Rider.description:
When you cast floating disk, you can modify its duration to be sustained, up to 10 minutes. If you do, add the following heightened entry to its effects.

Heightened (3rd) The disk can hold up to 10 Bulk. The spell no longer ends if you ride atop the disk (though it does if any other creature rides atop it, including if the creature is riding on you). If you are riding the disk, it changes its capacity to hold you, plus additional Bulk equal to the maximum you could carry without being encumbered. If you ride atop the disk, you can direct it to move along the ground up to 30 feet or your Speed, whichever is slower, each time you Sustain the Spell. While you ride atop it, the disk can move over liquids as long as it ends its movement on solid ground. If it ends its movement on a surface that can't support it, the spell ends.

Disorienting Opening.name: Disorienting Opening
Disorienting Opening.description: You use your foes' openings to expose even greater weaknesses. When you hit a creature as part of an Attack of Opportunity, that creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.

Disorienting Venom.name: Disorienting Venom
Disorienting Venom.description: The venom injected by your fangs disorients your foes. A creature damaged by your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.8aIe57gXJ94mPpW4]{Anadi Venom} must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

Dispelling Slice.name: Dispelling Slice
Dispelling Slice.description:
Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

Make a Strike against a flat-footed creature. If your Strike deals sneak attack damage, you attempt to counteract a single spell active on the target (your choice).

Your counteract level is equal to half your level (rounded up), and your counteract check modifier is equal to your class DC – 10.

Dispelling Spellstrike.name: 驱散性法术打击 Dispelling Spellstrike
Dispelling Spellstrike.description:
需求 你的法术打击已充能（charged）

你传递的法术试图强行驱散你对手的魔法效应。进行一次法术打击，如果击中，你也可以尝试反制（counteract）一个在目标上生效的单一法术（由你选择的法术）。

反制等级为了你等级的一半向上取整，并且反制检定调整值（check modifier）是使用一个法术用于法术反制的基础调整值（standard modifier，你的智力调整值 Intelligence 加上你的施法熟练度加值 spellcasting proficiency，再加上其他特别影响反制检定的加减值）

Disrupt Ki.name: Disrupt Ki
Disrupt Ki.description:
Make an unarmed Strike. If it deals damage to a living creature, you block that creature's inner life force.

The creature takes [[/r {2d6}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage} and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the persistent damage ends.

If you're 18th level or higher, this deals [[/r {3d6}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage} instead.

Disrupt Prey.name: Disrupt Prey
Disrupt Prey.description:
Trigger Your hunted prey is within your reach, and it uses a manipulate action, uses a move action, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Make a melee Strike against your prey. If the attack is a critical hit, you disrupt the triggering action.

Disrupting Strikes.name: Disrupting Strikes
Disrupting Strikes.description:
You call forth positive energy from within to help you destroy undead. Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a disrupting property rune until the start of your next turn.

If you're 14th level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a greater disrupting property rune. The DC for the rune's effect is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Disruptive Blur.name: Disruptive Blur
Disruptive Blur.description: You use cacophonous blasts from your gun or distracting shots from your crossbow to cause momentary diversions, letting you move about the battlefield with impunity. After you make a Strike with a firearm or crossbow, creatures can't take reactions that would be triggered by your movement for the rest of your turn.

Disruptive Stance.name: Disruptive Stance
Disruptive Stance.description:
The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you're prepared to foil enemies' actions.

As long as you are in this stance, you can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O2MwufzEHbuThoGr]{Attack of Opportunity} when a creature within your reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to manipulate and move actions.

Furthermore, you disrupt a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).

Distant Cackle.name: Distant Cackle
Distant Cackle.description: It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism} once per day as a 1st-level occult innate spell.

Distracting Explosion.name: 分神爆炸 Distracting Explosion
Distracting Explosion.description:
触发 你触及内的生物使用了一个专注动作。

你的敌人觉得你在身边的时候还能专注别的事情？你能直接让他们走神好吧！使用受益于攻势增压的武器或无武装攻击对触发的生物进行一次近战打击Strike。该打击Strike不计入你的多次攻击减值，你的多次攻击减值也不会应用在这次打击Strike上。

不稳定功能 你全力制造一种爆炸性的干扰。在分神爆炸Distracting Explosion上加上不稳定特征。如果这次攻击命中，你打断了触发的专注动作。

特殊 如果你的大发明是一个仆从，它而非你可以使用该反应，即使仆从一般不能使用反应或者在它的回合外行动。它使用你在该回合获得的反应进行。

Distracting Feint.name: Distracting Feint
Distracting Feint.description:
Your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feints} are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes' attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage.

While a creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.7hRgBo0fRQBxMK7g]{Effect: Distracting Feint}

Distracting Flattery.name: Distracting Flattery
Distracting Flattery.description:
Trigger You observe a target's attitude toward yourself or your allies decrease as a result of an ally's behavior.

You know how to maintain a good impression and manage your image, even while keeping uncouth company.

Make a Deception check against the target's Will DC. Regardless of your result, the target is temporarily immune to your Distracting Flattery for 10 minutes.

Success The target's attitude doesn't decrease as a result of

your ally's social blunder.

Failure The target's attitude decreases, as normal.

Critical Failure Your attempt makes matters worse, decreasing the target's attitude toward you by one step, in addition to any

changes from the behavior that triggered this reaction.

Distracting Performance.name: 注目表演 Distracting Performance
Distracting Performance.description:
你的表演尤其引人注目，让盟友可以趁机潜行。

当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{协助 Aid} 一名试图 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{分神 Create a Diversion}敌人的盟友时，你可不按照协助动作的通常效果，而是骰表演检定并将结果直接作为盟友的欺骗检定结果。

Distracting Shadows.name: Distracting Shadows
Distracting Shadows.description: You have learned to remain hidden by using larger folk as a distraction to avoid drawing attention to yourself. You can use creatures that are at least one size larger than you (usually Medium or larger) as cover for the Hide and Sneak actions, though you still can't use such creatures as cover for other uses, such as the Take Cover action.

Distracting Shot.name: Distracting Shot
Distracting Shot.description: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered. If you critically hit your hunted prey with a ranged weapon, or hit it at least twice on the same turn with a ranged weapon, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.

Distracting Spellstrike.name: 欺骗性法术打击 Distracting Spellstrike
Distracting Spellstrike.description:
需求 你处于奥术奔涌架式中并且有一只空闲（free）手

你用一只手编织欺骗性魔法以强化你的法术打击。进行一次法术打击和 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招} 来对抗你的打击（Strike）目标。在进行打击前，但是在你选择目标后立刻进行虚招检定。

这次虚招具有奥术（arcane）、幻术系（illusion）和视觉（visual）特征，并且它永远只具有虚招的基础效果，而不能应用来自于其他专长或能力的任何调整（adjustment）或替换能力（alternate）。

Disturbing Defense.name: Disturbing Defense
Disturbing Defense.description: Your internal organs and blood vessels have shifted and changed, and even you don't know precisely where in your body they are. You gain resistance to precision damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. The DC of your flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage is 13, rather than 15.

Disturbing Knowledge.name: 惊世胡言 Disturbing Knowledge
Disturbing Knowledge.description:
你口中念出一长串令人发麻的人物、预兆、外域的名字，那些你从各种书卷上看来的点点滴滴。即便是无法理解你所用语言的生物，也会对你念出的名字阵阵发抖。

你进行一次神秘技能检定，对抗30尺内一个敌人的意志豁免DC，若你的神秘技能熟练等级为传奇，则可对抗30尺内任意个敌人的意志豁免DC。成为目标的生物产生24小时的临时免疫。

大成功 目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} 1轮并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

成功 目标获得惊惧1。

失败 目标不受影响。

大失败 你被你自己说出的话吓到了，你获得惊惧1。

Diverse Armor Expert.name: 多样化盔甲专家 Diverse Armor Expert
Diverse Armor Expert.description: 你在轻甲、中甲、重甲以及无武装防御中的熟练等级均提升至专家。

Diverse Mystery.name: Diverse Mystery
Diverse Mystery.description:
You have broadened your understanding of the divine and can tap into the wonders of a different mystery. Select one revelation spell from a mystery other than your own. You can choose only an initial revelation spell or an advanced revelation spell.

When you cast this revelation spell, you gain the effects of the minor curse from that mystery in addition to the normal curse effects you gain from casting a revelation spell. This additional minor curse effect remains until your next daily preparations. Any ability that lets you cast a revelation spell without increasing the severity of your curse also prevents you from gaining this additional curse effect.

You can't cast your chosen revelation spell if any of the following conditions are true: its mystery's curse effects directly conflict with or negate the effects of your own mystery's curse, the curse would have no effect on you (for example, removing an ability from your original mystery that you lack), or either of these criteria would be met once you finish Casting the Spell.

Diverse Recognition.name: Diverse Recognition
Diverse Recognition.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger You successfully Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, using a skill in which you are a master.

Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats. Attempt to Recall Knowledge against a different kind of creature you can see using the same skill. You must still meet the requirements to attempt this check.

Diverse Weapon Expert.name: 多样化武器专家 Diverse Weapon Expert
Diverse Weapon Expert.description: 你在简易武器和军用武器中的熟练等级提升至专家，你在进阶武器中的熟练等级提升至受训。

Diverting Vortex.name: Diverting Vortex
Diverting Vortex.description:
Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-

cantrip spell.

You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks and physical ranged unarmed attacks.

Divine Access.name: Divine Access
Divine Access.description:
Your ability to tap into divine magic surpasses the spells traditionally available to you (the divine spell list).

Choose one deity who grants one of your mystery's granted domains. Add up to three cleric spells of your choice granted by that deity to your spell list. You can select from these spells when you add or swap spells in your spell repertoire.

Special You can select this feat more than once. You can't choose the same spells more than once, but you can choose a different domain or a different deity with the same domain you've previously selected with this feat.

Divine Aegis.name: Divine Aegis
Divine Aegis.description:
Trigger You attempt a saving throw against a magical effect, but you haven't rolled yet.

You summon divine energy to shield yourself, offering protection against other traditions but leaving you exposed to other divine effects.

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.K1IgNCf3Hh2EJwQ9]{Effect: Divine Aegis}

Divine Ally.name: 神圣盟友 Divine Ally
Divine Ally.description: 你获得一个自选的神圣盟友。

Divine Breadth.name: 神术扩展 Divine Breadth
Divine Breadth.description: 你每天可以施展更多的牧师法术。除了最高两个环级以外，每个环级你都获得额外一个来自牧师变体专长的每日法术位。

Divine Countermeasures.name: Divine Countermeasures
Divine Countermeasures.description: You've studied your celestial heritage with the intent of better defending yourself, and you've found that your techniques are equally powerful against celestials, fiends, and other divine entities. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against divine effects.

Divine Effusion.name: Divine Effusion
Divine Effusion.description:
The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of divine energy, even when your own magic dwindles.

Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell level; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell levels.

Divine Evolution.name: Divine Evolution
Divine Evolution.description: The divine might provided by your bloodline fiows through you. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast your choice of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm}. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if they aren't in your spell repertoire.

Divine Grace.name: 神圣恩典 Divine Grace
Divine Grace.description:
触发 你尝试一次豁免检定对抗一个法术，在你进行投骰之前。

你呼唤神祇的恩典，在这个豁免检定上获得+2的环境加值。

Divine Guidance.name: 开示 Divine Guidance
Divine Guidance.description: 你在宗教经典中浸淫已久，无论你面对任何难解的问题，只要拿起一卷经文，你总能找出神之言语给你提供的解答。如果你在思考一个极难处理或是决断的困境时，同时花费10分钟时间使用解译文书（Deciphering Writing）动作解读你信仰的神祗的宗教经典或是你追随的哲学文书，同时进行一个宗教技能检定（具体DC由GM决定）如果你成功，你会从文书中发现一段特定的箴言，教导或是警句，正好为你脑海中的难题提供了隐晦的解答。举例来说，GM可能会给你展示一段意有所指的诗文或是模糊的线索，如果你沿着这个方向去找就一定能发现解决问题的方法。

Divine Health.name: 神圣强健 Divine Health
Divine Health.description: 你的信仰给予你对疾病的抵抗力，在你向病患伸出援手时保护你。你在对抗疾病的豁免检定上获得+1状态加值。此外，如果你在对抗疾病的豁免检定上取得成功，你将其替换为大成功。

Divine Reflexes.name: 神圣反射 Divine Reflexes
Divine Reflexes.description: 在你的每个回合开始时，你获得一个额外的反应动作，你只能用它来进行神卫反应。

Divine Wall.name: 神圣壁垒 Divine Wall
Divine Wall.description:
需求 你正在持用一面盾牌

你使用盾牌骚扰敌人，阻止他们在你的四周快步移动或远离你。所有邻接你的方格对你的敌人来说视为困难地形（Difficult terrain）。

Divine Weapon.name: Divine Weapon
Divine Weapon.description:
Frequency once per turn

Trigger You finish Casting a Spell using one of your divine spell slots on your turn.

You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you're wielding. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 force damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.zZ25N1zpXA8GNhFL]{Effect: Divine Weapon (Force)}

You can instead deal an additional 1d6 damage of an alignment type that matches one of your deity's alignment components. As usual for aligned damage, this can damage only creatures of the opposite alignment.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.OkcblqWj4aHVAkrp]{Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.AclYG5JuBFrjCY3I]{Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.dvOfGUuvG8ihcN8d]{Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.GlpZyxAGhy5QNqkm]{Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)}

Diviner Sense.name: 未卜先知 Diviner Sense
Diviner Sense.description: 你能感应到魔法的威胁。在使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Yb0C1uLzeHrVLl7a]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic} 探索行动时，只要有至少一个敌人拥有魔法效果或魔法物品，并且在你侦测魔法的范围内，那你的先攻就可以双骰取高。

Diving Armor.name: 潜水护甲 Diving Armor
Diving Armor.description: 你用鱼鳍，螺旋桨或其他装置改造了你的护甲，让你能更轻易地在水中移动，且机械鳃能帮你从水中汲取可呼吸的空气。当穿戴你的护甲大发明，你可以在水下呼吸，且获得等同于陆地速度的游泳速度。

Djinni Magic.name: Djinni Magic
Djinni Magic.description: The magic of djinn runs through your blood. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

Doctor's Visitation.name: Doctor's Visitation
Doctor's Visitation.description: You move to provide immediate care to those who need it. Stride, then use one of the following: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison}. You can spend a second action to instead Stride and then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rfnEcjxIFqwlJwJT]{Treat a Condition}.

Dodge Away.name: Dodge Away
Dodge Away.description:
Trigger You are the target of a melee attack.

Requirements You're aware of the attack and aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.

You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} after the Strike.

If you're a master in Acrobatics, you can move 10 feet on this Step instead of 5 feet.

Dodging Roll.name: Dodging Roll
Dodging Roll.description:
Trigger You take damage from an area effect that allows a Reflex save.

You dodge a blow at the last possible moment.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} and gain resistance to all damage equal to your level against the triggering effect. If your Step moves you out of the triggering effect's area, this resistance is instead equal to your level plus your Dexterity modifier.

Dogfang Bite.name: Dogfang Bite
Dogfang Bite.description: You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do. Your beak unarmed attack gains the versatile S weapon trait.

Domain Acumen.name: Domain Acumen
Domain Acumen.description:
Every oracle's mystery touches on a divine domain of the deities that fuel it; you can access that power.

Choose one of the domains associated with your mystery for which you don't already have an initial domain spell. You gain an initial domain spell from that domain, which you cast as a revelation spell. It gains the cursebound trait. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Domain Fluency.name: Domain Fluency
Domain Fluency.description: You command a deep understanding of the divine domains related to your mystery. Choose one of the domains associated with your mystery for which you have an initial domain spell. You gain an advanced domain spell from that domain, which you cast as a revelation spell, causing it to gain the cursebound trait. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Domain Focus.name: Domain Focus
Domain Focus.description: Your devotion to your deity's domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Domain Initiate.name: Domain Initiate
Domain Initiate.description:
Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers. Select one domain - a subject of particular interest to you within your religion - from your deity's list. You gain an initial domain spell for that domain, a spell unique to the domain and not available to other clerics.

Domain spells are a type of focus spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell, and you start with a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You refill your focus pool during your daily preparations, and you can regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to pray to your deity or do service toward their causes. Focus spells are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.

Focus spells don't require spell slots, nor can you cast them using spell slots. Certain feats can give you more focus spells and increase the size of your focus pool, though your focus pool can never hold more than 3 Focus Points.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, selecting a different domain each time and gaining its domain spell.

Domain Wellspring.name: Domain Wellspring
Domain Wellspring.description: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you've placed in your domains. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Dongun Education.name: Dongun Education
Dongun Education.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You're knowledgeable in trades that are important to your people's survival and commercial interests. Pick two of the following Lore skills: Engineering Lore, Explosive Lore, or Firearm Lore. At 2nd level, you gain expert proficiency in these Lore skills; at 7th level, you gain master proficiency in these Lore skills; and at 15th level, you gain legendary proficiency in them.

Double Prey.name: Double Prey
Double Prey.description: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down. When you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} action, you can pick two creatures as your prey.

Double Shot.name: Double Shot
Double Shot.description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon with reload 0

You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession. Make two Strikes, each against a separate target and with a -2 penalty. Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made both of them.

Double Slice.name: Double Slice
Double Slice.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

Make two Strikes, one with each of your two melee weapons, each using your current multiple attack penalty. Both Strikes must have the same target. If the second Strike is made with a weapon that doesn't have the agile trait, it takes a -2 penalty.

If both attacks hit, combine their damage, and then add any other applicable effects from both weapons. You add any precision damage only once, to the attack of your choice. Combine the damage from both Strikes and apply resistances and weaknesses only once. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Doublespeak.name: 指东道西 Doublespeak
Doublespeak.description:
对你来说，指桑骂槐指东道西是一件很轻松的事。通过微妙的修辞强调等经验，你可以将真实意思隐藏到不相干的话语中，只有盟友能理解其中的真意。任何和你共同旅行至少一周的盟友自动理解你的话语。

其它听众则必须进行察觉检定对抗你的欺骗DC才能知晓你在传递暗语，其必须大成功才能理解你的暗语本意。

Dousing Spell.name: Dousing Spell
Dousing Spell.description:
You enhance your spell with elemental water, soaking the target.

If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell targeting a single creature, you soak the target of the spell with water. If the target has @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid or Fire Damage}, the DC to end those conditions is reduced to 10, and the creature can attempt a flat check to end those types of persistent damage immediately.

The spell gains the water trait (causing it to deal extra damage to creatures with weakness to water).

Dracomancer.name: Dracomancer
Dracomancer.description:
Your inborn arcane power manifests as your exemplar's most time-honored spells.

Choose one 1st-level spell and one 2nd-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{Blur}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike} for a black dragon exemplar).

You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells. You gain the trained proficiency rank in arcane spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your key spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Draconic Arrogance.name: Draconic Arrogance
Draconic Arrogance.description: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you. While raging, you gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Draconic Scent.name: Draconic Scent
Draconic Scent.description:
Your sense of smell is uncanny, much like a dragon's. You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet.

The GM might double the range if you're downwind from the creature or halve the range if you're upwind, at their discretion.

Draconic Sycophant.name: Draconic Sycophant
Draconic Sycophant.description:
You have an affect that dragonkind find unusually pleasing—and when that fails, you know when to duck. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks and saving throws against dragons. In addition, whenever you meet a creature with the dragon trait in a social situation, you can attempt a Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on that creature immediately, rather than after conversing for 1 minute; you take a –5 penalty to this check. If you fail, you can choose to engage in 1 minute of conversation and then attempt a new check rather than accept the failure or critical failure result.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cc8O47KFsODReoBe]{Glad-Hand} skill feat, you don't take the penalty to your immediate Diplomacy check if the target has the dragon trait.

Drag Down.name: Drag Down
Drag Down.description:
While swimming in water at least 10 feet deep, you grab an adjacent creature (on nearby land or in the water) and pull it below the surface.

Attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature. On a success, if the creature is on land, in addition to the normal effects of Grapple, you pull the creature into the water in a space adjacent to you. If the creature is already in the water, on a success, in addition the normal effects of Grapple, you drag the creature 10 feet deeper into the water, moving 10 feet with the creature.

Moving a creature into water or deeper into water using Drag Down is forced movement for the creature but not for you.

Dragging Strike.name: Dragging Strike
Dragging Strike.description:
You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

Make a melee Strike. If you hit a target that is your size or smaller, that creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your current turn, and you can move it 5 feet toward you. When you move the creature, you can move the same distance in the same direction as it, even if you're adjacent to the target. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

This Strike has the following failure effect.

Failure The target becomes flat-footed until the end of your

current turn.

Dragon Arcana.name: Dragon Arcana
Dragon Arcana.description:
You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

Add the draconic bloodline's granted spells to your spell list; you must still learn them or add them to your repertoire as normal. These spells are @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tgIhRUFtgDSELpJE]{Spell Immunity}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.forsqeofEszBNtLq]{Chromatic Wall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.iL6TujgTCtRRa0Y0]{Prismatic Wall}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fkDeKktdmbeplYRY]{Overwhelming Presence}.

Dragon Disciple Dedication.name: Dragon Disciple Dedication
Dragon Disciple Dedication.description:
Access You are a kobold with the dragonscaled or spellscaled

heritage, a dragon instinct barbarian, or a draconic

bloodline sorcerer.

You choose to study or worship one type of dragon, and your focus grants you a measure of its power. Choose one color of dragon when you select this feat; if you are a sorcerer with the draconic bloodline, this must be the same type as your bloodline.

You gain resistance equal to half your level against one type of damage determined by the chosen dragon type. The GM may allow you to choose a dragon type not listed below, and will determine the damage type appropriate for that dragon.

  • Black or Copper Acid
  • Blue or Bronze Electricity
  • Brass, Gold, or Red Fire
  • Green Poison
  • Silver or White Cold

You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against sleep effects and effects that would make you paralyzed.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the dragon disciple archetype. If you later take the sorcerer archetype, you must choose the draconic bloodline.

Dragon Grip.name: Dragon Grip
Dragon Grip.description: Your hold has a unique draconic connection. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when you attempt to Make an Impression on a creature with the dragon trait. You gain access to the Riding Drake animal companion.

Dragon Prince.name: Dragon Prince
Dragon Prince.description: The blood of the Dragon Kings runs strong in your veins. Your draconic heritage is clearly visible, with hair that is almost entirely crimson, azure, or the like, and that shines like a dragon's scales. You can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JcobNl4iE9HmMYtE]{Dragon Breath} sorcerer bloodline spell as an innate arcane spell once per day, but you can use only the dragon breath that is associated with your heritage and that matches the energy type of your Dragon Spit feat. At 12th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened by an additional spell level.

Dragon Roar.name: Dragon Roar
Dragon Roar.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{Dragon Stance}

You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies. Enemies within a 15-foot emanation must succeed at a Will save against your Intimidation DC or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). When a creature frightened by the roar begins its turn adjacent to you, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 on that turn.

Your first attack that hits a frightened creature after you roar and before the end of your next turn gains a +4 circumstance bonus to damage.

After you use Dragon Roar, you can't use it again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. Its effects end immediately if you leave Dragon Stance. Creatures in the area of your roar are then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Dragon Shape.name: Dragon Shape
Dragon Shape.description:
You can take on the form of some of the world's most fearsome creatures.

Add the forms listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} to your wild shape list.

Whenever you're polymorphed into another form using wild shape, you gain resistance 5 to your choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison.

Dragon Spit.name: Dragon Spit
Dragon Spit.description: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true-you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. Choose one of the following cantrips: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}. You can cast this spell as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.

Dragon Stance.name: Dragon Stance
Dragon Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored

You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon's tail. You can make dragon tail attacks that deal 1d10 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the backswing, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Dragon Stance, you can ignore the first square of difficult terrain while Striding.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.qUowHpn79Dpt1hVn]{Stance: Dragon Stance}

Dragon Transformation.name: Dragon Transformation
Dragon Transformation.description:
You transform into a ferocious Large dragon, gaining the effects of 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} except that you use your own AC and attack modifier, you apply your extra damage from Rage, and the Breath Weapon uses your class DC. The action to Dismiss the transformation gains the rage trait.

At 18th level, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, your damage bonus with dragon Strikes increases to +12, and you gain a +14 status bonus to your breath weapon damage.

Dragon's Breath.name: Dragon's Breath
Dragon's Breath.description: You can put more effort into your Kobold Breath to channel greater draconic power, though it takes more out of you. When you use Kobold Breath, you can increase the damage dice to d8s and increase the area to 60 feet for a line breath weapon or 30 feet for a cone. If you do, you can't use Kobold Breath again for 1 hour.

Dragon's Presence.name: Dragon's Presence
Dragon's Presence.description:
As a member of dragonkind, you project unflappable confidence (that collapses catastrophically against the deadliest foes).

When you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead. When you roll a failure against a fear effect, you get a critical failure instead.

In addition, when you attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a foe of your level or lower, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the Intimidation check.

Dragon's Rage Breath.name: Dragon's Rage Breath
Dragon's Rage Breath.description:
Requirements You haven't used this ability since you last Raged

You breathe deeply and exhale powerful energy in a 30-foot cone or 60-foot line, dealing [[/r (@actor.level)d6#Dragon's Rage Breath]]{1d6 damage per level}. The area and damage type match those of your dragon (see @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.VDot7CDcXElxmkkz]{Table 3-4}).

If you used this ability in the last hour, the area and the damage are halved (15-foot cone or 30-foot line; [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2))d6#Dragon's Rage Breath]]{1d6 damage for every 2 levels}).

Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Reflex save.

Dragon's Rage Wings.name: Dragon's Rage Wings
Dragon's Rage Wings.description: You sprout dragon wings from your back of the same color as your chosen dragon. While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. If you are flying when your rage ends, you start to fall but the transformation only completes at the last moment, so you take no damage from the fall and land standing up.

Dragonblood Paragon.name: Dragonblood Paragon
Dragonblood Paragon.description:
Your draconic anatomy becomes especially pronounced. You increase the power of one of the following kobold heritages or feats you have.

Dracomancer Increase the number of times you can cast each of the granted 1st- and 2nd-level innate spells by 1.

Kobold Breath Creatures that critically fail their save against your Kobold Breath take 3d4 persistent damage of the type dealt by your draconic patron.

Strongjaw Kobold Your jaws unarmed attack gains the deadly d6 trait.

Venomtail Kobold You produce enough venom to use the Tail Toxin action twice per day.

Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator).name: 屠龙誓约(解放者) Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)
Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator).description:
你立下誓约，屠尽邪龙。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须杀死你所遭遇到的邪恶龙类。

如果你使用由邪恶龙类触发的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步 Liberating Step} ，你的盟友会在自由快步所给予的检定上获得+4的环境加值，这名盟友在之后还可以进行两次快步（Step）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.iyONT1qgeRgoYHsZ]{效果：自由快步 (vs. 龙)}

你不会将邪恶龙类视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处他们统治的国家。

Dragonslayer Oath (Paladin).name: 屠龙誓约(圣武士) Dragonslayer Oath (Paladin)
Dragonslayer Oath (Paladin).description:
你立下誓约，屠尽邪龙。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须杀死你所遭遇到的邪恶龙类。

你对抗邪恶龙类的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{报应打击 Retributive Strike} 在伤害上获得+4的环境加值，如果你在你所使用的武器上达到大师熟练等级，则获得+6的环境加值。

你不会将邪恶龙类视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处他们统治的国家。

Dragonslayer Oath (Redeemer).name: 屠龙誓约(救赎者) Dragonslayer Oath (Redeemer)
Dragonslayer Oath (Redeemer).description:
你立下誓约，屠尽邪龙。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须杀死你所遭遇到的邪恶龙类。

你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{救赎瞥视 Glimpse of Redemption's} 所给予的抗力在对抗邪恶龙类的伤害时变为7+你的等级。

你不会将邪恶龙类视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处他们统治的国家。

Drain Vitality.name: Drain Vitality
Drain Vitality.description:
Frequency once per minute

Requirements You're wielding your bonded beast gun.

You draw out the bestial magic energy within your bonded beast gun to fortify yourself, purge ongoing harm, and bolster your life force with a sheath of swirling life essence. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level and attempt a flat check against any ongoing persistent damage, using the DC appropriate for particularly effective assistance. Using this ability depletes the magic within your bonded beast gun, preventing you from using any of its activated abilities until the end of your next turn.

Draw From the Land.name: Draw From the Land
Draw From the Land.description:
Requirements You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn, and it matched the terrain you're in.

You pull strength from the surrounding terrain. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level. They last for 1 round. If you previously gained the plains terrain attunement effect this turn, combine the temporary Hit Points together.

Dread Marshal Stance.name: Dread Marshal Stance
Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Putting on a grim face for the battle ahead, you encourage your allies to strike fear into their foes with vicious attacks.

When you use this action, attempt an Intimidation check. The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of your level, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check.

Critical Success Your @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.KBEJVRrie2JTHWIK]{Marshal's Aura} increases to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20-foot emanation}, and it grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Success As critical success, but your aura's size doesn't increase.

Failure You fail to enter the stance.

Critical Failure You fail to enter the stance and can't take this action again for 1 minute.

Dread Striker.name: Dread Striker
Dread Striker.description: You capitalize on your enemies' fear to slip past their defenses. Any creature that has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks.

Dream May.name: Dream May
Dream May.description:
