You are the child of a night hag, making one of your eyes violet or even black. Your mother's powers over sleep and dreams have given you a degree of resistance to those effects, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against sleep effects and effects that cause or alter dreams.

In addition, sleep is more restorative for you. You regain [[/r (@actor.level*2)*(max(@actor.abilities.con.mod,1))]]{HP equal to your Constitution modifier times double your level} instead of just times your level, and you reduce any @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} conditions you have by 2 instead of by 1.

Drenching Mist.name: Drenching Mist
Drenching Mist.description:
When you cast obscuring mist, you can modify it to add the following heightened entry to its effects.

Heightened (3rd) Your mist is particularly laden with moisture. Non-magical fires within the area are automatically extinguished. Choose one magical fire or fire spell in the area and attempt to counteract it.

Drifter's Juke.name: Drifter's Juke
Drifter's Juke.description:
Requirements You're wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand, and your other hand is either wielding a melee weapon or is empty.

You move in and out of range to complement your attacks. You Step, make a Strike, Step, and make another Strike. One Strike must be a ranged Strike using your firearm or crossbow, and the other must be a melee Strike using your melee weapon or unarmed attack. You can choose not to take one or both Steps.

Drive-By Attack.name: Drive-By Attack
Drive-By Attack.description:
Requirements You are piloting a vehicle.

You can smoothly line up an attack without disrupting your control. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Drive}, gaining the effects of the Drive action for the same number of actions you spent to Drive-By Attack. At any point during your vehicle's movement, you Strike.

Drow Shootist Dedication.name: Drow Shootist Dedication
Drow Shootist Dedication.description:
Every chance you get, you practice with the hand crossbow to increase your draw speed and accuracy. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the hand crossbow. If you're at least an expert in a hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You also gain the Shootist's Draw action.

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hV9wXLvgH2LBaBwk]{Shootist's Draw} 1

Frequency once per round

Effect You Interact to draw a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XyA6PKV46aNlLXOd]{Hand Crossbow} and Strike with it, or you Strike with a loaded hand crossbow you're already holding and then Interact to stow it.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the drow shootist archetype.

Druid Dedication.name: 德鲁伊入门 Druid Dedication
Druid Dedication.description:
你像一个德鲁伊一样施法，并获得施法Cast a Spell行动。你每天可以准备两个来自原能施法根源的常见戏法，这些戏法可以来自于本书或其他你学习或发现到的原能戏法。你在原能的法术攻击骰和法术DC中受训。你在德鲁伊变体法术中的施法主属性是感知Wisdom，可以施展的是原能根源的德鲁伊法术。你学会德鲁伊语言Druidic Language。你如德鲁伊一样选择一个派系。你成为该派系的成员，并受限于其禁忌。你在自然Nature和所选派系的偏好技能中受训；对于每一个你已经达成受训的上述技能，你都可以在另一个你自选的技能中受训。你不会得到所选派系给予的其他能力。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从德鲁伊变体中获得了其他两个专长。

Dual Energy Heart.name: Dual Energy Heart
Dual Energy Heart.description: A second energy dwells in your eidolon. Choose an additional energy damage type. Your unarmed attack that deals energy damage gains the versatile trait for the second energy damage type, and your eidolon gains resistance to the second type of energy damage equal to half your level.

Dual Finisher.name: Dual Finisher
Dual Finisher.description:
Requirements You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.

You split your attacks. Make two melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes}, one with each required weapon, each against a different foe. If the second Strike is made with a non-agile weapon, it takes a -2 penalty.

Increase your multiple attack penalty only after attempting both Strikes.

Dual Onslaught.name: Dual Onslaught
Dual Onslaught.description:
When you lash out with both weapons, you leave no room for the target to escape your attack.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice}, if you miss with both @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes}, choose one of the two weapons and apply the effects of a hit with that weapon.

You can't choose a weapon if your attack roll with that weapon was a critical failure, meaning you still miss entirely if both attack rolls were critical failures.

Dual Studies.name: Dual Studies
Dual Studies.description:
You and your eidolon have some skills you practice on your own.

Choose two skills. Your eidolon becomes trained in one of those skills and you become trained in the other skill.

At 7th level, you each become an expert in the chosen skills. These skill proficiencies are not shared between you and your eidolon.

Dual Thrower.name: Dual Thrower
Dual Thrower.description:
You know how to throw two weapons as easily as Strike with them.

Whenever a dual-weapon warrior feat allows you to make a melee Strike, you can instead make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon or a one-handed ranged weapon you are wielding.

Any effects from these feats that apply to one-handed melee weapons or melee Strikes also apply to one-handed ranged weapons and ranged Strikes.

Dual-Form Weapon.name: 双态武器 Dual-Form Weapon
Dual-Form Weapon.description:
你用一种可以替换的内联式部件改造了你的大发明，你能将其彻底转变成另一种类型的武器。当你选择该专长时，选择1种0级或1级的简易或军用武器。这必须是常见的，或者你获得许可的其他武器。这种武器变成你的大发明的第二配置。

为新的配置选择一组新的武器改修。你可以花费2个交互Interact动作在2个配置中切换你的武器大发明。这些动作不需要连续进行，但如果你进行了第一个动作，但还没进行第二个，则该武器失去功能，因为它处于一种中间状态。你的武器的负载总是两个配置中较高的负载，而不管它当前处于哪个配置——如果一把武器比另一把小，你也需要把武器剩下的部分拿在手上。你的武器大发明中的任何符文都不会影响第二配置。

Dual-Handed Assault.name: Dual-Handed Assault
Dual-Handed Assault.description:
Requirements You are wielding a one-handed melee weapon and have a free hand.

You snap your free hand over to grip your weapon just long enough to add momentum and deliver a more powerful blow to your opponent.

Make a Strike with the required weapon. You quickly switch your grip during the Strike in order to make the attack with two hands.

If the weapon doesn't normally have the two-hand trait, increase its weapon damage die by one step for this attack. If the weapon has the two-hand trait, you gain the benefit of that trait and a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the weapon's number of damage dice.

When the Strike is complete, you resume gripping the weapon with only one hand. This action doesn't end any stance or fighter feat effect that requires you to have one hand free.

Dual-Weapon Blitz.name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
Dual-Weapon Blitz.description:
Requirements You are wielding two one-handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.

You attack as you dash among foes. Stride up to your Speed. At any point during this movement, you can Strike once with each of the two required weapons. These Strikes can be against the same or different targets, as you see fit.

Dual-Weapon Reload.name: Dual-Weapon Reload
Dual-Weapon Reload.description:
Requirements You're wielding two one-handed weapons, each in a different hand, one of which is a ranged weapon.

You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons. You Interact to reload a one‑handed ranged weapon you're holding. Unlike most Interact actions, you don't need a free hand to reload your ranged weapon in this way.

Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication.name: Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication
Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication.description:
You're exceptional in your use of two weapons. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} fighter feat. This serves as Double Slice for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the dual-weapon warrior archetype.

Dualborn.name: Dualborn
Dualborn.description:
Your suli heritage can be traced back to two geniekin ancestors of opposing elements, or to an elemental ancestor that embodied two combined elements. Choose two of the following elements: air, earth, fire, and water. Once made, this choice can't be changed. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1) to all damaging effects with the traits of either of your chosen elements.

Special If you take the Elemental Assault or Elemental Bulwark ancestry feats, you can use them only with your chosen elements. You can add your resistance from this feat to the resistance you gain from Elemental Bulwark against effects with your elements' traits, for a total of 5 + half your level, or 10 + half your level with Improved Elemental Bulwark. If you take the Tetraelemental Assault feat, you can choose each of your two elements twice each, instead of choosing each of the four elements once each.

Dualistic Synergy.name: Dualistic Synergy
Dualistic Synergy.description: If your next action is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots, you gain a benefit. If the spell is arcane, you can attempt a skill check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} with a +1 status bonus to the check after casting the spell, or a +2 status bonus if the spell is 7th level or higher. If the spell is primal, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level for 1 round. If the spell is a halcyon spell, you gain both benefits.

Dubious Knowledge.name: 诡异知识 Dubious Knowledge
Dubious Knowledge.description: 你的脑海中有着包罗万象的学问——至少你自己这么认为，它们并不全来自可靠的来源。当你使用一项技能来回忆知识且失败时（而不是大失败），你会同时获得一条正确的线索和一条错误的线索，并且你无法区分究竟哪一个才是真实的。

Dueling Dance (Fighter).name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
Dueling Dance (Fighter).description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon. While you are in this stance, you constantly have the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{Dueling Parry}.

Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler).name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler).description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{Dueling Parry}.

Dueling Parry (Fighter).name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
Dueling Parry (Fighter).description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirements.

Grants @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.1nCwQErK6hpkNvfw]{Effect: Dueling Parry}

Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler).name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler).description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirements.

Grants @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.1nCwQErK6hpkNvfw]{Effect: Dueling Parry}

Dueling Riposte.name: Dueling Riposte
Dueling Riposte.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

Requirements You are benefiting from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{Dueling Parry}.

You riposte against your flailing enemy. Make a melee Strike against or attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the triggering creature.

Duelist Dedication.name: Duelist Dedication
Duelist Dedication.description:
You are always ready to draw your weapon and begin a duel, no matter the circumstances. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qFt6zyWVX1njJf1l]{Quick Draw} ranger feat, enabling you to both draw and attack with a weapon as 1 action. This serves as Quick Draw for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the duelist archetype.

Duelist's Challenge.name: Duelist's Challenge
Duelist's Challenge.description:
Select one foe that you can see and proclaim a challenge. That foe is your dueling opponent until they are defeated, flee, or the encounter ends.

Any time you hit that enemy using a single one-handed melee weapon while your other hand or hands are free, you gain a circumstance bonus to the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike's} damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

If you attack a creature other than your dueling opponent, you take a circumstance penalty to damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

Duelist's Edge.name: 决斗之刻 Duelist's Edge
Duelist's Edge.description:
触发 你进行先攻检定并且至少能观察到一名敌人。

你通过决斗磨练自己的反应时间并学会在战斗开始时无缝地拔出武器。你在触发的先攻检定上获得+2环境加值并且你能够立刻进行互动来拔出你的奥多里决斗剑。

Duo's Aim.name: Duo's Aim
Duo's Aim.description: With assistance from your spotter, you aim for an especially accurate attack. Make a ranged weapon Strike against a foe either within your spotter's melee reach or the first range increment of a ranged weapon your spotter is wielding. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's concealment. If you're using a firearm with the kickback trait, you don't take the normal circumstance penalty to this Strike for not having the required Strength score or firing without using a tripod.

Duskwalker Lore.name: Duskwalker Lore
Duskwalker Lore.description: You either found another duskwalker who taught you the secrets of your kind, or you managed to research your unusual heritage. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Medicine and Religion. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Boneyard Lore.

Duskwalker Magic.name: Duskwalker Magic
Duskwalker Magic.description: Your connection to psychopomps gives you the power to glimpse the near future and protect corpses from the ravages of undeath. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Dustsoul.name: Dustsoul
Dustsoul.description: Your earth elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as dust and dirt, like the soil of a field or the hot desert sands. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Survival. If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can sustain yourself on dirt and ash instead of normal food and water.

Dwarven Doughtiness.name: Dwarven Doughtiness
Dwarven Doughtiness.description: You are either naturally calm and collected in the face of imminent danger, or you are very good at faking it. At the end of your turn, reduce your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition by 2 instead of 1.

Dwarven Lore.name: Dwarven Lore
Dwarven Lore.description: You eagerly absorbed the old stories and traditions of your ancestors, your gods, and your people, studying in subjects and techniques passed down for generation upon generation. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting and Religion. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Dwarven Lore.

Dwarven Reinforcement.name: Dwarven Reinforcement
Dwarven Reinforcement.description:
You can use your knowledge of engineering and metalwork to temporarily strengthen thick objects and structures.

By spending 1 hour working on an item, you can give it a +1 circumstance bonus to its Hardness for 24 hours. If you're a master in Crafting, the bonus is +2, and if you're legendary, the bonus is +3.

You can reinforce a portion of a structure, though 1 hour usually reinforces only a door, a few windows, or another section that fits within a 10-foot cube.

Dwarven Weapon Cunning.name: Dwarven Weapon Cunning
Dwarven Weapon Cunning.description: You've learned cunning techniques to get the best effects out of your dwarven weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a battle axe, pick, warhammer, or a dwarf weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Dwarven Weapon Expertise.name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
Dwarven Weapon Expertise.description: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for battle axes, picks, warhammers, and all dwarven weapons in which you are trained.

Dwarven Weapon Familiarity.name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity.description:
Your kin have instilled in you an affinity for hard-hitting weapons, and you prefer these to more elegant arms. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6I4YJAQUbTAqbpsI]{Pick}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.rXt4629QSg7KDTgJ]{Warhammer}.

You also gain access to all uncommon dwarf weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial dwarf weapons are simple weapons and advanced dwarf weapons are martial weapons.

Eagle Eye.name: Eagle Eye
Eagle Eye.description: Your practice with crossbows and firearms has sharpened your attention to detail. You become a master in Perception.

Eagle Eyes.name: Eagle Eyes
Eagle Eyes.description: You and your spotter are adept at watching out for one another. As long as you can see or hear each other, neither of you is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, undetected, or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or to creatures of your level or lower using a surprise attack. However, they can still help their allies flank.

Earned Glory.name: 赢取荣誉 Earned Glory
Earned Glory.description:
精灵通常会对他们的半精灵亲属持怀疑态度，而你很擅长通过讲述自身的成就来获得他们的尊重。你在表演（Performance）技能上获得受训。若你已经自动在表演技能上受训（比如由于背景或职业），则自行选择1个技能获得受训作为替代。

你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{动人表演 Impressive Performance} 专长。当你尝试表演检定来对1名精灵进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象} 动作时，若检定结果为大失败，则使用失败作为替代。

Earthsense.name: Earthsense
Earthsense.description: Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble. You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

Earworm.name: 耳虫 Earworm
Earworm.description:
透过无止尽重复一个主题，你能殖入耳虫，一首不断在你盟友脑海中回荡的曲子。（疑似漏翻 preparing them to respond to it later）

选择一个组曲戏法，并花10分钟重复一段旋律、咏叹、演说、一系列的动作或类似能具体表达这戏法的表演。这项活动会有与表演类型相符的特征。在这个活动中，你能向所有能看到或听到(以及与表演类型相符的接收方式)你的盟友植入耳虫。

当你创造了耳虫，你能以一个自由动作进行一次表演检定激活。这检定的DC使用激活耳虫时等级最高的目标同等级的非常困难DC(Core Rulebook 503-504)。

如果成功，你对所有被植入耳虫并且察觉到你表演的盟友施放该戏法；如果失败，耳虫会腐坏耗尽。因为这依赖早期的不断反复，所以你不能进一步使用像是绕梁组曲或激发英勇等自由动作来调整激活的耳虫。

盟友们在激活耳虫后、或是在你花10分钟植入另一个耳虫后，或在你进行下一次日常准备期间自动将其遗忘，视何者为先。

Easily Dismissed.name: Easily Dismissed
Easily Dismissed.description:
Access Chelaxian nationality

You are practiced at blending into the background of the streets and halls of larger folk to ensure that you are overlooked. When you are in a crowd or well trafficked urban area, you can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, even when observed. On a success, you aren't hidden or undetected, but other creatures simply don't take particular notice of you, even though they can see you. You can't use this ability on observers who have already seen you perform obtrusive or notable actions. If you perform any action other than to Hide or Sneak or otherwise take particularly salient actions (GM's discretion), observers notice you right away.

Eat Fortune.name: Eat Fortune
Eat Fortune.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature within 60 feet uses a fortune or misfortune effect.

As someone tries to twist fate, you consume the interference. The triggering effect is disrupted.

If it's a misfortune effect, Eat Fortune gains the fortune trait; if it's a fortune effect, Eat Fortune gains the misfortune trait. This fortune or misfortune applies to the same roll the triggering effect would have, so you couldn't negate a fortune effect with Eat Fortune and then apply a misfortune effect to the same roll.

Ebb And Flow.name: Ebb And Flow
Ebb And Flow.description:
You can pull forth both positive and negative energy simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

If your next action is to cast a 1-action or 2-action @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell, choose one creature in range that would be harmed by the spell, and choose another creature within range that would be healed by the spell. Your heal or harm targets both creatures.

Echoes In Stone.name: Echoes In Stone
Echoes In Stone.description:
Requirements You are standing on a stone or earthen surface.

You pause a moment to attune your senses to the stone around you. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a new sense: imprecise @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]{Tremorsense} with a range of 20 feet.

Echoing Channel.name: Echoing Channel
Echoing Channel.description:
When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

If the next action you use is to cast a 2-action @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to heal or damage a single creature, choose one additional creature adjacent to either you or the target. Target that creature with a 1-action version of the same spell. This spell is the same level as the 2-action harm or heal you cast and doesn't cost another spell slot.

Echoing Spell.name: Echoing Spell
Echoing Spell.description:
You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} of 4th level or lower that has no duration, the spell's energy reverberates and echoes. You can Cast the Spell a second time before the end of your next turn without expending a spell slot.

Eclectic Obsession.name: Eclectic Obsession
Eclectic Obsession.description:
Frequency once per day

Your desire for stimulation has led you from one pursuit to another and granted you a smattering of expertise with myriad crafts and professions. You reflect on snippets you've learned to temporarily become trained in one Lore skill of your choice. This proficiency lasts for 10 minutes or until you critically fail a check with that skill. Since this training is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a permanent character option like a feat or a skill increase.

Eclectic Polymath.name: 兼收博学 Eclectic Polymath
Eclectic Polymath.description: 你多变的思维让你可以快速替换法术。如果你在每日准备的时候使用隐秘博学能力将一个法术加入法术库，当你再次进行准备的时候你可以保存该法术库中的法术，而失去一个法术库中的同级法术。

Eclectic Skill.name: 兼收技能 Eclectic Skill
Eclectic Skill.description:
你广泛的经验让你熟悉多种技能。

你将职业等级加在未受训的技能检定上。你未受训的技能，熟练度加值等同于你的等级。

如果你在神秘学上拥有传奇熟练等级，你可以尝试任何要求你拥有专家熟练等级的技能检定，就算你未受训或者仅受训也一样。

Eclectic Sword Mastery.name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
Eclectic Sword Mastery.description: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings. You change one of the swords designated in your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AmFv3ClkAVRowHLI]{Tengu Weapon Familiarity} to a new one that you're wielding, provided the sword meets the specifications of Tengu Weapon Familiarity. You can Interact to draw a sword as part of this activity, designating the sword as part of drawing it; disrupting that Interact action prevents you from designating it as one of your swords. This designation lasts until your next daily preparations.

Eclectic Sword Training.name: Eclectic Sword Training
Eclectic Sword Training.description:
You were always taught that you needed to be able to use whatever weapon came your way. You can change any of the swords designated in your Tengu Weapon Familiarity to different swords that meet the same specifications.

You have to practice with a sword during your daily preparations to designate it, and the designation only lasts until your next daily preparations. This changes only your proficiency; it doesn't change your access.

Edgewatch Detective Dedication.name: Edgewatch Detective Dedication
Edgewatch Detective Dedication.description:
You become trained in Society or Thievery; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can use Perception instead of Survival to Track, and you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Experienced Tracker} skill feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the this archetype.

Educate Allies.name: 言传身教 Educate Allies
Educate Allies.description:
触发 一位受益于你组曲法术的盟友，受制于有听觉、幻术、语言、音波或视觉特征的效果。

你转变了你组曲法术的性质，改为传第一些你的防卫的知识。

直到你下回合开始前 ，所有受到你组曲法术影响的盟友会从内行看门道能力中获得+1环境加值。 @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.WrWSieH9Acy6XuzV]{效果: 言传身教（盟友） Effect: Educate Allies (Ally)} 教导你的盟友也会强化你的技能，直到你下回合开始前，你自己从内行看门道获得的环境加值变成+2。 @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.KceTcamIZ4ZrQJLD]{效果: 言传身教（自身） Effect: Educate Allies (Self)}

Educated Assessment.name: Educated Assessment
Educated Assessment.description: You attempt to Recall Knowledge about a creature, and the GM uses the same secret roll result against the creature's Deception or Stealth DC, giving you the information from a Battle Assessment. You might get a different degree of success on the Recall Knowledge check than what you get for the Battle Assessment. If you have the Battle Assessment feat, you gain the effects of Educated Assessment whenever you Recall Knowledge (such as with the Automatic Knowledge feat).

Eerie Compression.name: Eerie Compression
Eerie Compression.description: Your limbs and even your torso can collapse in on themselves, allowing you to fit through tight spaces as though you were a Small creature. You can move at full Speed while Squeezing.

Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist).name: 高效炼金术 Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist)
Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist).description:
得益于你花费在研究和实验上的时光，你知道该怎样扩大公式的生产规模而无需额外的注意力。

当花费休整期去制作（Craft）炼金物品时，你能够在单一批次中生产两倍的炼金物品而无需花费额外的准备时间。举例而言，如果你正在制造生命灵药，你能够使用休整期在单一批次中制作至多八份灵药，而不是原本的四份。

这不会减少制作每份炼金物品所需的炼金试剂或其他材料的数量，也不会将你的每日进度提升至基础休整期花费之上。这也不会改变你在使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{高阶炼金术 Advanced Alchemy} 时每一批次所能创造的物品的数量。

Efficient Alchemy (Paragon).name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
Efficient Alchemy (Paragon).description: Your daily preparations are particularly efficient and plentiful. When using your infused reagents to create alchemical items during your daily preparations, you make a batch of three of a given item instead of a batch of two, or a batch of four if your field normally lets you create three of that item.

Efficient Controls.name: Efficient Controls
Efficient Controls.description: By reducing redundant systems and streamlining essential functions, you have made it easier for the vehicle to operate with fewer crew. Reduce the number of crew required to operate your signature vehicle by 25%. For example, you would reduce a sailing ship from needing 1 pilot and 8 crew to 1 pilot and 6 crew. This adjustment only affects the number of crew needed to operate the vehicle; it doesn't reduce the vehicle's need for a pilot.

Efficient Rituals.name: Efficient Rituals
Efficient Rituals.description: You can perform some rituals in less time. If the ritual normally requires 1 day to cast, you can cast it in 4 hours. If it takes longer than 1 day, you cast it in half the number of days, rounded up.

Effortless Captivation.name: Effortless Captivation
Effortless Captivation.description:
Trigger Your turn begins.

You maintain your innate enchantments and illusions with hardly a thought. You immediately gain the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, which you can use only to extend the duration of an enchantment or illusion spell.

Effortless Concentration.name: 不疲专注 Effortless Concentration
Effortless Concentration.description:
触发 你的回合开始。

你心念一动就可以维持法术。你立刻获得维持法术动作的效果，允许你可以加长一个已激活法术的持续时间。

Effortless Reach.name: Effortless Reach
Effortless Reach.description: Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic. Your unarmed attacks gain the reach trait.

Efreeti Magic.name: Efreeti Magic
Efreeti Magic.description: The magic of your efreeti ancestors flows through you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{Illusory Object} once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

Eidetic Ear.name: Eidetic Ear
Eidetic Ear.description: You have an amazing memory for sound. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Eo2Cpg1P4I70me3y]{Assurance (Performance)} feat. With a successful DC 8 flat check, you can accurately recall a sound or a snippet of conversation you heard within the last week. You are memorizing by rote rather than content, and can't use this to cram facts, so this doesn't grant you any extra ability to Recall Knowledge.

Eidetic Memorization.name: Eidetic Memorization
Eidetic Memorization.description: Pathfinders are often asked to study the intricacies of ancient history under less than ideal conditions, and you've trained your brain to make the most of your limited time. You quickly memorize an inscription, scroll, or other piece of writing you can clearly see whose length is equivalent to no more than one page. You can then accurately recreate this writing using a writing kit, wax tablet, or other writing medium, once you have reached safety. You don't need to understand the writing or identify the language to reproduce it. Your memory lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations; if you have not written down or otherwise recreated what you saw by this point, your memory fades and any attempt to recreate what you saw is garbled and unintelligible. You can have only one piece of writing memorized at a time; any previous memorization fades the next time you use this ability.

Eidolon's Opportunity.name: Eidolon's Opportunity
Eidolon's Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within your eidolon's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Your eidolon makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, your eidolon disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Eidolon's Wrath.name: Eidolon's Wrath
Eidolon's Wrath.description:
Your eidolon gains the eidolon's wrath focus spell, which it casts, instead of you. You determine the damage type when you gain the feat: acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, positive, or sonic. If your eidolon is a celestial, fiend, or monitor with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment.

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. As normal, your eidolon shares your Focus Points.

Elaborate Flourish.name: Elaborate Flourish
Elaborate Flourish.description:
You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

If the next action you use is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}, creatures with the ability to Cast that Spell don't automatically know what the spell is.

In addition, creatures that witness your spellcasting take a -2 circumstance penalty to checks to identify the spell with @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} and checks to counteract the spell during its casting (such as with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EpBG4CFMNSZQx7vI]{Counterspell}).

Elastic Mutagen.name: 弹性突变药剂 Elastic Mutagen
Elastic Mutagen.description:
在突变药剂的作用之下，你能将你的身体变得犹如水银一般柔软易弯的流体。

当你处于 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5MKBwpE401uz4kNN]{水银突变药剂 Quicksilver Mutagen} 的影响之下时，你能够延展你的腿并且使用快步（Step）移动至多10尺，你还能挤扁压缩你的身体，让你能够如同小一级的生物一般通过狭窄的空间，但仍如原本的体型一样受到 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤压Squeezing} 带来的任何影响。

Elbow Breaker.name: Elbow Breaker
Elbow Breaker.description:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

You bend your opponent's body or limbs into agonizing positions that make it difficult for them to maintain their grip. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained. This Strike has the following effects in addition to its usual effects.

Critical Success You knock one held item out of the creature's grasp. It falls to the ground in the creature's space.

Success You weaken your opponent's grasp on one held item. Until the start of that creature's turn, attempts to Disarm the opponent of that item gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and the target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item.

Eldritch Archer Dedication.name: Eldritch Archer Dedication
Eldritch Archer Dedication.description:
You blend magic with your archery, leading to powerful results.

If you don't already cast spells from spell slots, you learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} activity. You gain a spell repertoire with one cantrip of your choice, from a spell list of your choice. You choose this cantrip from the common spells on your chosen spell list or from other spells to which you have access on that list. This cantrip must require a spell attack roll. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for that tradition. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

If you already cast spells from spell slots, you learn one additional cantrip from that tradition. If you're a prepared caster, you can prepare this spell in addition to your usual cantrips per day; if you're a spontaneous caster, you add this cantrip to your spell repertoire.

You also gain @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DS9sDOWkXrz2xmHi]{Eldritch Shot}.

Eldritch Debilitations.name: Eldritch Debilitations
Eldritch Debilitations.description:
You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

  • Debilitation The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}.
  • Debilitation The target can't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step}.

Eldritch Nails.name: Eldritch Nails
Eldritch Nails.description:
Your nails are supernaturally long and sharp.

You gain a nails unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 slashing damage}. Your nails are in the brawling group and have the agile and unarmed traits. You can etch your nails with runes with the same cost and restrictions as for etching runes onto @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows}; runes etched onto your nails apply to nails unarmed attacks with both hands but not to other unarmed attacks.

You can deliver hexes through your nails. When you successfully cast a non-cantrip hex that requires 2 actions or more to cast and that doesn't require a spell attack roll, if your target is within your reach, as part of the spellcasting activity you can make a nails Strike against the foe before applying any effects of the hex. If this Strike misses, the hex has no effect.

Eldritch Researcher Dedication.name: Eldritch Researcher Dedication
Eldritch Researcher Dedication.description:
You gain the ability to cast a single arcane or occult cantrip of your choice (which is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up). If you weren't already, you become trained in that tradition's spell DCs and spell attack rolls with Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

Regardless of whether you choose an arcane or occult cantrip, you also become an expert in your choice of either Arcana or Occultism. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks you attempt with the chosen skill when Investigating or Identifying Magic.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Eldritch Researcher archetype.

Electric Counter.name: Electric Counter
Electric Counter.description:
Trigger You would take damage.

Requirements You are in Wild Winds stance.

You gain resistance to electricity equal to your level until the start of your next turn. If the triggering damage was electricity, this resistance applies to it. If the triggering damage was from a melee attack, the attacker takes [[/r {3d6}[electricity]]]{3d6 electricity damage}.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of ki spells you cast, either divine or occult.

Electrify Armor.name: 通电护甲 Electrify Armor
Electrify Armor.description:
需求 你穿戴着你的护甲大发明。

你给你的护甲通电，惩罚胆敢攻击你的敌人。1轮内，任何接触到你的生物，用近战无武装攻击或非长触及的近战武器命中你的生物，受到 [[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4 电击伤害}。如果你不再穿戴你的护甲大发明，该效果终止。

如果你有革命性大发明职业特性，伤害提升至 [[/r {2d4}[electricity]]]{2d4}.

不稳定功能 你制造一种不稳定的连锁反应，数不清的火花在你的护甲上舞动。在通电护甲Electrify上加上不稳定特征。该效果持续1分钟而非1轮，伤害骰从d4提升至d12。( [[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12}]] / [[/r {2d124}[electricity]]]{2d12})

Elemental Assault.name: Elemental Assault
Elemental Assault.description:
Frequency once per day

You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d6]] damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

Elemental Bulwark.name: Elemental Bulwark
Elemental Bulwark.description:
Trigger An enemy is about to damage you with cold, electricity, or fire, or with a spell that has the air, earth, fire, or water trait.

You call upon the corresponding elements of your suli heritage to resist the effect. You gain resistance 5 against the triggering damage.

Elemental Embellish.name: Elemental Embellish
Elemental Embellish.description: You can summon a harmless but impressive elemental display. You become trained in Intimidation. If you would automatically become trained in Intimidation (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. When you Demoralize a foe, if you choose to Demoralize via an elemental display, Demoralize loses the auditory trait and gains the visual trait, and you don't take a penalty when you attempt to Demoralize a creature that doesn't understand your language.

Elemental Eyes.name: Elemental Eyes
Elemental Eyes.description:
You can see in the darkness as easily as an elemental. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.

Elemental Familiar.name: Elemental Familiar
Elemental Familiar.description:
Your familiar becomes an elemental spirit capable of taking on aspects of the four elements: air, earth, fire, or water. Other than taking the form of an elemental instead of an animal, this familiar continues to use all the same rules as other familiars.

Your familiar gains one additional familiar ability each day, which must be one of the following elemental familiar abilities. While your familiar has an elemental familiar ability, your familiar is composed of the associated elemental matter and gains the matching elemental trait. You can't select more than one elemental familiar ability at a time.

  • Air If your familiar stays completely still for 1 round, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until it next takes an action. Any motion, even being moved or carried by another creature, ends this effect.
  • Earth Your familiar gains resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to half your level.
  • Fire Your familiar sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) and emits warmth. Creatures that remain within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] don't take damage from severe environmental cold.
  • Water Your familiar can move through a gap at least 2 inches wide without @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeezing} and can Squeeze through a gap at least 1 inch wide.

Elemental Fist.name: Elemental Fist
Elemental Fist.description:
You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage.

When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Ki Strike}, in addition to the damage types normally available, you can deliver the extra damage in the form of a gust of storm-tossed wind (dealing electricity damage and gaining the air trait), a chunk of stone (dealing bludgeoning damage and gaining the earth trait), a flickering flame (dealing fire damage), or a crashing wave of frigid water (dealing cold damage and gaining the water trait).

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4CUZSDn4BiqWpvZg]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Air)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.U2ekk5iBaSfZlEkp]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Earth)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.rnu7tqMPe3Qm0apj]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Fire)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.tTRy1cc24ApPnym8]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Water)}

Elemental Lore.name: Elemental Lore
Elemental Lore.description:
You've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the Inner Sphere. You gain the trained proficiency in your choice of Survival and either Arcana or Nature. If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in the Lore associated with your Elemental Plane of origin (such as Plane of Fire Lore).

Note Manually choose Arcana or Nature for now.

Elemental Shape.name: Elemental Shape
Elemental Shape.description:
You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body and manifest as a living embodiment of those elements.

Add the forms in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form} to your wild shape list.

Whenever you're polymorphed into another form using wild shape, you gain resistance 5 to fire.

Elemental Summons.name: Elemental Summons
Elemental Summons.description:
You can call the four elements to you.

You can spend 10 minutes in concert with nature to replace one of the spells you've prepared in one of your druid spell slots with a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{Summon Elemental} spell of the same level.

Elemental Trade.name: Elemental Trade
Elemental Trade.description: You have a strong connection with stone and metal. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting. If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the Specialty Crafting skill feat for both @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TWkwy0uQvTGlgEFG]{Stonemasonry} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.S8mPrjJjuObotmjZ]{Blacksmithing}.

Elemental Wrath.name: Elemental Wrath
Elemental Wrath.description: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. When you gain this feat, select acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You can call to the land to cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash} cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components and deals the type of damage you chose instead of acid damage; the spell gains the trait appropriate to its damage instead of the acid trait. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Elementalist Dedication.name: Elementalist Dedication
Elementalist Dedication.description:
Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice: air, earth, fire, or water.

You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait.

This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the elementalist archetype.

Elf Atavism.name: 精灵返祖 Elf Atavism
Elf Atavism.description:
你的精灵血脉特别浓厚，使你的种族特征远超典型的半精灵。你可能在精灵中成长，沉浸在你精灵先组的遗产之中。你获得了你精灵父母或是先组的精灵遗传的好处。你不能选择一个依赖或是增强你所没有的精灵特征的遗传。比如，如果你没有昏暗视觉，你就无法获得洞穴精灵的黑暗视觉。在这种情况下，根据GM的判断，你可能获得不同的效果。

特殊 你必须1级选择此专长，你无法重训来或是重训掉此专长。

Elf Step.name: 精灵快步 Elf Step
Elf Step.description: 你的移动如同优雅的舞蹈一般，即使步伐也是如此。你可以进行2次五尺快步。

Elite Dracomancer.name: Elite Dracomancer
Elite Dracomancer.description:
Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons. Choose one 3rd-level spell and one 4th-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GKpEcy9WId6NJvtx]{Stinking Cloud} for a black dragon exemplar).

You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells.

Elucidating Mercy.name: 澄清救济 Elucidating Mercy
Elucidating Mercy.description:
你的救济为周围最需要的人带来一阵清明。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{救济 Mercy}，你可以选择进行一次反制检定(counteract)移除 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞} 状态，判定反制等级和DC时，使用该状态的来源作为依据。

如果该状态是因为一种仍正在持续的效果，同时你无法移除该效果，该状态会在你下一回合结束时回来。

Elude Trouble.name: Elude Trouble
Elude Trouble.description:
Trigger A creature misses you with a melee attack.

You slip through your foe's opening. Stride up to your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger movement-based reactions from the creature that missed you.

Elude the Divine.name: Elude the Divine
Elude the Divine.description: You are able to escape inquisitions involving divine magic, allowing you to blend in well in Mzali but also to avoid unwanted attention in other oppressive theocracies. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RiuZT3H4QZIIEQXJ]{Slippery Secrets} skill feat, and its benefits also apply against divination effects that attempt to discern your deity. When using Slippery Secrets against a divine divination, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and on a critical success, the divination reveals false information appropriate to your false persona, rather than nothing.

Elven Aloofness.name: 冷傲精灵 Elven Aloofness
Elven Aloofness.description:
尽管你仍旧会关注精灵之外的存在，但你对他们短视的秉性习以为常，这使你觉得他们口中的威胁缺乏说服力。

若1名非精灵（non-elf）在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{胁迫} 你的威吓检定中投出失败时，结果会变为大失败作为替代（因此在1周内无法再次胁迫你）。

当1名非精灵尝试对你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气} 时，你会在1日内临时免疫（temporarily immune）对方的挫败士气以取代正常的10分钟。

Elven Instincts.name: Elven Instincts
Elven Instincts.description: Your senses let you react rapidly. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks made as initiative rolls. Additionally, if your initiative roll result is tied with that of an opponent, you go first, regardless of whether you rolled Perception or not.

Elven Lore.name: 精灵学识 Elven Lore
Elven Lore.description: 你研究过传统精灵艺术，学习过奥术知识以及你周围的世界。你获得了奥术和自然的受训熟练等级。如果你已经在这些中已经受训的话（比如来自你的背景或是职业），你可以自选一项技能将之受训。你同时也会在精灵学识上受训。

Elven Verve.name: Elven Verve
Elven Verve.description: While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of ghouls, you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against effects that would impose the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized},@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}conditions. When you would be immobilized, paralyzed, or slowed for at least 2 rounds, reduce that duration by 1 round.

Elven Weapon Elegance.name: 精灵武器优雅 Elven Weapon Elegance
Elven Weapon Elegance.description: 你已经十分善使精灵先祖传承下来的武器，在使用它们的时候尤其致命。当你用弓武器组或剑武器组的武器造成重击时，会附加武器的重击特殊效果。

Elven Weapon Expertise.name: 精灵武器专家 Elven Weapon Expertise
Elven Weapon Expertise.description: 你的精灵爱好与你接受的职业训练，授予了你对于精灵武器的卓越技巧。每当你获得一项授予你在特定武器上获得专家或是更高熟练度的职业能力时，你也可以在长弓、复合长弓、长剑、刺剑、短弓、复合短弓以及你已受训的精灵武器上获得对应的熟练度。

Elven Weapon Familiarity.name: 精灵武器熟悉 Elven Weapon Familiarity
Elven Weapon Familiarity.description:
你酷爱长弓跟其他优雅的武器。你在 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MVAWttmT0QDa7LsV]{长弓}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dUC8Fsa6FZtVikS3]{复合长弓}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{长剑}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tH5GirEy7YB3ZgCk]{刺剑}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{短弓}和 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{复合短弓}上受训。

此外，你还能够使用各种罕见的精灵武器。在决定是否擅长时，你将军用精灵武器视为简易武器，并将异种精灵武器视为军用。

Embed Aeon Stone.name: Embed Aeon Stone
Embed Aeon Stone.description:
You discover the secrets to embedding aeon stones into your flesh. You spend 1 day attuning to an aeon stone and physically embedding it in your skin. While the stone is embedded this way, you gain the benefits of the aeon stone as if it were orbiting above your head, but it protects the stone from being noticed or stolen as easily. Aeon stones in your flesh must be invested to function, as usual.

You can also use this activity to safely remove an embedded aeon stone in 1 day. Someone without this feat can attempt to surgically remove it safely by spending 1 day and succeeding at a DC 30 Medicine check, or hastily by simply ripping it from a corpse.

Ember's Eyes.name: Ember's Eyes
Ember's Eyes.description:
Your eyes blaze with inner flame. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision}, or you gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision} if your ancestry already has low-light vision.

Specia l If your ancestry has neither low-light vision nor darkvision, you can take this ancestry feat a second time to gain darkvision. You can't retrain out of this feat.

Emberkin.name: Emberkin
Emberkin.description:
A peri's roaring spirit burns in your soul. Peris engage in constant struggle to right the wrongs of their fallen forebears, and that struggle has been passed on to you. You have a direct impulse to right wrongs and better the world.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fire effects, and your perception is unaffected by non-magical flames, fog and smoke.

Emblazon Antimagic.name: Emblazon Antimagic
Emblazon Antimagic.description:
Your deity's symbol protects against offensive magic. When you Emblazon an Armament, you can choose from the following effects instead of the effects listed in that feat. These effects have the same restrictions as the base options.

  • Shield When the wielder has the shield raised, they gain the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against magic, and they can use Shield Block against damage from their enemies' spells.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.RyGaB5hDRcOeb34Q]{Weapon} When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.

Emblazon Armament.name: Emblazon Armament
Emblazon Armament.description:
Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle. You can spend 10 minutes emblazoning a symbol of your deity upon a weapon or shield. The symbol doesn't fade until 1 year has passed, but if you Emblazon an Armament, any symbol you previously emblazoned and any symbol already emblazoned on that item instantly disappears. The item becomes a religious symbol of your deity and can be used as a divine focus while emblazoned, and it gains another benefit determined by the type of item. This benefit applies only to followers of the deity the symbol represents.

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness. (This causes it to reduce more damage with the Shield Block reaction.)
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.U1MpMtRnFqEDBJwd]{Weapon} The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Emblazon Divinity.name: Emblazon Divinity
Emblazon Divinity.description:
Your sacred etchings imbue objects with power. It takes you only 1 minute to emblazon a symbol using Emblazon Armament, and you can have up to four symbols emblazoned at a time. Each item can still have only one symbol emblazoned upon it, and if you exceed the limit of four, the oldest symbol disappears. These symbols can benefit even those who don't follow the deity, provided they aren't directly opposed (as determined by the GM).

You can select a different benefit for each emblazoned symbol, chosen from any you have from Emblazon Armament or other feats such as Emblazon Energy or Emblazon Antimagic.

Emblazon Energy.name: Emblazon Energy
Emblazon Energy.description:
With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent. When you Emblazon an Armament, you can choose from the following effects instead of the effects listed in that feat. These effects have the same restrictions as the base options.

  • Shield Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The wielder gain the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against that damage type and can use Shield Block against damage of that type. The shield also gains resistance to that damage type equal to half your level if you have a domain spell with a trait matching that type (such as fire).
  • Weapon Choose @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.x4Sb3qaMJo8x1r3X]{acid}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.5TzKmEqFyLHBG2ua]{cold}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.oX51Db6IxnUI64dT]{electricity}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.GCEOngH5zL0rRyle]{fire}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.2c30Drdg84bWLcRn]{sonic}. The weapon deals an extra 1d4 damage of that type. Increase this extra damage to 1d6 if you have a domain spell with a trait matching that type (such as fire).

Embrace The Pain.name: Embrace The Pain
Embrace The Pain.description:
Trigger A creature damages you with a melee attack.

Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm. Attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the triggering creature or to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the creature of the triggering weapon.

Emerald Boughs Accustomation.name: Emerald Boughs Accustomation
Emerald Boughs Accustomation.description: You are comfortable and socially capable in almost any cultural context. When you use the Society skill to Subsist, if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead; if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead; and if you roll a critical success, you can provide for another additional creature. Furthermore, when you attempt a Society check to Recall Knowledge about cultural practices and roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

Emerald Boughs Hideaway.name: Emerald Boughs Hideaway
Emerald Boughs Hideaway.description: You use Emerald Bough techniques to create a small extradimensional space called a hideaway that lasts as long as you are conscious. The hideaway functions as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.jaEEvuQ32GjAa8jy]{Bag of Holding (Type I)}, but has no Bulk and takes no hands; it holds one object with a maximum Bulk equal to your highest mental ability score modifier; as you open the hideaway with pure thought, activating it to retrieve an item is a free action with the envision component instead of a single action with the Interact component. The hideaway's access point appears as an obviously magical gap within 1 foot of your body. Only you can access the hideaway; you can you use an Interact action each round to physically hold it open for another person. A successful dispel magic spell or similar effect against your spell DC and the hideaway's counteract level of 2 expels the object; the object is also expelled if you become unconscious. After a successful dispel magic spell or when you become conscious again, the hideaway immediately reforms with no additional action from you. You can also dismiss the hideaway (if it is empty) or re-form it using a single action with the envision component.

Emergency Medical Assistance.name: Emergency Medical Assistance
Emergency Medical Assistance.description:
Requirements An adjacent ally is suffering persistent damage.

You've learned a variety of methods for helping allies who are bleeding, burning, or otherwise suffering persistent damage, from brushing off acid to patting down fires. Your ally immediately attempts a flat check to remove all types of persistent damage, and your use of this feat automatically counts as especially effective aid, reducing the DC from 15 to 10 for all future flat checks to remove the persistent damage.

Emergency Targe.name: 紧急护盾 Emergency Targe
Emergency Targe.description:
触发 一个敌人使用近战打击或近战法术攻击骰命中你，或者你在对抗敌人法术的豁免骰中失败

需求 你握持着护盾或已经准备了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{护盾术 Shield} 。

你立刻举起盾牌（Raise a Shield）或者释放护盾术 Shield 。在决定触发法术或攻击的效果时，应用环境加值到你的防御上。

Emotionless.name: Emotionless
Emotionless.description: Your malfunctioning emotional processors make it difficult for you to feel strong emotions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion and fear effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion or fear effect, you get a critical success instead.

Empathetic Plea.name: Empathetic Plea
Empathetic Plea.description:
Trigger You are attacked by a creature that you haven't yet acted hostile toward. You must use this reaction before the creature rolls its attack.

The way you cringe or use those puppy-dog eyes you've been practicing elicits an empathetic response in the attacker. Attempt a Diplomacy check against your attacker's Will DC.

Critical Success The creature pulls its attack, wasting its

action, and can't use hostile actions against you until the beginning of its next turn.

Success The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to damage on the triggering Strike and all its Strikes against you until the beginning of its next turn. The penalty is -4 if you're an expert in Diplomacy, -6 if you're a master, and -8 if you're legendary.

Failure The creature's attack is unaffected, and the creature is

temporarily immune to your Empathic Pleas for 24 hours.

Empty Body.name: Empty Body
Empty Body.description: You transmute your body into an ethereal form. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mau1Olq58ECF0ZPi]{Empty Body} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Empyreal Blessing.name: Empyreal Blessing
Empyreal Blessing.description: You can call forth a benediction upon your allies, whether you pray to a deity of the celestial realms or just find the power within yourself. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless} once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.

Enchanting Arrow.name: Enchanting Arrow
Enchanting Arrow.description:
With a single whisper carried on the wind, you enchant your ammunition to make a foe more vulnerable to your attacks.

Make a bow Strike. On a hit, the target takes an additional [[/r {2d6}[mental]]]{2d6 mental damage}. On a critical hit, the target also becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. The mental damage increases to 3d6 if your bow has a greater striking rune, or to 4d6 if your bow has a major striking rune.

Encouraging Words.name: Encouraging Words
Encouraging Words.description:
Requirements The target ally lost Stamina Points within the last round.

You give an ally within 30 feet a quick pep talk, helping them recover. Attempt a Diplomacy check. The DC is usually 15, though the GM might adjust it based on the circumstances. If you have expert proficiency in Diplomacy, you can instead attempt a DC 20 check to increase the Stamina Points recovered by 5; if you have master proficiency, you can attempt a DC 30 check to increase the Stamina Points by 15; if you have legendary proficiency, you can attempt a DC 40 check to increase the Stamina Points by 25. No matter the result, the ally is temporarily immune to Encouraging Words until they either @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.qc0VsZ0UesnurUUB]{Take a Breather} or rest for the day.

Critical Success The ally recovers 2d8 Stamina Points.

Success The ally recovers 1d8 Stamina Points.

Critical Failure The ally takes 1d8 mental damage, but this can reduce only Stamina Points, never Hit Points.

Endemic Herbs.name: Endemic Herbs
Endemic Herbs.description:
During your daily preparations, you find medicinal plants endemic to your location. Until your next preparations, you can spend an additional batch of herbs to add a benefit to an item you create with your herbalism.

The benefit of the special herbs affects the creature that the item is applied to; if the benefit is not immediate, it lasts for 1 minute unless otherwise stated. This adjustment counts as an additive, so you can't include another additive without spoiling the item.

  • Aquatic Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
  • Arctic For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.
  • Desert For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.
  • Forest Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.
  • Mountain Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
  • Plains Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.
  • Swamp Remove one source of persistent bleed damage.
  • Underground Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.NviQYIVZbPCSWLqT]{Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.2RwhJ9fbJtcQjW6s]{Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.jZYRxGHyArCci6AF]{Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.bliWctLi7jlKUTUe]{Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.QTG73gxKSNkiEWdY]{Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.HjCXHDZT6GkCyiuG]{Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.AJlunjfAIOq2Sg0p]{Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs}

Endurance of the Rooted Tree.name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
Endurance of the Rooted Tree.description:
Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment. You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.

In addition, you can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qJZZdYBdNaWRJFER]{Wholeness of Body} ki spell almost effortlessly. You can cast it as a free action that triggers at the start of your turn.

Endure Death's Touch.name: Endure Death's Touch
Endure Death's Touch.description:
Requirements You are wearing medium or heavy armor in which you have expert proficiency.

Trigger An undead hits you with an unarmed attack.

Your conviction redirects the undead's attack through your armor and then harmlessly away. You gain resistance 5 to physical damage and resistance 10 to negative damage against the triggering attack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on any saving throws against effects from the undead's natural attack; if you succeed at the saving throw, you get a critical success instead.

Enduring Alchemy.name: 持久炼金术 Enduring Alchemy
Enduring Alchemy.description:
你知晓如何在快速调制合剂时使其中所蕴含的个人能量持续得更久一些。

当使用高速炼金创造一件炼金工具或灵药时，这件工具或灵药的效力会保持到你下一轮结束为止，而不是在你下一轮开始时失效。

Enduring Debilitation.name: Enduring Debilitation
Enduring Debilitation.description:
Trigger You apply a debilitation to a creature.

Frequency once per minute

You can make your debilitation last an exceptionally long time. The triggering debilitation lasts for 1 minute instead of until the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.PX6WdrpzEdUzKRHx]{Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike}

Enduring Quickness.name: Enduring Quickness
Enduring Quickness.description:
You move as fast and as high as the wind itself. You're permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}.

You can use your extra action to Stride or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, to provide one of the actions needed for a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}

Energetic Resonance.name: Energetic Resonance
Energetic Resonance.description:
Trigger You would take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage from a spell.

Requirements You have an unexpended spell slot of a level

equal to or higher than the triggering spell.

Your blood resonates with magical energy, mitigating the effects of harmful spells.

Expend one of your spell slots of a level equal to or higher than that of the triggering spell. You gain resistance to one of the triggering effect's damage types equal to twice the expended spell slot's level.

Energize Wings.name: Energize Wings
Energize Wings.description:
Frequency once per hour

You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms. For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Energized Font.name: Energized Font
Energized Font.description:
Frequency once per day

The magic within you provides increased energy you can use to focus. You regain 1 Focus Point, up to your usual maximum.

Energy Ablation.name: 能量消融 Energy Ablation
Energy Ablation.description:
当你施放能量法术时，你留下部分能量做为保护屏障。

如果你下一个动作是 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术} 且该法术能造成能量伤害，不管有没有成功造成伤害，你都会在下一回合结束前获得与该法术环级(最小为1)与能量类型相同的抗力。

如果此法术造成多种能量伤害，从其中挑一种获得抗力。

Energy Beam.name: Energy Beam
Energy Beam.description:
You can channel your core's power through the magical gem that serves as your eye. You gain an energy beam ranged unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage}. The energy beam has a range increment of 20 feet. On a critical hit, the target takes persistent fire damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Your eye beam does not add critical specialization effects.

Enhancement You channel greater power. Increase the damage die of your energy beam by one step, from 1d4 to 1d6.

Energy Blessed.name: Energy Blessed
Energy Blessed.description: Energy runs through your blood more powerfully. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7qjfYsLNTr17Aftf]{Energy Emanation}, you can create an emanation of 5 feet, 10 feet, or 15 feet. The damage increases to 6d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every level you have above 9th, instead of 1d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every 2 levels above 1st.

Energy Fusion.name: Energy Fusion
Energy Fusion.description:
You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

If the next action you use is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that deals acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage, select a non-cantrip spell in your spell repertoire that deals a different type of energy damage from that list, and expend an additional spell slot of the same level as this secondary spell. The spell you cast deals additional damage equal to the level of the secondary spell slot expended.

The spell's total damage is divided evenly between the energy type of the spell you cast and the energy type of the secondary spell.

Energy Heart.name: Energy Heart
Energy Heart.description:
Your eidolon's heart beats with energy.

Choose an energy damage type other than force. One of its unarmed attacks changes its damage type to the chosen type, and it gains resistance to that type equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Energy Resistance.name: Energy Resistance
Energy Resistance.description: Your eidolon has stronger resistance. Its resistance from Energy Heart and Dual Energy Heart increase to your level.

Energy Ward.name: Energy Ward
Energy Ward.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a

non-cantrip spell that dealt energy damage.

You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward. Until the start of your next turn, you gain resistance 5 to one type of energy damage dealt by the spell you just cast.

Enforce Oath.name: 迫行誓约 Enforce Oath
Enforce Oath.description:
频率 每小时1次

你呼唤誓约，在战斗中壮大自己。当你迫行自己的誓约时，选择一个你看得到，且作为誓约一部分发誓要剷除的生物。

你在对抗所选生物发起的攻击与效果时，于AC和豁免上获得+1状态加值。你也在对抗所选生物的攻击骰上获得+1状态加值。

但是，因为你迫行自己履约，你无暇分心其他敌人。当你迫行誓约时，你对其他所有生物在AC、攻击骰以及豁免上承受-1状态罚值，直到你停止迫行誓约。当所选生物的生命值降为0，或该生物向你或你的盟友合理正当的投降，迫行誓约就结束。

如果你陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识} ，或如果所选生物被你 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{忽视} 超过1分钟，那你会立刻结束迫行誓约。你还可以在自己回合时以一个自由动作立刻结束迫行誓约。

Enforced Order.name: Enforced Order
Enforced Order.description: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional lawful damage and have the lawful and magical traits.

Engine Bay.name: Engine Bay
Engine Bay.description: You are practiced at working in vast garages of vehicles and can work on many machines at a time. When Repairing and spending the full 10 minutes, you can fix up to two objects. If you are a master in Crafting, you can fix up to four targets. If you're legendary in Crafting, you can fix up to eight targets. This feat has no effect when using Quick Repair or another ability to reduce the time spent Repairing.

Engine of Destruction.name: 破坏引擎 Engine of Destruction
Engine of Destruction.description: 你的构装体的肢体分离，部署 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隐藏} 武器库，或使用类似的技术释放出巨大的破坏能量横扫一切。你指挥Command你的大发明。取代它通常的动作，它行走Stride一次，之后对它30尺内的每个敌人进行1次打击Strike，且它在攻击骰上有+2环境加值。多次攻击减值在构装体完成全部攻击之前都不会上升。

Enhanced Familiar.name: 强化魔宠 Enhanced Familiar
Enhanced Familiar.description:
(德鲁伊) 你将额外的魔法能量注入到你的魔宠体内。

(术士，法师，女巫) 你为你的魔宠注入额外的魔力。

(魔战士) 你向你的魔宠灌注魔法能量。

你每天可以选择四个魔宠或主人（master）能力（ability），而非原来的两个。

Enigma's Knowledge.name: 谜知识 Enigma's Knowledge
Enigma's Knowledge.description:
你的缪斯总在最适当时机向你低语着各种知识。

你在所有你可以使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} 能力的技能上，都获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.H3I2X0f7v4EzwxuN]{豆知识 Automatic Knowledge} 技能专长的效果。依照豆知识专长的规定，你一轮仍只能使用一次豆知识。

Enlarge Companion.name: Enlarge Companion
Enlarge Companion.description: You make your companion enormous. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8rj45fKzCFcB0fxs]{Enlarge Companion} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Enlarged Chassis.name: Enlarged Chassis
Enlarged Chassis.description:
You've empowered your core to support a larger body, granting you size and additional reach. You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} constantly.

Enhancement Your core's empowerment has stabilized, allowing for greater support. You are no longer @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} due to the effects of enlarge.

Enlightened Presence.name: Enlightened Presence
Enlightened Presence.description:
You exude an aura of resolve. You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.XM1AA8z5cHm8sJXM]{Effect: Enlightened Presence}

Enthralling Allure.name: Enthralling Allure
Enthralling Allure.description: The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}as a 1st-level divine innate spell.

Entities From Afar.name: Entities From Afar
Entities From Afar.description:
You can call in aberrations to fight for you or to answer questions. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i1TvBID5QLyXrUCa]{Summon Entity} as an innate occult spell once per day. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells; if you could already cast occult spells, your proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells increases to expert.

As soon as the aberration arrives, instead of giving it any other commands, you can demand that it help you with a single question you pose to it. For the creature to effectively answer, you must Sustain the Spell for 1 minute, and you must understand and be understood by the aberration. If you do, the aberration gives you a cryptic clue as provided by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pkcOby5prOausy1k]{Read Omens} spell, except that the clue is even more enigmatic than normal; the creature then immediately returns from whence it came without providing you any other benefit. At 16th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the summon entity spell is heightened by 1 level (to a maximum of 8th level when you reach 20th level).

Entourage.name: Entourage
Entourage.description:
You have a small group of admirers who tend to follow you around while you're in civilized settlements.

Your admirers are helpful to you, allowing you to make simple @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of them such as purchasing basic equipment with your funds or finding a room at an inn.

These admirers do not travel with you to places that are obviously dangerous, including most adventure locations, but they'll wait for you at the nearest settlement. Your admirers never use actions in encounter mode other than to retreat, and they abandon you if you intentionally bring them harm or at the GM's discretion.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information}, you can use your admirers to assist you, granting a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy check and reducing the time it takes even further (typically to 30 minutes, rather than 1 hour with the Hobnobber feat alone). If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sLEawQueTV1wGn0B]{Sow Rumor} feat, you can have your admirers assist you, with the same benefits as Gather Information.

Entreat With Forebears.name: Entreat With Forebears
Entreat With Forebears.description:
Something about your presence causes creatures of your bloodline to, consciously or not, recognize you as one of their own, and you become inured to their tricks.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy, Deception, and Intimidation checks when interacting with creatures that have the trait corresponding to your bloodline, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception and saving throws against such creatures.

For example, an aberrant bloodline sorcerer would gain this benefit against creatures with the aberration trait. The GM is the final arbiter of which creatures match your bloodline.

Entwined Energy Ki.name: Entwined Energy Ki
Entwined Energy Ki.description:
You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities. When you gain this feat, choose either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. When you cast ki blast, you can choose to have the spell deal the type of damage you chose instead of force damage. When you cast ki form or ki strike, add the type of damage you chose to the list of damage types you can select for the spell.

Special At the GM's discretion, this feat can alter other ki spells.

Envenom Fangs.name: Envenom Fangs
Envenom Fangs.description:
Frequency a number of times per day equal to your level

You envenom your fangs. If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1d6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal.

Envenomed Edge.name: Envenomed Edge
Envenomed Edge.description: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points. When you critically hit using a Strike with a weapon or unarmed attack and deal slashing or piercing damage with that Strike, you deal an additional [[/r {1d4}[persistent,poison]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} to your target.

Environmental Explorer.name: Environmental Explorer
Environmental Explorer.description: You've traversed enough untamed wilderness to gain an intuitive understanding of the dangers that exist in such places. Your extensive familiarity means you sometimes notice perils even when you're not trying to. Even if you aren't Searching in exploration mode, you can attempt a check to find environmental hazards that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find a particular hazard.

Environmental Grace.name: Environmental Grace
Environmental Grace.description: You rapidly adapt to environments through a combination of skill, meditation, and divine grace. After spending an hour in an environment of severe cold or colder, you are protected from the effects of severe cold until you leave that environment. After spending an hour in an environment of severe heat or hotter, you are protected from the effects of severe heat until you leave that environment.

Ephemeral Tracking.name: Ephemeral Tracking
Ephemeral Tracking.description: You are able to track your quarry through impossible places. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.QpjHqxwTGdILLvjD]{Ephemeral Tracking} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Eschew Materials.name: 施法免材 Eschew Materials
Eschew Materials.description: 你用巧妙的方法复制某些材料的奥法精华。在需要材料成分的施放法术(Casts a Spell)行动钟，你可以借由在大气中绘制复杂用以取代的法印，在没有法术材料包的情况提供材料成分。不同于提供姿势成分，你必须有一只完全自由的手。但这无法取代任何在法术花费项目上列出的材料。

Esoteric Oath (Liberator).name: 秘教誓约(解放者)  Esoteric Oath (Liberator)
Esoteric Oath (Liberator).description:
你已宣誓会对潜伏在格拉利昂各处的外来异客赶尽杀绝。在其他信条之后把下面的信条加进你神卫准则中： "只要有适当的机会，你要把你遇到的所有邪恶异怪赶尽杀绝。"

如果你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步} 且触发的是邪恶异怪，你的盟友在检定上从自由快步(Liberating Step)那获得+4环境加值，且之后你的盟友可以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步} 两次。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.tAsFXMzNkpj964X4]{效果：自由快步 (vs. 异怪)}

就算是在他统治的国家，你也无须考虑该邪恶异怪是否为合法权威。

Esoteric Oath (Paladin).name: 秘教誓约(圣武士) Esoteric Oath (Paladin)
Esoteric Oath (Paladin).description:
你已宣誓会对潜伏在格拉利昂各处的外来异客赶尽杀绝。在其他信条之后把下面的信条加进你神卫准则中： "只要有适当的机会，你要把你遇到的所有邪恶异怪赶尽杀绝。"

你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{报应打击} 伤害在对抗邪恶异怪上获得+4环境加值，如果你所使用的武器熟练度为大师，那+6。

就算是在他统治的国家，你也无须考虑该邪恶异怪是否为合法权威。

Esoteric Oath (Redeemer).name: 秘教誓约(救赎者)  Esoteric Oath (Redeemer)
Esoteric Oath (Redeemer).description:
你已宣誓会对潜伏在格拉利昂各处的外来异客赶尽杀绝。在其他信条之后把下面的信条加进你神卫准则中： "只要有适当的机会，你要把你遇到的所有邪恶异怪赶尽杀绝。"

你在对抗来自邪恶异怪施加的伤害时，从 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{救赎瞥视} )获得的抗力为7+你的等级。

就算是在他统治的国家，你也无须考虑该邪恶异怪是否为合法权威。

Esoteric Polymath.name: 隐秘博学 Esoteric Polymath
Esoteric Polymath.description: 你获得一本异能法术书，这与法师的法术书类似，并且可以使用它补充你的法术库。将你法术库当中所有的法术免费加入这一法术书。与法师类似，你可以使用神秘学技能学习法术并且加入法术书，只要支付对应的费用即可。在你每日准备法术时，你可以从异能法术书中选择一个法术。如果该法术已经在你的法术库中，当日可以将其视为你的标志性法术。如果并未在你的法术库中，你可以在下一次每日准备之前将其视为在你的法术库当中。

Esteemed Visitor.name: Esteemed Visitor
Esteemed Visitor.description: Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers' trust.
