While you are in a settlement, when you roll a critical failure on a Diplomacy check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, you get a failure instead.

Eternal Bane.name: Eternal Bane
Eternal Bane.description: A life of evil has made you a nexus for your deity's vile power. You're continuously surrounded by a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane} spell with a spell level equal to half your level (rounded up). The radius is 15 feet, and you can't increase it. You can Dismiss the spell; if you do, it returns automatically after 1 minute.

Eternal Blessing.name: Eternal Blessing
Eternal Blessing.description: Your good deeds have brought your deity's grace to you for all of eternity. You're continuously surrounded by a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless} spell with a spell level equal to half your level (rounded up). The radius is 15 feet, and you can't increase it. You can Dismiss the spell; if you do, it returns automatically after 1 minute.

Eternal Boost.name: Eternal Boost
Eternal Boost.description:
Your link with your eidolon is so intense that you continuously reinforce its abilities. You are permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}; you can use your extra action only to cast boost eidolon or reinforce eidolon.

While in exploration mode, you can declare that you are also continually casting boost eidolon or reinforce eidolon even while using a different exploration activity. If you do, even before your first turn in a combat encounter, that cantrip is active as if you had cast it on your previous turn.

Eternal Composition.name: 永恒组曲 Eternal Composition
Eternal Composition.description: 这个世界就是你永远的表演舞台。你受到恒定的加速效果；你仅可以使用该额外动作来施展需要一个动作施放的组曲戏法。当处于探索模式时，你可以在使用探索策略的时候，声明你施展一个可用的组曲戏法。在你开始战斗遭遇的第一回合之前，该戏法就可以如同在前一回合已经施展一般生效。

Eternal Elixir.name: 永恒灵药 Eternal Elixir
Eternal Elixir.description: 你的身体很容易接受并保留最微小的改变。当你饮用一瓶来自于你的，具有灵药和灌注特征且持续时间为1分钟或更长的炼金物品时，你能够让这份灵药的持续时间变为无限。你只能对等级为你等级的一半或更低的灵药使用这个能力。如果你在之后消耗了一份不同的灵药并让它的持续时间变为无限，前一个无限灵药的效果会立即结束。

Eternal Wings (Aasimar).name: Eternal Wings (Aasimar)
Eternal Wings (Aasimar).description: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body. You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Celestial Wings} at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

Eternal Wings (Sylph).name: Eternal Wings (Sylph)
Eternal Wings (Sylph).description: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body. You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FUOUyhHufNH4ri7H]{Wings Of Air} at all times rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

Evade Doom.name: Evade Doom
Evade Doom.description: You can elude supernatural disaster. When you would gain the doomed condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don't gain the doomed condition.

Evanescent Wings.name: Evanescent Wings
Evanescent Wings.description: You've manifested wings that can flutter for brief spurts. You don't need to spend any additional actions to reach something in your space that a Medium creature could reach. For instance, if you wanted to open a cookie jar located four feet off the ground, you only need to spend a single Interact action to do so. When you use Evanescent Wings to flutter to a higher place in your space, your action gains the move trait.

Evangelize.name: Evangelize
Evangelize.description:
You point out a detail that incontrovertibly supports your faith, causing a listener's mind to whirl. Attempt a Diplomacy check and compare the result to the Will DC of a single target that can hear you and understands your language; that target is then temporarily immune to Evangelize with respect to your deity or philosophy for 1 day. A creature that already agrees with you is unaffected, and at the GM's discretion, a target that genuinely changes its perspective to support your faith as a result of the argument is also otherwise unaffected.

Critical Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is unaffected.

Evasiveness (Rogue).name: 闪电回避(游荡者) Evasiveness (Rogue)
Evasiveness (Rogue).description: 你在反射Reflex中的熟练等级提升至大师。

Evasiveness (Swashbuckler).name: Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)
Evasiveness (Swashbuckler).description: Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.

Ever-Vigilant Senses.name: Ever-Vigilant Senses
Ever-Vigilant Senses.description:
Your eidolon has enhanced senses. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception, and can't be flanked except by creatures that are higher level than it.

It can see @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects; they appear translucent and are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

When your eidolon moves within 30 feet of an illusion that can be disbelieved, the GM rolls a secret check to disbelieve it, even if your eidolon didn't spend an action to Interact.

Everdistant Defense.name: Everdistant Defense
Everdistant Defense.description:
Trigger A creature within your aura is targeted by a ranged attack or a creature moves through your aura.

Requirements You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.

The spatial barrier of Syndara's Island has taught you that distance can foil enemies better than any armor. You warp space, causing each square within your aura that the attack or creature would move through to count as triple the distance. If this reaction is used on a ranged attack, the attack takes range increment penalties based on the adjusted range and fails if this would cause it to exceed its maximum range.

Everstand Stance.name: Everstand Stance
Everstand Stance.description:
Requirements You are wielding a shield.

You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense. When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction.

Everstand Strike.name: Everstand Strike
Everstand Strike.description:
Requirements You are wielding a shield in two hands.

Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield. Make a Strike with the wielded shield. If the Strike hits and deals damage, you also @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise your Shield}.

Everyone Duck!.name: Everyone Duck!
Everyone Duck!.description:
Trigger You fail, but don't critically fail, an attempt to Disable a Device on a trap.

You intentionally set off the trap, but you take special precautions to protect yourself and your allies from the trap's effects. For the next 2 rounds, if the trap rolls a critical success on an attack roll, it gets a normal success instead, and if anyone rolls a critical failure on their saving throw against the trap, they get a normal failure instead.

Everyone's A Suspect.name: Everyone's A Suspect
Everyone's A Suspect.description:
You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all-even your own allies.

After interacting with a creature for at least 1 minute, you automatically @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} with that creature as the subject. You can have any number of such leads at any given time, and when you Pursue a Lead again, you don't give up any of these automatic subjects.

Exacting Strike.name: Exacting Strike
Exacting Strike.description:
You make a controlled attack, fully accounting for your momentum. Make a Strike. The Strike gains the following failure effect.

Failure This attack does not count toward your multiple attack penalty.

Execution.name: Execution
Execution.description:
Requirements You have condemned a foe with Harsh Judgment.

You swing wide, attempting to behead your condemned foe. Make a melee Strike against your condemned foe. If you hit, your condemned foe takes [[/r {8d6}[precision]]]{8d6 extra precision damage} with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the condemned foe is reduced to 0 Hit Points by the execution and requires a head to live, they die. For creatures with multiple heads, this usually kills the creature only if you sever its last head. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Execution for 1 day.

Executioner Weapon Training.name: Executioner Weapon Training
Executioner Weapon Training.description:
Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck. You become trained with the following weapons: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{Falchion}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8COlYvHe6hKCXY8x]{Greataxe}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for these weapons.

Exhort The Faithful.name: 崇信忠告 Exhort The Faithful
Exhort The Faithful.description:
对信仰知识的了解使你总能找到最好的方法，来让同种信徒协助你或听从你的建议。

当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{提出请求 Request} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{胁迫 Coerce} 同信仰的信徒时，你可以进行宗教检定而非交涉或威吓检定，且你在该次宗教检定上获得+2环境加值。且当你的提出请求大失败时，目标对你的态度也不会因此下降。

Expand Aura.name: 拓展灵光 Expand Aura
Expand Aura.description: 你聚集神圣之力，放大你的影响力。选择一个从神卫专长或特性来的灵光，像是 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TIwk07T0OxSbcOpJ]{勇气灵光 Aura of Courage} 或是 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{生命灵光 Aura of Life}。直到你下一回合开始，该灵光的半径加倍。

Expanded Domain Initiate.name: Expanded Domain Initiate
Expanded Domain Initiate.description: You have long venerated one of your deity's lesser-known aspects. Select one domain from your deity's alternate domains. You gain access to that domain and an initial domain spell for that domain.

Expanded Luck.name: Expanded Luck
Expanded Luck.description:
You are luckier even than most catfolk. You can trigger @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} when you fail or critically fail a Fortitude or Will saving throw in addition to Reflex saving throws.

You still can use Cat's Luck only once per day.

Expanded Senses.name: Expanded Senses
Expanded Senses.description:
Your eidolon evolves more acute senses.

Your eidolon gains low-light vision and darkvision, as well as scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

Expanded Splash.name: 溅射扩展 Expanded Splash
Expanded Splash.description: 你调制出极不稳定的化合物并将其加入炸弹之中，让它能够造成强烈的大范围爆炸。当你投掷一枚具有溅射特征的炼金炸弹时，你能够将你的智力调整值加到炸弹正常的溅射伤害上，此外它还会对目标周围10尺范围内所有生物造成溅射伤害。

Expansive Spellstrike.name: 扩展法术打击 Expansive Spellstrike
Expansive Spellstrike.description:
你已经适应更多的法术，让其与你的攻击结合。对于法术打击（Spellstrike）而言，已经不再需要使用具备法术攻击骰的法术，你可以使用以单个目标或具有爆发（burst）、锥形（cone）或线性（line）区域（area）的具有伤害的法术（依然受到法术打击的其他限制）。当你施放一个不具备法术攻击骰的法术（Cast a Spell）用作法术打击的一部分时，它按照下列方式运作。

  • 如果你打击（Strike）大失败，法术被消耗且没有任何效应。
  • 生物使用他们通常对抗法术的方式防御，例如豁免检定（saving throws）。
  • 如果法术让你选择多个目标，取而代之的是它只会以你打击的生物为目标。
  • 如果法术具有区域属性，则目标必须在区域内。爆发区域以目标方格（target's square）作为区域中心，或者如果目标是大型（Large）或更大生物，则以紧邻目标中心的方角（square corner）作为区域中心；如果有多个角（corner）可选，则由你选择。锥形或线性区域以你为中心发射（emits）并且必须包含目标；如果你并不与目标临近（adjacent）（例如，使用长触及 reach 武器或具有星火流矢 starlit span），选择临近目标的任意方格作为起点。法术如常影响区域内所有生物，但是打击依然只以一个生物为目标。

Expeditious Advance.name: Expeditious Advance
Expeditious Advance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored or wearing light armor.

You advance and retreat quickly. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your speed.

Expeditious Search.name: 迅速搜索 Expeditious Search
Expeditious Search.description: 你有一套特别的方法可以让你迅速地找东西，你探寻线索或是隐藏的秘密的速度比别人快一倍。当你使用搜索（Searching）动作时，你只需要通常搜索一片区域所需时间的一半就可以完成搜索。同时，这也代表在处于探索模式时，你可以以通常双倍的速度在移动的同时进行搜索（不超过他原本速度的一半）。如果你在察觉上达到传奇熟练度，你的搜索速度可以再快一倍。

Experienced Professional.name: 熟练工 Experienced Professional
Experienced Professional.description: 你谨慎地遵守专业模范以避免不期而遇的职业风险。如果你使用学识技能来赚取收入（Earn Income），但得出了大失败的结果，你只会视为失败。如果你在学识技能上达到专家熟练度，你在赚取收入得出失败结果时会获得通常失败时所得现金收入的两倍，除非你的失败是因为本专长而从大失败转化而来的。

Experienced Smuggler.name: 偷渡老手 Experienced Smuggler
Experienced Smuggler.description:
你善于在官方检查下隐藏随身物品。

当GM为你暗骰隐秘技能检定来决定被动观察者是否发现你随身隐藏的物品时，如果他骰出的结果低于10，他使用10+你的隐秘技能调整值来决定你的检定结果。

如果你在隐秘技能上达到大师熟练度，当GM为你暗骰隐秘技能检定时，如果他骰出的结果低于15，他使用15+你的隐秘技能调整值来决定你的检定结果。如果你在隐秘技能上达到传奇熟练度，你会在被动观察者面前自动成功隐藏随身的物品。

本专长在对方主动搜查你随身隐藏的物品时没有效果。

除此之外，因为你擅长瞒天过海的名声，你现在可以很容易地使用黑街学识（Underworld Lore）来寻找有利可图的收入来源。

Experienced Tracker.name: 追迹老手 Experienced Tracker
Experienced Tracker.description: 你随时都在追踪痕迹，当情况需要时，你可以快速而不间断地进行追踪。你可以使用生存技能来进行追踪（Track）动作同时全速移动而不承受通常的-5减值。当你在生存技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你不会再需要每小时进行一次技能检定来保持追踪，但仍然需要在追踪路径上出现某些特别重要的变数时重新进行一次生存技能检定。

Expert Alchemy.name: 专家炼金术 Expert Alchemy
Expert Alchemy.description: 你的高阶炼金术等级提升至3。在10级，提升至5。

Expert Backstabber.name: Expert Backstabber
Expert Backstabber.description:
When you Strike a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} foe with a weapon that has the backstabber weapon trait, you deal 2 extra precision damage instead of 1.

If the weapon is a +3 weapon, you deal 4 extra precision damage instead of 2.

Expert Bard Spellcasting.name: 专家吟游诗人施法 Expert Bard Spellcasting

Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting.name: Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting
Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting.description: You've learned the deeper secrets of beast guns, making you an expert in the magic they grant you. You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

Expert Captivator Spellcasting.name: Expert Captivator Spellcasting
Expert Captivator Spellcasting.description: You learn more powerful spells to enchant and deceive. You learn a 4th-level occult spell. At 12th level, you learn a 5th-level spell, and at 14th level, you learn a 6th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the enchantment or illusion school. You Cast these Spells as occult innate spells. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

Expert Cleric Spellcasting.name: 专家牧师施法 Expert Cleric Spellcasting

Expert Combat Eidolon.name: Expert Combat Eidolon
Expert Combat Eidolon.description: Your eidolon advances its capabilities in combat. Your eidolon becomes an expert in unarmed attacks. If you are an expert in unarmored defense, your eidolon also becomes an expert in unarmored defense. If you have weapon specialization, your eidolon also gains weapon specialization.

Expert Disassembler.name: Expert Disassembler
Expert Disassembler.description: You can apply the same techniques you use to reverse engineer objects to disable them. You can use Crafting instead of Thievery to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable Device} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Pick a Lock}.

Expert Drill Sergeant.name: Expert Drill Sergeant
Expert Drill Sergeant.description: You know how to get the most out of your allies. While exploring, when you are leading and allies are @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Following the Expert}, you grant a +3 circumstance bonus instead of +2 if you're an expert in the applicable skill, and a +4 circumstance bonus if you're a master.

Expert Druid Spellcasting.name: 专家德鲁伊施法 Expert Druid Spellcasting

Expert Fireworks Crafter.name: Expert Fireworks Crafter
Expert Fireworks Crafter.description: You're particularly adept at crafting fireworks, allowing you to create much more powerful fireworks than you otherwise could. Your advanced alchemy level for fireworks increases to your level - 3.

Expert Herbalism.name: Expert Herbalism
Expert Herbalism.description:
Your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} level for herbalism increases to your level -3.

You gain the formulas for elixirs of life as soon as your advanced alchemy level is high enough to create them: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{lesser} at 8th level, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{moderate} at 12th level, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.mYozcVg9fQY6zO7C]{greater} at 16th level, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AmxSqEoFhRLMYd1W]{major} at 18th level.

Expert Longevity.name: 长寿专家 Expert Longevity
Expert Longevity.description: 你不断完善着你从生活中学来的知识和技能。当你通过长寿族裔选择一项技能时，你也可以选择一项你已经受训的技能，转而在这个技能上成为专家。这会持续到你长寿族裔到期为止。当长寿族裔和长寿专家效果结束时，你可以重训你的一项技能增强。这项技能增强必须是你长寿族裔或是长寿专家选择的技能。

Expert Magus Spellcasting.name: Expert Magus Spellcasting
Expert Magus Spellcasting.description: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

Expert Poisoner.name: Expert Poisoner
Expert Poisoner.description: Your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} level for poison increases to your level –3.

Expert Scroll Cache.name: Expert Scroll Cache
Expert Scroll Cache.description:
Your scroll collection is more powerful.

In addition to your daily scrolls from Basic Scroll Cache, add a scroll with a 3rd-level spell. At 14th level, add a scroll with a 4th-level spell. At 16th level, add a scroll with a 5th-level spell.

Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting.name: 专家术士施法 Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting

Expert Spellcasting.name: Expert Spellcasting
Expert Spellcasting.description: You gain the expert spellcasting archetype benefits.

Expert Summoner Spellcasting.name: Expert Summoner Spellcasting
Expert Summoner Spellcasting.description: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

Expert Wizard Spellcasting.name: 专家法师施法 Expert Wizard Spellcasting

Exploit Opening.name: Exploit Opening
Exploit Opening.description:
Trigger Your spotter critically succeeds at a Strike against a creature, and that creature is within your ranged weapon's first range increment.

You take advantage of your spotter's devastating attack to unleash your own follow-up attack. Make a ranged Strike with a -2 penalty against the target of the triggering attack. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to the Strike.

Exploitive Bomb.name: 剥离炸弹 Exploitive Bomb
Exploitive Bomb.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发条件 你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{高速炼金 Quick Alchemy} 制作一枚炼金炸弹，它的等级至少比你的高阶炼金术等级低2级。

你将一种能够阻碍抗力的物质混入炸弹之中。这枚炸弹能够减少敌人针对它自身的伤害类型所具有的任何抗力，数值等于你的等级，但这种削弱只会对那次攻击生效。

Explosion.name: Explosion
Explosion.description: Your innovation can explode on command. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.naKVqd8POxcnGclz]{Explode} action.

Explosive Death Drop.name: Explosive Death Drop
Explosive Death Drop.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance} and have a target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

You lift your enemy into the air before bringing them crashing down with a fiery detonation. Roll an Athletics check against your target's Fortitude DC. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to your check if the target is one size larger than you and a -3 circumstance penalty if it's larger than that. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your check if the target is one size smaller than you and a +3 circumstance bonus if it's smaller than that.

Critical Success The target takes [[/r {12d6}[fire]]]{12d6 fire damage} and falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in an unoccupied adjacent square of your choice. The target is no longer grabbed. The target and any creature adjacent to it also each take [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Success As critical success, but the target takes [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} instead of 12d6, and creatures don't take persistent fire damage.

Failure The target is no longer grabbed.

Critical Failure As failure, but you fall prone.

Explosive Entry.name: Explosive Entry
Explosive Entry.description: You know exactly how to make a memorable entrance... by detonating a bomb to produce a devastating explosion, of course! You Set Explosives on a door, window, container, or heavy gate. When the explosives detonate, you can attempt an Engineering Lore check to Force Open the target. If a bomb would add an item bonus to attack rolls, add that item bonus to your Engineering Lore check. Since you're blasting your way in, you can't avoid breaking the object or structure. If you roll a critical success, you get a success instead.

Explosive Expert.name: Explosive Expert
Explosive Expert.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You have continued training in volatile weapons and gained a deeper understanding. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for simple and martial bombs and firearms.

Explosive Leap.name: 爆炸跳跃 Explosive Leap
Explosive Leap.description:
你驱动你的大发明瞄准下方爆炸，将你发射到空中。你在不接触地面的情况下朝任意方向跳跃最多30尺。你必须在固体地表上着陆，否则你会在使用下一个动作后开始坠落。和使用下一个动作后开始坠落的通常效果一样，你仍然会在回合结束后开始坠落，即使你该回合没有使用更多的动作。

特殊 如果你的大发明是仆从，它而非你可以使用该动作。

Explosive Maneuver.name: 爆发战技 Explosive Maneuver
Explosive Maneuver.description:
需求 你的上一个动作是使用你的武器大发明对一个敌人进行的成功的打击。

你在武器中内置了一种 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隐藏}的实验特性，你的武器爆发性地部署杠杆，绳钩或类似的机关辅助你执行战技。当你使用爆炸战技Explosive Maneuver，选择擒拿Grapple，猛推Shove，或摔绊Trip。你的武器大发明必须有匹配你所选动作的武器特征（例如，你的武器必须有擒抱特征才能选择擒拿Grapple动作）。你对你上一次成功的打击Strike命中的敌人进行所选动作，使用和你上一次成功的打击一致的多次攻击减值。你仍然会在进行擒拿Grapple，猛推Shove或摔绊Trip后提升你的多次攻击罚值。

Explosive Savant.name: Explosive Savant
Explosive Savant.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

A lifetime wielding firearms and explosive ordinance amid the chaos of battle has granted you great skill with volatile weapons. You become trained in simple and martial bombs and firearms.

Express Driver.name: Express Driver
Express Driver.description: You can optimize your vehicle's performance, coaxing extra speed and choosing paths to avoid slowdowns. When calculating your travel speed for the day while piloting a vehicle, you can attempt a Driving Lore check to increase your vehicle's travel speed. The DC is determined by the GM but is typically based on the vehicle's piloting DC or a difficulty based on the environment, whichever is harder. On a success, increase your vehicle's travel speed by half. This has no effect on your vehicle's movement in encounters.

Express Rider.name: 奔途骠骑 Express Rider
Express Rider.description:
你当然知道如何驾驭坐骑跑得更快。

在计算骑乘中的你的旅行速度（travel speed）时，你可以进行一次自然技能检定并 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{指挥动物 Command an Animal} 来增加坐骑的旅行速度。DC取决于GM，通常会基于坐骑等级和环境因素来决定，取其高者。

若成功，你坐骑的旅行速度增加一半。本专长遭遇模式中的坐骑移动没有效果。

Extend Armament Alignment.name: Extend Armament Alignment
Extend Armament Alignment.description: The alignment you impose on a weapon lasts much longer. The duration of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament} increases to 1 minute.

Extend Boost.name: Extend Boost
Extend Boost.description:
You can increase the duration of your eidolon's boosts.

You learn the extend boost link spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Extend Elixir.name: 延时灵药 Extend Elixir
Extend Elixir.description: 你将个人能量浓缩到你制造的灵药之中，让它能够在你身上生效更长的时间。当你消耗一瓶来自于你的，具有灵药和灌注特征且持续时间为1分钟或更久的炼金物品时，这份灵药的持续时间翻倍。

Extinguish Light.name: Extinguish Light
Extinguish Light.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

You wrap shadow around a single unattended light source within 120 feet that's no larger than a torch. Any non-magical light source you target is automatically extinguished. For magical light sources, attempt a counteract check using your Fortitude or Thievery modifier against the target's DC. Your counteract level is equal to half your level rounded up. Successfully counteracting the light source suppresses its ability to produce light for 1 minute, but not any other effects. If you're in dim light or darkness when you Extinguish Light, its range is 240 feet.

Extra Squishy.name: Extra Squishy
Extra Squishy.description:
Your rubbery physique makes it easier for you to wedge yourself into tight spaces and more difficult for your enemies to dislodge you.

You become trained in Acrobatics. If you would automatically become trained in Acrobatics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

If you roll a success to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}, you get a critical success instead. While you're Squeezing, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove you or otherwise move you from your space.

Extradimensional Stash.name: Extradimensional Stash
Extradimensional Stash.description:
When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear. You create a small extradimensional space somewhere within in your clothing that can hold up to 5 Bulk worth of objects. The space functions as a bag of holding, but can hold only up to 5 Bulk, has no Bulk of its own, and can be Interacted with using only one hand.

In addition, when you Palm an Object, you can place it directly into this extradimensional space as long as the space has sufficient free space to hold the object.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.HEvuhktgeFXdlDKm]{Extradimensional Stash}

Eye For Numbers.name: 计数眼 Eye For Numbers
Eye For Numbers.description:
你受过训练，只需一眼，就能算出一组物品的具体数目。

你在看到的外型相似的一组物体（例如硬币、书籍、人）时，可以立刻知晓其物体数量，只是在最高位数会进行取整。

举个例子，你看到一排药剂时，会立刻得出有30瓶，但你不会立刻知道它们实际的数量是33瓶，也不知道是什么药，什么类型。与此类似，你看到2805枚的一堆硬币时，会立刻认为这里有3000枚硬币。你只能在可以计数的物体上适用本专长，因此像沙粒数量或繁星数量这样，无法适用。

另外，你在进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{解读文书 Decipher Writing} 时若遇上的是数学或数字相关的文书，则获得+2环境加值。

Eye For Treasure.name: Eye For Treasure
Eye For Treasure.description:
You know good artisanship when you see it and can wax poetic about crafting techniques and forms.

You become trained in Crafting and gain a +1 circumstance bonus on all Crafting checks made to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.B0Eu3EfwIa9kyDEA]{Recall Knowledge}. If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

In addition, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.voYr7ygVcWmlg1f4]{Crafter's Appraisal} skill feat, enabling you to identify magic items using the Crafting skill.

Eye of Ozem.name: Eye of Ozem
Eye of Ozem.description: You've learned how to spot danger at a distance, allowing you to serve as a sentry with ease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls when using Perception, and when you're Scouting, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus instead of +1.

Eye of the Arclords.name: Eye of the Arclords
Eye of the Arclords.description:
Frequency once per day

Access You are a member of the Arclords of Nex.

You open an incandescent third eye upon your forehead.

The eye can remain open for 1 minute, and you can close it before then with a single action with the concentrate trait. It can remain open for 2 minutes if you're a master in Arcana, or 5 minutes if you're legendary.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.5IGz4iheaiUWm5KR]{Effect: Eye of the Arclords}

After your third eye closes, you are dazzled for an amount of time equal to how long you had it open.

Eyes of the Night.name: Eyes of the Night
Eyes of the Night.description:
You can see in the darkness as easily as a true vampire. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.

Fabricated Connections.name: Fabricated Connections
Fabricated Connections.description:
You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

You can roll Deception in place of a different skill when attempting to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Earn Income}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{Subsist}.

You can use Fabricated Connections to Make an Impression or Request once per day, and you can also use it once per week to Earn Income or Subsist.

Fade Away.name: Fade Away
Fade Away.description: Your ability to blend into the background allows you to fade away entirely or appear innocuous even to magical effects. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.c2bTWBNO1BYX4Zfg]{Misdirection} as 2nd-level innate occult spells. You can target only yourself with invisibility, and you must be the primary target of misdirection. You can cast each spell once per day.

Fading.name: Fading
Fading.description:
Frequency Once per Crimson Shroud.

Trigger You are targeted with a Strike by someone you can detect while your Crimson Shroud is active.

You fade partially from reality. The attacker must attempt a DC 11 flat check; on a failure, the attack passes harmlessly through the image of your body that remains behind. An instant later you return to reality, and your Crimson Shroud ends.

Fake Out.name: Fake Out
Fake Out.description:
Trigger An ally is about to use an action that requires an attack roll, targeting a creature within your weapon's first range increment.

Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

With a skilled flourish of your weapon, you force an enemy to acknowledge you as a threat. Make an attack roll to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} the triggering attack. If you dealt damage to that enemy with the same weapon since the start of your last turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to this roll.

False Faith.name: False Faith
False Faith.description:
Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith. After spending 1 hour in prayer to Droskar, you can cast spells using the religious symbol of a different deity as your divine focus, and you can address verbal prayers to that deity. Droskar intercepts your prayers and answers them without the named god knowing.

This ability applies to the religious symbol of only one god at a time-making a different religious symbol work in this fashion requires another hour of prayer and causes the old one to cease functioning. You can always use a religious symbol of Droskar without affecting this ability.

Familiar.name: 魔宠 Familiar
Familiar.description: 你与生物建立契约，为你服务并协助你施法。你获得一个魔宠。

Familiar Conduit.name: Familiar Conduit
Familiar Conduit.description:
Requirements You have line of effect to your familiar.

Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic. If the next action you use is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that has a range, the spell uses the familiar as its origin point.

Familiar Form.name: Familiar Form
Familiar Form.description: You can use your magic to transform into a small creature of a type that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar, potentially allowing you to safely scout for your party while retaining a degree of spellcasting ability. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CHZQJg7O7991Vl4m]{Familiar Form} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Familiar Mascot.name: Familiar Mascot
Familiar Mascot.description:
Your familiar is the heart and soul of your adventuring team.

When selecting master abilities, you can choose an ally to benefit from any specific master ability.

Each master ability can benefit only a single character, and you can select a specific master ability only once unless the ability says otherwise.

Familiar Master Dedication.name: Familiar Master Dedication
Familiar Master Dedication.description:
You have forged a mystical bond with a creature. This might have involved complex rituals and invocations, such as meditating under the moon until something crept out of the forest. Or maybe you just did each other a good turn, such as rescuing the beast from a trap or a foe, and then being rescued in turn.

Whatever the details, you are now comrades until the end. You gain a familiar. If you already have a familiar, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N7dTFxpjXGn4ddq8]{Enhanced Familiar} feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the familiar master archetype.

Familiar's Eyes.name: Familiar's Eyes
Familiar's Eyes.description:
You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

You project your senses into your familiar. When you do, you lose all sensory information from your own body, but you can sense through your familiar's body until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the effect.

While projecting your senses in this way, you can converse telepathically with your familiar if it understands a language.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Familiar's Language.name: Familiar's Language
Familiar's Language.description:
You've learned to speak with your familiar and other creatures like it.

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with creatures of the same family of animals as your familiar.

For example, if your familiar were a cat, you could gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals} for any felines (including leopards, lions, and tigers, among others).

This ability doesn't make them more friendly than normal. If your familiar ever changes to a different creature, you can't use this ability for 1 week while you absorb your new familiar's language.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Fancy Moves.name: Fancy Moves
Fancy Moves.description: You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes. You can use Performance to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}.

Fane's Escape.name: Fane's Escape
Fane's Escape.description:
Requirements You have a deck of playing cards in your possession.

A good getaway requires a good distraction. You Interact to draw a deck of cards and flip it in a fluttering explosion, causing you to become briefly @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to all other creatures using vision as their precise sense, and then you Sneak. You have enough cover to Sneak until the end of your turn. This leaves all of the cards from the deck scattered about the room; collecting them into a deck again takes several minutes.

Fane's Fourberie.name: Fane's Fourberie
Fane's Fourberie.description:
Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

When you enter this stance, choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends. As long as the majority of the deck remains in your possession, any cards that are lost or thrown can be found after 1 minute. Otherwise, the remaining cards are likely lost or destroyed.

A character who has this feat can enchant a single deck of playing cards as a magic weapon, etching fundamental and property runes directly onto the deck of cards.

Fang Sharpener.name: Fang Sharpener
Fang Sharpener.description: You have filed your teeth into jagged points and have an unusually powerful jaw, making your mouth a dangerous weapon. If you're an irongut goblin, you gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d4 piercing damage, and if you're a razortooth goblin, your jaws unarmed attack deals 1d8 piercing damage and loses the finesse trait. Whenever you score a critical hit with your jaws unarmed attack, your target takes [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} per weapon damage die.

Fangs.name: Fangs
Fangs.description:
Your incisors have grown into true fangs: long, sharp, and well-suited to drawing blood.

You gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your fangs are in the brawling group and have the grapple and unarmed traits.

Fantastic Leap.name: Fantastic Leap
Fantastic Leap.description:
You launch yourself through the air at a foe. Attempt a @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.v3dlDjFlOmT5T2gC]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.QPsV0qi2zXm7syt6]{Long Jump}. If you attempt a High Jump, determine the distance you can travel using the scale of a Long Jump.

At the end of your jump, you can make a melee Strike. After your Strike, you fall to the ground if you're in the air. If the distance of your fall is no more than the height of your jump, you take no damage and land upright.

Far Lobber.name: 远距投手 Far Lobber
Far Lobber.description: 你知晓如何进行长距离投掷。当你投掷一枚炼金炸弹时，它拥有30尺的射程增量而不是原本的20尺。

Far Shot.name: Far Shot
Far Shot.description: Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance, increasing your accuracy. Double your weapons' range increments.

Far Throw.name: Far Throw
Far Throw.description: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a -1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a -2 penalty.

Farabellus Flip.name: Farabellus Flip
Farabellus Flip.description:
Trigger An enemy targets you with a melee Strike.

Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

Flinging your body into a twisting somersault, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against the triggering attack. If the attack still hits you, you can Step to an open space that's still within the triggering enemy's reach, turning the impact of the blow into momentum.

Fascinating Performance.name: 迷魂 Fascinating Performance
Fascinating Performance.description: 当你使用表演技能进行演出时，将你的检定结果用来对抗一个生物的意志DC，如果你胜出，这个生物陷入迷魂（Fascinated）状态1轮时间。如果周遭的环境会使目标因为直接的干扰而分心（比如身处战斗环境），你必须要在演出检定上大成功才可以将对方迷魂，并且你的演出动作获得【失能】（incapacitation）特性。你必须在开始演出前选择你希望迷魂的生物目标，并且对方会因此而在之后免疫你的迷魂尝试1小时。当你在表演技能上达到专家熟练度时，你可以同时迷魂最多4个生物；当你达到大师级熟练度时，你最多可以同时迷魂10个生物；当你达到传奇熟练度时，你可以同时迷魂所有正在观赏你演出的生物。

Fast Channel.name: Fast Channel
Fast Channel.description:
Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} by spending 2 actions, you can get the effects of the 3-action version instead of the 2-action version. You can do this with harm if you have harmful font or heal if you have healing font (or both if you have Versatile Font).

Fast Movement.name: Fast Movement
Fast Movement.description: While you are raging, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Fast Recovery.name: 快速恢复 Fast Recovery
Fast Recovery.description: 你的身体以超常的效率从伤痛中恢复正常。你在休息时可以恢复原本双倍数量的生命值。当你在对抗一个疾病（Disease）或是毒素（Poison）的一次强韧豁免检定（Fortitude Save）时获得成功，这个毒素或是疾病的状态等级（Stage）降低2级，恶性（Virulent）毒素或疾病的状态等级降低1级；当你在此类强韧豁免检定上获得大成功时，这个毒素或是疾病的状态等级降低3级，烈性毒素或疾病的状态等级降低2级。如果你承受流失（Drained）状态，每晚的休息可以使你承受的该状态等级降低2级而非通常的1级。

Fatal Aria.name: 致命咏叹调 Fatal Aria
Fatal Aria.description: 你的歌曲用无法承受的情感压垮对方，用潜在的致死力量攻击他们。你学会 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lyJDBD9OFW11vLyT]{致命咏叹调 Fatal Aria} 组曲法术。你聚能池的聚能点数提升1点。

Fatal Bullet.name: Fatal Bullet
Fatal Bullet.description: You're especially talented at striking your enemies in their most vulnerable areas. When you critically hit with a fatal firearm, you deal an additional die of the appropriate size and damage type for the fatal trait after doubling the weapon's damage. For example, after getting a critical hit with a fatal d12 weapon, you add an additional 1d12 damage to the attack after doubling its damage.

Favor Of Heaven.name: Favor Of Heaven
Favor Of Heaven.description: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side. Once per day, you can cast a 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} as a divine innate spell. In addition, you gain resistance 5 to both good and evil damage.

Favorable Winds.name: Favorable Winds
Favorable Winds.description: You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Favored Enemy.name: Favored Enemy
Favored Enemy.description:
You have studied a specific type of wild creature and can hunt it more easily. When you gain this feat, choose animals, beasts, dragons, or both fungi and plants as your favored enemy.

When you roll initiative and can see an enemy that belongs to the chosen category, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} as a free action, designating that enemy. You can use this free action even if you haven't identified the creature yet with Recall Knowledge. The benefit doesn't apply against favored enemies disguised as other creatures, and the GM determines whether it applies against a creature disguised as a favored enemy.

Favored Terrain.name: Favored Terrain
Favored Terrain.description:
You have studied a specific terrain to overcome its challenges. Choose aquatic, arctic, desert, forest, mountain, plains, sky, swamp, or underground as your favored terrain.

When in that terrain, you can ignore the effects of non-magical diffcult terrain.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, you gain a second benefit while in your favored terrain, depending on your choice.

  • Aquatic You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed. If you already had a swim Speed, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your swim Speed.
  • Arctic You need to eat and drink only one-tenth as much as usual, you aren't affected by severe or extreme cold, and you can walk across ice and snow at full Speed without needing to Balance.
  • Desert You need to eat and drink only one-tenth as much as usual, you aren't affected by severe or extreme heat, and you can walk along sand at full Speed without needing to Balance.
  • Forest, Mountain, or Underground You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed. If you already had a climb Speed, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your climb Speed.
  • Plains You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your land Speed.
  • Sky You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, if you have one.
  • Swamp You can move across bogs at full Speed, even if they are deep enough to be greater difficult terrain or to normally require you to Swim.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.sDftJWPPSUeSZD3A]{Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.IpRfT9lL3YR6MH6w]{Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.OhLcaJeQy4Nf5Mwo]{Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.HKPmrxkZwHRND5Um]{Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed)}

Fear No Law, Fear No One.name: Fear No Law, Fear No One
Fear No Law, Fear No One.description: When you roll a success on a save against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead. In addition, any time you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition, reduce the condition's value by 1. As usual, this ability reduces the initial frightened condition by 1, so if you have multiple similar abilities, they don't both take effect.

Fearsome Brute.name: Fearsome Brute
Fearsome Brute.description:
Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls for Strikes against @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creatures. The bonus is equal to double the target's frightened value.

If you have master proficiency in Intimidation, increase the bonus to triple the target's frightened value.

Feather Step.name: 轻羽步 Feather Step
Feather Step.description: 你可以迅速而谨慎地踏出步伐。你在困难地形（Difficult Terrain）中也可以进行快步（Step）。

Feathered Cloak.name: Feathered Cloak
Feathered Cloak.description: To blend in with the grounded and wingless, you fold your wings just so on your back, creating the illusion of a feathered cloak. You receive a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate a version of yourself who is not a strix. Additionally, your folded wings help you obscure objects on your person, providing a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to Conceal an Object.

Feed On Pain.name: Feed On Pain
Feed On Pain.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You deal mental damage.

The psychic feedback of another creature's pain fills you with false life. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the mental damage you dealt from the triggering effect. If the triggering action dealt mental damage to multiple creatures, calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Felicitous Riposte.name: Felicitous Riposte
Felicitous Riposte.description:
You take advantage of your foe's openings with uncanny odds.

When you make an @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Jtn7IugykXDlIoZq]{Opportune Riposte}, roll twice on the attack roll and take the better result.

Fell Rider.name: Fell Rider
Fell Rider.description: You have trained with your animal companion to become a terrifying, unified juggernaut on the battlefield. Your animal companion becomes trained in Intimidation. If your animal companion uses Support while serving as your mount, it grants you the effects of the Aid reaction on your first Intimidation check to Demoralize on the same turn, even though it can't take reactions.

Felling Shot.name: Felling Shot
Felling Shot.description:
Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air. Make a Strike with a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon against a flat-footed creature. If the Strike is a success and deals damage, the target must attempt a Reflex save against your class DC with the following effects.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target falls up to 120 feet. If it hits the ground, it takes no damage from the fall.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target can't fiy, jump, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground until the end of your next turn

Felling Strike.name: Felling Strike
Felling Strike.description:
Your attack can ground an airborne foe.

Make a Strike. If it hits and deals damage to a flying target, the target falls up to 120 feet. The fall is gradual enough that if it causes the target to hit the ground, the target takes no damage from the fall.

If the attack is a critical hit, the target can't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground until the end of your next turn.

Feral Mutagen.name: 凶猛突变药剂 Feral Mutagen
Feral Mutagen.description:
你的野性突变药剂将唤醒潜藏于你体内的野兽，赋予你利爪和尖牙，以及骇人的外貌。

当你处在一份 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.IQK9N2mEOyAj3iWU]{野性突变药剂 Bestial Mutagen} 的影响下时，你能够将突变药剂的物品加值加到你的威吓检定上。

此外，你的爪击（Claws）和啮咬（Jaws）变得愈发恶毒，它们获得致命（Deadly）d10的特征。最后，你能够将突变药剂在AC上的减值从-1提升至-2，此时，你的爪击和啮咬的伤害骰大小也会提升一级。

Ferocious Beasts.name: Ferocious Beasts
Ferocious Beasts.description:
Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood.

Animal companions or bonded animals you have gain the Orc Ferocity feat, and they gain a reaction they can use only for Orc Ferocity.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zZOycr00XDVTKuXa]{Undying Ferocity} ancestry feat, all animal companions or bonded animals you have also gain the benefits of that feat when using the Orc Ferocity reaction.

Ferocious Gust.name: Ferocious Gust
Ferocious Gust.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

With heavy wing beats, you whip up a furious gust and direct it at your opponents. This air blast has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Ferocious Shape.name: Ferocious Shape
Ferocious Shape.description:
You have mastered the shape of ferocious dinosaurs.

Add the forms listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{Dinosaur Form} to your wild shape list.

Whenever you use wild shape to take a form that grants you a specific Athletics modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to your Athletics checks.

Fetchling Lore.name: Fetchling Lore
Fetchling Lore.description: You've learned obscure lessons about your fellow fetchlings. You're trained in Occultism and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Shadow Plane Lore.

Fey Caller.name: Fey Caller
Fey Caller.description:
You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

Add @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{Illusory Object}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hkfH9Z53hPzcOwNB]{Veil} to your spell list as primal spells.

Fey Cantrips.name: Fey Cantrips
Fey Cantrips.description: You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound} as primal innate cantrips. If you have the grig heritage, you also gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, and if you have the draxie heritage, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}.

Fey Disguise.name: Fey Disguise
Fey Disguise.description: You can disguise yourself with magical illusions. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} once per day as a 1st-level primal innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.

Fey Fellowship.name: Fey Fellowship
Fey Fellowship.description:
Your enhanced fey connection affords you a warmer reception from creatures of the First World as well as tools to foil their tricks. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to both Perception checks and saving throws against fey. In addition, whenever you meet a fey creature in a social situation, you can immediately attempt a Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on that creature rather than needing to converse for 1 minute. You take a -5 penalty to the check. If you fail, you can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.

Special If you have the Glad-Hand skill feat, you don't take the penalty on your immediate Diplomacy check if the target is a fey.

Fey Influence.name: Fey Influence
Fey Influence.description:
You have been exposed to powerful fey magic. You become trained in primal DCs and spell attack rolls. You gain the fey trait and one of the following features which grant an innate primal spell that can be used once per day.

  • Anteater You can launch your tongue forward as a deadly attack, gaining @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k34hDOfIIMAxNL4a]{Grim Tendrils}.
  • Dryad Your body is covered in elegant vines, granting you @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus}
  • Gremlin You have long, bat-like ears and gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane}
  • Monarch You have vestigial, insectile features and gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting}.

This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.)

Fey Magic.name: Fey Magic
Fey Magic.description: You can use faerie magic to hide yourself and expose hidden foes. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]{Faerie Fire} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} each once per day as primal innate spells.

Fey Skin.name: Fey Skin
Fey Skin.description: While you are more susceptible to cold iron than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the First World. Increase your maximum Hit Points by an amount equal to your level. If you rest for 10 minutes, brilliant light from the First World seeps into your form from your wings (or the spot where your wings would be), causing you to regain a number of Hit Points equal to your level; this is cumulative with any Hit Points you regain from Treat Wounds. However, you gain weakness 5 to cold iron.

Field Artillery.name: Field Artillery
Field Artillery.description: While castles are generally obliging enough to stay in one place, out in the field positioning is of paramount importance-a gun in the wrong place is worse than useless. You can Interact with an adjacent mounted siege weapon to increase its Speed by 10 feet for one round.

Fiend's Door.name: 魔族便门 Fiend's Door
Fiend's Door.description: 一如众多魔族，你持有透过传送逃离危险的超自然能力。每日1次，你可以5环级神术内在法术的形式施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}。

Fiendish Eyes.name: 魔族之眼 Fiendish Eyes
Fiendish Eyes.description:
你可如同魔界生物一般在黑暗中清晰视物。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{黑暗视觉}.

特殊 此专长只得在1级时选取，且不得透过重训来取得或替换之。

Fiendish Form.name: 炼狱形态 Fiendish Form
Fiendish Form.description:
你的外型重塑成侍奉你神的炼狱型态，举例来说：如果是恶魔，那你可能会有腐化的鳞片、扭曲的角，以及腥红的双眼。

你获得与你速度相同的飞行速度。如果你没有，那你会获得 @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{黑暗视觉} ，你获得炼狱(fiend)以及你所变成的侍奉者相应的特征(例如邪魔[daemon]、恶魔[demon]或魔鬼[devil])。

Fiendish Lore.name: 魔界学识 Fiendish Lore
Fiendish Lore.description:
你或是由你的魔裔或魔界生物亲族抚养长大，或是将自己的生活奉献给了探询魔界位面秘密的研究。

你在威吓技能以及宗教技能上受训，若你会在其中一个技能上自动受训(例如背景或职业的效果)，改为让由你自选的另一个技能受训。

你还会在血脉来源的魔界位面的学识上受训(一般为末日荒原学识、深渊学识或地域学识)。

若你已经在本专长提供的技能上受训了，你需要手动指定另一个技能来受训。你也需要手动选择学识的类别。

Fiendish Mount.name: 炼狱坐骑 Fiendish Mount
Fiendish Mount.description:
你的骏骑盟友显化出你神所赐予的强大又邪恶的恩惠。

它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{黑暗视觉}，最大生命值加40，并且获得对善良伤害有弱点10。

此外，它会长出符合你神的侍奉者的翅膀(例如魔鬼就是蝙蝠翅膀)，让它获得与陆地速度相同的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{飞行} 速度。

它获得炼狱(fiend)以及它所变成的侍奉者相应的特征(例如邪魔[daemon]、恶魔[demon]或魔鬼[devil])。

Fiendish Resistance.name: 魔族抗性 Fiendish Resistance
Fiendish Resistance.description:
你与魔族先祖之间的连结，赐与了你他们持有的某种抗性。从下列能量伤害类型中选取1项：强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰、音波。你获得该伤害类型的抗力5。

虽然你可自由选择上述选项中的任何能量伤害类型，但该伤害类型一般会与你的血脉来源的魔界生物相对。举例来说，地狱后裔应选取火焰的抗力，而系出鹫魔的深渊后裔应选取电击。

Fiendish Strikes.name: 魔族打击 Fiendish Strikes
Fiendish Strikes.description:
你与邪恶不断加强的联系使你向善良目标发起的一切攻击都附带了邪恶能量。

所有你以武器或非武装攻击发动的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击} 额外造成 [[/r {1}[evil]]]{1点邪恶伤害} ，并带有[邪恶]、[魔法]特征。

Fiendish Wings.name: 魔族飞翼 Fiendish Wings
Fiendish Wings.description:
频率 每日1次

透过努力，你可在背上召出魔法飞翼，外观形似蝙蝠翅膀或其他魔族的飞翼。

此飞翼存续10分钟，你在飞翼显现期间获得等同于陆地速度的飞行速度。

Fiendish Word.name: 魔界真言 Fiendish Word
Fiendish Word.description:
你引用魔界的秽邪真言来制裁你的敌人。

每日1次，你可以7环级神术内在法术的形式施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sX2o0HH4RjJDAZ8C]{神圣裁决 Divine Decree} ，但你必须为该法术的效果选择邪恶阵营，且不论你是否信仰神祇，或所信仰神祇的阵营为何，都可施放此法术。

Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator).name: 驱魔誓约(解放者) Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)
Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator).description:
你立下誓约，要将堕落的魔族（Fiend）逐回被他们称作家园的黑暗位面。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须驱逐或者杀死你所遇见的魔族；如果在极其罕见的情况下你遇到了一位善良的魔族，你不必驱逐或者屠戮它。"

如果你使用由魔族触发的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步 Liberating Step} ，你的盟友会在自由快步所给予的检定上获得+4的环境加值，这名盟友在之后还可以进行两次快步（Step）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.9dCt0asv0kt7DR4q]{效果：自由快步 (vs. 魔族)}

你不会将魔族视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处魔族统治的国家。

Fiendsbane Oath (Paladin).name: 驱魔誓约(圣武士) Fiendsbane Oath (Paladin)
Fiendsbane Oath (Paladin).description:
你立下誓约，要将堕落的魔族（Fiend）逐回被他们称作家园的黑暗位面。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须驱逐或者杀死你所遇见的魔族；如果在极其罕见的情况下你遇到了一位善良的魔族，你不必驱逐或者屠戮它。"

你对抗魔族的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{报应打击 Retributive Strike}在伤害上获得+4的环境加值，如果你在你所使用的武器上达到大师熟练等级，则获得+6的环境加值。

你不会将魔族视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处魔族统治的国家。

Fiendsbane Oath (Redeemer).name: 驱魔誓约(救赎者) Fiendsbane Oath (Redeemer)
Fiendsbane Oath (Redeemer).description:
你立下誓约，要将堕落的魔族（Fiend）逐回被他们称作家园的黑暗位面。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须驱逐或者杀死你所遇见的魔族；如果在极其罕见的情况下你遇到了一位善良的魔族，你不必驱逐或者屠戮它。"

你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{救赎瞥视 Glimpse of Redemption's} 所给予的抗力在对抗魔族的伤害时变为7+你的等级。

你不会将魔族视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处魔族统治的国家。

Fiery Retort.name: Fiery Retort
Fiery Retort.description:
Trigger An opponent adjacent to you hits you with a melee weapon or a melee unarmed attack.

Frequency once per minute

Ignoring your pain, you sear your attacker with a wave of flame. The triggering opponent takes fire damage equal to your [[/r @actor.level #fire]]{level}.

Fighter Dedication.name: 战士入门 Fighter Dedication
Fighter Dedication.description:
你在简易武器和军用武器中受训。你在特技Acrobatics或运动Athletics中选择一个受训。如果你已经受训于上述两个技能，你在另一个你自选的技能中受训。你在战士的职业DC中受训。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从战士变体中获得了其他两个专长。

Fighter Resiliency.name: 战士韧性 Fighter Resiliency
Fighter Resiliency.description: 你获得的每个战士的变体职业专长都会给予你3点额外生命值。如果你继续选择战士变体职业专长，你就会继续按这种方式获得额外生命值。

Final Form.name: 最终形态 Final Form
Final Form.description:
频率 一天一次

你接纳体内的魔族血脉并将之挪为己用，向天魔诸界喊出愤怒痛苦及不屈的嘶吼，你爆发的威能甚至足以撼动并扭曲现实。每个魔裔都有自己独特的变身特效，这可能含有硫磺火焰、凄厉鬼哭、扭动蛇光等。每个离你10'内的生物需通过强韧豁免(DC为你的职业DC或法术DC两者取高)，否则陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋} 与 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩} 1轮。你的最终形态如同 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hiVL8qsnTJtpouw0]{神圣化身 Divine Vessel} 法术一般运作，但法术效果中的神祇改为与你的魔裔血脉阵营相同的神。你的最终形态的外貌会与魔裔血脉的祖先相似，变身能维持1分钟。处于最终形态时，每次变身各1次，你可以6环级神术内在法术的形式，施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sRfSBHWHdbIa0aGc]{冻寒黑暗 Chilling Darkness}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball},和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt}。

当你脱离最终形态时，你陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失3}。此外，当你取得此专长时，你得到弱点 善良 10，不论你是否变身为最终形态；且不论你的阵营是否为邪恶，你都会承受善良伤害。

特殊 依照GM判断，可调整此专长的具体效果来配合各个魔裔血脉。举例来说，GM可能认为比起火球术，野兽之子的最终形态应该要能施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{魅影杀手 Phantasmal Killer} 才更好。

Final Shot.name: Final Shot
Final Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding an unloaded firearm.

You jam a triple charge of black powder into your weapon to unleash a devastating but risky and inaccurate attack. Interact to reload, expending three doses of black powder in addition to your normal black powder or ammunition, then Strike with your firearm against a creature within the weapon's first range increment. If you roll a success, the attack is instead a critical success, but if you roll a failure, the weapon misfires. Regardless of your roll, after the attack you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-footed} until the start of your next turn and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Finessed Features.name: Finessed Features
Finessed Features.description: You've learned how to build snares that trigger based on visual stimuli. When you construct a snare using gears, you can cause it to trigger based on the visual features of a creature. For example, you could lay a snare that can only be triggered by a Large or Larger creatures, or one that only activates when a creature wearing red clothing would trigger it. You can use this ability to specify your snares to trigger on creatures that typically do not trigger snares, such as creatures smaller than Small, though the creature must still otherwise satisfy the snare's trigger as normal.

Finest Trick.name: 化身他人 Finest Trick
Finest Trick.description: 许多魔族─最著名的有罗刹王和魅魔─可以自在变身为他人样貌，几经训练后你也办的到了。当你使用化身常人能力时，可以不变成明显是非魔裔版本的自己的形象，而变成该族裔的寻常模样的他人。若你在使用能力时一并吃下一些目标的血、毛发或其他等价的适当身体部位，你还可指定变身成特定的人物(此时可以变成任何与你的族裔体型及类别相同的族裔的生物，对大多数族裔来说会是类人生物)，此时你必须清楚目标的相貌，也必须确知吃下去的部位的确来自目标的身体上。

Finishing Follow-through.name: Finishing Follow-through
Finishing Follow-through.description: Finishing a foe maintains your swagger. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache} if your finisher brings the target to 0 HP (or brings the highest-level target to 0 HP, if your finisher attacks multiple targets).

Finishing Precision.name: Finishing Precision
Finishing Precision.description:
You've learned how to land daring blows when you have @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RQH6vigvhmiYKKjg]{Precise Strike} class feature but you deal 1 addition damage on a hit and 1d6 damage on a finisher. This damage doesn't increase as you gain levels. In addition, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.dCuvfq3r2K9wXY9g]{Basic Finisher} action.

Finned Ridges.name: Finned Ridges
Finned Ridges.description: The ridges and flaps of your skin steer you through the water. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.

Fire Lung.name: Fire Lung
Fire Lung.description:
A lifetime of proximity to flames has inured your lungs and eyes to smoke. You can breathe normally in areas of ash and smoke without risk of suffocation, and you ignore the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

You need only a successful DC 10 flat check to recover from @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}, rather than DC 15 (and the DC when receiving particularly effective assistance is 5 instead of 10).

Fire Resistance.name: Fire Resistance
Fire Resistance.description: Your connection to heat and flame means that fire is reluctant to bring its full force to bear against you. You gain fire resistance equal to half your level, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fire effects.

Fire Savvy.name: Fire Savvy
Fire Savvy.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You've grown up around a forge and are well-suited to dealing with smoke and flame. Your flat check to remove persistent fire damage is DC 10 instead of DC 15, which is reduced to DC 5 with appropriate assistance. In addition, if you roll a success on a saving throw against suffocation or choking due to smoke or ash, you get a critical success instead.

Firearm Expert.name: Firearm Expert
Firearm Expert.description: You've become an expert with your chosen weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms increase to expert.

Firebrand Braggart Dedication.name: Firebrand Braggart Dedication
Firebrand Braggart Dedication.description:
Your Firebrand training has taught you that achieving something is more satisfying if you boast about it first. You declare a boast about a particular skill action, such as Balance, Demoralize, or Recall Knowledge. The first time you attempt this action within the next minute in a context the GM deems both suitably challenging and meaningful, you must roll twice and use the lower result. If you succeed at this check, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to attempt the same action for 10 minutes. If you fail this check or don't attempt the action within 1 minute, you instead take a -1 circumstance penalty on checks to attempt the same action for 1 hour.

If the chosen action can be used with multiple skills, such as Identify Magic or Recall Knowledge, you must specify which skill you are using for that particular action, such as using Arcana to Identify Magic, and your bonus or penalty after the boast applies only to checks using that skill for that action. Once you declare a boast about a particular action, you cannot declare a boast about the same action until the next time you make daily preparations, regardless of whether you succeed or fail at the check.

Typically a challenging task is one with at least a standard DC for your level, though the difficulty may be higher depending on the situation. A meaningful context is one where the action's success or failure is relevant to the pursuit of your goals, rather than a boast you made simply to gain a bonus later.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Firebrand Braggart archetype.

Firesight.name: Firesight
Firesight.description: You can see through the haze of flame. You automatically succeed at the flat check to target a concealed creature if that creature is concealed only by smoke and fire.

Firework Technician Dedication.name: Firework Technician Dedication
Firework Technician Dedication.description:
You've learned the secrets of making fire and sound bloom using black powder, metals, and paper. You most likely came by this knowledge through formal training with a fireworks house in Tian Xia or a fireworks company from Vudra, though perhaps you mastered fireworks completely by yourself after finding a secret stash in an old shipwreck.

You become trained in Fireworks Lore or become an expert if you were already trained in it. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} feat, a pool of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Infused Reagents} equal to your level, and @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} (allowing you to make alchemical items during your daily preparations without the normal cost or time expenditure). You can use your infused reagents only to make fireworks,@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yUjuLbBMflVum8Yn]{Launch Fireworks Display}, and use other feats from this archetype. Your advanced alchemy level is 1. If you gain infused reagents from more than one source, you use the highest number of reagents to determine your pool rather than adding them together.

You can also create special fireworks displays using your infused reagents, designed to create distinctive effects you can use to make onlookers marvel and even to gain an advantage in combat. You gain the Launch Fireworks Display action and learn some basic displays, and you can learn additional, more complex displays through other firework technician feats. The DC for any display is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the fireworks technician archetype.

First Revelation.name: First Revelation
First Revelation.description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell. Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus}by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

First Revelation (Ancestors Mystery).name: First Revelation (Ancestors Mystery)
First Revelation (Ancestors Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.d2pi7laQkzlr3wrS]{Ancestral Touch}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Ancestors

One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. This predominant ancestor guides you to use their preferred type of action.

When you try to use one of the types of actions listed for the other ancestors, you must succeed at a DC 4 flat check. On a failure, you spend the action but gain no effect (though you don't lose the spell if you were Casting a Spell). If your action would take 1 minute or longer, it's long enough that you can overcome the meddling, and you don't need to attempt a flat check.

During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.IrMgMRXf258bdIDo]{Effect: Minor Martial Ancestor Curse}, @Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.2uZfgqV279rxX4NK]{Effect: Minor Skillful Ancestor Curse}, @Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.iZHqhBHIZ0TB5Dbn]{Effect: Minor Spellcaster Ancestor Curse}

ANCESTRAL INFLUENCE

  1. Martial Ancestor, Preferred action Strikes
  2. Skillful Ancestor, Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor, Preferred action Cast a Spell
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

First Revelation (Battle Mystery).name: First Revelation (Battle Mystery)
First Revelation (Battle Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dqaCLzINHBiKjh4J]{Call to Arms}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Battle

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.922SDayUnipK4wlx]{Effect: Minor Battle Curse}

First Revelation (Bones Mystery).name: First Revelation (Bones Mystery)
First Revelation (Bones Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D6T17BdazhNy3KPm]{Soul Siphon}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Bones

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.whf92aQ6aMwByjFn]{Effect: Minor Bones Curse}

First Revelation (Cosmos Mystery).name: First Revelation (Cosmos Mystery)
First Revelation (Cosmos Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mlNYROcFrUF8nFgk]{Spray of Stars}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Cosmos

Your unnatural lightness makes it hard to keep your footing and interact with other physical objects. You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and take a -2 penalty to saves and DCs against @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and other forms of forced movement.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.usi1qa95gK4WnFIg]{Effect: Minor Cosmos Curse}

First Revelation (Flames Mystery).name: First Revelation (Flames Mystery)
First Revelation (Flames Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Flames

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.T6En6oEDwSycRyAG]{Effect: Minor Flames Curse}

First Revelation (Life Mystery).name: First Revelation (Life Mystery)
First Revelation (Life Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2gQYrCPwBmwau26O]{Life Link}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Life

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.yR4XFhh3irGBgPmJ]{Effect: Minor Life Curse}

First Revelation (Lore Mystery).name: First Revelation (Lore Mystery)
First Revelation (Lore Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k2QrUk7jWMAWozMh]{Brain Drain}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Lore

You take a -4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.zYKkObDPVRQOtwPh]{Effect: Minor Lore Curse}

First Revelation (Tempest Mystery).name: First Revelation (Tempest Mystery)
First Revelation (Tempest Mystery).description:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EzB9i7R6aBRAtJCh]{Tempest Touch}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Tempests

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a 5-foot emanation around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.IvXLHQySVNj4qMOi]{Effect: Minor Tempest Curse}

First World Adept.name: First World Adept
First World Adept.description: Over time your fey magic has grown stronger. You gain faerie fire and invisibility as 2nd-level primal innate spells. You can cast each of these primal innate spells once per day.

First World Magic.name: First World Magic
First World Magic.description: Your connection to the First World grants you a primal innate spell, much like those of the fey. Choose one cantrip from the primal spell list. You can cast this spell as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Flamboyant Athlete.name: Flamboyant Athlete
Flamboyant Athlete.description:
Your Panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity. While you have panache, you gain the following benefits.

  • You gain climb and swim Speeds equal to half your land Speed.
  • The DCs of your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jumps} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jumps} decrease by 10. This doesn't combine with other abilities that reduce those DCs.
  • The distance you can move with a vertical @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}increases to 5 feet. Your distance for a horizontal Leap increases to 15 feet if your Speed is at least 15 feet, or to 20 feet if your Speed is at least 30 feet.

Flamboyant Cruelty.name: Flamboyant Cruelty
Flamboyant Cruelty.description:
You love to kick your enemies when they're down, and you look fabulous when you do.

When you make a melee weapon Strike against a foe that has at least two of the following conditions, you gain a circumstance bonus to your damage roll equal to the number of these conditions the foe has.
