The qualifying conditions are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}.

If you hit such a foe, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} and to perform your style's Panache-granting actions until the end of your turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.v2HDcrxQF2Dncjbs]{Effect: Flamboyant Cruelty}

Flamboyant Leap.name: Flamboyant Leap
Flamboyant Leap.description:
Requirements You are capable of using a finisher.

You stylishly leap and deliver a powerful finisher.

Make a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} and attempt one single-action finisher at any point during your jump; the finisher can't be one that includes other movement, such as Mobile Finisher.

Immediately after the finisher, you fall to the ground if you're in the air, even if you haven't reached the maximum distance of your jump. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you take no damage and land upright.

When attempting a High Jump or Long Jump during a Flamboyant Leap, determine the DC using the Long Jump DCs, and increase the maximum distance to double your Speed, rather than just your Speed.

Flame Jump.name: Flame Jump
Flame Jump.description:
Frequency once per day

Your peri lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence.

You can spend 1 minute in focused preparation, then enter a fire your size or larger to instantly teleport to any fire that is your size or larger up to 5 miles away. You take no damage from entering or exiting fires when using this ability. Once you enter the fire, you instantly know the rough locations of other large fires within range and can exit from the original fire, if you prefer.

You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you when you teleport; if you attempt to do so, the activity fails.

Fledgling Flight.name: Fledgling Flight
Fledgling Flight.description:
Frequency once per round

You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed. If you don't end your movement on solid ground, you fall at the end of your turn.

Fleet.name: 飞跑 Fleet
Fleet.description:
你的移动速度极快。你的陆地速度（Speed）增进5尺。

Automatically applied effects:

  • +5 untyped bonus to land speed

Fleet Tempo.name: Fleet Tempo
Fleet Tempo.description:
Frequency once per hour

To rush after a criminal or reach someone in need, you ring a sprightly tone. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.pQ9e5njvIOe5QzFa]{Effect: Fleet Tempo}

Fleeting Shadow.name: Fleeting Shadow
Fleeting Shadow.description: You're able to quickly disappear and then move about stealthily. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} twice.

Flensing Slice.name: Flensing Slice
Flensing Slice.description:
Requirements Your last action was a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice}, and both attacks hit the target.

When you hit with both attacks with Double Slice, you flense the target, making it bleed and creating a weak spot.

The target takes [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} per weapon damage die of whichever of the weapons you used that has the most weapon damage dice (maximum 4d8 for a major striking weapon).

The target becomes flat-footed, and its resistances to any physical damage types are reduced by 5; these two effects last until the beginning of your next turn.

Flesh Wound.name: Flesh Wound
Flesh Wound.description:
You fire to ensure that even if your shot doesn't land cleanly, it still lands close enough to deal some damage. Make a ranged Strike. It gains the following effect on a failure (though not a critical failure).

Failure Though your attack misses, it still deals one die of damage plus any damage from your weapon specialization class feature. This uses your weapon's normal damage die and damage type. This attack doesn't add extra damage from any other sources or abilities.

Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting.name: Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting
Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting.description: You broaden your ability to channel your power into halcyon magic. You gain one more common halcyon spell of each level of halcyon spell you can cast other than your highest (you do not gain an additional cantrip). You also gain one additional halcyon spell slot for each level of halcyon spell you can cast, other than the highest.

Flexible Ritualist.name: Flexible Ritualist
Flexible Ritualist.description:
You can perform two aspects of a ritual yourself.

When you cast a ritual, you can reduce the number of secondary casters by 1.

When you do, you must fulfill any requirements for the secondary caster, and you attempt the secondary check normally performed by that secondary caster. You can't replace a secondary caster who is the target of the spell (as in the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual).

Flexible Spellcaster Dedication.name: Flexible Spellcaster Dedication
Flexible Spellcaster Dedication.description: You now have four cantrips per day instead of three. At 4th level, you have five cantrips per day instead of four.

Flexible Studies.name: Flexible Studies
Flexible Studies.description: You've collected a cross-section of information on various disciplines you can refer to when preparing for various tasks. During your daily preparations, you can cram on a certain subject to become temporarily trained in one skill of your choice. This proficiency lasts until you prepare again. As this proficiency increase is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or permanent character option like a feat.

Flexible Tail.name: Flexible Tail
Flexible Tail.description: You can perform simple Interact actions with your tail, such as opening an unlocked door. Your tail can't perform actions that require fingers or significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and you can't use it to hold items.

Flexible Transmogrification.name: Flexible Transmogrification
Flexible Transmogrification.description: You've learned how to transmogrify your eidolon to suit the circumstances of the day. Each day, choose one evolution feat of 6th level or lower during your daily preparations. Your eidolon gains that feat until your next daily preparations.

Flicker.name: Flicker
Flicker.description: You use your movements and disguises to make yourself a flickering blur. You gain concealment until your next turn. As usual for concealment involving an obvious visual manifestation, you can't use this concealment to Hide.

Flinging Blow.name: Flinging Blow
Flinging Blow.description:
You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.

Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you (or 20 feet, on a critical failure) and fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

If another creature or physical object would prevent this movement, both your target and the blocking creature or object take [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} per 5 feet of movement that was prevented.

Flinging Shove.name: Flinging Shove
Flinging Shove.description:
Increase the distance you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} your opponent with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.19OLlTrxvEtDAOHc]{Aggressive Block} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gt9pvIicabSOe6pB]{Brutish Shove} to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success.

When you use Aggressive Block, you can choose whether the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} or Shoved. When you make a Brutish Shove, you also Shove the target 5 feet on a failure.

Flourish And Ruin.name: Flourish And Ruin
Flourish And Ruin.description: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x5rGOmhDRDVQPrnW]{Field of Life} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JbAcSLu62TU1OgNF]{Tangling Creepers} as 6th-level primal innate spells once per day each. You become an expert in primal spell attack rolls and primal spell DCs.

Flourishing Finish.name: Flourishing Finish
Flourishing Finish.description:
Requirements Your last action was a Strike that dropped an opponent to 0 Hit Points.

Attempt a Performance check, comparing the result to the Will DC of each foe within 30 feet who can see you. Regardless of the result, each target is immune to your Flourishing Finish for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Success The target is frightened 1.

Fluid Contortionist.name: Fluid Contortionist
Fluid Contortionist.description: You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to Squeeze. When you roll a critical failure on a check to Squeeze, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Flurry of Maneuvers.name: Flurry of Maneuvers
Flurry of Maneuvers.description: You flurry is a combination of maneuvers. You can replace one or both of your attacks during a Flurry of Blows with @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapples}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoves}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trips}.

Flying Blade.name: Flying Blade
Flying Blade.description:
You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

When you have @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}, you apply your precise strike damage on ranged Strikes you make with a thrown weapon within that weapon's first range increment. The thrown weapon must be an agile or finesse weapon.

This also allows you to make a thrown weapon ranged Strike for @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.pyo0vmxUFIFX2GNl]{Confident Finisher} and any other finisher that includes a Strike that can benefit from your precise strike.

Flying Kick.name: Flying Kick
Flying Kick.description:
You launch yourself at a foe. Make a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} or attempt a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}.

At the end of the jump, if you're adjacent to a foe, you can immediately Strike that foe with an unarmed attack, even if the foe is in midair. You fall to the ground after the Strike. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you land upright and take no damage.

Focus Ally.name: Focus Ally
Focus Ally.description:
Trigger An adjacent ally fails, but doesn't critically fail, a saving throw against an effect with the incapacitation trait.

You're so focused on your allies that you can help them to recenter when something would take them out of the fight. Your ally rerolls the failed saving throw. That ally must take the second result.

Focused Cat Nap.name: Focused Cat Nap
Focused Cat Nap.description: When you @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}, you can also @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} as you dream of a relevant activity.

Focused Fascination.name: Focused Fascination
Focused Fascination.description:
When you use Fascinating Performance in a combat encounter, you need only a success, rather than a critical success, to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinate} your target. This works only if you're attempting to fascinate one target.

For example, if you were an expert in Performance, you could choose to target multiple creatures normally or target one creature and fascinate it on a success.

Focused Juggler.name: Focused Juggler
Focused Juggler.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Juggler}

Trigger Your turn begins.

You continue Juggling until the end of your next turn. Increase the maximum number of items you can juggle by one.

Focused Shot.name: Focused Shot
Focused Shot.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}.

You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

Make a ranged weapon Strike against a target within your weapon's first range increment. This Strike ignores the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition and all cover.

Foil Senses.name: 挫败感知 Foil Senses
Foil Senses.description: 你善于扰乱拥有特殊感知能力的生物，并且随时提防着自己的存在被特殊感官捕捉到。当你使用避人耳目（Avoid Notice），藏匿（Hide）或是潜行（Sneak）动作时，你总是视为提前对特殊感知做出过预警。

Folklorist Dedication.name: Folklorist Dedication
Folklorist Dedication.description:
You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spin Tale} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the folklorist archetype.

Folksy Patter.name: Folksy Patter
Folksy Patter.description:
You are adept at disguising coded messages as folksy idioms. Using slang, jokes, halfling loanwords, and the like, you convey a simple message consisting of three basic words (such as "Danger assassin flee" or "Meet me moonrise").

Your intended listener can attempt a Perception check to discern the message (DC 20 if an ally, DC15 if a halfling ally, DC 10 if a halfling ally with Folksy Patter).

Eavesdroppers can also attempt a Perception check against your Deception DC to discern your meaning. Any bonuses or penalties to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} apply.

Folktales Lore.name: Folktales Lore
Folktales Lore.description:
You can pull bits of wisdom from any tale. You become trained in Folktales Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to Recall Knowledge, but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Folktales Lore, you get the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

If you are legendary in the Performance skill, you gain expert proficiency in Folktales Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Folktales Lore by any other means.

Follow-up Assault.name: Follow-up Assault
Follow-up Assault.description:
Requirements You used your previous action to make a

melee Strike that missed.

Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed. Make a Strike with the same weapon, adding the effects of the backswing and forceful weapon traits.

Follow-up Strike.name: Follow-up Strike
Follow-up Strike.description:
Requirements Your last action was a missed Strike with a melee unarmed attack.

You have trained to use all parts of your body as a weapon, and when you miss with an attack, you can usually continue the attack with a different body part and still deal damage.

Make another Strike with a melee unarmed attack, using the same multiple attack penalty as for the missed Strike, if any.

Font of Knowledge.name: Font of Knowledge
Font of Knowledge.description: Experience or focused study have granted you mastery of a number of topics. When you know about something, you know about it in great detail. When you succeed at a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge}, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, at the GM's discretion, you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.

Foolproof Instructions.name: Foolproof Instructions
Foolproof Instructions.description:
You feel confident that you can explain your scrolls so well that even your allies can use them... hopefully. During your daily preparations, you can select a single scroll and instruct a single ally in its use. Until your next daily preparations, the ally can attempt to use the scroll with a single action that has the manipulate trait. The ally rolls the skill corresponding to the spellcasting tradition. The GM determines the DC based on the scroll's level, possibly adjusted for the situation. If the spell has a spell attack bonus or a spell DC, use your level as the proficiency bonus and the highest of your ally's Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifiers.

Success For the rest of the ally's turn, they can spend actions to Cast the Spell.

Failure The ally misremembers your instructions and can't use the scroll this turn.

Critical Failure The ally misunderstood your instructions and can't use the scroll.

Forager.name: 采集者 Forager
Forager.description:
每当你使用生存技能的求生（Subsist）动作时，如果你的检定结果低于成功，取而代之你自动获得成功结果。

如果你在求生时获得了成功，你可以为自己加上另外四个生物提供足以维生程度的饮食和住所；如果你在求生时获得了大成功，你可以为双倍于成功时可以供给的生物提供这些物质。

每当你在生存技能上的熟练等级获得提升，你在成功求生时可以支持的生物数量再加倍（专家时8个，大师时16个，传奇时32个）。

Y或者，你可以选择为这个数目一半的生物提供舒适而非基本程度的生存物质。

比人类体型小很多的生物可以视为只需要人类几分之一的生存资源，而体型较人类更大的生物需要占用更多的生存资源。GM会判断一个生物具体会占用几人份的生存资源。

Force Fang.name: 力牙术 Force Fang
Force Fang.description:
你将你的攻击转化为一种准确的模糊力量。你习得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9mPEoOPN0AMuixIv]{力牙术 Force Fang} 汇聚法术 conflux spell.

你聚能池的聚能点加1。

Forced Entry.name: Forced Entry
Forced Entry.description: You are trained to preserve the archaeological value of your location when entering. You don't take a penalty to Force Open doors, windows, or containers without a crowbar. If you roll a success on a check to Force Open, you get a critical success instead.

Forceful Push.name: Forceful Push
Forceful Push.description: When you cast mage hand, you can modify its target to be 1 creature. If you do, replace its standard effects with the following: You push your foe telekinetically. Make a spell attack roll against the target's Fortitude DC. On a success, you push the target 5 feet away from you. On a critical success, you push the target 10 feet away from you.

Forceful Shot.name: Forceful Shot
Forceful Shot.description:
Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies. Make a ranged Strike, adding the following effects in addition to the normal effects of the Strike.

Critical Success The target is pushed 10 feet away from you.

Success The target is pushed 5 feet away from you.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

Forcible Energy.name: 能量侵蚀 Forcible Energy
Forcible Energy.description:
你进行一连串复杂的操作，强化法术的能量，让敌人在事后更容易受创。

如果你下一个动作是 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell} 且该法术能造成酸液、电击、火焰或音波伤害，你可以选择一个因法术而伤害的目标，在直到你下一回合结束前，获得伤害类型的弱点5。如果法术造成多种能量伤害，选一种作为目标的弱点。

你选择能量类型该生物是有抗力或免疫的话，则无效果。

Forensic Acumen.name: 法医直觉 Forensic Acumen
Forensic Acumen.description:
你知晓法医的行为准则，善于判断肉体的死因或伤口类型。

你可以对肉体进行法医鉴定，如同用医疗技能进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SeUolRoPzorFUAaI]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} 一样，并且所需耗时减半（最低为5分钟）。

若医疗检定成功，你能立刻对找到的线索进行一次回忆知识，该次检定获得+2环境加值。

这次回忆知识检定需要和导致死因或伤口的因素有关，例如用手艺技能来判断所中毒素或制创武器，用另一个医疗检定来判断所患疾病名字。若你愿意，你也能改为用合适的技能回忆知识来判断所检肉体的生物类型，同样拥有+2环境加值。

当你医疗技能熟练等级为大师时，上述环境加值为+3。医疗技能为传奇时，上述环境加值为+4。

Foresee Danger.name: Foresee Danger
Foresee Danger.description:
Trigger A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker.

You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

The triggering attack roll targets your Perception DC instead of your AC. Though this allows you to avoid taking penalties to your AC, it doesn't remove any conditions or other effects causing such penalties.

For example, an enemy with sneak attack would still deal extra damage to you for being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, even though you wouldn't take the -2 circumstance penalty when defending against the attack.

Forest Stealth.name: Forest Stealth
Forest Stealth.description:
Requirements You are in a forest or jungle environment near an environmental feature that would allow you to Take Cover.

You are skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} and then use that cover to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}.

Forestall Curse.name: Forestall Curse
Forestall Curse.description:
Frequency once per day

You've learned to forestall the effects of your curse somewhat.

If the next action you use is to cast a revelation spell, the severity of your curse doesn't increase.

Forewarn.name: Forewarn
Forewarn.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger An enemy within your overwatch field attempts an attack against an ally who is also within your overwatch field.

Your foresight and planning are more valuable than armor as you direct your ally away from danger, but there's a limit to how often you can guide your allies away from a foe's relentless assaults. The triggering attack roll targets your Perception DC instead of your ally's AC. Though this allows your ally to avoid taking penalties to their AC, it doesn't remove any conditions or other effects causing such penalties. For example, an enemy with sneak attack would still deal extra damage to your ally if they are flat-footed, even though they wouldn't take the -2 circumstance penalty when defending against the attack.

Forge-Blessed Shot.name: Forge-Blessed Shot
Forge-Blessed Shot.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

Frequency once per day

Trigger You attempt a ranged Strike.

You intone a prayer to the dwarven deities Torag or Angradd, willing a higher power to guide your aim in the heat of battle. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the end of your turn, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your attack roll and ignore your target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, as well as your target's lesser, standard, and greater cover.

Forge-Day's Rest.name: Forge-Day's Rest
Forge-Day's Rest.description:
Access underground dwarf ethnicity

Your unusual rest cycle allows you to recover faster. As long as you rest for 12 hours, you gain the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N8Xz5fuW6o7GW124]{Fast Recovery} general feat and you can go 20 hours without resting before becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Forlorn.name: 百年孤寂 Forlorn
Forlorn.description: 眼睁睁看着你的朋友逐渐凋零逝去让你满心抑郁，却也使你在对抗有害情绪时有所准备。你在对抗情绪效果的豁免上获得+1环境加值。如果你在对抗情绪检定的豁免检定中成功，那么改视其为大成功。

Form Control.name: Form Control
Form Control.description:
With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate form for a longer period of time.

If your next action is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Wild Shape}, wild shape's spell level is 2 lower than normal (minimum 1st level), but you can remain transformed for up to 1 hour or the listed duration (whichever is longer). You can still Dismiss the form at any time, as permitted by the spell.

Form Lock.name: Form Lock
Form Lock.description:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

Your ability to manipulate your enemy's body is potent enough that you can tear and break apart alternate forms. Attempt an Athletics check to counteract a polymorph effect currently affecting the creature you have grabbed or restrained. If the target is somehow under the effect of multiple polymorph effects, you can choose which one to attempt to counteract; the GM chooses randomly if the separate effects aren't obvious. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 day.

Form Of The Bat.name: Form Of The Bat
Form Of The Bat.description:
Frequency once per hour

You can transform into a harmless bat. You gain the effects of a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}, except you always transform into a bat.

Form Of The Fiend (Claw).name: 魔族体貌（爪抓） Form Of The Fiend (Claw)
Form Of The Fiend (Claw).description:
你身上长着明显是魔族的特征。或是手上长着利爪，或是满口尖牙，又或是强韧尾巴。

从下列非武装攻击中选择1项，这个攻击属于搏击武器组，并持有注明的特性：

  • 爪抓 [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 挥砍} (agile, finesse, unarmed, versatile piercing)
  • 蹄踢 [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 钝击} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 啃咬 [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 穿刺} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 尾击 [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 钝击} (agile, finesse, unarmed)

特殊此专长只得在1级时选取，且不得透过重训来取得或替换之，也不得改变借此取得的非武装攻击。

Form Of The Fiend (Hoof).name: 魔族体貌（蹄踢） Form Of The Fiend (Hoof)
Form Of The Fiend (Hoof).description:
你身上长着明显是魔族的特征。或是手上长着利爪，或是满口尖牙，又或是强韧尾巴。

从下列非武装攻击中选择1项，这个攻击属于搏击武器组，并持有注明的特性：

  • 爪抓 [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 挥砍} (agile, finesse, unarmed, versatile piercing)
  • 蹄踢 [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 钝击} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 啃咬 [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 穿刺} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 尾击 [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 钝击} (agile, finesse, unarmed)

特殊此专长只得在1级时选取，且不得透过重训来取得或替换之，也不得改变借此取得的非武装攻击。

Form Of The Fiend (Jaws).name: 魔族体貌（啃咬） Form Of The Fiend (Jaws)
Form Of The Fiend (Jaws).description:
你身上长着明显是魔族的特征。或是手上长着利爪，或是满口尖牙，又或是强韧尾巴。

从下列非武装攻击中选择1项，这个攻击属于搏击武器组，并持有注明的特性：

  • 爪抓 [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 挥砍} (agile, finesse, unarmed, versatile piercing)
  • 蹄踢 [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 钝击} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 啃咬 [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 穿刺} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 尾击 [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 钝击} (agile, finesse, unarmed)

特殊此专长只得在1级时选取，且不得透过重训来取得或替换之，也不得改变借此取得的非武装攻击。

Form Of The Fiend (Tail).name: 魔族体貌（尾击） Form Of The Fiend (Tail)
Form Of The Fiend (Tail).description:
你身上长着明显是魔族的特征。或是手上长着利爪，或是满口尖牙，又或是强韧尾巴。

从下列非武装攻击中选择1项，这个攻击属于搏击武器组，并持有注明的特性：

  • 爪抓 [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 挥砍} (agile, finesse, unarmed, versatile piercing)
  • 蹄踢 [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 钝击} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 啃咬 [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 穿刺} (finesse, unarmed)
  • 尾击 [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 钝击} (agile, finesse, unarmed)

特殊此专长只得在1级时选取，且不得透过重训来取得或替换之，也不得改变借此取得的非武装攻击。

Form Retention.name: 型态保留 Form Retention
Form Retention.description:
你锤炼你的心灵与肉体忍受更久的变形魔法，只要你有相应的准备。

在准备持续1分钟且会给予战斗型态(battle foem)的变形法术时，你可以把这法术准备在比正常环位高2环的法术位上。这不会给你正常会有法术升环好处，但法术最长能持续10分钟。

举例来说，如果你用型态保留在4环法术位准备 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态Animal Form} 法术，那你就可以施放一个2环的动物型态，并且最长持续10分钟。如果法术可以被解消，也不会改变能解消的功能。

Formation Master.name: Formation Master
Formation Master.description: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins' military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies. When you are adjacent to at least two humanoid allies, you gain the benefits of Formation Training, even if they aren't hobgoblin allies. Hobgoblin allies adjacent to you and at least one other hobgoblin ally also gain the bonuses from your Formation Training feat.

Formation Training.name: Formation Training
Formation Training.description:
You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.LVPodfYEWKtK3fUW]{Effect: Formation Training}

Fortified Flesh.name: Fortified Flesh
Fortified Flesh.description: Your flesh takes on the hardness of stone. You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to your number of class feats from the Living Monolith archetype.

Fortify Shield.name: Fortify Shield
Fortify Shield.description:
Frequency once per day

You reinforce your shield with a rocky outgrowth of metal and stone. You Raise your Shield. If you use the Shield Block reaction before your next turn, add your character level to your shield's Hardness when determining how much damage is blocked.

Fortuitous Shift.name: Fortuitous Shift
Fortuitous Shift.description: You have grown more comfortable with your penchant for supernatural disappearance. The flat check DC of your Fortuitous Shift feat decreases to 11, and you are no longer @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} if you succeed.

Fountain of Secrets.name: Fountain of Secrets
Fountain of Secrets.description:
Frequency once per round

You constantly remember details about the world. You attempt a check to Recall Knowledge. If you succeed, you gain additional information or context. If you critically succeed, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.

Fox Trick.name: Fox Trick
Fox Trick.description:
频率 每小时一次

你随时不忘讲笑话或是恶作剧。你进行分神（Create a Diversion）、隐藏物件（Conceal an Object）或躲藏（Hide）。所有注意到并看穿你狐妖把戏的生物，在接下来24小时内暂时免疫你的狐妖把戏。

Foxfire (Cold).name: 狐火（寒冷） Foxfire (Cold)
Foxfire (Cold).description:
你的尾巴间有蓝色的能量在劈啪乱跳。选取本专长时，选择那是电击还是火焰。你获得远程非武装攻击狐火，最大射程20呎。这个攻击造成 [[/r 1d4]] 点你所选择的伤害类型（伤害掷骰不会加上属性调整值）。狐火攻击属于投索（sling）武器组。如同其他非武装攻击，你可以用 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{重拳缠手带 Handwraps of Mighty Blows}来强化这个攻击。

特殊 如果你是雪狐，你的狐火会造成寒冷，而非电击或火焰伤害。

Foxfire (Electricity).name: 狐火（电击） Foxfire (Electricity)
Foxfire (Electricity).description:
你的尾巴间有蓝色的能量在劈啪乱跳。选取本专长时，选择那是电击还是火焰。你获得远程非武装攻击狐火，最大射程20呎。这个攻击造成 [[/r 1d4]] 点你所选择的伤害类型（伤害掷骰不会加上属性调整值）。狐火攻击属于投索（sling）武器组。如同其他非武装攻击，你可以用 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{重拳缠手带 Handwraps of Mighty Blows}来强化这个攻击。

特殊 如果你是雪狐，你的狐火会造成寒冷，而非电击或火焰伤害。

Foxfire (Fire).name: 狐火（火焰） Foxfire (Fire)
Foxfire (Fire).description:
你的尾巴间有蓝色的能量在劈啪乱跳。选取本专长时，选择那是电击还是火焰。你获得远程非武装攻击狐火，最大射程20呎。这个攻击造成 [[/r 1d4]] 点你所选择的伤害类型（伤害掷骰不会加上属性调整值）。狐火攻击属于投索（sling）武器组。如同其他非武装攻击，你可以用 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{重拳缠手带 Handwraps of Mighty Blows}来强化这个攻击。

特殊 如果你是雪狐，你的狐火会造成寒冷，而非电击或火焰伤害。

Freeze It!.name: Freeze It!
Freeze It!.description:
You are no rime hag or Jadwiga, but the magic of the north has still left a mark on you. Frigid ice runs through your veins, and you can expel frost from your body to freeze your foes. Attempt an Athletics check against the Fortitude DC of an adjacent foe. If you have master proficiency in Athletics, you can affect up to two adjacent foes, rolling one Athletics check against each foe.

Critical Success The target becomes clumsy 2 for 1 round.

Success The target becomes clumsy 1 for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Fresh Ingredients.name: Fresh Ingredients
Fresh Ingredients.description: When using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WC4xLBGmBsdOdHWu]{Natural Medicine} to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, you can spend a batch of herbs to gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness. If you spend a batch of herbs in wilderness, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus instead.

Friendform.name: Friendform
Friendform.description:
The shared bond between you and your allies allows you to act on their behalf.

During your daily preparations, you can perform a simple ritual with up to five willing Small or Medium humanoids, where participants exchange minor tokens of personal significance.

As long as you hold onto a participant's token, you can assume their form with your Change Shape ability, gaining a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to pass as that person and adding your level to the check even if you're untrained. You lose access to a participant's form if they're not carrying your token or if you use the ritual again.

Friendly Toss.name: Friendly Toss
Friendly Toss.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to an ally and have one or more hands free.

You toss your friends around the battlefield. Pick up an adjacent ally of your size or smaller and throw them to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet. Their movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Your ally ends this movement on their feet and doesn't take damage from the fall. If your ally ends this movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against an enemy within their reach as a reaction.

Frightening Appearance.name: Frightening Appearance
Frightening Appearance.description:
Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders.

When you make a Startling Appearance, you can also attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} each opponent within 10 feet to whom you were unnoticed before your Strike.

Frightful Condemnation.name: Frightful Condemnation
Frightful Condemnation.description:
Trigger You hit your condemned foe with a melee Strike in the same turn during which you condemned it with Harsh Judgment.

Requirements You have condemned a foe to death with Harsh Judgment.

Your willingness to follow through on your pitiless judgment is frightful to the person you have condemned, and they begin to dread what you will do to them next. Your condemned foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} if the triggering Strike was a critical hit.

Frostbite Runes.name: Frostbite Runes
Frostbite Runes.description:
Thick tattoos, each one a rune fragment from the saumen kar's long-lost language spelling out their pact with their equally lost deity, cover your body and stretch across your limbs, torso, and face. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against evil and necromancy spells and effects. You can sense the presence of evil undead as a pervasive taste of oily corruption in the air; this is a vague sense that allows you to know when such a creature is within 60 feet of you, though you can't precisely pinpoint their location with this sense. As normal for a vague sense, it can be fooled, but undead might not realize they need to take precautions against it. This sense also extends to living creatures who have the negative healing ability, like dhampir.

You deal an additional 1 cold damage with all Strikes made with an ice-crafted weapon. If you have the Crown of the Saumen Kar feat, you deal an additional 1 cold damage with your unarmed horns Strikes.

Full Automation.name: 全自动 Full Automation
Full Automation.description:
你与你的大发明紧密相连，你无需思考就能使用它。你永久 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷}。你使用额外动作的方式由你的大发明决定。

  • 护甲 Armor 只要你穿戴你的护甲，它就能对更多不易察觉的刺激作出回应，让你移动到正确的位置上。你可以使用额外动作行走Stride，快步Step，或使用一种你的大发明提供的移动形式（例如飞行或游泳。
  • 构装体 Construct 你能本能地指挥你的构装体。你可以使用额外动作指挥Command你的构装体大发明（或如果你要花费2个动作指挥Command你的构装体，用额外动作来满足其中一个动作）。
  • 武器 Weapon 你如身体地延伸一般本能地挥舞你致命的武器。只要你持握它，它能毫不费力地往你所选的任何目标袭去。可以用额外动作，使用你的大发明进行打击Strike。

Fully Flighted.name: Fully Flighted
Fully Flighted.description: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes. This includes the status bonus to your Speed if you have Fledgling Flight.

Fulminating Shot.name: Fulminating Shot
Fulminating Shot.description:
Frequency once per round.

You channel potent magic into your next shot, empowering it with a blast of crackling energy. Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal [[/r {1d6}[additional]]]{1d6 additional damage} of this type. At 12th level, this increases to [[/r {2d6}[additional]]]{2d6 additional damage}, and at 18th level, it increases to [[/r {3d6}[additional]]]{3d6 additional damage}.

Fulminating Synergy.name: Fulminating Synergy
Fulminating Synergy.description: When you draw upon your spells' synergy, you create a physical manifestation of their magical resonance and invoke it to harm a foe. When you use Dualistic Synergy, choose a damage type: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. In addition to Dualistic Synergy's normal effect, a foe within 30 feet of you takes an amount of damage of the chosen type equal to the spell's level. If the spell already deals damage of the chosen type, combine the damage before applying weaknesses and resistances.

Fumesoul.name: Fumesoul
Fumesoul.description: The air inside you asserts itself as a toxic miasma, inuring you to most poisons. You gain resistance to poison equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Furious Bully.name: Furious Bully
Furious Bully.description: You bully foes across the battlefield. While raging, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks for attack actions.

Furious Finish.name: Furious Finish
Furious Finish.description: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow. Make a Strike. If it hits, you gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the number of rounds remaining in your Rage (maximum 10). After this Strike, your Rage immediately ends, and you are fatigued until you rest for at least 10 minutes.

Furious Focus.name: Furious Focus
Furious Focus.description: You've learned to maintain your balance even when swinging furiously. When you make a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2xk4jdwcCfmasYfT]{Power Attack} with a melee weapon you're wielding in two hands, it counts as one attack toward your multiple attack penalty instead of two.

Furious Grab.name: Furious Grab
Furious Grab.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike, and either you have a hand free or your Strike used a grapple weapon.

You grab your foe while it's distracted by your attack. The foe you hit becomes grabbed, as if you had succeeded at an Athletics check to Grapple the foe.

Furious Sprint.name: Furious Sprint
Furious Sprint.description: You rush forward. Stride up to five times your Speed in a straight line. You can increase the number of actions this activity takes to 3 to Stride up to eight times your Speed in a straight line instead.

Furious Vengeance.name: Furious Vengeance
Furious Vengeance.description:
Trigger An enemy within your melee reach critically hits you with a melee Strike.

Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation. Make a melee Strike against the triggering enemy.

Fuse Stance.name: Fuse Stance
Fuse Stance.description: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own. When you take this feat, choose two stances you know and combine them into a single fused stance. Give your new fused stance a unique name. When you enter your fused stance, you gain all the effects of both stances, including the requirements and restrictions. You can't fuse stances with fundamentally incompatible requirements or restrictions (such as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}, which both require using only one type of Strike).

Fused Polearm.name: Fused Polearm
Fused Polearm.description:
Requirements Your arcane bonded item is a polearm.

During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse your arcane bonded weapon and a magical staff together into one item, with the staff making up the haft of the weapon. You prepare the staff at the same time you do this, and you can do this only with a staff you're able to prepare. This fusion lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

While the two are fused, the weapon's haft takes on aesthetic aspects of the staff.

Fused Staff.name: 融合法杖 Fused Staff
Fused Staff.description:
当你预备法杖（prepare a staff）时，你可以握住它和一件武器，将两件物品（item）合为一体。你可以通过一个具有专注（concentrate）特征的单动作切换被融合物品的形态从武器到法杖，或者反过来。当物品处于法杖形态，你可以用法杖施法法术（Cast a Spell）并且得到任何法杖具有的其他属性增益。法杖和武器共享他们的基础符文（fundamental rune），武器潜力 weapon potency和强击符文 striking使用两者等级中较高者。他们不共享任何其他符文或者特殊能力。

即使当法杖处于武器形态时，你也能用法杖施放法术来用作法术打击的一部分。其他情况下，你都不能在法杖处于武器形态时用法杖施法。

融合持续到你下一次每日准备，然而你可以花费10分钟来分离两件物品并将法杖融入另一把武器中。融合物只能为你所用。其他的持有者只能以法杖当前的形态来使用，但并不能转换它，获得共享符文的增益，或者如果它在武器形态时用它进行法术打击施法。

Gadget Specialist.name: 小装置专家 Gadget Specialist
Gadget Specialist.description:
你不仅仅用你的小装置来增压或调校，你每天也能制作一些特殊的临时消耗小装置。你获得3个常见或罕见的小装置（66页）的公式。每天在每日准备期间，你可以从公式簿中制造2个临时小装置。按这种方式准备的小装置不会消耗你任何资源来制作Craft，也不存在出售价格。它们是临时物品，如果到你下一次进行每日准备时还没使用就会解离。

如果你在手艺Crafting达到大师，你每天可以制作3个小装置，你也获得3个额外的常见或罕见小装置公式。如果你在手艺Crafting上达到传奇，你每天可以制作4个小装置，你也获得3个额外的常见或罕见小装置公式，总共加起来有9个。

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.description: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert. Any enemy is flat-footed against your melee attacks due to flanking as long as the enemy is within both your reach and your ally's. Your allies must still flank an enemy for it to be flat-footed to them.

Ganzi Gaze.name: Ganzi Gaze
Ganzi Gaze.description:
You have unusual sensory abilities passed down from your chaotic forebears. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision}. If you already have low-light vision, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision} instead.

Special You can select this feat a second time to gain darkvision in addition to low-light vision.

Gaping Flesh.name: Gaping Flesh
Gaping Flesh.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature you are aware of damages you with a melee Strike.

Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (sickened 2 on a critical failure). It can't recover from the sickened condition while it's adjacent to you.

Garden Path.name: Garden Path
Garden Path.description: You can guide your crop to move without notice. When you and any of your crop are Avoiding Notice, you can choose one member of your crop to temporarily gain the benefits of the Quiet Allies skill feat until the group is no longer Avoiding Notice. The group rolls two checks instead of one, using the higher die roll. This is a fortune effect.

Gardener's Resolve.name: Gardener's Resolve
Gardener's Resolve.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on a Will save against a fear effect.

The Gray Gardeners are known for having nerves of steel and an unbreakable resolve. When you would be overwhelmed by terror, you can draw upon this resolve to keep your composure and remain undaunted. You take mental damage equal to twice your level, and the saving throw is a success.

Garuda Magic.name: Garuda Magic
Garuda Magic.description: You are descended from the wondrous garudas, and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{Blur} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Garuda's Squall.name: Garuda's Squall
Garuda's Squall.description: Garudas' marksmanship and magic are second nature to you. Whenever you critically hit using a bow, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Gaze of Veracity.name: Gaze of Veracity
Gaze of Veracity.description: You can channel your mask's power to pierce through lies and see the truth in any situation. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. While wearing your mask, you can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZjbVgIIqMstmdkqP]{Glimpse the Truth} cleric domain spell as a divine focus spell.

Gear Gnash.name: Gear Gnash
Gear Gnash.description: Snares you create have complicated inner workings that are quite difficult to disable. Creatures attempting to Disable your snares that use gears must succeed at an additional Thievery check in order to disable the snare. On a failed check, while the snare doesn't fully trigger, the grinding mechanisms deal bludgeoning damage to the creature equal to half your level. The snare still triggers on a critical failure, as normal.

Gecko's Grip.name: Gecko's Grip
Gecko's Grip.description: You stick to walls with a preternatural grip. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.

Gemsoul.name: Gemsoul
Gemsoul.description: The earth inside you asserts itself as crystallized gemstones or metals, like a cluster of quartz or veins of iron and gold. This shimmering presence inside your being inspires you to flashy and flamboyant performances. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Performance. If you would automatically become trained in Performance (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Impressive Performance} skill feat.

General Training.name: 通用训练 General Training
General Training.description:
你的适应力体现在你掌握了一系列实用的能力。你获得1个1级通用专长。你必须满足专长的前置，但是当你在创建角色时选择此专长，你可以选择在此期间中稍后获得这个专长以便满足前置。

特殊 你可以多次选择这个专长，但每次都要选择一个不同专长。

Genie Weapon Expertise.name: Genie Weapon Expertise
Genie Weapon Expertise.description: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{Falchions}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UfurZQK6H6SgOjqe]{Ranseurs}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitars}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Tridents}, and all geniekin weapons in which you are trained.

Genie Weapon Familiarity.name: Genie Weapon Familiarity
Genie Weapon Familiarity.description:
You've trained with weapons used by your genie ancestors. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{Falchions}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UfurZQK6H6SgOjqe]{Ranseurs}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitars}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Tridents}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon geniekin weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial geniekin weapons are simple weapons and advanced geniekin weapons are martial weapons.

Genie Weapon Flourish.name: Genie Weapon Flourish
Genie Weapon Flourish.description: Whenever you critically hit using a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{Falchion}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UfurZQK6H6SgOjqe]{Ranseur}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Trident}, or a geniekin weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Genius Mutagen.name: 天才突变药剂 Genius Mutagen
Genius Mutagen.description:
针对你那增幅智慧的公式的专业调整拓宽了你从认知突变药剂中获得的好处。

当你处于 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wbr6rkyaVYnDhdgV]{认知突变药剂 Cognitive Mutagen}的影响下时，你也会在欺骗，交涉，威吓，医疗，自然，表演，宗教和生存检定上获得突变药剂的物品加值。

此外，你可以通过心灵感应与周围60尺内和你使用同一种语言的生物进行交流。这种交流一旦建立起来就是双向的，所以与你联结的生物同样能和你进行交流。

Geomancer Dedication.name: Geomancer Dedication
Geomancer Dedication.description:
You feel a deep connection to the world no matter where you are, a phenomenon known as "terrain attunement." When you expend a spell slot to cast a spell with a trait that corresponds to the type of terrain you are currently in (as listed below), you gain the terrain attunement effect for that type of terrain. The GM might determine an attunement applies as long as it's prevalent enough around you. For instance, you might be in aquatic terrain on a riverbank or on a boat. Similarly, one place might count as multiple types of terrain, such as a mountain in the far north being both arctic and mountain. In this case, you choose only one terrain attunement effect, even if the spell has traits that would apply to each terrain type.

Certain terrain attunements affect your enemies instead of you. If they do, when you cast the spell you apply the listed effect to all enemies who are either adjacent to you, in the area of the spell, or targeted by the spell. These enemies receive the listed saving throw against your spell DC to attempt to avoid the effect.

  • Aquatic (water) You ride the currents of water. If you're in the water, you gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed. If you're on a surface, temporary waves of water follow your movements, allowing you to use your swim Speed-if you have one-as your land Speed.
  • Arctic (cold) Arctic rime covers your foes' bodies. Enemies must attempt a Fortitude save. They take a -5-foot status penalty to their Speeds for 2 rounds (–10-foot on a critical failure).
  • Desert (fire) The scorching heat of the desert dehydrates your foes. Enemies must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, they're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until they drink water or another potable liquid.
  • Forest (plant) Branches and vines reach out to get in your foes' way. Enemies must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, they become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).
  • Mountain (earth) The rugged endurance of the mountain protects you from harm. You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to the spell level for 1 round.
  • Plains (plant) The growing fields and pulsing vitality of the plains provide you vigor. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell level for 1 round.
  • Sky (air) A gust of wind carries you aloft. You can Fly up to 10 feet. If you're in the air at the end of the turn and don't have a fly Speed, you fall.
  • Swamp (plant) Your magic draws in noxious swamp gas to fumigate your foes. Affected foes take @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} equal to half the spell's level (minimum 1 damage) with a basic Fortitude save.
  • Underground (earth) The endless darkness of the cavern depths opens up its secrets to your senses. For 1 round, you gain darkvision as well as imprecise tremorsense out to 15 feet.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the geomancer archetype.

Ghost Eater Dedication.name: Ghost Eater Dedication
Ghost Eater Dedication.description:
You have trained as a ghost eater, a hunter specialized in the destruction of spirits. You know how to channel your own spiritual energy to harm spirits. Your weapon and unarmed attack Strikes become magical. Against incorporeal creatures, they also gain the effects of a ghost touch property rune.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from this archetype.

Ghost Hunter.name: Ghost Hunter
Ghost Hunter.description:
Your connection to the Boneyard ensures that your blows strike true against spectral beings.

Your weapon and unarmed attack Strikes against incorporeal creatures become magical. If they are already magical, they instead gain the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Ghost Hunter Dedication.name: Ghost Hunter Dedication
Ghost Hunter Dedication.description:
Prerequisites Trained in Occultism or Religion

You have focused your training on hunting and defeating ghosts, spirits, and all manner of haunts. Pick Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore; you become trained in this skill. If you were already trained in both skills, you become trained in a new Lore skill of your choice.

Choose two cantrips from the occult spell list. Each cantrip must have the divination, enchantment, or necromancy trait. You can cast these spells as innate occult spells. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity if you didn't have it already. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs. You can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need a spell component pouch. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the ghost hunter archetype.

Ghost Strike.name: Ghost Strike
Ghost Strike.description: Once per day, you can infuse a weapon you are carrying with magical energies that allow it to strike true against incorporeal undead. The weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune for 10 minutes. At 10th level, you can apply this effect to two weapons instead of one.

Giant Snare.name: Giant Snare
Giant Snare.description:
You can create bigger snares for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares.

When you prepare snares for quick deployment, you can prepare some of them as giant snares. A giant snare takes up a 10-foot-by-10-foot area but costs two of your quick deployment snares. A giant snare can trigger from a creature entering any portion of its area, and all its effects apply over the full area.

Giant's Lunge.name: Giant's Lunge
Giant's Lunge.description: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach. Until your rage ends, all your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain reach 10. This doesn't increase the reach of any weapon or unarmed attack that already has the reach trait, but it does combine with abilities that increase your reach due to increased size, such as Giant's Stature.

Giant's Stature.name: Giant's Stature
Giant's Stature.description:
Requirements You are Medium or smaller.

You grow to incredible size. You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the clumsy 1 condition until you stop raging. Your equipment grows with you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.6VrKQ0PhRXuteusQ]{Effect: Giant's Stature}

Gift Of The Moon.name: Gift Of The Moon
Gift Of The Moon.description: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can. You can cast a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy} as a primal innate spell once per day. At 15th level, you cast a 6th-level moon frenzy instead. At 17th level, your 6th-level moon frenzy grants its standard effects, except the temporary Hit Points increase to 15 and the silver weakness increases to 15. At 20th level, you cast a 10th-level moon frenzy instead. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Gigaton Strike.name: 亿万吨强击 Gigaton Strike
Gigaton Strike.description:
当你使用全力的百万吨强击时，你可以击退你的敌人。当你使用不稳定的百万吨强击Megaton Strike成功进行打击Strike，你的目标必须尝试一次强韧豁免对抗你的职业DC。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物被推离5尺

失败 该生物被推离10尺

大失败 该生物被推离20尺

特殊 如果你的大发明是仆从，该增益应用在它的不稳定百万吨强击上。

Gigavolt.name: 亿万伏特 Gigavolt
Gigavolt.description: 当你从大发明中释放电能时，你可以让它在障碍间反弹，创造致命的电刑领域。当你使用百万伏特Megavolt，每当你的电击线击中一个固体屏障，例如墙壁，它会以你所选的角度反射并继续前进，直到达到线形区域的最大长度。即使1个生物处于多条反射线内，他也只承受1次伤害。

Glad-Hand.name: 自来熟 Glad-Hand
Glad-Hand.description: 你擅长于给人留下深刻的第一印象。当你和一个生物首次会面时，你可以立刻进行一次交涉技能检定（而非通常需要1分钟交谈）你在这次检定上承受-5减值。如果你在这次检定上失败或是大失败，你可以和对方尝试进行一次至少1分钟时间的对话来重新建立印象而非必须接受失败或大失败的结果。

Gladiator Dedication.name: Gladiator Dedication
Gladiator Dedication.description:
You know how to turn combat into a form of entertainment. You become trained in Gladiatorial Lore; if already trained in Gladiatorial Lore, you instead become trained in another Lore skill of your choice.

At the start of a combat encounter, if you have spectators, you gain a number of temporary HP equal to your character level for 1 minute and you can roll Performance for your initiative.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the gladiator archetype.

Glean Contents.name: 字里探花 Glean Contents
Glean Contents.description:
你十分善于快速浏览大堆书页和在不弄坏信封蜡印的状态下辨识信笺内容。

你可以用社群检定来对只能看到部分文字、阅读方向颠倒、放在信封中密封的信息进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{解密文书 Decipher Writing}。若大失败，文字容器会留下你的痕迹（例如你弄坏了蜡印或打乱了书页的摆放）。当用该专长解译密封信笺时，你的解译文书行动获得操作特征。

该专长不会让你的动作能不被别人发现，特别是在解译密封信笺时你必须操作摆弄来阅读；因此你需要进行欺骗检定或隐秘检定来避免被发现。

Glean Lore.name: Glean Lore
Glean Lore.description:
You tap into the collected lore of the divine, accessing a variety of potentially useful information.

Attempt a Religion check to understand the information you gain. The GM sets the DC (similar to the DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}), potentially adjusting the DC of the check for topics far removed from your mystery.

Critical Success You comprehend the lore accurately or gain a

useful clue from the divine about your situation.

Success You learn two pieces of information about the topic,

one true and one erroneous, but you don't know which is which.

Failure You recall incorrect information or gain an erroneous

or misleading clue.

Critical Failure You recall two pieces of incorrect information

or gain two erroneous or misleading clues.

Glib Mutagen.name: 伶俐突变药剂 Glib Mutagen
Glib Mutagen.description:
你的巧舌突变药剂超越了语言和理论的界限。

当你处于你制造的 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YwRAHWW8yUI07sy9]{巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue Mutagen} 的影响下时，你忽视欺骗，交涉，威吓和表演检定上的环境减值。

此外，你的话语超越了语言的桎梏；任何能够听到你讲话的听众都能够理解你说的话，就好像你正在说他们自己的语言一样（尽管你实际上并不会说这种语言，这个能力也不会让你额外理解任何语言）。

Glider Form.name: Glider Form
Glider Form.description:
Your eidolon evolves wings, a buoyant body, or some other means to control descent.

It glides slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air.

As long as it spends at least 1 action gliding each round and has not yet reached the ground, it remains in the air at the end of your turn.

Gloomseer.name: Gloomseer
Gloomseer.description: Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision}.

Glory And Valor!.name: Glory And Valor!
Glory And Valor!.description:
Frequency once per day

You are descended from the einherji, the worthy warriors of chaos. You call upon your ascendant blood with a mighty cry that fills you with a revitalizing energy for 1 minute or until you critically fail a Strike, whichever comes first. For the duration, the first time each round you successfully Strike a creature of your level or higher, you regain Hit Points equal to half your level.

Glyph Expert.name: Glyph Expert
Glyph Expert.description: You've learned to recognize the telltale writings and other signs that indicate the presence of magical traps. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to find magical traps, to AC against attacks made by magical traps, to saves against magical traps, and to checks to Disable magical traps. Even if you aren't Searching, you get a check to find magical traps that normally require you to be Searching. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the trap. You're also adept at avoiding the effects of traps that feature magical writing, such as runes, glyphs, ancient script, or other forms. When you attempt a saving throw against the effects of these traps, if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

Gnaw.name: Gnaw
Gnaw.description: With enough time and determination, you can chew through nearly anything. You deal double your jaws damage to an unattended, inanimate object.

Gnoll Lore.name: Gnoll Lore
Gnoll Lore.description:
You paid attention to your senior hunters to learn their tricks. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Stealth and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Gnoll Lore.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill. You also need to manually enter the granted Lore skill.

Gnoll Weapon Expertise.name: Gnoll Weapon Expertise
Gnoll Weapon Expertise.description: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.t5FbyZtRL4qV0V7k]{Flail}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YLb6XnT7OxAVGL5m]{Khopesh}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MeA0g9xvWCbGxf2g]{Mambele}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.mVxA9E2ernBL6fM6]{War Flail}.

Gnoll Weapon Familiarity.name: Gnoll Weapon Familiarity
Gnoll Weapon Familiarity.description: You were taught to be a hunter and a raider. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.t5FbyZtRL4qV0V7k]{Flail}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YLb6XnT7OxAVGL5m]{Khopesh}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MeA0g9xvWCbGxf2g]{Mambele}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.mVxA9E2ernBL6fM6]{War Flail}.

Gnoll Weapon Practicality.name: Gnoll Weapon Practicality
Gnoll Weapon Practicality.description: Whenever you critically hit using @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.t5FbyZtRL4qV0V7k]{Flail}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YLb6XnT7OxAVGL5m]{Khopesh}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MeA0g9xvWCbGxf2g]{Mambele}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.mVxA9E2ernBL6fM6]{War Flail}, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Gnome Obsession.name: Gnome Obsession
Gnome Obsession.description: You might have a flighty nature, but when a topic captures your attention, you dive into it headfirst. Pick a Lore skill. You gain the trained proficiency rank in that skill. At 2nd level, you gain expert proficiency in the chosen Lore as well as the Lore granted by your background, if any. At 7th level you gain master proficiency in these Lore skills, and at 15th level you gain legendary proficiency in them.

Gnome Polyglot.name: Gnome Polyglot
Gnome Polyglot.description: Your extensive travels, curiosity, and love of learning help you to learn languages quickly. You learn three new languages, chosen from common languages and uncommon languages you have access to. These languages take the same form (signed or spoken) as your other languages. When you select the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingual}feat, you learn three new languages instead of two.

Gnome Weapon Expertise.name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
Gnome Weapon Expertise.description: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the glaive, kukri, and all gnome weapons in which you are trained.

Gnome Weapon Familiarity.name: Gnome Weapon Familiarity
Gnome Weapon Familiarity.description:
You favor unusual weapons tied to your people, such as blades with curved and peculiar shapes. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TDrO7Xdyn7juFy3c]{Kukri}.

In addition, you gain access to kukris and all uncommon gnome weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial gnome weapons are simple weapons and advanced gnome weapons are martial weapons.

Gnome Weapon Innovator.name: Gnome Weapon Innovator
Gnome Weapon Innovator.description: You produce outstanding results when wielding unusual weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a glaive, kukri, or gnome weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Goading Feint.name: Goading Feint
Goading Feint.description:
When you trick a foe, you can goad them into overextending their next attack.

On a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, you can use the following success and critical success effects instead of any other effects you would gain when you Feint; if you do, other abilities that adjust the normal effects of your Feint no longer apply. You can choose whether to use the Goading Feint benefits or the normal benefits each time you Feint a given foe.

Critical Success The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to

all attack rolls against you before the end of its next turn.

Success The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its next

attack roll against you before the end of its next turn.

Goblin Jubilee Display.name: Goblin Jubilee Display
Goblin Jubilee Display.description: Flames and explosions sear the air in a riot of color and devastation that rivals that wrought by even the wildest goblin party. The display is both so beautiful and chaotic that, while mesmerizing, it poses a significant risk to the physical health, sight, and hearing of anyone who gets too close. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.izvfZ561JTdeyh6i]{Goblin Jubilee} fireworks display.

Goblin Lore.name: Goblin Lore
Goblin Lore.description: You've picked up skills and tales from your goblin community. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Goblin Lore.

Goblin Scuttle.name: Goblin Scuttle
Goblin Scuttle.description:
Trigger An ally ends a move action adjacent to you.

You take advantage of your ally's movement to adjust your position. You Step.

Goblin Song.name: Goblin Song
Goblin Song.description:
You sing annoying goblin songs, distracting your foes with silly and repetitive lyrics. Attempt a Performance check against the Will DC of a single enemy within 30 feet. This has all the usual traits and restrictions of a Performance check. You can affect up to two targets within range if you have expert proficiency in Performance, four if you have master proficiency, and eight if you have legendary proficiency.

Critical Success The target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves for 1 minute.

Success The target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is temporarily immune to attempts to use Goblin Song for 1 hour.

Goblin Weapon Expertise.name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
Goblin Weapon Expertise.description: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the dogslicer, horsechopper, and all goblin weapons in which you are trained.

Goblin Weapon Familiarity.name: Goblin Weapon Familiarity
Goblin Weapon Familiarity.description:
Others might look upon them with disdain, but you know that the weapons of your people are as effective as they are sharp. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.olwngGXM3hpgoLEP]{Dogslicer} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YnwEttFE1bJacLDh]{Horsechopper}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon goblin weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial goblin weapons are simple weapons and advanced goblin weapons are martial weapons.

Goblin Weapon Frenzy.name: Goblin Weapon Frenzy
Goblin Weapon Frenzy.description: You know how to wield your people's vicious weapons. Whenever you score a critical hit using a goblin weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Godless Healing.name: Godless Healing
Godless Healing.description: You recover an additional 5 Hit Points from a successful attempt to Treat your Wounds or use Battle Medicine on you. After you or an ally use Battle Medicine on you, you become temporarily immune to that Battle Medicine for only 1 hour, instead of 1 day.

Golden Body.name: Golden Body
Golden Body.description: You perfect your body, refining the flex of every muscle and the bend of every joint to maximum efficiency. Your unarmed Strikes gain the deadly d12 trait, and you have fast healing 20, causing you to regain 20 HP at the start of each of your turns provided you have at least 1 HP.

Golden League Xun Dedication.name: Golden League Xun Dedication
Golden League Xun Dedication.description:
You are a xun for the Golden League, aiding the organization. You gain expert proficiency in two of the following skills (or in two other skills of your choice in which you're trained, if you were already an expert in the listed skills): Athletics, Deception, Intimidation, or Stealth. In addition, if you use Underworld Lore to Earn Income or Recall Knowledge, when you get a success, you get a critical success instead.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Golden League Xun archetype.

Golem Dynamo.name: Golem Dynamo
Golem Dynamo.description: You've learned the secrets of Jistkan golem prostheses, allowing you to incorporate golem components into your dynamo and gain a portion of their magic. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic, and your dynamo Strikes become magical.

Golem Grafter Dedication.name: Golem Grafter Dedication
Golem Grafter Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XATPzPTZ9Je89erT]{Golem Grafter}

Your flesh has been specially treated with the same arcane and alchemical processes used to toughen the skin of flesh golems. Increase your maximum Hit Points by an amount equal to your level. You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to your number of class feats from the golem grafter archetype.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the golem grafter archetype.

Goloma Courage.name: Goloma Courage
Goloma Courage.description: The most important thing you've learned living with fear is how to overcome it. When you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead. In addition, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves against fear effects and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against attempts to Demoralize you.

Goloma Lore.name: Goloma Lore
Goloma Lore.description:
You lived an insulated life focused on avoiding danger. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Stealth and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Goloma Lore.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill. You also need to manually enter the granted Lore skill.

Gorilla Pound.name: Gorilla Pound
Gorilla Pound.description:
Requirements You are in Gorilla Stance.

You pound your chest before slamming into your foes.

Attempt an Intimidation check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}, then make one gorilla slam Strike against the same target. If your Strike hits, you gain a circumstance bonus to the damage roll equal to triple the value of the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

Special If you have this feat, while you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 15 feet.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.UZKIKLuwpQu47feK]{Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)}

Gorilla Stance.name: Gorilla Stance
Gorilla Stance.description:
You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle - walking stance.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.RozqjLocahvQWERr]{Stance: Gorilla Stance}

Gossip Lore.name: Gossip Lore
Gossip Lore.description:
Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic.

You are trained in Gossip Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Gossip Lore, you get the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

If you have legendary proficiency in Society, you gain expert proficiency in Gossip Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Gossip Lore by any other means.

Graceful Guidance.name: Graceful Guidance
Graceful Guidance.description:
You can demonstrate how to quickly twist out of the way of dangerous effects.

You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} reaction to grant a bonus to an ally's Reflex save. As usual for Aid, you need to prepare by using an action on your turn to encourage the ally.

Graceful Leaper.name: Graceful Leaper
Graceful Leaper.description:
Mass and muscle are meaningless when you leap; only grace and balance matter.

You can roll an Acrobatics check instead of an Athletics check when making a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}.

Graceful Poise.name: Graceful Poise
Graceful Poise.description:
With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion's stinger.

While you are in this stance, if you make your second Strike from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Grandmother's Wisdom.name: Grandmother's Wisdom
Grandmother's Wisdom.description: You carry the bones of your ancestors with you, and you can ask them for counsel. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury} twice per day as a 2nd-level occult innate spell.

Grasping Limbs.name: Grasping Limbs
Grasping Limbs.description: Your eidolon grabs enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the grapple trait. It gains the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} action on that unarmed attack.

Grasping Reach.name: Grasping Reach
Grasping Reach.description: You can extend a tangle of vines or tendrils to support your arms and extend your reach. When you wield a melee weapon that requires two hands, doesn't have reach, and deals at least 1d6 damage, you can change between a typical two-handed grip and an extended two-handed grasp using an Interact action. Weapons wielded in your extended grasp gain reach of 10 feet. This grasp is less stable and powerful than a typical grip, reducing the weapon's damage die by 1 step.

Grave Sense.name: Grave Sense
Grave Sense.description: Your time spent hunting the undead allows you to sense them. You sense undead as a vague sense similar to a human's sense of smell, an uncomfortable sensation akin to smelling something cloying and rotting. When in proximity to the undead, you eventually sense their presence, though you might not do so instantly, and you can't pinpoint their location. An undead using a disguise or otherwise trying to hide its presence must attempt a Deception check against your Perception DC to hide its presence from you. If the creature succeeds at its Deception check, it is then temporarily immune to your Grave Sense for 1 day.

Grave's Voice.name: Grave's Voice
Grave's Voice.description: You can use your choice of Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore to Make an Impression or Request things of incorporeal creatures. At the GM's discretion, an incorporeal spirit might be willing to hear you out.

Gravesight.name: Gravesight
Gravesight.description:
You can see in the darkness as easily as a psychopomp. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.

Gravity Weapon.name: Gravity Weapon
Gravity Weapon.description:
Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IWUe32Y5k2QFd7YQ]{Gravity Weapon} warden spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

Great Boaster.name: Great Boaster
Great Boaster.description: Your bragging is particularly effective. If you succeed at a boast, you can attempt a great boast about that same skill by using your Firebrand Braggart Dedication action about the same action during the duration of your original boast's circumstance bonus; this is an exception to the rule that you can't make another boast about the same action until your next daily preparations. A great boast uses the Firebrand Braggart Dedication action, except that if you succeed, your circumstance bonus increases to +2 and remains for 1 hour. If you fail the great boast, you take a -2 circumstance penalty to attempt the same action for 4 hours. Once you declare a great boast about a particular action, you can't declare a great boast about the same action until the next time you make daily preparations, regardless of whether you succeed or fail at the check. The minimum challenging task for a great boast is one with at least a hard DC for your level.

Great Cleave.name: Great Cleave
Great Cleave.description: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes. When you Cleave, if your Strike also kills or knocks the target unconscious, you can continue to make melee Strikes until you make a Strike that doesn't kill or knock a creature unconscious, or until there are no creatures adjacent to the most recent creature you attacked while Cleaving, whichever comes first.

Great Tengu Form.name: Great Tengu Form
Great Tengu Form.description:
You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni.

Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

Greater Animal Senses.name: Greater Animal Senses
Greater Animal Senses.description:
Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect. You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: echolocation (imprecise) 30 feet or tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet. If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain the sense with this feat.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, either choosing a different sense or improving an imprecise sense granted by this feat to a precise sense.

Greater Animal Senses (Echolocation).name: Greater Animal Senses (Echolocation)
Greater Animal Senses (Echolocation).description:
Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect. You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: echolocation (imprecise) 30 feet or tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet.

If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain the sense with this feat.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, either choosing a different sense or improving an imprecise sense granted by this feat to a precise sense.

Greater Animal Senses (Precise Echolocat.name: Greater Animal Senses (Precise Echolocation)
Greater Animal Senses (Precise Echolocat.description:
Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect. You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: echolocation (imprecise) 30 feet or tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet.

If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain the sense with this feat.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, either choosing a different sense or improving an imprecise sense granted by this feat to a precise sense.

Greater Animal Senses (Precise Tremorsen.name: Greater Animal Senses (Precise Tremorsense)
Greater Animal Senses (Precise Tremorsen.description:
Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect. You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: echolocation (imprecise) 30 feet or tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet.

If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain the sense with this feat.
