Special You can select this feat multiple times, either choosing a different sense or improving an imprecise sense granted by this feat to a precise sense.

Greater Animal Senses (Tremorsense).name: Greater Animal Senses (Tremorsense)
Greater Animal Senses (Tremorsense).description:
Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect. You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: echolocation (imprecise) 30 feet or tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet.

If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain the sense with this feat.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, either choosing a different sense or improving an imprecise sense granted by this feat to a precise sense.

Greater Augmentation.name: Greater Augmentation
Greater Augmentation.description: You've greatly improved your abilities and your core can support further augmentations. You gain the enhancement benefits of one of your 1st-, 5th-, 9th-, or 13th-level automaton ancestry feats. You are also capable of reconfiguring your augmentations to meet your needs. You can spend one week of downtime to change the enhancement you gain with this feat.

Greater Bloodline.name: Greater Bloodline
Greater Bloodline.description: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets. You gain the greater bloodline spell associated with your bloodline. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Greater Crossblooded Evolution.name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
Greater Crossblooded Evolution.description: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex. You can have up to three spells from other traditions in your spell repertoire, rather than just one. These spells must each be of a different spell level, but they don't need to be from the same tradition.

Greater Cruelty.name: 高等酷虐 Greater Cruelty
Greater Cruelty.description:
你所施加的腐化现在不光能掏空敌人的力量了，还能毁灭敌人的心灵和反射神经。

在你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vxA0VRN10OwUkGAr]{酷虐 Cruelty}时，你可以跟之前一样选择让该生物力竭，或是选豁免失败变 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 1} (大失败笨拙2)，或是豁免失败变成 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 1} (大失败呆滞2)。

Greater Debilitating Bomb.name: 高等衰弱炸弹 Greater Debilitating Bomb
Greater Debilitating Bomb.description:
你所掌握的先进技术和炼金秘密扩展了你的炸弹所能施加的影响的种类。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sv4LeEbkOJyLen10]{衰弱炸弹 Debilitating Bomb} 时，将下述效果添加到你能够选择的列表中：@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}， @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} ，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，或在速度上造成-10尺的状态减值。

Greater Distracting Shot.name: Greater Distracting Shot
Greater Distracting Shot.description:
Even a single missile can throw off your enemy's balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

If you hit your hunted prey with a ranged weapon, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn. If you critically hit your prey or hit it twice on the same turn with a ranged weapon, it's flat-footed until the end of your next turn instead.

Greater Interpose.name: 高等干涉 Greater Interpose
Greater Interpose.description:
在你束手无策之际，你的神性优雅令你免于伤害。

你可以对某次攻击所造成的任何伤害类型，或需要反射豁免的效果使用牺牲护甲好减少伤害。当你使用牺牲护甲对抗一次重击，或一次会让你承受双倍伤害的反射豁免大失败时，你只受到正常的伤害。

Greater Lesson.name: Greater Lesson
Greater Lesson.description:
Your patron grants you greater knowledge.

Choose a greater or basic lesson from the list of witch lessons. You gain its associated hex, and your familiar learns the associated spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Greater Magical Edification.name: Greater Magical Edification
Greater Magical Edification.description: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VVAZPCvd4d90qVA1]{Secret Page} as innate occult spells, each once per day. When you cast secret page, it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from Magical Edification.

Greater Magical Scholastics.name: Greater Magical Scholastics
Greater Magical Scholastics.description:
You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals.

You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} as occult innate spells, each once per day. You can cast this nondetection spell only on an object, and it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from Magical Scholastics.

Greater Mental Evolution.name: Greater Mental Evolution
Greater Mental Evolution.description: Your bloodline's deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire. Add one spell to your spell repertoire for each spell level you can cast.

Greater Merciful Elixir.name: 高等慈悲灵药 Greater Merciful Elixir
Greater Merciful Elixir.description: 你的添加剂中含有能够治疗绝大多数病痛的万能药。当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Mvw3ZFrdwMHedAxY]{慈悲灵药 Merciful Elixir} 时，你的灵药能够转而尝试反制 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} ，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}，或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}状态。

Greater Mercy.name: 高等救济 Greater Mercy
Greater Mercy.description:
你的信仰强化了你移除负面状态的能力。

当你 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{救济 Mercy}时, 你能够转而尝试反制 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed} 状态。

Greater Physical Evolution.name: Greater Physical Evolution
Greater Physical Evolution.description:
You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

Once per day, you can use a sorcerer spell slot to cast any common polymorph battle form spell of the spell slot's level as if it were a signature spell in your repertoire.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qxh4evekG28Gt1vj]{Arcane Evolution}, you can also choose from any battle form spell in your spellbook.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K3TasgeZLJQ84qtZ]{Primal Evolution}, you can Cast a Spell listed in that feat using the extra spell slot the feat grants (instead of a sorcerer spell slot).

Greater Revelation.name: Greater Revelation
Greater Revelation.description:
You learn a greater revelation spell associated with your mystery.

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Greater Spell Runes.name: Greater Spell Runes
Greater Spell Runes.description: You gain more powerful spell runes. You gain a spell rune corresponding to a 4th-level arcane spell. At 12th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 5th-level arcane spell, and at 14th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 6th-level arcane spell.

Greater Spiritual Evolution.name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
Greater Spiritual Evolution.description:
Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

Your spells have the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune. They can target or affect a creature projecting its consciousness (such as via @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0873MWM0qKDDv81O]{Project Image}) or possessing another creature, even if its body is elsewhere, though you must know about the possession or projection and choose to do so. Your spells can affect creatures on the Ethereal Plane, though this doesn't grant you any particular ability to locate them.

Greater Sun Blessing.name: Greater Sun Blessing
Greater Sun Blessing.description:
Your connection to the Old Sun Gods grows stronger. You gain an advanced domain spell from a domain you chose with Blessing of the Sun Gods. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Special You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must select a different domain for which you have an initial domain spell from Blessing of the Sun Gods.

Greater Vital Evolution.name: Greater Vital Evolution
Greater Vital Evolution.description: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy. Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell level; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell levels.

Green Empathy.name: Green Empathy
Green Empathy.description:
You can communicate with plants on a basic level and use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on them and to make very simple Requests of them. Non-creature plants typically can't fulfill most requests you might ask of them unless you have access to other magic such as speak with plants.

Because of your affiliation with the leaf order, plants have a sense that you support them, so you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your check to Make a Request of a plant using Green Empathy.

Green Tongue.name: Green Tongue
Green Tongue.description: You share a special kinship with all things green and living. You (and your leshy familiar, if you have one) are constantly under the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}. Most non-creature plants recognize you as a druid of the leaf order and are friendly to you.

Grievous Blow.name: Grievous Blow
Grievous Blow.description:
You know how to deliver focused, powerful blows that bypass your enemies' resistances.

Make an unarmed melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal two extra weapon damage dice. If you are at least 18th level, increase this to three extra weapon damage dice.

This attack also ignores an amount of resistance to physical damage, or to a specific physical damage type, equal to your level.

Grim Insight.name: Grim Insight
Grim Insight.description: Others' attempts to scare you often grant you insights about your would-be bullies that you can then exploit. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead, and the source of the fear effect is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to you until the end of your next turn.

Grimspawn.name: 邪魔血脉 Grimspawn
Grimspawn.description:
你是凄惨死法化身，在末日荒原吞噬灵魂的邪魔的后裔，因此死到临头时你总是紧紧抓着自己最后一丝生命力不放。

你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.I0BhPWqYf1bbzEYg]{死硬通用 Diehard} 专长。

Gripping Limbs.name: Gripping Limbs
Gripping Limbs.description: Nodules, hooks, or claws on your limbs allow you to cling to surfaces with ease. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.

Grippli Glide.name: Grippli Glide
Grippli Glide.description:
Requirements You must have at least one hand free.

You can use your webbed feet to guide your fall. You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down (10 feet if you don't have both hands free) and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and have not yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.

Grippli Lore.name: Grippli Lore
Grippli Lore.description:
You are well versed in grippli culture and tactics. You gain the trained proficiency in Nature and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Grippli Lore.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill. You also need to manually enter the granted Lore skill.

Grippli Weapon Expertise.name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
Grippli Weapon Expertise.description: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FPwsiGqMCNPLHmjX]{Blowgun}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.H74vYwHJ8XT4qOPI]{Scythe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, or grippli weapons in which you are trained.

Grippli Weapon Familiarity.name: Grippli Weapon Familiarity
Grippli Weapon Familiarity.description:
You've trained with weapons ideally suited to marshes and dense forests. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FPwsiGqMCNPLHmjX]{Blowguns}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchets}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.H74vYwHJ8XT4qOPI]{Scythes}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbows}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbows}.

You also gain access to all uncommon grippli weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial grippli weapons are simple weapons, and advanced grippli weapons are martial weapons.

Grippli Weapon Innovator.name: Grippli Weapon Innovator
Grippli Weapon Innovator.description: You've learned devious ways to make the most of your grippli weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FPwsiGqMCNPLHmjX]{Blowgun}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.H74vYwHJ8XT4qOPI]{Scythe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, or grippli weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Grit and Tenacity.name: Grit and Tenacity
Grit and Tenacity.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail a Fortitude or Will save.

You call upon deep reserves of toughness and mental fortitude to power through an otherwise debilitating effect. Reroll the triggering save with a +2 circumstance bonus; you must use the second result.

Group Aid.name: 协助团队 Group Aid
Group Aid.description:
你所接受的教育强调团队协作，这使得协助盟友对你来说就好像是天性一般。

在你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{协助} 1名盟友进行1次不具有攻击（Attack）特征的技能检定后，你还能协助任何其他在该轮为了相同目标而尝试相同检定的盟友。你这么做是自由动作（free action）而非反应动作（reaction）。

你为了帮助他人所进行的准备应当也适用于其他盟友，而且每名盟友你仅能协助1次。举例说明，若你托举1名盟友来协助他的运动检定以翻越墙壁的话，你也可以在同一轮内保持同样的姿势来协助尝试翻越墙壁的其他盟友。

Group Coercion.name: 集体胁迫 Group Coercion
Group Coercion.description: 当你使用胁迫（Coercion）技能动作时，你可以同时使用你的威吓检定结果对抗两个而非一个目标的意志DC，但可能会在两个目标上取得不同的成功等级。在你的熟练等级达到专家级时，你可以同时胁迫四个目标；在大师级时，10个目标；在传奇级时，25个目标。

Group Impression.name: 集体印象 Group Impression
Group Impression.description: 当你使用建立印象技能动作时，你可以同时使用你的交涉检定结果对抗两个而非一个目标的意志DC，但可能会在两个目标上取得不同的成功等级。在你的熟练等级达到专家级时，你可以同时向四个目标建立印象；在大师级时，10个目标；在传奇级时，25个目标。

Grovel.name: Grovel
Grovel.description:
With obsequious words and begging gestures, you convince your foe you're less of a threat.

You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against a creature. Unlike a normal Feint, the creature can be within 30 feet instead of in your melee reach, and you make your check against its Will DC instead of its Perception DC.

Gruesome Strike.name: 残酷打击 Gruesome Strike
Gruesome Strike.description:
需求 你的打击目前能从你的神卫反应动作那造成额外伤害

对触发你神卫反应动作的生物进行一次打击。如果你打中，目标会受到两倍从反应动作那得来的额外伤害，同时必须通过一次强韧豁免对抗你的职业，失败则 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 1}。

无论结果如何，该生物都会暂时免疫你的残酷打击24小时。

Guarded Movement.name: Guarded Movement
Guarded Movement.description: Your guard is up, even while moving. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by your movement.

Guardian's Deflection (Fighter).name: Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)
Guardian's Deflection (Fighter).description:
Trigger An ally within your melee reach is hit by an attack, you can see the attacker, and the ally gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC would turn the critical hit into a hit or the hit into a miss.

Requirements You are wielding a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their Armor Class against the triggering attack. This turns the triggering critical hit into a hit, or the triggering hit into a miss.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.w6X7io56B2HHTOvs]{Effect: Guardian's Deflection}

Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler).name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler).description:
Trigger An ally within your melee reach is hit by an attack, you can see the attacker, and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC would turn the critical hit into a hit or the hit into a miss.

Requirements You are wielding a single one-handed melee

weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack. This turns the triggering critical hit into a hit, or the triggering hit into a miss.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.w6X7io56B2HHTOvs]{Effect: Guardian's Deflection}

Guided By The Stars.name: Guided By The Stars
Guided By The Stars.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are about to attempt a skill check or saving throw.

The stars grant you insights that guide your actions. You roll twice and take the better result. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Guiding Finish.name: Guiding Finish
Guiding Finish.description:
Requirements You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them.

Make a Strike with the required weapon. If the Strike hits, you can move the target up to 10 feet into a space in your reach. You can move the target through your space during this movement. This follows the forced movement rules. Your Strike gains the following failure effect.

Failure You can force the creature to move as you would on a success, but you can move the target only 5 feet.

Guiding Luck.name: Guiding Luck
Guiding Luck.description: Your luck guides you to look the right way and aim your blows unerringly. You can use Halfling Luck twice per day: once in response to its normal trigger, and once when you fail a Perception check or attack roll instead of the normal trigger.

Guiding Riposte.name: Guiding Riposte
Guiding Riposte.description:
By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{Dueling Riposte} to Strike and you hit, you can move the target up to 10 feet into a space in your reach. This follows the forced movement rules.

Gunpowder Gauntlet.name: Gunpowder Gauntlet
Gunpowder Gauntlet.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded one-handed firearm.

Your flair keeps foes' attention, as your motions with your gun draw your foes into a deadly game. As you toy with them and performatively brandish your weapon, you build their tunnel vision, leaving them trapped in a perceptual gauntlet of your own making. Attempt a Performance check against the Will DC of a single target within your one-handed firearm's first range increment.

Critical Success The target takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you until the beginning of your next turn.

Success The target takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you until the beginning of your next turn.

Gunslinger Dedication.name: Gunslinger Dedication
Gunslinger Dedication.description:
You become trained in simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms. You become trained in gunslinger class DC. Choose a gunslinger way. You become trained in your way's associated skill; if you were already trained in this skill, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of way.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the gunslinger archetype.

Hag Claws.name: Hag Claws
Hag Claws.description:
When you came of age, your fingernails grew long and sharp. You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage}. Your claws are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

Special Hag claws can develop at any point in a changeling's life, allowing you to select this feat anytime you would gain an ancestry feat, but once you've selected it, you can't retrain out of it.

Hag Magic.name: Hag Magic
Hag Magic.description:
Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic. Choose one common spell of 4th level or lower from those available to a coven, including the spells contributed to a coven by a hag of your mother's type. You can cast this spell once per day as a 4th-level occult innate spell.

Spells available to all covens are @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HXhWYJviWalN5tQ2]{Clairaudience}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clairvoyance}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yM3KTTSAIHhyuP14]{Dream Message}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}.

The eligible spells granted by the most prominent types of hag are:

  • Sea Hag @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}
  • Green Hag @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{Outcast's Curse}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}
  • Annis Hag @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{Earthbind}
  • Night Hag @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare}

Hag's Sight.name: Hag's Sight
Hag's Sight.description: You've nurtured the supernatural abilities gifted by your hag mother, particularly your sight. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Hair Trigger.name: Hair Trigger
Hair Trigger.description:
Prerequisites initial deed that allows you to Interact to draw a weapon

No one can react faster than you can pull your trigger. When using your initial deed, instead of Interacting to draw a weapon, you can Strike with a firearm or crossbow you're already wielding. If this Strike hits, the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your first turn of the encounter.

Special If your initial deed allows you to Interact to draw a weapon more than once, this feat allows you to replace one of these Interact actions and use the other one to draw a weapon. You can't replace both Interact actions with Strikes, but you can draw a loaded firearm or crossbow with one of the actions and immediately shoot it with the other.

Halcyon Speaker Dedication.name: Halcyon Speaker Dedication
Halcyon Speaker Dedication.description:
You devote much of your study to halcyon magic. You gain two common Halcyon cantrips and two common 1st-level halcyon spells. In addition to being able to cast your halcyon spells via your arcane or primal spell slots, you also gain a 1st-level halcyon spell slot. You can use your halcyon spell slots to spontaneously cast your halcyon spells.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the halcyon speaker archetype.

Halcyon Spellcasting Adept.name: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept
Halcyon Spellcasting Adept.description: You refine your halcyon magic. You gain two common 4th-level halcyon spells and two 5th-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 4th-level halcyon spell slot and a 5th-level halcyon spell slot. Your proficiency rank in either arcane or primal spell DCs and spell attack rolls advances from trained to expert.

Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate.name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate.description: Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases. You gain two common 2nd-level halcyon spells and two 3rd-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 2nd-level halcyon spell slot and a 3rd-level halcyon spell slot. These and all future halcyon spell slots work like the 1st-level halcyon spell slot you gained from Halcyon Speaker Dedication.

Halcyon Spellcasting Sage.name: Halcyon Spellcasting Sage
Halcyon Spellcasting Sage.description: Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched. You gain two common 6th-level and 7th-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 6th-level halcyon spell slot and a 7th-level halcyon spell slot. Your proficiency rank in either arcane or primal spell DCs and spell attack rolls advances from expert to master.

Halfling Ingenuity.name: Halfling Ingenuity
Halfling Ingenuity.description: While your willingness to dig into a task you know little about might get you into trouble, your incredible luck often saves you from danger. You can attempt skill actions that normally require you to be trained even if you aren't trained in that skill. If you use Halfling Luck when you fail a check for a skill with which you are untrained, you can add a proficiency bonus equal to your level, rather than 0, when you reroll the triggering skill check. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to this rerolled skill check.

Halfling Lore.name: Halfling Lore
Halfling Lore.description: You've dutifully learned how to keep your balance and how to stick to the shadows where it's safe, important skills passed down through generations of halfling tradition. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Halfling Lore.

Halfling Luck.name: Halfling Luck
Halfling Luck.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail a skill check or saving throw.

Your happy-go-lucky nature makes it seem like misfortune avoids you, and to an extent, that might even be true. You can reroll the triggering check, but you must use the new result, even if it's worse than your first roll.

Halfling Weapon Expertise.name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
Halfling Weapon Expertise.description: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the sling, halfling sling staff, shortsword, and all halfling weapons in which you are trained.

Halfling Weapon Familiarity.name: Halfling Weapon Familiarity
Halfling Weapon Familiarity.description:
You favor traditional halfling weapons, so you've learned how to use them more effectively. You have the trained proficiency with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UCH4myuFnokGv0vF]{Sling}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DV4qelKHrviM0O5i]{Halfling Sling Staff}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7tKkkF8eZ4iCLJtp]{Shortsword}.

You gain access to all uncommon halfling weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial halfling weapons are simple weapons and advanced halfling weapons are martial weapons.

Halfling Weapon Trickster.name: Halfling Weapon Trickster
Halfling Weapon Trickster.description: You are particularly adept at fighting with your people's favored weapons. Whenever you critically succeed at an attack roll using a shortsword, a sling, or a halfling weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Halo.name: Halo
Halo.description:
You are surrounded by a halo of light and goodness at all times.

Your halo sheds light with the effects of a divine @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

You can suppress or reestablish the halo with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Hammer Quake.name: Hammer Quake
Hammer Quake.description:
Requirements You're wielding a non-finesse melee weapon in two hands.

You smash the ground with your weapon, knocking nearby creatures to the ground.

Choose a square within your reach, including your own space. If there's a foe in the chosen square, Strike that foe with the required weapon. Then attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} every foe in the chosen square plus each square adjacent to that square, ignoring Trip's requirement that you have a hand free. This counts as three attacks toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made the Strike, if any, and all the Trip attempts.

Hand of the Apprentice.name: 学徒之手 Hand of the Apprentice
Hand of the Apprentice.description:
你对你的敌人扔出你的武器。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bSDTWUIvgXkBaEv8]{学徒之手 Hand of the Apprentice} 通用法术。通用法术是一种聚能法术，和学派法术类似。你的聚能池从1点聚能点开始。

有关聚能法术，请见奥术学派。

Handy with your Paws.name: Handy with your Paws
Handy with your Paws.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair} non-magical items, and you don't need a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vLGDUFrg4yGzpTQX]{Repair Kit} for such repairs as long as you have any amount of junk, spare parts, or debris at your disposal.

Haphazard Repair.name: 紧急抢修 Haphazard Repair
Haphazard Repair.description: 你快速修复你的大发明，而代价则是它的稳定性。你立刻修理Repair你的大发明。你不需要将大发明摆在平坦表面上，但你需要邻接它（包括持握或穿戴它），也如常需要拥有修理工具包。

Harbinger's Caw.name: Harbinger's Caw
Harbinger's Caw.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature within 60 feet is about to attempt an attack roll or skill check.

You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune. The target creature must roll the triggering check twice and take the lower result.

Hard Tail.name: Hard Tail
Hard Tail.description: Your tail is much stronger than most, and you can lash out with it with the strength of a whip. You gain a tail unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

Hard To Fool.name: Hard To Fool
Hard To Fool.description: You're accustomed to seeing through shifting darkness and bewildering magic. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Perception checks against illusions as well as to Will saves against illusions and shadow effects.

Harden Flesh.name: Harden Flesh
Harden Flesh.description:
Requirements You're standing on earthen or stone ground.

You fortify your skin with minerals drawn from earth and stone. You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn. At 12th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, the resistance increases by 1, to a maximum of resistance 6 at 20th level.

Hardy Traveler.name: 坚韧旅者 Hardy Traveler
Hardy Traveler.description:
在友人相伴之时，你的旅程就变得不那么遥远，而行囊也变得不再那样沉重了。

你的最大（maximum）以及超载（encumbered）的负载上限（Bulk limits）增加1点。此外，在陆上旅行（overland travel）期间，你的速度获得+10尺环境加值。

Harming Hands.name: Harming Hands
Harming Hands.description: The mordant power of your negative energy grows. When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm}, you roll d10s instead of d8s.

Harmless Doll.name: Harmless Doll
Harmless Doll.description:
You look like nothing more than an ordinary toy, doll, or statuette, and you can fool others with your innocuous appearance. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Deception (or another skill if you're already trained in Deception), and you can Impersonate an inanimate toy or a mindless poppet. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} without any cover or concealment from creatures that don't realize you're alive, so long as you're in a location where a toy of your shape wouldn't be out of place, like a carnival booth, city street, or toy shop (at the GM's discretion). If you succeed, onlookers still see you, but they mistake you for an inanimate toy. After being fooled once, they realize you're alive, and you can't Hide from them in that way again.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill.

Harmlessly Cute.name: Harmlessly Cute
Harmlessly Cute.description: Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KIK2Eza9TK47MEb2]{Shameless Request}skill feat as a bonus feat. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative checks when you roll Deception for initiative.

Harmonize.name: 和声 Harmonize
Harmonize.description: 你可以同时演奏多种组曲。如果你的下一个动作是施展组曲，该组曲会成为一个和声组曲。与一般组曲不同，和声组曲并不会在施展其他组曲的时候结束，并且你可以在同一回合施展另一个组曲法术。施展另一个和声组曲会结束你当前正在生效的任何和声组曲。

Harrying Strike.name: Harrying Strike
Harrying Strike.description:
Your attack prevents a foe from pursuing your allies. Make a melee Strike, adding the following effects in addition to the normal effects of the Strike.

Critical Success The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

Success The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

Failure The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

Harsh Judgement.name: Harsh Judgement
Harsh Judgement.description:
Choose one creature you can see, and loudly declare the creature's life forfeit by your judgment. That creature becomes your condemned foe until they are defeated, you use Harsh Judgment on a different creature, or the encounter ends. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

You typically can use Harsh Judgment only during an encounter, and if you try to use it to declare someone's life forfeit during exploration or downtime, you are likely to start an encounter.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.raoz523QRsj5WjcF]{Effect: Harsh Judgement}

Hasted Assault.name: 加速突袭 Hasted Assault
Hasted Assault.description:
你能够加快自身以更加迅捷的移动和攻击。 你习得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3MzuRDc7ccylpW2e]{加速突袭 Hasted Assault}汇聚法术（conflux spell）。

你聚能池的聚能点加1。

Hatchling Flight.name: Hatchling Flight
Hatchling Flight.description:
Frequency once per round

You can fly a little! You Fly up to half your Speed. If you don't end your movement on solid ground, you fall at the end of your turn.

Haughty Obstinacy.name: 傲慢固执 Haughty Obstinacy
Haughty Obstinacy.description: 你强大的自我让你周围的人很难命令你。如果你在一次对抗尝试直接控制你行动的影响心灵效果的豁免检定上成功时，你视为大成功。如果一个生物在使用威吓来胁迫你的检定上失败时，他视为获得大失败（所以无法在一周内再次强迫你）。

Hazard Finder.name: Hazard Finder
Hazard Finder.description: You have an intuitive ability to sense hazards. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to find traps and hazards, to AC against their attacks, and to saves against their effects. You can find hazards that would normally require you to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} even if you aren't Searching.

Head Stomp.name: Head Stomp
Head Stomp.description:
Make an unarmed melee attack against a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} target.

On a hit, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to all attacks until the end of your next turn.

Head of the Night Parade.name: Head of the Night Parade
Head of the Night Parade.description: You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display. You Perform and cast 8th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tFKJCPvOQZxKq6ON]{Mad Monkeys} three times, except that the spell calls various apparitions such as dancing tsukumogami or drinking oni rather than monkeys. Each casting can produce a different kind of mischief. You can Sustain all three Spells each round using a single Perform action.

Headshot.name: Headshot
Headshot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

You attempt to finish your target with a final, well-placed shot. Make a crossbow or firearm Strike. If you've damaged the target within the last minute with the same weapon and you get a critical success on your attack roll, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or die; this is a death and incapacitation effect. A creature that survives is temporarily immune for 1 day. Creatures with no head (such as dullahans or oozes) are immune to this ability, and creatures with redundant heads (such as ettins) might survive the destruction of a head.

Heal Animal.name: Heal Animal
Heal Animal.description: You can heal your animal companion's wounds. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Zmh4ynfnCtwKeAYl]{Heal Animal} as a beastmaster focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Heal Companion.name: Heal Companion
Heal Companion.description: You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KIV2LqzS5KtqOItV]{Heal Companion} warden spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

Heal Mount.name: 医疗坐骑 Heal Mount
Heal Mount.description:
你对坐骑的忠诚转化为汹涌的正能量浪潮。

当你对坐骑施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 时，你能够为其恢复10点生命值，外加每升高一个环级10点。

Healer's Halo.name: Healer's Halo
Healer's Halo.description:
Trigger You or allies within 30 feet recover Hit Points while your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PGVXjbAi1Fa4uTmD]{Halo} is active.

Your halo can enhance positive energy. Creatures who have recovered Hit Points from a positive healing effect recover an additional [[/r {1d6}[healing]]]{1d6 Hit Points}. Creatures who benefit from this power become temporarily immune to its effect for the next 10 minutes.

Healing Bomb.name: Healing Bomb
Healing Bomb.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger You craft an @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{Elixir of Life} using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NlEZ0piDxg9buXCL]{Quick Alchemy}, and that elixir is at least 2 levels lower than your advanced alchemy level.

By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile. You grant the elixir the bomb trait.

If you throw an elixir of life bomb at a willing target, you hit even on a failure, though not on a critical failure. If your Strike with this elixir bomb hits a living target, the target regains Hit Points as if it had consumed the elixir. On a critical success, the target also gains the elixir's item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 1 minute.

Healing Hands.name: Healing Hands
Healing Hands.description: Your positive energy is even more vibrant and restorative. When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, you roll d10s instead of d8s.

Healing Touch.name: 治愈之手 Healing Touch
Healing Touch.description: 你获得所选事业提供的虔诚法术（对于圣武士、救赎者和解放者来说是圣疗Lay on Hands）。如果你没有聚能池，你获得一个含有1点聚能点的聚能池，通过祈祷或服侍于你的神祗，你可以再聚能Refocus。

Healing Transformation.name: Healing Transformation
Healing Transformation.description: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries. If your next action is to cast a non-cantrip polymorph spell that targets only one creature, your polymorph spell also restores 1d6 Hit Points per spell level to that creature. This is a healing effect.

Heart of the Kaiju.name: Heart of the Kaiju
Heart of the Kaiju.description:
Witnessing the might of the kaiju King Mogaru, Alru, and Toraloa up close awoke a new ferocity within you. When you transform using Monstrosity Shape, you can take on a kaiju form. When you take this feat, choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage; this is the damage your breath weapon deals. You can't change this later. The battle form is Gargantuan size with the following specific abilities; the damage values already include the extra die from being a 9th-level spell.

Kaiju Speed 40 feet; physical resistance 5; Melee 1 jaws (reach 20 feet), Damage[[/r {3d12+20}[piercing]]]{3d12+20 piercing damage}; Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 20 feet), Damage[[/r {3d8+20}[slashing]]]{3d8+20 slashing damage}

Breath Weapon2 (evocation, primal) Each creature in a 60-foot cone takes [[/r {15d6}]]{15d6 damage} (of your chosen damage type), with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Heat Wave.name: Heat Wave
Heat Wave.description:
Trigger An effect would deal fire damage to you, even if you resist all the damage.

Frequency once per 10 minutes

You harness the oncoming flames and twist them into a screen of heat and smoke, granting you concealment until the beginning of your next turn.

Heaven's Thunder.name: Heaven's Thunder
Heaven's Thunder.description:
With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body. Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and weapons you wield that have the monk trait deal additional electricity damage equal to one-half your level and additional sonic damage equal to one-half your level.

If you also know the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Ki Blast} ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead). Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you also takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.L9g3EMCT3imX650b]{Effect: Heaven's Thunder}

Hefting Shadow.name: Hefting Shadow
Hefting Shadow.description: Your shadow can contain objects. You can Interact with your shadow to store or retrieve objects, just like you would a mundane container (meaning you spend two Interact actions total to store and then retrieve the object, for example). Your shadow can contain 2 Bulk of objects, which don't count toward the Bulk you're carrying. The items remain solid but take on a shadowy patina while stored this way. Though the items are in your shadow and can be detected normally, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to Conceal the Objects unless someone knows to check your shadow for items.

Hefty Hauler.name: 配达人 Hefty Hauler
Hefty Hauler.description: 你可以背起你的身材似乎不像是可能带动的大堆物品。你的可以携带的最大和超载（Encumbered）重量单位限度增加2。

Heightened Captivation.name: Heightened Captivation
Heightened Captivation.description:
You can infuse your enchantments and illusions with more power. Choose one of your spells granted by captivator archetype feats; this spell can't be from your highest level of non-cantrip captivator spells. The spell you choose is heightened to the highest level of captivator spell you can cast, not including cantrips. You can't later change the spell that is heightened by this feat.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you choose a different spell.

Heir of the Saoc.name: Heir of the Saoc
Heir of the Saoc.description: In the past, you would have been a proud initiate of the Saoc Brethren. Today, you carry on their legacy. When you use Saoc Astrology, roll 1d4 instead; on a 1, you take a -1 penalty to the skill check. On any other result, you gain a circumstance bonus of that value (for instance, a +3 circumstance bonus on a 3).

Hell's Armaments.name: Hell's Armaments
Hell's Armaments.description: You've trained with your order's weapon and your Hellknight plate long enough to apply your expertise from other weapons and armor. If you have expert proficiency in any weapon or unarmed attack, you gain expert proficiency in your order's weapon as well. If you have expert proficiency in any armor or unarmored defense, you gain expert proficiency in Hellknight plate as well.

Hellknight Armiger Dedication.name: Hellknight Armiger Dedication
Hellknight Armiger Dedication.description:
Access You are from Old Cheliax.

Your Hellknight training teaches you to terrorize others into compliance, but you also study the structure and hierarchy of Hell. You must survive painful tests of your body and mind called reckonings, which steady your mind against all sorts of trauma. You gain resistance to mental damage equal to 1 + your number of class feats from the Hellknight Armiger archetype and other Hellknight archetypes. You become trained in Intimidation and Hell Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead.

Special You can't select another dedication feat except dedication feats for higher positions within the Hellknights until you have gained two other feats from the Hellknight armiger archetype.

Hellknight Dedication.name: Hellknight Dedication
Hellknight Dedication.description:
You have forged your body to comply with the commands of your mind-orders steeped in the Measure and the Chain. You gain expert proficiency in Intimidation (or in another skill in which you're trained of your choice, if you were already an expert in Intimidation). You gain the armor specialization effects of Hellknight plate, and your resistance from that armor specialization is 1 higher than normal. In addition, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks while wearing your Hellknight plate.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Hellknight or Hellknight armiger archetypes.

Hellknight Order Cross-Training.name: Hellknight Order Cross-Training
Hellknight Order Cross-Training.description:
You gain the lesser order benefit of a Hellknight order other than the one to which you belong. This represents your time spent training with members of that order to learn their techniques and teachings. If you aren't in good standing with a given order, you can't receive their training.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, gaining the lesser order benefit from a different order each time by training with members of that order.

Hellknight Signifer Dedication.name: Hellknight Signifer Dedication
Hellknight Signifer Dedication.description:
You have bolstered your force of will with the power of the Measure and the Chain. Upon initiation, you receive a signifer mask, often devoid of eyeholes or other decorative features. The mask doesn't obscure your vision, though it makes it impossible for others to see your eyes. While wearing your signifer's mask, you gain +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Lie, Intimidation checks, and Deception DCs against Sense Motive. You gain expert proficiency in Intimidation (or in another skill in which you're trained of your choice, if you were already an expert in Intimidation) as well as in your choice of Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.GwItivMACzBmW82g]{Hellknight Signifer} or @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.LYYDozZfXok19VYW]{Hellknight Armiger} archetypes.

Hellspawn.name: 魔鬼血脉 Hellspawn
Hellspawn.description:
你是在地狱的黑心制度内阴谋策划的魔鬼的后裔，因此你擅长看破与施展谎言及话术。

你在欺骗技能及法律学识上受训，若你会在欺骗技能上自动受训(例如背景或职业的效果)，改为让由你自选的另一个技能受训。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{将计就计 Lie To Me} 技能专长。

Helpful Halfling.name: Helpful Halfling
Helpful Halfling.description: When you aid a friend with a task, you find many ways to help and avoid interfering. On a critical success to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid}, you grant your ally a +3 circumstance bonus if you have expert proficiency in the skill (rather than +2), and you grant your ally a +4 circumstance bonus if you have master proficiency (rather than +3). If you roll a critical failure on a check to Aid, you don't give your ally a -1 circumstance penalty to their check.

Helpful Poppet.name: Helpful Poppet
Helpful Poppet.description: You're particularly skilled at helping others with a task. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on checks to Aid, and you don't give your ally a -1 circumstance penalty to their check if you critically fail your attempt to Aid.

Helpful Tinkering.name: 支援修补 Helpful Tinkering
Helpful Tinkering.description:
频率 每10分钟1次。

你不仅能修补自己的大发明，你也能鼓捣盟友的武器（当然是为了他们好）。选择一个你触及内的盟友以及他的一把武器。尝试一次手艺Crafting检定，对抗符合你等级的高DC。

成功 1分钟内，所选盟友使用所选武器进行的打击Strike获得和你的大发明相同的攻势增压效果。

大失败 你的盟友受到攻势增压在正常情况下的一次成功的打击中能造成的数值和类型的伤害。

Herbalist Dedication.name: Herbalist Dedication
Herbalist Dedication.description:
You can create remedies and other herbal products. You gain the basic alchemy benefits, though they apply only for herbal items: alchemical items with the healing trait, plus @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ktjFOp3U0wQD9t0Z]{Antidote} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UqinuuCWePTYGhVO]{Antiplague}.

You gain batches of infused reagents per day equal to your level or half your level if you didn't make your daily preparations in the wilderness. Your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} level for creating these is 1 and doesn't increase on its own.

You become an expert in Nature and can use Nature instead of Crafting to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} herbal items. You don't need to be trained in Crafting or have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} feat to do so, and you can use @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Healer's Tools} instead of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4ftXXUCBHcf4b0MH]{Alchemist's Tools}.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the herbalist archetype.

Hero's Wings.name: Hero's Wings
Hero's Wings.description: You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential. Your wings are always in their majestic form without you needing to use Energize Wings, granting you a permanent fly Speed. Furthermore, sprites recognize you as a powerful hero (or villain) by your unique wings and are appropriately impressed. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Diplomacy and Intimidation checks against sprites and gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cc8O47KFsODReoBe]{Glad-Hand} skill feat against other sprites, without taking a –5 penalty to your Diplomacy check.

Heroes' Call.name: Heroes' Call
Heroes' Call.description: The songs of ancient heroes echo through your mind and quicken your pulse, especially in dire straits. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}as a 3rd-level innate occult spell that you can cast once per day. If you Cast the Spell when you have half or fewer Hit Points, you also gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Heroic Presence.name: 英雄风姿 Heroic Presence
Heroic Presence.description:
频率 每日1次

英雄之血在你体内滚滚流淌，你能深入发掘盟友并激励他们催生出更强的决心。

你能赋予30尺内的至多10名自愿盟友6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GYD0XZ4t3tQq6shc]{狂热执念 Zealous Conviction}法术的效果，但如果你对目标下达的指令会让其感到反感，那么该法术便会自动终止。

该动作具有听觉（auditory）或视觉（visual）特征，具体取决于你如何激励盟友。

Heroic Recovery.name: Heroic Recovery
Heroic Recovery.description:
The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.7ogytOgDmh4h2g5d]{Effect: Heroic Recovery}

Hex Focus.name: Hex Focus
Hex Focus.description: Your patron's teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocused}, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Hex Master.name: Hex Master
Hex Master.description:
You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

You are no longer limited to casting only a single hex each turn. In addition, when you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YVK3JUkPVzHIeGXQ]{Cackle} to sustain a hex, you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain a Spell} for all your active hexes that have a duration of sustained.

Hex Wellspring.name: Hex Wellspring
Hex Wellspring.description: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar. You can recover 3 Focus Points when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} instead of 1 if you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused.

Hidden Magic.name: Hidden Magic
Hidden Magic.description:
You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear. During your daily preparations, you carefully tweak any or all of your magic items to appear non-magical. Objects adjusted in this way remain so until your next preparations.

A spellcaster using @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura} must succeed at a Perception check against your Deception DC to see through your obfuscations.

Hidden Paragon.name: Hidden Paragon
Hidden Paragon.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from all of your current foes, or use Stealth to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all your current foes.

When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 1 minute, even if you use a hostile action. Not even @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility}, or similar effects can reveal you, though creatures can still use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to locate you as normal.

Hideous Ululation.name: Hideous Ululation
Hideous Ululation.description: Your throat has multiple separate chambers that can give your voice an eerie echo. You can be clearly heard at distances of up to 300 feet regardless of ambient sound, although your voice doesn't penetrate a magical @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} effect.

Hierophant's Power.name: Hierophant's Power
Hierophant's Power.description: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.

High-quality Scrounger.name: High-quality Scrounger
High-quality Scrounger.description:
When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} a temporary item using Scrounger Dedication, it can be an item of up to 3rd level (though the item must still be a weapon, armor, or a nonconsumable piece of adventuring gear).

You can instead Craft it for someone else's use, allowing them to avoid taking the penalty for using a shoddy item when using it, but causing you to take the penalty if you use it.

Hireling Manager.name: 雇工头 Hireling Manager
Hireling Manager.description: 你可以找到比大多数人好用的雇工劳力。当你的雇工提供服务时，雇工们在所有技能检定上获得+2环境加值。该环境加值对所有受训和未受训雇工都有效，但对所提供的服务和劳动力的成本没有影响。

Histrionic Injury.name: Histrionic Injury
Histrionic Injury.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger A creature you can see damages you with a melee Strike.

You respond with a startled look, dramatic pratfall, or theatrical arm-flailing that stymies your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} on a critical failure).

Hit the Dirt!.name: Hit the Dirt!
Hit the Dirt!.description:
Trigger A creature you can see attempts a ranged Strike against you.

You fling yourself out of harm's way. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}. Your movement gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. Regardless of whether or not the triggering attack hits, you land @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} after completing your Leap.

Hobgoblin Lore.name: Hobgoblin Lore
Hobgoblin Lore.description: You've studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent. You become trained in Athletics and Crafting. For each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Hobgoblin Lore.

Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline
Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline.description: You know how to efficiently utilize the weapons soldiers use in close quarters. Whenever you score a critical hit using a weapon of the polearm, spear, or sword group, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise.description: You increase your training in battlefield weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all weapons you are trained in from Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity.

Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity
Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity.description:
You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dUC8Fsa6FZtVikS3]{Composite Longbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaives}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MVAWttmT0QDa7LsV]{Longbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longswords}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbows}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon hobgoblin weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial hobgoblin weapons are simple weapons and advanced hobgoblin weapons are martial weapons.

Hobnobber.name: 飞短流长 Hobnobber
Hobnobber.description: 你惯于从众人的闲言碎语中截取有用的情报。你在进行搜集信息（Gather Information）技能动作时所花费的时间降低到通常的一半（在大多数情况下，降低到1小时）。如果你在交涉技能上达到大师熟练度，并且你以通常的速度进行搜集信息，那么假使你在技能检定上得出大失败结果，这个结果只会被视为普通失败结果。当然，本专长不会保证你搜集到的情报是否总是真实准确的。

Hold Mark.name: Hold Mark
Hold Mark.description:
You bear scars or tattoos enhanced by the mark of your community's prowess. When you select this feat, choose one of the options listed below. When you critically hit using a weapon of the listed group, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

You gain a large brand or tattoo in the shape of the chosen emblem or a similar image (for example, the axe could be a bear or other symbol of ferocious strength, while the shield might be a turtle or another symbol associated with a strong defense) and gain the listed benefit.

  • Axe axe or pick
  • Shield hammer or shield
  • Torch bomb or knife

Holistic Care.name: Holistic Care
Holistic Care.description: You provide emotional and spiritual care. Add @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} to the list of conditions you can reduce with Treat Condition. If the stunned condition has a duration instead of a value, you can't use Treat Condition to reduce it.

Holy Castigation.name: Holy Castigation
Holy Castigation.description: You combine holy energy with positive energy to damage demons, devils, and their evil ilk. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.

Homeward Bound.name: Homeward Bound
Homeward Bound.description:
Frequency twice per week

The connection between you and the First World resonates within your body stronger than it does for most gnomes, allowing you to cross the threshold between the Material Plane and the First World.

You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} as a primal innate spell. You can cast it twice per week. This can be used only to travel back and forth between the First World and the Material Plane. Due to your body's natural resonance, you can act as the spell focus, and you don't require a tuning fork.

Hopping Stride.name: Hopping Stride
Hopping Stride.description: You've internalized the hopping gait of your vampiric forebear. Stride up to a distance equal to your Speed – 10 feet. During this Stride, instead of moving through each space normally, you hop over every other square between your starting space and your ending space. These hops aren't high enough to jump over a creature or other significant obstacle in your way, but they avoid difficult terrain, hazardous terrain, pressure plates, or hazards on the ground or up to a foot above it in the spaces you hopped over.

Horizon Walker Dedication.name: Horizon Walker Dedication
Horizon Walker Dedication.description:
You've mastered travel within a specific type of terrain. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain} feat.

When in your favored terrain, you gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your travel Speed. When other creatures @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Follow the Expert} with you as a guide in your favored terrain, they gain both the ability to ignore non-magical difficult terrain for the purpose of their travel Speed and the bonus to travel Speed.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the horizon walker archetype.

Hot Foot.name: Hot Foot
Hot Foot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

Using a carefully aimed shot, you make a creature "dance." You shoot at the ground near a target's feet, causing them to react involuntarily; even mindless creatures have unconscious responses to dodge an attack, and you can capitalize off those uncontrollable reflexes to achieve your aim. As they dance to the sweet tune of your pistol's retort, you ensure your foe can't use whatever nasty surprise they had planned in store for you and your allies. Make an attack roll against the Reflex DC of a target creature within your firearm's first range increment.

Critical Success The creature can't use reactions, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves. These effects last until the start of its next turn.

Success The creature can't use reactions until the start of its next turn.

House of Imaginary Walls.name: 幻墙之屋 House of Imaginary Walls
House of Imaginary Walls.description: 你创造出其他人认为是真实的想象屏障。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PEfSofHm73IT3Khc]{幻墙之屋 House of Imaginary Walls} 组曲戏法。

Hulking Size.name: Hulking Size
Hulking Size.description: Your eidolon grows substantially. Your eidolon becomes Large, instead of its previous size, and its reach increases to 10 feet. This doesn't change any of its other statistics.

Hungry Goblin.name: Hungry Goblin
Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Hunted Shot.name: Hunted Shot
Hunted Shot.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon with reload 0

You take two quick shots against the one you hunt. Make two Strikes against your prey with the required weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to each Strike normally.

Hunter's Aim.name: Hunter's Aim
Hunter's Aim.description: When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate. Make a ranged weapon Strike against your hunted prey. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore your prey's concealed condition.

Hunter's Defense.name: Hunter's Defense
Hunter's Defense.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger A creature with the animal, beast, elemental, fey, fungus, or plant trait attacks you, and you can see the attacker.

Your canny understanding of natural and primal creatures helps you predict and dodge their attacks. The triggering attack roll targets your Nature DC instead of your AC. Though this allows you to avoid taking penalties to your AC, it doesn't remove any conditions or other effects causing such penalties. For example, an enemy with sneak attack would still deal extra damage to you for being flat-footed, even though you wouldn't take the -2 circumstance penalty against the attack.

Hunter's Fangs.name: Hunter's Fangs
Hunter's Fangs.description: Your fangs are exceptionally painful. Whenever you score a critical hit with your fangs unarmed attack, you apply the unarmed attack's critical specialization effect.

Hunter's Luck.name: Hunter's Luck
Hunter's Luck.description: Your recollection of monsters is magically enhanced by luck. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GfrKNJ9pNeATiKCc]{Hunter's Luck} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Hunter's Vision.name: Hunter's Vision
Hunter's Vision.description: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tj86Rnq3QuQnDtG3]{Hunter's Vision} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Hurling Charge.name: Hurling Charge
Hurling Charge.description:
You make a ranged Strikewith a thrown weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}to draw another weapon.

If you are @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Raging}, you can add the additional damage with melee weapons you receive from raging to your damage with the thrown weapon.

Hurricane Swing.name: Hurricane Swing
Hurricane Swing.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically hit a foe with a Strike with a slashing weapon.

Choose either @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind}. You Cast the chosen Spell as a 6th-level primal innate spell in the direction of the target of the triggering action.

Hybrid Form.name: 混合型态 Hybrid Form
Hybrid Form.description: 使用化形时，你会保留狐妖型态的特征，让你可以在狐狸型态时说话、在无尾型态使用狐妖非武装攻击，或是在无尾型态得到一条尾巴以使用需要尾巴的能力。你可以用化形能力改变混合型态的细节，无须完全现出真身或变成变化型态。处在混合型态时，你的狐狸特征会清楚透漏你不是普通的类人生物。

Hybrid Shape.name: Hybrid Shape
Hybrid Shape.description:
Mastery of your shapeshifting lets you combine the best features of your humanoid and spider forms. When using your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{Change Shape} ability, you can assume a bipedal hybrid shape.

This form gains all the benefits of your spider shape as well as the ability to use items and take manipulate actions just as easily as your human shape.

Hybrid Study Spell.name: Hybrid Study Spell
Hybrid Study Spell.description: Gain the conflux spell from a hybrid study of your choice. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by studying your spellbook and performing a physical regimen. You don't gain any of the hybrid study's other benefits.

Hydraulic Amneuvers.name: Hydraulic Amneuvers
Hydraulic Amneuvers.description: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings. If the next action you take is an Athletics check to Disarm, Shove, or Trip, that action has a range of 15 feet. You don't receive any item bonuses to that check or any circumstance bonuses related to your physical body, but if you roll a critical failure on that Athletics check, you get a failure instead.

Hydraulic Deflection.name: Hydraulic Deflection
Hydraulic Deflection.description:
Drawing moisture from the atmosphere, you create a disc of hovering water that deflects attacks. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.IfsglZ7fdegwem0E]{Effect: Hydraulic Deflection}

Hydraulic Maneuvers.name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
Hydraulic Maneuvers.description:
You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings.

If the next action you take is an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, that action has a range of 15 feet. You don't receive any item bonuses to that check or any circumstance bonuses related to your physical body, but if you roll a critical failure on that Athletics check, you get a failure instead.

Hyena Familiar.name: Hyena Familiar
Hyena Familiar.description: Hyenas serve gnolls as pets, trackers, and in your case, vessels for spirits. You gain a Tiny hyena as a familiar.

Hymn Of Healing.name: 复原颂 Hymn Of Healing
Hymn Of Healing.description: 你学会 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gSUQlTDYoLDGAsCP]{复原颂 Hymn of Healing} 组曲法术，让你的音乐富含能使盟友从伤痛中复原的饱满旋律。

I Meant to do That.name: I Meant to do That
I Meant to do That.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements Your previous action was a ranged weapon Strike that missed a foe within 60 feet.

Somehow your stray bullet causes an unintended reaction that creates a problem for your enemy: perhaps a ricochet knocks your foe's weapon away or they stumble over stray debris in an attempt to dodge your bullets. Roll a Deception check to attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the foe you missed.

Ice Crafter.name: Ice Crafter
Ice Crafter.description: The ancient ice-crafting techniques of the saumen kar awaken within you. You become trained in Crafting, or become an expert if you were already trained. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xWY5omyIcILNR7y1]{Magical Crafting} skill feat. You can craft permanent items out of ice instead of metal or wood; these items are a translucent crystal-blue in color, resemble icicles and glacier ice, and have the same statistics and properties as cold iron, including the price and the ability to deal additional damage to certain kinds of creatures. Any creature who wields or wears a piece of ice-crafted equipment takes 1 cold damage each round from contact with the primal cold of the crafted ice.

Idyllkin.name: Idyllkin
Idyllkin.description:
Your wild, unique features betray your agathion birthright. Serene celestials from the plane of Nirvana, agathions seek the peaceful path, ensuring a better world for all to coexist. Your halcyon demeanor leads you to search for peaceful resolution to conflict.

You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature. If you would automatically become trained in Nature (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You know the Sylvan language and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WC4xLBGmBsdOdHWu]{Natural Medicine} skill feat.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill.

Illusion Sense.name: Illusion Sense
Illusion Sense.description: Your ancestors spent their days cloaked and cradled in illusions, and as a result, sensing illusion magic is second nature to you. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to both Perception checks and Will saves against illusions. When you come within 10 feet of an illusion that can be disbelieved, the GM rolls a secret check for you to disbelieve it, even if you didn't spend an action to Interact with the illusion.

Impaling Briars.name: Impaling Briars
Impaling Briars.description: You can fill an area with devastating briars that impale and impede your foes. You gain the impaling briars order spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Impaling Finisher.name: Impaling Finisher
Impaling Finisher.description:
You stab two foes with a single thrust or bash them together with one punch.

Make a bludgeoning or piercing melee Strike and compare the attack roll result against the AC of up to two foes. One foe must be adjacent to you, and the other foe must be adjacent to and directly behind the first foe, in a straight line from your space. Roll damage once and apply it to each creature you hit.

An Impaling Finisher counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Impaling Thrust.name: Impaling Thrust
Impaling Thrust.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon that deals

piercing damage.

You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

Make a melee Strike with the required weapon. If the Strike hits and deals damage, your target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until they successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}, you attack with the required weapon, or you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.wQYmDStjdjn0I26t]{Release} the required weapon, whichever comes first.

When the target is no longer grabbed, they take @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} equal to the number of weapon damage dice.

Impassable Wall Stance.name: Impassable Wall Stance
Impassable Wall Stance.description: You refuse to let foes past your guard. As long as you are in this stance, when you critically hit with an @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O2MwufzEHbuThoGr]{Attack of Opportunity} triggered by a move action, you disrupt that move action.

Impeccable Crafting.name: 完美制作 Impeccable Crafting
Impeccable Crafting.description: 你能够以极高的效率制造出精良的产品。每当你在使用专门制作专长制作物品并取得成功结果时，取而代之，你获得大成功结果。

Impervious Vehicle.name: Impervious Vehicle
Impervious Vehicle.description: From armor plating and flexible components, to reinforced materials and backup redundant functionality, you have built safeguards to protect your vehicle from the rigors of combat. Your signature vehicle gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and Fortitude saves, and increases its Hit Points by an amount equal to twice your level.

Implausible Infiltration.name: Implausible Infiltration
Implausible Infiltration.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to a floor or vertical wall

You find tiny holes or imperfections that no one else could see and try to somehow fit yourself through them, possibly moving directly through the wall or floor from one side to the other. Your movement attempt fails if the wall or floor is made of something other than wood, plaster, or stone; is thicker than 10 feet; or contains even a thin layer of metal. If you have a climb Speed, you can use this ability to attempt to move through a ceiling.

Implausible Purchase (Investigator).name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
Implausible Purchase (Investigator).description:
It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can use it as a single action instead of a 2-action activity, during which you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw the item.

In addition, five times per day, you can use Prescient Planner to pull out a common consumable item up to 6 levels lower than your level.

Implausible Purchase (Rogue).name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
Implausible Purchase (Rogue).description:
Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw the item as a single action instead of a 2-action activity.

In addition, five times per day, you can use Prescient Planner to pull out a common consumable item up to 6 levels lower than your level.

Impose Order.name: Impose Order
Impose Order.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would critically fail a skill check or suffer an effect with the misfortune trait.

You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order. If the trigger was a skill check, you instead receive a result of 10 + your proficiency bonus (don't apply any other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers). If the trigger was an effect with the misfortune trait, the misfortune and fortune effects cancel each other out as normal, negating the triggering misfortune effect.

Imposing Destrier.name: 壮硕军骑 Imposing Destrier
Imposing Destrier.description: 在你的照料下，你的坐骑激发它的与生俱来的潜能。你通过神圣盟友职业特性获得的坐骑现在是一只灵敏（Nimble）或狂怒（Savage）动物伙伴（214页）。在遭遇中，即使你不使用命令动物（Command an Animal）动作，你的坐骑也仍然会在你的回合中使用一个动作进行迈步（Stride）或打击（Strike）。

Impossible Flurry.name: Impossible Flurry
Impossible Flurry.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed. Make three melee Strikes with each of the required weapons. All of these Strikes take the maximum multiple attack penalty, as if you had already made two or more attacks this turn.

Impossible Gossip.name: Impossible Gossip
Impossible Gossip.description: You can speak to inanimate objects, finding a magical spark within them similar to the one that animated you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YIMampGpij4Y30yE]{Stone Tell} once per day as an arcane innate spell, but instead of speaking with natural or worked stone, you speak with toys, statues, or other three-dimensional inanimate objects crafted to mimic a creature's appearance, regardless of their composition. The GM has discretion over which objects you can speak with and what they know, although objects generally have a good opinion of those who have cared for them and a poor opinion of those who have neglected or ignored them.

Impossible Polymath.name: 超常博学 Impossible Polymath
Impossible Polymath.description: 你的隐秘剧集非同寻常，允许你涉足其他诗人不能理解的多种法术源流。如果你的奥术技能受训，你可以将奥术法术加入隐秘博学的法术书中；如果你的自然技能受训，你可以将原能法术加入法术书中；如果你的宗教技能受训，你可以将神圣法术加入你的法术书中。如同书中的其他法术，你可以每天使用隐秘博学能力，将这些其他起源的法术加入你的法术库当中；但是你不能在在下一次准备的时候使用兼收博学能力，将这些法术保存在法术书中。

Impossible Riposte.name: Impossible Riposte
Impossible Riposte.description:
Your ripostes can deflect attacks back at their source.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{Opportune Riposte} with a trigger of "A foe outside of your reach critically fails an attack roll against you" in addition to its usual trigger.

When you use Opportune Riposte with this new trigger against a ranged attack, your Strike deflects some of the triggering effect back toward its source. Compare the result of your attack roll to the AC of the triggering foe. On a hit, you deal the normal amount of damage for your Strike, but the damage type changes to that of the triggering attack.

For instance, if you used Opportune Riposte to deflect a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}, your Strike would deal cold damage instead of its normal damage type.

Impossible Snares.name: Impossible Snares
Impossible Snares.description:
You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

Once per minute, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} one of the snares you've prepared for quick deployment without expending the prepared snare. Once deployed, such a snare lasts for 10 minutes before losing its effectiveness.

Impossible Striker.name: Impossible Striker
Impossible Striker.description:
