Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation. Nothing can prevent you from making a sneak attack, even if your opponent can see every blow coming.

Instead of dealing the damage from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AbgHCPWOKULeXrJ2]{Sly Striker}, you can deal your full sneak attack damage to a target even if the target isn't flat-footed.

Impossible Technique.name: Impossible Technique
Impossible Technique.description:
Trigger An enemy's attack hits you or you fail a saving throw against an enemy's ability.

Requirements You are not armored or fatigued.

You execute a maneuver that defies possibility. If the triggering effect was an enemy's attack hitting you, the enemy rerolls the attack roll and uses the lower result. If the triggering effect was you failing a saving throw, you reroll the saving throw and use the higher result.

Impossible Volley (Eldritch Archer).name: Impossible Volley (Eldritch Archer)
Impossible Volley (Eldritch Archer).description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon with the volley trait and reload 0

You fire a volley at all foes in an area. Make one Strike with a -2 penalty against each enemy within a 10-foot-radius burst centered at or beyond your weapon's volley range. Roll the damage only once for all targets.

Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but do not increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.

Impossible Volley (Fighter).name: Impossible Volley (Fighter)
Impossible Volley (Fighter).description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon with the volley trait and reload 0

You fire a volley at all foes in an area. Make one Strike with a -2 penalty against each enemy within a 10-foot-radius burst centered at or beyond your weapon's volley range. Roll the damage only once for all targets.

Impossible Volley (Ranger).name: Impossible Volley (Ranger)
Impossible Volley (Ranger).description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon with the volley trait and reload 0

You fire a volley at all foes in an area. Make one Strike with a -2 penalty against each enemy within a 10-foot-radius burst centered at or beyond your weapon's volley range. Roll the damage only once for all targets.

Impressive Landing.name: Impressive Landing
Impressive Landing.description:
Trigger You fall at least 10 feet and land on a solid surface.

You slam into the ground, shattering it around you. Treat the fall as 10 feet shorter. You land on your feet. All adjacent spaces become difficult terrain, and creatures in those spaces when you land take 5 bludgeoning damage as the debris hits them and are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of their next turn.

Impressive Mount.name: Impressive Mount
Impressive Mount.description: You've trained your mount to become a powerful force on the battlefield. The mount you gained through the Cavalier Dedication feat becomes a mature animal companion, granting it additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command an Animal action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike.

Impressive Performance.name: 动人表演 Impressive Performance
Impressive Performance.description: 你的演艺能够为你赢得支持者和敬意。你可以使用表演技能而非交涉技能来使用建立印象技能动作。

Improbable Elixirs.name: 不可思议灵药 Improbable Elixirs
Improbable Elixirs.description:
你对炼金术奥秘的掌握让你能够复制绝大多数人认为只有通过魔法才能达成的效果。

选择数量为你的智力调整值（至少为1）的不高于九级的药水（Potions）。你获得如同具有灵药（Elixir）特征的炼金物品一般制作这些药水的公式。

当你制作这些炼金灵药时，你能够用炼金试剂代替等值的魔法成分，你也可以用 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4ftXXUCBHcf4b0MH]{炼金工具 Alchemist's Tools} （在使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{快速炼金 Quick Alchemy}时）或 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.k6xZkDUpF7E1Totd]{炼金实验室 Alchemist's Lab}（在进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{手艺 Craft} 活动时）代替任何必需的工具包。除此之外，这些公式本身不会改变。

你一旦你决定了所选的药水公式，你就不能更改它们。

Improved Command Undead.name: Improved Command Undead
Improved Command Undead.description: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xYakFeP6olBsxpZN]{Command Undead}, if the undead succeeds at its save but doesn't critically succeed, it is your minion for 1 round. If the undead fails its save, it is your minion for 10 minutes. If it critically fails, it is your minion for 24 hours.

Improved Communal Healing.name: Improved Communal Healing
Improved Communal Healing.description:
You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

You can grant the Hit Points you would regain from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yExxOkHN1PN37hUa]{Communal Healing} to any one creature within the range of your heal spell instead of yourself. You can also use Communal Healing when you target only yourself with a heal spell, though if you do, you must grant the additional healing to someone other than yourself.

Improved Dueling Riposte.name: Improved Dueling Riposte
Improved Dueling Riposte.description:
Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the opportunity presents itself.

At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to make a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{Dueling Riposte}. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{Dueling Parry}.

Improved Elemental Bulwark.name: Improved Elemental Bulwark
Improved Elemental Bulwark.description: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.

Improved Familiar (Familiar Master).name: Improved Familiar (Familiar Master)
Improved Familiar (Familiar Master).description: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side. The number of abilities required to make your familiar a specific familiar is two lower than normal.

Improved Familiar (Witch).name: Improved Familiar (Witch)
Improved Familiar (Witch).description: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side. The number of abilities required to make your familiar a specific familiar is two lower than normal.

Improved Knockback.name: Improved Knockback
Improved Knockback.description:
When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} a creature, increase both the distance you can push the creature and the distance you can move to follow along with the target by 5 feet on a success or 10 feet on a critical success.

If you push the target into an obstacle, it takes bludgeoning damage equal to 6 plus your Strength modifier, or 8 plus your Strength modifier if you have legendary proficiency in Athletics.

Improved Knockdown.name: Improved Knockdown
Improved Knockdown.description:
You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.39CqlOzlHjEhh0E4]{Knockdown}, instead of making a Strike followed by a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, you can attempt a single Strike. If you do and your Strike hits, you also apply the critical success effect of a Trip.

If you used a two-handed melee weapon for the Strike, you can use the weapon's damage die size instead of the regular die size for the damage from a critical Trip.

Improved Poison Weapon.name: Improved Poison Weapon
Improved Poison Weapon.description:
You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects. When you apply a simple poison with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}, the poison deals [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4 poison damage} instead of [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage}. You don't waste a poison you apply with Poison Weapon on a critically failed attack roll.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.C6H3gF5HTdsIKpOC]{Effect: Improved Poison Weapon}

Improved Reflexive Shield.name: Improved Reflexive Shield
Improved Reflexive Shield.description: Your shield can help save nearby allies. When you use Shield Block against damage resulting from a Reflex save, adjacent allies who would take damage due to Reflex saves against the same effect also benefit from the damage reduction.

Improved Swift Banishment.name: Improved Swift Banishment
Improved Swift Banishment.description:
You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3unBu3PX6AO0uIW]{Swift Banishment} as long as you have a spell slot of 5th level or higher remaining, even if you don't have banishment prepared. You must sacrifice a prepared spell of 5th level or higher, and the banishment effect you create is heightened to the level of that spell. Your weapon serves as the special material component of banishment, causing the target to take the -2 penalty to its save against any banishment you cast using Swift Banishment.

Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter).name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter).description:
Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.GJIAecRq1bD2r8O0]{Twin Riposte}. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry}.

Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger).name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger).description: At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.GJIAecRq1bD2r8O0]{Twin Riposte} against your hunted prey. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry}.

Improvisational Defender.name: Improvisational Defender
Improvisational Defender.description: You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times. When you use an improvised weapon or a shoddy weapon, you don't take the -2 item penalty to attack rolls.

Improvisational Warrior.name: Improvisational Warrior
Improvisational Warrior.description: When you use an improvised weapon, you apply the critical specialization of a brawling weapon to it. Depending on the shape and nature of the improvised weapon, your GM might determine another weapon group's critical specialization is more appropriate.

Improvise Tool.name: 临时工具 Improvise Tool
Improvise Tool.description:
你就算手边没有合适的工具，你也能用杂七杂八的物什凑合凑合。你可以在没有修理工具时使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{修理 Repair} 物品的伤害。

若你手边有合适且可用的原材料， 你可以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{制作 Craft} 一份基础 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7fSnvJ2xoSfa6JXD]{铁蒺藜 Caltrop} ， @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ti4gWILk69LPxKuU]{蜡烛 Candle}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wob6DB1FFdWs0mbp]{指南针 Compass}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.44F1mfJei4GY8f2X]{撬棍 Crowbar}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.3tOyV4VZEZhwnAMO]{渔具 Fishing Tackle}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UlIxxLm71UdRgCFE]{燧石和铁片 Flint and Steel}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ML0GR2cIEdMn2hoD]{锤子 Hammer}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5j5KyZsGOfbrJNUZ]{梯子 Ladder}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.oX39xqMLVB8kNrY0]{岩钉 Piton}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fyYnQf1NAx9fWFaS]{绳索 Rope}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ccsgob2TZ7WqTrp7]{十尺长杆 Ten-Foot Pole}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sw7MBLASN3xK4Y44]{替换开锁器 Replacement Thieves Picks}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wrpI5z7iWB8XvflQ]{长工具 Long Tool} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Zr4PwTEuBLE30kkn]{短工具 Short Tool}, 或 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8Jdw4yAzWYylGePS]{火把 Torch} 这些，而不需要查阅基础工匠手册。

Improvised Crafting.name: Improvised Crafting
Improvised Crafting.description: You've learned to repair your equipment even in challenging circumstances, making use of what you have available. You can attempt to Repair an item without a repair kit, instead improvising tools out of your gear or found items. This adds 5 minutes to the time it takes to Repair the item. You can also Repair an item while on the move without needing a stable surface. This adds 10 minutes to the times it takes to Repair the item.

Improvised Critical.name: Improvised Critical
Improvised Critical.description: You can apply critical specialization effects to improvised weapons you wield. For any given improvised weapon, the GM determines which critical specialization effect is most applicable, based on the type of object it is.

Improvised Pummel.name: Improvised Pummel
Improvised Pummel.description:
Requirements You are wielding an improvised weapon.

You make a Strike with your wielded improvised weapon. You gain a +1 item bonus to the attack roll, and the Strike deals two weapon damage dice if it would have dealt fewer.

If the attack is a critical hit, in addition to the effect of the critical hit, the improvised weapon breaks. If the item has a Hardness greater than your level, or if it's an artifact, cursed item, or other item that's difficult to break or destroy, the item doesn't break and the attack is a hit instead of a critical hit.

At 12th level, your item bonus to the attack roll increases to +2 instead of +1, and at 16th level, the Strike deals three weapon damage dice if it would have dealt fewer, instead of two.

Improvised Repair.name: 临时修理 Improvised Repair
Improvised Repair.description:
你十分擅长修补受损的装备，但你的修补只有一时之效。

你对手中的一件破损（broken）非魔法物品迅速进行一次 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{修复 Repair}。直到该物品下次受伤之前，你都可以将其视为劣质物品使用。这种修补不会恢复物品HP，它还是很容易被摧毁。当该物品被正常修理至失去破损状态时，它会同时不再是劣质物品。

Incredible Aim.name: Incredible Aim
Incredible Aim.description:
By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true.

Make a ranged weapon Strike. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition.

Incredible Beastmaster Companion.name: Incredible Beastmaster Companion
Incredible Beastmaster Companion.description: Your mature animal companions continue to grow and develop. They each become nimble or savage animal companions (your choice, choose for each companion, including those that become mature after you take this feat), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

Incredible Companion (Druid).name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
Incredible Companion (Druid).description: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop. It becomes a nimble or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

Incredible Companion (Ranger).name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
Incredible Companion (Ranger).description: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop. It becomes a nimble or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

Incredible Construct Companion.name: 惊人构装伙伴 Incredible Construct Companion
Incredible Construct Companion.description: 得益于你不断的维护，你的构装伙伴进化成了不可思议的工程结晶，它所有的能力都得到了强化。你的构装伙伴变成了惊人构装伙伴。

Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master).name: Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)
Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master).description: Your familiar is infused with even more magic than other familiars. You can select six familiar or master abilities each day, instead of four.

Incredible Familiar (Witch).name: Incredible Familiar (Witch)
Incredible Familiar (Witch).description:
Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars. You can select a base of six familiar or master abilities each day, instead of four.

Special Add the bonus familiar abilities you gain for being a witch to this amount.

Incredible Ferocity.name: 无敌凶猛 Incredible Ferocity
Incredible Ferocity.description: 在多次徘徊于生死之间后，你可以重新凶猛起来并承受额外的重击。你可以每小时使用1次兽人凶猛，而非每天1次。

Incredible Improvisation.name: 奇妙应变 Incredible Improvisation
Incredible Improvisation.description:
频率 一天一次

触发 当你使用一个未受训的技能进行检定

尽管你缺乏经验，但你的灵机一动可以让你在一个技能上获得很多优势。你在触发技能检定上获得+4环境加值。

Incredible Initiative.name: 惊奇先攻 Incredible Initiative
Incredible Initiative.description: 你比别人的反应速度更快。你在先攻检定上获得+2环境加值。

Incredible Investiture.name: 额外绑定  Incredible Investiture
Incredible Investiture.description: 你拥有令人惊叹的魔法物品亲和度。你最多可以绑定12件而非10件魔法物品。

Incredible Luck (Halfling).name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
Incredible Luck (Halfling).description: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky. You can use Halfling Luck once per hour, rather than once per day. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.k0sXAn4PPq5nW9al]{Guiding Luck}, you can still use Halfling Luck when you fail a Perception check or attack roll only once per day (though you can use it within the same hour that you used Halfling Luck), and if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.f5Vkk2rM6tCe2zQn]{Shared Luck}, you can still use Halfling Luck on an ally instead of yourself only once per day.

Incredible Luck (Swashbuckler).name: Incredible Luck (Swashbuckler)
Incredible Luck (Swashbuckler).description: You always seem to bounce back from the worst. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DkoxNw9tsFFXrfJY]{Charmed Life}, roll the save twice (including the +2 circumstance bonus from Charmed Life) and use the better result.

Incredible Mount.name: Incredible Mount
Incredible Mount.description: Under your care and training, your mount has realized its innate potential. The mount you gained through the Cavalier Dedication feat becomes a nimble or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

Incredible Recollection.name: Incredible Recollection
Incredible Recollection.description: You can sift through knowledge locked within your mind at an incredible pace. You instantly use up to 5 Recall Knowledge actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.

Incredible Ricochet.name: Incredible Ricochet
Incredible Ricochet.description:
After your first shot singles out your opponent's position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

Make a ranged weapon Strike against a creature you previously attacked this turn. You ignore the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition and all cover.

Incredible Scout.name: 大侦查兵 Incredible Scout
Incredible Scout.description:
侦查中的你对危险极端警觉，总能先发制人提醒盟友准备战斗。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{侦查 Scout} 探索行动时，你对盟友的先攻提供+2环境加值而非+1。

Inescapable Grasp.name: Inescapable Grasp
Inescapable Grasp.description: Your grasp has a supernatural quality to it, preventing your foes from easily escaping-with or without magical assistance. If a creature you have @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} attempts to use a teleportation spell or effect, it must succeed at a Flat Check or the spell fails. If a creature you have grabbed attempts to Escape while under the effect of freedom of movement, it must succeed at a Flat Check or be forced to roll the Escape attempt normally, rather than automatically succeeding.

Inexhaustible Countermoves.name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
Inexhaustible Countermoves.description: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses. At the start of each enemy's turn, you gain an extra reaction you can use only during that turn to perform an @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Jtn7IugykXDlIoZq]{Opportune Riposte}, or an @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.hmShTfPOcTaKgbf4]{Attack of Opportunity} if you have that reaction.

Infectious Emotions.name: Infectious Emotions
Infectious Emotions.description: When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2424g94rpoiN1IPh]{Catharsis}, one ally within 30 feet gains the catharsis activation benefits in addition to you. If these benefits require an emotional focus, they use your emotional focus as they're experiencing an empathic imprint of your emotions. Depending on the activation benefit, it might be impossible to grant it to an ally; for instance, pride could only have an effect for an ally if both you and the ally critically failed the same saving throw against the same effect.

Infinite Possibilities.name: 无限可能 Infinite Possibilities
Infinite Possibilities.description: 妳找到把法术准备在妳心中那个拥有无穷可能法术位的方法。在妳进行日常准备时，妳能把一个法术位赋予无穷的可能性，而不是就用来准备一个法术。妳可以使用这个法术位去施放妳法术书中的任何法术，这法术的环级必须要比妳所选定的法术位环级低2，并且这法术的效果在任何方面都比原始低2级。直到妳施放前，妳无须在此法术位上准备任何法术。

Influence Nature.name: 干涉自然 Influence Nature
Influence Nature.description:
只要有耐心和时间，你能通过模仿鸟儿鸣叫，留下猎物踪迹等等行为，最终影响该地区某种动物的整体行动，在未来的日子里甚至还能帮助你。

GM决定需要进行的检定及DC和该行动所需的耗时（通常最少需要一到两天休整期）。不过你无法直接决定如何干涉到自然运行，你只能期望产生效果，例如更容易狩猎或在危险时鸟类会静默地从天而降。

若你自然技能为传奇熟练等级，你只需要10分钟就能对区域内某种生物造成这些影响。

Initial Eidolon Ability.name: Initial Eidolon Ability
Initial Eidolon Ability.description: Your link to your eidolon becomes stronger, granting it a new ability. Your eidolon gains the initial ability for an eidolon of its type.

Innate Magical Intuition.name: Innate Magical Intuition
Innate Magical Intuition.description: You've spent countless hours learning to recognize and predict a creature's innate magical abilities. The first time you successfully Recall Knowledge to identify a creature, in addition to any information you learn from your successful check, you learn the names of three of the highest-level innate spells it can cast, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your next save against an innate spell cast by that creature.

Inner Breath.name: Inner Breath
Inner Breath.description: Your body is capable of recycling its own air. When you hold your breath, you can do so for an additional hour. At the end of this hour, your body needs to rest before it can recycle air again. This rest requires 10 minutes of exposure to breathable air.

Inner Fire (Ifrit).name: Inner Fire (Ifrit)
Inner Fire (Ifrit).description: You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand. You can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} cantrip as an innate primal or arcane spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Inner Fire (Monk).name: Inner Fire (Monk)
Inner Fire (Monk).description: While you're in Stoked Flame Stance, you have cold and fire resistance equal to half your level, and any creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, tries to Grab or Grapple you, or otherwise touches you takes fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). A creature can take this damage no more than once per turn.

Inner Strength.name: Inner Strength
Inner Strength.description:
Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

You reduce your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition's value by 1.

Innocent Butterfly.name: Innocent Butterfly
Innocent Butterfly.description: You know how to alter the perceptions of others. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VUMtDHr8CRwwr3Mj]{Aura of the Unremarkable} once per day as an innate arcane spell. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Innocuous.name: Innocuous
Innocuous.description:
Access Jaric ethnicity

Halflings have been unobtrusive assistants of larger folk for untold ages, and your people count on this assumption of innocence. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Deception (or another skill of your choice, if you're already trained in Deception). If you fail a Deception check to Create a Diversion, humanoid creatures aren't aware that you were trying to trick them unless you get a critical failure on your roll.

Inoculation.name: 接种疗法 Inoculation
Inoculation.description:
你学习过如何对抗疫病，你的病人也会短时间内对同种疾病产生更强的抵抗力。

当你成功地 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{治疗疾病 Treat a Disease}且目标从该疾病中完全恢复过来后，目标在1周内对同种疾病的豁免获得+2环境加值。

Inoculation Subroutine.name: Inoculation Subroutine
Inoculation Subroutine.description: Your nanites reject diseases with ease. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing disease, you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a virulent disease. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent disease.

Insect Shape.name: Insect Shape
Insect Shape.description:
Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

Add the forms in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form} to your wild shape list.

Whenever you use wild shape to polymorph into the non-flying insect form listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}, the duration is 24 hours instead of 10 minutes.

Insistent Command.name: Insistent Command
Insistent Command.description: When you roll a success to Command an Animal, you get a critical success; if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure.

Inspirational Focus.name: 激发聚能 Inspirational Focus
Inspirational Focus.description: 你跟缪斯的连接赋予了你非同寻常的聚能能力。如果你距上次再聚能起花费了至少2点聚能值，你进行再聚能的时候回复2点而非1点聚能。

Inspirational Performance.name: 激励表演 Inspirational Performance
Inspirational Performance.description: 你获得激发勇气Inspire Courage组曲戏法。

Inspire Competence.name: 激发表现 Inspire Competence
Inspire Competence.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f0Z5mqGA6Yu79B8x]{激发表现 Inspire Competence} 戏法，能够援助你盟友的技能。

Inspire Defense.name: 激发防御 Inspire Defense
Inspire Defense.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{激发防御 Inspire Defense} 组曲戏法，可以保护你和盟友。

Inspire Heroics.name: 激发英勇 Inspire Heroics
Inspire Heroics.description: 你的表演可以激励盟友，使他们完成更伟大的目标。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{激发英勇 Inspire Heroics} 超魔聚能法术。你的聚能点数池提升1点。

Inspire Imitation.name: 鼓舞效仿 Inspire Imitation
Inspire Imitation.description: 你通过自己的行动来鼓舞盟友完成伟业。每当你在技能检定上大成功时，即使你没有花费一个动作来准备，当你帮助盟友进行一个相同的技能检定时，你也可以进行协助反应。

Inspired Stratagem.name: Inspired Stratagem
Inspired Stratagem.description:
Trigger One of the required allies is about to attempt an attack roll or skill check.

Requirements You spent 10 minutes during your daily

preparations reviewing stratagems for the day's adventures

with up to four allies.

You quickly advise your ally, using your earlier planning to make sure luck can't throw a wrench in the cogs of your schemes.

The ally rolls the triggering check twice and takes the better of the two results. That ally then becomes temporarily immune to your Inspired Stratagem until your next daily preparations.

Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
You become a brilliant example of dedication and poise in battle, encouraging your allies to follow suit.

When you spend this action, attempt a Diplomacy check. The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of your level, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check.

Critical Success Your @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.kzEPq4aczYb6OD2h]{Marshal's Aura} increases to a 20-foot emanation and grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Success As critical success, but your aura's size doesn't increase.

Failure You fail to enter the stance.

Critical Failure You fail to enter the stance and can't take this action again for 1 minute.

Inspirit Hazard.name: Inspirit Hazard
Inspirit Hazard.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable} a hazard.

Requirements The hazard isn't broken.

You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard. You learn the hazard's effects.

Once in the next 10 minutes, when you observe a creature take an action that would trigger one of the hazard's reactions or free actions if you hadn't Disabled it, you can use a reaction to rearm the hazard, causing the observed creature to trigger it immediately.

Instant Backup.name: Instant Backup
Instant Backup.description:
Trigger Your attack with a firearm misfires.

Even as your firearm misfires, you quickly draw a backup weapon. Release the misfired weapon if you so choose, and Interact to draw a one-handed weapon.

Instant Opening.name: Instant Opening
Instant Opening.description: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture. Choose a target within 30 feet. It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks until the end of your next turn. Depending on the way you describe your distraction, this action gains either the auditory or visual trait.

Instant Return.name: Instant Return
Instant Return.description:
Trigger An enemy misses you with a ranged attack using a type of ammunition appropriate to your weapon (a bullet if you're wielding a firearm).

Requirements You're wielding an unloaded firearm or crossbow.

With a single fluid gesture, you catch a projectile out of the air, load it in your weapon, and shoot it back at the attacker. Interact to load the projectile into your weapon, then make a Strike with the required weapon against the triggering opponent. Since you're using the foe's ammunition, this Strike applies any special effects that ammunition would have (for instance, if it was @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.rKknk8odXDBpON5l]{Explosive Ammunition}, it would explode in a burst of fire if your Strike hits).

Instinct Ability.name: 本能能力 Instinct Ability
Instinct Ability.description: 你获得你为野蛮人入门Barbarian Dedication所选本能的本能能力。

Instinctive Obfuscation.name: Instinctive Obfuscation
Instinctive Obfuscation.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are attacked by a foe.

The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats. You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image} but with two images instead of three. The tradition of this action matches the tradition of your gnome ancestry options.

Instinctive Strike.name: Instinctive Strike
Instinctive Strike.description:
You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

Make a melee Strike against an opponent that isn't hiding its scent with an effect like @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0fKHBh5goe2eiFYL]{Negate Aroma}. This attack ignores any flat check required due to the target being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

Instrument Of Slaughter.name: 饮血魔器 Instrument Of Slaughter
Instrument Of Slaughter.description:
你的利刃盟友渴求着敌人的鲜血。

当你使用寄宿利刃盟友，并且在会造成额外伤害的神卫反应动作重击一位敌人时，目标会承受与你武器伤害骰双倍数量的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害} 。

Instrument of Zeal.name: 热忱兵器 Instrument of Zeal
Instrument of Zeal.description: 神能充盈你的武器。当你使用制裁邪恶或者报应打击对一名敌人造成重击时，你的攻击增加一个额外的伤害骰，目标在它的下一回合中获得缓慢（Slowed）1。

Integrated Armament.name: Integrated Armament
Integrated Armament.description:
Your mechanical body houses a weapon or shield that you can quickly draw and stow, leaving you prepared for combat at all times.

You can use a 1-minute activity, which has the manipulate trait, to integrate a single, one-handed weapon or shield into one of your arms. You can draw or stow this item as an Interact action. Creatures don't automatically see this integrated item when it's stowed and must actively @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} in order to find it. They take a -2 circumstance penalty to any checks to do so. While you are wielding the item, it can't be @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}ed and you can't drop or Release it; you must Interact to store the weapon and free that hand. A creature determined to retrieve the item can do so, but it requires either 1 minute to remove it or extreme violence to your arm-such as physically removing portions of the limb. You can only have one integrated armament at a time, though you can use the 1-minute activity to replace the item or swap the arm in which it's stored.

Enhancement Your body has more space for integration. You can now either integrate two one-handed weapons, a one-handed weapon and a shield, or a single two-handed weapon which is split across both arms. You can use a single Interact action to draw or store both integrated armaments. When you draw a single weapon, you can choose to hold it with either one hand or both hands.

Intercorporate.name: Intercorporate
Intercorporate.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You're afflicted by a disease or poison, or are taking persistent damage.

Your ordered physiology rejects unwelcome elements. Choose one.

  • Disease or Poison Attempt a saving throw against the affliction at its current stage. On a failure, the affliction's stage doesn't increase, but you suffer the effects of the stage you were already on. On a critical failure, the stage only increases by 1.
  • Persistent Damage Attempt a DC 10 flat check to recover from the persistent damage.

Interfering Surge.name: Interfering Surge
Interfering Surge.description:
Trigger A creature you can see Casts a Spell.

Requirements You have an unexpended spell slot and can see the triggering spell's manifestations.

You overcharge the triggering spell with magic. You expend a spell slot and attempt to counteract the triggering spell using the energy of the expended slot. If the triggering spell is in your repertoire and the spell slot you expended was a high enough level to cast it, you take no penalty. Otherwise, you take a -2 penalty to the counteract check if the triggering spell was cast using the same magical tradition you cast, or a -5 penalty if it was cast using a different tradition.

If the triggering spell is successfully counteracted, it creates a wellspring surge from its caster in addition to the normal effects of being counteracted. If it isn't counteracted, your expended spell slot creates a wellspring surge from you.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, primal, or occult).

Internal Cohesion.name: Internal Cohesion
Internal Cohesion.description: Axis's order suffuses your body and helps it maintain coherency. You and your allies can Treat your Wounds without healer's tools. Once per day, when someone rolls a failure or a critical failure on a check to Treat your Wounds, you can focus on your internal cohesion to increase the degree of success by one step.

Internal Compartment.name: Internal Compartment
Internal Compartment.description:
You can hide a small object of up to light Bulk inside a hollow cavity on one of your forearms. It takes three @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} actions to store an object in this way.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DCs of checks for others to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} objects stored inside your arm.

If you store a weapon in your arm, you can use a single action to Interact to draw the weapon into the hand corresponding to your internal cavity, then Strike with the weapon.

Internal Respirator.name: Internal Respirator
Internal Respirator.description: Your body can internally synthesize oxygen for limited periods of time. When you hold your breath, you can do so for an additional hour due to your internal air reservoirs. At the end of this hour, your air reservoirs are expended. Refilling your empty air reservoirs takes 10 minutes of exposure to breathable air.

Interweave Dispel.name: Interweave Dispel
Interweave Dispel.description:
You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.

If your next action is to cast a single-target spell against a creature, and you either hit the foe with the spell attack roll or the foe fails its saving throw, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} on the foe as a free action, expending a spell slot as normal and targeting one spell effect affecting the foe.

Intimidating Glare.name: 金刚怒目 Intimidating Glare
Intimidating Glare.description: 你能仅靠一个恫吓的眼神就使对手退缩。如果你选择这样做，你的挫败士气（Demoralize）技能动作失去【声音】特性但获得【视觉】特性，并且你不会因为和对方语言不通而在挫败士气时承受减值。

Intimidating Prowess.name: 威逼 Intimidating Prowess
Intimidating Prowess.description: 你可以利用自己的肉体威慑力在尝试挫败士气和胁迫目标时获得额外的优势。你在进行这些技能动作时在检定上获得+1环境加值，并且你不会因为和对方语言不通而在威吓技能检定上承受减值。如果你的力量属性达到20且威吓技能达到大师级熟练度，这个加值提升到+2。

Intimidating Strike.name: Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description:
Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical hit.

Intuitive Cooperation.name: Intuitive Cooperation
Intuitive Cooperation.description:
Access Jaric ethnicity

You are accustomed to working alongside others, relying on each other to get by. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid, and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid you.

Intuitive Crafting.name: Intuitive Crafting
Intuitive Crafting.description:
Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting (or another skill of your choice, if you're already trained in Crafting). You gain the Specialty Crafting skill feat in a specialty of your choice.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XVnpntqV6w94PoOb]{Specialty Crafting (Alchemy)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.22HUfCajd6IkATOR]{Specialty Crafting (Artistry)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.S8mPrjJjuObotmjZ]{Specialty Crafting (Blacksmithing)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.59FN13nU6agKT4oa]{Specialty Crafting (Bookmaking)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YmzLnj4ojlf9INNP]{Specialty Crafting (Glassmaking)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WddEyALYHfpeUjZB]{Specialty Crafting (Leatherworking)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8XC2xJ7Y1xlr6Xor]{Specialty Crafting (Pottery)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tbIMWrIRI9P9cubM]{Specialty Crafting (Shipbuilding)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TWkwy0uQvTGlgEFG]{Specialty Crafting (Stonemasonry)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B06QKNvKYqxYGwPU]{Specialty Crafting (Tailoring)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dTjzxCy9pku5gL0F]{Specialty Crafting (Weaving)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YvoiGWZhtbHH6NMF]{Specialty Crafting (Woodworking)}

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill.

Intuitive Illusions.name: Intuitive Illusions
Intuitive Illusions.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Your turn begins.

Illusion magic comes to you so naturally that you can effortlessly sustain your magical ruses. You immediately gain the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain a Spell} action to extend the duration of one of your active illusion spells.

Inured to the Heat.name: Inured to the Heat
Inured to the Heat.description: Your have a love for extreme heat. You gain resistance 4 to fire. You treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less extreme (incredible heat becomes extreme, extreme heat becomes severe, and so on).

Inventive Offensive.name: Inventive Offensive
Inventive Offensive.description:
You can jury-rig your weapons to perform in unexpected ways. When you use this ability, add one of the following weapon traits to a melee weapon you wield: deadly d6, disarm, nonlethal, shove, trip, versatile B, versatile P, or versatile S. You cannot add a trait that the weapon already has. The weapon retains this trait until you a successfully hit and deal damage with the weapon. The weapon retains this trait only while you wield it, and you can have only one weapon modified in this way at any time.

If you have expert proficiency in Crafting, you can use this feat as a 2-action activity. If you have legendary proficiency in Crafting, you can apply two weapon traits from the list when using this feat.

Inventor.name: 发明家 Inventor
Inventor.description: 你的手艺能力出类拔萃，让你可以轻易分析一件物品的运作原理并创作你自己的发明物。你可以使用你的休整期时间来创作一个你尚未获得的物品的稀有度为常见（Common）的设计图（Formula）。这个行动和制作物品的流程类似：你支付设计图价格的一半开始制作，进行手艺技能检定，任何决定是否花费另一半价格立刻完成制作，或是花费额外的时间来节约投资。这中间的区别在于，你并不是花时间来制造一件物品，而是进行分析，设计和创造。如果你成功完成了设计图，将它加入你已有的设计图集（Formula Book）中。

Inventor Dedication.name: Inventor Dedication
Inventor Dedication.description:
You become trained in Crafting and inventor class DC. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XR95taODq1sq82Du]{Inventor} skill feat, even if you don't meet the skill feat's requirements. Choose an innovation. You gain that innovation, though you don't gain any other abilities that modify or use that innovation, such as modifications or Explode.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have first gained two other feats from the inventor archetype.

Investigate Haunting.name: Investigate Haunting
Investigate Haunting.description: You are skilled at noticing the telltale signs of ghosts and hauntings. Even when you aren't Investigating in exploration mode, you get a check to Recall Knowledge about incorporeal undead and haunts active in the area. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to disable haunts.

Investigator Dedication.name: Investigator Dedication
Investigator Dedication.description:
You gain the on the case class feature, which grants you both the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} activity and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} reaction. You become trained in Society and another skill of your choice. If you were already trained in Society, you instead become trained in an additional skill of your choice. You also become trained in investigator class DC.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the investigator archetype.

Investigator's Stratagem.name: Investigator's Stratagem
Investigator's Stratagem.description:
You play out battles in your head, allowing you to Strike when the time is right. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Strategem} action; however, when you substitute its result for your attack roll, you can't use your Intelligence modifier in place of your Strength or Dexterity modifier.

You also can't use your Intelligence modifier on other rolls from abilities that expand Devise a Stratagem, such as the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tu1hOEr6Ko9Df54L]{Athletic Strategist} feat.

Invigorating Mercy.name: 精力救济 Invigorating Mercy
Invigorating Mercy.description:
你的神性触碰能痊癒衰弱与疲惫。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{救济 Mercy}, 时，你可以选择进行一次反制(counteract)检定移除 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭} )状态，判定反制等级和DC时，使用该状态的来源作为依据。

如果该状态是因为一种仍正在持续的效果，同时你无法移除该效果，该状态会在你下一回合结束时回来。

Invincible Mutagen.name: 无敌突变药剂 Invincible Mutagen
Invincible Mutagen.description:
你将这种特地调制的强化添加剂加入你的突变药剂之中，令你的主宰形态变得坚不可摧。

当你处于 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xE0EdDrf734l2fQH]{主宰突变药剂 Juggernaut Mutagen} 的影响下时，你获得针对所有物理伤害的抗力，数值等同于你的智力调整值（最低为0）。

Invisible Trickster.name: Invisible Trickster
Invisible Trickster.description: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so. You can cast 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} as a primal innate spell once per hour.

Invoke Disaster.name: Invoke Disaster
Invoke Disaster.description: You can invoke nature's fury upon your foes. You gain the storm lord order spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Invoke The Elements.name: Invoke The Elements
Invoke The Elements.description:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of shimmering heat, flurrying snow, crashing waves, or swirling wind and lightning.

For 1 minute, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r 1d12]] damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 13th and 17th level, this damage increases by 1d12.

A veil may changeling deals fire damage, a snow may changeling deals cold damage, a brine may changeling deals bludgeoning damage and the effect gains the water trait, and a virga may changeling deals electricity damage.

Invoke The Elements (Brine May).name: Invoke The Elements (Brine May)
Invoke The Elements (Brine May).description:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of crashing waves.

For 1 minute, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r {1d12}[bludgeoning]]]{1d12 bludgeoning damage} damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At [[/r {2d12}[bludgeoning]]]{13th} and [[/r {3d12}[bludgeoning]]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.

Invoke The Elements (Snow May).name: Invoke The Elements (Snow May)
Invoke The Elements (Snow May).description:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of flurrying snow.

For 1 minute, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r {1d12}[cold]]]{1d12 cold damage} damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At [[/r {2d12}[cold]]]{13th} and [[/r {3d12}[cold]]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.

Invoke The Elements (Veil May).name: Invoke The Elements (Veil May)
Invoke The Elements (Veil May).description:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of shimmering heat.

For 1 minute, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r {1d12}[fire]]]{1d12 fire damage} damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At [[/r {2d12}[fire]]]{13th} and [[/r {3d12}[fire]]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.

Invoke The Elements (Virga May).name: Invoke The Elements (Virga May)
Invoke The Elements (Virga May).description:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of swirling wind and lightning.

For 1 minute, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12 electricity damage} damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{13th} and [[/r {3d12}[electricity]]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.

Invoke the Crimson Oath.name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
Invoke the Crimson Oath.description: You can invoke the Crimson Oath to unleash blasts of ruby energy from your weapon. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AsKLseOo8hwv5Jha]{Invoke the Crimson Oath} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to recite the Crimson Oath and meditate on its teachings; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your knight reclaimant focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Invulnerable Juggernaut.name: Invulnerable Juggernaut
Invulnerable Juggernaut.description:
You are unstoppable, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease. You gain resistance equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier to all damage, and your resistance from raging resistance increases to 8 + your Constitution modifier.

In addition, if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you can end your rage as a reaction to stay at 1 Hit Point. If you do, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 2} (or increase your wounded condition by 2 if you are already wounded).

Iron Fists.name: Iron Fists
Iron Fists.description:
Your fists have been forged by battle, your naturally tough skin and dense bone further hardened by conflict.

Your fist unarmed attacks no longer have the nonlethal trait and gain the shove weapon trait.

Iron Lung.name: Iron Lung
Iron Lung.description: Your lungs are infused with the resilience of iron. Treat the result of your save against an inhaled poison as one degree of success better than you rolled. Additionally, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.GAoUxmcKx1vW3vEB]{Exhale Poison} ability.

Iron Repercussions.name: 残酷报应 Iron Repercussions
Iron Repercussions.description: 不服从你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M8RCbthRhB4bxO9t]{残酷纪律}会有更持久的后果。如果一位敌人拒绝向你跪拜，你可以转而对他造成 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续心灵伤害} 。你必须在敌人决定是否向你跪拜前，选择要不要造成持续性的心灵伤害。伤害的数值不会改变。

Ironblood Stance.name: Ironblood Stance
Ironblood Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored

You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow. You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.tPKXLtDJ3bzJcXlv]{Stance: Ironblood Stance}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{Effect: Parry}

Ironblood Surge.name: Ironblood Surge
Ironblood Surge.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{Ironblood Stance}

You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact.

You gain the benefits of your iron sweep's parry trait (a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn) and your resistance from Ironblood Stance increases to your Strength modifier (if it's higher) for the same duration.

Irrepressible (Ganzi).name: Irrepressible (Ganzi)
Irrepressible (Ganzi).description: Your contrary nature means you bounce back with prejudice. When you roll a success on a save against an emotion or fear effect, you get a critical success instead.

Irrepressible (Halfling).name: Irrepressible (Halfling)
Irrepressible (Halfling).description: You are easily able to ward off attempts to play on your fears and emotions. When you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead. If your heritage is gutsy halfling, when you roll a critical failure on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a failure instead.

Irriseni Ice-Witch.name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
Irriseni Ice-Witch.description: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself. Your resistance to cold increases to 5 + half your level, and you can cast 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R5FHRv7VqyRnxg2t]{Wall of Ice} as an innate arcane spell once per day.

Iruxi Glide.name: Iruxi Glide
Iruxi Glide.description: You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and haven't yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.

Iruxi Spirit Strike.name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
Iruxi Spirit Strike.description: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors. Any unarmed attacks you acquire from iruxi heritages or ancestry feats gain the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Iruxi Unarmed Cunning.name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
Iruxi Unarmed Cunning.description: You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks. Whenever you score a critical hit with a claw or an unarmed attack you gained from a lizardfolk ancestry feat, you apply the unarmed attack's critical specialization effect.

Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication.name: Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication
Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication.description:
Access trained by a current or former member of a House of Perfection

Your skill and dedication have set you on a path to master the techniques of Jalmeray's greatest martial artists: victors of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven. You become trained in either Acrobatics or Occultism. You gain either the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yA9tsWT9uzL2REnw]{Ki Rush} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3a07jkWezSuORSpS]{Ki Strike} monk feat, which grants you a ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} activity as a monk does. If you already have both these feats, you can instead choose a single 1st-level monk feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Jalmeri Heavenseeker archetype.

Janatimo's Secret Lesson.name: Janatimo's Secret Lesson
Janatimo's Secret Lesson.description: Thanks to Janatimo's secret techniques, you can weave your knowledge and words into powerful tools to assist your allies in life-threatening situations. When you use Uzunjati Recollection to tell a story and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about a creature during a combat encounter, if you succeed at both checks, your story carries deeper meaning. This grants your allies a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll and saving throw against the creature during that encounter, as well as to their AC against that creature's next attack roll during that encounter. If you critically succeed at both checks, the bonuses also apply to all attack rolls, saves, and AC against that creature for 2 rounds.

Janni Hospitality.name: Janni Hospitality
Janni Hospitality.description: You can use magic to show others desert hospitality. You can cast 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mt6ZzkVX8Q4xigFq]{Create Food} once per day and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WzLKjSw6hsBhuklC]{Create Water} twice per day as arcane innate spells.

Janni Magic.name: Janni Magic
Janni Magic.description: The magic of jann runs through your blood. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals} once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

Jellyfish Stance.name: Jellyfish Stance
Jellyfish Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.pkcr9w5x6bKzl3om]{Stance: Jellyfish Stance}

Jinx Glutton.name: Jinx Glutton
Jinx Glutton.description: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.

Judgement of the Monolith.name: Judgement of the Monolith
Judgement of the Monolith.description: You can use the oaths bound in your ka stone to compel the truth from the living and the dead. You can activate your ka stone to target a single living creature, causing that creature to experience the effects of being in a zone of truth. You can also activate it with a 10-minute activation (envision) to cast talking corpse.

Juggernaut's Fortitude.name: 主宰强韧 Juggernaut's Fortitude
Juggernaut's Fortitude.description: 你在强韧豁免中的熟练等级提升至大师。

Juggle.name: Juggle
Juggle.description:
You can Juggle items and still use your hands between tosses. You can use the Juggle action in several ways.

You can start to Juggle with a single stored item, an item you were carrying, or an unattended item within your reach. The item must be of light or negligible Bulk. You Juggle the item until the end of your next turn, unless you use this feat against next turn to continue Juggling (see below). While you are Juggling, you can use this action again to add another item to the Juggle, which must meet all the same requirements. You can Juggle a number of items equal to one more than the number of hands you are using to Juggle.

You can also use this action to continue Juggling as long as you aren't fatigued. When you do, you continue to Juggle until the end of your next turn. If you do not continue Juggling by the end of your turn, you cease Juggling and you drop all the items. You become fatigued if you continue Juggling for more than 10 minutes (60 rounds) within the course of an hour.

As long as you're Juggling fewer than your maximum number of items, you have a free hand. You can wield weapons you are Juggling (but not shields or other items) as long as they can be wielded in one hand. For example, while you Juggle a dagger in one hand and wield a shield in the other, you are wielding the dagger but still have a free hand to Cast a Spell with a material component. Juggling two or more weapons with one hand doesn't allow you to use feats that require two weapons each held in a different hand.

Juggler Dedication.name: Juggler Dedication
Juggler Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Juggler}

You become trained in Performance; if you were already trained in Performance, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AYb8PmGJ37HwIMwj]{Juggle} skill feat, even if you don't meet its prerequisites.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained one other feat from the juggler archetype.

Jumping Jenny Display.name: Jumping Jenny Display
Jumping Jenny Display.description: This multi-sequence rocket blasts confetti at a series of altitudes. While the design is intended to delight children of all ages, you've found it has an unexpected side effect of confounding enemy fliers. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.wt6jdjjje16Nx34f]{Jumping Jenny} fireworks display.

Jungle Strider.name: Jungle Strider
Jungle Strider.description: You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles. You ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to Balance on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of plant material, you aren't flat-footed, and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.

Junk Tinker.name: Junk Tinker
Junk Tinker.description: You can make useful tools out of even twisted or rusted scraps. When using the Crafting skill to Craft, you can make level 0 items, including weapons but not armor, out of junk. This reduces the Price to one-quarter the usual amount but always results in a shoddy item. Shoddy items normally give a penalty, but you don't take this penalty when using shoddy items you made. You can also incorporate junk to save money while you Craft any item. This grants you a discount on the item as if you had spent 1 additional day working to reduce the cost, but the item is obviously made of junk. At the GM's discretion, this might affect the item's resale value depending on the buyer's tastes.

Just One More Thing.name: Just One More Thing
Just One More Thing.description:
Requirements Your most recent action was to Feint, Request, or Demoralize, and you failed but didn't critically fail.

After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

Reroll the failed check and use the new result. If the target of the failed check is the subject of a lead you're pursuing, double your bonus from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} on the rerolled check. That creature is temporarily immune to Just One More Thing for 1 day.

You can also use this action if you failed, but didn't critically fail, at a check to Lie, Gather Information, Make an Impression, or Coerce. In this case, rather than spending 1 action, adding Just One More Thing takes you half the amount of time you initially spent on the check, to a minimum of 1 more round.

Just The Facts.name: Just The Facts
Just The Facts.description:
You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.

You are permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}.

Your checks to Recall Knowledge are no longer secret. When you Recall Knowledge, you use the outcome for one degree of success better than the result of your check, and if an effect (such as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge}) would give you inaccurate information from your Recall Knowledge check, you know which information is inaccurate.

When one of your allies Recalls Knowledge and gains false information, you also know that information is inaccurate if they share it with you.

Just the Thing!.name: 就是这个！ Just the Thing!
Just the Thing!.description:
频率 每小时1次

你要在刀尖上保持平衡，破拆一道铁门，还是说服一条龙和你谈判？不用怕！无论发生什么，你总是有你要的东西！你进行一次需要1分钟或以下的时间来完成的技能动作，花费正常情况下所需的相同数量的动作或相同的时间。然而，当你进行该动作时，描述一种你拿出来的装置用于完成该动作。你如何完成动作的细节由你来决定，但这种装置需要符合你手头上的工作。例如，你可能会用重力稳定器在刀尖上保持平衡，一个力场攻城锤来打开一道铁门，或某种能散发出芳香，安抚龙类装置来说服巨龙。按这种方式使用发明能让你改变该动作计算技能检定的方式。你使用你的手艺Crafting调整值替换该技能动作通常关联的技能调整值。

Juvenile Flight.name: Juvenile Flight
Juvenile Flight.description:
Frequency once per day

You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled. If you have Fledgling Flight, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Ka Stone Ritual.name: Ka Stone Ritual
Ka Stone Ritual.description:
You inscribe your true name on your ka stone, as well as oaths to gods and pharaohs, and embed it in your forehead in a special ritual with a sphinx or with a living monolith who already has this feat. The ka stone is an invested magic item that you automatically invest each day. It can't be removed without your permission, nor can it be dispelled, and you can never lose investiture in the ka stone. Its Bulk is negligible.

The ka stone grants you a +1 item bonus to saves against death effects and negative effects, which increases to +2 at 8th level, +3 at 14th level, and +4 at 20th level.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.C9VvYnjbWertzgMc]{Ka Stone}

Activate 2 (envision), or a different activation if otherwise specified

Frequency a number of times each day equal to the number of class feats you have from the Living Monolith archetype

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} on yourself or use one of the other activated abilities granted by a later Living Monolith feat.

Keen Follower.name: 完美追随 Keen Follower
Keen Follower.description:
你目不转睛的模仿使你可以更好追踪同伴的动作。

当在探索模式中使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{追随专家 Follow the Expert} 行动时，若追随目标为专家熟练度，你改为获得+3环境加值，若目标为大师熟练度，你改为获得+4环境加值。

Keen Recollection.name: Keen Recollection
Keen Recollection.description: You can recall all sorts of information. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.DZWQspPi4IkfXV2E]{Keen Recollection} class feature.

Keep Pace.name: Keep Pace
Keep Pace.description:
Trigger Your prey is within reach and attempts to move away from you.

Your prey can't escape. Stride up to your Speed, following the foe and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed.

You can use Keep Pace to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.

Keep Up Appearances.name: Keep Up Appearances
Keep Up Appearances.description:
Access Taldan nationality

Trigger You are affected by an emotion effect.

Taldan pride means you never show weakness. Roll a Deception check and compare the result to any observing creatures' Perception DCs. On a success, that creature believes you were unaffected by the emotion effect. A creature tricked in this manner can't benefit from the emotion effect and can't use abilities that require you to be under this emotion effect; for example, if you successfully use this ability to trick a will-o'-wisp into believing you aren't under a fear effect, it can't use its Feed on Fear ability on you.

Ki Blast.name: Ki Blast
Ki Blast.description: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Ki Blast} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Ki Center.name: Ki Center
Ki Center.description:
Frequency once per minute

You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power. You cast a single action ki spell with the stance trait, without spending a Focus Point.

Ki Form.name: Ki Form
Ki Form.description: You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YDMOqndvYFu3OjA6]{Ki Form} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Ki Rush.name: Ki Rush
Ki Rush.description: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ps0nmhclT6aIXgd8]{Ki Rush} ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

Ki Strike.name: Ki Strike
Ki Strike.description: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Ki Strike} ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

Killing Stone.name: 杀生石 Killing Stone
Killing Stone.description: 你的星辰玉隐藏着致命的瘴气。你每天可以用内在神术法术的方式施展一次5环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{死云术 Cloudkill}。将该法术原本的成份改成法器（你的星辰玉）和姿势，你必须将星辰玉指向法术的目标区域。

Kip Up.name: 鲤鱼打挺 Kip Up
Kip Up.description: 你可以立刻站起身。这次移动不会触发反应动作。

Kitsune Lore.name: 狐妖学识 Kitsune Lore
Kitsune Lore.description: 你善于在各种社会情境间穿梭的同时保守祕密。你的交涉和欺瞒熟练度变成受训（trained）。如果你会在其中一个技能上自动受训（例如背景或职业的效果），改为让你自选的另一个技能受训。你还会在狐妖学识上受训。

Kitsune Spell Expertise.name: 精通狐妖法术 Kitsune Spell Expertise
Kitsune Spell Expertise.description: 尾巴让你看见更多魔法的奥秘。每天的准备阶段，选择 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{困惑术 Confusion}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{防死结界 Death Ward}或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{幻象场景 Illusory Scene}。你每天可以用5环神术内在法术施展一次这个法术。你的神术DC和神术法术攻击掷骰成为专家（expert）。

Kitsune Spell Familiarity.name: 狐妖法术天份 Kitsune Spell Familiarity
Kitsune Spell Familiarity.description: 你学会了几个魔法把戏。在每天的准备阶段，选择 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{眩晕术 Daze}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{严厉护卫 Forbidding Ward}或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{幻音术 Ghost Sound}。在隔天的准备阶段以前，你可以随意用内在神术法术施展这个戏法。戏法会自动升阶到你等级的一半，向上取整。

Kitsune Spell Mysteries.name: 狐妖法术奥秘 Kitsune Spell Mysteries
Kitsune Spell Mysteries.description: 至少有一个来自狐妖传承或族裔专长的内在法术。你懂得更多狐妖魔法。每天的准备阶段，选择 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{绝望术 Bane}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{幻象造物 Illusory Object}或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8xRzLhwGL7Dgy3EZ]{圣域术 Sanctuary}。你每天可以用一环神术内在法术的方式施展一次该法术。

Kneecap.name: Kneecap
Kneecap.description:
You deliver a punishing blow to an enemy's knee, shin, or other vulnerable anatomy within your reach.

Make a Strike with one of your melee weapons or melee unarmed attacks. This attack doesn't deal damage. On a hit, the target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed or a -15-foot status penalty on a critical hit.

This penalty applies only if the target has a land Speed and depends on legs or other targetable appendages to use its land Speed. As with all penalties to Speed, this can't reduce a creature's Speed below 5 feet.

Kneel for No God.name: Kneel for No God
Kneel for No God.description:
Access Vahird ethnicity

Your ancestors' defiance of magic and your people's strictly egalitarian mindset mean that certain forms of magic have little effect on you. When you use your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.8w6esW689NNbbq3i]{Call on Ancient Blood} reaction against a divine spell and roll a critical failure on the saving throw against that spell, you get a failure instead.

Knight Reclaimant Dedication.name: Knight Reclaimant Dedication
Knight Reclaimant Dedication.description:
You have sworn the Crimson Oath and become a full member of the Crimson Reclaimers. You gain expert proficiency in Stealth and Survival. Whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an undead's special ability, you get a critical success instead. This applies to any abilities that come from being undead, including an undead's innate spells (but not its prepared or spontaneous spells).

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Knight Reclaimant archetype.

Knight Vigilant Dedication.name: Knight Vigilant Dedication
Knight Vigilant Dedication.description:
You are dedicated to the cause of the Shining Sentinels. You gain expert proficiency in Religion. When you are between an ally and a foe and would provide lesser cover to your ally against the foe's attacks, you twist to become even more obtrusive, providing standard cover instead.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Knight Vigilant archetype.

Knight in Shining Armor.name: Knight in Shining Armor
Knight in Shining Armor.description: As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor. You gain expert proficiency in heavy armor.

Knockback.name: Knockback
Knockback.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike

The weight of your swing drives your enemy back. You push the foe back 5 feet, with the effects of a successful Shove. You can follow the foe as normal for a successful Shove.

Knockback Strike.name: Knockback Strike
Knockback Strike.description: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you. Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the target. This attack uses the same multiple attack penalty as your Strike, and doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.

Knockdown.name: Knockdown
Knockdown.description:
You make an attack to knock a foe off balance, then follow up immediately with a sweep to topple them.

Make a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, you can attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the creature you hit. If you're wielding a two-handed melee weapon, you can ignore Trip's requirement that you have a hand free.

Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made both of them.

Know It All (Eldritch Researcher).name: Know It All (Eldritch Researcher)
Know It All (Eldritch Researcher).description: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled. When you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a Knowledge check, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.

Know Oneself.name: Know Oneself
Know Oneself.description:
Frequency once per day

Access Vudrani ethnicity

Trigger You roll a critical failure on a saving throw against an emotion effect.

You center yourself and call to mind the Vudrani monastic ideals of mindfulness and self-knowledge. You fail the save against the emotion effect instead of critically failing.

Know Your Own.name: 理解自身 Know Your Own
Know Your Own.description:
你花费无数时间去研究自己以及其他世界的精灵历史，在同族之中已经算个学究了。

若你在关于精灵、精灵社会或精灵历史的回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）检定中投出大失败，则会得到失败的结果作为替代。

Know the Beat.name: Know the Beat
Know the Beat.description: You become trained in your choice of Guild Lore, Legal Lore, Mercantile Lore, or Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to Gather Information and to checks made to investigate crimes.

Know-It-All (Bard).name: 万事皆知（吟游诗人）Know-It-All (Bard)
Know-It-All (Bard).description: 当你成功进行知识检定的时候，你可以额外获得一条信息或者背景。当你在知识检定上获得大成功的时候，按照DM判断，你可以获得比平时更多的信息或者背景。

Knowledge is Power.name: 知识就是力量 Knowledge is Power
Knowledge is Power.description:
当你在对一个生物回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）检定获得大成功时，你下次对抗该生物的攻击骰、下次对抗它攻击骰的AC和下次对抗它需要豁免的效应的豁免检定获得 +1 环境加值。

如果你和你的队友分享了信息，他们也获得其好处。如果不被使用，加值会持续1分钟。

Known Weaknesses.name: Known Weaknesses
Known Weaknesses.description:
Whenever you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Strategem}, you can also attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} as part of that action. If you critically succeed at the Recall Knowledge check, you notice a weakness and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll from Devise a Stratagem.

If you immediately convey this information to your allies as part of the check, each ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.DvyyA11a63FBwV7x]{Effect: Known Weakness}

Kobold Breath.name: Kobold Breath
Kobold Breath.description:
You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy that manifests as a @Template[type:line|distance:30] or a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], dealing [[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d4]]{1d4 leveled damage}. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. You can't use this ability again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4. The shape of the breath, the damage type, and the saving throw match those of your @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.egpiSWBrNBb1Fmig]{Draconic Exemplar}. This ability has the trait associated with the type of damage it deals.

Kobold Lore.name: Kobold Lore
Kobold Lore.description: You attentively learned key kobold survival strategies and mythology from your elders. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Stealth and Thievery. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Kobold Lore.

Kobold Weapon Expertise.name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
Kobold Weapon Expertise.description: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, and spear, as well as any kobold weapons in which you are trained.

Kobold Weapon Familiarity.name: Kobold Weapon Familiarity
Kobold Weapon Familiarity.description:
You've trained with weapons ideal for subterranean efficiency. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{Crossbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.3Zv5hSXXtlaDatUv]{Greatpick}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RbM4HvPyrZ4YJxRc]{Light Pick}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6I4YJAQUbTAqbpsI]{Pick}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}.

You also gain access to all uncommon kobold weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial kobold weapons are simple weapons, and advanced kobold weapons are martial weapons.

Kobold Weapon Innovator.name: Kobold Weapon Innovator
Kobold Weapon Innovator.description: You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons. Whenever you critically hit with a crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, spear, or kobold weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover.name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover.description:
Trigger You gain no information from a Recall Knowledge check (usually because you failed the secret check) using one of the two skills you chose for this feat.

Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources. You immediately reattempt the triggering check using the other chosen skill.

Special When you gain this feat, choose two of the following skills: Arcana, Crafting, Lore (any one), Medicine, Nature, Occultism, Religion, or Society.

Lab Rat.name: Lab Rat
Lab Rat.description:
You've spent more than your share of time in an alchemy lab. You might have been an alchemist yourself, an assistant, or perhaps even a test subject. Either way, you have been exposed to a wide variety of alchemical poisons and elixirs, leaving you with increased tolerance of their effects.

You have a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against poison and harmful effects from elixirs. If you roll a success on your saving throw against an elixir or poison, you get a critical success instead.

Larcenous Hand.name: Larcenous Hand
Larcenous Hand.description: When you cast mage hand, you can remove its duration, modify its range to 20 feet, and modify its target to be an attended object within the spell's Bulk limit that wouldn't be time-consuming to remove. Add the following to the spell's standard effects: If the creature attending the object is willing to have you take the item, mage hand carries the item to you. If the creature is unwilling, you must attempt to Steal the target object with a Thievery check. The usual restrictions on attempts to Steal an object apply, including the restrictions that you can't steal objects that would be extremely noticeable or time-consuming to remove (like worn shoes or armor or actively wielded objects) and you can't Steal from a creature in combat or otherwise on guard. On a successful Steal check, the mage hand carries the item to you, and on a critical failure, you can't use this modification again for 1 hour. If you're a master in Thievery, you can attempt to Steal from a creature in combat or otherwise on guard, though if you do so, the spell's casting time increases by 1 action.

Larcenous Tail.name: Larcenous Tail
Larcenous Tail.description: Your tail's chaotic and independent nature causes it to perform mischief even when you don't intend it, and it can somehow steal things it shouldn't be able to handle. You can use your tail to Steal an object, though your tail still can't hold onto it at the end of your action. If you have a hand free, you can transfer the stolen object to your hand. Otherwise, your tail surreptitiously drops it on the ground in your space, where you can grab it later. Observers other than your target who haven't witnessed you stealing something with your tail are usually distracted, meaning the GM will usually decrease their Perception DCs, as normal for Stealing something.

Lasting Coercion.name: 持久威胁 Lasting Coercion
Lasting Coercion.description: 当你成功地对某人使用了胁迫技能动作后，这个效果对他们的最长影响时间提升到一周（但GM可以决定实际的作用时间）。如果你在威吓技能达到传奇级熟练度，你的胁迫效果最长影响时间延长到一个月。

Lasting Doubt.name: 恒久疑虑 Lasting Doubt
Lasting Doubt.description:
当你在敌人的心中种下疑虑时，它的效果将会比通常持续得更久。

在你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{救赎瞥视 Glimpse of Redemption}造成力竭（Enfeebled）2之后，敌人还会在1分钟内陷入力竭（Enfeebled）1。

如果你拥有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2c9awqDem5OLK47S]{负罪之重 Weight of Guilt}，在救赎瞥视造成呆滞（Stupefied）2之后，你的敌人还会陷入呆滞（Stupefied）1，持续1分钟或直到呆滞产生的裸骰检定致使它失去一个法术为止，取其先者。

Lastwall Sentry Dedication.name: Lastwall Sentry Dedication
Lastwall Sentry Dedication.description:
Access You are from the Eye of Dread region.

You've sworn yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall, the first line of defense against incursions by the Whispering Tyrant throughout Golarion. You become trained in Athletics and in Undead Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Finally, you gain the Reactive Shield fighter feat.
