Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Lastwall sentry archetype.

Lastwall Warden.name: Lastwall Warden
Lastwall Warden.description:
You use your shield to protect your allies, not just yourself, especially against the undead. When you have a shield raised, you can use your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction when an attack is made against an ally adjacent to you, in addition to its usual trigger. If you do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of you, following the normal rules for a Shield Block.

If an undead makes an attack against an ally within 10 feet, you can Step to become adjacent to your ally and then use Shield Block as part of the same reaction.

Laughing Gnoll.name: Laughing Gnoll
Laughing Gnoll.description: A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ePObIpaJDgDb9CQj]{Battle Cry} skill feat. You don't take a penalty when you attempt to Demoralize a creature that doesn't understand your language.

Lavasoul.name: Lavasoul
Lavasoul.description: Your elemental lineage manifests as magma and molten rock, and you can focus the magma into your hand to attack your foes. You gain a magma spike unarmed attack, which requires a free hand to use. This is an agile, finesse, unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group that deals [[/r {1d4}[piercing]]]{1d4 piercing damage}, as well as [[/r {1}[fire]]]{1 additional fire damage}. Instead of the normal critical specialization effect, the target takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}; you gain a bonus on this persistent damage equal to your item bonus to attack rolls on unarmed attacks.

Lawbringer.name: Lawbringer
Lawbringer.description:
You trace your lineage to archons: embodiments of heavenly virtues, guardians of the seven-tiered mountain of Heaven, and nurturers of law and virtue within mortals. Your own virtue and orderly mind protect you from foes who would turn your emotions against you.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against emotion effects, and if you roll a success on a save against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.

Lead Climber.name: 带头攀爬 Lead Climber
Lead Climber.description:
攀爬中时，你可为后续者开拓路线，也能拉盟友一把躲开灾难。

探索模式中盟友使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{追随专家 Follow the Expert}行动准备 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb} 你开拓出来的移动路线时，若其攀爬检定大失败，你可进行一次运动检定对抗同样的DC。若你成功，大失败的盟友改为失败。若你也大失败，则你和该盟友同时承受其攀爬大失败的结果。

Lead Investigator.name: Lead Investigator
Lead Investigator.description:
You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

Those allies gain the same circumstance bonus you do from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} to checks to investigate that lead. This bonus lasts until you cease pursing that lead or for 1 day, whichever comes first. This doesn't confer any other benefits of pursuing a lead, such as adding the circumstance bonus to your saves with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness}.

Lead The Pack.name: Lead The Pack
Lead The Pack.description:
You can have up to two animal companions active at once. However, when you do, it's slightly more difficult to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command} them. If you don't Command either of your companions, one of the two (your choice) can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike, as per Mature Beastmaster Companion, but not both.

When you Command an Animal, either choose one of the companions to take 2 actions, as normal, or else both companions can take 1 action to Stride or Strike. Either way, you can't Command an Animal to make either companion act again until your next turn.

Leading Dance.name: Leading Dance
Leading Dance.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to an enemy.

You sweep your foe into your dance. Attempt a Performance check against an adjacent enemy's Will DC. If your swashbuckler's style is @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.5HoEwzLDJGTCZtFa]{Battledancer} and you succeed, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}.

Critical Success Your foe is swept up in your dance. You both

move up to 10 feet in the same direction, remaining adjacent

to one another. Your movement doesn't trigger reactions

from the target (and the target's movement doesn't trigger

reactions because it's forced movement).

Success As critical success, but you both move only 5 feet.

Failure The foe doesn't follow your steps. You can move 5 feet

if you choose, but this movement triggers reactions normally.

Critical Failure You stumble, falling @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in your space.

Leap and Fire.name: Leap and Fire
Leap and Fire.description: You're quick enough to line up a shot even while diving to the ground. When you use your Hit the Dirt! reaction, at any point during your Leap you can also make a ranged Strike with a loaded firearm or crossbow, targeting the creature whose attack triggered the reaction.

Leave an Opening.name: Leave an Opening
Leave an Opening.description:
When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

Whenever you critically hit a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} opponent with a melee attack and deal damage, the target triggers an Attack of Opportunity reaction from one ally of your choice who has that reaction, as if the enemy had used a manipulate action.

Leech-Clipper.name: Leech-Clipper
Leech-Clipper.description: You are trained to capture deserters, or "leeches." If you critically hit a foe with a weapon from the flail weapon group, you can wrap the weapon around the target's legs and then drop it, causing the foe to take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds until they or their allies disentangle the weapon, which takes a total of 2 Interact actions.

Legendary Codebreaker.name: 传奇译码员 Legendary Codebreaker
Legendary Codebreaker.description:
你对于语言和密码惊人的理解能力使你可以在翻看一次的时间内就读出文本中被加密的内容。

你可以正常阅读文本的速度来解译文书。

，如果你选择以通常解译文书所需的时间来仔细阅读，那么你在解译文书时取得的成功结果视为大成功；如果你选择以通常解译文书所需的时间来仔细阅读并且取得了大成功结果，你可以获得对于文本逐字逐句程度的精确理解。

Legendary Guide.name: 传奇向导 Legendary Guide
Legendary Guide.description:
你对荒野知根知底，能不费吹灰之力带领团队穿行其间。

当你带领团队于荒野中行进时，在计算队伍旅行速度时，速度获得+10尺环境加值，且队伍旅行速度不会因困难地形减少，进阶困难地形也只是减半队伍旅行速度而不是减为1/3。

该专长不会增加遭遇中的队伍旅行速度，也不会使队伍在遭遇中忽略困难地形。

Legendary Linguist.name: 传奇语言学家 Legendary Linguist
Legendary Linguist.description: 你对于语言文化深入的研究使你可以在瞬间创造出一种自己的代码语言。你可以和任何使用某种语言的生物交谈——即使你们之间并没有可以交流的语言类型，你也可以迅速创作一种允许你们之间交换概念的简单代码语言。当然，你需要事先理解该生物的交流方式（口头语言，手语，等等）才可以编撰这种简易语言。

Legendary Medic.name: 传奇医师 Legendary Medic
Legendary Medic.description: 你发明了某些近乎奇迹般的医疗技术。每天一次，你可以花费1小时时间，进行一个医疗检定来为一个患者移除他承受的一个疾病、目盲、毁灭、耳聋、或是流失不良状态。使用这个效果原本的豁免DC来作为这次医疗检定的DC。如果这个效果来自一件神器（Artifact），等级超过20级，或是类似的强大来源，增加这个医疗检定的DC10点。

Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Legendary Monster Hunter
Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey. Your bonus from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} (and the bonus from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have it) increases from +1 to +2 for you and any allies who benefit.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.LB0PTV5yqMlBmRFj]{Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.aUpcWqaLBlmpnJgW]{Effect: Legendary Monster Warden}

Legendary Negotiation.name: 传奇交涉者 Legendary Negotiation
Legendary Negotiation.description: 你可以在敌意环伺的处境中快速交涉停火。你可以尝试立刻对和你交战的对手进行一次建立印象然后进行一次提出请求动作，要求他们停止攻击并和你谈判。你在这些交涉检定上承受-5减值。GM决定具体的检定DC——通常来说，这个DC以你面对的生物的等级来说会非常高。某些对手可能会立刻拒绝你的要求，另一些可能会在你提出的条件无法使他们满意时重新对你暴力相向。

Legendary Performer.name: 传奇艺者 Legendary Performer
Legendary Performer.description: 你作为演艺家的声望国际知名。NPC只需要通过一个DC10的社群技能检定就会认出你的身份，并且他们通常会对你提高一级态度——取决于该NPC的地位和你的名声。举例来说，如果你是一个世界知名的歌剧魅影，那么你的出现可能会引发人们的恐惧而非友善。如果你使用表演技能来赚取收入，那么你的名望会吸引到比起你所在的地区水平更高贵的观众——人们会旅行而来专门欣赏你的演出。比如，如果你在一个森林小镇中表演，皇室和天使可能会因此而专程前来。从游戏机制来说，这通常意味着你的观众等级增加2级（取决于GM的判断）。

Legendary Professional.name: 传奇仕事人 Legendary Professional
Legendary Professional.description: 你作为特定职业专家的声誉国际知名（举例来说，如果你选择的学识子类别是军事学识，那么你可能是一个传奇的将军或军师）。本专长的效果与 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.467qQoiy6bjWU1G8]{传奇艺者 Legendary Performer}相同，但你在使用学识技能赚取收入时会获得较高等级的任务而非吸引较高等级的观众。

Legendary Rider.name: Legendary Rider
Legendary Rider.description: You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other's signals. Whenever you are riding your mount, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}; you can use the extra action only to command your mount using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} skill action.

Legendary Shot.name: Legendary Shot
Legendary Shot.description: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would affect your ranged attack. If you have master proficiency with your ranged weapon, you can ignore the penalty for attacking up to five range increments away when attacking your hunted prey.

Legendary Sneak.name: 传奇潜行者 Legendary Sneak
Legendary Sneak.description: 即使在没有掩蔽物的环境中，你也可以保持潜行——只有你希望被人看到的时候，其他人才会看到你。你可以在没有掩蔽或是隐蔽的状态时尝试潜行（Sneak）和藏匿（Hide）技能动作。如果你在探索模式中使用回避注意以外的探索战术（Exploration Tactic），你视为总是拥有回避注意，除非你有意选择不这么做。见本书第479页理解更多关于探索战术的内容。

Legendary Summoner.name: Legendary Summoner
Legendary Summoner.description:
Your ability to summon extends past your other spellcasting. When you sacrifice a 9th-level spell slot to gain two summoning slots using Master Summoner, you can use those slots to cast summoning spells heightened to 10th level.

You can't use these spell slots for any purpose other than casting the summoning spells, and you don't count as having 10th-level spell slots for other abilities or rules.

Legendary Survivalist.name: 传奇生存专家 Legendary Survivalist
Legendary Survivalist.description: 你可以无需食物和水便可以生存，并且不会因为严重（Severe），极端（Extreme）和灾难性（Incredible）寒冷或炎热环境而承受任何伤害。

Legendary Thief.name: 传奇神偷 Legendary Thief
Legendary Thief.description: 你的盗术令人匪夷所思。你可以下手偷窃被他人积极地使用，十分显眼或是难以移除的物品（比如正在被人穿着的鞋或是护甲）。你需要仔细而小心地进行你的偷窃，这通常会需要至少1分钟时间（或者，如果移除一件物品-比如护甲-需要比这更长的时间，那么这个时间也会相应延长）。你需要一定程度的隐蔽，比如黑暗或是拥挤的人群来掩盖你的行动，并且在贼活检定上承受-5减值。即使你在检定上成功，你的行动通常也会立刻吸引他人的注意——一件全身甲突然从穿着它的人身上消失自然是非常冲击性的。

Legs of Stone.name: Legs of Stone
Legs of Stone.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} you. You can Shove creatures even if you don't have a hand free. When you successfully Shove a foe, you can Stride away from your opponent (instead of toward it), but you must move the same distance in the opposite direction from where you Shoved it.

Lemma Of Vision.name: Lemma Of Vision
Lemma Of Vision.description: You've solved a tiny stepping stone in your self-discovery, awakening new depths in your sight. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Lengthy Diversion.name: 持久分神 Lengthy Diversion
Lengthy Diversion.description: 当你在使用欺骗技能来尝试使敌人分神（Create a Diversion）并取得大成功时，你可以在你的本回合结束后仍然处于隐匿状态。根据GM基于环境和具体情势的判断，这个效果可以保持更长的时间（至少额外1轮）。

Leshy Familiar.name: Leshy Familiar
Leshy Familiar.description: You gain a leshy familiar, a Tiny plant that embodies one of the many spirits of nature. Other than taking the form of a plant instead of an animal, this familiar uses all the same rules as other familiars.

Leshy Familiar Secrets.name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
Leshy Familiar Secrets.description:
The leaf order's secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form. You can select one additional familiar ability each day, which must be one of the following leshy familiar abilities. You can't select more than one leshy familiar ability at a time.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.familiar-abilities.LUBS9csNNgRTui4p]{Grasping Tendrils} Your familiar can extend vines or similar tendrils, increasing its reach to 15 feet.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.familiar-abilities.43xB5UnexISlfRa5]{Purify Air} Your familiar recycles air, providing enough oxygen for a Medium creature in areas with stale air, such as a sealed chamber or extradimensional space. If the leshy is within the area of an inhaled poison effect or an effect that relies on smell, creatures within a 15-foot emanation from the leshy gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws against the effect.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.familiar-abilities.SKIS1xexaOvrecdV]{Verdant Burst} When your familiar dies,it releases its primal energy to cast the 3-action version of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, heightened to a level 1 lower than your highest-level spell slot. The heal spell gains a status bonus equal to twice the spell's level to the Hit Points it restores to plants. You must be able to cast 2nd-level spells using spell slots to select this familiar ability.

Leshy Glide.name: Leshy Glide
Leshy Glide.description: Using your own leaves, you can control your descent. You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and have not yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.

Leshy Lore.name: Leshy Lore
Leshy Lore.description: You deeply understand your people's cultural traditions and innate strengths. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Leshy Lore.

Leshy Superstition.name: Leshy Superstition
Leshy Superstition.description:
Trigger You attempt a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, but haven't rolled yet.

You notice spirits that inhabit objects, learning which bring good fortune and which are unlucky. You focus on the power of a lucky object, granting you a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throw against the triggering effect.

Lesser Augmentation.name: Lesser Augmentation
Lesser Augmentation.description:
You've focused on enhancing yourself and have received an improvement to one of your existing abilities. You gain the enhancement benefits of one of your 1st- or 5th-level automaton ancestry feats.

You are also capable of reconfiguring your augmentations to meet your needs. You can spend one week of downtime to change the enhancement you gain with this feat.

Enhancement You gain the enhancement benefits of another 1st- or 5th-level automaton ancestry feat. Also, your reconfigurations take less time. You only need to spend 1 day of downtime to change any of your enhancements. If you have multiple enhancements, changing each one requires a separate day.

Lethal Finisher.name: Lethal Finisher
Lethal Finisher.description:
You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright. Make a Strike. On a success, you forego your precise strike damage from the finisher.

Instead, your target takes additional precision damage based on a Fortitude save against your class DC. If your Strike was a critical hit, the target's saving throw outcome is one degree worse.

Critical Success You deal [[/r 6 #precision]]{6 precision damage}.

Success You deal [[/r {6d6}[precision]]]{6d6 precision damage}.

Failure You deal [[/r {12d6}[precision]]]{12d6 precision damage}.

Critical Failure You deal [[/r {18d6}[precision]]]{18d6 precision damage}.

Lethargy Poisoner.name: Lethargy Poisoner
Lethargy Poisoner.description: You've learned more than the use of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XyA6PKV46aNlLXOd]{Hand Crossbow} from drow lore. During your daily preparations, you can prepare a dose of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison} from ordinary materials in a wilderness or urban area. If you're an expert in Crafting, you can instead craft a dose of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.nn2HAN1XKkKHfVnM]{Stupor Poison}. You can prepare two doses (of either poison) if you're a master in Crafting and three doses if you're legendary in Crafting. The save DC for this poison is equal to your class DC. Only you can use these poisons, and they expire the next time you make your daily preparations. The GM might decide that the area you're in is too barren to provide the materials you need for this feat.

Levering Strike.name: Levering Strike
Levering Strike.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}

Requirements You are wielding your staff.

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don't critically fail, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its DC against @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} attempts until the start of your next turn.

Leyline Conduit.name: Leyline Conduit
Leyline Conduit.description:
Frequency once per minute

You can cast your spells effortlessly by tapping into the leylines of the world. If your next action is to Cast a Spell of 5th level or lower that has no duration, you don't expend the prepared spell as you cast it.

Liberating Stride.name: 自由迈步 Liberating Stride
Liberating Stride.description:
取代在你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步 Liberating Step}结束之后进行一个快步（Step），触发自由快步的盟友能够以至多他们速度（Speed）的一半进行迈步（Stride）。

即使你拥有 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.uptzvOLrZ3fctrl2]{升格 Exalt}，也只有触发自由快步的盟友才能从这个能力中获益。

Lie Detector.name: Lie Detector
Lie Detector.description:
You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar - sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} and to Perception DCs against attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} to you.

When you determine someone is lying to you, you can use their deceit to your advantage to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check you attempt against that creature within the next minute.

Lie To Me.name: 将计就计 Lie To Me
Lie To Me.description: 你可以使用自己的欺骗技巧来给对你撒谎的人布下话术圈套。如果你在和他人交谈时对方尝试对你说谎，你可以使用你的察觉DC或是欺骗技能DC（取其高者）来决定对方是否成功。本专长的效果只有在你可以和对方保持互动交流时才能生效——比如，对方在进行不被打断的独白演说时说谎，则本专长无效。

Life Leap.name: Life Leap
Life Leap.description:
Requirements You must be adjacent to a living creature.

You phase through a space that a living creature occupies in a flash, spontaneously appearing on the opposite side of it in a vibrant display of colorful light.

You move from your current location to another location that's still adjacent to the same living creature, but on the opposite side or corner of the creature's space.

To determine whether a position is valid, use the same rules as for flanking: a line through the center of the two spaces must pass through opposite sides or corners of the creature's space.

You pass through the creature's life force, appearing in the selected location; this doesn't trigger reactions based on movement. You must be able to see your destination, and you can't move farther than your Speed would allow.

Life-Giving Magic.name: Life-Giving Magic
Life-Giving Magic.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You cast an innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat.

The upwelling of innate magic refreshes your body. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Lifeblood's Call.name: Lifeblood's Call
Lifeblood's Call.description: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls on your melee Strikes equal to twice the sum of your wounded and doomed conditions (to a maximum of a +8 circumstance bonus to damage) whenever you have one or both conditions.

Lifelink Surge.name: Lifelink Surge
Lifelink Surge.description: You learn the lifelink surge link spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Lifesense.name: Lifesense
Lifesense.description:
You have a limited ability to sense life force, like your psychopomp forebears.

You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 10 feet. This allows you to sense the life force within living creatures and its counterforce that animates the undead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

Light From Darkness.name: 弃暗投明 Light From Darkness
Light From Darkness.description:
你长年与体内的魔族影响对抗，并终于胜出；今后的人生中不论是要行善作恶，都是你不受外力影响的选择。

你在抵抗神术效果的所有豁免上，获得+1环境加值。

Light Paws.name: Light Paws
Light Paws.description:
You can balance on your toes to step carefully over obstructions.

You Stride and then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step}, or Step and then Stride, ignoring difficult terrain during this movement.

Light Step.name: Light Step
Light Step.description: You aren't bothered by tricky footing. When you Stride or Step, you can ignore difficult terrain.

Light of Revelation.name: Light of Revelation
Light of Revelation.description: You've learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ou56ShiFH7GWF8hX]{Light of Revelation}devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Lightless Litheness.name: Lightless Litheness
Lightless Litheness.description: Your body is almost as flexible as your shadow. When you critically fail at Squeezing, you get a failure instead. Additionally, when you roll a success at an Escape check, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical success, you can Step instead of Striding up to 5 feet.

Lightning Snares.name: Lightning Snares
Lightning Snares.description: You can rig a trap with incredible speed. When you create a snare that normally takes 1 minute to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft}, you can Craft it using a single @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action instead.

Lightning Tongue.name: Lightning Tongue
Lightning Tongue.description: Your tongue darts out faster than the eye can see to retrieve loose objects. You Interact to pick up a single unattended object of light Bulk or less within 10 feet of you. If you don't have enough hands free to hold the object, it falls to the ground in your space.

Lightslayer Oath.name: 屠天荡神 Lightslayer Oath
Lightslayer Oath.description:
你已发誓要把天界存在那自私的正义从这个世界上抹去。其他信条之后把下面的信条加进你神卫准则中： "只要有适当的机会，你要把你遇到的所有天界生物放逐或赶尽杀绝；虽然你几乎不可能碰到邪恶的天界生物，但如果碰到你不必放逐或杀了它。"

当你使用神卫反应动作对抗天界生物时，你用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击} 造成的额外伤害+1(9级+2、16级+3)。

Lingering Composition.name: 绕梁组曲 Lingering Composition
Lingering Composition.description: 通过在表演中加入夸张的表现，你让你的组曲持续时间变长。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.irTdhxTixU9u9YUm]{绕梁组曲 Lingering Composition} 聚能法术。你的聚能点数池提升1点。

Lingering Flames.name: Lingering Flames
Lingering Flames.description:
When you cast fireball, you can modify its effects, decreasing the base damage to 5d6 and causing it to deal 2 persistent fire damage to creatures that fail their save, doubled as normal on a critical failure. If you do, replace its heightened entry with the following.

Heightened (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6 and the persistent fire damage is increased by 2.

Linguist Dedication.name: 语言学者 Linguist Dedication
Linguist Dedication.description:
你学习了语言本身和它们的发展过程。你的社群（Society）熟练度变为受训；若你的社群熟练度已经是受训，则在社群上的熟练度变为专家作为替代。你获得2次 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{多语言 Multilingual}技能专长。

特殊 直至选取另外2个语言学者变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长（dedication feat）。

Link Focus.name: Link Focus
Link Focus.description: Your focus recovers faster. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocused}, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Link Wellspring.name: Link Wellspring
Link Wellspring.description: Your bond replenishes your focus. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocused}, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Linked Focus.name: 连结专攻 Linked Focus
Linked Focus.description:
频率 一天一次

你将你的连结物品与供给学派法术的聚能池相连。当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{汲取你的连结物品 Drain your Bonded Item} 施放你奥术学派的法术时，你会恢复1点聚能点。

Lion Blade Dedication.name: Lion Blade Dedication
Lion Blade Dedication.description:
Access You are from Taldor.

Your lion blade spy training helps you conceal yourself and your identity. You become trained in your choice of Deception or Stealth and in Espionage Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You never take circumstance penalties for attempting to take a disguise of a different ancestry, age, and so on, as long as the disguised form is appropriate for your size.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Lion Blade archetype.

Lion's Fury.name: Lion's Fury
Lion's Fury.description: You gain access to the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ak3oHoPDJoMR14yg]{Lion Scythe's} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zWp7Kcn7mhKyGFxW]{Sun Sling's} critical specialization effects.

Lion's Might.name: Lion's Might
Lion's Might.description: You've trained with the weapons of the Bright Lions. You gain access to @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ak3oHoPDJoMR14yg]{Lion Scythes} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zWp7Kcn7mhKyGFxW]{Sun Slings}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank with lion scythes and sun slings.

Litany Against Sloth.name: 反怠惰祷言 Litany Against Sloth
Litany Against Sloth.description: 你斥责怠惰之罪，让敌人的懒惰转而袭向它自己。你能够施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2mVW1KT3AjW2pvDO]{反怠惰祷言 Litany against Sloth}虔诚法术。你的聚能池中的聚能点容量提升1。

Litany Against Wrath.name: 反愤怒祷言 Litany Against Wrath
Litany Against Wrath.description:
你因敌人对美好之物的愤怒而予以谴责。

你能够施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.X1b9ollVMSLXDN9o]{反愤怒祷言 Litany against Wrath} 虔诚法术。你的聚能池中的聚能点容量提升1。

Litany Of Depravity.name: 堕落祷言 Litany Of Depravity
Litany Of Depravity.description: 对敌人的空洞大道理你釜底抽薪，让他们的心向邪恶沉沦。你可以施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tYP8unoR0a5Dq9EA]{堕落祷言 Litany of Depravity} 聚能法术。你的聚能池增加1点聚能点。

Litany Of Self-Interest.name: 利己祷言 Litany Of Self-Interest
Litany Of Self-Interest.description: 你迫使一名生物无视他人，只为自己目标而动。你能施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mm3hZ6jgaJaKK16n]{利己祷言 Litany of Self-Interest} 虔诚法术。你的聚能池增加1点聚能点。

Litany of Righteousness.name: 正义祷言 Litany of Righteousness
Litany of Righteousness.description: 你呼唤正义之力揭露恶徒的弱点。你能够施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.n3b3pDmA6L5YRTyq]{正义祷言 Litany of Righteousness}虔诚法术。你的聚能池中的聚能点容量提升1。

Live Ammunition.name: Live Ammunition
Live Ammunition.description: There are generally few things as ill-advised as being shot out of a cannon or launched by a trebuchet, but people use the tactic every so often in a desperate situation. While it's more humane to use this strategy with mindless constructs or undead, occasionally an exceedingly foolhardy adventurer demands the opportunity to try it. Loading a creature requires two additional Load actions, which you must conduct personally. The creature must be willing, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} throughout the process, and the siege weapon must be physically capable of firing the creature in question, based on their size and shape. Typically, that means ballistas don't qualify, for example-nor do auto-catapults which require specifically-sized balls-but normal catapults and onagers work just fine. When you Launch the weapon, if the weapon usually targets an area, you target a single 5-foot square instead. The siege weapon deals its normal damage to its target, or to the modified area, and to the creature fired.

Living Hair.name: Living Hair
Living Hair.description:
You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.

You gain a hair unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 bludgeoning damage}; is in the brawling group; and has the agile, disarm, finesse, trip, and unarmed traits.

Living Monolith Dedication.name: Living Monolith Dedication
Living Monolith Dedication.description:
Access You are from the Golden Road region.

You've begun to inscribe a magical stone called a ka stone that you will some day tie to your soul. You gain knowledge of Ancient Osirion and a connection to your nascent ka stone. If you fail a recovery check while dying, your dying condition does not increase; if you critically fail, your dying condition increases by only 1. You become trained in Ancient Osirion Lore, or expert if you were already trained.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the living monolith archetype.

Living Rune.name: Living Rune
Living Rune.description: You've bridged a connection between the runes on your body and the magic of runestones, allowing you to place an armor rune on your living flesh. Your body can hold a single property rune; you can't etch a property rune on your body if it has requirements on the type or category of armor or if the property would affect the armor instead of its wearer. If you wear armor, you gain the property rune's effects in addition to any effects of that armor.

Living Weapon (Claws).name: Living Weapon (Claws)
Living Weapon (Claws).description:
You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage} and has the agile and finesse traits; a horn, jaws, or tusk unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} and has the versatile S trait; or a tail unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} and has the backswing trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the brawling weapon group.

Your features are mutable; you can select this feat at any level, and you can retrain into or out of this feat or change the type of attack you gain.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select a new attack from the options above.

Living Weapon (Horn).name: Living Weapon (Horn)
Living Weapon (Horn).description:
You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage} and has the agile and finesse traits; a horn, jaws, or tusk unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} and has the versatile S trait; or a tail unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} and has the backswing trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the brawling weapon group.

Your features are mutable; you can select this feat at any level, and you can retrain into or out of this feat or change the type of attack you gain.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select a new attack from the options above.

Living Weapon (Jaws).name: Living Weapon (Jaws)
Living Weapon (Jaws).description:
You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage} and has the agile and finesse traits; a horn, jaws, or tusk unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} and has the versatile S trait; or a tail unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} and has the backswing trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the brawling weapon group.

Your features are mutable; you can select this feat at any level, and you can retrain into or out of this feat or change the type of attack you gain.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select a new attack from the options above.

Living Weapon (Tail).name: Living Weapon (Tail)
Living Weapon (Tail).description:
You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage} and has the agile and finesse traits; a horn, jaws, or tusk unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} and has the versatile S trait; or a tail unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} and has the backswing trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the brawling weapon group.

Your features are mutable; you can select this feat at any level, and you can retrain into or out of this feat or change the type of attack you gain.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select a new attack from the options above.

Living Weapon (Tusk).name: Living Weapon (Tusk)
Living Weapon (Tusk).description:
You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage} and has the agile and finesse traits; a horn, jaws, or tusk unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} and has the versatile S trait; or a tail unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} and has the backswing trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the brawling weapon group.

Your features are mutable; you can select this feat at any level, and you can retrain into or out of this feat or change the type of attack you gain.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select a new attack from the options above.

Lizardfolk Lore.name: Lizardfolk Lore
Lizardfolk Lore.description: You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Iruxi Lore.

Loaner Spell.name: Loaner Spell
Loaner Spell.description:
During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day. The spell can be up to 3rd level. Your ally must be able to prepare and cast it, and the spell must have a Targets entry or an area. Your ally loses a spell slot of the corresponding spell level, and you gain the ability to cast the prepared spell once that day.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}, use your class DC for any saving throws required by the spell, and your class DC - 10 as a spell attack roll modifier.

Lobbed Attack.name: Lobbed Attack
Lobbed Attack.description:
Requirements You are Juggling a thrown weapon.

You make a thrown ranged Strike with the required weapon, using the weapon's normal range increment. This attack doesn't trigger reactions, and if the target has never seen you use this feat before, the target is flat-footed against this attack.

Locate Lawbreakers.name: Locate Lawbreakers
Locate Lawbreakers.description: Your pursuit is relentless, and you are able to magically locate stolen objects and outlaws. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate} as an innate spell of a tradition of your choice, which you can cast once per day. If you are a member of the Order of the Gate, when you reach 14th level, the spell is heightened to 5th level.

Lock On.name: 锁定 ock On
Lock On.description: 啊哈！你锁定了敌人的弱点，你的构装伙伴可以摧毁他了！当你锁定Lock On，指定一个你可以看见的敌人。如果你的下一个动作是指挥Command你的构装体，该构装体在针对指定敌人的攻击骰上获得+2环境加值，直到回合结束。如果你在指挥Command时使用2动作，加值改为+3环境加值，或+4环境加值，如果你在手艺Crafting上达到传奇。

Log Roll.name: Log Roll
Log Roll.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}

Requirements You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is flat-footed.

You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the adjacent creature's Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.

Long Tongue.name: Long Tongue
Long Tongue.description: You've learned to stretch your exceptionally long tongue beyond its original limits. When you use your tongue to deliver touch range spells or perform very simple Interact actions, you can do so at a distance that is 5 feet beyond your usual reach.

Long-Nosed Form.name: Long-Nosed Form
Long-Nosed Form.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WPz97m5FNlbLIQ6p]{Long-Nosed Form}

You can transform into a specific, curious-looking human form. This human form is the same age and body type as your tengu form and has roughly analogous physical traits, such as height, though your nose remains as long as your beak and your complexion has red undertones, no matter the skin color of your human form.

Using Long-Nosed Form counts as creating a disguise for the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} use of Deception. Due to your imperfect transformation, your transformation doesn't automatically defeat Perception DCs to determine whether you are human, though you may be able to explain away or hide your tengu traits.

You lose your beak unarmed Strike in your human form, as well as any other unarmed Strikes you gained from a tengu heritage or ancestry feat. You can remain in your human form indefinitely, and you can shift back to your tengu form by using this action again.

Look Again.name: Look Again
Look Again.description:
Frequency once per day

If your illusions or enchantments fail to ensnare the minds of others, you can cast them again. If your next action is to cast an innate enchantment or illusion spell and it fails to affect any targets, you do not lose the spell. You must use the same number of actions to recast the same spell on your following turn; if you can't, or choose not to, you waste that number of actions with no effect. After this second casting, you lose the spell whether it affected any targets or not. Look Again works only with spells that require targets and doesn't do anything if you cast a targeted spell but didn't select any targets.

Lore Seeker.name: Lore Seeker
Lore Seeker.description: You see what others don't, and you've developed magical tricks to find hidden truth. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} as innate spells, each once per day. If you could already cast spells, these spells are of the same tradition. Otherwise, they are arcane spells, you use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells.

Lorefinder.name: Lorefinder
Lorefinder.description: You know that fate sometimes conspires to keep dangerous knowledge or items from the eyes of those most able to understand them. You deny fate the ability to conceal truths from you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate} as an innate occult spell once per day. When you reach 14th level, this spell is heightened to 5th level.

Loremaster Dedication.name: Loremaster Dedication
Loremaster Dedication.description:
You've compiled a vast repository of information that touches on nearly every subject. You are trained in Loremaster Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, but on any topic.

If you have legendary proficiency in a skill used to Decipher Writing, you gain expert proficiency in Loremaster Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Loremaster Lore by any other means.

You can take feats in the loremaster's additional feats entry even if you don't meet the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.4ripp6EfdVpS0d60]{enigma muse} prerequisite.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uVXEZblPRuCyPRua]{Bardic Lore} class feat, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks with Bardic Lore.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the loremaster archetype.

Loremaster's Etude.name: 博学者练习曲 Loremaster's Etude
Loremaster's Etude.description: 你用魔法的力量解锁记忆，让他们更容易回想。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5Pc55FGGqVpIAJ62]{博学者练习曲 Loremaster's Etude} 博学者练习曲组曲法术。你聚能池的聚能点数提升1点。

Lost in the Crowd.name: Lost in the Crowd
Lost in the Crowd.description:
You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures and a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.aWOvmdaTK1jS3H72]{Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.CNnIS8jWVj00nPwF]{Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)}

Loud Singer.name: Loud Singer
Loud Singer.description: Staying on pitch, proper breath control, and remembering the words are all less important than the real measure of a good singer: volume! The range of your Goblin Song is increased to 60 feet, and you can target one additional enemy when you use it.

Loyal Empath.name: Loyal Empath
Loyal Empath.description: You have incredible empathy for your friends and family, and you have an innate timing for helping others in distress. You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} reaction to grant a bonus to another creature's Will saving throw. As usual for Aid, you need to prepare by using an action on your turn to encourage the creature to bravely withstand the effect.

Loyal Warhorse.name: 忠贞战骑 Loyal Warhorse
Loyal Warhorse.description: 你和你的坐骑亲密无间，彼此之间的忠诚牢不可破。你通过神圣盟友职业特性获得的坐骑现在是一只成年（Mature）动物伙伴。此外，你的坐骑绝不会攻击你，哪怕有什么魔法正强迫它这样做。

Lucky Break.name: Lucky Break
Lucky Break.description:
You catch yourself as you make a mistake. You can trigger @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} when you fail or critically fail on an Athletics or Acrobatics skill check, in addition to its normal trigger. When you do, you reroll the triggering skill check and use the better result.

This still counts against Cat's Luck's frequency, as normal.

Lucky Escape.name: Lucky Escape
Lucky Escape.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature targets you with an attack, even if you aren't aware of it.

Your enemy lies in wait, lines up the perfect shot, and pulls the trigger... then at just the right moment you duck down to notice something scrawled on the cobblestone in chalk, a shiny coin, or some other coincidental distraction, creating an opportunity for the attack to miss. The attacker must roll the attack twice and use the worse result.

Lucky Keepsake.name: Lucky Keepsake
Lucky Keepsake.description: You have a keepsake that grants you luck. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against spells and magical effects at all times, not just when you use Leshy Superstition. If you lose the keepsake, you lose the bonus until you designate a new keepsake, typically over the course of a week.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon

Extending your body to its limits, you attack an enemy that would normally be beyond your reach. Make a Strike with a melee weapon, increasing your reach by 5 feet for that Strike. If the weapon has the disarm, shove, or trip trait, you can use the corresponding action instead of a Strike.

Lunging Spellstrike.name: 突击性法术打击 Lunging Spellstrike
Lunging Spellstrike.description:
需求 你握持一柄木杖（staff）

你的法术解放了木杖的结构使其变得出乎意料的长，甚至将其撕裂成由魔法力量结合起来的碎片。

使用木杖进行一次法术打击，使用的法术不能是戏法或聚能法术。增长法杖触及范围，数值为5尺 x 每法术环级。

Lunging Stance.name: Lunging Stance
Lunging Stance.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon

Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies. While you are in this stance, you can use Attack of Opportunity against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a Lunge. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.

Magaambyan Attendant Dedication.name: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication
Magaambyan Attendant Dedication.description:
You devote much of your study to halcyon magic. You gain the ability to cast a single arcane or primal cantrip of your choice, (as is normal for cantrips, it is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level, rounded up). If you weren't already, you become trained in that tradition's spell DCs and spell attack rolls, with Intelligence as your spellcasting ability if you choose arcane or Wisdom as your spellcasting ability if you choose primal.

Regardless of whether you choose an arcane or primal cantrip, you also either become trained in Arcana or Nature, or an expert in one of those skills in which you were already trained.

When you gain this feat, choose to affiliate with the Cascade Bearers, Emerald Boughs, Rain-Scribes, Tempest-Sun Mages, or Uzunjati. This grants you additional feats available to only that branch.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat other than @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7fU6e3HIT4NvwLYa]{Halcyon Speaker Dedication} until you have gained two other feats from the Magaambyan Attendant or @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Qsmzm6w1ZNpHX7GD]{Halcyon Speaker} archetype.

Mage Hunter.name: Mage Hunter
Mage Hunter.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}.

You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit, you disrupt the spell.

Magic Arrow.name: Magic Arrow
Magic Arrow.description:
Frequency once per round

You imbue your ammunition with eldritch power. When you select this feat, choose three types of common magical ammunition of 4th level or lower from the Core Rulebookor this book. Your GM might allow you to choose from other types of magical ammunition, such as uncommon ammunition, or ammunition from other books.

When using Magic Arrow, you transform a non-magical arrow or bolt into a piece of ammunition of one type you chose. You must shoot the ammunition before the end of your turn or the magic dissipates. If the ammunition has an Activate entry, you still need to spend the required actions to activate the ammunition before shooting it.

When you use Magic Arrow, you can choose a type of magical ammunition that is typically not available to the type of ammunition you're using-for example, you can use @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.n5L7HE9H8jn8ftQy]{Climbing Bolt} on an arrow, even though that magical ammunition is normally only found on bolts.

Special You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select three additional types of ammunition as described above.

Magic Finder.name: Magic Finder
Magic Finder.description:
You've learned a few tricks to ensure you find every last magic item and interesting magical effect during your missions. You can cast detect magic and read aura as innate spells at will. You can also cast locate as an innate spell once per day, but only to locate magic items, not specific mundane objects or types of objects. If you could already cast spells, these spells are of the same tradition. Otherwise, they're arcane spells, you use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells.

When you cast detect magic or read aura from this feat on an item or creature under the effect of a magic aura spell or interact with an item under the effect of an item facade spell, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your check to disbelieve the illusion.

Magic Hands.name: Magic Hands
Magic Hands.description:
The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, making your mundane healing work as if by magic.

When you succeed at a Medicine check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, your action gains the divine trait and you heal the maximum amount for the 2d8 (or 4d8 on a critical success). If you have an ability that adds additional dice to your Treat Wounds, you still roll those normally.

Magic Hide.name: Magic Hide
Magic Hide.description: You can defend your companion in battle. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.u2uSeH6YSbK1ajTy]{Magic Hide} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Magic Rider.name: 魔法旅者 Magic Rider
Magic Rider.description:
你的族人使用魔法在遥远的世界间旅行，这些残留的魔力让你能够更方便地进行传送。

当你成为传送法术（teleportation spell）的目标，且该次传送不止传送1人时，该法术可以在正常限制之外影响1个额外的人，额外目标由施法者进行选择。

此外，当你是 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{传送术 Teleport} 法术的目标时，你和其他目标抵达的位置与目的地间的距离不会超过1英里，无论已经传送了多远的距离都是如此。

Magic Sense.name: 魔力视界 Magic Sense
Magic Sense.description:
你凭借字面意义上的第六感来感应你身边环境中的魔力。

你可以感知到魔法灵光的存在，就像是你持续在使用1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic} 一样。其效果只会侦测存在于你视野中的魔法。

当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索}，对于你视野中的东西，你获得3环 侦测魔法 detect magic 的增益（除搜索动作通常收益以外）。在你回合结束或开始时，你能够用一个自由动作（free action）打开或关上此感官。

Magic Sense (Magus).name: Magic Sense (Magus)
Magic Sense (Magus).description:
You have a literal sixth sense for ambient magic in your vicinity.

You can sense the presence of magic auras as though you were always using a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} spell. This detects magic in your field of vision only.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, you gain the benefits of a 3rd-level detect magic spell on things you see (in addition to the normal benefits of Seeking). You can turn this sense off and on with a free action at the start or the end of your turn.

Magic Warrior Aspect.name: Magic Warrior Aspect
Magic Warrior Aspect.description: You can alter your form to gain an aspect of the animal your mask represents. You gain the magic warrior aspect focus spell.

Magic Warrior Dedication.name: Magic Warrior Dedication
Magic Warrior Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.OmEG0nhQgeKnAUsn]{Magic Warrior}

Access You are from the Mwangi Expanse.

You have taken up a nameless mask and sworn the oath of the magic warriors. You become trained in your choice of Arcana or Nature and in Magic Warrior Lore; if you were already trained in the skill, you become an expert instead.

You hide your identity behind a mask representing an animal of your choice, corresponding to one of the general animal types in the animal form spell. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against pination effects, though sometimes refusing to remove your mask can cause issues in areas that don't respect or understand the magic warrior tradition.

Once you take this feat, if another creature ever learns your true face or name, you lose your abilities from this archetype. Close allies who knew of your decision to take the mask before your dedication don't break this taboo unless they tell someone else. To regain your abilities, you must discard your mask and obtain a new one of a different animal, then retrain Magic Warrior Dedication into a new Magic Warrior Dedication with your new mask. Your focus spells from the magic warrior archetype are the same tradition as your other spells (choose one if you have spells from multiple traditions).

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the magic warrior archetype.

Magic Warrior Transformation.name: Magic Warrior Transformation
Magic Warrior Transformation.description: You can transform fully into the animal your mask represents. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tp4K7mYDL5MRHvJc]{Magic Warrior Transformation} focus spell.

Magical Adaptation.name: Magical Adaptation
Magical Adaptation.description: When an obstacle bars your path, you pull a trick from your sleeve to overcome it. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pZTqGY1MLRjgKasV]{Darkvision}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Spider Climb}, and 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing} as innate primal spells, each once per day.

Magical Adept.name: Magical Adept
Magical Adept.description: Your eidolon gains more magic. Choose one 2nd-level spell and one 1st-level spell of your eidolon's tradition. Your eidolon can cast them each once per day as innate spells. At every even level after you take this feat, your eidolon can swap one of these innate spells for a new innate spell that's 2 or more levels lower than your highest-level spell slot.

Magical Crafting.name: 制作魔导具 Magical Crafting
Magical Crafting.description: 你可以制作魔法物品，但通常这需要你满足一些特定的先决条件（见本书第11章）。当你选择获得本专长时，你会同时获得所有物品等级（Item Level）不高于2级的常见（Common）魔法物品的设计图。

Magical Edification.name: Magical Edification
Magical Edification.description: You've learned those tidbits of magic that are most conducive to furthering your acquisition and transmission of knowledge. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{Message}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil} as innate occult cantrips.

Magical Master.name: Magical Master
Magical Master.description:
Your eidolon gains a bevy of lower-level spells. Choose an innate spell of your eidolon's tradition of each of the spell levels from 1 to 7 in which your eidolon doesn't currently have an innate spell from Magical Adept. Your eidolon can cast each once per day as innate spells.

You can swap these spells at every even level, but your eidolon can never know more than one spell of each spell level 1 through 7

Magical Resistance.name: Magical Resistance
Magical Resistance.description:
Your animating magic provides some defense. Choose one of the following energy damage types: cold, electricity, or sonic. You gain resistance 5 to that damage type.

Enhancement You tap deeper into your animating magic, and your resistances improve. Choose one of the following benefits: you gain resistance 5 to the remaining two damage types from the above list, or your chosen resistance increases to a value equal to 1 + half your level.

Magical Scholastics.name: Magical Scholastics
Magical Scholastics.description: While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura} as occult innate cantrips.

Magical Shorthand.name: 魔法熟稔 Magical Shorthand
Magical Shorthand.description: 你可以轻松地掌握新法术。当你在一项与你所施展的法术宗派对应的技能上拥有专家级熟练度时，你学习该宗派的法术只需要花费10分钟/每环的时间而非通常的1小时/每环。如果你没能成功的掌握一个法术，那么你可以在下次提升等级或是一周以后（取其先者）重新尝试学习。当你在相应技能上达到大师级时，学习法术只需要5分钟/环；当你在相应技能上达到大师级时，学习法术只需要1分钟/环。除此之外，你可以在休整期间学习和抄录新的法术，这个行动和使用休整期赚取收入行动相似，不过使用你所施展的法术宗派对应的技能进行检定，并将赚取收入的金额从你学习法新术的花费中减去。如果你赚取的收入大于或等于你学习新法术的花费，则你可以免费学习该法术。

Magical Trickster.name: Magical Trickster
Magical Trickster.description: Whether you're using magic items, wielding innate magic, or dabbling in spellcasting, you can sneak spells past your foes' defenses as easily as any blade. When you succeed at a spell attack roll against a flat-footed foe's AC and the spell deals damage, you can add your sneak attack damage to the damage roll. If your single spell leads to multiple separate damage rolls, apply your sneak attack damage only once per target.

Magical Understudy.name: Magical Understudy
Magical Understudy.description: Your eidolon evolves to cast spells. It gains the Cast a Spell activity and learns two cantrips of its tradition, which it can cast as innate spells.

Magpie Snatch.name: Magpie Snatch
Magpie Snatch.description: You move quickly, snatching a shiny item that catches your eye. Stride twice, and you can Interact to grab an unattended object at any point during your movement.

Magus Dedication.name: Magus Dedication
Magus Dedication.description:
You cast spells like a magus, gaining a spellbook with four common arcane cantrips of your choice. You gain the Cast a Spell activity. You can prepare two cantrips each day from your spellbook. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the magus archetype, add a spell of that level or lower to your spellbook. You're trained in arcane spell attack rolls and spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for magus archetype spells is Intelligence, and they are arcane magus spells. You become trained in Arcana; if you were already trained in Arcana, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You become trained in simple weapons.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the magus archetype.

Magus's Analysis.name: 魔战士分析 Magus's Analysis
Magus's Analysis.description: 根据你所知的生物战斗知识，你进行一次评估。尝试一次对生物的回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）检定。如果这轮你用打击（Strike）命中了生物，你的回忆知识检定获得+1环境加值。如果你检定成功，再充能（recharge）你的法术打击（Spellstrike）。你检定的目标在接下来1天暂时免疫（immune）魔战士分析。

Maiden's Mending.name: Maiden's Mending
Maiden's Mending.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You cast a non-cantrip occult spell or an innate spell from a changeling ancestry feat.

You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.FIgud5jqZgIjwkRE]{Effect: Maiden's Mending}

Major Lesson.name: Major Lesson
Major Lesson.description:
Your patron grants you even greater secrets. Choose a major, greater, or basic lesson from the list of witch lessons. You gain its associated hex, and your familiar learns the associated spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Special You can select this feat a second time if you're 14th level or higher, and a third time if you're 18th level or higher. Choose a different lesson each time.

Maker of Miracles.name: Maker of Miracles
Maker of Miracles.description: You are a conduit for truly deific power. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.

Makeshift Strike.name: Makeshift Strike
Makeshift Strike.description:
You quickly snatch up whatever's nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to pick up a nearby object you could use as an improvised weapon. It must be located at around your chest level, such as a mug on a table, rather than an object on the floor. You then either Strike or make an @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FSxugo3zTgRhW7Og]{Improvised Pummel} with the improvised weapon.

Malicious Bane.name: Malicious Bane
Malicious Bane.description: 不论你内心的具体善恶，你持有向敌人降下诅咒的能力。每日1次，你可以1环级神术内在法术的形式施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{绝望术 Bane} 。

Maneuvering Spell.name: Maneuvering Spell
Maneuvering Spell.description:
Trigger You begin to Cast a Spell that requires at least 2 actions to cast.

You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand}. This action can be before or after you Cast the Spell.

Manifold Edge.name: Manifold Edge
Manifold Edge.description: You've learned every possible edge to use against your foes. When you use Hunt Prey, you can gain a different hunter's edge benefit instead of the one you selected at 1st level.

Manifold Edge (Flurry).name: Manifold Edge (Flurry)
Manifold Edge (Flurry).description:
You've learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} you can gain a different hunter's edge benefit instead of the one you selected at 1st level.

This feat grants @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Flurry}.

Manifold Edge (Outwit).name: Manifold Edge (Outwit)
Manifold Edge (Outwit).description:
You've learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} you can gain a different hunter's edge benefit instead of the one you selected at 1st level.

This feat grants @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Outwit}.

Manifold Edge (Precision).name: Manifold Edge (Precision)
Manifold Edge (Precision).description:
You've learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} you can gain a different hunter's edge benefit instead of the one you selected at 1st level.

This feat grants @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precision}.

Manifold Modifications.name: 复式改修 Manifold Modifications
Manifold Modifications.description: 你运用聪明的变通思路改造你的大发明，你可以在不影响基础结构的情况下添加另一个初始改修。你的大发明从对应类型的列表中获得一个额外的初始改修。

Mantis Form.name: Mantis Form
Mantis Form.description: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bKDsmKVosexwJ80i]{Mantis Form} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by praying to Achaekek or researching your assigned kill.

Many Guises.name: Many Guises
Many Guises.description:
You can take on any number of mundane guises. Whenever you change your identity, instead of taking on your social or vigilante identity, you can become someone completely ordinary.

This identity isn't a specific individual-rather, you become a nondescript member of your ancestry, of any gender, with a neutral alignment and a mundane occupation such as common laborer, farmer, or peasant.

Spells and abilities detect you as if you were this ordinary identity, rather than either of your two real identities, unless they succeed at a counteract check against your Deception DC. You can't use either social abilities or vigilante abilities while in this identity.

Marid Magic.name: Marid Magic
Marid Magic.description: You channel the magic of marids. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist} each once per day as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

Marine Ally.name: Marine Ally
Marine Ally.description: You've befriended a sea creature, which becomes magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar. The type of creature is up to you, but one of its abilities must always be a swim Speed or the amphibious familiar ability.

Mariner's Fire.name: Mariner's Fire
Mariner's Fire.description: You conjure uncanny orbs of spiritual flame that float above or below the water's surface. You can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. You can cast this cantrip underwater.

Marsh Runner.name: Marsh Runner
Marsh Runner.description: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain. When you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} action, you can ignore difficult terrain caused by flooding, swamps, or quicksand. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} on narrow surfaces or uneven marshy ground, you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and if you roll a success on the Acrobatics check, you get a critical success instead.

Marshal Dedication.name: Marshal Dedication
Marshal Dedication.description:
You've combined your social skills and combat training to become a talented combat leader. Choose Diplomacy or Intimidation. You become trained in that skill or become an expert if you were already trained in it.

In addition, you're surrounded by a marshal's aura in a 10-foot emanation. Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the marshal archetype.

Martial Artist Dedication.name: Martial Artist Dedication
Martial Artist Dedication.description:
You have trained to use your fists as deadly weapons. The damage die for your fist unarmed attacks becomes [[/r 1d6]] instead of [[/r 1d4]]. You don't take the -2 circumstance penalty for making a lethal attack with your nonlethal unarmed attacks.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all unarmed attacks.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the martial artist archetype.

Martial Exercise.name: Martial Exercise
Martial Exercise.description: You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords. Choose one weapon group, such as hammer or sword. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with both simple and martial weapons of your chosen weapon group.

Martial Experience.name: 兵击经验 Martial Experience
Martial Experience.description:
你与手持格式武器的各种敌人交过手，这种经历让你理解了近乎所有武器的战斗技巧。

当你手持1件未受训的武器时，将你的等级视为它的熟练加值（proficiency bonus）。在11级时，你变为在所有武器上受训（trained）。

Martial Performance.name: 军乐演奏 Martial Performance
Martial Performance.description:
你的缪斯教导你比大多数吟游诗人都还多的武器，让你即使是使用最粗旷的工具，也能毫不费力的将表演融入战斗中。

你在所有军用武器上受训。如果你获得的诗人武器专家职业能力，你的军用武器熟练度提到至专家。

Martyr.name: Martyr
Martyr.description:
You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

If your next action is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} from your healing or harmful font to restore Hit Points to a single ally, you can channel your own vitality along with the spell. You lose [[/r 1d8]] Hit Points per level of the spell, which can't be reduced or mitigated in any way, and your ally regains an equal number of Hit Points.

Mask Familiar.name: Mask Familiar
Mask Familiar.description:
Your mask takes on a personality of its own, allowing it to serve as your familiar. Though you can still wear it as a mask, you can detach it from your face to grant it a bodily form of colored light that allows it to move around; usually, this is a miniature form of the animal the mask represents. Detaching or reattaching the familiar to transform it is a two-action activity. Even in mask form, the familiar can move around on its master's face and speaks in a distinct voice (if it can talk). It is easily recognized as more than a simple mask unless the familiar succeeds at a Deception check to Impersonate a mask. Other than its appearance and the fact that it can be worn, it functions as other familiars. Your mask familiar has access to the mask freeze familiar ability

Mask Freeze When in mask form, your familiar can hide its obvious supernatural qualities to pass as a simple, unassuming mask. It doesn't need to Impersonate to fool a passing glance, and it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to its Deception DC against an active observer Seeking or otherwise studying it.

Mask Of Fear.name: Mask Of Fear
Mask Of Fear.description:
Trigger You start your turn with the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

Requirements You're wearing your warmask.

Your warmask burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension. You remove the frightened condition. Your warmask is destroyed, and you can't reapply it until your next daily preparations.

Special You can use this free action even if you have a condition tied to the frightened condition that would normally prevent you from using a free action, such as “@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} as long as you're frightened” or “@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} as long as you're frightened.”

Mask Of Pain.name: Mask Of Pain
Mask Of Pain.description:
Trigger You succeed at a Demoralize check.

Requirements You're wearing your warmask.Your mask has grown into a manifestation of your pain, which you can release. The creature you successfully Demoralized takes [[/r {2d6}[mental] #Mask of Pain]]{2d6 mental damage}, or [[/r {4d6}[mental] #Mask of Pain]]{4d6 mental damage} if you're legendary in Intimidation. The target is then temporarily immune to additional damage from Mask of Pain for 24 hours.

Mask Of Power.name: Mask Of Power
Mask Of Power.description:
Your warmask sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power. During your daily preparations, choose @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}.

Until your next daily preparations, you can cast this spell as a 1st-level innate spell once per day; the spell's tradition is determined by the tradition tied to your warmask. You must be wearing your warmask to Cast the Spell.

Mask Of Rejection.name: Mask Of Rejection
Mask Of Rejection.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail a saving throw against an effect from your warmask's magical tradition.

Requirements You're wearing your warmask.

Your warmask projects a white-hot fury that attempts to vaporize the offending magic. You reroll the triggering check with a +2 circumstance bonus, but you must use the new result, even if it's worse than your first roll.

Masked Casting.name: Masked Casting
Masked Casting.description:
Requirements You are wearing your signifer's mask.

Trigger You begin Casting a Spell.

You harness the magical energy flowing through your eyeless mask to effortlessly protect you from visual effects. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UWdRX1VelipCzrCg]{Avert your Gaze}.

Master Alchemy.name: 大师炼金术 Master Alchemy
Master Alchemy.description: 你的高阶炼金术等级提升至7。超过12级后，每升1级都会使你的高阶炼金术等级提升1级。

Master Bard Spellcasting.name: 大师吟游诗人施法 Master Bard Spellcasting

Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting.name: Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting
Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting.description: You've learned the final truth of beast guns, making you a master in the magic they grant you. You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Master Captivator Spellcasting.name: Master Captivator Spellcasting
Master Captivator Spellcasting.description: You master the most powerful spells that enchant and deceive. You learn a 7th-level occult spell. At 18th level, you learn an 8th-level spell, and at 20th level, you learn a 9th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the enchantment or illusion school. You cast these spells as occult innate spells. You become a master with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

Master Cleric Spellcasting.name: 大师牧师施法 Master Cleric Spellcasting

Master Druid Spellcasting.name: 大师德鲁伊施法 Master Druid Spellcasting

Master Magus Spellcasting.name: Master Magus Spellcasting
Master Magus Spellcasting.description: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

Master Monster Hunter.name: Master Monster Hunter
Master Monster Hunter.description: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world. You can use Nature to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.eT1jXYvz2YH70Ovp]{Recall Knowledge} to identify any creature. In addition, you gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} (and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}, if you have it) on a success as well as a critical success.

Master Scroll Cache.name: Master Scroll Cache
Master Scroll Cache.description:
Your scroll collection is incredible, brimming with eldritch power, and you can prepare far more of them than an ordinary scroll trickster.

In addition to your daily scrolls from the Basic and Expert Scroll Caches, add a single scroll with a 6th-level spell. At 20th level, add a scroll with a 7th-level spell.

Master Siege Engineer.name: Master Siege Engineer
Master Siege Engineer.description: What you don't know about artillery isn't worth knowing and your mastery allows you to perform an impossible number of actions as part of a siege weapon's crew. You're permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. You can only use the extra action to Aim or Launch a siege weapon.

Master Sorcerer Spellcasting.name: 大师术士施法 Master Sorcerer Spellcasting

Master Spellcasting.name: Master Spellcasting
Master Spellcasting.description: You gain the master spellcasting archetype benefits.

Master Spotter.name: Master Spotter
Master Spotter.description: Your incredible perception and trusty enhanced visual gear allow you to see things others miss. Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

Master Spotter (Investigator).name: Master Spotter (Investigator)
Master Spotter (Investigator).description: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

Master Spotter (Ranger).name: 大师斥候 (游侠) Master Spotter (Ranger)
Master Spotter (Ranger).description: 你在察觉Perception中的熟练等级提升至大师。

Master Summoner.name: Master Summoner
Master Summoner.description: During daily preparations, you can designate one of your spell slots to become two summoning slots of the same spell level, from which you can cast only summoning or incarnate spells.

Master Summoning Spellcasting.name: Master Summoning Spellcasting
Master Summoning Spellcasting.description: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

Master Wizard Spellcasting.name: 大师法师施法 Master Wizard Spellcasting

Master of Many Styles.name: Master of Many Styles
Master of Many Styles.description:
Trigger Your turn begins

You move between stances in an unceasing dance. You use an action with the stance trait.

Master's Counterspell.name: Master's Counterspell
Master's Counterspell.description:
Trigger A creature Casts a Spell that you have prepared, and that spell was cast or created with a tradition of magic in which you have master proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs.

When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it. If you're a prepared caster, you can expend a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of a spell. If you're a spontaneous caster, you can expend a spell slot. The level of the prepared spell or spell slot must be at least as high as the triggering spell's level. You lose your prepared spell or spell slot as if you had Cast the Spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell, and you take a -2 penalty to your counteract check; for prepared casters, the GM might waive the penalty if the spell you're expending to counterspell is especially appropriate-such as countering with the same spell, or using a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold} to counteract a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}.

Masterful Companion.name: Masterful Companion
Masterful Companion.description:
Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}, your animal companion gains the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RVZC4wVy5B5W2OeS]{Masterful Hunter} benefit associated with your hunter's edge, rather than just your original hunter's edge benefit.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.4UNQfMrwfWirdwoV]{Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.iqvurepX0zyu9OlI]{Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Lt5iSfx8fxHSdYXz]{Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision}

Masterful Obfuscation.name: Masterful Obfuscation
Masterful Obfuscation.description: You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study. When you gain this feat, choose one skill with the Recall Knowledge action in which you have attained master proficiency. You can attempt to deceive others about the truth of facts and knowledge related to that skill-such as by pretending to know something that you don't, planting false information, or the like-using the Lie action of the Deception skill. When you Lie in this way, attempt your skill check using the skill you selected when you gained this feat instead of Deception, applying all bonuses or penalties related from the selected skill to the check. While it's easier to convince someone who knows nothing about your chosen false information, on a critical success, you can even convince someone who has heard something contradictory, unless they have reason to be certain from direct experience. For instance, you might say, "I know you may have heard to use silver weapons against vampires, but that's a misconception based on conflating them with werewolves. According to all credible scholars, cold iron will do the trick." Once a creature realizes you've used masterful obfuscation to Lie to them, either from a failed check or due to later discovering the falsehood, you can't use this feat against them again, as it relies on blind trust in your superior knowledge. However, you can still Lie to them normally.

Mastermind's Eye.name: Mastermind's Eye
Mastermind's Eye.description: When you succeed at identifying a creature using Recall Knowledge, that creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute. This feat serves as the rogue's mastermind racket for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Mature Animal Companion (Druid).name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
Mature Animal Companion (Druid).description: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion, which grants it additional capabilities. Your animal companion is better trained than most. During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command an Animal action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn that round to Stride or Strike.

Mature Animal Companion (Ranger).name: Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)
Mature Animal Companion (Ranger).description:
Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion and gaining additional capabilities. If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} action, your animal companion assaults the prey even without your orders.

During an encounter, even if you don't use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} action, your animal companion can still use 1 action that round on your turn to Stride toward or Strike your prey.

Mature Beastmaster Companion.name: Mature Beastmaster Companion
Mature Beastmaster Companion.description: All of your animal companions grow up, becoming mature animal companions and gaining additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to either Stride or Strike.

Mature Trained Companion.name: Mature Trained Companion
Mature Trained Companion.description: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to expert instead of one of the three skill increases for mature. It gains the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.CrUPaPlsxy2bswaT]{Mesmerizing Performance} advanced maneuver, rather than the normal advanced maneuver for its type.

Mauler Dedication.name: Mauler Dedication
Mauler Dedication.description:
