You specialize in weapons that require two hands. You become trained in all simple and martial melee weapons that require two hands to wield or have the two-hand trait.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in these weapons. If you are at least an expert in such a weapon, you gain access to the critical specialization effect with that weapon.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the mauler archetype.

Medic Dedication.name: Medic Dedication
Medic Dedication.description:
You become an expert in Medicine.

When you succeed with Battle Medicine or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, the target regains 5 additional HP at DC 20, 10 HP at DC 30, or 15 HP at DC 40.

Once per day, you can use Battle Medicine on a creature that's temporarily immune. If you're a master in Medicine, you can do so once per hour.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the medicarchetype.

Medical Researcher.name: Medical Researcher
Medical Researcher.description: Kassi has taught you not only how to apply medicines with your medical skills but how to craft them as well. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} healer's kits, vaccines, addiction suppressants, antidotes, antiplagues, elixirs of life, or other non-magical medical or healing items, you can use Medicine instead of Crafting.

Meditative Focus.name: Meditative Focus
Meditative Focus.description: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Meditative Wellspring.name: Meditative Wellspring
Meditative Wellspring.description: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Medusa's Wrath.name: Medusa's Wrath
Medusa's Wrath.description: You learn a monstrous ki technique that infuses your blows with the petrifying power of a medusa's gaze. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wTYxxYJWN348oV15]{Medusa's Wrath} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Mega Bomb.name: 超能炸弹 Mega Bomb
Mega Bomb.description:
需求 你持有一枚你制作的灌注炼金炸弹，它的等级至少比你的高阶炼金术等级低3级。

你将一种超乎想象的强力添加剂加入你所持有的炸弹中，就此创造出了超能炸弹，这将会大幅提升这枚炸弹的爆炸范围和威力。

你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact} 动作投掷这枚超能炸弹，而不是使用打击（Strike），你也不需要进行攻击骰。

超能炸弹以你周围60尺内的某一点为中心，影响30尺爆炸半径内的所有生物。这枚炸弹会像每个生物都是主要目标一般对其造成伤害，并且它们需要进行一个基础反射豁免（Basic Reflex save）。一旦在豁免中失败，生物就会承受所有只影响主要目标的额外效果（例如瓶装闪电造成的措手不及）。区域内的所有目标都会如同主要目标一般受到溅射伤害，哪怕原本的溅射效果并不会影响这么大的范围。

如果你在制造一枚超能炸弹后的下一个动作不是通过交互动作将其投掷出去的话，这枚超能炸弹就会变质并失去所有的效果。

Megaton Strike.name: 百万吨强击 Megaton Strike
Megaton Strike.description:
你启动了器械，爆炸，和其他大发明的隐藏机制以进行强力的攻击。你进行一次打击Strike，造成1个额外的武器伤害骰。如果你至少有10级，增加到2个额外骰，如果你至少有18级，增加到3个额外骰。你进行打击Strike的类型由你的大发明决定。

  • 护甲 Armor 你使用近战无武装攻击或一把近战武器进行打击Strike。为了使用近战武器进行，你必须在进行每日准备时，提前通过一种奇怪的机械准备好这把武器。
  • 构装体 Construct 你的构装体大发明进行打击Strike。
  • 武器 Weapon 你使用你的武器大发明进行打击Strike。

不稳定功能 你冒着大发明破损的风险，在打击Strike中追加更多的力量。在百万吨强击Megaton Strike中添加不稳定特征。该打击造成另一个额外的伤害骰，4级时总共造成2个额外骰，10级3个，18级4个。

特殊 如果你的大发明是仆从，它而非你可以使用该动作。

Megavolt.name: 百万伏特 Megavolt
Megavolt.description:
你从大发明中放出闪电。 以你的大发明为起点的 @Template[type:line|distance:20] 中的生物承受 [[/r {3d4}[electricity]]]{3d4电击伤害}，基础反射豁免DC为你的职业DC。在8级和之后的每2级，电击伤害提升1d4。

不稳定功能 你加上更强的电压，将电能过载。在百万伏特Megavolt上加上不稳定特征。区域变成 @Template[type:line|distance:60] ，伤害骰从d4提升至d12。如果你有突破性大发明职业特性，当你使用不稳定百万伏特Megavolt时，你可以选择60尺或 @Template[type:line|distance:90] ；如果你有革命性大发明职业特性，你可以选择60尺，90尺或 @Template[type:line|distance:120]。

特殊 如果你的大发明是仆从，它而非你可以使用该动作。

Meld into Eidolon.name: Meld into Eidolon
Meld into Eidolon.description:
Your physical form can combine with that of your eidolon, granting benefits but limiting your capabilities.

You Manifest your Eidolon, but instead of summoning it into an adjacent open space, you become it. While Manifested in this way, you use its statistics, and you can't act except to direct it to use Manifest an Eidolon to unmanifest it.

Since you can't act, you can't Cast Spells, activate or benefit from magic items that normally benefit you and not your eidolon, perform actions that have the tandem trait, or use other abilities that require you, and not the eidolon, to act.

You can't be separately targeted while you are melded into it. When you reach 0 HP, your eidolon unmanifests, leaving your body behind, unconscious and dying.

Melodious Spell.name: 旋律法术 Melodious Spell
Melodious Spell.description: 你可以暗中将施法编织进表演当中，如果你使用的下一个动作为施展法术，尝试一次对抗所有观察者察觉DC的表演检定。如果你的表演检定成功对抗了某一观察者的察觉DC，该观察者不会注意到你正在施展法术，即使通常该法术拥有可以感知的明显效果也一样，且语音、姿势和材料成分都被极端的掩盖了。你将这些都隐藏在通常的表演当中。这只能掩盖法术的施法动作和表现而非效果，因此观察者还是会看到射出的射线或者你消失。

Menacing Prowess.name: Menacing Prowess
Menacing Prowess.description: Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty. When you Demoralize, you can target up to 2 creatures within 30 feet of you at once. If you are a master of Intimidation, you can Demoralize up to 4 creatures at once; if you're legendary, you can Demoralize up to 8 creatures at once.

Merciful Elixir.name: 慈悲灵药 Merciful Elixir
Merciful Elixir.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发条件 你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{高速炼金 Quick Alchemy} 制作了一份 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{生命灵药Elixir of Life} ，这份生命灵药至少比你的高阶炼金术等级低2级。

你将一种特殊的添加剂混合至你的灵药中，让它能够抚慰饮用者的身心。

这份生命灵药会尝试反制一个恐惧效果或一个会导致饮用者陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} 状态的效果。使用该物品的等级以及等同于你职业DC-10的反制调整值。

Merciless Rend.name: Merciless Rend
Merciless Rend.description:
Requirements Your eidolon hit the same enemy with two consecutive Strikes with its secondary attack this turn and dealt slashing damage with both.

Your eidolon rends its foes. It automatically deals the damage from its secondary attack to the enemy.

Mercy.name: 救济 Mercy
Mercy.description:
你的接触将解除恐惧并恢复行动力。

如果你的下一个动作是施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands}，那么在给予圣疗原本效果的同时，你还能够尝试反制（Counteract）一个恐惧效果或一个会导致目标陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}的效果。

Mesmerizing Gaze.name: Mesmerizing Gaze
Mesmerizing Gaze.description:
When you meet someone's gaze, they are unable to look away.

Choose one target creature. That creature must succeed at a Will save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} until the end of your next turn; the DC for this save is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the creature succeeds at its save or its fascination ends due to a hostile action, it becomes temporarily immune to your Mesmerizing Gaze for 1 day.

When you select this feat, it gains either the arcane or occult trait; once you make this choice, you can't change it.

Metabolize Element.name: Metabolize Element
Metabolize Element.description:
Trigger You take damage from a foe's spell or magical ability with the air, earth, fire, or water trait.

You rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition until the end of your next turn. You can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.

Metal-veined Strikes.name: Metal-veined Strikes
Metal-veined Strikes.description: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen. Choose either cold iron or silver. Your unarmed attacks are treated as the chosen type of metal.

Metamagic Channel.name: Metamagic Channel
Metamagic Channel.description:
Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

Use 1 metamagic action that you can perform that normally takes 1 action and can be applied to the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell. If you use it in this way, its effects apply only to a harm or heal spell.

Metamagic Mastery.name: 超魔宗师 Metamagic Mastery
Metamagic Mastery.description: 改变妳的法术不会比正常施放他们来的久。妳能以自由动作使用需要一个动作的超魔专长。

Meteoric Spellstrike.name: 贯穿性法术打击 Meteoric Spellstrike
Meteoric Spellstrike.description:
需求 你握持一件远程（ranged）或投掷（thrown）武器，或者具有远程无武装攻击（ranged unarmed attack）

一条能量轨迹从你的目标流出返回到你。对在远程武器或远程无武装攻击第一射程增量（range increment）内的目标，使用远程武器或远程无武装攻击进行一次法术打击。你用于法术打击所释放的法术不能是戏法或聚能法术。在你和目标连线上的每个生物，除了你和目标，受到数值等同于两倍法术环击的伤害。根据奥术奔涌描述决定伤害类型。

Methodical Debilitations.name: Methodical Debilitations
Methodical Debilitations.description:
You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy's tactical advantages. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

  • Debilitation The target can't flank other creatures, and it can't provide flanking for its allies.
  • Debilitation The target doesn't gain a circumstance bonus to AC from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raising a Shield}, lesser cover, or standard cover; it gains only a +2 circumstance bonus to AC from greater cover or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Taking Cover}.

Mighty Bulwark.name: Mighty Bulwark
Mighty Bulwark.description: Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers. Your bonus from the bulwark armor trait increases from +3 to +4, and it applies on all Reflex saves, not just damaging Reflex saves.

Mighty Dragon Shape.name: Mighty Dragon Shape
Mighty Dragon Shape.description: You've practiced and increased your draconic might, allowing you to take your draconic form more often. You can use Shape of the Dragon once per hour instead of once per day.

Mighty Wings.name: Mighty Wings
Mighty Wings.description: Your dragon wings are now a permanent part of your body, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. If you spend 1 Focus Point to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}, your fly Speed increases to 90 feet for the duration, unless your Speed is faster, and you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws} for the duration.

Mimic Protections.name: Mimic Protections
Mimic Protections.description: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} on a foe within 100 feet, you gain resistance 10 to all damage types that target has resistance or immunity to for as long as the foe remains within 100 feet.

Mindblank Mutagen.name: 空白思维突变药剂 Mindblank Mutagen
Mindblank Mutagen.description:
通过对宁静突变药剂（Serene mutagen）的公式进行一些微小的调整，你能从中获取精神防护。

当你处于 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.bOPQDM54W8ZDoULY]{宁静突变药剂 Serene Mutagen} 的影响下时，不高于九级的侦测（Detection），揭示（Revelation），探知（Scrying）效果在探测你或者你的所有物及灵光时，得到的只会是一片空白。

举例而言，侦测魔法（Detect magic）仍然可以侦测到区域内的其他魔法，但无法侦测到你身上的魔法。

Miniaturize.name: Miniaturize
Miniaturize.description: Your eidolon can shrink even further. When using Shrink Down, your eidolon can reduce its size to Tiny

Minion Guise.name: Minion Guise
Minion Guise.description:
When you are in your social identity, you can also grant a social identity to an animal companion, familiar, or other minion you gained from a class feature.

When changing to your social identity, you also change your minion's appearance to that of a socially acceptable creature of its type, such as grooming a wolf to appear as a large dog or disguising a familiar to appear as an exotic pet.

Commanding your minion to use unusual magical or combat abilities it gained from your class features or feats while in this social identity risks exposing your vigilante identity.

Minor Magic.name: Minor Magic
Minor Magic.description: You've dabbled in minor magical abilities. Choose arcane, divine, occult, or primal magic, and gain two cantrips from the common cantrips that are available in that tradition. Your key spellcasting ability is Charisma, and you're trained in spell attack rolls and DCs for the tradition of your chosen cantrips..

Miracle Worker.name: 奇迹缔造者 Miracle Worker
Miracle Worker.description:
频率 每10分钟一次

你对炼金术的掌握让你能够扭转新近产生的死亡。你能够将一瓶 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qK964kZz1ALcysOa]{真实生命灵药 True Elixir of Life} 给予一个死亡不超过2轮的生物。你这样做之后，这名生物会立即以生命值为1的状态重获生命并且获得受伤（Wounded）1。

Miraculous Flight.name: Miraculous Flight
Miraculous Flight.description: With superior engineering and magical application, you have freed your signature vehicle from the bonds of gravity, allowing it to soar through the sky like a dragon. The vehicle gains magical propulsion and a fly Speed equal to its fastest current Speed. If your signature vehicle already had a fly Speed, reduce the distance the vehicle needs to make a 90-degree turn to half the usual length (typically half the length of the vehicle).

Miraculous Possibility.name: Miraculous Possibility
Miraculous Possibility.description:
Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

Once during your daily preparations, you can use a spell slot to hold sheer divine potential, rather than using it to prepare a spell. You can use this spell slot to cast any spell you know from the divine spell list that's at least 2 levels lower than the slot you designate. The spell acts in all ways as a spell of 2 levels lower.

You don't have any particular spell prepared in that slot until you cast it.

Miresoul.name: Miresoul
Miresoul.description: You have a connection to the muddier denizens of the Plane of Earth from its border with the Plane of Water, and your elemental lineage manifests as clay or mud, reflecting that bond. Your body's mudlike quality makes it easy for you to compress and squeeze yourself through smaller areas. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics. If you would automatically become trained in Acrobatics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3G8xUlgCjRmRJNfP]{Quick Squeeze} skill feat.

Mirror Shield.name: Mirror Shield
Mirror Shield.description:
Trigger An opponent casting a spell that targets you critically fails a spell attack roll against your AC.

Requirements You have a shield raised

You reflect the spell back against the triggering opponent. Make a ranged attack against the triggering creature using your highest proficiency with a ranged weapon. If you can cast spells, you can make a spell attack roll instead. If you succeed, your opponent takes the effects of a successful spell attack roll for their own spell (or the effects of a critical success if your attack roll was a critical success).

Mischievous Tail.name: Mischievous Tail
Mischievous Tail.description: Your tail can bedevil your foes. You can Disarm and Trip creatures with your tail, even if you don't have a free hand. All restrictions of Skillful Tail otherwise continue to apply. If you have Smashing Tail, your tail unarmed attack gains the disarm and trip traits.

Mist Child.name: Mist Child
Mist Child.description: You blend in with unnatural subtlety. When you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, increase the DC of the flat check to target you to 6 if you're concealed or 12 if you're hidden.

Mist Strider.name: Mist Strider
Mist Strider.description: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Q8fdMjZ2Wv3FawOI]{Water Strider}, you can walk on air. You can ascend and descend at a maximum of a 45-degree angle. You still fall at the end of your movement if you don't end on a surface that can support you, as normal for Water Strider.

Mistsoul.name: Mistsoul
Mistsoul.description: You have a connection to vaporous forms of water, such as fog and mist. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.I9k9qe4gOT8UVK4e]{Mist Blending} reaction.

Mixed Maneuver.name: Mixed Maneuver
Mixed Maneuver.description: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole. Choose any two of @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}. Attempt both of the attacks you chose against the same or different creatures, but don't apply the multiple attack penalty until after resolving both attacks.

Mobile Finisher.name: Mobile Finisher
Mobile Finisher.description:
You attack in motion. Stride and then Strike.

You can use Mobile Finisher while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Mobile Magical Combat.name: Mobile Magical Combat
Mobile Magical Combat.description:
Requirements You're wielding a melee weapon and have Cast a Spell requiring at least 1 action this turn.

You dart around the battlefield, casting spells while you carefully make melee attacks with your weapon. Stride once. If you end your movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can make a melee Strike against that enemy. You can use Mobile Magical Combat while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Mobile Shot Stance.name: Mobile Shot Stance
Mobile Shot Stance.description:
Your shots become nimble and deadly. While you're in this stance, your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O2MwufzEHbuThoGr]{Attack of Opportunity}, you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: You move in a way that denies your enemies the opportunity to retaliate. When you take a Stride action to move half your Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions. You can use Mobility when Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Modular Dynamo.name: Modular Dynamo
Modular Dynamo.description:
Your dynamo has modular configurations, allowing you to swap between various different possibilities with ease in order to adapt to various situations in combat. Your dynamo attack gains the modular trait, as well as one of the following configurations of your choice: power driver ([[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage}; shove), percussive striker ([[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 bludgeoning damage}; agile, finesse), rotating sickle ([[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 slashing damage}; trip), or entangling barbs ([[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}; grapple). If you have a manually controlled dynamo, these damage dice increase by 1 size, as usual, and you can also choose the extendable baton ([[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 bludgeoning damage}; finesse, reach), which has the damage increase already factored in.

When you use an Interact action to switch configurations using the modular trait, you switch between the initial configuration of dynamo you chose with the Sterling Dynamo Dedication and the new configuration you chose with Modular Dynamo.

Special You can select this feat multiple times. Each time, you choose another configuration and add it to the list of options you can choose when you use an Interact action with the modular trait.

Moment of Clarity.name: Moment of Clarity
Moment of Clarity.description: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly. Until the end of this turn, you can use actions with the concentrate trait even if those actions don't have the rage trait.

Monastic Archer Stance.name: Monastic Archer Stance
Monastic Archer Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored and wielding a longbow, shortbow, or a bow with the monk trait.

You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.1dxD3xsTzak6GNj5]{Stance: Monastic Archer Stance}

Special When you select this feat, you become trained in the longbow, shortbow, and any simple and martial bows with the monk trait. If you gain the expert strikes class feature, your proficiency rank for these weapons increases to expert, and if you gain the master strikes class feature, your proficiency rank for these weapons increases to master.

Monastic Weaponry.name: Monastic Weaponry
Monastic Weaponry.description: You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school. You gain access to uncommon weapons that have the monk trait and become trained in simple and martial monk weapons. When your proficiency rank for unarmed attacks increases to expert or master, your proficiency rank for these weapons increases to expert or master as well. You can use melee monk weapons with any of your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks, though not if the feat or ability requires you to use a single specific type of attack, such as Crane Stance.

Monk Dedication.name: 武僧入门 Monk Dedication
Monk Dedication.description:
你在无武装攻击中受训，并获得 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.SB8UJ8rZmvbcBweJ]{强力拳 Powerful Fist} 职业特性。你在特技Acrobatics或运动Athletics中选择一个受训。如果你已经受训于上述两个技能，你在另一个你自选的技能中受训。你在武僧的职业DC中受训。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从武僧变体中获得了其他两个专长。

Monk Moves.name: 武僧步法 Monk Moves
Monk Moves.description: 在你未穿戴盔甲时，你的速度Speed获得+10尺状态加值。

Monk Resiliency.name: 武僧韧性 Monk Resiliency
Monk Resiliency.description: 你获得的每个武僧的变体职业专长都会给予你3点额外生命值。如果你继续选择武僧变体职业专长，你就会继续按这种方式获得额外生命值。

Monk's Flurry.name: 武僧连击 Monk's Flurry
Monk's Flurry.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{疾风连击 Flurry of Blows} 动作。

Monster Hunter.name: Monster Hunter
Monster Hunter.description:
You swiftly assess your prey and apply what you know. As part of the action used to Hunt your Prey, you can attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.eT1jXYvz2YH70Ovp]{Recall Knowledge} about your prey.

When you critically succeed at identifying your hunted prey with Recall Knowledge, you note a weakness in the creature's defenses. You and allies you tell gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You can give bonuses from Monster Hunter only once per day against a particular creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.W2tWq0gdAcnoz2MO]{Effect: Monster Hunter}

Monster Warden.name: Monster Warden
Monster Warden.description:
You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey. When you grant bonuses from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}, you and your allies also each gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.nlaxROgSSLVHZ1hx]{Effect: Monster Warden}

Monstrosity Shape.name: Monstrosity Shape
Monstrosity Shape.description: You can transform into a powerful magical creature. Add the purple worm and sea serpent forms listed in monstrosity form to your wild shape list. If you have Soaring Shape, also add the phoenix form to your wild shape list.

Monstrous Peacemaker.name: 恐怖调停者 Monstrous Peacemaker
Monstrous Peacemaker.description: 你兽人与人类的双重人性给予了你独特的视角，让你可以弥合人类与世界上很多被视为怪物的智慧生物之间的鸿沟。你针对非类人智慧生物和在人类社会边缘化的类人生物（由GM决定，但通常至少包括巨人，地精，狗头人和兽人）的交涉检定上获得+1环境加值。你还可以在对这些生物察言观色的察觉检定上获得这些加值。

Moon May.name: Moon May
Moon May.description: Your mother was a moon hag, a handmaiden of Groetus, and you have a single scarlet eye and a sliver of her supernal foresight. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} as an occult innate cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Morrigna's Spider Affinity.name: Morrigna's Spider Affinity
Morrigna's Spider Affinity.description: Much like morrignas, you feel an affinity for spiders. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{Animal Messenger (spiders only)}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals (spiders only)}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Spider Climb} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Mortal Healing.name: Mortal Healing
Mortal Healing.description: You grant greater healing when the gods don't interfere. When you roll a success to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} for a creature that hasn't regained Hit Points from divine magic in the past 24 hours, you get a critical success on your check instead and restore the corresponding amount of Hit Points.

Mortification.name: Mortification
Mortification.description: Your reckonings have prepared your body for physical punishment. Choose bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, based on the nature of your physical reckonings. You gain resistance to the chosen damage type equal to your number of class feats from the Hellknight Armiger archetype and other Hellknight archetypes.

Mother's Mindfulness.name: Mother's Mindfulness
Mother's Mindfulness.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger An adjacent ally is hit by an attack.

You have the protective instinct your own mother lacks and will gladly suffer in another's place. You interpose yourself in the attack's path. You become the target of the triggering attack and are automatically hit by the attack (or critically hit if the ally was critically hit), suffering the full effects in your ally's place.

Mountain Quake.name: Mountain Quake
Mountain Quake.description:
Trigger You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you. Creatures on the ground within a 20-foot emanation take damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 0), which they can resist with a basic Fortitude save. On a failure, they also fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

After you use this action, you can't use it again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Special If you have this feat, the Dexterity modifier cap to your AC while using Mountain Stance increases from +1 to +2.

@Compendium[pf2e.pf2e-macros.4nEbRlo2cB9KkK7T]{Toggle Mountain Stance}

Mountain Stance.name: Mountain Stance
Mountain Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored and touching the ground

You enter the stance of an implacable mountain-a technique first created by dwarven monks-allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche and block blows with your garments.

The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. You have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don't add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dDIPA1WE9ESF67EB]{Clothing (Explorer's)}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}, and bracers of armor.

@Compendium[pf2e.pf2e-macros.4nEbRlo2cB9KkK7T]{Toggle Mountain Stance}

Mountain Stronghold.name: Mountain Stronghold
Mountain Stronghold.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Special If you have this feat, the Dexterity modifier cap to your AC while you're in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance} increases from +0 to +1.

@Compendium[pf2e.pf2e-macros.4nEbRlo2cB9KkK7T]{Toggle Mountain Stance}

Mountain's Stoutness.name: Mountain's Stoutness
Mountain's Stoutness.description:
Your hardiness lets you withstand more punishment than most before going down. Increase your maximum Hit Points by your level. When you have the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, the DC of your recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying value (instead of 10 + your dying value).

If you also have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AmP0qu7c5dlBSath]{Toughness} feat, the Hit Points gained from it and this feat are cumulative, and the DC of your recovery checks is equal to 6 + your dying value.

Mounted Shield.name: Mounted Shield
Mounted Shield.description:
You've trained with your shield to defend both yourself and your mount. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} while mounted, both you and your mount gain the shield's circumstance bonus to AC.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction, you can use it in response to your mount taking damage, as long as you're riding your mount. If you do, the shield prevents your mount from taking damage instead of preventing you from taking damage, following the normal rules for Shield Block.

Mug.name: Mug
Mug.description: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process. Make a melee Strike against an adjacent foe. If you hit and deal sneak attack damage, you can also attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} from the target, even if the target is in combat.

Multifarious Muse.name: 多样缪斯 Multifarious Muse
Multifarious Muse.description:
你的缪斯并不唯一。选择一种自身以外的缪斯，你获得一个需求该缪斯的一级专长，并且你的缪斯当前也视为一种该类型的缪斯，让你可以选择其他需要该缪斯作为先决条件的专长。你不会获得所选缪斯带来的任何其他效果。

特殊 你可以多次选择这一专长，每次都必须选择一个与当前类型不同的缪斯类型。

Multilingual.name: 多语言 Multilingual
Multilingual.description:
你很容易学习新的语言。你现在掌握了两门新的语言，它们可以是任何常见（Common），罕见（Uncommon）或是任何你可以接触到的语言。当你在社群技能上达到大师级熟练度和传奇级熟练度时，你再额外获得一门新的语言。

特殊 你可以多次选择本专长。每次选择本专长时，你都会获得额外的语言。

Multilingual Cipher.name: 多语言暗码 Multilingual Cipher
Multilingual Cipher.description:
你能用多重语言来创造或破译密码。你在 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{解译文书 Decipher Writing}时获得+1环境加值。

若其他生物尝试解译文书来破译你编写的密码，则会受到-2环境减值，除非他懂得你在写下文字时所使用的所有语言。

Multishot Stance.name: Multishot Stance
Multishot Stance.description:
You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PwcmmJOLY8C9JHau]{Double Shot} is reduced to -1, or -2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.l4QUaedYofnfXig0]{Stance: Multishot Stance}

Multitalented.name: 多才多艺 Multitalented
Multitalented.description: 你已经学会了如何轻松的把你的注意力分散在多个职业上你会获得1个2级兼职入门专长（要了解更多兼职变体，见219页），即使你通常无法选择另外一个入门专长直到你从当前变体中获得更多专长。如果你半精灵，你无需满足该专长的属性值前置。

Munitions Crafter.name: Munitions Crafter
Munitions Crafter.description:
Bullets and bombs can be scarce in some parts, so you've learned to make your own. You become trained in Crafting and gain the alchemist's infused reagents class feature, gaining a number of reagents each day equal to your level. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} feat and four additional formulas for 1st-level alchemical items.

You gain infused reagents (a pool of reagents usable to make alchemical items) and advanced alchemy (allowing you to make alchemical items during your daily preparations without the normal cost or time expenditure). You gain batches of infused reagents per day equal to your level, which you can use to create only bombs or alchemical ammunition. Your advanced alchemy level for creating these is 1 and doesn't increase on its own. If you use a batch of infused reagents to create basic level-0 ammunition such as black powder cartridges or black powder doses, you produce 10 rounds of ammunition.

Munitions Machinist.name: Munitions Machinist
Munitions Machinist.description: You're particularly adept at crafting ammunition and bombs. Your advanced alchemy level for ammunition and bombs increases to your level – 3.

Murderer's Circle.name: Murderer's Circle
Murderer's Circle.description: You Strike a target within reach and then Step to any other open space adjacent to that target. Your target is then @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your next Strike this turn.

Murksight.name: Murksight
Murksight.description: Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow. You don't take circumstance penalties to ranged attacks or Perception checks caused by non-magical precipitation, and your targeted attacks don't require a flat check to succeed against a target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} only by such effects.

Musetouched.name: Musetouched
Musetouched.description:
Your blood sings with the liberating power of the azatas, living embodiments of freedom from the wild realm of Elysium.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}. When you roll a critical failure on a check to Escape, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Mutable Familiar.name: Mutable Familiar
Mutable Familiar.description:
Your familiar's supernatural spirit has outgrown its corporeal body. You can conduct a special 10-minute activity to reselect certain familiar abilities, switching one or more of the following abilities for other abilities on this list: amphibious, burrower, climber, darkvision, fast movement, manual dexterity, resistance, and scent.

You can reselect only familiar abilities you would normally be able to reselect each day, not required familiar abilities for your familiar. You can't remove an ability that is required for another ability your familiar has (for instance, you can't remove manual dexterity if the familiar has lab assistant).

Mutate Weapon.name: Mutate Weapon
Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Myriad Forms.name: 不拘一型 Myriad Forms
Myriad Forms.description: 经过一段自我探索，你找出了新的型态。你得到除了自身传承之外另一个传承的变化型态，将之加入化形能力的选项之中。

Mysterious Breadth.name: Mysterious Breadth
Mysterious Breadth.description: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more divine spells each day. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and the number of spell slots you gain from oracle archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest oracle spell slots.

Mysterious Repertoire.name: Mysterious Repertoire
Mysterious Repertoire.description:
Your mystery holds unknowable depths of magic not always associated with the divine. You can have one spell in your spell repertoire not on the divine spell list, in addition to spells you've added to your spell list from feats like Divine Access. You cast that spell as a divine spell.

You can swap which spell you add and from which tradition as you could any other oracle spell, but you can't use this feat to have more than one spell from another tradition in your spell repertoire at the same time.

Mystery Conduit.name: Mystery Conduit
Mystery Conduit.description:
The power of your mystery enables you to cast more than just revelation spells.

When you cast a spell of 5th level or lower that has no duration, instead of spending a spell slot, you can advance the effects of your oracular curse in the same manner as when you cast a revelation spell. A spell cast in this way gains the cursebound trait.

Named Artillery.name: Named Artillery
Named Artillery.description:
It is a tradition among artillerists to name the siege weapon most important to them and closest to their heart-much as a sailor on a ship, the weapon is their livelihood. You've gone a step further, and you always make sure that your named artillery has the best possible maintenance and upkeep. You can spend a full day adjusting and working on a single siege weapon to designate it as your named artillery. The siege weapon you designated as your named artillery gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, Fortitude saves, and Reflex saves as well as additional Hit Points equal to twice your level.

During your daily preparations, you must spend at least one hour on maintenance to service your named artillery. If you fail to do so, or if you spend a full day designating a new piece of named artillery, the previous named artillery loses any benefits from this feat. Only one artillerist can designate a particular siege weapon as their named artillery, even if several artillerists are serving on the same siege weapon's crew (though it's typically more efficient for a group with several artillerists to divide them up, assigning one to each siege weapon).

Nameless Anonymity.name: Nameless Anonymity
Nameless Anonymity.description: Your mask protects you further from divination. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} on yourself, heightened to the highest level of spell you can cast; the spell ends immediately if your mask is removed for even a moment. The spell is of the same tradition as your focus spells.

Nanite Shroud.name: Nanite Shroud
Nanite Shroud.description:
Frequency once per day

Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud.

You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} for a number of rounds equal to half your level. You can't use this concealment to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, as normal for concealment that makes your position obvious.

While Nanite Shroud is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.

Nanite Surge.name: Nanite Surge
Nanite Surge.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You attempt a skill check requiring three actions or fewer.

You stimulate your nanites, forcing your body to temporarily increase its efficiency. You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check. In addition, your circuitry glows, lighting a 10-foot emanation with dim light for 1 round.

Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication.name: Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication
Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication.description:
You've studied the basics of harmony and resonance in magic, exemplified by the ringing of chimes. You gain a single arcane or occult cantrip of your choice, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level, rounded up. If you weren't already, you become trained in that tradition's spell DCs and spell attack rolls, with Intelligence as your spellcasting ability if you choose arcane or Charisma as your spellcasting ability if you choose occult. Regardless of your choice, you also either become trained in Arcana or Occultism, or an expert in one of these skills if you are already trained in both.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Nantambu Chime-Ringer archetype.

Narrative Conduit.name: Narrative Conduit
Narrative Conduit.description: You act as a conduit for your companions just as your stories are a conduit between teller and listener. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spin a Tale} and the hero of your tale Casts a Spell against the villain, you warp the world, allowing the hero to calculate range and cover to the villain from your space instead of their own if they prefer. The hero must choose to calculate both range and cover from the same space; they can't use one space for range and the other for cover.

Natural Ambition.name: 天生野望 Natural Ambition
Natural Ambition.description: 你从小壮志勃勃，并且为了出人头地而奋斗，这让你在你所选择的领域上的进步卓越。你可以在你的职业上获得1个1级职业专长。你必须满足专长的前置，你只可在创建角色时能稍后选择该专长以便满足所选职业专长的前置。

Natural Illusionist.name: Natural Illusionist
Natural Illusionist.description: By drawing upon the First World's magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4ZGte0i9YbLh4dRi]{Item Facade}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism}. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.

Natural Medicine.name: 自然疗法 Natural Medicine
Natural Medicine.description: 你可以从自然环境中采集药材为盟友提供医疗。你可以使用自然而非医疗技能来使用治疗伤害技能动作。并且，如果你身处可以采集到新鲜的生药材料的环境中（由GM判断）时，你再使用自然技能进行治疗伤害动作的技能检定获得+2环境加值。

Natural Performer.name: Natural Performer
Natural Performer.description: Entertainment comes naturally to you. You become trained in Performance and gain one 1st-level Performance skill feat.

Natural Skill.name: 天生精熟 Natural Skill
Natural Skill.description: 你的聪明才智让你在各种各样的技能上都获得了训练。你可以选择2项技能受训。

Natural Swimmer.name: Natural Swimmer
Natural Swimmer.description: Water flows around you, letting you cut through the waves as if born to it. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet. If you already have a permanent swim Speed, swimming up or down isn't difficult terrain.

Necromantic Physiology.name: Necromantic Physiology
Necromantic Physiology.description: Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against diseases.

Necromantic Resistance.name: Necromantic Resistance
Necromantic Resistance.description: As part of your training, you've inured yourself against necromancy through repeated exposure. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against necromancy effects and gain resistance to negative damage equal to half your level.

Necromantic Tenacity.name: Necromantic Tenacity
Necromantic Tenacity.description: Your training against necromantic effects allows you to escape the worst of their touch. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a necromancy effect, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical failure on such a save, you get a failure instead.

Necrotic Infusion.name: Necrotic Infusion
Necrotic Infusion.description:
You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the harm spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.bIU1q05vzkKBtFj2]{Effect: Necrotic Infusion}

Negate Damage.name: 否决伤害 Negate Damage
Negate Damage.description:
触发 你即将承受伤害。

你的护甲启动了多种你提前准备好的装置，你使用其中一种将你即将受到的伤害降低15点。

不稳定功能 你同时启动了全部的预案，暴力反抗到来的攻击，抵消它的力量。在否决伤害Negate Damage上加上不稳定特征，将你即将受到的伤害降低50点。

Nestling Fall.name: Nestling Fall
Nestling Fall.description: You trust the strength of your wings and can spread them to glide safely to the ground. As long as you can act, you take no damage from falling, no matter what distance you fall.

Never Tire.name: Never Tire
Never Tire.description:
Trigger You would gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} condition.

Requirements You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} by at least three creatures

who aren't foes.

As long as you have an audience, you can continue to perform. Indeed, you must-you have an obligation to your fans!

You delay the effects of the fatigued condition for 1 minute or until you are no longer observed by the required creatures, whichever comes first. If the fatigued condition has a duration, the duration begins to elapse only after the delay. You can't further delay or prevent the fatigued condition after this ability ends.

Night Magic.name: Night Magic
Night Magic.description: You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form} (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist} as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.

Nightvision Adaptation.name: Nightvision Adaptation
Nightvision Adaptation.description: The nanites in your ocular processors have adapted to darkness, enhancing your ability to see in the dark. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}.

Nimble Crawl.name: 灵巧爬行 Nimble Crawl
Nimble Crawl.description: 你可以以惊人的速度匍匐爬行。你可以以通常陆地速度的一半而非通常的5尺速度进行爬行移动。当你在特技技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你可以以全速爬行移动，并且不会因为处于俯卧状态而陷入措手不及。

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
Trigger A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker.

Requirements You are not encumbered

You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Nimble Elf.name: 灵巧精灵 Nimble Elf
Nimble Elf.description: 你的饱经锻炼。你的速度增加5尺。

Nimble Hooves.name: 灵巧蹄足 Nimble Hooves
Nimble Hooves.description:
你的腿底下长的不是脚而是蹄，其关节与肌腱使你能快速跑动。你的速度提升5尺。

特殊 此速度提升不与来自其他族裔专长的速度提升效果叠加(例如灵巧精灵)。

自动适应效果

  • +5无类别陆地速度

Nimble Roll.name: Nimble Roll
Nimble Roll.description:
You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dNH8OHEvx3vI9NBQ]{Nimble Dodge} before attempting a Reflex save, in addition to its original trigger. If you do, the circumstance bonus applies to your Reflex save against the triggering effect.

When you use Nimble Dodge and the triggering attack fails or critically fails, or when you succeed or critically succeed at the saving throw, you can also Stride up to 10 feet as part of the reaction. If you do, the reaction gains the move trait.

You can use Nimble Roll while Flying or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Nimble Shield Hand.name: Nimble Shield Hand
Nimble Shield Hand.description:
You are so used to wielding a shield that you can do so even while using the hand that's holding it for other purposes.

The hand you use to wield a shield counts as a free hand for the purposes of the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action. You can also hold another object in this hand (but you still can't use it to wield a weapon).

This benefit doesn't apply to tower shields, which are still too cumbersome.

No Cause For Alarm.name: 无需惊慌 No Cause For Alarm
No Cause For Alarm.description:
无需惊慌，保持镇静！进行一次交涉检定，对抗你周围10尺弥漫范围内所有处于 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}状态生物的意志豁免DC。所有目标生物获得1小时临时免疫。

大成功 减少目标惊惧状态值2点。

成功 减少目标惊惧状态值1点。

No Escape.name: No Escape
No Escape.description: You keep pace with a retreating foe. Stride up to your Speed, following the foe and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed. You can use No Escape to Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.

No Evidence.name: No Evidence
No Evidence.description: You leave little sign when attempting to remain unseen. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoid Notice}, you also gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]{Cover Tracks} unless you choose not to.

No Hard Feelings.name: No Hard Feelings
No Hard Feelings.description: Despite the devastation your weapons tend to inflict upon their targets or the destruction you might unleash upon an area, your foes still manage to walk away at the end of a fight-at least sometimes. You can choose to add the nonlethal trait to your ranged weapons, making the choice of whether to add the trait or not just before each Strike.

No! No! I Created You!.name: 不不不！是我造的你！ No! No! I Created You!
No! No! I Created You!.description:
频率 每分钟一次

触发 你的构装伙伴将要陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑} 或被控制状态。

你呼唤你的构装伙伴和创造者之间的纽带，试图破解控制效果。尝试反制使你的构装伙伴陷入困惑或被控制状态的效果，使用你的手艺Crafting调整值进行反制检定并将你等级的一半（取高）视为反制等级。

Nocturnal Charm.name: 超凡魅惑 Nocturnal Charm
Nocturnal Charm.description: 你血液中流淌的精灵魔法散发的魔力让你更具吸引力和诱惑力。你可以每天把1次1环的魅惑术当作你的内在奥术法术使用。

Nocturnal Grippli.name: Nocturnal Grippli
Nocturnal Grippli.description:
You tend to do most of your hunting and work at night and have adapted to the requirements of nocturnal life. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}, allowing you to see in darkness and dim light just as well as you can in bright light. However, in darkness, you see in black and white only.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.

Nocturnal Sense.name: Nocturnal Sense
Nocturnal Sense.description: Your senses gain even greater clarity. While raging, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision} if you don't already have it, and the range of your imprecise scent increases to 60 feet.

None Shall Know.name: None Shall Know
None Shall Know.description: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} as an innate occult spell once per day, which can only be cast on yourself and is automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.

Nonlethal Spell.name: 非致命法术 Nonlethal Spell
Nonlethal Spell.description: 你能把侵略性强的法术变得没那么致命。如果你下一个动作是 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell} 且该法术能造成伤害，没有死亡或负能量特征，则该法术会获得非致命特征。

Nosoi's Mask.name: Nosoi's Mask
Nosoi's Mask.description: Many psychopomps wear masks when dealing with the living, and many cultures believe that seeing an unmasked psychopomp's face invites death. You are trained in Intimidation and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat. If you were already trained in Intimidation (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also know how to make masks like those worn by psychopomps, a process that takes 1 hour and 1 sp of appropriate material. If you instead pay 50 gp for a splendid psychopomp mask, the mask grants you a +1 item bonus to Intimidation while you are wearing it. Its usage is worn (mask).

Nothing But Fluff.name: Nothing But Fluff
Nothing But Fluff.description: Your fluffy interior lacks specific organs and struts, with few weak spots to injure. You gain resistance to precision damage equal to half your level.

Numb to Death.name: Numb to Death
Numb to Death.description:
Frequency once per day

Your past has left you numb to death's call. The first time each day that you regain Hit Points while you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, you regain additional Hit Points equal to your level, and you neither gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition nor increase the value of this condition.

Obscured Terrain.name: Obscured Terrain
Obscured Terrain.description: When you cast obscuring mist, you can modify the spell to replace its standard effects with the following: You cause a cloud of thick fog to blanket the area, making it difficult to see the ground. The area within the fog is difficult terrain for creatures that can't see through fog or mist. You can Dismiss the cloud.

Observant Explorer.name: Observant Explorer
Observant Explorer.description: Thanks to the time you've spent wandering through wild and untamed environments, you've gained an intuitive sense about creatures. You sometimes notice them before they attack, or spot them nearby even if they weren't planning on attacking. You can attempt a check to notice hidden creatures attempting to Avoid Notice nearby even if you aren't actively Searching for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to notice a particular creature.

Occult Breadth.name: 异能扩展 Occult Breadth
Occult Breadth.description: 你的剧目扩展了，你每天也能施放更多的异能法术。除了最高两个环级以外，每个环级你都额外获得一个来自吟游诗人变体专长的剧目法术和每日法术位。

Occult Evolution.name: Occult Evolution
Occult Evolution.description: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power. You become trained in one skill of your choice. Additionally, once per day, you can spend 1 minute to choose one mental occult spell you don't know and add it to your spell repertoire. You lose this temporary spell the next time you make your daily preparations (though you can use this ability to add it again later).

Occult Resistance.name: Occult Resistance
Occult Resistance.description: Your study of occult practices has shown you how to best defend against them. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against occult effects.

Oddity Identification.name: 异常察觉 Oddity Identification
Oddity Identification.description: 你对于那些用来窥探秘密和操控心智的法术效果异常敏感。你在用来辨识具有【心灵】（Mental）、【占据】（Possession）、【预见】（Prediction）或是【探知】（Scrying）特性的法术的神秘技能检定上获得+2环境加值。

Ode To Ouroboros.name: 衔尾蛇颂 Ode To Ouroboros
Ode To Ouroboros.description: 你学会 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DgCS456mXKw97vNy]{衔尾蛇颂组曲 Ode to Ouroboros} 法术，它能让你的盟友暂时免于一死。

Offensive Analysis.name: Offensive Analysis
Offensive Analysis.description: You can enhance your senses and mental state to consider every aspect of an attack. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike} as a divine innate spell once per day.

Offensive Subroutine.name: Offensive Subroutine
Offensive Subroutine.description: Nanites augment your attacks. You can choose to activate @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge} when you attempt an attack roll, instead of when you attempt a skill check. If you do, you gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering attack roll.

Old Soul.name: Old Soul
Old Soul.description: Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way. You become trained in two skills of your choice.

Olethros's Decree.name: Olethros's Decree
Olethros's Decree.description:
Frequency once per day

You have a connection to olethroses, the enigmatic psychopomps who successfully swayed the yamaraj to permit the creation of the first duskwalkers. You place a finger on fate's scales by wrapping silk around your bow. The first time this turn that you hit a creature with a Strike using a weapon in the bow group you've modified in this way, that creature takes an additional [[/r 60]] damage (basic Fortitude save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher) as the arrow works to cut short their very destiny. This additional damage is of the same type as the initial attack dealt. If you hit more than one creature at the same time, choose one to suffer the effect of your decree.

One For All.name: One For All
One For All.description:
With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts.

Designate an ally within 30 feet; this action counts as sufficient preparation to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} that ally. When you use the Aid reaction to help that ally, you can roll Diplomacy in place of the usual check.

If your swashbuckler's style is wit and your Diplomacy check to Aid meets or exceeds the very hard DC for your level, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}.

One With Earth.name: One With Earth
One With Earth.description: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it. You gain a burrow Speed of 15 feet.

One-Inch Punch.name: One-Inch Punch
One-Inch Punch.description:
You put all your force into a single mighty, carefully controlled blow. Make an unarmed Strike. If you spend two actions and this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage. You can instead spend 3 actions to perform an even more powerful attack, dealing a second additional die of weapon damage on a hit.

If you're at least 10th level, the number of additional dice you add from this feat doubles, for a total of 2 additional dice if you spend 2 actions or 4 additional dice if you spend 3 actions.

If you're at least 18th level, the number of additional dice you add from this feat triples, for a total of 3 additional dice if you spend 2 actions or 6 additional dice if you spend 3 actions.

One-Millimeter Punch.name: One-Millimeter Punch
One-Millimeter Punch.description:
Your punches have incredible force and control. When you damage a target using One-Inch Punch, you can focus your ki to send the foe flying. If you do, the target must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is pushed back 5 feet.

Failure The target is pushed back 10 feet.

Critical Failure The target is pushed back 10 feet for each action you spent on One-Inch Punch.

One-Toed Hop.name: One-Toed Hop
One-Toed Hop.description: Assuming a peculiar stance, you make a short hop on each toe. You make a vertical @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} without triggering reactions that can be triggered by move actions or upon leaving or entering a square.

Ongoing Investigation.name: Ongoing Investigation
Ongoing Investigation.description: You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities. You can move at full Speed while using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EwgTZBWsc8qKaViP]{Investigate} exploration activity, and you can use another exploration activity while Investigating.

Ongoing Selfishness.name: 利己自利 Ongoing Selfishness
Ongoing Selfishness.description: 你强大的人格和难以置信的自负让你爱护自己远胜一切。在你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{自私卫盾}后，直到你使用此反应动作的那回合结束之前，你会对来自触发敌人的所有伤害上获得自私卫盾抗性一半的抗性。

Ongoing Strategy.name: Ongoing Strategy
Ongoing Strategy.description:
You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

On any Strike for which you didn't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Strategem}, you still deal precision damage equal to your number of strategic strike damage dice so long as the weapon or unarmed attack you used is one that would have let you use your Intelligence modifier had you Devised a Stratagem.

Ooze Empathy.name: Ooze Empathy
Ooze Empathy.description: You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on oozes and to make very simple @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of them. In most instances, oozes will give you time to make your case.

Oozemorph Dedication.name: Oozemorph Dedication
Oozemorph Dedication.description:
You are plagued by sporadic anatomical rearrangements, which grant you insights into other creatures with unusual anatomies. You become trained in Occultism and Ooze Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves to avoid being Engulfed by creatures, and to checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} after being Engulfed.

As you develop more abilities based on your amorphous affliction, you become increasingly off-putting to mundane creatures. You take a penalty to Diplomacy checks against animals and humanoids. This penalty is equal to your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, to a maximum of -4 for four or more feats.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the oozemorph archetype.

Opportune Backstab.name: Opportune Backstab
Opportune Backstab.description:
Trigger A creature within your melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of your allies

When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction. Make a Strike against the triggering creature.

Opportune Throw.name: Opportune Throw
Opportune Throw.description:
Requirements You are Juggling a thrown weapon.

Trigger A creature within 10 feet of you uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

You make a thrown ranged Strike with the required weapon against the triggering creature. If you critically succeed and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count against your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Opportunist.name: 机会主义者 Opportunist
Opportunist.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O2MwufzEHbuThoGr]{借机攻击（战士） Attack of Opportunity (Fighter)}反应动作。

Opportunistic Grapple.name: Opportunistic Grapple
Opportunistic Grapple.description:
Requirements Your prey is within your reach, you have at

least one free hand, and your target is no more than one

size larger than you.

Trigger Your prey critically fails on a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike's} attack roll against you.

You attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} your prey.

Oracle Dedication.name: Oracle Dedication
Oracle Dedication.description:
Choose a mystery. You become trained in Religion and the mystery's skill; if you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice.

You gain the mild, constant effects of the mystery's curse described in its first paragraph, but not other effects the mystery usually grants.

You cast spells like an oracle and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two cantrips, either common divine cantrips or other divine cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in divine spell attack rolls and divine spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for oracle archetype spells is Charisma, and they are divine oracle spells.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the oracle archetype.

Oracular Providence.name: Oracular Providence
Oracular Providence.description: Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.

Oracular Warning.name: Oracular Warning
Oracular Warning.description:
Trigger You are about to roll initiative.

You have a flash of insight about impending danger related to one ally, and you can shout or gesture to warn that ally of the threat a moment before it materializes. One ally of your choice can roll twice for initiative and use the better result; this is a fortune effect. If you are legendary in Religion, you receive two visions and can warn two allies, granting them both this benefit.

You are momentarily thrown off by the divine insight, however, and you must roll twice for your initiative roll and use the worse result. This is a misfortune effect. The two effects are tied together; if you would avoid the misfortune effect for any reason, or if any of your allies would negate their fortune effect, your Oracular Warning does nothing. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this action gains either the visual or auditory trait, respectively.

Orc Ferocity.name: 兽人凶猛 Orc Ferocity
Orc Ferocity.description:
频率一天一次

触发当你血量低于0点但还未被杀死时

战斗的狂怒会贯穿你的血液，让你不会因为你的伤口而倒下。当这个专长被触发时，你会避免被击倒并且保持1点血量，但是你的伤势增加1点。

Orc Lore.name: Orc Lore
Orc Lore.description:
The hold elders taught you your people's histories, told tales of great athletic feats, and shared with you the hardships your ancestors endured so that you can pass this wisdom down to future generations.

You become trained in Athletics and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Orc Lore.

Orc Sight.name: 兽人视觉 Orc Sight
Orc Sight.description:
你的兽人血统足够强大，可以让你可以和你兽人先祖一样有着敏锐的洞察力。你获得了黑暗视觉，允许你在和黑暗与微光如常视物。但是，在黑暗中，你只能看见黑白两色。

特殊 选择此专长时你必须为1级，你无法重训来或是重训掉此专长。

Orc Superstition.name: 兽人迷信 Orc Superstition
Orc Superstition.description:
触发 当你尝试对法术和魔法效果进行豁免检定时，还未掷骰

你依靠来自兽人文化的迷信来使自身抵御魔法。你对抗触发的法术和魔法效果的豁免检定上获得+1环境加值。

Orc Warmask.name: Orc Warmask
Orc Warmask.description:
You paint your face to create a warmask, an invested magic item of negligible Bulk with an item level equal to your level and a usage of worn (mask). It has the divination trait and a magical tradition trait depending on its type. Donning or removing your warmask requires 1 minute of work, though you don't need to Invest the mask each time. The warmask is unique to you and might signify your hold, your accomplishments, or your faith. While creating your mask, you must choose the source of your warmask's power from the options below. This source determines the mask's associated skill as well as magical tradition. Once you select this source, it can't be changed. You become trained in the associated skill, and you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat as a bonus feat. You can spend 1 hour performing a ceremony that costs 50 gp to attune yourself more deeply with your warmask. If you do, you gain a +1 item bonus to the associated skill whenever you wear the warmask.

  • The Gods Religion, divine tradition
  • The Land Nature, primal tradition
  • Magic Arcana, arcane tradition
  • The Unknown Occultism, occult tradition

Orc Weapon Carnage.name: 兽人武器屠戮 Orc Weapon Carnage
Orc Weapon Carnage.description: 你兽人先祖的武器是那么的野蛮而高效。当你使用一把大砍刀，巨斧或是使用一把兽人武器重击时，你可以应用武器的重击专精效果。

Orc Weapon Expertise.name: 兽人武器专家 Orc Weapon Expertise
Orc Weapon Expertise.description: 你的兽人爱好与你接受的职业训练，授予了你对于兽人武器的卓越技巧。每当你获得一项授予你在特定武器上获得专家或是更高熟练度的职业能力时，你也可以在弯刃大刀、巨斧以及你已受训的兽人武器上获得对应的熟练度。

Orc Weapon Familiarity.name: 兽人武器熟悉 Orc Weapon Familiarity
Orc Weapon Familiarity.description:
在战斗中，你喜欢使用兽人先祖的野蛮武器。你在 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{砍刀} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8COlYvHe6hKCXY8x]{巨斧}上受训

此外，你还能够使用各种罕见的兽人武器。对于你来说，军用兽人武器视为简易武器，进阶兽人武器视为军用武器。

Order Explorer.name: Order Explorer
Order Explorer.description: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order, passing whatever rites of initiation that order requires and gaining access to its secrets. Choose an order other than your own. You gain a 1st-level feat that lists that order as a prerequisite, and you are now a member of that order for the purpose of meeting feat prerequisites. If you commit acts anathema to your new order, you lose all feats and abilities requiring that order but retain your other druid feats and abilities. You don't gain any of the other benefits of the order you chose.

Order Magic.name: Order Magic
Order Magic.description:
You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell. Choose an order you have selected with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9onf3uGvZRnNLPR6]{Order Explorer}. You gain the initial order spell from that order.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you must choose a different order you have selected with Order Explorer.

Order Spell.name: 派系法术 Order Spell
Order Spell.description: 你获得来自所选派系的初始派系法术。如果你没有聚能池，你获得一个含有1点聚能点的聚能池，通过成为自然的一部分，你可以再聚能Refocus。

Order Training.name: Order Training
Order Training.description: You gain the lesser order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

Ornate Tattoo.name: Ornate Tattoo
Ornate Tattoo.description: You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic. Choose a 1st-level arcane spell from the same school as your Arcane Tattoos, either a common spell or another to which you have access. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate arcane spell.

Orthographic Mastery.name: Orthographic Mastery
Orthographic Mastery.description: You understand the principles that underlie all written words, allowing you to read nearly any text. You can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{Decipher Writing} using Loremaster Lore in place of the required skill.

Ostentatious Arrival.name: Ostentatious Arrival
Ostentatious Arrival.description:
If the next action you take is to Manifest your Eidolon as a three-action activity, or to Cast a three-action summoning Spell, the creature appears in an explosion.

All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around the creature you summoned or manifested take [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage per spell level} for a summoning spell, or [[/r {(floor(@actor.level/2))d4}[fire]]]{1d4 damage per 2 levels} for Manifesting your Eidolon.

If the creature you summoned or manifested has the acid, cold, electricity, fire, sonic, or water trait, the damage is that type instead (or cold damage for the water trait). If the creature has more than one of these traits, you choose which damage type to deal.

Otherworldly Acumen.name: 超凡天资 Otherworldly Acumen
Otherworldly Acumen.description:
你所具有的奥法之力变得日益强大和复杂。根据你已经拥有的其他精灵族裔专长提供的内在法术选择相同的根源（same tradition），比如若你具有超凡魔法（Otherworldly Magic）专长则要从奥术列表选择，从常见2环法术（common 2nd-level spell）选择1个。你每日能够以内在法术施放该法术1次，根据你选择的列表来使用相同的根源。

你的魔法可塑性很强。通过在休整期（downtime）花费1日的时间，你能够把之前选择的法术变更为相同根源的另一个常见2环法术。

Otherworldly Magic.name: 超凡魔法 Otherworldly Magic
Otherworldly Magic.description: 即使你没有接受过正规魔法训练，你也可以将你的精灵魔力汇聚为一个简单的奥法。从奥术法术列表选择一个戏法。你可以将此戏法作为可随意施展的内在奥术法术。此戏法将被升阶至等同你等级一半的环数。

Overcrowd.name: Overcrowd
Overcrowd.description:
Your physiology is slight, and you can pack into small spaces with others of similar stature.

As long as you are Small, you can end your movement in the same square as a Small ally. Only two creatures total can share the same space when using this ability or a similar one.

Overdrive Ally.name: 超载盟友 Overdrive Ally
Overdrive Ally.description:
需求 你正处于超载中

你快速对着盟友丢出你身上的一些高能机关，暂时与他分享你的增益。选择一个30尺内的盟友。直到他下一个回合结束，该盟友的打击Strike造成额外伤害，数值等于你智力调整值的一半，或等于你的智力调整值，如果你处于极限超载中。盟友不会获得来自超载专家，大师，传奇的额外伤害。

Overextending Feint.name: Overextending Feint
Overextending Feint.description:
When you trick a foe, instead of catching them off guard, you goad them into overextending their next attack.

On a successful @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, you can use the following success and critical success effects instead of any other effects that would occur when you Feint. You can choose a different effect each time you Feint against a given foe.

Critical Success The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to

all attack rolls against you before the end of its next turn.

Success The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its next

attack roll against you before the end of its next turn.

Overlooked Mastermind.name: Overlooked Mastermind
Overlooked Mastermind.description: Many consider half-orcs little more than dumb brutes. This is offensive to you, but it can occasionally be useful. You are trained in Deception (or another skill of your choice if you were already trained in Deception), and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Lie when specifically claiming ignorance and to Deception DCs against @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} checks to uncover such lies.

Overpowering Charge.name: Overpowering Charge
Overpowering Charge.description:
You trample your foes as you charge past them.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.to6s7QanfhHukW5r]{Barreling Charge} and successfully move through a creature's space, that creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier. If you critically succeed, the creature takes twice this amount of damage and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

Oversized Throw.name: Oversized Throw
Oversized Throw.description:
Requirements You have one or more hands free.

With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes. The object must be your size or one size smaller than you, and it must not have too much Bulk for you to lift it in the first place.

Make a ranged Strike with the object; regardless of the result, the object takes the same amount of damage it would deal on a success.

The object is a simple ranged weapon that deals [[/r {1d10}[bludgeoning]]]{1d10 bludgeoning damage}, has a range increment of 20 feet, and has the thrown weapon trait. The damage increases to [[/r {2d10}[bludgeoning]]]{2d10 bludgeoning damage} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.9EqIasqfI8YIM3Pt]{Weapon Specialization} in simple weapons, or [[/r {3d10}[bludgeoning]]]{3d10 bludgeoning damage} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.7JjhxMFo8DMwpGx0]{Greater Weapon Specialization}.

Overwatch Dedication.name: Overwatch Dedication
Overwatch Dedication.description:
You have an innate knack for tactical observation, and you've innovated to apply that knack in a variety of ways that allow you to assist your allies. With the help of enhanced visual gear (such as a specially modified telescope, goggled visor, or binoculars), you're keenly aware of the movement of combatants on the battlefield. You quickly and efficiently disperse that information to your nearby allies so they can use it to direct their own observations and reactions to danger.

You're surrounded by an overwatch field aura in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.AKKHagjg5bL1fMG5]{Effect: Overwatch Field}

Special You can't select another dedication feat until after you have gained at least two other feats from the overwatch archetype.

Overwhelming Blow.name: Overwhelming Blow
Overwhelming Blow.description:
You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable.

Make a melee Strike. This counts as three attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you get a critical hit. If you roll a critical hit, your attack also gains the deadly d12 trait.

Whether or not you hit, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.

Overwhelming Breath.name: Overwhelming Breath
Overwhelming Breath.description:
You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance.

If you use your next action to Cast a Spell that has the monk trait and no duration, the spell and any Strike} you make as a result of casting it ignore an amount of the target's resistance to physical damage equal to your level.

Overwhelming Energy.name: 强能 Overwhelming Energy
Overwhelming Energy.description:
(德鲁伊) 你为了克服抗力而修改你的法术。

(术士) 你调整了你的法术，使其得以穿透敌人的抗力。

(法师) 借由复杂的手势，妳改变了自身法术的能量去克服抗性。

如果妳下一个动作是施放法术(Cast a Spell)，那施放的法术可以忽视目标对酸液、寒冷、电击、火或音波伤害的抗性，其数值等于妳的等级。这超魔效果会应用在所有由这法术造成的伤害上，包含来自这法术的持续伤害(persistent damage )以及持续性效果所造成的伤害，例如火墙(wall of fire )造出来的墙。免疫的生物则不受影响。

Overwhelming Spellstrike.name: 过载性法术打击 Overwhelming Spellstrike
Overwhelming Spellstrike.description:
需求 你的法术打击已充能（charged）

Y你刺穿敌人的抗性。进行一次法术打击。用于法术打击而释放的法术无视目标数值等同于你等级的对于酸液（acid）、寒冷（cold）、电击（electricity）、火焰（fire）或音波（sonic）的伤害抗性。这将应用于法术造成的所有伤害，包括 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害} 和被法术的持续效应所造成的伤害。生物的所有免疫（immunities）不受影响。

Pack Hunter.name: Pack Hunter
Pack Hunter.description: You were taught how to hunt as part of a pack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid, and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid you.

Pack Rat.name: Pack Rat
Pack Rat.description:
Years of packing for travel have taught you how to cram vast quantities into small spaces. You can fit an additional 50% of the listed Bulk capacity into mundane storage containers or vehicles.

For example, you can fit 6 Bulk in a backpack, or 12 Bulk in a chest. This doesn't alter the items' Bulk, nor does it change how much you can store in a magical or extradimensional storage space, such as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.jaEEvuQ32GjAa8jy]{Bag of Holding}.

Pack Stalker.name: Pack Stalker
Pack Stalker.description: Ambushes are an honored gnoll tradition. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker} feat and can extend its effects to a single ally so long as they remain within 10 ft. of you. If you have master proficiency in Stealth, you can extend the effect to two allies. If you have legendary proficiency in Stealth, you can extend it to four allies.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: You have mastered how to hunt with your pack. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your allies, that enemy is flat-footed against you.

Pactbound Dedication.name: Pactbound Dedication
Pactbound Dedication.description:
You befriended one of the last saumen kar and were infused with a fraction of their power, granting you the potential to become a guardian of their ancient pact. You gain cold resistance equal to half your level. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while it's snowing even lightly, even if it wouldn't be thick enough to normally grant concealment. Finally, all saumen kar can sense the mark of their pact upon you, and their attitude toward you is typically one step better than it would be otherwise (hostile to unfriendly, unfriendly to indifferent, etc.) Most saumen kar are unfriendly to outsiders; this would make them indifferent to you.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the pactbound initiate archetype.

Paired Shots.name: Paired Shots
Paired Shots.description:
Requirements You're wielding two weapons, each of which can be either a loaded one-handed firearm or loaded one‑handed crossbow.

Your shots hit simultaneously. Make two Strikes, one with each of your two ranged weapons, each using your current multiple attack penalty. Both Strikes must have the same target.

If both attacks hit, combine their damage and then add any applicable effects from both weapons. You add any precision damage, only once, to the attack of your choice. Combine the damage from both Strikes and apply resistances and weaknesses only once. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Pale Horse.name: 苍白骏骑 Pale Horse
Pale Horse.description:
你的坐骑在你骑乘时变成带有某种预兆的怪诞生物。牠的外型可以转换成从皮肤喷发火焰、周身有负能量环绕，或从他的血肉中流泻毒液。

当你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{骑乘} 你的骏骑盟友时，你可以选择火、负能量、毒素。只要你还骑着，你的骏骑就会获得所选伤害类型的10点抗力，同时任何碰触你骏骑的生物会受到所选类型 [[/r 1d6]] 点伤害，碰触包含用非武装攻击打中骏骑，或邻接骏骑时使用近战武器进行打击并击中。

这个伤害在16级变成 [[/r 2d6]] ，20级变成 [[/r 3d6]] 。

Panache Paragon.name: Panache Paragon
Panache Paragon.description:
You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks. You are permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}.

You can use the extra action only to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} or perform the skill action listed in your swashbuckler's style as one that allows you to gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}, or other actions that would allow you to gain panache at the GM's discretion.
