Paradoxical Mystery.name: Paradoxical Mystery
Paradoxical Mystery.description: The truest depths of your divine mystery are fathomless and contradictory, granting you changing powers that even you can barely begin to fathom. Each day during your daily preparations, choose one basic or advanced domain spell from any domain from the Core Rulebook or another domain to which you have access, or any initial or advanced revelation spell from another mystery. You gain that spell as a revelation spell until your next daily preparations, and it has the cursebound trait.

Paragon Battle Medicine.name: Paragon Battle Medicine
Paragon Battle Medicine.description:
Kassi Aziril taught you her techniques that originated the modern use of Battle Medicine.

When you successfully use Battle Medicine, you can also reduce the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition by 1 (this has no effect if you are subject to an effect continually applying the clumsy condition, like enlarge).

If you are legendary in Medicine, you can choose to reduce the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} condition by 1 instead, and if you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yTLGclKtWVFZLKIz]{Godless Healing} feat , you can choose to reduce the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} condition by 1 instead.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mEk2POFNU1Q0TQg2]{Mortal Healing} feat, you can reduce all available conditions by 1 for a target who hasn't benefited from positive or healing magic in the last 24 hours, and if you roll a critical success before applying the effects of the feat, you reduce all available conditions by 2 for that target instead.

Paragon Companion.name: 典范伙伴 Paragon Companion
Paragon Companion.description: 你的构装伙伴触摸到了形态和功能的巅峰。你的构装伙伴变成了典范构装伙伴。

Paragon's Guard.name: Paragon's Guard
Paragon's Guard.description:
Requirements You are wielding a shield

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

Parry And Riposte.name: Parry And Riposte
Parry And Riposte.description:
Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{Opportune Riposte} against an enemy who fails at a Strike against you (not just critically fails), provided you have both damaged that creature with a finisher on your last turn and currently have a circumstance bonus to AC from the parry weapon trait, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{Dueling Parry}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry}.

Parthenogenic Hatchling.name: Parthenogenic Hatchling
Parthenogenic Hatchling.description: You were hatched from an unfertilized egg during hard times for your people, and you are a biological copy of your mother. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases. Each of your successful saving throws against a disease reduces its stage by 2, or by 1 for a virulent disease. Each critical success against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent disease. You take damage only every 2 hours from thirst and every 2 days from starvation, rather than every hour and every day.

Parting Shot.name: Parting Shot
Parting Shot.description:
Requirements You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon or a ranged weapon with reload 0.

You jump back and fire a quick shot that catches your opponent off guard.

You Step and then make a ranged Strike with the required weapon. Your target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the attack.

Party Crasher.name: Party Crasher
Party Crasher.description:
You attend all the fashionable society parties, no matter how exclusive they might be.

Any time you encounter a social event you would ordinarily be denied access to, such as a coronation, royal gala, or other society function, you can spend [[/r 1d4]] hours to secure entry without the need for a skill check. You find invitations, invitees looking for fashionable dates, temporary jobs with the caterers, event staff willing to look the other way, or some other mode of access for yourself and your allies.

This ability doesn't apply to secret events or other small private gatherings with no staff, dates, or outsiders involved.

Patch Job.name: Patch Job
Patch Job.description: You can patch up damage to an object with a quick fix. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xT593tHyPkumPuzz]{Improvised Repair} general feat. When you use Improvised Repair, you can attempt a Crafting check with the same DC as Repair. If you succeed, you can use the object as a normal object of its type until it takes damage rather than as a shoddy object of its type.

Path Of Iron.name: Path Of Iron
Path Of Iron.description:
Frequency once per minute

With a burst of effort, you weave a path through your enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them. You Stride; this movement doesn't trigger reactions. You can Strike up to three times at any point during your movement, each against a different enemy.

Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but your multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until you have made all your attacks.

Pathfinder Agent Dedication.name: Pathfinder Agent Dedication
Pathfinder Agent Dedication.description:
Access You are from Absalom.

Your Pathfinder training has broadened your horizons and made you more flexible at various skills, since you never know when you might need an obscure skill to complete your mission. You become trained in one skill of your choice, or expert in a skill of your choice in which you were trained. You also become trained in Pathfinder Lore, or an expert if you were already trained. When using a skill untrained, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level instead of 0. You gain access to wayfinders.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Pathfinder Agent archetype.

Patron's Breadth.name: Patron's Breadth
Patron's Breadth.description: You can cast more spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from witch archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell slots.

Patron's Truth.name: Patron's Truth
Patron's Truth.description: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron's magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.

Peafowl Stance.name: Peafowl Stance
Peafowl Stance.description:
Requirements You are wielding a sword that has the monk

trait in one hand.

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.vjvcccAwdkOLA1Fc]{Stance: Peafowl Stance}

Peafowl Strut.name: Peafowl Strut
Peafowl Strut.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}.

You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace. Step twice and then Strike. The Strike must be made with the sword required by Peafowl Stance.

Peculiar Anatomy.name: Peculiar Anatomy
Peculiar Anatomy.description:
Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against disease and poison, and resistance to poison damage equal to half your level.

In addition, your resistance to precision damage from Disturbing Defense increases to an amount equal to 7 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, and the DC of your flat checks to recover from @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is 8 rather than 13.

Peer Beyond.name: Peer Beyond
Peer Beyond.description:
You have uncanny insight into the way ghosts and haunts manifest, manipulate the mind, and rejuvenate. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against mental effects caused by incorporeal undead and haunts, and you can roll a Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore check for initiative if you know that an incorporeal undead or a haunt is present.

If you are present when a spirit or haunt is defeated, you instantly gain a flash of insight into how it can be permanently put to rest. Typically, this flash manifests as a vision that presents a quick scene closely linked to the source of the spirit or haunt's creation. Attempt a Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore check, respectively, with a DC appropriate for the spirit or haunt's level. On a success, you gain a hint about how to put the spirit to rest or permanently disable the haunt; on a critical success, you learn the exact method of doing so.

Pelagic Aptitude.name: Pelagic Aptitude
Pelagic Aptitude.description:
You've learned special tricks to survive underwater. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Survival.

When in an aquatic environment, if you roll a critical failure on a Survival skill check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.fJImDBQfqfjKJOhk]{Sense Direction} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{Subsist}, you get a failure instead.

Penetrating Fire.name: Penetrating Fire
Penetrating Fire.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

You blast a bullet through one foe and into another. Choose two targets, one of which would give the other lesser cover against your ranged attacks. Make a single ranged Strike with the required weapon against both targets. This attack ignores any lesser cover the nearer target provides the other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature you hit. Penetrating Fire counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty.

Penetrating Projectile.name: Penetrating Projectile
Penetrating Projectile.description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged or thrown weapon

that deals piercing damage.

Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone. Make a ranged Strike against each creature in a 30-foot line. These attacks ignore lesser cover, cover, and greater cover granted by creatures. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature you hit.

Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.

Penetrating Shot.name: Penetrating Shot
Penetrating Shot.description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon

You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey. Choose a target that is giving lesser cover to your hunted prey. Make a single ranged Strike with the required weapon against the chosen target and your hunted prey. This attack ignores any lesser cover the chosen target provides your hunted prey. Roll damage only once, and apply it to each creature you hit. A Penetrating Shot counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty.

Perfect Clarity.name: Perfect Clarity
Perfect Clarity.description:
Trigger You fail or critically fail an attack roll or Will save

You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free. Reroll the triggering attack roll or Will save with a +2 circumstance bonus, use the better result, and resolve the effect. You then immediately stop raging.

Perfect Debilitation.name: 完美衰弱 Perfect Debilitation
Perfect Debilitation.description:
你将制作用于阻碍敌人的炸弹的公式完善得近乎完美。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sv4LeEbkOJyLen10]{衰弱炸弹 Debilitating Bomb} 时，你的目标只有在豁免检定上取得大成功才能避免承受炸弹施加的状态。

Perfect Distraction.name: Perfect Distraction
Perfect Distraction.description:
You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while leaving a decoy behind.

The decoy acts as the spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WPXzPl7YbMEIGWfi]{Mislead}, though you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, just @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}. You can continue to concentrate to move your decoy, as with the spell, whether or not you remain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} throughout the duration.

Once you use Perfect Distraction, you need to spend 10 minutes to set up another decoy before you can use it again.

Perfect Dive.name: Perfect Dive
Perfect Dive.description: You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall. You intentionally Leap or otherwise fall into the water, taking no falling damage regardless of the distance.

Perfect Encore.name: 完美安可 Perfect Encore
Perfect Encore.description: 你创造了另一曲无与伦比的作品。你获得一个额外的10级法术位。

Perfect Finisher.name: Perfect Finisher
Perfect Finisher.description: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault. Make a Strike, rolling the attack roll twice and using the better result.

Perfect Form Control.name: Perfect Form Control
Perfect Form Control.description: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely; you may have even forgotten your original form. When you use Form Control, instead of lasting 1 hour, wild shape is permanent until you Dismiss it.

Perfect Ki Adept.name: Perfect Ki Adept
Perfect Ki Adept.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.JiRqSMv1STETLwSP]{Student of Perfection}

You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VBNevVovTCpn04vL]{Unblinking Flame Revelation} for Unblinking Flame, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ytboJsyZEbE1MLeV]{Unbreaking Wave Advance} for Unbreaking Waves, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tvO6Kmc2pQve9DC5]{Unfolding Wind Rush} for Unfolding Wind, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FPnkOYyWIaOzkmqn]{Untwisting Iron Buffer} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Perfect Mutagen.name: 完美突变药剂 Perfect Mutagen
Perfect Mutagen.description: 你调整并强化了所有突变药剂的公式，让他们能够完美适应你的生理机能。当你处于你制作的突变药剂的影响下时，你不会承受它们带来的缺陷。

Perfect Readiness.name: Perfect Readiness
Perfect Readiness.description: You prepare to fire with an instinctive speed and muscle memory that go beyond your conscious thoughts. You're permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. You can use your extra action only to Step or Interact to reload.

Perfect Shot.name: Perfect Shot
Perfect Shot.description:
Requirements You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon with reload 1 or more, and you have not reloaded your weapon since your last turn

After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain. Make a ranged Strike with the required weapon against your hunted prey. If you hit, the Strike deals maximum damage. After the Strike, your turn ends.

Perfect Strike.name: Perfect Strike
Perfect Strike.description:
Archetpe @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.JiRqSMv1STETLwSP]{Student of Perfection}

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GQopUYTuhmtb7WMG]{Perfect Strike} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Perfection's Path (Fortitude).name: 完美道途(强韧) Perfection's Path (Fortitude)
Perfection's Path (Fortitude).description: 选择一个你达成专家的豁免骰（强韧Fortitude，反射Reflex或意志Will）。你在所选豁免骰中的熟练等级提升至大师。

Perfection's Path (Reflex).name: 完美道途(反射) Perfection's Path (Reflex)
Perfection's Path (Reflex).description: 选择一个你达成专家的豁免骰（强韧Fortitude，反射Reflex或意志Will）。你在所选豁免骰中的熟练等级提升至大师。

Perfection's Path (Will).name: 完美道途(意志) Perfection's Path (Will)
Perfection's Path (Will).description: 选择一个你达成专家的豁免骰（强韧Fortitude，反射Reflex或意志Will）。你在所选豁免骰中的熟练等级提升至大师。

Performance Weapon Expert.name: Performance Weapon Expert
Performance Weapon Expert.description: Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, as does your proficiency rank for your chosen advanced weapon.

Performative Weapons Training.name: Performative Weapons Training
Performative Weapons Training.description:
You're skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hMYdSFmMWzidzHih]{Bo Staff}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DA3HgyEBGEbtRNOo]{Dueling Cape}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zi9ovfoRp2fMhfpO]{Spiked Chain}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.VitLIpdIAmKlGb7i]{Sword Cane}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.

Peri Magic.name: Peri Magic
Peri Magic.description: The shimmering embers of the righteous peris crackle at your fingertips. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Perpetual Breadth.name: Perpetual Breadth
Perpetual Breadth.description:
You have expanded your supply of near-infinite items. Choose a research field. Add one item from the list of options available to that field from perpetual infusions, or two items if you choose your own field.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.JOdbVu14phvdjhaY]{Perpetual Potency} or @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.3R19zS7gERhEX87F]{Perpetual Perfection}, you gain an additional item (or items if you chose your own field) appropriate to the field you chose, for instance a higher-level version of the bomb you chose or a new poison.

Perpetual Scout.name: Perpetual Scout
Perpetual Scout.description:
You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best. While in your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain}, you always gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout} exploration activity, even if you are performing another exploration activity.

If you're legendary in Survival, you gain these benefits in any terrain.

Persistent Boost.name: 持续性增压 Persistent Boost
Persistent Boost.description: 你的大发明点燃敌人，腐蚀对手，留下箭簇或用其他方式在你的增压攻击命中后对你的敌人造成持久的持续伤害。当你或你的构装体大发明通过攻势增压伤害了1个敌人，该敌人也受到 [[/r {1d8}[persistent]]]{1d8} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}，伤害类型与攻势增压相同。

Persistent Creation.name: Persistent Creation
Persistent Creation.description: You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation} as an innate spell at will, choosing whether it is arcane or primal each time. The created object lasts until you spend 1 hour not within its immediate vicinity or until it is destroyed. Such objects are called persistent creations. If you cast creation again, any persistent creation you previously created with the spell immediately disintegrates.

Persistent Mutagen.name: 恒久突变药剂 Persistent Mutagen
Persistent Mutagen.description: 你的训练让你的物理形态能够在变异状态中保持稳定。每天一次，当你消耗一份带有灌注和突变药剂特征的炼金物品时，取代它原本的持续时间，你能够将它的效果保持到下一次你进行日常准备为止。

Pervasive Superstition.name: 常态迷信 Pervasive Superstition
Pervasive Superstition.description: 你沉迷于古代兽人的迷信与心理训练以便摆脱魔法影响。你在任何时候对抗法术和魔法效果的豁免检定都会获得+1环境加值。

Pesh Skin.name: Pesh Skin
Pesh Skin.description:
Requirements You are transformed into a plant by a polymorph spell.

Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it. Each time a creature touches you, hits you with an unarmed attack, or hits you with a melee weapon attack while adjacent to you, that creature takes 1d6 piercing damage. Increase the damage to 2d6 if the polymorph spell is 8th level or higher, or to 3d6 if it's 10th level.

When an adjacent creature damages you with piercing or slashing damage, it must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or become stupefied 1 (or stupefied 2 on a critical failure) until the end of its next turn.

These benefits last until you're no longer polymorphed into a plant.

Phalanx Breaker.name: Phalanx Breaker
Phalanx Breaker.description:
Requirements You're wielding a two-handed firearm or a two‑handed crossbow.

You know that to take out an enemy formation, you must punch a hole through its center. Make a ranged Strike with the required weapon against a target within the weapon's first range increment. The target is pushed directly back 10 feet (20 feet on a critical hit), and if this pushes the target into an obstacle, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to half your level.

Phase Arrow.name: Phase Arrow
Phase Arrow.description:
Frequency once per day

You can concentrate an immense amount of magic to create a piece of ammunition that phases through everything but your target.

Make a bow Strike against a foe who is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you (but not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}).

The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers stop the arrow. The shot ignores all cover, the concealed condition, the hidden condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor.

The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction using a non-magical shield.

Phase Bullet.name: Phase Bullet
Phase Bullet.description:
Frequency once per day

You can aim your bullets not just in three normal dimensions, but in additional dimensions as well, allowing you to fire a magical shot that phases through everything but your target. Make a crossbow or firearm Strike against a foe who's observed or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you (but not undetected). The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers and force effects stop the bullet. The shot ignores all cover, the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, the hidden condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor. The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a Shield Block reaction using a non-magical shield.

Phase Out.name: Phase Out
Phase Out.description:
Your eidolon phases out of reality slightly, gaining resistance to all damage (except force and negative) equal to half your level. It's not incorporeal, but it can't use Strikes or actions that require a fully physical form, such as @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}.

Your eidolon can return to its normal form with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Phenom's Verve.name: Phenom's Verve
Phenom's Verve.description: You're possessed with an incredibly vivacious spark that separates you not only from ordinary gun users and gunslingers, but even from other phenoms. Using that distinctive verve, when you perform impeccably and control the scene with your abilities, you also manage to set up your foes for disaster and ensure they remain in your sights for any follow-up attacks you want to make against them. If you critically succeed at a Performance check for Pistol Twirl or a pistol phenom archetype feat, you gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons until the end of your turn.

Phonetic Training.name: 语音训练 Phonetic Training
Phonetic Training.description: 即便你实际上并不能理解确切地含义，你也能近乎完美地精确判断和复述单词，而且你能够将这些词以注音字母写下来，使得你或者其他具有语音训练（Phonetic Training）专长的生物稍后阅读它。即便这些词在语言中的发音是你无法发出的，你也能够将其如实转录下来。记忆长段的词句的难度与正常情况一致。

Physical Training.name: Physical Training
Physical Training.description: You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness. You increase your proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Athletics from expert to master.

Pick Up The Pace.name: 加快步伐 Pick Up The Pace
Pick Up The Pace.description: 你以身作则，帮助他人超越他们的正常极限。队伍于探索模式中进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{急行军 Hustling} 时，你的队伍可以额外急行军20分钟，最长可为队伍中最高体质调整值的人可急行军的时长。

Pickpocket.name: 扒手 Pickpocket
Pickpocket.description: 你可以尝试对被严密看护的物品——比如被装在荷包里的物品——使用偷窃或是手上功夫技能动作而不会承受通常的-5减值。但你仍然不能对那些正在被频繁使用或是过于引人注目的物品（比如正被人穿在脚上的鞋子或是被人穿着的护甲，或是正在被人持握着的物品）使用这些动作。当你在贼活技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你可以对处于战斗中或是类似的高度警戒状态的生物使用偷窃技能动作。但如果你选择这样做，偷窃会变成一个需要2个【操作】动作的技能动作，并且你在技能检定上承受-5减值。

Pied Piping.name: Pied Piping
Pied Piping.description: 你学会 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Um0aaJotqMKGmAlR]{带领移位 Pied Piping} 组曲法术，让你能控制心灵弱小之人的行动。

Pierce The Light.name: Pierce The Light
Pierce The Light.description: You tear the veil between the Material Plane and its shadow. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} twice per week as an occult innate spell that can only target yourself; you can travel only to the Material or Shadow Planes, and your body serves as the focus component.

Pierce the Darkness.name: Pierce the Darkness
Pierce the Darkness.description:
Your eyes have adapted to see in all circumstances, even without the assistance of light. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}, allowing you to see in darkness and dim light just as well as you can in bright light. However, in darkness you see in black and white only.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.

Piercing Critical.name: Piercing Critical
Piercing Critical.description: Your attacks with your preferred weapons deal especially devastating wounds. When you Strike with a firearm or crossbow for which you have legendary proficiency, you critically succeed if you roll a 19 on the die, as long as that result is a success.

Piercing Quills.name: Piercing Quills
Piercing Quills.description: Your quills can dig particularly deep into the flesh of your opponents. Your quills unarmed attack deals [[/r {1d4}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical hit.

Pilgrim's Token.name: 朝圣者印记 Pilgrim's Token
Pilgrim's Token.description:
你从自己的信仰圣地获得了一个小小的守护印记，或者你的圣徽被圣物或圣坛触碰过。只要该印记伴随你身，当你和敌人的先攻值相等时，你会先行动。

特殊 若你在1级时选择该专长，你能免费获得该朝圣者印记。另外，若你拥有圣徽，则如上所说，它自动成为朝圣者印记。

若你在随后的等级选择该专长，或你丢失了自己的朝圣者印记，你必须购买或制造一个来替换，且需在圣地重新使其被祝福。这种印记通常消费最少2sp，祝福需要10分钟的祈祷和成功进行DC20的宗教检定。GM可以根据印记的材料质量和宗教圣地的知名度来调整价格和DC；越标志性的圣地，祝福越容易。

Pin to the Spot.name: Pin to the Spot
Pin to the Spot.description: You Strike a target within reach. If you hit and deal damage, the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} as if you had critically succeeded at an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}.

Pinch Time.name: 挤出时间 Pinch Time
Pinch Time.description:
你的双亲之一具有人类的寿命，另一名则具有精灵的寿命，而你自身则介于两者之间。作为这种情况带来的结果，你对时间有着截然不同的观点，由此你学会了如何帮助自己从短暂的压力中释放出来。

你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{加速术 Haste} 作为3环奥术内在法术（arcane innate spell），不过你只能以自身为目标。你每日能施放该法术1次。

Pinning Fire.name: Pinning Fire
Pinning Fire.description:
Trigger You use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} to make two ranged piercing weapon Strikes against the same target.

You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface.

If both your attacks hit, the target must succeed at a Reflex save against your class DC or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it or an adjacent creature succeeds at a DC 10 Athletics check to remove the pinning projectiles.

The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a water elemental or some oozes), or could otherwise escape without effort.

Pinpoint Poisoner.name: Pinpoint Poisoner
Pinpoint Poisoner.description: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons. When you successfully Strike a flat-footed creature with a poisoned weapon or expose a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creature to an inhaled poison, the flat-footed condition also gives that creature a -2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

Pirate Dedication.name: Pirate Dedication
Pirate Dedication.description:
As a pirate, you sail the seas in search of enemy ships to plunder. You become trained in Sailing Lore, or become an expert in it if you were already trained.

You ignore the effects of difficult terrain or uneven ground caused by a ship's movement. Additionally, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vZltxwRNvF5khf9a]{Boarding Assault} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the pirate archetype.

Pirate Weapon Training.name: Pirate Weapon Training
Pirate Weapon Training.description:
You're particularly skilled at wielding traditional pirate weapons. You become trained with the following weapons: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tH5GirEy7YB3ZgCk]{Rapier}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank for these weapons.

Pistol Phenom Dedication.name: Pistol Phenom Dedication
Pistol Phenom Dedication.description:
You catch an opponent off-guard by spinning your weapon. You gain the Pistol Twirl gunslinger feat, enabling you to Feint against creatures within your weapon's first range increment. This otherwise serves as Pistol Twirl for the purpose of meeting prerequisites, although as normal, it doesn't count as another pistol phenom feat for the purpose of meeting Pistol Phenom Dedication's special entry and taking another archetype. Whenever you Feint with a one-handed firearm, you can choose to attempt a Performance check instead of a Deception check.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained at least two other feats from the pistol phenom archetype.

Pistol Twirl.name: Pistol Twirl
Pistol Twirl.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded one-handed ranged weapon.

Your quick gestures and flair for performance distract your opponent, leaving it vulnerable to your follow-up attacks. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against an opponent within the required weapon's first range increment, rather than an opponent within melee reach. If you succeed, the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-footed} against your melee and ranged attacks, rather than only your melee attacks. On a critical failure, you're flat-footed against the target's melee and ranged attacks, rather than only its melee attacks.

Pistolero's Challenge.name: Pistolero's Challenge
Pistolero's Challenge.description:
With a stern call, carefully chosen barb, or some other challenging declaration, you demand your foe's attention in a duel. Choose an opponent within 30 feet who you can perceive and can hear you, and make your choice of a Deception or Intimidation check against the target's Will DC. No matter the result of the check, the foe is temporarily immune to your Pistolero's Challenge until noon the next day.

You can have only one challenge in effect at a time; challenging a new opponent ends this effect on any current target. Otherwise, the effect lasts until one of you is defeated, flees, or the encounter ends.

Success Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.

Critical Failure You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and can't use this ability again for 1 minute.

Piston Punch.name: Piston Punch
Piston Punch.description: You lash out with a powerful punch, extending your dynamo to a greater length in order to attack two creatures in a row. Make a single bludgeoning or piercing dynamo Strike and compare the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes. The first foe must be within your melee reach and the second foe must be adjacent to the first foe in a straight line away from you. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature you hit. A Piston Punch counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty. Reduce the operational time of your sterling dynamo by 1 hour.

Pitborn.name: 恶魔血脉 Pitborn
Pitborn.description:
你是在无底深渊徘徊的罪业化身─恶魔的后裔。每个深渊后裔都以不同的形式显现其恶魔血缘，例如指间生蹼以利游泳，手掌粗壮适合擒抱等。

你在运动技能上受训，若你会在运动技能上自动受训(例如背景或职业的效果)，改为让由你自选的另一个技能受训。

你还获得1个先决条件为在运动技能上受训的任意1级常见技能专长，代表你身上畸变的效果。

若你已经在本专长提供的技能上受训了，你需要手动指定另一个技能来受训。你也需要手动选择学识的类别。

Pivot Strike.name: Pivot Strike
Pivot Strike.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}

Requirements You are wielding your staff.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the target.

Plague Sniffer.name: Plague Sniffer
Plague Sniffer.description: You can sniff out the pungent tang of disease. When you detect a creature by scent, you can also detect if that creature is suffering from a disease at a non-carrier state. If the disease is particularly subtle, you might need to attempt a Perception check against the disease's DC (subject to the GM's discretion).

Planar Survival.name: 异界生存家 Planar Survival
Planar Survival.description: 你能够在异世界中使用生存技能的求生行动——即使这些位面中并不存在你通常需要赖以为生的自然特征或是资源。举例来说，你可以在通常不出产能让你食用的生物的位面中找到食物。除此之外，如果GM判断合理的话，你可以通过一个成功的求生行动检定来降低因为身处异位面而受到的环境伤害。

Plant Evidence.name: Plant Evidence
Plant Evidence.description:
You can put a single item you're holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing by succeeding at a Thievery check against their Perception DC.

If you have the ruffian racket, you can do this as a free action when you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} a target.

Plant Shape.name: Plant Shape
Plant Shape.description:
You can take the form of a plant creature.

Add the forms listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form} to your wild shape list; if you don't have wild shape, you can instead cast plant form once per day, heightened to the same level as your highest-level druid spell slot.

Whenever you're polymorphed into another form using wild shape, you gain resistance 5 to poison.

Play To The Crowd.name: Play To The Crowd
Play To The Crowd.description:
Trigger You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points during a non-trivial combat encounter with spectators.

You show off for the crowd. Attempt a Performance check; the DC is determined by the GM but is typically the standard DC for your level or the DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on the spectators, whichever is higher. On a success, choose one of the following benefits; on a critical success, choose two benefits:

  • A number of temporary Hit Points equal to your character level; these last for 1 minute.
  • A +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
  • A +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your next turn.

Plentiful Snares.name: Plentiful Snares
Plentiful Snares.description: You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients. Double the number of prepared snares granted by Snarecrafter Dedication.

Plot The Future.name: Plot The Future
Plot The Future.description:
You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out. Choose a particular goal or activity you plan to engage in within 1 week, or an event you expect might happen within 1 week. You analyze whether it's likely to come to pass, learning whether it's highly likely, somewhat likely, somewhat unlikely, or highly unlikely. You also gain a piece of advice suggesting a course of action you or your allies could take that might make the chosen event more or less likely, whichever you prefer.

The GM determines the likeliness of the event and the piece of advice you learn.

Plum Deluge.name: Plum Deluge
Plum Deluge.description:
Requirements You have at least three of the same contact poison.

You have learned to saturate an area with poison in imitation of the techniques of your rival, Blue Viper. As part of this ability, you Interact to draw three vials of the same contact poison and throw them in the air, where they shatter and spread a poisonous deluge affecting a 20-foot burst within 60 feet. All creatures in the burst are automatically exposed to the poison, immediately bypassing any onset time, and must attempt a saving throw against that poison. The three vials must be identical, even if the poison can come in multiple types or different levels.

Plumekith.name: Plumekith
Plumekith.description: Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent garuda, proud and stoic avian warriors. You only take half the normal damage from falling and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the air trait.

Point-Blank Shot.name: Point-Blank Shot
Point-Blank Shot.description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon

You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

When using a ranged volley weapon while you are in this stance, you don't take the penalty to your attack rolls from the volley trait. When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.9HPxAKpP3WJmICBx]{Stance: Point-Blank Shot}

Poison Coat.name: Poison Coat
Poison Coat.description:
Trigger A creature adjacent to you hits you with a melee unarmed Strike.

Requirements You have prepared your clothing to poison

attackers (see below).

In nature, certain animals are covered in venomous spines, such that even touching them is deadly.

To use this reaction, you must have brushed poison onto your clothing or woven sharp poisoned needles into the garment's fabric. This takes 10 minutes and uses one dose of contact or injury poison. You can have only one such poison suffused into your clothing at a time.

When you use this reaction, the triggering creature is exposed to the suffused poison.

Poison Resistance.name: 毒素抗力 Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.description:
(炼金术士) 反复曝露在有毒试剂下使得你的身体具备了针对所有毒素的抵抗力。

(Druid) Your affinity for the natural world grants you protection against some of its dangers.

Poison Weapon.name: Poison Weapon
Poison Weapon.description:
Requirements You are wielding a piercing or slashing weapon

You apply a poison to the required weapon; if you have a free hand, you can Interact to draw a poison as part of this action. If your next attack with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, it applies the effects of the poison, provided that poison can be delivered by contact or injury. If you critically fail the attack roll, the poison is wasted as normal.

Special During your daily preparations, you can prepare a number of simple injury poisons equal to your rogue level. These poisons deal 1d4 poison damage. Only you can apply these poisons properly, and they expire the next time you prepare.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.SXYcrnGzWCuj8zq7]{Effect: Poison Weapon}

Poisoner Dedication.name: Poisoner Dedication
Poisoner Dedication.description:
You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand-you never know when some arsenic or the like might prove useful.

You gain the basic alchemy benefits, though they can be used only for alchemical poisons. You gain batches of infused reagents per day equal to your level. Your advanced alchemy level for creating these is 1 and doesn't increase on its own.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained at least two other feats from the poisoner archetype.

Poisoner's Twist.name: Poisoner's Twist
Poisoner's Twist.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful melee Strike

that dealt damage against a target that is afflicted by a poison, and you know which poison.

Poisons attack specific parts of the body-one venom might target the lungs, another the circulatory system, while another deteriorates the nerves. You know how to take advantage of such weaknesses.

You deal [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 damage} damage of the required Strike's damage type and [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} to the target. If you're at least 18th level, you deal [[/r 2d6]]{2d6 damage of each type}.

Polearm Tricks.name: Polearm Tricks
Polearm Tricks.description: Your connection to rune magic has revealed tricks to make polearms deadlier in your hands. You gain the critical specialization effects of polearms.

Portentous Spell.name: Portentous Spell
Portentous Spell.description:
Your spellcasting is rife with strange lights, esoteric gestures, and other captivating effects that befuddle your foes.

If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell, any creature that attempts to use a reaction triggered by your Cast a Spell activity takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and skill checks rolled as part of the reaction.

In addition, if the spell includes a spell attack roll or requires a saving throw, creatures you hit or that fail their saves are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} with you until the start of your next turn.

Positioning Assault.name: Positioning Assault
Positioning Assault.description:
Requirements You are wielding a two-handed melee weapon and your target is within your reach

With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position. Make a Strike with the required weapon. If you hit, you move the target 5 feet into a space in your reach. This follows the forced movement rules.

Posse.name: Posse
Posse.description:
Requirements You have designated prey with @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}.

By spending 1 minute giving guidance to help hunt down your prey, you instruct up to five willing creatures to assist you. They gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} your prey, to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} your prey, and to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} about your prey. You and the creatures assisting you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls when entering combat with your prey.

This benefit lasts until you designate a new prey or your prey dies, whichever comes first. An individual creature assisting you loses this benefit if they're out of your presence for too long to benefit from your instructions. This is usually 1 hour, but is determined by the GM.

Potent Poisoner.name: 强效制毒师 Potent Poisoner
Potent Poisoner.description: 通过浓缩毒药中的剧毒成分，你让受害者更加难以抵挡毒素的侵袭。当你通过任何方式制作一份具有毒素特征的炼金物品时，这份物品的DC提升4，至多提升至你的职业DC。

Poultice Preparation.name: Poultice Preparation
Poultice Preparation.description:
When you create an herbal elixir, you can prepare it as a poultice instead. A poultice gains the oil trait (but remains alchemical, not magical) and loses the elixir and ingested traits. You can apply a poultice by @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interacting} with one hand.

When you apply a poultice, in addition to the item's normal effects, the recipient can attempt an immediate flat check to recover from a single source of persistent acid, bleed, or fire damage, with the DC reduction from appropriate assistance.

Power Attack.name: Power Attack
Power Attack.description: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady. Make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage. If you're at least 10th level, increase this to two extra dice, and if you're at least 18th level, increase it to three extra dice.

Power Slide.name: Power Slide
Power Slide.description:
Requirements You are piloting a vehicle.

You throw the vehicle into a barely controlled skid, turning sharply to evade pursuit or bring your weapons to bear. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Drive} with a -2 penalty to your piloting check, gaining the effects of the Drive action for the same number of actions you spent to Power Slide. At the end of the movement, if you succeed, you can turn the vehicle up to 90 degrees. If you critically succeed at your piloting check, you can instead turn the vehicle up to 180 degrees.

Powerful Guts.name: Powerful Guts
Powerful Guts.description: Your stomach is particularly durable. When you succeed at a Fortitude save to reduce your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} value, you reduce it by 2 (or by 3 on a critical success).

Powerful Leap.name: 强力跳跃 Powerful Leap
Powerful Leap.description: 当你使用跳跃动作时，你可以跳高的最高距离提高到5尺，跳远的距离增加5尺。

Powerful Shove.name: Powerful Shove
Powerful Shove.description:
You can push larger foes around with your attack. You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.19OLlTrxvEtDAOHc]{Aggressive Block} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gt9pvIicabSOe6pB]{Brutish Shove} against a creature up to two sizes larger than you.

When a creature you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 1). This happens regardless of how you Shoved the creature.

Powerful Snares.name: Powerful Snares
Powerful Snares.description: Your snares are particularly difficult for enemies to avoid. When you set a snare, the saving throw DC for that snare is equal to its normal DC or your class DC, whichever is higher.

Powerful Sneak.name: Powerful Sneak
Powerful Sneak.description: You have learned to exploit your enemies' lowered defenses. When you succeed or critically succeed at a Strike using your Strength modifier on the attack roll and you would deal sneak attack damage, you can change the additional damage from sneak attack into ordinary damage of the same type as your Strike, rather than precision damage.

Practiced Defender.name: Practiced Defender
Practiced Defender.description: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised. You may use the Defend exploration activity while traveling at your full travel speed instead of half your travel speed.

Practiced Guidance.name: Practiced Guidance
Practiced Guidance.description: Making one's way to safety can be harrowing, but you have extensive practice at helping others along that path. When you roll a success to Aid a member of your crop, you get a critical success instead.

Practiced Paddler.name: Practiced Paddler
Practiced Paddler.description: You're skilled at navigating bogs and marshes, even for a paddler shoony. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.

Practiced Reloads.name: Practiced Reloads
Practiced Reloads.description: You've mastered the reloading techniques and methods usually practiced by only the most dedicated firearm professionals. You gain the slinger's reload for the way you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.

Prairie Rider.name: Prairie Rider
Prairie Rider.description: You grew up riding your clan's shaggy ponies and riding dogs. You become trained in Nature. If you would automatically become trained in Nature (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also get a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} if the target is a traditional halfling mount, such as a pony or riding dog.

Prayer Attack.name: Prayer Attack
Prayer Attack.description:
Requirements You are wielding a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber} in each hand.

You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an enemy within 30 feet. If your Feint is successful, when you use Prayer Attack on subsequent turns you automatically make the target flat-footed against your melee attacks for that turn without rolling a check to Feint, so as long as you remain visible to the target and the target remains within 30 feet of you. If you use your Prayer Attack against a different target, you must attempt to Feint the target normally.

When you use Prayer Attack, your next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber that turn deals [[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} to the target.

Precious Arrow.name: Precious Arrow
Precious Arrow.description:
You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures' weaknesses.

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

Precious Munitions.name: Precious Munitions
Precious Munitions.description: You mix flecks of precious materials you've gathered on your journeys into your custom bullets to bring out those properties in your temporary ammunition. You can use advanced alchemy to create standard-grade adamantine, cold iron, or silver ammunition, spending 1 batch of reagents per piece of ammunition. At 15th level, you can create high‑grade adamantine, cold iron, or silver ammunition.

Precise Debilitations.name: Precise Debilitations
Precise Debilitations.description:
You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

  • Debilitation The target takes an additional [[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6 precision damage} from your attacks.
  • Debilitation The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.

Precise Finisher.name: Precise Finisher
Precise Finisher.description: Even when your foe avoids your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.K878asDgf1EF0B9S]{Confident Finisher}, you can still hit a vital spot. On a failure with Confident Finisher, you apply your full precise strike damage instead of half.

Predator's Growl.name: Predator's Growl
Predator's Growl.description:
Trigger You successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} a hidden or undetected creature.

You give a throaty growl to attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a creature you just found. You don't take the -4 penalty for not sharing a language with the creature.

Predator's Pounce.name: Predator's Pounce
Predator's Pounce.description:
Requirements You are unarmored or wearing light armor

You close the distance to your prey in a blur, pouncing on the creature before it can react. You Stride up to your Speed and make a Strike at the end of your movement.

Predictable!.name: Predictable!
Predictable!.description:
By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

Choose one target and attempt a Perception check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} against the foe's Deception DC or a hard DC of the foe's level, whichever is higher.

Critical Success You precisely discern the target's strategy, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the creature until the start of your next turn and a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against the creature before the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.I4Ozf6mTnd3X0Oax]{Effect: Predictable! (Critical Success)}

Success You deduce the gist of the target's strategy; as critical success, except the circumstance bonus is only +1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.5v0ndPPMfZwhiVZF]{Effect: Predictable!}

Failure You fail to discern the target's strategy and gain no benefit.

Critical Failure You misinterpret the target's strategy and take a -1 circumstance penalty to AC against the creature until the start of your next turn, and a -1 circumstance penalty to your next saving throw against the creature before the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.KgR1myc4OLzVxfxn]{Effect: Predictable! (Critical Failure)}

Predictive Purchase (Investigator).name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
Predictive Purchase (Investigator).description:
You have just the thing for the situation. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} feats.

When using Prescient Planner, you can pull out the item as a 2-action activity to remove your backpack (or a similar container) and draw the item, rather than taking 1 minute.

Predictive Purchase (Rogue).name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
Predictive Purchase (Rogue).description:
You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} feats.

When using Prescient Planner, you can draw the item from your backpack (or a similar container) as a 2-action activity, instead of taking 1 minute to do so.

Preemptive Reconfiguration.name: Preemptive Reconfiguration
Preemptive Reconfiguration.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Your body anticipates the blow. The impact area briefly reorganizes into a strengthened tissue lattice that blunts the attack. You gain resistance equal to your level to the triggering damage type, which applies against the triggering damage.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ewk7h9aQpKvy1RJo]{Crystalline Dust} feat, you can use Preemptive Reconfiguration without expending a usage of the reaction for the purpose of the feat's Frequency limit. Instead, the usage counts toward your number of Crystalline Dust uses per day, as if you had used that feat instead.

Premonition Of Avoidance.name: Premonition Of Avoidance
Premonition Of Avoidance.description:
Trigger You attempt a saving throw against a hazard, but you haven't rolled yet.

Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Premonition Of Clarity.name: Premonition Of Clarity
Premonition Of Clarity.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail a saving throw against a mental effect.

Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks. Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus. You must use the second result, even if it's worse.

Preparation.name: Preparation
Preparation.description: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities. You gain one additional reaction, which you can use before the beginning of your next turn for any rogue reaction.

Prescient Consumable.name: 预见消耗 Prescient Consumable
Prescient Consumable.description: 你可以猜出接下来需要什么消耗品。使用预见计划专长时，你可以从背包中拿出一件消耗品，而不是一件冒险道具。该消耗品必须是等级不高于你等级一半的常见消耗品，其负载也必须轻到即便算上它你也不会重载的程度。

Prescient Planner.name: 预见计划 Prescient Planner
Prescient Planner.description:
消耗 所选物品的价格

需求 从你上一次购物到现在为止，你还未使用该专长

你经常制定复杂的计划和突发事件，并利用你的资源来确保它们。花费1分钟清理背包，你能小心找出一个你未曾宣言购买的物品——上一次购物机会中你的直觉认为这很重要并悄悄越过你的理性买了它。

该物品必须是一种冒险道具，不能是武器、护甲、炼金物品、魔法物品或其它宝物。

它的稀有度必须为常见，其等级不能大于你自己等级的一半，其负载也必须轻到即便算上它你也不会重载的程度。

Preternatural Parry.name: 超常格挡 Preternatural Parry
Preternatural Parry.description:
触发 你成为打击或法术攻击的目标，或者你将要进行对抗法术效应的豁免骰

需求 你必须有至少一只空闲手。

你在最后时刻挥舞武器或肢体到格挡伤害的位置。直到你的下个回合开始，你的AC和对抗触发效应的豁免骰获得+2环境加值。

Prevailing Position.name: Prevailing Position
Prevailing Position.description:
Trigger You are targeted by an attack or attempt a Reflex saving throw against a damaging effect, and you are in a stance.

Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.COsdMolZraFRTdP8]{Effect: Prevailing Position}

Pride Hunter.name: Pride Hunter
Pride Hunter.description: You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies. You can use lesser cover from your allies to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}.

Pride in Arms.name: Pride in Arms
Pride in Arms.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet brings a foe to 0 Hit Points.

With a shout of triumph, you grant inspiration to an ally fight on. The triggering ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to their Constitution modifier until the end of their next turn.

Primal Aegis.name: Primal Aegis
Primal Aegis.description: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy. You and allies within 30 feet of you gain resistance equal to your Wisdom modifier to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, and positive damage.

Primal Breadth.name: 原能扩展 Primal Breadth
Primal Breadth.description: 你每天可以施展更多的德鲁伊法术。除了最高两个环级以外，每个环级你都获得额外一个来自德鲁伊变体专长的每日法术位。

Primal Evolution.name: Primal Evolution
Primal Evolution.description: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus}. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if it they aren't in your spell repertoire.

Primal Focus.name: Primal Focus
Primal Focus.description: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Primal Rampage.name: Primal Rampage
Primal Rampage.description: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin} as 4th-level primal innate spells that you can cast once per day. As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.

Primal Summons.name: Primal Summons
Primal Summons.description: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water. You gain the primal summons order spell.

Primal Wellspring.name: Primal Wellspring
Primal Wellspring.description: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Pristine Weapon.name: Pristine Weapon
Pristine Weapon.description: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures. The weapon is treated as cold iron and silver. If you critically hit a creature that has a weakness to cold iron or silver, the target takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} as the primal energies within your weapon slow its natural healing.

Project Persona.name: Project Persona
Project Persona.description:
Where others etch their armor to serve as a conduit for their imaginations, your vivid mind and bold personality allow you to project a more fitting persona over your lackluster armor.

You change the shape and appearance of your armor to appear as ordinary or fine clothes of your imagining. The armor's statistics don't change. This effect lasts as long as you remain conscious and are wearing the armor.

A creature can disbelieve the illusion by Seeking or touching your armor. The DC equals your Will DC.

Propeller Attachment.name: Propeller Attachment
Propeller Attachment.description: You've mastered attaching clockwork propellers to your daily quick-deploy snares that use gears. This allows you to place your snares in the air or underwater, where they remain in place for up to 10 minutes, after which the propeller runs out of power and they fall or sink. Unless you use additional precautions to hide it, a propeller snare's location is usually obvious.

Protect Ally.name: Protect Ally
Protect Ally.description: You place your body between your friends and your enemies, protecting your allies against oncoming attacks. You choose one adjacent ally. That ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn or until that ally is no longer adjacent to you, whichever comes first. You can only protect a single ally in this way. If you choose to Protect a different Ally, the previous ally loses the bonus to AC.

Protective Bond.name: Protective Bond
Protective Bond.description:
Trigger You and your eidolon are in a damaging effect's area.

The power of your bond can protect you and your eidolon from harm. If you and your eidolon would take different amounts of damage from the area effect, you take the lower amount of damage instead of the greater amount of damage.

Special This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Protective Claws.name: Protective Claws
Protective Claws.description: The chitin on your claws is so hard you can defend against attacks with them. Your claw unarmed attack from the vicious goloma heritage gains the parry weapon trait.

Protective Sheath.name: Protective Sheath
Protective Sheath.description: When you lash out with your @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kJJvKm80KwWXPukV]{Clan Dagger}, you keep its sheath close at hand. When you use Clan's Edge, if the hand you're not holding the dagger with is empty, you can use your clan dagger's sheath to block attacks as well. The circumstance bonus to your AC from parrying increases to a +2 against any target you hit with a Strike this turn.

Protective Subroutine.name: Protective Subroutine
Protective Subroutine.description: Your nanites can augment your defenses. You can choose to activate @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge} when you attempt a saving throw, instead of when you attempt a skill check. If you do, you gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Prototype Companion.name: 原型伙伴 Prototype Companion
Prototype Companion.description: 你创造了一个构装伙伴，尽管它可能不是你的大发明，但也是值得信赖的仆从。你获得一个原型构装伙伴。

Provocator Dedication.name: Provocator Dedication
Provocator Dedication.description:
Access Successfully defeat the eberarks in the Irorium.

For you, fighting is as much about style as skill. You become trained in simple weapons, martial weapons, and one advanced weapon of your choice. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using your chosen advanced weapon, you also apply the critical specialization of that weapon. You become an expert in Performance and your choice of either Acrobatics or Athletics. If you were an expert in all three of these skills, you instead become an expert in a skill of your choice.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the provocator archetype.

Proximity Alert.name: Proximity Alert
Proximity Alert.description: You're unnaturally in tune with your surroundings and react instinctively to danger. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks made as initiative rolls.

Purge Sins.name: Purge Sins
Purge Sins.description:
Frequency once per day

You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities. For each disease or poison currently affecting you, attempt a Religion check to counteract that disease or poison. As normal, your counteract level is equal to half your level, rounded up.

Purifying Spell.name: Purifying Spell
Purifying Spell.description: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness. If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature, you can attempt to counteract a disease or poison affecting the target, in addition to the other benefits of heal. If you do, heal gains the water trait.

Push It.name: Push It
Push It.description: You can push your vehicle's performance beyond the limits envisioned by its makers. Whenever you succeed at a piloting check, the vehicle you are piloting gains a +5-foot circumstance bonus to all its Speeds until the end of your turn. If you critically succeed, this bonus increases to +10 feet.

Pushing Attack.name: Pushing Attack
Pushing Attack.description: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the shove trait. It gains the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} action for that attack.

Qlippoth Magic.name: Qlippoth Magic
Qlippoth Magic.description: 你仔细钻研血脉中的神祕后，甚至能逼迫现实自我扭曲。每日各1次，你可以2环级神术内在法术的形式，施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{朦胧术 Blur} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{沉默术 Silence} 。

Quadruped.name: Quadruped
Quadruped.description:
You were crafted in a form with four legs rather than two. Your Speed is 30 feet.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.

Quah Bond.name: Quah Bond
Quah Bond.description:
Access Shoanti ethnicity

You grew up among the Shoanti tribes, with the spirits watching over you, and they offer you guidance. You gain the trained proficiency rank in the skill listed for your quah (or another skill of your choice, if you're already trained in that skill). You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Assurance} skill feat in that skill, as the spirits' help guides your actions.

  • Lyrune-Quah: Religion
  • Shadde-Quah: Athletics
  • Shriikirri-Quah: Nature
  • Shundar-Quah: Diplomacy
  • Sklar-Quah: Intimidation
  • Skoan-Quah: Medicine
  • Tamiir-Quah: Acrobatics

Quaking Stomp.name: Quaking Stomp
Quaking Stomp.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake, with the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake} spell.

Quick Alchemy.name: 高速炼金 Quick Alchemy
Quick Alchemy.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yzNJgwzV9XqEhKc6]{高速炼金 Quick Alchemy}动作。

Quick Block.name: 快速格挡 Quick Block
Quick Block.description: 你本能地使用盾牌进行格挡。在你每个回合开始时，你获得一个额外的反应动作，但这个反应动作只能用于执行盾牌格挡。

高速投弹手 Quick Bomber.name: Quick Bomber
高速投弹手 Quick Bomber.description: 你把你的炸弹放在容易触及的弹药袋中，以便你不假思索地取出。你通过 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact} 取出一枚炸弹，然后立即用它进行打击（Strike）。

Quick Change (Beastkin).name: Quick Change (Beastkin)
Quick Change (Beastkin).description:
Trigger You roll initiative.

Your instincts kick in and you take on an aggressive stance. You use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape} to enter your hybrid form or a new form granted by a beastkin feat.

Quick Change (Vigilante).name: Quick Change (Vigilante)
Quick Change (Vigilante).description: You can shift between your identities with ease. Instead of spending 1 minute to change your identity, you can now do so as a 3-action activity. If you are legendary in Deception, you can perform this change as a 1-action activity.

Quick Climb.name: 迅速攀爬 Quick Climb
Quick Climb.description: 当你进行攀爬动作时，你可以在运动检定成功的情况下多移动5尺距离，或是在大成功的情况下多移动10尺距离，最多不超过你的最大陆地移动速度。当你在运动技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你获得相当于你的陆地移动速度的攀爬速度。

Quick Coercion.name: 迅速胁迫 Quick Coercion
Quick Coercion.description: 你可以用切中要害的三言两语让他人屈服。你只需要1轮时间而非通常的1分钟时间交谈就对另一个生物发动胁迫技能动作。拥有本专长不能使你可以对处于战斗中或是尚未和你展开交谈的生物进行胁迫技能动作。

Quick Contacts.name: 快速交谊 Quick Contacts
Quick Contacts.description: 你知道要去哪，找谁做事，如何交朋友，以最快的速度。当进入一个新聚居点时，花费1天休整期，你就能用关系户或犯罪网络专长构筑足够的关系网。若你社群技能为传奇熟练等级，你在进入新聚居点时只需1小时技能构筑关系网。

Quick Disguise.name: 迅速易容 Quick Disguise
Quick Disguise.description: 现在你只需要通常所需时间的一半（5分钟）就能完成乔装技能动作的易容。当你在欺骗技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你只需要通常所需时间的十分之一（1分钟）就能完成乔装技能动作的易容；当你在欺骗技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你只需要3个动作就可以完成整个易容和乔装他人的行动。

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion. You Interact to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon.

Quick Fix.name: Quick Fix
Quick Fix.description:
You can attach a talisman using only a bit of glue and some string. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9xA8P2Vlz98He7C]{Rapid Affixture} skill feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. When you use it, you can affix or remove up to four talismans in 1 minute instead of just one.

You gain the ability to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Affix a Talisman} as a 3-action activity from that feat at 12th level, regardless of your Crafting proficiency.

Quick Identification.name: 迅速辨识 Quick Identification
Quick Identification.description: 你可以迅速地读出魔法的性质。你只需要花费1分钟，而非通常的10分钟时间就可以辨识出一件物品，一个区域或是一个魔法现象具备的魔法性质。当你在对应魔法宗派的技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你只需要3个动作就可以辨识魔法；当你在对应魔法宗派的技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你只需要1个动作就可以辨识魔法。

Quick Juggler.name: Quick Juggler
Quick Juggler.description: When you start to juggle or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one. Increase the maximum number of items you can Juggle by one.

Quick Jump.name: 迅速跳跃 Quick Jump
Quick Jump.description: 你可以只用一个动作来进行跳高或是跳远而非通常所需的2个动作。若你如此做，则不执行最初的行走动作（不会因未行走助跑10尺而失败）

Quick Mount.name: Quick Mount
Quick Mount.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to a creature that is at least

one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.

You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{Mount} the creature and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to issue it an order of your choice.

Quick Recognition.name: 迅速认知 Quick Recognition
Quick Recognition.description:
你一眼就能看出法术的路数。

每轮一次，你可以使用一项你达到大师级熟练度的技能，以一个自由动作来 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{辨识法术 Recognize Spell}。

Quick Repair.name: 迅速修理 Quick Repair
Quick Repair.description: 你现在只需要1分钟时间就可以完成修理技能动作。当你在手艺技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你只需要3个动作就可以完成修理；当你在手艺技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你只需要1个动作就可以完成修理。

Quick Reversal.name: Quick Reversal
Quick Reversal.description:
Requirements You are flanked by at least two enemies

You turn your foes' flanking against them with a quick reverse. Make a melee Strike against one of the flanking enemies and make a second Strike with the same weapon or unarmed attack against a different enemy that is flanking you. This second Strike has the same multiple attack penalty of the initial attack and doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.

Quick Shield Block.name: Quick Shield Block
Quick Shield Block.description: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}.

Quick Shot.name: Quick Shot
Quick Shot.description: You draw your bow and attack with the same action. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw a weapon from the bow weapon group that is loaded or has reload 0, then Strike with that weapon.

Quick Snares.name: Quick Snares
Quick Snares.description: You can rig a snare in only moments. You can Craft snares that normally take 1 minute to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} with 3 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} actions, even if you haven't prepared them.

Quick Squeeze.name: 迅速穿越 Quick Squeeze
Quick Squeeze.description: 你现在可以以每轮5尺（技能检定大成功时10尺）的速度挤入一个狭窄空间。当你在特技技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你可以以你通常的陆地移动动作挤过狭窄空间。

Quick Stow (Ratfolk).name: Quick Stow (Ratfolk)
Quick Stow (Ratfolk).description:
Frequency once per round

You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to store one held item in your cheek pouches (provided it fits).

Quick Stow (Swordmaster).name: Quick Stow (Swordmaster)
Quick Stow (Swordmaster).description: You know that situations can change rapidly and might leave you needing to change equipment in the middle of combat. Your training has taught you how to swap your equipment on the fly. You Interact to stow a weapon and then Interact again to draw a readied item or weapon.

Quick Study.name: Quick Study
Quick Study.description:
During your daily preparations, you can study a particular subject to gain the trained proficiency rank in one Lore skill of your choice. You must have interacted with that subject in some way on the previous day, whether by reading about it, talking to someone knowledgeable on the topic, or experiencing it yourself.

Alternatively, you can reference your notes to instead choose a Lore skill you've prepared before with Quick Study. This proficiency lasts until you prepare again. Since this proficiency is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or a permanent character option like a feat.

Quick Swim.name: 迅速游泳 Quick Swim
Quick Swim.description: 当你进行游泳动作时，你可以在运动检定成功的情况下游动5尺距离，或是在大成功的情况下游动10尺距离，最多不超过你的最大陆地移动速度。当你在运动技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你获得相当于你的陆地移动速度的游泳速度。

Quick Unlock.name: 迅速开锁 Quick Unlock
Quick Unlock.description: 你现在可以使用1个而非2个动作来进行开锁技能动作。

Quicken Heartbeat.name: Quicken Heartbeat
Quicken Heartbeat.description:
Frequency once per turn

You've replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine. You reduce your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition by 1. Alternatively, if you are not slowed, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} during your next turn, and can use your extra action to Stride or Strike.

Quickened Attunement.name: Quickened Attunement
Quickened Attunement.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements Your previous action was Attunement Shift.

If your next action is to cast a spell that would grant your terrain attunement bonus, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (to a minimum of 1 action).

Special You can't use Quickened Attunement and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z2ptq23nNBOeEI7H]{Quickened Casting} in the same round.

Quickened Casting.name: 快速施法 Quickened Casting
Quickened Casting.description:
频率 每天一次

如果你的下一个动作是施展一个诗人戏法，或者比你能施展最高等级诗人法术低2级或以下的诗人法术，将其施法动作减少一个（最少为一个动作）。

Quiet Allies.name: 集体潜行 Quiet Allies
Quiet Allies.description: 你擅长引导整个小队进行潜伏行动。当你尝试使用回避注意（Avoiding Notice）行动而你的队友选择使用跟随专家（Follow the Expert），你和所有跟随你的盟友可以进行单独一次隐秘技能检定，使用该结果加上你们中最低的隐秘技能调整值来决定所有人的隐秘检定结果，而不需要为每一个盟友单独投骰。本专长的效果不能应用在先攻检定上。

Quill Spray.name: Quill Spray
Quill Spray.description:
Frequency once per day

You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a 30-foot cone, dealing [[/r {5d8}[piercing]]]{5d8 piercing damage}. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes [[/r {5}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

[[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d8 #piercing]]{Levelled} piercing damage

[[/r ceil(@actor.level/2) #persistent bleed]]{Levelled} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}

Quivering Palm.name: Quivering Palm
Quivering Palm.description: Your strikes can kill foes. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ovvflf5aFbmBxqq8]{Quivering Palm} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Radiant Blade Master.name: 闪耀利刃至尊 Radiant Blade Master
Radiant Blade Master.description:
你的神圣盟友将你所选中的武器转化为同类武器中的至尊之作。

当你在日常准备期间为你的利刃神圣盟友选择武器时，将下列属性符文添加到你能选择的效果列表中： @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{舞空 Dancing}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.HjfIXg5btodThCTW]{效果：利刃盟友高等瓦解符文}和 @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Gf7h44DcTB43464h]{效果：利刃盟友锐锋符文}。

Radiant Blade Spirit.name: 闪耀利刃圣灵 Radiant Blade Spirit
Radiant Blade Spirit.description:
你的神圣盟友闪耀着强大的力量，增幅你选中的武器。

当你在日常准备期间为你的利刃盟友选择一把武器时，将如下属性符文添加到你的可选效果列表中： @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.YxYr18vleIt2t3RS]{效果：利刃盟友炽焰符文}和匹配你事业阵营的任意阵营属性 (@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.xLXFK4mtzgAF4zvx]{效果：利刃盟友混乱符文}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ZzE6jPbCyUqEqhcb]{效果：利刃盟友公理符文}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.l98IthkklgLDJXIo]{效果：利刃盟友神圣符文}或 @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.rGSc2PtvU3mgm18S]{效果：利刃盟友邪恶符文})。

Radiant Burst.name: Radiant Burst
Radiant Burst.description:
Frequency once per day

Your skin glows with intensity. Creatures within 10 feet who can see you must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and dazzled for 4 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 4 rounds and dazzled for 10 minutes.

Radiant Circuitry.name: Radiant Circuitry
Radiant Circuitry.description: Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). The light shuts off when you take this action again or are knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

Radiant Infusion.name: Radiant Infusion
Radiant Infusion.description:
You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional 1d6 positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.cH8JD3ub4eEKuIAD]{Effect: Radiant Infusion}

Radiate Glory.name: Radiate Glory
Radiate Glory.description:
Your inherent glory radiates into the world with all the divine power of the celestial planes for 1 minute.

Any creature that can see you while you Radiate Glory must attempt a Will saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to this effect for 24 hours.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the creature for 1 round by the shining light, but can't use this concealment to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, as normal for when your location is obvious.

Failure As success, except you are concealed to the creature while your glory radiates.

Critical Failure You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to the creature while your glory radiates, lost amid the radiant corona of your presence. Your general position is still obvious, so you can't use this to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Raging Athlete.name: Raging Athlete
Raging Athlete.description: Physical obstacles can't hold back your fury.
