While you are raging, you gain a climb Speed and swim Speed equal to your land Speed and the DC of High Jumps and Long Jumps decreases by 10. Your distance for a vertical Leap increases by 5 feet vertically, and your distance for a horizontal Leap increases to 15 feet if your Speed is at least 15 feet and to 20 feet if your Speed is at least 30 feet.

Raging Intimidation.name: Raging Intimidation
Raging Intimidation.description: Your fury fills your foes with fear. While you are raging, your Demoralize and Scare to Death actions (from the Intimidation skill and an Intimidation skill feat, respectively) gain the rage trait, allowing you to use them while raging. As soon as you meet the prerequisites for the skill feats Intimidating Glare and Scare to Death, you gain these feats.

Raging Thrower.name: Raging Thrower
Raging Thrower.description: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

Rain of Bolts.name: Rain of Bolts
Rain of Bolts.description:
Frequency once per day

Throughout the day, your body produces powerful projectiles within your chassis. You fire them all at once in either a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]{30-foot cone} or a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10-foot emanation}. Foes in the area take [[/r {6d6}[piercing]]]{6d6 piercing damage}. This increases to 7d6 at 12th level, 8d6 at 15th level, and 9d6 at 18th level.

Enhancement The projectiles regenerate quicker, they are much more powerful, and you can refine the metallic content to harm certain creatures. You can use Rain of Bolts once per hour instead of once per day. The damage increases to 12d6 and each time you use the action, you can choose adamantine, cold iron, or silver. The damage from Rain of Bolts is treated as the metal you chose. At 20th level, the damage increases to 13d6.

Rain of Embers Stance.name: Rain of Embers Stance
Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored.

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that flicker with dancing flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Im5JBInybWFbHEYS]{Stance: Rain of Embers Stance}

Rain-Scribe Mobility.name: Rain-Scribe Mobility
Rain-Scribe Mobility.description: You surround yourself in a mantle of Rain-Scribe magic and Stride twice; difficult terrain does not reduce your Speed, even if the difficult terrain has been manipulated by magic. Your magic clears the difficult terrain in each square you entered; until your next turn, those squares aren't difficult terrain for any creature walking through them (or are normal difficult terrain if they were previously greater difficult terrain).

Rain-Scribe Sustenance.name: Rain-Scribe Sustenance
Rain-Scribe Sustenance.description:
You use the power of your Rain-Scribe magic to draw on a stream of primal power for sustenance. You don't need to eat or drink and need only 6 hours of rest to feel well rested. You must still rest at least 8 hours and spend 1 hour of preparation to regain resources usable only a limited number of times per day, such as spell slots.

You can draw on primal power to stay awake and alert while otherwise resting your body and mind, gaining the full benefits of an 8-hour rest without falling asleep. When you do, you lose the other benefits of Rain- Scribe Sustenance for 1 week while your primal energies recharge.

Raise a Tome.name: 举起书卷 Raise a Tome
Raise a Tome.description:
需求 你拿着一本书

你举起所拿着的书，然后将其翻开以防御自己并加快学习的速度。这本书一直保持举起（raise）状态直到你的下一个回合开始为止。在举起书的时候，你获得 +1 的AC环境加值，并且辨识（identify）本书技能相关的生物获得 +1 回忆知识（Recall Knowle）环境加值（例如你举起你的法术书时回忆奥法 arcana）。这是相较于书本通常给予检定的任何物品加值以外的加值。

如果你具有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡}专长，你可以用书本来响应这个专长（硬度 hardness 3，HP 12，BT 6）就好像它是一面盾牌一样。无论你使用任何允许你使用举起盾牌（Raise a Shield）动作的能力时，例如 Emergency Targe，你可以用举起书卷（Raise a Tome）替代，任何通常需要一面盾牌的需求（requirement）都可以使用你的书本替代。

Rakshasa Magic.name: 罗刹魔法 Rakshasa Magic
Rakshasa Magic.description: 你回想起罗刹先祖记忆中的密技以及实行的手法。每日各1次，你可以2环级神术内在法术的形式，施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{类人形态 Humanoid Form} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{幻象生物 Illusory Creature}。

Rallying Charge.name: Rallying Charge
Rallying Charge.description:
Your fearless charge into battle reinvigorates your allies to carry on the fight.

You Stride up to your Speed and make a melee Strike. If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 60 feet who saw you hit gains temporary Hit Points equal to your Charisma modifier. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Rallying Cry.name: Rallying Cry
Rallying Cry.description:
Frequency once per day

You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat. All allies within 30 feet that can hear you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level. In addition, these allies become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute but can only use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Rampaging Ferocity.name: Rampaging Ferocity
Rampaging Ferocity.description:
Trigger You use Orc Ferocity.

You lash out viciously even as you fend off death. Make a single melee Strike. If this Strike brings a foe to 0 Hit Points, this activation of Orc Ferocity doesn't count against its frequency.

Rampaging Form.name: 炽怒型态 Rampaging Form
Rampaging Form.description:
每天一次，当你用化形变成狐狸时，你可以选择同时产生五环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态 Animal Form} 和7环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{火焰之躯 Fiery Body} 的效果，持续时间为一分钟或是等到你变回来，取其先者。即使处在战斗型态，你也可以施展火焰之躯所提供的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{燃火术 Produce Flame}。

特殊 如果你是雪狐，你的型态会结冰而非燃烧。这会让火焰之躯效果的免疫和伤害变成寒冷，弱点变成火焰，并将燃火术变成 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{冰冻射线 Ray of Frost}。

Ranged Combatant.name: Ranged Combatant
Ranged Combatant.description:
Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

When you select this feat, choose a damage type: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, negative, piercing, positive, or slashing. If your eidolon is a celestial, fiend, or monitor with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment.

Ranged Combatant (Acid).name: Ranged Combatant (Acid)
Ranged Combatant (Acid).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 acid damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Bludgeoning).name: Ranged Combatant (Bludgeoning)
Ranged Combatant (Bludgeoning).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Chaotic).name: Ranged Combatant (Chaotic)
Ranged Combatant (Chaotic).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 chaotic damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Cold).name: Ranged Combatant (Cold)
Ranged Combatant (Cold).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 cold damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Electricity).name: Ranged Combatant (Electricity)
Ranged Combatant (Electricity).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 electricity damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Evil).name: Ranged Combatant (Evil)
Ranged Combatant (Evil).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 evil damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Fire).name: Ranged Combatant (Fire)
Ranged Combatant (Fire).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 fire damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Good).name: Ranged Combatant (Good)
Ranged Combatant (Good).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 good damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Lawful).name: Ranged Combatant (Lawful)
Ranged Combatant (Lawful).description:
Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

When you select this feat, choose a damage type: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, negative, piercing, positive, or slashing. If your eidolon is a celestial, fiend, or monitor with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment.

Ranged Combatant (Negative).name: Ranged Combatant (Negative)
Ranged Combatant (Negative).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 negative damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Piercing).name: Ranged Combatant (Piercing)
Ranged Combatant (Piercing).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 piercing damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Positive).name: Ranged Combatant (Positive)
Ranged Combatant (Positive).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 positive damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Combatant (Slashing).name: Ranged Combatant (Slashing)
Ranged Combatant (Slashing).description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 slashing damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

Ranged Disarm.name: Ranged Disarm
Ranged Disarm.description:
Requirements You're wielding a simple firearm.

When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the target using a ranged attack roll with your simple firearm, instead of attempting an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC.

Ranged Reprisal.name: 远距复仇 Ranged Reprisal
Ranged Reprisal.description: 你能够使用远程武器发动报应打击。此外，如果触发反应动作的敌人在你的触及范围周围5尺之中，而不在你的触及范围之内，你可以在发动一次近战报应打击之前，作为反应动作的一部分进行快步（Step）好让敌人处于你的触及范围之内。

Ranger Dedication.name: 游侠入门 Ranger Dedication
Ranger Dedication.description:
你在生存Survival中受训；如果你已经在生存Survival中受训，你在另一个你自选的技能中受训。你在游侠的职业DC中受训。你可以使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey} 动作。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从游侠变体中获得了其他两个专长。

Ranger Resiliency.name: 游侠韧性 Ranger Resiliency
Ranger Resiliency.description: 你获得的每个游侠的变体职业专长都会给予你3点额外生命值。如果你继续选择游侠变体职业专长，你就会继续按这种方式获得额外生命值。

Ranger's Bramble.name: Ranger's Bramble
Ranger's Bramble.description: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KktHf7zIAWOr499h]{Ranger's Bramble} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Rapid Affixture.name: 快速附着 Rapid Affixture
Rapid Affixture.description: 你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{附着护符 Affix a Talisman}只需要1分钟。若你手艺技能为传奇熟练等级，附着护符只需要【AAA】行动。

Rapid Manifestation.name: 迅捷显现 Rapid Manifestation
Rapid Manifestation.description:
触发 你骰先攻，或一种危害攻击你

当你处于危险时，你坚定的灵魂霎时使你做好防御。你显现你的魂铸武装。

Rapid Mantel.name: 鹞子翻身 Rapid Mantel
Rapid Mantel.description: 你可以轻易地将自己托举起来。当你使用抓住边缘（Grab the Edge）动作来阻止专家坠落时，你可以同时将自己拉到你抓住的那个平面是并站起身来。除此之外，现在你可以使用运动技能检定取代反射豁免检定来尝试抓住边缘动作。

Rapid Recharge.name: 急速再充能 Rapid Recharge
Rapid Recharge.description:
频率 每天一次

你利用奥术诀窍来恢复你将法术与攻击交融的能力。你再充能（recharge）你的法术打击。

Rapid Response.name: Rapid Response
Rapid Response.description:
Trigger An ally is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance. You Stride towards the triggering ally. You gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed during this movement.

Rat Familiar.name: Rat Familiar
Rat Familiar.description: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar, and this familiar must be a rat. It still gets the benefits of familiar abilities, but its base form remains a rat.

Rat Form.name: Rat Form
Rat Form.description: You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat to scout an area or slip through tight spaces. You gain the effects of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell, except that you must assume the battle form of a Tiny rat.

Rat Magic.name: Rat Magic
Rat Magic.description: There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{Animal Messenger} once per day as a primal innate spell. When you do, the animal that responds is always a rat. If there are no rats within range, the spell is lost.

Ratfolk Growth.name: Ratfolk Growth
Ratfolk Growth.description: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} as a 6th-level primal innate spell once per day. You can target only yourself and other ratfolk with this spell.

Ratfolk Lore.name: Ratfolk Lore
Ratfolk Lore.description:
Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you've learned to run and hide when enemies threaten.

You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Ratfolk Lore.

Ratfolk Roll.name: Ratfolk Roll
Ratfolk Roll.description: Your ability to curl up into a tight ball comes in handy. You roll up into a ball and move up to four times your Speed in a straight line down an incline. If you reach the bottom of the incline or hit an obstacle during this first turn of movement, you stop rolling safely. Otherwise, you automatically keep rolling at this Speed during subsequent turns until you hit the bottom of the incline or an obstacle ends this movement (which can happen in the middle of your turn). You're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} each turn after the first that you keep rolling, and if you hit an obstacle on a turn after the first, you and the obstacle both take [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage} and you stop rolling.

Ratspeak.name: Ratspeak
Ratspeak.description:
To you, the squeaking of rats and other rodents makes a strange kind of sense.

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with rodents, including beavers, mice, porcupines, rats, and squirrels, but not with other mammals, such as dogs or bats. The GM determines which animals count as rodents.

Ravening's Desperation.name: Ravening's Desperation
Ravening's Desperation.description: Your study of the Beast of Gluttondark has taught you how to make do in the most trying of circumstances rather than succumb to weakness. As long as your current Hit Points are less than half your maximum Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival and Stealth checks. If your current Hit Points are less than a quarter your maximum Hit Points, the circumstance bonus is +2 instead.

Razor Claws.name: Razor Claws
Razor Claws.description: Your have honed your claws to be deadly. Your claw attack deals [[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 slashing damage} instead of 1d4 and gains the versatile (piercing) trait.

Razzle-Dazzle.name: Razzle-Dazzle
Razzle-Dazzle.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blind} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzle} a creature.

You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights.

Extend the duration of the blinded or dazzled condition you give the target by 1 round.

Reach Beyond.name: Reach Beyond
Reach Beyond.description: You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't. You can make melee Strikes against incorporeal creatures that are inside solid objects as long as the object is within your reach. An incorporeal creature inside of a solid object is hidden, requiring you to succeed at a DC 11 flat check when you target it. You can spend an action, which has the concentrate trait, to focus on a creature inside of a solid object. If you do, the next melee Strike you make this turn requires you to succeed at only a DC 6 flat check to affect the creature.

Reach Spell.name: 及远法术 Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description: 你扩展了法术的距离，如果你使用的下一个动作是 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施展 Cast a Spell} 一个拥有距离的法术。那么该法术的距离提高30尺。通常情况下如果该法术的距离为接触，则该施法距离提升至30尺。

Reach for the Sky.name: Reach for the Sky
Reach for the Sky.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

You command the room, firing a gun into the air and ordering everyone to surrender and put their hands in the air. You fire your firearm and then attempt a single Intimidation check to Demoralize each enemy within 30 feet. Creatures who become frightened instinctively put their hands in the air. If they had Raised a Shield, they lose the benefits, as they raise the shield above their head where it's of little use to block attacks. With their hands in the air, each of these frightened creatures can't use reactions or free actions that require their hands, or items held in their hands, until the beginning of their next turn. Regardless of the result, each creature is then temporarily immune to Reach for the Sky for 1 minute.

Reach for the Stars.name: Reach for the Stars
Reach for the Stars.description: The sky's the limit, as long as you've got enough black powder. When you use Black Powder Boost, you can expend additional black powder or ammunition to boost yourself farther. For each dose of black powder or piece of firearm ammunition you spend in addition to your shot, you add another 10 feet to the height or distance of your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, to a maximum of 5 boosts (a +50-foot status bonus). You must be wearing a dose of black powder or piece of ammunition, or have it in hand, to detonate it for a boost. You can choose at which points in your Leap you detonate each boost, allowing you to change direction each time. You must then move in a straight line until you boost again or end your Leap.

Reactive Charm.name: Reactive Charm
Reactive Charm.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are the target of a spell or attack.

You're so charming and distracting that when pressed, you can cast a simple enchantment in time to foil an attacker. You cast any of your 1st-level enchantment spells that normally take two actions or fewer to cast. This takes effect before the triggering spell or attack, and if the attacker is affected by your spell, it can make different decisions based on the effects (for instance, if you charm the attacker and it becomes friendly to you, it can choose a different target than you for its attack or spell). The attacking creature must be in range of your chosen spell, and if your spell requires targets, the attacking creature must be a valid target. Your spell affects only the attacking creature, even if it would normally affect more targets or an area.

Reactive Dismissal.name: Reactive Dismissal
Reactive Dismissal.description:
Trigger Your eidolon would take damage.

You abruptly dismiss your eidolon to reduce the damage it takes, though this makes summoning it again more difficult. Reduce the triggering damage to your eidolon by double your level, and your eidolon unmanifests. You can't Manifest your Eidolon again until after the end of your next turn.

Reactive Distraction.name: Reactive Distraction
Reactive Distraction.description:
Trigger You would be hit by an attack or targeted by an effect, or you are within an effect's area.

Requirements You have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjhCcwGKyI5dpNIY]{Perfect Distraction} ready to use.

You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe. You use Perfection Distraction, even if you were observed, as long as you end the movement of your Sneak while concealed or in a location with cover or greater cover.

Your decoy is targeted by the attack or effect instead of you. In the case of an area effect, if your Sneak doesn't move you out of the area, both you and the decoy are targeted by the effect.

Reactive Interference.name: Reactive Interference
Reactive Interference.description:
Trigger An adjacent enemy begins to use a reaction.

Grabbing a sleeve, swiping with your weapon, or creating another obstruction, you reflexively foil an enemy's response. If the triggering creature's level is equal to or lower than yours, you disrupt the triggering reaction. If the triggering creature's level is higher than yours, you must make an attack roll against its AC. On a success, you disrupt the reaction.

Reactive Pursuit.name: Reactive Pursuit
Reactive Pursuit.description:
Trigger An adjacent foe moves away from you, and you can reach at least one space adjacent to the foe with a Stride action

You keep pace with a retreating foe. You Stride, but you must end your movement adjacent to the triggering enemy. Your move does not trigger reactions from the triggering enemy. You can use Reactive Pursuit to Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.

Reactive Shield.name: Reactive Shield
Reactive Shield.description:
Trigger An enemy hits you with a melee strike.

You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second. You immediately use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action and gain your shield's bonus to AC. The circumstance bonus from the shield applies to your AC when you're determining the outcome of the triggering attack.

Reactive Transformation.name: Reactive Transformation
Reactive Transformation.description:
Trigger varies

You transform reflexively when in danger. You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Wild Shape} to transform into one form granted by one of the prerequisite feats you have, depending on the trigger. Your form's resistances and weaknesses apply against the triggering damage.

Trigger You fall 10 feet or more

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}.

Trigger You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} that resists the triggering damage.

Trigger You take fire damage

Effect Choose a fire elemental form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}.

Trigger You take poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}.

Read Disaster.name: Read Disaster
Read Disaster.description:
You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future.

You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of "weal" are instead "nothing," and results of "weal and woe" are instead "woe." If you are legendary in Religion, you take only 1 minute to Read Disaster.

Read Lips.name: 读唇 Read Lips
Read Lips.description: 当你可以清楚地看见他人的交谈但听不清他们说的是什么时，你可以尝试从他们嘴唇的动作中读出交谈的内容。当你处于空闲的状态时，你无需任何检定就可以自动读唇；当你处于探索模式，或是你尝试读唇的环境对你的尝试造成影响时，你在保持读唇的每一轮行动中都视为处于迷魂（Fascinated）和措手不及（Flat-footed）状态，并且你必须要跳高一个社群技能检定（GM决定DC）来读取他人说话的内容。无论如何，你只能读懂你本来就理解的语言。如果你拥有本专长但处于耳聋（Deaf）状态或是受到其他听力异常的影响时，读唇可以帮助你准确地理解他人的语言（如果你理解他们使用的语言），并且你也可以毫无障碍地使用你理解的语言和他人进行口头交谈。

Read Shibboleths.name: 解读民风 Read Shibboleths
Read Shibboleths.description:
所有交流中都充满了各种细微的暗示与信号。若你与某人互动至少10分钟，他们的地域方言、发音变化和肢体动作都会提供关于他们社会环境的微小事实，比如他们的家乡或者可能隶属于的群体。

若该能力的目标在其社会环境（social environment）方面进行了欺骗，比如平民伪装为贵族，则必须尝试欺骗（Deception）、社群（Society）或相应的学识（Lore）检定对抗你的社群DC，成功则会为你提供与其虚假身份一致的虚假事实。

一旦你收集到关于某个人的1个或更多真实事实，便能够把这些行为习惯融入到你的言行中，并以一种他们熟悉的方式来表现自己。这使得你在与他们进行交涉（Diplomacy）和欺骗（Deception）检定时获得+1环境加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ivGiUp0EC5nWT9Hb]{效果：解读民风}

Read The Stars.name: Read The Stars
Read The Stars.description: You're incredibly skilled in iruxi astrology, and you can gain useful (if cryptic) hints from the stars' alignment. Once per night, if you can clearly see the stars, you can spend 1 hour reading the heavens to see how they relate to a particular goal, event, or activity that will occur within 1 week. The GM rolls a secret check, either a DC 28 Astrology Lore check or a DC 32 Occultism check. On a success, you learn a cryptic clue or piece of advice that could help with the chosen event, and on a critical failure, you learn a misleading cryptic clue or piece of advice.

Read the Land.name: Read the Land
Read the Land.description: You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.l4LFwY7iuzX6sDXr]{Commune with Nature} ritual if you didn't know it already. You can perform this ritual with a casting time of 1 hour instead of 1 day and without a secondary caster.

Reanimating Spark.name: Reanimating Spark
Reanimating Spark.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

The magic that animates you strains to keep you alive. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

Reaper of Repose.name: Reaper of Repose
Reaper of Repose.description: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses. When you make an attack using a weapon with which you have master proficiency and hit an undead creature, you ignore 5 points of the creature's resistances, and the undead's weaknesses are 2 higher against your attack.

Reason Rapidly.name: Reason Rapidly
Reason Rapidly.description: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed. You instantly use up to five @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.

Reassuring Presence.name: Reassuring Presence
Reassuring Presence.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the frightened condition.

You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress. Decrease the value of the triggering ally's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition by 1. The ally is then temporarily immune to your Reassuring Presence for 1 hour.

Rebounding Assault.name: Rebounding Assault
Rebounding Assault.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow in one hand and a bludgeoning or slashing melee weapon in the other.

You hurl your melee weapon at an opponent, then fire a bullet into the weapon's hilt, making it deal additional damage and bounce back to your grasp. Make a thrown ranged Strike with the melee weapon, then a ranged Strike with your firearm. Both Strikes use the same multiple attack penalty. If the melee weapon doesn't already have the thrown trait, it gains the thrown 10 feet trait during a Rebounding Assault.

If both attacks are successful, the bolt or bullet hits the thrown melee weapon instead of your target, adding its force into one attack. Combine the damage from both Strikes, using the thrown weapon's damage type, and add an additional [[/r {1d6}[precision]]]{1d6 precision damage}. The impact sends the melee weapon rebounding off the target and back to your hand.

In any circumstance other than both attacks hitting, carry out the individual Strikes normally. The thrown weapon doesn't rebound and remains in the target's space as normal for thrown weapons.

Rebounding Toss.name: Rebounding Toss
Rebounding Toss.description:
Requirements You are wielding a thrown weapon.

You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another. Make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon. If this Strike hits, the weapon rebounds toward an enemy within 10 feet of the original target. Make an additional Strike against this second target.

Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made both attacks.

Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).name: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)
Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).description:
Trigger Your turn begins, and you are at half or fewer Hit Points.

Your blood boils when you take a beating, and you throw caution to the wind to finish the fight. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a -2 penalty to AC, and a -1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.

Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description:
Frequency once per day

Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you've managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions. For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead. Further, enemies and hazards that would damage you this turn roll the minimum possible damage.

These benefits apply only to harmful effects incurred entirely during your turn in which you activate Reckless Abandon, such as running through a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.iL6TujgTCtRRa0Y0]{Prismatic Wall}. Persistent damage and conditions that were applied prior to your turn proceed normally, and as soon as your turn ends you are subject to the full consequences of any dangers still threatening you.

Reclaim Spell.name: Reclaim Spell
Reclaim Spell.description:
You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections. You reclaim the magic of an ongoing spell, using it reprepare a spell with a duration.

You Dismiss a Spell of 4th level or lower that you cast today from a spell slot with at least half its duration remaining, even if that spell can't normally be Dismissed.

You can then spend 10 minutes to reprepare the spell in that spell slot, as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Reprepare Spell}.

Recognize Ambush.name: Recognize Ambush
Recognize Ambush.description:
Trigger You roll initiative.

Your combat training has honed you to be ready for an attack at all times. You Interact to draw a weapon.

Recognize Spell.name: 认知法术 Recognize Spell
Recognize Spell.description:
触发有一个生物或是一个法术陷阱和类似的装置在你的视线范围内施放一个你尚未准备或是已知的法术，且你意识到有人在施法。

如果你在对应这个法术所属魔法宗派的技能上拥有受训，且该法术是一个不高于2环的常见法术，你可以立刻辨识出该法术（你仍然可以要求尝试投骰来拼大成功结果，但你视为自动获得成功结果）。当你在对应魔法宗派的技能上达专家级熟练度时，你可以自动辨识出最高4环的法术；当你在对应魔法宗派的技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你可以自动辨识出最高6环的法术；当你在对应魔法宗派的技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你可以自动辨识出最高10环的法术。

GM会为你暗骰一个奥法、自然、神秘或是宗教技能检定（对应你辨识的法术宗派）。如果你在对应的技能上未受训，你们你最高只会获得失败结果。

大成功 你成功辨识出了该法术，并在对抗该法术的豁免检定和AC上获得+1环境加值。

成功 你成功辨识出了该法术。

失败 你未能辨识该魔法效果。

大失败 你误以为这是另一个法术，GM决定你把它看成了什么东西。

Recognize Threat.name: Recognize Threat
Recognize Threat.description:
Requirements You have master proficiency in a skill to identify the triggering creature.

Trigger Your first turn of an encounter begins, and you can see a creature.

You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team. Attempt a Recall Knowledge check against the triggering creature.

Recollect Studies.name: Recollect Studies
Recollect Studies.description:
Requirements You're fighting a creature of your level or lower that could be identified by Recall Knowledge with a skill in which you're an expert.

You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures. Choose a creature that meets the requirements. You learn the resistances, immunities, or weaknesses of the creature (your choice) without needing to successfully Recall Knowledge.

Reconstruct The Scene.name: Reconstruct The Scene
Reconstruct The Scene.description:
You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day. This involves moving about the area and studying footprints, the placement of objects, spilled drinks or blood, and so forth.

You get an indistinct mental impression of significant events that happened there. This gives you clues and details of the past, including the overall events and their time frame, but it's not a perfect record. This also isn't enough to identify who was involved in these events if you weren't already aware the person was there.

As determined by the GM, you also pick out various seemingly small details that could serve as important clues, like a memorable weapon someone used for a murder or the type of cloak someone wore when passing through.

Recover Spell.name: Recover Spell
Recover Spell.description:
Requirements An enemy's action disrupted your attempts to Cast a Spell since the beginning of your last turn.

You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates. You regain the use of a spell that was disrupted since the beginning of your last turn, but you must immediately Cast the Spell again with your next action or else you lose the spell; as normal for metamagic, this must be on the same turn that you use Recover Spell. You can change the area, targets, and other variables, including the number of actions used to Cast the Spell if the spell allows, such as when casting @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}.

Recycled Cogwheels.name: Recycled Cogwheels
Recycled Cogwheels.description: You're able to scavenge the cogwheels from your daily quick-deploy snares that use gears. This allows you to deconstruct a snare that didn't trigger in order to set the snare up somewhere else. Doing so takes the same number of actions as setting the snare did. When you do, you recover the snare and can deploy it in another location.

Red Herring.name: Red Herring
Red Herring.description:
You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead}, the GM tells you if the lead you chose is inconsequential.

For example, if you found a splatter of gray mud on the wall, thought it was suspicious, and Pursued it as a Lead, the GM would tell you if there was no greater mystery related to it.

When the GM tells you a lead is inconsequential, you can decline to Pursue the Lead, keeping any leads you were already pursuing. You still can't use Pursue a Lead again for 10 minutes, as normal.

Red Mantis Assassin Dedication.name: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
Red Mantis Assassin Dedication.description:
Access You are from Mediogalti Island.

You have learned how to stalk your foes and slay them with a sawtooth sabre. You become trained in Stealth and Assassin Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber}.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Red Mantis assassin archetype.

Redirect Elements.name: Redirect Elements
Redirect Elements.description:
Trigger The spell attack roll for a foe's spell with an elemental trait targeting you fails or critically fails.

You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area. The attacker rerolls the spell's attack roll against the new target.

Redirecting Shot.name: Redirecting Shot
Redirecting Shot.description:
Trigger An ally misses with a ranged attack that uses a thrown weapon or ammunition. The ally must be willing to accept your assistance, you must see the attack's target, and the attack's target must be within the first range increment of your firearm or crossbow.

Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

Seeing your ally's attack about to go astray, you fire your weapon to right its course. Discharge your firearm and roll a d20. Your ally uses this roll instead of their own, and the attack ignores bonuses the target would gain against the attack from lesser or standard cover.

Reflect Spell.name: 反射法术 Reflect Spell
Reflect Spell.description:
如果妳使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.deoHKUzpzT7iwWhL]{反制法术 Counterspell} 并成功反制一个影响目标生物或一块区域的法术，妳能把这法术的效果返还给法术的施放者。

当你反射法术时，反射的法术只会影响最初的施法者，就算这是一个区域性法术或这法术通常能影响不只一个生物。这位最初的施法者在对抗被反射的法术时，也可以正常尝试过或免或使用其他防御手段。

Reflecting Riposte.name: Reflecting Riposte
Reflecting Riposte.description:
Trigger An opponent casts a spell and you critically succeed at a saving throw against it.

Requirements You have a shield raised or are benefiting from Dueling Parry or Twin Parry.

You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts. Use your attack roll modifier with your shield or parrying weapon for your counteract check. If you counteract the spell, it is reflected upon the caster. If the spell targeted individual creatures, it targets the caster only. If the spell targeted an area centered on a point, the new area is centered on the caster. If the spell was a cone or line, the cone or line emanates from you toward the caster. If the spell has a save DC, it uses your class DC, and if it requires a spell attack roll, use the same attack roll modifier as the counteract check.

Reflective Ripple Stance.name: Reflective Ripple Stance
Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fluid grace as small amounts of water flow with your movements and attacks. You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

Reflexive Catch.name: Reflexive Catch
Reflexive Catch.description:
Requirements The item or thrown weapon is of a Bulk you can Juggle. If the trigger was a thrown weapon attack targeting you, you can't be flat-footed to the attack. If you were already Juggling, you can't be Juggling your maximum number of items.

Trigger An item falls within your reach or an attacker fails an attack roll to hit you or a creature within your reach with a thrown weapon.

You grab the triggering item. If you are Juggling, you can immediately add the item to the objects you're Juggling as a free action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits.

Reflexive Grip.name: Reflexive Grip
Reflexive Grip.description: You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you. In addition, when you fall unconscious, you don't drop any weapons that you're currently wielding, though somebody else can remove them from you.

Reflexive Riposte.name: Reflexive Riposte
Reflexive Riposte.description: You can riposte almost without a thought. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to perform an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{Opportune Riposte}.

Reflexive Shield.name: Reflexive Shield
Reflexive Shield.description:
You can use your shield to fend off the worst of area effects and other damage.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise your Shield}, you gain your shield's circumstance bonus to Reflex saves. If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction, damage you take as a result of a Reflex save can trigger that reaction, even if the damage isn't physical damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.pwbFFD6NzDooobKo]{Effect: Reflexive Shield}

Regrowth.name: Regrowth
Regrowth.description: Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.

Rehydration.name: Rehydration
Rehydration.description:
Frequency once per day

You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air. You can spend one hour resting to rehydrate your gills and skin, which counts as submerging your body in water. At the GM's discretion, incredibly dry areas, such as deserts, might not have enough moisture in the air for your Rehydration to work.

Reinforce Eidolon.name: Reinforce Eidolon
Reinforce Eidolon.description: You buffer your eidolon. You gain the reinforce eidolon link cantrip.

Reinforced Chassis.name: Reinforced Chassis
Reinforced Chassis.description:
Your body is designed to be particularly resilient. Your chassis is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of -2, a speed penalty of -5 feet, and a Strength value of 16. You can never wear other armor or remove your chassis; however, you still don't become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} from sleeping. Finally, you can etch armor runes onto your chassis as normal.

Enhancement Your chassis becomes difficult to overcome. You gain the Chassis Deflection reaction.

Rejuvenating Touch.name: 复原之触 Rejuvenating Touch
Rejuvenating Touch.description:
你的治疗能量在你施放后仍徘徊逗留，提供持续性效果。

一名因为你的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on hand} 恢复生命值的生物在接下来的10轮中，每到他回合开始他就会获得10点临时生命值。如果该盟友 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识}，效果结束。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.oaRt210JV4GZIHmJ]{法术效果：复原之触}

Relentless Disarm.name: Relentless Disarm
Relentless Disarm.description:
When you succeed, but don't critically succeed, at a check to Disarm a creature, your circumstance bonus to further checks to Disarm that creature is +4 instead of +2. Other creatures gain only the normal bonus.

When you critically succeed at a Disarm check, you can immediately Demoralize your target as a reaction.

Relentless Stalker.name: Relentless Stalker
Relentless Stalker.description:
Trigger An adjacent creature you are hunting attempts to move away from you using an action that has the move trait

Your hunted prey cannot escape your relentless pursuit. Stride up to your Speed in tandem with the triggering creature, remaining adjacent to the foe throughout its movement until it stops moving or you run out of movement. You can ignore difficult terrain during this movement unless the difficult terrain is caused by a magical effect.

Relentless Wings.name: 不息飞翼 Relentless Wings
Relentless Wings.description: 你的飞翼成为你身上的永久部位。你永久获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jNemcS5GqH8mnjV6]{魔族飞翼 Fiendish Wings} 的效果，而非只有每日1次的10分钟。

Reliable Luck.name: Reliable Luck
Reliable Luck.description: You have gone well past nine lives to survive danger with surprising regularity. You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} once per hour, rather than once per day.

Reloading Trick.name: Reloading Trick
Reloading Trick.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HvPvyeXM2iMK4OYf]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Training} feat, you can use this feat with a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} to load either a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AITVZmakiu3RgfKo]{Bolt} or a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9w8MrBhFtvM7RrYN]{Magazine}, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.

Remediate.name: Remediate
Remediate.description:
Frequency once per hour

If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

You use your heal or harm spell to attempt to counteract one effect in the spell's area with the chaotic, evil, good, or lawful trait. The chosen trait must oppose one component of your deity's alignment; if your deity is neutral, you can choose any one trait.

Remember Your Training.name: Remember Your Training
Remember Your Training.description:
Frequency once per day

During your training to become a Pathfinder Agent you were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter, and you can think back to that training to gain crucial insight in times of need. Attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, adding your level as a proficiency bonus if you are untrained (rather than 0). If you roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on this check, you get a success instead.

Reminder of the Greater Fear.name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
Reminder of the Greater Fear.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the frightened condition the creature would take by 1.

Remorseless Lash.name: Remorseless Lash
Remorseless Lash.description: You're skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking. When you succeed at a melee weapon Strike against a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} foe, that foe can't reduce their frightened condition below 1 until the beginning of your next turn.

Remote Trigger.name: Remote Trigger
Remote Trigger.description:
You've learned how to trigger snares from afar, creating ranged hazards to assail your opponents and allowing you to disarm enemies' snares harmlessly.

You can Strike a snare to trigger it prematurely. If you crafted the snare, you automatically hit. If someone else crafted it, attempt a ranged Strike against the Crafting DC, triggering the snare only if you hit.

Renewed Vigor.name: Renewed Vigor
Renewed Vigor.description: You pause to recover your raging vigor. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.

Renewing Quills.name: Renewing Quills
Renewing Quills.description: Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks. You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction once every 10 minutes.

Repair Module.name: Repair Module
Repair Module.description:
Frequency once per day

You trigger your body's repair programming, causing your body's nanites to heal your wounds. You gain fast healing equal to half your level for 1 minute. While Repair Module is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.

Repeating Hand Crossbow Training.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow Training
Repeating Hand Crossbow Training.description:
You become trained in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.oJZe5rRitvioUgRh]{Shootist Bandolier}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the repeating hand crossbow. If you're at least an expert in a repeating hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You can perform the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hV9wXLvgH2LBaBwk]{Shootist's Draw} action with repeating hand crossbows.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload} feat, you can reload a repeating hand crossbow @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9w8MrBhFtvM7RrYN]{Magazine} on the move. You can use Running Reload as a 3-action activity to reload a magazine into a repeating hand crossbow after you Stride, Step, or Sneak, or as a 2-action activity if you use a magazine from a shootist bandolier.

Replenishing Hydration.name: Replenishing Hydration
Replenishing Hydration.description: You draw life from the water around you. If you submerge in water and rest for 10 minutes, you regain Hit Points equal to your [[/r {(floor(@actor.level/2))*(@actor.abilities.con.mod)}[healing]]]{Constitution modifier × half your level}.

Replenishment of War.name: Replenishment of War
Replenishment of War.description: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity. When you damage a creature with a Strike using your deity's favored weapon, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Reprepare Spell.name: 重备法术 Reprepare Spell
Reprepare Spell.description:
妳发现如何重复利用妳的法术位。妳能花10分钟去准备一个妳今天已经施放过的法术，并重获那个法术位。这法术必须是4环或低于4环，并且没有持续时间。就算妳在同一天之前已经重新准备过这个法术了，妳还是可以用这个方法重新准备。

如果妳有 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.QzWXMCSGNfvvpYgF]{法术替换 Spell Substitution} 奥术论题，妳可以选择用已经消耗掉的法术位去准备不同的法术，只要新法术没有持续时间。当妳在那个法术位上重新准备了法术，哪怕只有一次，妳就可以使用妳的奥术论题在那个法术位上去替换没有持续时间的法术。

Reptile Rider.name: Reptile Rider
Reptile Rider.description: To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Rq5wkA8DtsmbzoGV]{Ride} feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to Handle an Animal as long as the animal is a reptile, dinosaur, or even a non-sapient dragon.

Reptile Speaker.name: Reptile Speaker
Reptile Speaker.description: You hear the sounds of reptiles as language. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals that are reptiles (the GM determines which animals count as reptiles).

Repurposed Parts.name: Repurposed Parts
Repurposed Parts.description: You are familiar with the fittings and cogwheels of your snares and can repurpose parts from prepared quick-deploy snares to assemble a new creation on the fly. Using two of the snares you prepared for quick deployment during daily preparations, you can quickly deploy a different snare that you know how to Craft, even if you didn't prepare that snare during your daily preparations.

Rescuer's Press.name: Rescuer's Press
Rescuer's Press.description: Any shield you wield gains the shove trait. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} using a shield and Stride as part of that action, you can move an additional 5 feet to either side of the creature you Shoved. In addition, if you are in the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6GN1zh3RcnZhrzxP]{Everstand Stance} and successfully Shove a creature using a shield that you wield two-handed, you can increase the distance of your Shove to 10 feet.

Resilient Shell.name: Resilient Shell
Resilient Shell.description: Your eidolon is resilient against attacks. It gains resistance to physical damage equal to its Constitution modifier.

Resilient Touch.name: 适性之触 Resilient Touch
Resilient Touch.description:
你的治疗能量创造一层保护灵光，除刀箭外还能在其他方面保护盟友。

因你的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 恢复生命值的盟友，直到他们下一轮结束前，在豁免上获得+1状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.6embuvXCpS3YOD5u]{法术效果：适性之触}

Resist Ruin.name: Resist Ruin
Resist Ruin.description: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need. You gain resistance 5 to negative energy, and once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward} as a divine innate spell.

Resounding Blow.name: Resounding Blow
Resounding Blow.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon that deals

bludgeoning damage.

You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} until the start of your next turn (or for 1 minute on a critical hit).

Resounding Bravery.name: Resounding Bravery
Resounding Bravery.description:
Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit.

When you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability, you gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute. These benefits are doubled if you critically succeed against a fear effect.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.NMmsJyeMTawpgLVR]{Effect: Resounding Bravery}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Cumdy84uIkUHG9zF]{Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)}

Resounding Cascade.name: 嘹亮奔涌 Resounding Cascade
Resounding Cascade.description:
触发 你使用奥术奔涌

当你进入奥术奔涌架式时，你向附近盟友散布魔法强化。你从奥术奔涌中获得的额外伤害成为一种灵光，其影响5尺弥漫（emanation）。其只使用架式的基础伤害，基于盟友的武器专精（weapon specialization）；其不会获得任何你从增益、诡笑锋影融汇研究（laughing shadow hybrid study）或者类似效果中得到的加值。

一如通常重复效果（duplicate effects）规则，复数个奥术奔涌对于同一生物的影响不会叠加。

Resounding Finale.name: 大终奏 Resounding Finale
Resounding Finale.description:
触发 你或一位受益于你组曲法术的盟友将受到音波伤害。

你把自己的表演突兀又戏剧性的结束，将周遭的声音都压了下去。你的组曲法术立刻结束，而你所有受益于该法术效果的盟友在对抗触发条件的伤害时，会获得与组曲法术环级两倍相同数值的音波抗力。

Resourceful Ritualist.name: Resourceful Ritualist
Resourceful Ritualist.description: You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill. You can attempt checks to cast a ritual that requires expert proficiency if you are trained, master proficiency if you are an expert, or legendary proficiency if you are a master.

Restitch.name: Restitch
Restitch.description: You've learned how to sew even the most terrible tears and wounds together. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} as a 7th-level arcane innate spell once per day.

Resurrectionist.name: Resurrectionist
Resurrectionist.description: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing. When you restore Hit Points to a dying creature or bring a dead creature back to life and restore Hit Points to it, you grant that creature fast healing 5 for 1 minute. This fast healing ends if the creature is knocked unconscious.

Resuscitate.name: Resuscitate
Resuscitate.description:
Requirements You are holding healer's tools or are wearing them and have a hand free. Also, the target's body is mostly intact.

You can use Medicine to resuscitate the dead. Attempt a DC 40 Medicine check to revive a dead creature that has been dead for no more than 3 rounds. If you succeed, the target returns to life with the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead}, except it still has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition it had before @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, increased by 1 (or wounded 1 if it wasn't wounded before dying). Whether you succeed or fail, the target is temporarily immune to Resuscitate for 1 day.

Retain Absorbed Spell.name: Retain Absorbed Spell
Retain Absorbed Spell.description: When you absorb a spell using the Absorb Spell reaction, you utilize secret, techniques that allow you to retain the power and knowledge necessary to cast the spell repeatedly-potentially for a greater period of time. If you're a spontaneous caster, you can cast the triggering spell up to three times instead of once. If you're a prepared spellcaster, you can replace up to three of your prepared spells of the same level with the absorbed spell instead of one. Either way, you can choose to retain the absorbed spell for the next hour instead of the next 10 minutes; if you choose to extend the absorption to an hour, you can't use Absorb Spell again until one hour after the spell is absorbed.

Retractable Claws.name: 亮爪 Retractable Claws
Retractable Claws.description: 你得到非武装攻击爪抓，造成 [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 挥砍伤害}。你的爪抓属于搏击武器组，拥有灵巧、娴熟和非武装特征。

Return Fire.name: Return Fire
Return Fire.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}, are wielding

a bow, and have a free hand.

Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire. When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgaqlDFTVC7Ryurt]{Deflect an Arrow} as part of that reaction you can immediately make a ranged bow Strike by firing the arrow you deflected from your own bow.

Returning Throw.name: Returning Throw
Returning Throw.description:
You have mastered the technique of arcing a projectile so that it returns to your hand after being thrown, though this requires a moment to precisely calculate the trajectory and possible ricochets.

Make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon. Once the Strike is complete, the weapon arcs or ricochets back to your hand. If your hands are full when the weapon returns, it falls to the ground in your space.

Reveal Beasts.name: Reveal Beasts
Reveal Beasts.description: You are adept at revealing—or creating—weaknesses among those who are a threat to civilization. If you roll a success on a check to Recall Knowledge to identify an animal or a beast, you get a critical success instead. The next time you damage that creature, it gains weakness 5 during that attack to one damage type of your choice that you dealt it.

Reveal Machinations.name: Reveal Machinations
Reveal Machinations.description: You reveal that you played a minor but recurring role in another humanoid's life-or at least convince them that's the case. Attempt a Deception check against the target's Will DC. On a success, the revelation makes them frightened 2, and on a critical success they are frightened 3. In addition, you gain information about the subject as though you had attempted to Recall Knowledge about them using an appropriate skill and received the same result on your roll. You can't use this ability against the same humanoid again until 1 day has passed and you've also successfully disguised yourself as a different person.

Reveal True Name.name: Reveal True Name
Reveal True Name.description:
You attempt to get a creature to do as you wish by threatening them with your knowledge of their true name. You must know and speak the creature's true name and say what you want the creature to do. Attempt an Intimidation check against the target's Will DC.

Critical Success The target does as you say out of a sense of self-preservation, and will not harm itself in any way. It becomes unfriendly (if it wasn't already unfriendly or hostile) but continues to comply for up to 1 day. The target is too scared of you to retaliate or flee, certain you would find them wherever they might go.

Success As critical success, but once the target becomes unfriendly, they avoid you and might act against you in an indirect manner, such as alerting your enemies to your location.

Failure The target refuses to comply and typically flees your presence to avoid your further use of their true name. If they were not already unfriendly or hostile, they become unfriendly. They avoid you in the future and are likely to take indirect action against you.

Critical Failure The target refuses to comply and becomes hostile, if it wasn't already. If they perceive you as weak, they might attack you; otherwise, they likely flee to avoid your further use of their true name.

Revealing Stab.name: Revealing Stab
Revealing Stab.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon that deals piercing damage

You drive your piercing weapon into an imperceptible foe, revealing its location to your allies.

Make a Strike with the required melee weapon. You don't have to attempt a flat check to hit a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} creature, and you have to succeed at only a DC 5 flat check to target a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} creature.

If you hit and deal damage, you can drive the required weapon into a corporeal target, revealing its current position. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.wQYmDStjdjn0I26t]{Release} the weapon, and it becomes lodged in the target.

If the target is concealed, other creatures don't need to succeed at a flat check to hit it. If the target is hidden, other creatures have to succeed at only a DC 5 flat check to target it. The creatures need to be able to see your weapon to gain any of these benefits, and the target can't become undetected to anyone who sees your weapon. If the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the weapon remains visible while lodged in it. This benefit lasts until the weapon is removed from the creature. An adjacent creature or the target can remove the weapon with 2 Interact actions.

Revealing True Name.name: Revealing True Name
Revealing True Name.description:
You attempt to get a creature to do as you wish by threatening them with your knowledge of their true name. You must know and speak the creature's true name and say what you want the creature to do. Attempt an Intimidation check against the target's Will DC.

Critical Success The target does as you say out of a sense of self-preservation, and will not harm itself in any way. It becomes unfriendly (if it wasn't already unfriendly or hostile) but continues to comply for up to 1 day. The target is too scared of you to retaliate or flee, certain you would find them wherever they might go.

Success As critical success, but once the target becomes unfriendly, they avoid you and might act against you in an indirect manner, such as alerting your enemies to your location.

Failure The target refuses to comply and typically flees your presence to avoid your further use of their true name. If they were not already unfriendly or hostile, they become unfriendly. They avoid you in the future and are likely to take indirect action against you.

Critical Failure The target refuses to comply and becomes hostile, if it wasn't already. If they perceive you as weak, they might attack you; otherwise, they likely flee to avoid your further use of their true name.

Reverberate.name: 音波反弹 Reverberate
Reverberate.description:
触发 你将从一个法术那受到音波伤害。

你能操纵你周围的声音，把音波伤害反弹回去。进行一次表演检定，对抗施放触发法术生物的法术DC。

大成功 触发条件的伤害最多减少你的等级四倍的值。而施法者会受到与你减少的伤害相同的音波伤害。

成功 跟大成功一样，但最多减少你的等级两倍的值。

大失败 你误把音波导向自身，受到两倍触发条件的伤害。

Reverse Engineer.name: 逆向工程师 Reverse Engineer
Reverse Engineer.description: 你非常擅长对物品进行逆向工程以开发它的公式，或仅仅为了停用物品而拆解它。你在从物品逆向工程成公式的手艺Crafting检定中获得+2环境加值。如果你在手艺Crafting检定中达成大成功，你可以同时创造公式并将原始物品组装起来，你最后会获得公式和物品，而非公式和等价于物品价值一半的原材料。另外，你可以在解除装置Disable a Device或开锁Pick a Lock时使用手艺Crafting而非贼活Thievery。

Reverse Engineering.name: Reverse Engineering
Reverse Engineering.description:
You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to reverse engineer a formula from an item.

Additionally, if you get a critical success on your Crafting check, you can opt to not only create the formula but also reassemble the original item at the same time, leaving you with the formula and the item instead ofthe formula and raw materials equal to half the item's value.

Revivification Protocol.name: Revivification Protocol
Revivification Protocol.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and unconscious conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

Revivifying Mutagen.name: 再生突变药剂 Revivifying Mutagen
Revivifying Mutagen.description:
当你处于一份突变药剂的影响下时，你能够代谢掉这份突变药剂的力量来治疗自己。

这需要使用一个单独的动作，该动作会具有专注和操纵特征。

一旦动作完成，这份突变药剂每2个物品等级便会让你恢复1d6点生命值（至少1d6），但这份突变药剂的持续时间会立即结束，哪怕它是一份恒久突变药剂（Persistent Mutagen）也是如此。

Ricochet Feint.name: Ricochet Feint
Ricochet Feint.description: While in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RsNvCSrCN7czHC0G]{Ricochet Stance}, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them. You can attempt a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against a creature within the first range increment of a thrown weapon you are wielding, rather than only creatures within your melee reach.

Ricochet Legend.name: Ricochet Legend
Ricochet Legend.description:
The more obstacles between you and your target, the deadlier your shots become, as you ricochet off multiple surfaces to hit them. When using Ricochet Shot, your shot can bounce off of any surface within your weapon's first three range increments and the target can't benefit from cover unless they have total cover on all sides.

In addition, a creature must attempt a Will save against your class DC the first time in an encounter you attack it with a Ricochet Shot. If it fails, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and is unable to determine where your shot originated.

Ricochet Master.name: Ricochet Master
Ricochet Master.description:
You have an eye for angles and can find shots that others believe are impossible. When using Ricochet Shot, you can bounce your bullet off up to two solid surfaces within your weapon's first range increment instead of just one.

In addition, a creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} the first time you attack it with a Ricochet Shot during an encounter.

Ricochet Shot.name: Ricochet Shot
Ricochet Shot.description: You bounce your shot off a nearby surface to strike your opponent from an unexpected angle. When determining whether a target has cover from your ranged attack with a firearm or crossbow, you can choose one solid surface within your weapon's first range increment to ricochet your shot off of. If you do, you determine the target's cover from the point where you ricochet your shot instead of from you.

Ricochet Stance (Fighter).name: Ricochet Stance (Fighter)
Ricochet Stance (Fighter).description:
You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged Strike to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon's listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.

Ricochet Stance (Rogue).name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
Ricochet Stance (Rogue).description:
You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged Strike to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon's listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.

Ricocheting Leap.name: Ricocheting Leap
Ricocheting Leap.description: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes. You can use Wall Jump to make additional jumps off of creatures larger than you as if they were walls. Once per turn when you make an additional jump off of a creature in this way, you can also attempt to Shove or Trip that creature as a free action.

Ride.name: 骁骑手 Ride
Ride.description: 当你需要对一个你骑乘（Mounted）的动物使用指挥动物技能动作来要求它进行移动（比如跑动动作）时，它自动成功地服从你的要求而无需你进行检定。如同仆从（Minion）生物一样，你骑乘的生物会在你行动的回合进行行动如果你骑乘的动物进入战斗遭遇，它不会在属于它的回合行动，而是在你的下一个回合开始行动。参见本书249页来了解指挥动物的详细情况。

Riftmarked.name: 古魔血脉 Riftmarked
Riftmarked.description:
很久以前古魔标记了你的某个先祖，多半是透过遍布全球的古老符文石办到的。这份血脉悠久原始又扭曲，你也擅长察知其他扭曲的事物。你在神秘技能上受训，若你会在神秘技能上自动受训(例如背景或职业的效果)，改为让由你自选的另一个技能受训。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{异常察觉 Oddity Identification} 技能专长。

若你已经在本专长提供的技能上受训了，你需要手动指定另一个技能来受训。你也需要手动选择学识的类别。

Right-Hand Blood.name: Right-Hand Blood
Right-Hand Blood.description: It's said that the flesh of the right side of a hyena can heal diseases, but that of the left side is poisonous. You can take [[/r {1}]]{1 damage} to feed someone blood from your right side and Administer First Aid or take [[/r {2d8}]]{2d8 damage} to Treat Disease or Treat Wounds; in either case, you don't need healer's tools, and gain a +1 item bonus. Blood from your left side causes the check to critically fail automatically.

Righteous Resistance.name: Righteous Resistance
Righteous Resistance.description: You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy} twice per day as a divine innate spell, except you can target only yourself. If you grant yourself resistance to fire damage, the resistance is equal to either the spell's normal value or to your level, whichever is higher.

Rimesoul.name: Rimesoul
Rimesoul.description: The water inside you is cold and frozen, like sheets of ice and frigid glaciers. You gain resistance to cold equal to half your level (minimum 1), and you treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe (incredible cold becomes extreme, extreme cold becomes severe, and so on).

Ringmaster's Introduction.name: Ringmaster's Introduction
Ringmaster's Introduction.description:
Requirements The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

Trigger An ally's turn begins.

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, Demoralize, Feint, or Perform.

Rippling Spin.name: Rippling Spin
Rippling Spin.description:
Trigger You are hit by a physical melee attack by an attacker you can see that's in reach.

Requirements You're in Reflective Ripple Stance.

After the triggering attack is done, Step. You must end this Step within the attacker's reach. Then, you can attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the attacker.

Riptide.name: Riptide
Riptide.description:
Requirements You are within 10 feet of water at least 10 feet deep, and your Speed is sufficient to reach the water in one Stride.

Trigger You successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature of the same size as you or smaller.

You Stride up to 10 feet to enter the water, bringing the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} creature with you into the water.

Risky Reload.name: Risky Reload
Risky Reload.description:
Requirements You're wielding a firearm.

You've practiced a technique for rapidly reloading your firearm, but attempting to use this technique is a dangerous gamble with your firearm's functionality. Interact to reload a firearm, then make a Strike with that firearm. If the Strike fails, the firearm misfires.

Risky Surgery.name: 激进手术 Risky Surgery
Risky Surgery.description:
你采用激进的手段尝试让病患脱离死亡，但也有可能直接推他们一把。当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{治疗伤害 Treat Wounds}时，在应用治疗伤害的效果前，你先对病人造成 [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 挥砍伤害} 。

若你如此行动，你在治疗伤害的医疗检定上获得+2环境加值，且若你结果为成功，则视为大成功。

Rites Of Convocation.name: Rites Of Convocation
Rites Of Convocation.description:
Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

Choose one summon spell (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lKcsmeOrgHtK4xQa]{Summon Construct}, and so forth) that appears on the spell list of your spellcasting tradition. You can spend 10 minutes in communion with your familiar to replace one spell you've prepared in one of your witch spell slots with the spell you chose, heightened to the same level.

The spell you replaced must be of at least the summon spell's minimum spell level.

Rites Of Transfiguration.name: Rites Of Transfiguration
Rites Of Transfiguration.description:
You can adapt your patron's power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims. Your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{Baleful Polymorph}, even if baleful polymorph isn't on your tradition's spell list.

By spending 10 minutes in communion with your familiar, you can replace one spell of 6th level or higher you've prepared in one of your witch spell slots with a baleful polymorph spell of the same level.

Ritual Researcher.name: 仪式研究者Ritual Researcher
Ritual Researcher.description: 仔细研究仪式的技艺，让你对仪式使用自如。你在进行作为仪式一部分的所有主要与次要检定上获得+2环境加值。

Ritual Reversion.name: Ritual Reversion
Ritual Reversion.description: You can temporarily revert to a less conspicuous form without diminishing your senses. You take the form of an ordinary specimen of the type of plant or fungus that most closely resembles you, reverting to your body's appearance just before your spirit joined with it. This otherwise has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Tree Shape}, except that your size remains Small.

Ritualist Dedication.name: Ritualist Dedication
Ritualist Dedication.description:
You have begun to master the difficult art of casting rituals. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all primary checks to perform a ritual.

You learn two uncommon rituals with a level no higher than half your level; you must meet all prerequisites for casting the ritual to choose it. At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you learn another uncommon ritual with a level no higher than half your level and for which you meet the prerequisites.

You can cast these as the primary caster, but you can't teach them to anyone else or allow someone else to serve as primary caster unless they know the ritual as well.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the ritualist archetype. If you retrain out of this feat, you lose the rituals learned from it.

Roadkill.name: Roadkill
Roadkill.description:
Requirements You are piloting a vehicle.

In your hands, any vehicle is a weapon. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.lID4rJHAVZB6tavf]{Run Over}, you can use your class DC in place of the vehicle's collision DC. Your vehicle can Run Over any number of creatures up to one Size smaller than the vehicle or ram any one target creature or object in your path up to the size of your vehicle.

Robust Recovery.name: 健体医疗 Robust Recovery
Robust Recovery.description: 你掌握了各种用来滋补调养，祛病排毒的民间偏方，运用这些疗法使你的身体格外强韧。当你对其他人或是某人对你使用治疗疾病或治疗中毒技能动作时，如果检定成功，你在从该动作中获得的豁免检定环境加值提高到+4.除此之外，如果被治疗者之后尝试的豁免检定结果为成功，他视为取得了大成功结果。

Rock Runner.name: Rock Runner
Rock Runner.description: Your innate connection to stone makes you adept at moving across uneven surfaces. You can ignore difficult terrain caused by rubble and uneven ground made of stone and earth. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of stone or earth, you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.

Rockslide Spell.name: Rockslide Spell
Rockslide Spell.description:
You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground.

If the next action you use is to Cast a non-cantrip Spell that affects an area, a number of 5-foot squares in the area equal to the spell level become difficult terrain for 1 round. These squares must be on the ground, and the entire area of difficult terrain must be contiguous.

The spell gains the earth trait.

Rogue Dedication.name: 游荡者入门 Rogue Dedication
Rogue Dedication.description:
你获得一个技能专长以及游荡者的突袭打击Surprise Attack职业特性。你在轻甲中受训。另外，你在隐匿Stealth或盗窃Thievery，外加一个你自选的技能中受训；如果你已经受训于隐匿Stealth和盗窃Thievery，你在另一个你自选的技能中受训。你在游荡者的职业DC中受训。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从游荡者变体中获得了其他两个专长。

Rokoan Arts.name: Rokoan Arts
Rokoan Arts.description: Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status} as primal innate spells once per day each.

Roll with It.name: Roll with It
Roll with It.description:
Trigger A foe hits you with a melee weapon or unarmed attack.

When you take a big hit, your foe bounces you around like a rubber ball, but you escape the worst of the blow. Your foe can move you any distance of its choice up to 30 feet in a direction of its choice (this is not forced movement, and it triggers reactions as normal). You fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. Attempt a DC 6 flat check. On a success, you take minimum damage from the attack, and on a critical success, if the attack was a critical hit, you don't take double damage from the critical hit.

Root Magic.name: 最初的魔法 Root Magic
Root Magic.description:
你的护身符能抵御污秽的魔力。在你进行每日准备时，你可以缝合好一个装有香草、头发、圣油和其它仪式材料的香囊，并将其给与一位盟友。

该盟友当天第一次对法术或作祟进行豁免检定时，获得+1环境加值。若你的神秘技能为专家，则环境加值为+2，若你的神秘技能为传奇，则环境加值为+3。

Rope Mastery.name: Rope Mastery
