Rope Mastery.description: Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways. When Climbing a rope, you move 5 more feet on a success and 10 more feet on a critical success, to a maximum of your Speed. This additional movement stacks with the effects of Quick Climb. In addition, you can use a rope to hamper your foes. When holding a rope, you can attempt an Athletics check to Disarm, Grapple, or Trip a creature up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. If you critically fail such a check while holding a rope, you can drop the rope to take the effects of a failure instead of a critical failure.

Rope Runner.name: Rope Runner
Rope Runner.description:
You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 15 feet, but only on ship's rigging or similar ropes.

Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to Climb a rope or an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} on a rope, you get a critical success instead. You aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} while Climbing or Balancing on a rope.

Rough Rider.name: Rough Rider
Rough Rider.description: You are especially good at riding traditional goblin mounts. You gain the Ride feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to use Command an Animal on a goblin dog or wolf mount. You can always select a wolf as your animal companion, even if you would usually select an animal companion with the mount special ability, such as for a champion's steed ally.

Rough Terrain Stance.name: Rough Terrain Stance
Rough Terrain Stance.description:
Requirements You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn.

You enter a stance that makes it difficult to move around you. Each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain that matches the terrain attunement you gained (rime forms in an arctic terrain, momentary undergrowth shoots up in a forest terrain, and so on). You ignore this difficult terrain.

This stance ends if you move into a different type of terrain.

Round Ears.name: Round Ears
Round Ears.description:
Your elven lineage is subtle enough that you look barely different from other humans, and you've learned to use that to your advantage. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Deception (or another skill of your choice, if you were already trained in Deception). You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Impersonate checks to pretend you aren't a half-elf. Observers are never granted circumstance bonuses to Perception checks due to you Impersonating a full-blooded human, and you never take circumstance penalties due to you Impersonating a full-blooded human.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.

Ru-shi.name: Ru-shi
Ru-shi.description: You were born to a jiang-shi, one of the so-called hopping vampires found most often in Tian-Xia. Your parent had a supernatural obsession with counting small objects, which manifests in you as a preternatural gift for linguistics and mathematics. You are trained in Society and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers} skill feat. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

Rubbery Skin.name: Rubbery Skin
Rubbery Skin.description: Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality. You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. You also gain resistance equal to twice that amount to extra damage from critical hits; if the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn't reduce the attack's normal damage.

Ruby Resurrection.name: Ruby Resurrection
Ruby Resurrection.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points.

In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes. Change your current Hit Points to 30 and cast a 6th-level fireball centered on yourself. This fireball doesn't affect you. Your hair turns brilliant red for 1 hour.

If you haven't used Ruby Resurrection and you die, you stay in initiative order and Ruby Resurrection triggers automatically at the start of your next turn, bringing you back to life at 0 HP before having its normal effects. This happens only if there are some remains to resurrect; for instance, if you were killed by disintegrate you wouldn't return.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast.

Rugged Survivalist.name: Rugged Survivalist
Rugged Survivalist.description: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness. You don't get fatigued more quickly due to precipitation during overland travel, though you can otherwise be fatigued as normal. You can go 3 days + your Constitution modifier without water before you take damage from thirst and you can go 5 days + your Constitution modifier without food before you take damage from starvation.

Rule of Three.name: Rule of Three
Rule of Three.description:
Requirements You have @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spun a Tale}.

Trigger The villain of the tale you've spun makes an attack roll with a given weapon or unarmed attack, uses a particular special ability (such as a Breath Weapon), or Casts a Spell against the hero, and they used that same attack, special ability, or spell against the hero on the previous turn.

Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt. You narrate a tale of the hero's success, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC or saving throw against the triggering effect. If the villain has used the same effect against the hero on both of their last two turns, and you used Rule of Three on that effect last turn as well, the bonus increases to +4.

Runelord Dedication.name: Runelord Dedication
Runelord Dedication.description:
Your rune magic increases, and you practice with your school's associated weapon. You gain an additional cantrip of your chosen arcane school, and each time you gain a level (including this level), you add an additional spell from your chosen arcane school to your spellbook, with the same restrictions as the two spells you normally add.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the runelord archetype.

Runescarred Dedication.name: Runescarred Dedication
Runescarred Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.RyjrUkqSIg52Mjl8]{Runescarred}

Access You are from the Saga Lands.

Whether through blood (if you're Varisian, Shoanti, or New Thassilonian) or by exposure to rune magic, you have become runescarred, with visible, glowing runes on your body in the form of tattoos or scars. You might have possessed these marks before gaining the archetype, but you only truly became runescarred when you chose to study and tap into the runes' power. You become an expert in Arcana and you also become trained in Thassilon Lore, or an expert in Thassilon Lore if you were already trained in it.

Choose one cantrip from the arcane list. One of the runes on your body corresponds to the chosen cantrip, and you can cast the chosen cantrip as an innate arcane spell.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the runescarred archetype.

Runic Impression.name: 刻印符文 Runic Impression
Runic Impression.description:
你可暂时仿制（replicate）一个性能符文（proper）的效果用于你的武器或无武装攻击。你习得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oOaEfsdVpgTXRhrY]{刻印符文 Runic Impression} 汇聚法术（conflux spell）。

你聚能池的聚能点加1。

Running Reload.name: Running Reload
Running Reload.description: You can reload your weapon on the move. You Stride, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}to reload.

Running Tackle.name: Running Tackle
Running Tackle.description: You charge toward your opponent, throwing your body at them in a vicious tackle. Stride up to your Speed and then make an unarmed melee Strike. If you hit, you can attempt to Shove the target.

Runtsage.name: Runtsage
Runtsage.description: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ihN8gkHSdPG9Trte]{Adopted Ancestry} general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level goblin ancestry feat.

Saber Teeth.name: Saber Teeth
Saber Teeth.description: You have long fangs, natural or augmented. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the unarmed trait.

Sabotage.name: Sabotage
Sabotage.description:
Requirements You have a free hand

You subtly damage others' equipment. Choose one item that a creature within your reach wields or carries. The item must have moving parts that you could possibly sabotage (a shortbow could be sabotaged, but a longsword could not). Attempt a Thievery check against the Reflex DC of the creature. Damage dealt by Sabotage can't take the item below its Break Threshold.

Critical Success You deal damage equal to four times your Thievery proficiency bonus.

Success You deal damage equal to double your Thievery proficiency bonus.

Critical Failure Temporarily immune to your Sabotage for 1 day

Sacred Defender.name: 神圣防卫者 Sacred Defender
Sacred Defender.description:
你是个强大的战士，即使遇到再强大的敌人也屹立不摇。

你对和你信条相悖(邪恶生物对善良信条、善良生物对邪恶信条，以此类推)生物所造成的攻击与效果上，于钝击、穿刺还有挥砍伤害获得抗力10。

此外，在对抗你的攻击骰上，该生物和效果如果骰出自然20，不会让结果的成功程度上升一阶。

Sacred Defense.name: Sacred Defense
Sacred Defense.description:
Frequency once per hour

You call upon your deity to grant you their protective blessing. Attempt a DC 30 Religion check. If you have legendary proficiency in Religion, you can instead attempt a DC 40 Religion check to increase the temporary Hit Points you gain on a successful check to 15 (25 on a critical success).

Critical Success You gain 10 temporary Hit Points. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Success You gain 5 temporary Hit Points. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Critical Failure Your deity withholds their blessing. You cannot attempt to call to your deity again for 1 day.

Sacred Ki.name: Sacred Ki
Sacred Ki.description:
The power of your faith suffuses your ki. When you select this feat, choose chaos, evil, good, or law. Your choice must match one of your deity's alignment components.

When you cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Ki Strike} focus spell and damage a creature whose alignment is opposite your chosen alignment, you can choose for the ki strike damage to be of the chosen type.

Additionally, you can substitute the damage from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Ki Blast} (or other ki spells that deal force damage, at the GM's discretion) with damage of your chosen alignment.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.joCQGq27FylDuY9P]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Chaotic)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4U9BWv0rSpGbU0wr]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Evil)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.OplbQWW6i1NtMq9f]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Good)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.X2BGmuKdGVj4YYyp]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike (Lawful)}

Sacrifice Armor.name: 牺牲护甲 Sacrifice Armor
Sacrifice Armor.description:
触发 你被会造成物理伤害的打击动作击中。

借由神性的领会，你拧转身躯降低攻击带来的冲击。将受到的伤害减去你盔甲等级两倍的值。你的盔甲 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{破损}，把盔甲的生命值扣到破损阈值。如果你的盔甲本来就有损坏(already damaged)，那就会被毁掉。

Safe House.name: Safe House
Safe House.description:
You establish a safe house-a secure space in which to hide your secrets from the outside world.

This safe house is roughly the size of a 10-foot cube. It's in a location you have access to, and it can be part of a larger building or structure, like a hidden room or an underground cave.

The safe house protects objects and people inside it from magical detection. This has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection}, using your Deception modifier for the counteract DC and half your level rounded up for the counteract level.

Setting up or moving your safe house takes a week of downtime.

The size of the safe house expands to four 10-foot cubes if you're an expert in Deception, eight cubes if you're a master, and 16 cubes if you're legendary.

Safeguarded Spell.name: Safeguarded Spell
Safeguarded Spell.description: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body. If the next action you take is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with an area, you aren't affected by the spell even if you are within the area.

Safety Measures.name: Safety Measures
Safety Measures.description: You're often careful to be sure you're not hoisted on your own petard, or anyone else's, for that matter. When you have cover from a bomb, you gain resistance to damage caused by that bomb equal to half your level, plus a value equal to the circumstance bonus to AC granted by the cover. You gain these benefits against your own bombs regardless of whether you have cover.

Sanctify Water.name: Sanctify Water
Sanctify Water.description: You imbue water with your deity's blessing. Choose a container of water on your person that is of light Bulk. For 1 round, if you or an ally throw this container at a foe, it has the damaging effects of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.efFe4EK7ThUrH446]{Holy Water} (if you follow a good deity) or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.uplCUQwMwBOBHz0E]{Unholy Water} (if you follow an evil deity). The water's transient power doesn't make it gain any value, allow it to be used to supply the cost for a spell or ritual, and so on. If you have legendary proficiency in Religion, you can sanctify three containers held by you or allies within your reach instead of one.

Saoc Astrology.name: Saoc Astrology
Saoc Astrology.description:
Frequency 3 times per day

Access Lirgeni nationality

Requirements You must spend 10 minutes just after your daily preparations examining the sky or consulting a star chart or you can't use this action that day.

The ancient Saoc Brethren were the masters of astrology, and while your knowledge may be but a pale shadow of their wisdom, it still comes in handy. You recall the stars' predictions about your current situation. If your next action requires you to attempt one or more skill checks, roll 1d8. On a result of 6, 7, or 8, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the first such skill check you attempt. On a 3, 4, or 5, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus. On a 2, you gain nothing. On a 1, you take a -1 circumstance penalty to the skill check.

Sap Life.name: Sap Life
Sap Life.description: You draw the life force out of your enemies to heal your own wounds. When you cast a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell and damage at least one living creature, you regain Hit Points equal to the spell level of your harm spell. If you aren't a living creature, you gain no benefit from this feat.

Savage Critical.name: Savage Critical
Savage Critical.description: The wounds you inflict are grievous. When you Strike with a weapon or unarmed attack for which you have legendary proficiency, you critically succeed if you roll a 19 on the die as long as that result is a success. This has no effect on a 19 if the result would be a failure.

Saving Slash.name: 求生斩击 Saving Slash
Saving Slash.description:
触发 敌人对你的近战攻击造成重击。

你迅速旋转剑刃试图偏转足够的动能以避免这次攻击最糟糕的情况。进行DC16的纯骰检定。如果你成功的话，这次攻击将变成普通攻击而非重击。

Scalding Spit.name: Scalding Spit
Scalding Spit.description: Your bodily fluids burn with surprising volatility, as if you ran on oil instead of blood. As long as you are taking @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}, you gain a boiling spit ranged unarmed attack with a range of 30 feet that deals 1d6 fire damage.

Scales Of The Dragon.name: Scales Of The Dragon
Scales Of The Dragon.description: Scales grow across your body, protecting you against physical and magical threats. When you're unarmored, the scales give you a +2 status bonus to AC with a Dexterity cap of +2. Your resistance from Dragon Disciple Dedication increases to 3 + half your level.

Scaling Poppet.name: Scaling Poppet
Scaling Poppet.description: Your construction integrates ropes, hooks, or other tools to help you move across steep surfaces. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.

Scalpel's Point.name: Scalpel's Point
Scalpel's Point.description: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy. When you critically hit with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devising a Strategem}, if your attack dealt piercing or slashing damage, you also deal [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} to your target.

Scamper.name: Scamper
Scamper.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to at least one enemy.

You instinctively know how to flee danger. You Stride up to your Speed, with a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. You must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy.

Scamper Underfoot.name: Scamper Underfoot
Scamper Underfoot.description: You are used to ducking under foes and can scurry around the battlefield with ease. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} the spaces of Medium or larger enemies, and the presence of an enemy doesn't make the squares difficult terrain.

Scapegoat Parallel Self.name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
Scapegoat Parallel Self.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Your turn starts or your oracular curse would advance.

Seeing Syndara superimpose creatures with similar metaphysical properties, you've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse. You immediately change your curse to its minor, moderate, or major stage, or back to its mild form, exchanging the curse effect with that of a parallel version of yourself in another reality.

Scar-Thick Skin.name: Scar-Thick Skin
Scar-Thick Skin.description: Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body. Your DC on flat checks to end @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is reduced from 15 to 10, or from 10 to 5 after receiving especially appropriate assistance.

Scare to Death.name: 肝胆俱裂 Scare to Death
Scare to Death.description:
你造成的恐怖如此之剧烈，以至于受害者可能被活活吓死。你可以对一个距离你不超过30尺距离，你可以感知和观察且它也可以感知和观察到你的活物进行一次威吓技能检定。如果对方听不懂你使用的语言，或是它听不见你，这会在你的检定上造成-4环境减值。这个生物在此之后会暂时免疫你的这个专长效果1分钟时间。

大成功 目标必须进行一次强韧豁免检定来对抗你的威吓检定结果，失败则暴死。如果目标在豁免检定上成功，它陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 2}状态并开始逃跑（Fleeing）1轮；如果目标在豁免检定上大成功则不受任何影响。

成功 目标陷入陷入惊惧2状态。

失败 目标陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 1}状态。

大失败 目标什么事也没有。

Scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
Scarecrow.description: You fight fiercely to protect your crop. When you hit a creature that is adjacent to two or more members of your crop with a weapon or unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to your damage roll equal to the number of weapon damage dice. When you hit a creature who has a member of your crop grabbed, that member can attempt to Escape using a reaction.a

Scatter Blast.name: Scatter Blast
Scatter Blast.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm that has the scatter trait.

You pack your weapon with additional shot and powder, creating a risky but devastating wave of destruction. Make a ranged Strike with the firearm. The firearm's range increment increases by 20 feet and the radius of its scatter increases by 20 feet. The Strike gains the following failure conditions.

Failure The firearm misfires, but it doesn't cause the other critical failure effects listed below.

Critical Failure The firearm misfires and also explodes. It becomes broken, and it deals its normal weapon damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] centered on the firearm, with a basic Reflex save against your class DC. This damage includes any from the weapon's fundamental and property runes.

Scattered Fire.name: Scattered Fire
Scattered Fire.description: When you cast fireball, you can modify its area to be two non-overlapping @Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10-foot bursts}.

Scavenger's Search.name: Scavenger's Search
Scavenger's Search.description: You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables. Each time you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to search for objects (including secret doors and hazards), you can search for objects in your choice of a 10-foot emanation around you or an adjacent 15-foot-by-15-foot area, rather than a single adjacent 10-foot-by-10-foot area.

Scholar's Inheritance.name: Scholar's Inheritance
Scholar's Inheritance.description: Your parents devoted themselves to alchemical experiments involving elemental energy. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting. If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat.

Scholarly Defense.name: Scholarly Defense
Scholarly Defense.description: Your knowledge of strange creatures and their bizarre anatomy allows you to anticipate their physical attacks and reduce the damage you take from them. You gain resistance to physical damage from melee attacks made by aberrations and oozes. This resistance is equal to one-third your level.

Scholastic Identification.name: Scholastic Identification
Scholastic Identification.description:
You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

You can use Society when @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{Deciphering Writing}, no matter the type of writing you are examining.

You can also use Society to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{Identify Magic} when examining a magic item or location with cultural significance.

School Counterspell.name: School Counterspell
School Counterspell.description: Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school. Instead of being able to counter a foe's spell with Counterspell only if you have the same spell prepared, if the foe casts a spell from the school matching your specialization, you can Counterspell it with any other spell of the same school.

School Spell Redirection.name: School Spell Redirection
School Spell Redirection.description: When you Counterspell a spell with a school matching your specialization, if you critically succeed at your counteract check, or if you succeed while using a spell of a higher level than the spell you countered, you can redirect the spell you countered. You choose the target, area, and other aspects of the spell and use your own spell DC, spell attack roll, or other statistics as appropriate to determine the effects.

Schooled In Secrets.name: 记号的秘密 Schooled In Secrets
Schooled In Secrets.description:
你能注意到秘密教派和秘密社团成员用来向其他成员宣布他们的从属关系的标志和符号。

在对这些团体 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{搜集信息 Gather Information} 时，你可用神秘技能代替交涉技能。若你自己从属于一个秘密教派、团体、隐修会或类似组织，除非团体成员有意对你隐藏自己的存在，否则你自动识别自己组织成员留下的记号。

Scintillating Spell.name: Scintillating Spell
Scintillating Spell.description:
Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that doesn't have the darkness trait, has no duration, and requires creatures to attempt a Reflex save, the spell explodes in a spray of scintillating lights, in addition to its other effects.

Each creature that failed its Reflex save against the spell is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round, and those who critically failed are instead @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Scion Transformation.name: Scion Transformation
Scion Transformation.description: You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis. You permanently gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}, and your maximum Hit Points increase by your level. The ritual transforms most of your gear to the appropriate size for your new body (though powerful items like artifacts or items strongly tied to their original size may not transform, at the GM's discretion).

Scorching Disarm.name: Scorching Disarm
Scorching Disarm.description:
Frequency once per day

You make a weapon unbearable to hold. Attempt an Athletics check to Disarm a target creature. You don't need to have a hand free to make this Disarm attempt. If the Disarm attempt succeeds, the target takes [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage} unless it drops the weapon, and on a critical success, it takes [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage} and drops the weapon. If you're legendary in Athletics, this increases to [[/r {8d6}[fire]]]{8d6 fire damage}.

Scouring Rage.name: Scouring Rage
Scouring Rage.description:
Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Rage}.

You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential. Each adjacent creature takes damage equal to your level (basic Fortitude save against your class DC) of the same type as your additional damage during that Rage.

Scout Dedication.name: Scout Dedication
Scout Dedication.description:
You are a highly skilled scout, capable of providing your allies a timely warning of any danger. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning} ranger feat.

When you're using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout} exploration activity, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls instead of a +1 circumstance bonus.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the scout archetype.

Scout's Charge.name: Scout's Charge
Scout's Charge.description:
You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

Choose one enemy. Stride, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against that opponent, and then make a Strike against that foe. For your Feint, you can attempt a Stealth check instead of the Deception check that's usually required, because you use the terrain around you to catch your foe off-guard.

Scout's Pounce.name: Scout's Pounce
Scout's Pounce.description:
Requirements You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by all

of your opponents, and you aren't within 10 feet of any

enemy.

You leap from the shadows to strike your foes. Stride up to your Speed, then Strike twice. If you were hidden or unnoticed by the target of these Strikes, your foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against both attacks.

Your multiple attack penalty applies normally for both attacks.

Scout's Speed.name: Scout's Speed
Scout's Speed.description: You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout ahead and report back without slowing your allies. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed. When calculating your travel speed, this increases to a +20-foot status bonus.

Scout's Warning.name: Scout's Warning
Scout's Warning.description:
Trigger You are about to roll a Perception or Survival check for initiative

You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this action gains either the visual or auditory trait, respectively.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.RxDDXK52lwyHXl7v]{Effect: Scout's Warning}

Scroll Savant.name: 卷轴学家 Scroll Savant
Scroll Savant.description:
妳在日常准备中，可以创造两个两个临时卷轴，卷轴内的奥术法术需来自妳的法术书。这些卷轴的规则与一般卷轴相同(P.564)，但有一些额外限制。

每个卷轴内含的法术环级必须不同，并且内含法术的环级必须至少低于你最高环级2级。妳用这种方式制作的卷轴在你下次进行日常准备时，会自动变成非魔法物品。临时卷轴没有任何价值。

如果妳在奥术法术DC上有大师级熟练度，妳能在日常准备之际创造三个临时卷轴；妳果妳有传奇熟练度，妳可以创造四个临时卷轴。

Scroll Trickster Dedication.name: Scroll Trickster Dedication
Scroll Trickster Dedication.description:
You've studied scrolls in depth. This might have been a comprehensive education in formal setting, or the sort of education where you somehow obtain a number of scrolls and try not to explode anything you didn't mean to explode.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR62fVC9FyQAMCO1]{Trick Magic Item} feat, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to Trick scrolls. If you roll a critical failure to Trick a Magic Item that's a scroll, you get a failure instead.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the scroll trickster archetype.

Scrollmaster Dedication.name: Scrollmaster Dedication
Scrollmaster Dedication.description:
Your experience chronicling adventures and discoveries grants you heightened discernment and memory. For 24 hours after learning a prominent fact-such as the name of an NPC you have met, the details of your mission briefing, and similar information-you can recall it without attempting a check, though this doesn't allow you to automatically memorize long strings of numbers or text. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to remember a detail that has come up before in the current adventure, even if it was more than 24 hours ago.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0Dy8RlFqrzCVOTl4]{Thorough Reports} feat and have expert proficiency in the skill you're using to Recall Knowledge, your circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge about creatures from that feat increases to +4.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Scrollmaster archetype.

Scrounger Dedication.name: Scrounger Dedication
Scrounger Dedication.description:
You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} items even without appropriate tools or a workshop, though you take a -2 item penalty to your Crafting check.

Additionally, you don't need a physical formula book to remember all of your formulas; you pay the same cost as normal to learn them, but you memorize them all.

You can Craft temporary items out of anything, anywhere, with whatever materials happen to be on hand, spending only 10 minutes to perform the initial Crafting check. The temporary item must be common, non-magical, 1st level or lower, and must be a weapon, armor, or a nonconsumable piece of adventuring gear. Instead of a single item, you can create 10 pieces of a single type of ammunition. This is a shoddy item, but you don't take the normal penalty when using shoddy items you made using this feat.

Your temporary item lasts for [[/r 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours} before falling apart into its raw components; the GM rolls the number of hours secretly. You can create only the physical item, not any information or magic, so for example, while you could create a blank journal or one of random pages, you couldn't use it as a scholarly journal or a religious text.

You can incorporate any materials or items that you have on hand, even if they're not the type of materials that would ordinarily be used to Craft a given item, though you must have enough volume of material to make the item you want.

Unless all the materials you used were an appropriate type to make the item, you take a -5 penalty to the Crafting check (or a -10 penalty if the materials you used were particularly unsuitable, as determined by the GM).

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the scrounger archetype.

Scrutinizing Gaze.name: Scrutinizing Gaze
Scrutinizing Gaze.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

Your family's traditions of defending against Geb's undead have granted you a sixth sense for detecting spirits, haunts, and other restless dead, no matter their form or the strength of their presence. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} when trying to determine if a creature is possessed or under the influence of an effect that would make them controlled, a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks made to see through disguises worn by undead, and a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected haunts or undead within 30 feet of you.

If you aren't using the Seek action or searching, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to notice haunts or undead within 30 feet anyway. This check doesn't gain the usual +2 circumstance bonus, and instead takes a -2 circumstance penalty.

Sculpt Shadows.name: Sculpt Shadows
Sculpt Shadows.description: You coax nearby shadows into the shape of a simple weapon or a simple tool or item, using a tiny piece of your shadow to make it solid; in doing so, you lose 1 Hit Point. You can create only level-0 common, non-consumable weapons, or adventuring gear with no intricate parts, written text, or other complicated components. The item lasts until used for a single activity, until you Sculpt Shadows again, or for 1 minute, whichever comes first. Once the duration expires, the object dissipates, and you regain the lost Hit Point unless the item was Broken or Destroyed. As the object holds a tiny sliver of your shadow, you can't recover the lost Hit Point until after the object dissipates.

Sealed Poppet.name: Sealed Poppet
Sealed Poppet.description:
You've reinforced your interior parts with sealant or other flame-retardant materials, protecting you from fire. You no longer have the weakness to fire from the flammable ability.

Special You can't take this feat if you're a stuffed poppet.

Searing Restoration.name: 烧灼疗法 Searing Restoration
Searing Restoration.description:
别人告诉你爆炸不可能能用来治疗，但他们都是傻子……傻子都无法理解你的智慧！你从大发明中造出一种小型爆炸，改变燃烧强度并使用蒸汽药草烧灼伤口。你或一个邻接你的生物恢复 [[/r {1d10}[healing]]]{1d10点生命值}。另外，该生物可以立刻尝试一次纯骰检定以从某单一来源的持续性流血伤害中恢复，且DC降低，如同提供了合适的辅助。

在3级，以及之后每2级，治疗量提升1d10。

特殊 如果你的大发明是仆从，它而非你可以进行该动作，但因为它并非一个活物，它不能对自身使用该能力。

Seasoned.name: 老厨子 Seasoned
Seasoned.description: 你十分擅长准备许多种类的食物和饮品。你在制作（Craft）食物和饮品时的检定上获得+1环境加值，包括制作药水时。若你某一个先决条件技能熟练等级为大师，则环境加值为+2。

Second Ally.name: 第二盟友 Second Ally
Second Ally.description: 你心中的恩典引起了第二位守护灵的注意。再选择另一种类型的神圣盟友并获得它的好处。

Second Chance Spell.name: 不贰过 Second Chance Spell
Second Chance Spell.description: 当你的目标没有被你的魔法诡计迷惑时，你可以对另一个人重试。当你对一个生物施放一个惑控法术，且该生物在意志豁免上大成功，你可以在你下一回合结束前对不同生物施放同个法术(Cast the Spell)且不用额外消耗法术位。第二次施法不会任何你通常从法术位施法(Casting a Spell)时会获得的任何好处。

Second Shield.name: Second Shield
Second Shield.description:
Trigger Your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} causes your shield to break or be destroyed.

You're used to your shield breaking in the middle of battle, and you're prepared to use a backup or any convenient nearby object to defend yourself.

You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw a shield on your person or an unattended shield within your reach. If there is an object within your reach that could serve as an improvised shield-for example, a table or chair-you can Interact to draw it with this feat. The GM determines if something can be used as an improvised shield.

Your new shield isn't raised until you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as normal.

Second Sting.name: Second Sting
Second Sting.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

You read your prey's movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other. Make a melee Strike with one of the required weapons against your hunted prey. The Strike gains the following failure effect.

Failure You deal the damage the other required weapon would have dealt on a hit, excluding all damage dice. (This removes dice from weapon runes, spells, and special abilities, not just weapon damage dice).

Second Wind.name: Second Wind
Second Wind.description: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath. You can Rage without waiting for 1 minute after the previous Rage (or 1 round, with quick rage), but when you end this second Rage, you're fatigued until you rest for 10 minutes.

Secret Eyes.name: Secret Eyes
Secret Eyes.description: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Prying Eye} as an innate occult spell.

Secret Speech.name: Secret Speech
Secret Speech.description:
Choose a secret society (such as the Lacunafex or the Bellflower Network). You've learned that society's secret cant or jargon, enabling you to share hidden messages when signing or speaking with others who've also learned it. If an observer succeeds at a Perception check against your Deception DC when you do this, they realize you are passing a message but fail to discern its content, unless they subsequently succeed at a Society check against your Deception DC. On a critical success, they learn not only the message, but also who you're passing the message to.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. You learn the secret speech of a different society each time.

Secrets of Shadow.name: Secrets of Shadow
Secrets of Shadow.description:
Your shadow's voice grows ever clearer; it whispers secrets of true power to you and shields your flesh from harm. Your shadow reservoir gains an additional spell 1 level below the highest level spell you can cast, in addition to the spells it already contains for all the levels below that.

In addition, the tattoos generated by casting shadow spells protect your body against harmful energies. You gain negative resistance equal to the highest level of spell you can cast from spell slots; if you have negative healing (or are otherwise harmed by positive damage and not negative damage), you instead gain positive resistance in the same amount.

See the Unseen.name: See the Unseen
See the Unseen.description: You notice things that others can't see at all. While you're adjacent to an undetected creature of your level or lower, it is instead only hidden from you. You only need a successful DC 5 flat check to target a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} creature.

Seedpod.name: Seedpod
Seedpod.description: Your body produces a nearly endless supply of hard seedpods. You gain a seedpod ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 10 feet that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage; these Strikes have the manipulate trait. On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a -10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round. Seedpods do not add critical specialization effects.

Seek Injustice.name: Seek Injustice
Seek Injustice.description:
Frequency once per day

With a moment spent focusing, you can locate the telltale signs of corruption no matter what means it may use to hide from your sight. For 1 minute, you can see through up to 5 feet of stone, wood, or similar barriers as if they didn't exist (though any amount of metal or denser barriers block this effect).

Seeker Arrow.name: Seeker Arrow
Seeker Arrow.description: Your shots zip around corners and fly at impossible angles to reach your target. Make a bow Strike against a foe you can see; the ammunition travels to your target, even around corners. You ignore the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition and all cover.

Seeker of Truths.name: Seeker of Truths
Seeker of Truths.description:
Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear. You gain the cleric's @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} feat but must select knowledge, secrecy, or truth as your domain. You cast that domain's domain spell as a focus spell of the same tradition as your cantrip from Eldritch Researcher Dedication, and you Refocus by contemplating abstruse mysteries rather than praying to a god. When an ability would manifest a divine symbol—such as the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aF7RiG7c8GzSQLYt]{Word of Truth} focus spell—it instead manifests as a strange shape unique to you that seems to defy geometry.

Special You can take this feat up to three times, selecting a different domain each time.

Selective Energy.name: Selective Energy
Selective Energy.description: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt. When you cast a version of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} that has an area, you can designate a number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1) that are not targeted by the spell.

Selfless Parry.name: Selfless Parry
Selfless Parry.description:
You protect those near you with a flash of steel. When you're benefiting from Dueling Parry, allies adjacent to you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{Dueling Riposte}, you can use it when an enemy within your reach critically fails a Strike against an ally adjacent to you, not just against yourself.

Sense Alignment.name: Sense Alignment
Sense Alignment.description:
You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos. The GM rolls a secret Perception check, comparing the result against the target's Deception DC.

Critical Success You ascertain the target's alignment.

Success You ascertain the target's alignment, but only along one axis (your choice of either the good-evil axis or the lawful-chaotic axis).

Failure You do not learn the target's alignment.

Critical Failure You incorrectly ascertain the target's alignment, misidentifying their alignment along either one axis or both (GM's choice).

Sense Allies.name: 感知盟友 Sense Allies
Sense Allies.description: 与许多其他在关系紧密的社区长大的人类一样，你总能够强烈地感受并适应他人的存在。距离你60尺范围内，且你能意识到的自愿盟友，若在正常情况下对你来说为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪} ，则改为对你来说为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿} 作为替代。若你要以对你来说为藏匿状态、且与你的距离不超过60尺的自愿盟友为目标，则此纯骰检定（flat check）的DC为5，而非正常的11。

Sense Chaos.name: Sense Chaos
Sense Chaos.description: You sense chaos as an unsettling feeling of nervous energy. When in the presence of an aura of chaos that is powerful or overwhelming, you eventually detect the aura, though you might not do so instantly and you can't pinpoint the location. This is a vague sense, similar to humans' sense of smell. A chaotic creature using a disguise or otherwise trying to hide its presence attempts a Deception check against your Perception DC to hide its aura from you. If the creature succeeds at its Deception check, it is temporarily immune to your Sense Chaos for 1 day.

Sense Evil.name: 感知邪恶 Sense Evil
Sense Evil.description:
令人作呕的感觉或忽然闪现的预兆让你感知到邪恶的存在。当你的面前有强大（Powerful）或刺目（Overwhelming）邪恶灵光存在时，你最终会感知到这种灵光，不过你并不会立即察觉到，你也无法准确地将其定位。这个能力如同模糊感官（Vague sense）一般运作，类似于人类的嗅觉。

邪恶生物能够使用某种伪装或其他方式尝试隐藏他的存在并进行一次欺骗检定对抗你的察觉DC来从你的眼中隐藏它的灵光。如果这名生物在这次欺骗检定中成功，它能够在一天内暂时免疫你的感知邪恶。

Sense For Trouble.name: Sense For Trouble
Sense For Trouble.description:
You can tell when something's off. You can trigger @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} after you roll initiative, in addition to its normal trigger, to reroll your Initiative and take the higher of the two results.

This still counts against Cat's Luck's frequency, as normal.

Sense Good.name: 感知善良 Sense Good
Sense Good.description:
善良存在那伪善的正义让你觉得恶心。当存在一个强烈(powerful)或刺目(overwhelming)的善良灵光，你能侦测到该灵光，虽然你可能没办法立刻侦测到，并且你无法精确定位灵光的位置。这个侦测算做模糊感官(vague sense)，类似人类的嗅觉。

使用易容或其他想要隐藏自身手段的善良生物，要想在你眼前隐藏自己的灵光，需要进行一次欺骗检定，对抗你的察觉DC。如果该生物的欺骗检定成功，接下来的一天里他会暂时免疫你的感知善良能力。

Sense Ki.name: Sense Ki
Sense Ki.description: You can read the presence of ki in your area. You gain imprecise lifesense out to a range of 30 feet.

Sense The Unseen.name: Sense The Unseen
Sense The Unseen.description:
Trigger You fail a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}

When you look for foes, you notice the slightest of cues. Even though you failed at the triggering check, you automatically sense any @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures in the area where you're Seeking, making them merely @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you.

Sense Thoughts.name: Sense Thoughts
Sense Thoughts.description: You have an even stranger knack for knowing what other people are thinking. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading} as an innate occult spell once per day.

Sensitive Nose.name: Sensitive Nose
Sensitive Nose.description:
Your large black nose isn't just for show. You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.

Sentinel Dedication.name: Sentinel Dedication
Sentinel Dedication.description:
You have trained carefully to maximize the protective qualities of your armor.

You become trained in light armor and medium armor. If you already were trained in light armor and medium armor, you gain training in heavy armor as well.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in any type of armor (but not unarmored defense), you also gain that proficiency in the armor types granted to you by this feat. If you are at least 13th level and you have a class feature that grants you expert proficiency in unarmored defense, you also become an expert in the armor types granted to you by this feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the sentinel archetype.

Settlement Scholastics.name: Settlement Scholastics
Settlement Scholastics.description:
Your studies open up new horizons. You become an expert in a Lore skill about a specific settlement; if you were already trained in that Lore skill, you also become trained in the Lore skill for a different settlement of your choice. Choose a single common or uncommon language prevalent in that settlement. You learn that language.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. When you take this feat again, choose a different settlement.

Sever Space.name: Sever Space
Sever Space.description:
Requirements You are wielding a weapon that deals slashing damage or have an unarmed Strike that deals slashing damage.

You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon or unarmed attack. The attack gains an 80-foot reach for this Strike.

After the Strike, regardless of whether it succeeded, the world rushes to fill the space you destroyed, bringing you and the target adjacent to each other. You can choose to teleport to the closest space adjacent to the target or to attempt to teleport the target adjacent to you. If you choose the target, they can negate the teleportation if they succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC.

Shackleborn.name: 链魔血脉 Shackleborn
Shackleborn.description: 你的血脉中可见到链魔改造的痕迹，能看到这些喜爱塑造肉体与灵魂的影界工匠留下的种种奇妙特质。你的肉体自癒的相当迅速完整─正是方便祂们用来练习手艺的理想实验品。你无视先决条件获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N8Xz5fuW6o7GW124]{快速恢复 Fast Recovery} 通用专长。

Shackles of Law.name: Shackles of Law
Shackles of Law.description: You attempt to subdue a target with an attack and a follow-up grab. Make a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, you can attempt an Athletics check to Grapple the creature you hit. If you're wielding a flail, you can ignore Grapple's requirement that you have a hand free. Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made both of them.

Shadow Blending.name: Shadow Blending
Shadow Blending.description:
Trigger A creature attempts a flat check to target you while you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} due to dim light or darkness.

You draw shadows close to create a shroud. Increase the DC of the flat check by 2.

Shadow Hunter.name: Shadow Hunter
Shadow Hunter.description: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain. While in natural terrain, you're always @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from all foes if you choose to be, except for your hunted prey.

Shadow Illusion.name: Shadow Illusion
Shadow Illusion.description: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EOWh6VVcSjB3WPjX]{Shadow Illusion} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.

Shadow Magic.name: Shadow Magic
Shadow Magic.description:
You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers.

You learn a shadowdancer focus spell of your choice: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BGEf9Sv5rgNBCk0]{Dance of Darkness} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5ttAVJbWg2GVKmrN]{Shadow Jump}. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus}by meditating within an area of dim light or darkness.

Shadowdancer focus spells are occult spells. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Shadow Mark.name: 暗影印记 Shadow Mark
Shadow Mark.description:
你经受过特殊训练，可以悄无声息跟在目标背后而不被发现。

当你处于 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{避人耳目 Avoid Notice} 探索行动中，进行隐秘检定跟踪一个特定目标时，目标的察觉检定受到-2环境减值。若你隐秘技能为大师，减值为-3，若为传奇，减值为-4。

若目标处于该减值中时被你引入遭遇模式中，目标的先攻骰受到同样的减值，在目标察觉到你后，目标对抗你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}动作的察觉DC受到同样的减值。

Shadow Master.name: Shadow Master
Shadow Master.description:
The shadows protect you better than any armor can, and they give you power to plunge others into darkness.

Whenever you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you gain resistance 5 to all damage except force and damage from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

When you attempt a Reflex saving throw in an area of dim light or darkness, you can roll twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Shadow Pact.name: Shadow Pact
Shadow Pact.description: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with @Compendium[pf2e.deities.ZfN7jkK6boU1FuiS]{Zon-Kuthon}. He has not forgotten, even if you might wish he had. You can take 1 damage to mix blood and shadows to cast 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation} as an innate divine spell. You can use this ability as often as you wish, but you can have only one such object in existence at a time. If the object encounters bright light, the spell ends and the object dissolves into shadows.

Shadow Power.name: Shadow Power
Shadow Power.description: You can focus the shadows into a powerful blast. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} as an innate occult spell once per day. Its level is always 1 level lower than the level of your shadowdancer focus spells. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.

Shadow Reservoir.name: Shadow Reservoir
Shadow Reservoir.description:
Your own shadow speaks to you, providing knowledge of spells and a reservoir of magical power. Your shadow reservoir contains a single spell of each spell level at least 2 levels lower than the highest-level spell you can cast from your spell slots. This spell must come from your spell list, you must have access to it, and it must require a spell attack roll or a saving throw. These spells don't need to be prepared and aren't in your repertoire.

Regardless of the way in which you cast spells, you can spontaneously cast a spell from your shadow reservoir by using one of your spell slots of the same level. If you're a prepared spellcaster, you lose the spell you prepared in that slot.

Spells cast from your shadow reservoir gain the shadow trait, and affected creatures might be able to disbelieve them. If the spell requires an attack roll, use the higher of the target's AC or their Will DC. If the spell requires a saving throw, the target uses their Will saving throw or the spell's normal saving throw, whichever is higher. Each time a creature fails its saving throw against a spell cast from your reservoir, you gain a small tattoo inked on your flesh out of pure shadowstuff.

If you have more than one source of spells you can cast with spell slots, such as if you're a spellcaster with a multiclass archetype, choose one source of spells for your shadow reservoir.

Shadow Self.name: Shadow Self
Shadow Self.description:
Frequency Once per hour.

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from all your current foes, or use Stealth to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all your current foes.

With a powerful talent for misdirection, you slip from your adversaries' notice so thoroughly you appear to be somewhere else. You become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 1 minute or until you take a hostile action, whichever comes first.

Choose a location within 10 feet of you. Until your invisibility ends, you appear to be hidden in that location to anyone trying to find you. If the searcher gets clear evidence that you're not there, they no longer think you're hidden there, but they don't discover your actual location.

Shadow Sight.name: Shadow Sight
Shadow Sight.description:
Frequency once per hour

You draw on your connection with the Shadow Plane to see through all but the deepest darkness. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.vPhPgzpRjYDMT9Kq]{Greater Darkvision} for 1 minute.

Shadow Sneak Attack.name: Shadow Sneak Attack
Shadow Sneak Attack.description:
You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{Sneak Attack} class feature, except you deal [[/r {1d6}[precision]]]{1d6 precision damage} regardless of your level.

Sneak attack from multiple sources isn't cumulative. If you have sneak attack from more than one source, use only the highest number of dice when you sneak attack rather than adding the amounts together.

Shadow Spell.name: Shadow Spell
Shadow Spell.description:
You attach a piece of your shadow to a spell to cloud the senses and cause mischief. If the next action you take is to Cast a Spell that has the shadow trait, choose one creature affected by the spell. This creature either gains a +2 status bonus to Stealth or takes a -2 status penalty to Perception (your choice). This lasts for 1 round. This choice and the effect occur after resolving any checks for the spell's initial effects. If the chosen creature is your enemy, it's affected only if your spell attack roll succeeded or if it failed its saving throw.

The effects of Shadow Spell end if you use Shadow Spell again.

Shadow Spells.name: Shadow Spells
Shadow Spells.description: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition. Add @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tcwT97RWKxsJiefG]{Shadow Siphon}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{Shadow Walk}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.srEKUvym9kDVbEhD]{Replicate}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hvKtmoHwekDZ5iOH]{Shadow Army}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8cuqRFB3mWBOgy61]{Shadow Projectile}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VTb0yI6P1bLkzuRr]{Shadow Raid} to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.

Shadow of the Wilds.name: Shadow of the Wilds
Shadow of the Wilds.description: It's difficult to notice your passage through wild areas. As long as you're not in an urban environment, you're always considered to be @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]{Covering Tracks}, even if you chose a different activity in exploration mode.

Shadow's Assault.name: Shadow's Assault
Shadow's Assault.description: Your shadow assaults your foes. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} as a 5th-level occult innate spell once per day. At 17th level, your shadow blast is heightened to 6th level.

Shadow's Web.name: Shadow's Web
Shadow's Web.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QkKMile0qqmuVY67]{Clinging Shadows Initiate}.

You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.n8eEXXAtguoErW0y]{Shadow's Web} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Shadowcaster Dedication.name: Shadowcaster Dedication
Shadowcaster Dedication.description:
You've sacrificed a piece of your spirit, allowing the powers of shadow into your being and changing the nature of your magic. You can no longer cast spells that have the light trait; if an ability, such as a class feature or ancestry feat, would automatically grant you a light spell, such as the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} feat granting you the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zul5cBTfr7NXHBZf]{Dazzling Flash} spell, you don't gain that spell.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SE0fbgBj7atuukdv]{Cloak of Shadow} domain spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} activity. You can Refocus by meditating to siphon power from the Shadow Plane and refill your focus pool. Your domain spells from the shadowcaster archetype are of the same tradition as the spells you used to meet the shadowcaster archetype's prerequisites.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the shadowcaster archetype.

Shadowdancer Dedication.name: Shadowdancer Dedication
Shadowdancer Dedication.description:
You dedicate yourself to the shadows. Your coloring becomes gray and gloomy, your senses adjust to the darkness, and you can sneak through darkness with ease.

You gain greater @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks when you are within dim light or darkness.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the shadowdancer archetype.

Shadowy Disguise.name: Shadowy Disguise
Shadowy Disguise.description: You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} as a 1st-level occult innate spell once per day. This spell gains the shadow trait.

Shaitan Magic.name: Shaitan Magic
Shaitan Magic.description: The magic of shaitans runs through your blood. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy} once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

Shaitan Skin.name: Shaitan Skin
Shaitan Skin.description: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin} on yourself only, 3 times per day as a 4th-level arcane innate spell.

Shake it Off.name: Shake it Off
Shake it Off.description: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness. Reduce your frightened condition value by 1, and attempt a Fortitude save to recover from the sickened condition as if you had spent an action retching; you reduce your sickened condition value by 1 on a failure (but not on a critical failure), by 2 on a success, or by 3 on a critical success.

Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.name: Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout
Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.description: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rnFAHvKpcsU4BJD4]{Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to recite the Crimson Oath and meditate on its teachings. If you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your knight reclaimant focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs and your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Shameless Request.name: 完美请求 Shameless Request
Shameless Request.description: 运用自己的魅力和胆识，你了解如何在交涉中避重就轻。当你使用交涉技能来提出请求（Request）时，如果你提出的要求非常不合理，交涉技能检定的DC会比通常的类似情况低2点。并且你在提出此类要求时如果交涉技能检定大失败，它只会视为普通失败结果。注意虽然这意味着即使你的检定失败对方对你的态度也不会降低，但如果你反复提出荒诞的要求，他仍然可能因为对你的行为感到厌恶，即便他对保持良好的态度。

Shape Of The Dragon.name: Shape Of The Dragon
Shape Of The Dragon.description:
You've discovered how to transform yourself into a dragon. Once per day, you can cast 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} as an innate arcane spell, transforming into your chosen type of dragon. The spell automatically heightens to 8th level if you're 16th level and 9th level if you're 18th level.

Any time you score a critical hit with an unarmed Strike gained from dragon form, you recharge the spell's breath weapon immediately.

Shape of the Cloud Dragon.name: Shape of the Cloud Dragon
Shape of the Cloud Dragon.description:
You've discovered how to transform yourself into a cloud dragon. Once per day, you can cast 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} as an innate arcane spell, transforming into a cloud dragon. The spell automatically heightens to 8th level if you're 16th level and 9th level if you're 18th level.

On a critical hit with an unarmed Strike gained from dragon form, you recharge the spell's breath weapon immediately.

While in this form, you gain the following cloud dragon–specific abilities:

  • Cloud cloud walk (you can walk on clouds or fog);
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d12 electricity;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horn (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • Breath Weapon 30-foot cone, 6d12 electricity.

Special You can use this feat in place of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eR0sifECG27CC4do]{Shape Of The Dragon} to fulfill feat requirements.

Shapechanger's Intuition.name: 变形者直觉 Shapechanger's Intuition
Shapechanger's Intuition.description: 这辈子的经验能帮助你看穿伪装。如果一个生物正变形成变化型态，或是正乔装（Impersonate）成特定生物，当你进入他的10呎以内，无论你有没有花一个动作搜索（Seek）该生物，GM都要暗骰一次察觉，判定你是否发现该生物是变形而来。

Shaped Contaminant.name: Shaped Contaminant
Shaped Contaminant.description: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely. When you activate an inhaled poison, you can cause it to fill a 20-foot line that's 5 feet tall rather than a 10-foot cube. You gain a +3 status bonus to saving throws against inhaled poisons that you activate.

Share Eidolon Magic.name: Share Eidolon Magic
Share Eidolon Magic.description: Your eidolon shares innate spells with you. You can cast the innate spells your eidolon gained from Magical Understudy, Magical Adept, and Magical Master. You and your eidolon share the same daily uses of these innate spells.

Share Rage.name: Share Rage
Share Rage.description:
Requirements You haven't used this ability since you last Raged.

You stoke an ally's fury. While you are raging, one willing creature within 30 feet gains the effects of the Rage action, except it can still use concentrate actions.

Share Thoughts.name: Share Thoughts
Share Thoughts.description: You have an uncanny knack of communicating with other elves without speaking, though this habit that is often uncomfortable to observers. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}as an innate occult spell once per day, but you can target only other elves or half-elves.

Shared Assault.name: 协同进攻 Shared Assault
Shared Assault.description:
在荣耀的战场上，你可以向另一位盟友分享荣耀。

当你在蛮勇猛袭能力选择的盟友于给予的打击上大成功时，另一位受你 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 组曲法术影响的盟友能立刻使用一个反应动作进行一次近战打击。

因为第二位盟友并非你在蛮勇猛袭能力时选择的盟友，所以这个效果不会持续到第三位盟友身上，就算第二位盟友也在本能力给予的打击上获得大成功。

Shared Attunement.name: Shared Attunement
Shared Attunement.description: When you would gain a benefit from your terrain attunement, you can grant it to one ally within 30 feet instead of yourself. This has no effect if the terrain attunement affects your foes instead of granting you a benefit.

Shared Avoidance.name: Shared Avoidance
Shared Avoidance.description:
You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KYl1rWFOHe0e6VqJ]{Premonition Of Avoidance}, allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.svVczVV174KfJRDf]{Effect: Shared Avoidance}

Shared Clarity.name: Shared Clarity
Shared Clarity.description:
You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2h8a6pKhXTXwpJjP]{Premonition Of Clarity}, allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.CUtvkuGSxq1raBIB]{Effect: Shared Clarity}

Shared Luck (Catfolk).name: Shared Luck (Catfolk)
Shared Luck (Catfolk).description: When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} to reroll a Reflex saving throw, any creatures you choose within 10 feet who also just failed a Reflex saving throw against the same effect (such as a single spell) can also reroll their saving throws and use the better result.

Shared Luck (Halfling).name: Shared Luck (Halfling)
Shared Luck (Halfling).description: You are evidence that it's lucky to travel with a halfling. You can use Halfling Luck when an ally within 30 feet fails a skill check or a saving throw to allow the ally to reroll the triggering check instead of you rerolling your own failed check. As usual, your ally must use the new result, even if it's worse than their first roll. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.k0sXAn4PPq5nW9al]{Guiding Luck}, you can't use Guiding Luck's effect that applies to attack rolls and Perception checks to use Shared Luck to benefit an ally.

Shared Overdrive.name: 共享超载 Shared Overdrive
Shared Overdrive.description: 你在队友上做了充分的实验，能将大量的高能装置传递给他们，让你的一个盟友受益于超载Overdrive的完整效果和持续时间。在一个给定的超载Overdrive效果期间，你第一次使用超载盟友Overdrive Ally时，该效果的持续时间即为你的超载Overdrive的剩余持续时间，而非仅持续到目标的下回合结束。在同一个超载Overdrive效果期间使用的其他的超载盟友Overdrive Ally都只有通常的持续时间。

Shared Prey.name: Shared Prey
Shared Prey.description:
Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} and select only one prey, you can grant your Hunt Prey benefits and @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.mzkkj9LEWjJPBhaq]{Hunter's Edge} to an ally in addition to gaining them yourself. The ally retains these benefits until you use Hunt Prey again.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.uXCU8GgriUjuj5FV]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ltIvO9ZQlmqGD89Y]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.mNk0KxsZMFnDjUA0]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision}

Shared Replenishment.name: Shared Replenishment
Shared Replenishment.description:
When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

You can grant the temporary Hit Points from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aMef2VM4mSxl0pmy]{Replenishment of War} to an ally within 10 feet instead of gaining them yourself. You can grant these temporary Hit Points to a different ally each time, meaning you might be able to grant them to multiple creatures in a single turn.

Shared Stratagem.name: Shared Stratagem
Shared Stratagem.description:
The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself. When you hit a creature with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Strategem}, designate one ally.

The creature you hit is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to that ally on the next attack the designated ally makes against that creature before the start of your next turn.

Shared Synergy.name: Shared Synergy
Shared Synergy.description: You can grant the benefit from Dualistic Synergy to an ally within 30 feet instead of yourself, either allowing that ally to Recall Knowledge, granting that ally temporary Hit Points, or both, depending on the spell's tradition.

Sharp Fangs.name: Sharp Fangs
Sharp Fangs.description: Your teeth are formidable weapons. You gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage.

Shatter Defenses.name: Shatter Defenses
Shatter Defenses.description:
Requirements A frightened creature is in your melee reach

Your offense exploits your enemy's fear.

Make a melee Strike against a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creature. If you hit and deal damage, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until its frightened condition ends.

If the target was already flat-footed to you when you damaged it with this Strike, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of your next turn.

Shattering Blows.name: Shattering Blows
Shattering Blows.description: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease. While you are raging, your melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} ignore 5 points of an object's Hardness. If you have the devastator class feature, you instead ignore 10 points of an object's Hardness.

Shattering Shot.name: Shattering Shot
Shattering Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow and are wearing or holding an alchemical bomb.

You fling a bomb into the air and then shoot it with your gun before it falls, raining destruction down over a wide area. If necessary, you Interact to draw the bomb and regrip your weapon. You throw your bomb to the corner of a square within your firearm's first range increment and shoot it with your firearm. All creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] of the bomb take the bomb's normal damage with a basic Reflex save against your class DC. They don't take any splash or persistent damage the bomb would deal normally.

Shattering Strike (Monk).name: Shattering Strike (Monk)
Shattering Strike (Monk).description: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike. Make an unarmed Strike. It bypasses the target's resistances. If the target has Hardness, the Strike treats the Hardness as if it were half its value.

Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser).name: Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)
Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser).description:
Trigger An improvised weapon that you are wielding becomes broken as a result of a critical success on an Improvised Pummel.

The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional [[/r {3d6}[piercing]]]{3d6 piercing damage} to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel. This extra damage you apply on the critical hit doesn't double from the critical hit, as normal.

Shed Tail.name: Shed Tail
Shed Tail.description:
Requirements You have a fully grown tail.

Trigger You become grabbed.

You can shed your tail to escape. You cease being grabbed, then Stride without triggering any reactions from the creature that grabbed you. It takes 1 week for your tail to fully grow back. Until it does, you can't use your tail unarmed attack, and you take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

Sheltering Cave.name: Sheltering Cave
Sheltering Cave.description:
Requirements You're standing on ground composed of earth, stone, or a similar material.

You spend 10 minutes communing with spirits of earth and stone, requesting shelter. At the end of this time, the earth rises and opens, forming a small cave or earthen mound 20 feet in diameter and 10 feet high. This cave has the structure trait and the same restrictions as structures created by magic items. The cave has a single entrance and provides shelter from the elements.

The cave remains for 12 hours or until you spend 10 minutes coaxing the earth to close.

Sheltering Slab.name: Sheltering Slab
Sheltering Slab.description:
The stone around you is your ally, and you have learned to use it to shore up your weaknesses.

As long as you remain on the ground and are adjacent to a vertical stone wall that rises to your height or taller, you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against attacks as a result of being flanked. This works even if you are at the outside corner of the wall.

Shield Block.name: 盾牌格挡 Shield Block
Shield Block.description:
触发 你正处于举盾状态，并因为一次物理攻击而承受伤害

你快速调整盾牌的角度，抵御一次猛烈的直击。你的盾牌会为你减免相当于它的硬度（Hardness）的伤害，但你和你的盾牌都必须承受相当于减免数值扣去以后的剩余伤害——这可能会导致你的盾牌破损或是被摧毁。

Shield Of Faith.name: Shield Of Faith
Shield Of Faith.description: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses. When you spend a Focus Point to cast a domain spell, you gain a +1 status bonus to your AC until the start of your next turn.

Shield Paragon.name: 坚盾典范 Shield Paragon
Shield Paragon.description: 你的盾牌成为神圣守护的容器。当你持用你所选择的盾牌时，它总是被视作已举起，哪怕你没有使用举起盾牌（Raise a Shield）动作。你所选的盾牌的HP和BT变为两倍，而不是增加原本的一半。如果盾牌将要被摧毁，作为代替，它会消失并出现在在你所侍奉的神祇的领地之中，而你的神圣盟友会在那里修复它。在你下次进行日常准备期间，这面盾牌会完好无损地回到你的手中。

Shield Salvation.name: Shield Salvation
Shield Salvation.description:
You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}, the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead.

Its construction is weakened until you take the time to repair it, preventing you from using Shield Salvation to save the same shield until your next preparations.

Shield Warden (Champion).name: 坚盾守望者(神卫) Shield Warden (Champion)
Shield Warden (Champion).description: 你用你的盾牌保护自身和盟友。当你持有一面已经举起的盾牌时，你能够在邻接你的盟友即将承受一次攻击时使用盾牌格挡反应动作。如果你这样做，这面盾牌会阻挡即将对盟友造成的伤害而不是阻挡即将对你造成的伤害，除此之外如同正常的盾牌格挡规则一般运作。

Shield Warden (Fighter).name: Shield Warden (Fighter)
Shield Warden (Fighter).description: You use your shield to protect your allies as well as yourself. When you have a shield raised, you can use your Shield Block reaction when an attack is made against an ally adjacent to you. If you do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of preventing you from taking damage, following the normal rules for Shield Block.

Shield of Grace.name: 恩典之盾 Shield of Grace
Shield of Grace.description: 你以身躯和盾牌保护你的盟友。当你使用盾牌格挡反应动作阻挡一名盟友受到的伤害时，你能够将盾牌格挡之后剩余的伤害在你自己和盟友之间均分。

Shield of Reckoning.name: 清算之盾 Shield of Reckoning
Shield of Reckoning.description:
触发 一名敌人针对你盟友的攻击同时满足你的盾牌格挡反应动作和神卫反应的触发条件。

当你运用盾牌为盟友挡下攻击时，你还能呼唤你的力量进一步保护盟友。你使用盾牌格挡反应动作去为一名盟友阻挡伤害，同时也启动你的神卫反应来对抗这名攻击你盟友的敌人。

Shielded Stride.name: Shielded Stride
Shielded Stride.description: When your shield is up, your enemies' blows can't touch you. When you have your shield raised, you can Stride to move half your Speed without triggering reactions that are triggered by your movement (such as Attacks of Opportunity). You can use Shielded Stride while Flying or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Shielded Tome.name: 书盾 Shielded Tome
Shielded Tome.description:
在你每日准备时，你可以通过魔法将一面盾牌融入到你心爱的书中，它的外型看起来是一片精心设计的书签。当两者融合时，书本共享盾牌的硬度（Hardness）、生命值（HP）和破损阈值（Broken Threshold），并且它可被用于 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡} 反应如果你具备的话，使用 "你正处于举书状态" 替代通常的需求。

你可以用一个具有专注（concentrate）特征的“书本外形风格”单动作（single action），来切换融合后的物品形态从一本书到一面盾牌。当物品处于书本形态，你可以读书和举起书卷（Raise a Tome），并且当它处于盾牌形态，你可以举起盾牌（Raise a Shield），激活它时，将获得普通盾牌具有的任何其他增益或者效应（例如 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.OqDAx4HJ39ojVtvg]{护法盾 Spellguard Shield's} 对抗法术的豁免检定加值）。

这种融合形态持续到你下次每日准备。

Shift Spell.name: Shift Spell
Shift Spell.description:
Access member of the Magaambya

Requirements You have an active spell that affects an area and you are within the spell's range.

You move the spell's area to a new location within 120 feet. The spell's remaining duration is reduced by half. The spell no longer affects its previous area.

Shifting Faces.name: 千面万相 Shifting Faces
Shifting Faces.description:
频率 每天一次

你有许多面容可以变换，哪怕不是你的脸。当你化形成无尾型态，你获得三环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{幻象伪装 Illusory Disguise} 的效果，维持一小时或持续到你变回来，不过这是变化效果，而非幻术效果。

Shifting Terrain.name: Shifting Terrain
Shifting Terrain.description:
Requirements Your terrain attunement matches the terrain you're in and you're in Rough Terrain Stance.

You slam your fist into the ground or twirl your arms about to cause the terrain around you to shift and ripple, potentially throwing others off balance. Each creature within your area of difficult terrain from Rough Terrain Stance must attempt a Reflex saving throw against your spell DC with the following effects.

After you use this action, you can't use it again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is clumsy 2 for 1 round and falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Shining Arms.name: Shining Arms
Shining Arms.description: When you cast light, you can modify its target to be 1 melee weapon, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally, and modify its duration to be 1 minute. If you do, add the following to its effects: When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the Spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. After you use this reaction, you can't use this modification again for 10 minutes.

Shining Oath (Liberator).name: 光辉誓约(解放者) Shining Oath (Liberator)
Shining Oath (Liberator).description:
你立下誓约，要令亡灵安息。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要你有合理的机会取得成功，你就必须终结你所遭遇到的不死存在；如果在极其罕见的情况下你遇到了一位善良的不死生物，你可以尝试找到更为和平的方式让它从不死状态中解脱，而不是通过战斗将其摧毁，例如帮助它完成未了的心愿并寻获安宁。"

如果你使用由不死生物触发的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步 Liberating Step}，你的盟友会在自由快步所给予的检定上获得+4的环境加值，这名盟友在之后还可以进行两次快步（Step）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ZnKnOPPq3cG54PlG]{效果：自由快步 (vs. 不死生物)}

你不会将不死生物视作正当的统治者，哪怕你正身处不死生物统治的国家。

Shining Oath (Paladin).name: 光辉誓约(圣武士) Shining Oath (Paladin)
Shining Oath (Paladin).description:
