Specialty Crafting (Woodworking).description:
你专攻于制作特定的一类物品。从下表中选择一个专攻方向，你在用来制作木制品的手艺技能检定上获得+1环境加值。当你在手艺技能上达大师级熟练度时，这个加值提升到+2。

范例工艺造物 制作木质物品和建造建筑物

如果不能确定某一件物品的制作是否属于本专长影响的范围，则GM具有最终裁判权。在某些情况下，本专长只会部分地对某些物品的制作提供帮助。举例来说，如果你的专攻方向是“木工”，那么如果你要制作一把钉头锤的话，GM只会允许你获得本专长提供的加值的一半，因为制作这样的一件物品会同时需要锻造和木工加工方式。

Speedy Rituals.name: Speedy Rituals
Speedy Rituals.description: You can perform rituals in only a fraction of the usual time. If a ritual has a casting time measured in days, you can cast it in an equal number of hours. If this results in a ritual longer than 8 hours, you split the ritual between multiple days, as normal for a ritual.

Spell Combination.name: 法术融合 Spell Combination
Spell Combination.description:
妳能将法术合并，在一次施法中就产生多重效果。妳在每个能施放环级中一个法术位(除了1环和2环)变成了融合法术位(戏法不行)。在妳准备法术时，妳可以用两个法术的合并来填充融合法术位。合并各法术需比该融合法术位至少低2环，并且两个法术都必须只针对一个生物或物体，或选择只针对一个生物或物体。融合的法术也必须有相同确认效果的方式，例如两个法术都需要远程法术攻击骰、需要相同的豁免类型检定，或自动影响目标。

在妳施放一个融合法术时，他只会影响一个目标，即便组成的法术正常来说会影响更多目标。如果组成的法术有更进一步的限制(例如只针对活物)，那所有限制都要用上。融合的法术会使用组成法术中比较短的范围。在处理融合法术上视其为一个法术，但使用两个组成法术的效果。举个例子，如果法术的目标在对抗融合法术的豁免为成功，那就使用组成法术在豁免为成功的结果；而如果大失败，那就使用两个组成法术在大失败上的结果。

Spell Devourer.name: Spell Devourer
Spell Devourer.description: You don't just resist magic; you devour it. Whenever you succeed at a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to double the spell's level, or equal to the level if the magical effect isn't a spell. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your next turn.

Spell Mastery.name: 法术掌握 Spell Mastery
Spell Mastery.description:
你对某些法术了如指掌，哪怕没有准备也可以施放。

任选4个9环(含)以下且你能使用(access to)的法术，每个法术其环级都不相同。在你进行日常准备时这些法术会自动准备好，并有它们自己的法术位。你可以花1周的休整期重训你掌握的法术。

Spell Parry.name: 法术格挡 Spell Parry
Spell Parry.description:
需求 你有至少一只手是空闲的（free）。

你灌注魔法力量到你的躯体或武器（armament）中以同时格挡物理或魔法的袭击。

你做好防守姿势，只要你一直满足需求（requirements）直到下个回合开始，AC和对抗以你为目标的法术豁免骰获得+1环境加值。

Spell Penetration.name: 法术穿透 Spell Penetration
Spell Penetration.description: 你潜心研究各种方法去克服像是龙、某些超凡脱俗的存在还有其他强大生物的魔法抗性。任何在对抗默法的豁免检定上有状态加值的生物，在对抗你的法术上，该加值减1。

Spell Relay.name: Spell Relay
Spell Relay.description:
Trigger An ally @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casts a Spell} and you are within that spell's range.

You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range. Your ally can use you as the point of origin for their spell, calculating range and cover from your space instead of their own.

Spell Runes.name: Spell Runes
Spell Runes.description: The magical runes on your body grant you several magical abilities. Choose a 1st-level arcane spell. You gain a spell rune on your body corresponding to the chosen spell, which you can cast once per day as an innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 2nd-level arcane spell, and at 8th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 3rd-level arcane spell.

Spell Shroud.name: Spell Shroud
Spell Shroud.description:
Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud. If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that targets you, you surround yourself in a 15-foot emanation of dense magical mist that lasts until the start of your next turn.

All creatures within the cloud become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the cloud are concealed to creatures within it.

Spell Swipe.name: 法术横扫 Spell Swipe
Spell Swipe.description:
需求 你的法术打击已充能

你进行一次弧线（arc）攻击并且对每个你命中的目标释放法术。进行一次法术打击，但是分别骰两次打击（Strike）来攻击两个生物，每一个都必须在你的近战攻击触及范围内并且彼此相邻（adjacent）。如果你的法术可以影响两个或更多目标，则你的法术影响任意数量被你命中的敌人，而不只是第一个目标；其他情况，则选择一个法术生效的目标。一次法术横扫在计算多重攻击减值时被计算为两次攻击，但是你不会应用这一减值直到你完成两次打击为止。

如果你使用一个具有横扫（sweep）特征的武器，其环境加值同时应用到两个目标。你只能在近战打击（melee Strikes）时使用这一动作，即使你拥有星火流矢融汇研究（starlit span hybrid study）或类似能力也不行。

如果你根据扩展法术打击（Expansive Spellstrike）使用一个区域法术进行法术打击时，按照扩展法术打击的描述应用区域，选择你打击的生物之一来决定区域以及法术是否因为打击大失败而失效。如果你根据扩展法术打击使用一个指向性法术（targeted spell）进行法术打击时，如果两次打击都大失败则法术完全失效。

Spell Tinker.name: 法术弥补 Spell Tinker
Spell Tinker.description:
妳学到如何去更改本该在自己施放法术即已做出的决定。在妳施放了一个唯有妳能在数个效果中做出选择的法术(例如抵抗能量、法术免疫或提供多种型态的变形法术)，妳能改变妳在施放法术时做出的选择(例如妳可以在抵抗能量上选择不同的伤害类型)。但是，这种弥补行为会弱化法术的完整性，它剩余的持续时间会减半。

如果该法术的效益已经被使用，或是如果第一次的选择会在转换之后依旧持续，那妳就不能使用此专长(例如如果其中一个选择是创造消耗品，而消耗品已经被妳已经用了，或是妳已经被治疗了)，如果专长能创造出比基础法术还要强的效果，那也不行。GM对法术弥补到底能怎么用有最终裁决。

Spell Trickster Dedication.name: Spell Trickster Dedication
Spell Trickster Dedication.description:
Your experience with magic and its traditions lets you specialize in the casting of certain spells, customizing familiar spells to create novel effects. Whenever you gain a feat from this archetype, you either learn to modify the effects of a single spell, or you change one of the modifications from a previous feat. Each time you Cast the Spell corresponding to the feat you chose, you decide whether to cast its normal or modified version. You can only apply one modification to a spell at a time, even if you know more than one modification for that spell. Besides modifications mentioned in the feat, the spell functions as normal.

Choose up to two 4th-level spell trickster archetype feats for which you meet the spell-casting prerequisite. You gain those feats, ignoring their level prerequisite.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the spell trickster archetype. The two feats you gain from taking the dedication don't count toward this total.

Spell-Repelling Form.name: Spell-Repelling Form
Spell-Repelling Form.description: Your eidolon evolves to protect itself from the danger posed by spells. It gains a +1 status bonus to all saving throws against magic.

Spellbook Prodigy.name: 手不释卷 Spellbook Prodigy
Spellbook Prodigy.description:
你特别熟悉把法术加到你的法术书上。你 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{学习法术 Learn a Spell} 的时间是正常的一半。

同时，当你在学习法术检定上骰出大失败，你可以视为失败。如果你骰出失败，那你可以在一星期后重试。

Spellmaster Dedication.name: Spellmaster Dedication
Spellmaster Dedication.description:
As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when you Identify Magic with a skill in which you are trained or better. If you have the Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer feat, you can change the cantrip you chose for that feat each day during your daily preparations.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Spellmaster archetype.

Spellmaster's Resilience.name: Spellmaster's Resilience
Spellmaster's Resilience.description: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it. Choose a magical tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and effects with that tradition's trait and resistance 5 to all damage from spells and effects with that tradition's trait. The effect must have actually been cast or created with that tradition, rather than simply being on that tradition's spell list.

Spellmaster's Tenacity.name: Spellmaster's Tenacity
Spellmaster's Tenacity.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically fail at a saving throw against a foe's spell, and that spell was cast or created with the tradition of magic you selected with the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dWkf6LhYBfBkeyOA]{Spellmaster's Resilience} feat.

You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way. You fail your saving throw instead of critically failing. For 1 minute, increase the circumstance bonus to saving throws from the Spellmaster's Resilience feat to +2, and increase the resistance to damage it grants to 10.

Spellmaster's Ward.name: Spellmaster's Ward
Spellmaster's Ward.description: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VrhCpCIQB8PFax77]{Spellmaster's Ward} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Spellshot Dedication.name: Spellshot Dedication
Spellshot Dedication.description:
You've steeped yourself in magic and gunplay to the extent that you can conjure bullets from thin air, using a rudimentary knowledge of arcane theory to create a temporary piece of ammunition. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KC6o1cvbr45xnMei]{Conjure Bullet} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat other than Beast Gunner Dedication until you've gained two other feats from the spellshot or beast gunner archetypes.

Spellstriker.name: Spellstriker
Spellstriker.description: You gain the magus's @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Spellstrike} activity. You can recharge it only as an activity that takes 1 minute. This restriction applies even if you gain another ability that recharges Spellstrike.

Spelunker.name: Spelunker
Spelunker.description: Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground. If you roll a success on an Survival check to Sense Direction or an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead. You're not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} when you attempt to Climb.

Spew Tentacles.name: Spew Tentacles
Spew Tentacles.description: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2w4OpAGihn1JSHFD]{Black Tentacles} once per day as an innate occult spell, though when you do so, you spew them from your mouth out to the appropriate range, where they take root and begin Grappling creatures as usual. The tentacles recognize you as a part of them and don't attempt to Grapple you, even if you are in the area.

Spine Stabber.name: Spine Stabber
Spine Stabber.description: The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy. You gain a quills unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your quills are in the knife weapon group and have the finesse and unarmed traits.

Spinebreaker.name: Spinebreaker
Spinebreaker.description:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points. Attempt an Athletics check to Grapple the creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following effects instead of the usual effects.

Critical Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} until the end of its next turn and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.

Success The target is clumsy 1 until the end of its next turn.

Spirit Sheath.name: 灵魂护套 Spirit Sheath
Spirit Sheath.description:
你凭借魔法为自己的武器构建一件异次元（extradimensional）护套，从而让你可以从随身衣物上抽取武器，典型的通过一个口袋、袖子或者缝线处抽出。这个护套难以被注意到，你用它 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{隐藏物件}的潜行（Stealth）技能检定获得+2的环境加值。一个灵魂护套同时只能保管一件武器，并且武器必须为1负载（Bulk）或更轻。

在法术打击（Spellstrike）时，你可以在你施法法术（Cast a Spell）前用一个交互（Interact）抽取武器。你可以用一个交互（Interact）动作从灵魂护套中抽取或放回武器，同时任何人也能持有或穿上这件具有护套的衣物。一个 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法} 法术或相似效应可被用于对抗灵魂护套让武器脱离。这次反制（counteract）检定对抗你的法术DC并且使用护套的反制等级1。如果你 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识}，武器也会脱离护套。

Spirit Soother.name: Spirit Soother
Spirit Soother.description: You are attuned to the minute sounds and sensations of restless spirits. Even if you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching}, you can attempt a check to find haunts that normally require you to be Searching. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the haunt.

Spirit Spells.name: Spirit Spells
Spirit Spells.description: Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting. Choose a 1st-level occult spell. You can Cast this Spell as an innate occult spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level occult spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level occult spell. Each of these spells must have the divination, enchantment, or necromancy trait. You can cast each of these spells once per day

Spirit Strikes.name: Spirit Strikes
Spirit Strikes.description:
Your connection to the Boneyard empowers you to bring death to all forms of life and unlife, exploiting their weaknesses.

All your weapon and unarmed Strikes are magical and deal [[/r {1}[negative]]]{1 additional negative damage} to living creatures and [[/r {1}[positive]]]{1 additional positive damage} to undead.

Spirit's Wrath.name: Spirit's Wrath
Spirit's Wrath.description: You call forth an ephemeral apparition, typically the ghost of an ancestor or a nature spirit, which takes the form of a wisp. The spirit wisp makes a melee wisp rush unarmed attack against an enemy within 120 feet of you. The wisp's attack modifier is equal to your proficiency bonus for martial weapons plus your Strength modifier plus a +2 item bonus, and it applies the same circumstance and status bonuses and penalties that you have. On a hit, the wisp deals damage equal to 4d8 plus your Constitution modifier. The damage is your choice of negative or positive damage; don't apply your Rage damage or your weapon specialization damage, but circumstance and status bonuses and penalties that would also affect the wisp's damage apply. If your wisp's Strike is a critical hit, the target becomes frightened 1. This attack uses and counts toward your multiple attack penalty as if you were the one attacking.

Spirits' Interference.name: Spirits' Interference
Spirits' Interference.description: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks. Until your rage ends, anyone making a ranged attack against you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attack misses with no effect.

Spiritual Disruption.name: Spiritual Disruption
Spiritual Disruption.description: You channel disruptive power that severs a foe's spiritual connection to their heretical magic. Make a melee Strike. If the attack hits, any time the target attempts to cast a divine or occult spell, the spell is disrupted unless they succeed at a DC 5 flat check (DC 7 on a critical hit); if the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}, it must attempt the harder of the two flat checks (but not both). This effect lasts for 1 minute.

Spiritual Explorer.name: Spiritual Explorer
Spiritual Explorer.description: You're familiar with the danger that lingering spirits can pose to an unwary adventurer, and you're particularly attuned to their presence. Even if you aren't Searching in exploration mode, you can attempt a check to find haunts that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find a particular haunt.

Spiritual Guides.name: Spiritual Guides
Spiritual Guides.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail, but don't critically fail, a Perception check or a skill check.

Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging. Sometimes they're even helpful. You can heed the spirits' guidance to reroll the triggering check, using the second result even if it's worse.

Spiritual Sense.name: Spiritual Sense
Spiritual Sense.description:
You have a vague connection to the Ethereal Plane that enables you to notice spirits. While you're exploring but not @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching}, the GM rolls a secret check for you to find haunts that usually require Searching, as well as spirits, creatures on the Ethereal Plane, and beings made entirely of spiritual essence such as celestials, fiends, and monitors.

You can also potentially notice ethereal creatures and spirits inside solid objects, provided they are within 30 feet of you. This applies while Searching, while @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeking}, and on the automatic secret check you gain while exploring even if you aren't Searching. You can still notice spirits only on a successful check, and you can't see them if they're more than 5 feet inside an object.

When you notice a creature with your Spiritual Sense, you also learn its location, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you if it had been @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

Spiteful Rake.name: Spiteful Rake
Spiteful Rake.description:
Requirements You have both hands free.

Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes. You make a claw Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. On a critical hit, the target is instead @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and dazzled until restored to maximum hit points.

Splendid Companion.name: Splendid Companion
Splendid Companion.description: Your animal companion continues to develop. It becomes a nimble or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining abilities determined by its type. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to master instead of Athletics or Acrobatics.

Splinter Faith.name: Splinter Faith
Splinter Faith.description:
Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical. When you select this feat, you should detail the fundamental tenets of your splinter faith, though it shouldn't affect the deity's edicts or anathema. Choose four domains. These domains must be chosen from among your deity's domains, your deity's alternate domains, and up to one domain that isn't on either list and isn't anathematic to your deity. Any domain spell you cast from a domain that isn't on either of your deity's lists is always heightened to 1 level lower than usual for a focus spell. For the purpose of abilities that depend on your deity's domains, the four domains you chose are your deity's domains, and any of your deity's domains you didn't choose are now among your deity's alternate domains.

Special Unless you take this feat at 1st level, changing the way you relate to your deity requires retraining, as described in the Changing Faith section below. If you take this feat and previously benefited from any effect that requires a domain your splinter faith doesn't include, such as a domain spell from Domain Initiate, you lose that effect.

Split Hex.name: Split Hex
Split Hex.description: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well. If the next action you use is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} to cast a harmful hex with a single target, reduce its level by 2 (making it 2 levels lower than the maximum spell level you can cast). If you do, you can select a second target for that hex to affect.

Split Shot.name: Split Shot
Split Shot.description:
You fragment a ranged spell into a pair of smaller shots. If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} without a duration that requires an attack roll against a single target and has no effect beyond dealing damage, you roll a single attack roll and compare the result to the AC of two targets within the spell's range. The spell deals only half its usual damage to each target.

This counts as one attack for your multiple attack penalty.

Split Slot.name: 法术位分裂 Split Slot
Split Slot.description:
你能在一个法术位上准备两个法术，让你在施法时更加灵活。你在每日准备法术时，你可以选择一个环级至少比你能施展的最高环还低一环的法术位，并在那个法术位准备两个法术。

当你从这法术位 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell} 时，要选择施放哪个发束。一旦选了，没使用的法术会散逸，好似你没根本没准备过一样，举个例子，你不能用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{汲取连结物品 Drain Bonded Item}把散逸的法术唤回。

Spore Cloud.name: Spore Cloud
Spore Cloud.description:
Frequency once per hour

You unleash a cloud of pollen or similar spores. All creatures in a 10-foot emanation around you must attempt a Fortitude save using your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher) with the following results. Plants and fungi are immune to this effect.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is dazzled and can see only 10 feet away for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Spot Translate.name: 精准口译 Spot Translate
Spot Translate.description:
触发 与你相距60尺范围内的其他生物使用1个语言效果（linguistic effect），且说的是你所能够理解的语言

你口译该生物说出的词句，用你理解的另一种不同语言重复他们说出的信息。若触发效果的目标说的是母语（original language）或者你所翻译的语言，则他们也会受到影响。

Spring Attack.name: Spring Attack
Spring Attack.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to an enemy

Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another. Stride up to your Speed, but you must end that movement within melee reach of a different enemy. At the end of your movement, make a melee Strike against an enemy now within reach. You can use Spring Attack while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Spring from the Shadows.name: Spring from the Shadows
Spring from the Shadows.description: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it. You Stride up to your Speed, but you must end your movement next to an enemy you're hidden from or undetected by. You then Strike that enemy; you remain hidden from or undetected by that creature until after you Strike. You can use Spring from the Shadows while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Springing Leaper.name: Springing Leaper
Springing Leaper.description: Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} as a 2-action activity to double the distance you can Leap vertically, or Leap as a 3-action activity to triple the distance you can Leap vertically. You don't automatically fail @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} for jumping in a different direction than your Stride.

Sprite's Spark (Draxie).name: Sprite's Spark (Draxie)
Sprite's Spark (Draxie).description:
You can fling a portion of your magic at foes. You gain a ranged unarmed attack in the sling weapon group with a maximum range of 20 feet that deals [[/r 1d4]] damage. (No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) The damage type and name of the unarmed attack depends on your heritage, described below; most sprite heritages not presented in this book also use luminous spark. Like other unarmed attacks, you can improve this attack with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows}.

Draxie euphoric spark (mental)

Firefly Sprite luminous spark (fire)

Grig dissonant note (sonic)

Melixie sting shot (poison)

Nyktera ultrasonic pulse (sonic)

Pixie pixie dust (mental)

Sprite's Spark (Firefly Sprite).name: Sprite's Spark (Firefly Sprite)
Sprite's Spark (Firefly Sprite).description:
You can fling a portion of your magic at foes. You gain a ranged unarmed attack in the sling weapon group with a maximum range of 20 feet that deals [[/r 1d4]] damage. (No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) The damage type and name of the unarmed attack depends on your heritage, described below; most sprite heritages not presented in this book also use luminous spark. Like other unarmed attacks, you can improve this attack with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows}.

Draxie euphoric spark (mental)

Firefly Sprite luminous spark (fire)

Grig dissonant note (sonic)

Melixie sting shot (poison)

Nyktera ultrasonic pulse (sonic)

Pixie pixie dust (mental)

Sprite's Spark (Grig).description:

(No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) (No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) (No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) The damage type and name of the unarmed attack depends on your heritage, described below; most sprite heritages not presented in this book also use luminous spark. Sprite's Spark (Pixie).name: Sprite's Spark (Pixie)
Sprite's Spark (Pixie).description:
You can fling a portion of your magic at foes. You gain a ranged unarmed attack in the sling weapon group with a maximum range of 20 feet that deals [[/r 1d4]] damage. (No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) The damage type and name of the unarmed attack depends on your heritage, described below; most sprite heritages not presented in this book also use luminous spark. Like other unarmed attacks, you can improve this attack with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows}.

Draxie euphoric spark (mental)

Firefly Sprite luminous spark (fire)

Grig dissonant note (sonic)

Melixie sting shot (poison)

Nyktera ultrasonic pulse (sonic)

Pixie pixie dust (mental)

Spy's Countermeasures.name: Spy's Countermeasures
Spy's Countermeasures.description: You've learned how to analyze and fake your responses to the most common magic used against spies. Whenever you succeed at your save against a divination or mental effect, you can Identify Magic to identify the spell as a free action triggered when you succeed, even if you didn't notice the spell being cast. If you successfully identify a divination effect targeting you and the spell would normally fail or have no effect, you can create a substitute result, causing the spell's caster to think the spell succeeded, with a result of your choice. If you successfully identify a mental effect targeting you and the spell would normally fail or have no effect, you can make it appear as if you were affected and attempt to play along with the spell; if the spell normally establishes a mental link, it functions normally but you can disregard any commands you receive through the link.

Spyglass Modification.name: Spyglass Modification
Spyglass Modification.description: Your enhanced visual gear includes a regulating scope and reflectors, combined in an ingenuous setup that allows you to see around corners within the area of your overwatch field. This permits your overwatch field to extend around a single corner or turn and allows you to see around that corner as well. This ability doesn't let you see through walls or other barriers. You can't use it to see around a second or further corner, and it doesn't allow you to make ranged attacks or perform other actions that require line of effect with your target.

Squad Tactics.name: Squad Tactics
Squad Tactics.description: You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your allies, that enemy is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against you.

Squawk!.name: Squawk!
Squawk!.description:
Trigger You critically fail a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against a creature that doesn't have the tengu trait.

You let out an awkward squawk, ruffle your feathers, or fake some other birdlike tic to cover up a social misstep or faux pas. You get a failure on the triggering check, rather than a critical failure. All creatures that witnessed you Squawk are temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Squirm Free.name: Squirm Free
Squirm Free.description:
Trigger A creature grabs, immobilizes, or restrains you.

You're used to slipping out of a bigger creature's grasp or escaping a child's overly enthusiastic hug. You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Stab and Blast.name: Stab and Blast
Stab and Blast.description:
Requirements You're wielding a firearm with an attached bayonet or reinforced stock, a fire lance, or a combination weapon.

You slice or smash your opponent with the melee portion of your weapon before pulling the trigger at point-blank range. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon. If the Strike is successful, you can immediately make a ranged Strike against the same target with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll. This counts as two attacks toward your multiple attack penalty, but you don't apply the multiple attack penalty until after making both attacks.

Staff Acrobat Dedication.name: Staff Acrobat Dedication
Staff Acrobat Dedication.description:
When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} while wielding your staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to any Athletics check required and add 5 feet to the distance you can Leap vertically and horizontally. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} even if you don't have a free hand, provided you are wielding your staff. Finally, when you roll a success on a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} while wielding your staff, you get a critical success instead.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the staff acrobat archetype.

Staff Sweep.name: Staff Sweep
Staff Sweep.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}

Requirements You are wielding your staff.

You sweep your foes away with your staff. Roll an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and compare the result to the appropriate DCs of up to two foes, each of whom must be within your reach and no more than 5 feet apart.

Stage Fighting.name: Stage Fighting
Stage Fighting.description: You pull punches to give a better show. You don't take the usual -2 circumstance penalty when making a nonlethal attack with a weapon or unarmed attack that doesn't have the nonlethal trait.

Stance Savant (Fighter).name: Stance Savant (Fighter)
Stance Savant (Fighter).description:
Trigger You roll initiative

When there's imminent danger, you drop into a stance with a mere thought. Use an action that has the stance trait.

Stance Savant (Monk).name: Stance Savant (Monk)
Stance Savant (Monk).description:
Trigger You roll initiative

You enter a stance without a thought. Use an action that has the stance trait.

Stand Still.name: Stand Still
Stand Still.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using

You strike out when your foe tries to flee. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a move action, you disrupt that action.

Standby Spell.name: 备用法术 Standby Spell
Standby Spell.description: 有一种法术是你最爱用的，并且你经过足够的练习，因此不再需要通过准备就能将其施放。选择在你法术书中一个可以与法术打击一起使用的法术，并且该法术的等级不高于你拥有的最高等级的魔战士法术位。你可以通过消耗足够等级的法术位来施放所选法术而无需提前准备。 当你添加新法术到你的法术书时，或者通过研读法术书1小时，则你可以改变你最爱用的法术。

Star Orb.name: 星辰玉 Star Orb
Star Orb.description: 你的魔法凝结成一颗圆石。你获得一个魔宠，只不过它是一颗星辰玉：体型为超小型，负载为为1L。这个魔宠没有速度，必须选择一个有速度（Speed）的魔宠能力才能移动，它在当天会按照选取的速度，以适合的方式移动，除此之外的数据都和一般魔宠相同；如果它是一颗不会动的石头，就不能选择任何需要一动的魔宠或主人能力。此外，它永远具备激发潜能（Innate Surge）这个主人能力。

Starlit Eyes.name: 洞若观火 Starlit Eyes
Starlit Eyes.description:
星火照亮你的视野，强化了你的察觉范围。

当你处于奥术奔涌架式并进行一次远程打击时，你降低因为目标生物对于你的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽} 或者 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿} 状态带来的纯骰检定DC。 对抗隐蔽的生物的DC从5降低到 3 ，且对抗藏匿生物的DC从11降低到9 。

当你释放流星击（shooting star）且以一个藏匿生物为目标时，你对目标藏匿生物的远程打击无需进行纯骰检定。

Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp).name: Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp)
Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp).description: You are trained in Intimidation (or another skill of your choice, if you were already trained in Intimidation) and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat as a bonus feat.

Startling Appearance (Vigilante).name: Startling Appearance (Vigilante)
Startling Appearance (Vigilante).description:
Requirements You are completely unnoticed by the target

creature.

You can startle foes who are unaware of your presence. Make a Strike against your target. That creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against this Strike, as normal. If your Strike hits, the target remains flat-footed for the rest of your turn and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (frightened 2 on a critical hit).

Stasian Smash.name: Stasian Smash
Stasian Smash.description: You've modified your dynamo with Stasian coils, allowing you to make a powerful attack that crackles with electricity. Make a dynamo Strike. On a success, the Strike deals an additional [[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12 electricity damage} to the target, as well as [[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4 electricity damage} to up to two other foes within 10 feet as sparks leap across the gaps. If you critically fail your dynamo Strike, you take [[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12 electricity damage}. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. At 18th level, the additional electricity damage to the target increases to 2d12, and the additional electricity damage to the other foes increases to [[/r 2d4]]{2d4}. Reduce the operational time of your sterling dynamo by 1 hour.

Stave off Catastrophe.name: Stave off Catastrophe
Stave off Catastrophe.description: You fully protect your allies from the worst blows. When you use the Shoulder Catastrophe reaction, you can choose to take the full critical damage and effects from the attack, including effects that apply on a critical hit, and have your ally take no damage and avoid the attack's effects.

Stay Down!.name: Stay Down!
Stay Down!.description:
Trigger A @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} foe within your reach @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stands}.

You have ways of keeping your foes down. Attempt an Athletics check against the triggering foe's Fortitude DC. On a success, they don't stand up and remain prone. On a critical success, they can't Stand until their next turn.

Steadfast Ally.name: Steadfast Ally
Steadfast Ally.description: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support. You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} reaction to grant a bonus to another creature's Will saving throw even when you haven't prepared to help.

Steady Balance.name: 四平八稳 Steady Balance
Steady Balance.description: 即使在恶劣的环境中你也可以轻易保持平衡的姿势。每当你在一次保持平衡（Balance）技能动作的检定上获得了成功结果，你会视为获得了大成功结果。你不会因为在狭窄的平面或是高低不平的位置上尝试保持平衡而陷入措手不及。最后，因为你精妙的平衡能力，你可以使用特技技能检定而非反射豁免检定来在坠落时尝试抓住边缘动作。

Steady On Stone.name: Steady On Stone
Steady On Stone.description: Your connection to the earth makes natural uneven surfaces less of a hindrance for you. You can ignore difficult terrain caused by rubble and uneven ground made of stone and earth. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to Balance on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of stone and earth, you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.

Steady Spellcasting.name: 稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: 你不会轻易失去法术。如果一个反应动作会打断你的施法动作，尝试一次DC15纯骰检定。如果成功，你的动作并不会被打断。

Steady Spellcasting (Magus).name: 镇定施法 Steady Spellcasting (魔战士)
Steady Spellcasting (Magus).description:
自信就是你的武器，你在施放法术时不会轻易失去专注。

如果有反应动作会打断你的施法动作，进行一次 DC 15的纯骰检定。如果成功，你的动作就不会被打断。

Steadying Stone.name: Steadying Stone
Steadying Stone.description:
The earth has taught you how to remain unyielding and firm. If you roll a success on an Acrobatics check made to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} on uneven ground composed of earth or rock, you get a critical success instead.

As long as you remain on the ground, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DC against attempts to Shove or Trip you. This bonus also applies to saving throws against spells or effects that would attempt to knock you prone. If you're a rock dwarf, this bonus increases to +3.

Steal Essence.name: Steal Essence
Steal Essence.description:
Requirements A magic item is within your reach.

Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item. The DC to steal the properties of a magic item is equal to the DC for the item's level or the normal DC to Steal the item, whichever is higher. The targeted item then becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours. If the object was on a creature, that creature is also temporarily immune (which prevents you from attempting to Steal the Essence of another object on it).

If you successfully steal the properties of an item, it loses its magical properties for 24 hours and you can move those properties to a non-magical object of the same general kind (such as moving a hat's properties to another piece of headgear or moving a weapon's properties to another weapon) for the same length of time. If the moved properties are counteracted, they return immediately to the original item. You automatically fail to Steal the Essence of an artifact, cursed item, or similar item.

Steal Spell.name: Steal Spell
Steal Spell.description:
When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IZbjUaZI5zHTd1Vp]{Legendary Thief} to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe. The spell is randomly selected from the highest-level spells the foe knows that have a target or area, to a maximum of 8th-level spells; the target loses the appropriate spell slot as if they had cast it themself.

You can Cast the Spell once within the next [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, after which the fleeting magic fades; this otherwise works the same as casting a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.80DU0IvIzOIBGuUa]{Loaner Spell}.

Steal Vitality.name: Steal Vitality
Steal Vitality.description: When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining temporary Hit Points, if your target fails or critically fails its saving throw, you can attempt a counteract check to remove the clumsy or enfeebled conditions on yourself, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC. If the condition was caused by an ongoing effect and you don't remove that effect, the condition returns at the end of your next turn.

Steal the Sky.name: Steal the Sky
Steal the Sky.description: You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zoY0fQYTF1NzezTg]{Steal the Sky} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Stealthy Companion.name: Stealthy Companion
Stealthy Companion.description: You've trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings. Your animal companion gains the benefit of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qqe5VmcO1s8iTOfd]{Camouflage} feat. If your companion is a specialized ambusher, its proficiency rank for Stealth increases to master (or legendary if it was already master).

Steam Spell.name: Steam Spell
Steam Spell.description: You transform your fire spells into steam, making them more effective underwater. If your next action is to Cast a Spell with the fire trait, you can cast it underwater. When you do so, it takes the form of scalding steam. Underwater creatures do not gain the normal fire resistance for being underwater against this spell, but they don't light things on fire or cause @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}, nor do they add other effects that would apply to fire but not steam (at the GM's discretion).

Steed Form.name: Steed Form
Steed Form.description: Your eidolon changes to make it particularly effective as your mount. While you ride it, you get your full number of actions each round instead of reducing them to 2. This applies only when you ride your eidolon, not when anyone else does. Your eidolon still must be at least one size category larger than you to ride it. Since you work together to move, your eidolon's move actions while you're mounted gain the tandem trait.

Steel Skin.name: Steel Skin
Steel Skin.description: You wear your armor like a second skin. You can rest normally while wearing medium armor. If you are a master in heavy armor, you can also rest normally while wearing heavy armor.

Steel Your Resolve.name: Steel Your Resolve
Steel Your Resolve.description:
Cost 1 Resolve Point

Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.

@Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.oxowCzHbxSGOWRke]{Steel Your Resolve}

Steel Yourself!.name: Steel Yourself!
Steel Yourself!.description: You encourage an ally to toughen up, giving them a fighting chance. Choose one ally within your marshal's aura. The ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to your Charisma modifier and a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves. Both benefits last until the start of your next turn.

Stella's Stab and Snag.name: Stella's Stab and Snag
Stella's Stab and Snag.description:
Requirements You are wielding a piercing or slashing melee weapon.

You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement. Stride up to your Speed; this movement does not trigger reactions triggered by movement. At any point during this movement you can Strike an opponent within reach. If this Strike is successful, you can attempt a Thievery check to Steal from the target.

Step Lively.name: Step Lively
Step Lively.description:
Trigger A Large or larger enemy ends a move action adjacent to you.

You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} to another space adjacent to the enemy.

Sterling Dynamo Dedication.name: Sterling Dynamo Dedication
Sterling Dynamo Dedication.description:
You obtain a sterling dynamo prosthetic, which allows you to replace or augment a limb, or even add a simple new non-prehensile limb, such as a tail. While your sterling dynamo prosthetic can replace a missing prehensile limb, such as an arm, choosing to add a new limb can never increases your character's number of hands or prehensile limbs beyond two, even in combination with other abilities or effects.

Your sterling dynamo prosthesis is especially optimized for combat, granting you a dynamo melee unarmed attack that is in the brawling weapon group and is made of silver (which makes it more effective against certain types of creatures, such as devils and werewolves).

You have several options to customize your sterling dynamo. First, choose whether you have a power driver dynamo, which deals [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} and has the shove trait, or a percussive striker dynamo, which deals [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 bludgeoning damage} and has the agile and finesse traits. Most dynamos are automated, so they don't require a free hand to use, like other unarmed attacks. However, you can instead choose to make your dynamo be manually controlled via a handheld switch, lever, or other device; to make an attack with a manually controlled dynamo, you must have a hand free to operate it, but the benefit is great control and a more devastating strike. This increases the damage die by one size, to a 1d8 for a power drive dynamo or 1d6 for a percussive striker dynamo. Arm dynamos are always manual, but they use the hand on that arm to operate the dynamo when making strikes. Manual control is required only in the heat of combat, not for less strenuous adventuring or everyday activities.

You need to keep your sterling dynamo wound, but the process isn't particularly onerous, so in most situations, it won't be an issue. If you spend 1 minute winding up your dynamo, it can remain active for 24 hours before needing additional winding. However, enemies can attempt to Disable the dynamo, which has a level equal to your own, to reduce the remaining operational time by 1 hour, or 2 hours on a critical success. Certain other abilities that adversely affect technology might also reduce the dynamo's remaining operational time. When your dynamo is out of operational time, you can still use it as a normal prosthetic, but you cannot use your dynamo unarmed attack or any other abilities from this archetype until you wind the dynamo again. You can wind the dynamo for 1 minute at any time to return it to the maximum 24 hours of operational time.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the sterling dynamo archetype.

Sticky Bomb.name: 黏性炸弹 Sticky Bomb
Sticky Bomb.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发条件 你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{高速炼金 Quick Alchemy} 制作一枚炼金炸弹，这个炸弹的等级至少比你的高阶炼金术等级低2级。

你混入其中的添加剂能够使得炸弹的内容物附着在目标身上并持续造成伤害。

一名被你的黏性炸弹直接命中的生物也会受到与这枚炸弹的溅射伤害数值与类型相同的持续伤害。如果这枚炸弹本身也会造成持续伤害，那么将二者的数值相加。

Sticky Poison.name: Sticky Poison
Sticky Poison.description:
A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear.

If your Strike with a poisoned weapon would expend its poison without your target attempting an initial save (due to resistance or your Strike being a critical failure, for example), attempt a DC 5 flat check. On a success, your weapon remains poisoned.

If your Strike with a poisoned weapon succeeds, attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, your weapon remains poisoned until the end of your next turn.

Stoked Flame Stance.name: Stoked Flame Stance
Stoked Flame Stance.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements. You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1d6 persistent fire damage.

While in Stoked Flame Stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3rd.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.rp1YauUSULuqW8rs]{Stance: Stoked Flame Stance}

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

Stone Blood.name: Stone Blood
Stone Blood.description: You can selectively stop your bleeding with ease. Reduce the DC of flat checks to stop @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} you have from 15 to 10, and you can use a single action that has the concentrate trait to gain an early flat check without physically binding the wounds. You recover naturally from the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} condition twice as quickly as normal.

Stone Bones.name: Stone Bones
Stone Bones.description:
Trigger You are struck by a critical hit that deals physical damage.

Your intractable nature can help you shrug off even the most grievous injuries. Attempt a DC 17 flat check. If you are successful, the attack becomes a normal hit.

Stone Communion.name: Stone Communion
Stone Communion.description: You gain a unique communion with the earth and stones. You learn the Terran language and you can Activate your ka stone with a 10-minute activation (envision) to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YIMampGpij4Y30yE]{Stone Tell}.

Stone Face.name: Stone Face
Stone Face.description: Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against effects with the fear trait, and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against Intimidate skill actions, such as Demoralize.

Stone Form.name: Stone Form
Stone Form.description: You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form} as a 7th-level primal innate spell, but you can only choose the earth elemental form.

Stonecunning.name: Stonecunning
Stonecunning.description: You have a knack for noticing even small inconsistencies and craftsmanship techniques in the stonework around you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to notice unusual stonework. This bonus applies to checks to discover mechanical traps made of stone or hidden within stone. If you aren't using the Seek action or searching, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to notice unusual stonework anyway. This check doesn't gain the circumstance bonus, and it takes a -2 circumstance penalty.

Stonegate.name: Stonegate
Stonegate.description: Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.115Xp9E38CJENhNS]{Passwall} as a 7th-level divine innate spell that you can cast once per day. Unlike the spell, however, this ability can be used only to open passages through barriers of earth or stone.

Stonewalker.name: Stonewalker
Stonewalker.description: You have a deep reverence for and connection to stone. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone} as a 3rd-level divine innate spell that you can cast once per day. If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HOUHs5rahwIsQoBf]{Stonecunning} dwarf ancestry feat, you can attempt to find unusual stonework and stonework traps that require legendary proficiency in Perception. If you have both Stonecunning and legendary proficiency in Perception, when you're not Seeking and the GM rolls a secret check for you to notice unusual stonework,you keep the bonus from Stonecunning and don't take the -2 circumstance penalty.

Storm Born.name: Storm Born
Storm Born.description: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed. You do not take circumstance penalties to ranged spell attacks or Perception checks caused by weather, and your targeted spells don't require a flat check to succeed against a target concealed by weather (such as fog).

Storm Form.name: Storm Form
Storm Form.description: You can transform into an elemental. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form} as a 7th-level primal innate spell, but you can only choose the air elemental form.

Storm Retribution.name: Storm Retribution
Storm Retribution.description:
Trigger An opponent adjacent to you critically hits you with a melee weapon or melee unarmed attack.

Requirements You have at least 1 available Focus Point

You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ho1jSoYKrHUNnM90]{Tempest Surge} on the triggering opponent and push that creature, moving it 5 feet away from you if it fails its Reflex save, or 10 feet if it critically fails. This movement is forced movement.

Storm's Lash.name: Storm's Lash
Storm's Lash.description: Wind and lightning have always been close friends to you. You can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc} cantrip as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Stormsoul.name: Stormsoul
Stormsoul.description: Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning. You gain resistance to electricity equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Stormy Heart.name: Stormy Heart
Stormy Heart.description: The elemental power in your blood is a raging storm. You can @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4Jwtl2FvxskruHQv]{Invoke The Elements} with a frequency of once per 10 minutes, rather than once per day.

Story Crooner.name: Story Crooner
Story Crooner.description: You're a talented story weaver and use your voice effectively. You are trained in Performance. If you would automatically become trained in Performance, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the Impressive Performance skill feat and gain a +1 circumstance bonus when Performing for an audience of strix.

Strand Strider.name: Strand Strider
Strand Strider.description: Your eight legs serve you well when climbing walls and webs alike. You gain a climb speed of 25 feet in your spider shape.

Strange Script.name: Strange Script
Strange Script.description: You have such familiarity with obscure texts that you can compel them to reveal their secrets. Once per day, you can touch a single text (such as a tome, a wall of hieroglyphics, or something similar) and understand its meaning for 1 hour. If the text is in multiple languages, you gain the ability to understand them all for only the purposes of reading the text. If the text is in a code or cypher, you don't automatically understand the text, but you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to decipher it.

Strangle.name: Strangle
Strangle.description:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

You twist and squeeze the breath out of your foe. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained. On a success, you gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice and the target can barely speak until the start of your next turn or until it Escapes, whichever comes first. While it can barely speak, the target can't vocalize above a hoarse whisper, and it must succeed at a Flat Check or lose any action that requires speech, For an action requiring speech that is also a manipulate action, like Casting a Spell with somatic and verbal components, the target just rolls a single Flat Check, rather than an additional Flat Check for being grabbed.

Strategic Assessment.name: Strategic Assessment
Strategic Assessment.description:
You learn your foes' strengths and weaknesses by watching them move. When you critically hit a creature with a Strike on which you substituted your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devising a Strategem}, the GM chooses one of the following pieces of information about the enemy to tell you.

  • Which of the enemy's weaknesses is highest
  • Which of the enemy's resistances is highest
  • Which of the enemy's saving throws is lowest
  • One immunity the enemy has

The GM can choose deliberately or at random, but they can't choose information that doesn't apply (such as choosing an immunity for an enemy that has no immunities). This applies only the first time you critically hit a given creature.

Strategic Bypass.name: Strategic Bypass
Strategic Bypass.description: Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow. When you hit with a Strike on which you substituted your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Strategem}, you ignore an amount of resistance equal to your Intelligence modifier for each resistance that applies against your attack.

Straveika.name: Straveika
Straveika.description: You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a nosferatu cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth. People call you straveika, or ancient-born. The vestiges of your forebear's powers of domination have left you with an understanding of how a creature's intentions change its behaviors. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} and Perception DCs against attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} to you.

Streetwise.name: 人情练达 Streetwise
Streetwise.description: 你惯于在街头巷尾打探消息，随时触碰着当地社群的脉搏起伏。你可以使用社群技能调整值取代交涉技能调整值来使用搜集信息（Gather Information）。当你身处任何一个你经常性访问（Frequent regularly）的社区中时，你可以使用社群技能的回忆知识技能动作，取代交涉技能的搜集信息来获得同样的信息。通常，这样做会使技能检定的DC比使用交涉技能更高，但好处是你无需花费时间四下打听就能立即回忆起相关的讯息。即使你以此方式回忆知识的检定失败，你仍然可以尝试正常的通过交涉技能来重新收集信息。

Strident Command.name: Strident Command
Strident Command.description:
The common folk heed your demands, and though your true foes rarely bend to your commands, when they do the hesitation can cost them the battle. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} once every 10 minutes as a 1st-level occult innate spell.

If you're in your vigilante identity, you can command the target only to approach you, drop prone, or stand in place. If you're in your social identity, you can command the target only to run away or release what the target is holding.

Striker's Scroll.name: 打击卷轴 Striker's Scroll
Striker's Scroll.description:
你可以将卷轴附着在你的武器或 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{重拳缠手带} 从而融合法术到攻击中，细心的折叠在武器一部分上或者复盖在武器表面。附着卷轴需要附着一个 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{护符} 动作。你同时只能将一个卷轴附着在武器上，并且你不能同时将附着护符（talisman）和卷轴。

假定这个法术是你可以在法术打击时正常使用的话，你可以从卷轴中释放法术（Cast a Spell）来用作法术打击的一部分。你不能通过其他方式用附着的卷轴释放法术，除非你再次使用附着一个护符动作移除这个卷轴然后正常使用卷轴——它可能有点褶皱。

Striking Retribution.name: Striking Retribution
Striking Retribution.description:
You have an appropriately intense hatred for alghollthus.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against creatures from the alghollthu family and those that serve alghollthus (the GM determines which creatures serve an alghollthu).

In addition, if an alghollthu successfully affects you or one of your allies within 60 feet with an enchantment, your circumstance bonus to damage against that alghollthu increases to +4 for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.EzgW32MCOGov9h5C]{Effect: Striking Retribution}

Strix Defender.name: Strix Defender
Strix Defender.description: Your ancestral feud with humans gives you experience dealing with vicious foes, and your vengeance knows no bounds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation, Perception, and Survival checks against humans, as well as on damage rolls against humans with weapons and unarmed attacks. However, your hatred of humans is immediately obvious, giving you a –2 circumstance penalty to Diplomacy checks against them and usually starting their attitude one step worse towards you.

Strix Lore.name: Strix Lore
Strix Lore.description: You're well connected to your tribe and perhaps even strix communities beyond your own, where you've learned about the land and techniques of graceful movement. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Nature. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Strix Lore.

Strix Vengeance.name: Strix Vengeance
Strix Vengeance.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You, or a strix ally you can see, are damaged by an enemy's critical hit.

You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin. Until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional +1d6 damage on Strikes against the triggering enemy. The bonus increases to +2d6 if you use a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DxCuJKynlnMQZHgp]{Striking} weapon or unarmed attack and +3d6 if you use a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.woxl2FrrgAcJDu0t]{Striking (Major)} weapon or unarmed attack.

Strong Arm.name: Strong Arm
Strong Arm.description: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon's range increment increases 10 feet.

Strong Swimmer.name: Strong Swimmer
Strong Swimmer.description: Your swim Speed increases to match your land Speed.

Stubborn Persistence.name: 顽强毅力 Stubborn Persistence
Stubborn Persistence.description:
人类以能够经受最严苛试炼的能力而闻名。当你将要陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏}时，尝试1次DC为17的纯骰检定（flat check）。

若成功，你就不会陷入疲乏。若你未能解决产生疲乏状态的根本原因，比如缺乏休息，则必须根据GM的判断在一段间隔时间后再次尝试检定，直至你在纯骰检定中失败或者解决了根本原因为止。

Student Of The Dueling Arts.name: Student Of The Dueling Arts
Student Of The Dueling Arts.description:
You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day. During your daily preparations, you can swap out any number of your duelist archetype feats for other duelist archetype feats of the appropriate level for which you are qualified. You can't swap out Duelist Dedication or Student of the Dueling Arts in this way.

In addition, you can enter a stance from a duelist archetype feat you don't have (such as one listed under Additional Feats) by increasing the number of actions it takes to enter the stance by 1 (typically to 2 actions). You must still meet the feat's prerequisites.

Student of Perfection Dedication.name: Student of Perfection Dedication
Student of Perfection Dedication.description:
Access You are from Jalmeray.

You have learned the martial arts techniques of your House of Perfection. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics and Warfare Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3a07jkWezSuORSpS]{Ki Strike} monk class feat, which grants you the ki strike ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the Refocus activity as a monk does. Your ki spells from Student of Perfection are occult spells.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the student of perfection archetype.

Student of the Canon.name: 神学士 Student of the Canon
Student of the Canon.description:
你研究过各个宗教派别的教义要旨，这使你很难在相关的知识上被蒙骗或是混淆。

当你使用宗教技能来解译一部具有宗教意义的文书或是回忆关于某一宗教信仰的教义的知识时，但获得了大失败结果时，你只会获得普通失败的结果。

当你使用宗教技能来回忆关于你所信仰的宗教的教义知识且失败时，你视为获得了成功的结果；如果你的检定获得了成功结果，你视为获得了大成功结果。

Student of the Staff.name: 木杖学徒 Student of the Staff
Student of the Staff.description:
你已经广泛的研究过木杖从而习得了你所选武器的隐藏能力。当你使用木杖进行攻击骰时获得大成功，你应用棍棒（club）武器组的重击专精效果（critical specialization effects）。当你处于奥术奔涌架式时，你的棍棒获得致命d6（deadly d6）特征，致命骰的伤害具有和奥术奔涌额外伤害相同的伤害类型。

额外的，你可以铸刻性能符文（property runes）到一柄你预备的法杖（a magic staff you prepare）上，即使一柄魔法木杖通常不能承载性能符文。你必须首先铸刻性能符文到你的法术书上，然后使用相同的步骤转移符文（transfering a rune）到你的法术书上（核心规则书p.580）。符文在你的法术书上会是一种特殊形式的图案，占据一整页空间。你不能铸刻无法放置于非魔法木杖的符文，也不能铸刻 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.roeYtwlIe65BPMJ1]{变形} 符文。 在你预备法杖（prepare a staff）时，你可以从法术书上传递任意数量的性能符文到木杖上，上限为铸刻在木杖上的武器潜力 weapon potency 符文。

Studious Adept.name: Studious Adept
Studious Adept.description: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image} as 2nd-level arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.

Studious Capacity.name: 学习积累 Studious Capacity
Studious Capacity.description: 你持续地学习异能法术，提升了你的法术积累，让你在看起来不可能的时候依旧能够施展法术。你每天可以在已经用完了某一等级的法术位的情况下，施展一个该等级的法术，但是你不能使用这一能力施展你最高等级的法术。

Studious Magic.name: Studious Magic
Studious Magic.description: You've taken an interest in anadi arcane traditions. Choose one cantrip from the arcane spell list. You can cast this spell as an arcane innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Stumbling Feint.name: Stumbling Feint
Stumbling Feint.description:
Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}.

You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows}, you can attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} as a free action just before the first Strike.

On a success, instead of making the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your next attack, they become flat-footed against both attacks from the Flurry of Blows.

Stumbling Stance.name: Stumbling Stance
Stumbling Stance.description:
You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated-bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements.

While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}. The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.BCyGDKcplkJiSAKJ]{Stance: Stumbling Stance}

Stunning Appearance.name: Stunning Appearance
Stunning Appearance.description: Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond. When you use Startling Appearance, if your foe's level is equal to or lower than yours, they are also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} on a hit, or stunned 2 on a critical hit.

Stunning Finisher.name: Stunning Finisher
Stunning Finisher.description:
You attempt a dizzying blow. Make a melee Strike. If you hit, your foe must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results; the save has the incapacitation trait.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target can't use reactions until its next turn.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Stunning Fist.name: Stunning Fist
Stunning Fist.description: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent. When you target the same creature with two Strikes from your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows}, you can try to stun the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} on a critical failure). This is an incapacitation effect.

Sturdy Bindings.name: Sturdy Bindings
Sturdy Bindings.description: Your grapples are incredibly reliable. When you roll a critical failure on a check to Grapple a target, you get a failure instead. In addition, when a creature you have grabbed rolls a failure on its check to Escape, it gets a critical failure instead, and if it rolls a critical success, it gets a success instead.

Subjective Truth.name: Subjective Truth
Subjective Truth.description: Your disparate identities allow you to defeat magic that detects lies. As long as what you say is true from the point of view of your current identity, you can say it even under effects like @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aewxsale5xWEPKLk]{Zone of Truth} that force you to speak the truth.

Submission Hold.name: Submission Hold
Submission Hold.description:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

Your iron grip slowly saps your opponent's strength. Attempt an Athletics check to Grapple the creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following effects instead of the usual effects.

Critical Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of its next turn and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.

Success The target is enfeebled 1 until the end of its next turn.

Subtle Delivery.name: Subtle Delivery
Subtle Delivery.description:
You can capably deliver toxins with a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FPwsiGqMCNPLHmjX]{Blowgun}. Your blowgun @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} can apply injury poisons even if they deal no damage due to a creature's resistance.

If you critically succeed at an attack roll using a blowgun loaded with a dart you've poisoned and the target rolls a failure on the poison's initial save, the target critically fails instead.

Subtle Shank.name: Subtle Shank
Subtle Shank.description:
Access Help either the Washboard Dogs or the Diobel Sweepers destroy their rival.

Requirements You have a melee weapon of light bulk @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} on your person via the Stealth skill, and the target isn't aware of it.

You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion. Interact to draw the weapon, Strike with that weapon, and then Conceal it with a Stealth check. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for this attack.

Subtle Theft.name: 妙手空空 Subtle Theft
Subtle Theft.description: 当你成功地使用偷窃（Steal）技能动作偷到了东西时，除了受害人以外的潜在会在他们发觉你在行窃的察觉检定上承受-2减值。除此之外，如果你你在对其他生物视为无踪状态时事先使用了欺骗技能来使对方分神，你接下来对其进行的一个藏匿物品或是偷窃技能动作不会导致你失去无踪状态。

Sudden Charge.name: Sudden Charge
Sudden Charge.description: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing. Stride twice. If you end your movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can make a melee Strike against that enemy. You can use Sudden Charge while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Sudden Leap.name: Sudden Leap
Sudden Leap.description:
(Barbarian) You swing at a foe while mid-leap.

(Fighter) You make an impressive leap and swing while you soar.

Make a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} and attempt one melee Strike at any point during your jump.

Immediately after the Strike, you fall to the ground if you're in the air, even if you haven't reached the maximum distance of your jump. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you take no damage and land upright.

When attempting a High Jump or Long Jump during a Sudden Leap, determine the DC using the Long Jump DCs, and increase your maximum distance to double your Speed.

Suli Amir.name: Suli Amir
Suli Amir.description: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pkcOby5prOausy1k]{Read Omens} and 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} each once per day as arcane innate spells, and you can cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate cantrip, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Suli-jann.name: Suli-jann
Suli-jann.description: Your elemental ancestor was a janni, genies that walk the mortal world and embody all four elements together. You inherited a janni's nature as a wanderer and ability to survive in many types of environment, from the hottest desert to the coldest tundra. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Survival. If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat as a bonus feat.

Summon Air Elemental.name: Summon Air Elemental
Summon Air Elemental.description: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{Summon Elemental} as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an air elemental.

Summon Celestial Kin.name: Summon Celestial Kin
Summon Celestial Kin.description: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lTDixrrNKaCvLKwX]{Summon Celestial} as a 5th-level divine innate spell, but the celestial summoned must be from the same category as your own lineage, such as a creature with the angel trait if you are angelkin.

Summon Earth Elemental.name: Summon Earth Elemental
Summon Earth Elemental.description: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{Summon Elemental} as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an earth elemental.

Summon Ensemble.name: Summon Ensemble
Summon Ensemble.description: When you cast summon instrument, you can modify its duration to be sustained, up to 1 minute. When you do, you summon a number of instruments equal to your spellcasting ability modifier that hover around you and play of their own accord. Once per turn when you Sustain the Spell, choose an opponent within 30 feet who can hear your performance. The target must attempt a Will save against the spell's DC; on a failure, it becomes distracted by your performance and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round. The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Summon Fiendish Kin.name: Summon Fiendish Kin
Summon Fiendish Kin.description: 你与魔界位面有着深刻联系，使你能借此召唤同族的魔族盟友。每日1次，你可以5环级神术内在法术的形式施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.29ytKctjg7qSW2ff]{召唤魔物 Summon Fiend} ，但只能召唤与你的血脉专长相符的魔界生物。

Summon Fire Elemental.name: Summon Fire Elemental
Summon Fire Elemental.description: You can summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{Summon Elemental} as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be a fire elemental.

Summon Water Elemental.name: Summon Water Elemental
Summon Water Elemental.description: You can summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{Summon Elemental} as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be a water elemental.

Summoner Dedication.name: Summoner Dedication
Summoner Dedication.description:
You've formed a bond with an eidolon, an entity that manifests in a physical body only through its link to your life force. Your bond may be tenuous, but that doesn't make your connection any less special. You gain an eidolon as well as the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.n5vwBnLSlIXL9ptp]{Manifest Eidolon} activity. Due to your tenuous link, you can't gain or use tandem actions. Because you don't have Act Together, only you or your eidolon can perform an exploration activity at one time, so for instance you couldn't both be Searching or Investigating.

Your eidolon is trained in unarmed attacks and unarmored defense, and shares your proficiency rank for Perception, saving throws, and skill checks. Choose an eidolon type. You become trained in your eidolon's listed skills. For each of those skills that you are already trained in, you become trained in a different skill of your choice. Your eidolon's initial ability scores are reduced. It starts with a 16 in any ability score listed at 18 for its eidolon array. It otherwise gains the statistics listed for an eidolon of that type.

At 5th level, the eidolon's ability score that was reduced to 16 increases to 18, before applying ability boosts. At levels 5, 10, 15, and 20, your eidolon also gets four ability boosts, which follow the same rules as yours.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the summoner archetype.

Summoner's Call.name: Summoner's Call
Summoner's Call.description:
Trigger You or your eidolon take damage from a foe or hazard.

Requirements Your eidolon is manifested more than 5 feet away.

In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side. Your eidolon teleports to an open space adjacent to you.

Special This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Sun Blade.name: Sun Blade
Sun Blade.description:
Access The following class feat is available to Knights of Lastwall.

You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pMTltbI3S3UIuFaR]{Sun Blade} devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Sun's Fury.name: Sun's Fury
Sun's Fury.description: The Old Sun Gods have granted you a gift in your fight against Walkena. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LrFUj76CHDBV0vHW]{Sun's Fury} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to pray to the Old Sun Gods; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your Bright Lion focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, if you aren't already, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability score.

Sunder Enchantment.name: Sunder Enchantment
Sunder Enchantment.description:
You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

When you Sunder a Spell, you can instead attempt to counteract either an unattended magic item or one of your target's magic items. If your counteract attempt succeeds, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. If you target an artifact, an intelligent item, or a particularly powerful item, your counteract attempt automatically fails.

Sunder Spell.name: Sunder Spell
Sunder Spell.description:
You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell. Make a Strike with a melee weapon or an unarmed attack against a creature, object, or a spell manifestation (such as the wall created by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire} or the guardian from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jQdm301h6e8hIY4U]{Spiritual Guardian}).

If your Strike hits, you can attempt to counteract a single spell or magical effect on the target. Your counteract level for this attempt is equal to half your level rounded up, and you use the result of your attack roll for the counteract check.

Whether or not you succeed at your Strike, the target becomes temporarily immune to your Sunder Spell for 24 hours.

Superior Bond.name: 高级连结 Superior Bond
Superior Bond.description: 当妳从妳的连结物品汲能时，妳能留下一些能量以待下次使用。妳每天额外多一次汲取连结物品的次数，但法术必须低于最高环级两环级。

Superior Propulsion.name: Superior Propulsion
Superior Propulsion.description:
By experimenting with the effects of momentum gained from your signature vehicle's movement, you have learned to get more from propulsion than just speed when the pilot pushes the vehicle to its limit. Each time the pilot Drives your signature vehicle as a 2- or 3-action activity and succeeds at the Piloting check, the vehicle produces an additional effect, depending on its method of propulsion. If your signature vehicle has more than one propulsion method, the pilot can select which benefit to gain each time they succeed at the Piloting check to Drive the vehicle as a 2- or 3-action activity.

Alchemical The caustic runoff from the alchemical engines is now weaponized. Creatures adjacent to your signature vehicle when it begins its movement take acid damage equal to your level.

Clockwork More resilient gears allow the vehicle to remain functional, even when damaged. If your signature vehicle is broken, it does not need to make the flat check to avoid losing operating time.

Magical The residual magic from your signature vehicle interferes with hostile spells. Pilots, crew, and passengers of the vehicle gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells until the start of the pilot's next turn.

Pulled You have eased the amount of effort needed for those pulling your signature vehicle to move it. The vehicle gains a +10 circumstance bonus to its Speed.

Rowed Reinforced ports protect the rowers below decks from harm. Rowers of your signature vehicle who are below decks have greater cover from attacks from outside the vehicle and are not damaged when the vehicle takes collision damage.

Steam The outlet of steam forms a cloud around the vehicle as it moves. For the duration of its movement, your signature vehicle is concealed.

Wind The draft of the wind helps the vehicle turn. During this movement, your signature vehicle can turn normally, rather than needing to move in a straight line as normal for a 2- or 3-action Drive.
