  • Explosive Barrel Your attack strikes a barrel of expensive rum, a vial of volatile alchemical fluids, a demonic pustule erupting from the earth, or some other explosive object. The object explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20], and creatures in the area take 6d6 damage with a basic Reflex save against your class DC. The damage type is chosen by the GM, based on the exploding object. Increase the damage by 1d6 for every 2 levels you have above 10th.

Trickster Tengu.name: Trickster Tengu
Trickster Tengu.description: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure. Once per day, you can cast either @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{Baleful Polymorph} as a 7th-level primal innate spell. You must take the form of a bird when using this aerial form.

Trickster's Ace.name: Trickster's Ace
Trickster's Ace.description:
Trigger You specify the trigger when you make your daily preparations (see Requirements below).

Requirements When you make your daily preparations, you must specify a trigger for this reaction using the same restrictions as the triggers for the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.dLgAMt3TbkmLkUqE]{Ready} action. You also choose a single spell from the arcane, divine, occult, or primal list of 4th level or lower. The spell can't have a cost, nor can its casting time be more than 10 minutes. The spell must be able to target a single creature, and you must be a valid target for it.

Whether from jury-rigged magic items, deduction from the study of magical interactions, or other means, you have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

When the trigger occurs, you cause the spell to come into effect. The spell targets only you, no matter how many creatures it would affect normally. If you define particularly complicated conditions, as determined by the GM, the trigger might fail. Once the contingency is triggered, the spell is expended until your next daily preparations.

Triple Shot.name: Triple Shot
Triple Shot.description:
You can quickly fire multiple shots with greater control.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PwcmmJOLY8C9JHau]{Double Shot}, you can make the attacks against the same target. You can add an additional action to Double Shot to make three ranged Strikes instead of two. If you do, the penalty is -4. All attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made all of them.

Triple Threat.name: Triple Threat
Triple Threat.description:
You can divide your attention three ways when hunting. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}, you can designate three creatures as prey, designate two creatures as prey and share the effect with one ally (as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Aqhsx5duEpBgaPB0]{Shared Prey}), or designate one creature as prey and share the effect with two allies.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.uXCU8GgriUjuj5FV]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ltIvO9ZQlmqGD89Y]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.mNk0KxsZMFnDjUA0]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision}

Triple Time.name: 三拍子 Triple Time
Triple Time.description: 你学会了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.c8R2fpk88fBwJ1ie]{三拍子 Triple Time} 戏法乐章, 可以使你与你的盟友在一轮内能够更快的行动。

Triumphant Inspiration.name: 激发胜心 Triumphant Inspiration
Triumphant Inspiration.description:
触发 你在一次近战武器打击或一次近战非武装攻击重击一名敌人。

伴随胜利的呼喊，你激励了你的盟友。你施放一个你所知且通常花一个动作施放的组曲戏法。

True Debilitating Bomb.name: 真实衰弱炸弹 True Debilitating Bomb
True Debilitating Bomb.description:
你已经为你过去发明的炸弹找到了更具毁灭性的方式去阻碍和束缚你的敌人。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sv4LeEbkOJyLen10]{衰弱炸弹 Debilitating Bomb} 时，将后述效果添加到你的可选效果列表中： @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，或在速度上造成-15尺的状态减值。

如果你没有从上述列表中为你的衰弱炸弹挑选效果，那么你可以让目标只有在豁免检定上取得大成功时才能避免衰弱炸弹的效果。

True Gaze.name: True Gaze
True Gaze.description:
Frequency once per hour

When you focus your eyes carefully, your gaze can pierce through all obfuscations, even magical ones. When you use True Gaze, you gain the effects of a 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} spell, using your Perception modifier for the counteract check.

True Hypercognition.name: 真实认知 True Hypercognition
True Hypercognition.description: 你的思维以令人惊奇的速度运作。你可以立刻使用最多五个回忆知识动作。如果你拥有任何特殊能力或者自由动作通常会由于回忆知识触发，你不能在这些动作中使用这些能力。

True Perception.name: 真实视野 True Perception
True Perception.description: 你们的感知能力和处理感官信息的能力是如此远超常人，以至于你们注意到在各种幻象和嬗变中微小的差异。你永久处于6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing} 效果影响下，使用你的察觉调整值来进行反制检定。

True Shapeshifter.name: True Shapeshifter
True Shapeshifter.description: You transcend the limitations of form. While under the effects of wild shape, you can change into any other form on your wild shape list; if the durations of the forms would vary, use the shorter of the two durations. Once per day, you can transform into a kaiju, with the effects of nature incarnate; if you have Plant Shape, you can instead transform into a green man.

True Transmogrification.name: True Transmogrification
True Transmogrification.description: You transmogrify your eidolon each day. During your daily preparations, you can swap out any number of your evolution feats, each for a different evolution feat of an appropriate level for which you meet the prerequisites. These swaps last until your next daily preparations.

Truespeech.name: Truespeech
Truespeech.description:
It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message.

You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SwUiVavHKMWG7t5K]{Tongues} as a 5th-level divine innate spell once per day on yourself only.

You gain a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for the duration of the spell when speaking to creatures with whom you already shared a language before casting.

Tumble Behind (Rogue).name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
Tumble Behind (Rogue).description: You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard. When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, the foe whose space you passed through is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.

Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler).name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler).description: Your tumbling catches your foe off guard. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} successfully, the foe you Tumbled Through is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.

Tumbling Opportunist.name: Tumbling Opportunist
Tumbling Opportunist.description:
Frequency once per minute

Requirements Your most recent action was to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}

or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jfsmtOx4QgXB19BL]{Tumbling Strike}, and you successfully moved through an

enemy's space.

You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back. You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for this check.

Tumbling Strike.name: Tumbling Strike
Tumbling Strike.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to an enemy.

Attempt an Acrobatics check against the Reflex DC of an enemy adjacent to you.

Critical Success You move through the enemy's space to an

unoccupied space on the other side of the enemy from your

starting position. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

You can't move farther than your Speed, and you must end

your movement adjacent to the enemy whose space you

moved through. After moving, you make a melee Strike

against the enemy whose space you moved through, and

the enemy is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against that Strike.

Success As critical success, but the enemy isn't flat-footed

against the Strike.

Failure You remain in your original space but can still Strike.

Critical Failure No effect.

Tupilaq Carver.name: Tupilaq Carver
Tupilaq Carver.description:
Access Erutaki ethnicity

You know the truth behind old stories that tell of sending a fetish of bone and sinew to seek vengeance. These old magics allow you to conjure constructs with ease. Add the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lKcsmeOrgHtK4xQa]{Summon Construct} spell to your spell list. The constructs you summon have a distinct ivory scrimshaw appearance, and if you include a drop of blood, lock of hair, or other portion of a creature's body as part of the spell's material component, the summoned construct gains a +4 status bonus to Perception checks to sense or locate that creature.

Turn Undead.name: Turn Undead
Turn Undead.description: Undead harmed by your positive energy might flee, compelled by an innate aversion to the force opposite undeath. When you use a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to damage undead, each undead of your level or lower that critically fails its save gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition for 1 round.

Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication.name: Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication
Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}

Access You must befriend at least one Turpin Rowe logger.

Your logging training has made you intimately familiar with all aspects of forestry, and you have trained extensively to reach around trees and utilize their bulk to your advantage. You become trained in Milling Lore and Forest Lore, or an expert if you were already trained. You can always @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} when you are within forest terrain to gain cover, even if you're not next to an obstacle you can Take Cover behind. In addition, any enemy who gains standard cover from a tree gains only lesser cover against your attacks (or only standard cover, if the enemy otherwise gains greater cover).

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Turpin Rowe lumberjack archetype.

Tusks (Half-Orc).name: Tusks (Half-Orc)
Tusks (Half-Orc).description:
Most half-orcs have visible tusks, but yours are particularly large and sharp, capable of gouging deep wounds. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.

Tusks (Orc).name: Tusks (Orc)
Tusks (Orc).description:
You have particularly long, jagged tusks perfect for tearing meat from bone. You gain a tusks unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your tusks are in the brawling group and have the finesse and unarmed traits.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into this feat. You can retrain out of this feat only through drastic measures such as breaking or filing your tusks.

Tweak Appearances.name: Tweak Appearances
Tweak Appearances.description: You spend 1 minute making quick adjustments to someone's clothing and appearance, causing their words to carry more weight with an audience of your choice. While speaking to that audience, the target gains a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy and Performance checks. If you have master proficiency in Crafting, the bonus increases to +2; if you have legendary proficiency in Crafting, the bonus increases to +3. This bonus lasts until this ability is used on the target again, the situation they were prepared for ends, or they next change their outfit.

Twin Distraction.name: Twin Distraction
Twin Distraction.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in

a different hand.

Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

When using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9XALeVNcmlIxf3tJ]{Twin Feint}, if both your Strikes deal damage to a targeted creature, the target must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn.

Twin Eidolon.name: Twin Eidolon
Twin Eidolon.description:
You can transform to match your eidolon. When you Manifest your Eidolon, you can call upon its powers to transform yourself into a duplicate until it unmanifests. You can't use this if you Manifest your Eidolon in an unusual way, such as Meld into Eidolon.

While using Twin Eidolon, you use your eidolon's statistics other than your mental ability modifiers, including its evolutions. You can't cast spells (except spells your eidolon could cast), Activate or otherwise benefit from magic items that normally benefit you and not your eidolon, or use other actions it can't perform.

Any of its spells you cast with limited uses count against your eidolon's uses. You can Manifest your Eidolon again to end this effect.

Special This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Twin Feint.name: Twin Feint
Twin Feint.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

You make a dazzling series of attacks with both weapons, using the first attack to throw your foe offguard against a second attack at a different angle. Make one Strike with each of your two melee weapons, both against the same target. The target is automatically flat-footed against the second attack. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.

Twin Parry.name: Twin Parry
Twin Parry.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, or a +2 circumstance bonus if either weapon has the parry trait. You lose this circumstance bonus if you no longer meet this feat's requirement.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.eu2HidLHaGKe4MPn]{Effect: Twin Parry}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.EDpjey6SCdvIYqEc]{Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)}

Twin Riposte.name: Twin Riposte
Twin Riposte.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you

Requirements You are benefiting from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry}

A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon. Make a melee Strike or use a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} action against the triggering opponent.

Twin Shot Knockdown.name: Twin Shot Knockdown
Twin Shot Knockdown.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded crossbow or loaded firearm in each hand.

You fire at an enemy while targeting a part of its anatomy that will disrupt its balance. Make two Strikes against the same target, one with each of the required weapons. If both Strikes are successful, the target is also knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Twin Takedown.name: Twin Takedown
Twin Takedown.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

You swiftly attack your hunted prey with both weapons. Make two Strikes against your hunted prey, one with each of the required weapons. If both hit the same hunted prey, combine their damage for the purpose of its resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to each Strike normally.

Twinned Defense (Fighter).name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
Twinned Defense (Fighter).description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.

Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler).name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler).description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.

Twist Healing.name: Twist Healing
Twist Healing.description: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims. Whenever you Activate an Item to cast a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell, you can invert its energy to produce the effects of an equivalent @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell instead.

Twist the Knife.name: Twist the Knife
Twist the Knife.description:
Requirements Your last action was a melee Strike that dealt sneak attack damage to a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} target

After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open. You deal @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} to the target equal to your number of sneak attack damage dice.

Twitchy.name: Twitchy
Twitchy.description:
You are naturally suspicious and wary of danger, especially when you suspect someone might be leading you into an ambush. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saves against hazards, and to all of your initiative rolls.

If at least one of your opponents is using Deception or Diplomacy to determine their initiative, your bonus to initiative from this feat increases to +4.

Two-Weapon Flurry.name: Two-Weapon Flurry
Two-Weapon Flurry.description:
Requirements You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand

You lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy. Strike twice, once with each weapon.

Two-Weapon Fusillade.name: Two-Weapon Fusillade
Two-Weapon Fusillade.description:
Requirements You're wielding two weapons, each in a different hand. At least one of these weapons must be a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow.

You attack with both your weapons in a furious barrage. Strike twice, once with each weapon.

Ubiquitous Gadgets.name: 充裕小装置 Ubiquitous Gadgets
Ubiquitous Gadgets.description:
别人觉得你用光了你的装置，但他们没想到你还有！你的袖套里藏了比别人预计得更多的小装置。你每天可以制作的临时小装置数量提升2个。

特殊 在14级后，你可以第二次选择该专长。

Ubiquitous Overdrive.name: 全链超载 Ubiquitous Overdrive
Ubiquitous Overdrive.description: 你为你的每个盟友都准备了一大堆惊人的小玩意儿，通过精心的调整将他们链在一起，让你可以一次性给他们全部充能。在每日准备期间，选择至多6个自愿盟友。当你超载Overdrive时，你将你的超载增益提供30尺内你所选的任意盟友。这些盟友不会获得来自超载专家，大师，或传奇的额外伤害。

Ubiquitous Snares.name: Ubiquitous Snares
Ubiquitous Snares.description: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you're ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes. Double the number of prepared snares from Snare Specialist.

Ultimate Flexibility.name: Ultimate Flexibility
Ultimate Flexibility.description:
Your experience keeps you on your toes, making you adaptable to even the most dangerous challenges. When you gain a fighter feat using combat flexibility, you gain three fighter feats instead of two.

While the first feat must still be 8th level or lower, the second feat can be up to 14th level, and the third feat can be up to 18th level. You can use the first feat to meet the prerequisites of the second or third feats and the second feat to meet the prerequisites of the third feat. You must meet all feats' prerequisites.

In addition, you can adapt to the battlefield's challenges by spending 1 hour to train. If you do, you can reselect the feats chosen with combat flexibility as if you had made your daily preparations. You can't trade out limited-use abilities that you've already used, such as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wdkbfWKEjAFXAxto]{Determination}.

Ultimate Mercy.name: 最终救济 Ultimate Mercy
Ultimate Mercy.description:
你的救济将超越生死的界限。

当你使用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{救济 Mercy}, 你能够将@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 施展在一名在你上一回合结束后死亡的生物，令其重获生命。目标以1点生命值的状态重获生命并变得受伤（Wounded）1。如果目标是因为解离术（Disintegrate）或者死亡效果而死，那么你不能对其使用最终救济。

Ultimate Polymath.name: 六艺通习 Ultimate Polymath
Ultimate Polymath.description: 你的施法灵活多变，产生无限可能。你法术库的所有法术对你来说都算标志性法术了。

Ultimate Skirmisher.name: Ultimate Skirmisher
Ultimate Skirmisher.description: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain. You ignore the effects of all difficult terrain, greater difficult terrain, and hazardous terrain, and you don't trigger traps and hazards that are triggered by moving into an area (such as trip wires and pressure plates), unless you want to.

Unassuming Dedication.name: Unassuming Dedication
Unassuming Dedication.description:
Access Uhlam ethnicity

Your family instilled the values of care and patience into you from a young age. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to perform a downtime activity.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description: Interweaving attacks in a graceful fiow, you unbalance your foes. Whenever your Strike is a critical hit and deals damage, the target is flat-footed against your attacks until the end of your next turn.

Unbalancing Finisher.name: Unbalancing Finisher
Unbalancing Finisher.description: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

Unbalancing Sweep.name: Unbalancing Sweep
Unbalancing Sweep.description:
You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you. Choose up to three adjacent foes and choose whether to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} all three of them.

Whichever of the two options you choose, roll a separate Athletics check against each foe, performing the same action against each foe. Each attempt counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you have made all the attempts.

Unbelievable Escape.name: Unbelievable Escape
Unbelievable Escape.description: Your ability to narrowly evade danger defies all logic. You can use Lucky Escape once per hour instead of once per day.

Unbelievable Luck.name: Unbelievable Luck
Unbelievable Luck.description: While no one, not even you, might appear to understand why, you demonstrate a greater ability to hit your targets regardless of the obstacles in your way. You can use the Accidental Shot activity granted to you by the Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication once per hour instead of once per day.

Unbreakable-er Goblin.name: Unbreakable-er Goblin
Unbreakable-er Goblin.description: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break. You gain 20 Hit Points from your ancestry instead of 10. When you fall, you take no falling damage. If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AlhyF8LCW011w9kq]{Bouncy Goblin} feat, after falling or jumping from a height of at least 20 feet, you can bounce back into the air, up to half the distance you fell (and half as far forward if you jumped). These bounces continue until you bounce less than 20 feet.

Unburdened Iron.name: Unburdened Iron
Unburdened Iron.description: You've learned techniques first devised by your ancestors during their ancient wars, allowing you to comfortably wear massive suits of armor. Ignore the reduction to your Speed from any armor you wear. In addition, any time you're taking a penalty to your Speed from some other reason (such as from the encumbered condition or from a spell), deduct 5 feet from the penalty. For example, the encumbered condition normally gives a -10-foot penalty to Speed, but it gives you only a -5-foot penalty. If your Speed is taking multiple penalties, pick only one penalty to reduce.

Uncanny Agility.name: Uncanny Agility
Uncanny Agility.description: You have near-supernatural poise that lets you move swiftly across the most unsteady surfaces. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CnqMJR8e9jqJR7MM]{Steady Balance} skill feat. You can Step into difficult terrain caused by uneven ground, such as a rocky field or hilly incline.

Uncanny Awareness.name: Uncanny Awareness
Uncanny Awareness.description: You have a keen sense of movement around you. You gain motion sense as an imprecise sense out to 30 feet. Motion sense allows you to detect nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

Uncanny Bombs.name: 诡奇炸弹 Uncanny Bombs
Uncanny Bombs.description:
你投掷的炸弹忽视障碍和距离，精准地命中目标。

当你投掷一枚具有炸弹特征的炼金物品时，它的射程增量提升至60尺，目标在AC上来自于掩蔽的任何环境加值都会减少1，而你在目标为 隐蔽 生物时进行的裸骰检定上自动取得成功。

Uncanny Cheeks.name: Uncanny Cheeks
Uncanny Cheeks.description: You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} feats, except that you always withdraw the objects from your cheek pouches. This means the object you retrieve must fit in your cheek pouches; this is generally an item of negligible Bulk unless you also have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Pox93XMBaFmeLIDM]{Cheek Pouches} feat.

Uncanny Dodge.name: 离奇闪避 Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.PNpmVmD21zViDtGC]{否决优势 Deny Advantage} 职业特性。

Uncanny Suction.name: Uncanny Suction
Uncanny Suction.description: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces. You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed equal to your half your land Speed (minimum 5 feet). If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P04Hw8E6WAWARKHP]{Quick Climb} feat, your climb Speed is equal to your land Speed. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed}.

Unconventional Expertise.name: 冷门专家 Unconventional Expertise
Unconventional Expertise.description: 你继续使用你的冷门武器。每当你从一个职业能力中给特定武器获得专家或是更高熟练度时，你也可以在你冷门武器中选择的武器获得相同熟练度。

Unconventional Weaponry.name: 冷门武器 Unconventional Weaponry
Unconventional Weaponry.description: 你对一种来自其他先祖或是文化的武器非常熟悉。你可以把1种和你先组（比方说矮人，兽人，侏儒）特性有关或是在其他文化常见的罕见简易武器或军用武器变为可用，同时在确定熟练时将其视为简易武器。如果你有全部军用武器的擅长，那么你可以选择1种具有这种特性的罕见先进武器变为可用，同时在确定熟练时将其视为军用武器。

Undaunted.name: Undaunted
Undaunted.description: Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence, and you are certain you can overcome whatever hardships life throws your way. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against emotion effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.

Undead Companion.name: Undead Companion
Undead Companion.description: Your companion is also touched by undeath, a mix of a traditional companion and a skeleton, zombie, or stranger form of unlife. Your companion gains the undead trait instead of the animal trait and gains negative healing. It otherwise uses the normal rules for an animal companion or familiar; that means it can still be affected by many conditions or effects to which most undead are immune.

Undead Slayer.name: Undead Slayer
Undead Slayer.description: Your knowledge of your own not-quite-living anatomy, combined with your experience in combat, helps you take down undead foes with ease. Against undead creatures, you gain a circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks equal to the number of weapon damage dice for the Strike. This bonus increases to double the number of weapon damage dice if your target has the vampire trait.

Underground Network.name: 地下关系网 Underground Network
Underground Network.description:
你和知晓街道讯息的团伙有所联系，可以通过他们迅速获取情报。当你处于拥有关系网的区域（通常为你已生活一周或用1天休整期快速构筑关系网的聚居点）用社群技能 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{搜集信息 Gather Information} 时，你能直接向街上的团伙联系获取信息。通常这花费1小时，且不会因向公众收集信息而引人注目。检定和获得的信息正常遵从收集信息（Gather Information）动作的规则。

另外，若你成功请教了地下关系网，下一次你对收集信息的目标进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KUfLlXDWTcAWhl8l]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} 检定时获得+1环境加值，若该次检定你使用黑街学识（Underworld Lore），则加值为+2。GM可以根据当前地点以及与你关系网中的团体类型而改变这个拥有加值的学识技能类型。

Underhanded Assault.name: Underhanded Assault
Underhanded Assault.description:
You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} up to a foe adjacent to one of your allies. You can roll against the foe you're Sneaking up on, even if it's currently observing you, as though you were hidden. You take a -2 penalty on your Stealth check.

If your Stealth check against the chosen foe succeeds, you can make a melee Strike against that foe at the end of your Sneak.

Underwater Marauder.name: 水下熟手 Underwater Marauder
Underwater Marauder.description: 你可以熟练地在水中作战。当身处水中时你不会陷入措手不及，也不会因为在水中使用挥砍（Slashing）和钝击（Bludgeoning）伤害类型的武器而承受减值。

Underwater Volcano.name: Underwater Volcano
Underwater Volcano.description: You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O7ZEqWjwdKyo2CUv]{Volcanic Eruption} as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day, except that you can only evoke the volcano on the floor of a body of water, and the effects that normally happen to flying creatures happen to swimming creatures instead.

Underworld Investigator.name: Underworld Investigator
Underworld Investigator.description:
Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element. You might be a criminal yourself, or you might have gained an understanding of how they operate from the outside.

You become trained in Underworld Lore, and you gain your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} circumstance bonus to Thievery checks to investigate the subject of your lead (such as checks to Steal a clue from a suspect or Pick a Lock to open a safe with damning documents).

Undying Ferocity.name: Undying Ferocity
Undying Ferocity.description: You resist death's clutches with supernatural vigor. When you use Orc Ferocity, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Uneasy Rest.name: Uneasy Rest
Uneasy Rest.description: When you cast sleep, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: Subjects of your spell experience troubled dreams. When a target that failed or critically failed its saving throw wakes up, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Unending Emptiness.name: Unending Emptiness
Unending Emptiness.description: You pool the power of shadow within your eyes, gaining the ability to gather darkness into a turbulent orb of crushing emptiness within your line of sight. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sFwoKj0TsacsmoWj]{Darklight} domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Unerring Shot.name: Unerring Shot
Unerring Shot.description: Your senses are finely tuned to the slightest variations in the air, so much that you can place your shot exactly where you intend to aim it from any range possible with your weapon. When attacking with a ranged weapon in which you have master or greater proficiency, ignore the penalty from its range increment. (The weapon's maximum range is unchanged.) In addition, if your target has cover against your attack with such a weapon, it doesn't gain the bonus to AC if it has lesser cover, gets only the bonus of lesser cover if it has standard cover, or gains only the bonus of standard cover if it has greater cover.

Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication.name: Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication
Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication.description:
Frequency once per day

Who needs skill when you've got dumb luck? Sometimes your shots hit miraculously, regardless of the fact that you seemed to slip when you pulled the trigger or that you weren't aiming at your foe when you fired. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.FzZAYGib08aEq5P2]{Accidental Shot} activity.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the unexpected sharpshooter archetype.

Unexpected Shift.name: Unexpected Shift
Unexpected Shift.description:
Trigger You would take damage from an attack, spell, or other effect.

Your supernatural connection sometimes causes you to phase from reality when under threat, disappearing for split seconds before reappearing-often surprising you as much as your enemies. Roll a DC 16 flat check. On a success, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your level against the triggering effect, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that effect until the start of your turn, and you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} condition for 1 round.

Unfazed Assessment.name: Unfazed Assessment
Unfazed Assessment.description: You have witnessed hundreds of fighting styles and quickly adapt to defend against complicated maneuvers. Choose a creature within 30 feet who you're aware of, and attempt a Perception check against that target's Will DC. If you succeed, you size up their fighting style, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against that creature's attacks (or a +2 circumstance bonus for a critical success). These benefits last until the end of your next turn.

Unfetter Eidolon.name: Unfetter Eidolon
Unfetter Eidolon.description:
You can allow your eidolon to travel far from your side.

You learn the unfetter eidolon link spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Unfettered Halfling.name: Unfettered Halfling
Unfettered Halfling.description: You were forced into service as a laborer, either pressed into indentured servitude or shackled by the evils of slavery, but you've since escaped and have trained to ensure you'll never be caught again. Whenever you roll a success on a check to Escape or a saving throw against an effect that would impose the grabbed or restrained condition on you, you get a critical success instead. Whenever a creature rolls a failure on a check to Grapple you, they get a critical failure instead. If a creature uses the Grab ability on you, it must succeed at an Athletics check to grab you instead of automatically grabbing you.

Unhampered Passage.name: Unhampered Passage
Unhampered Passage.description: You won't allow others to restrain you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement} on yourself as a primal innate spell once per day.

Unified Theory.name: 源符论 Unified Theory
Unified Theory.description: 通过深入研究，你发现了隐藏在四大魔法宗派的魔法本质之间固有的联系——并且它们可以全部以奥法理论来解释。当你使用任何因为对应魔法宗派而需要你进行自然、神秘或是宗教技能检定的技能动作或是技能专长时，你可以取而代之使用奥法技能来进行检定；除此之外，如果你使用奥法技能检定，承受较高的DC或是减值来达成特定的行动（比如尝试辨识非奥术宗派的法术）时，你不需要再承受这些惩罚。

Unimpeded Step.name: 无阻快步 Unimpeded Step
Unimpeded Step.description: 伴随着神圣解放之力的爆发，因为你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步 Liberating Step} 而得以移动的盟友免受困难地形（Difficult terrain），严重困难地形（Greater difficult terrain），狭窄平面（Narrow surfaces）和崎岖地面（Uneven ground）的影响。

Universal Longevity.name: 长寿全才 Universal Longevity
Universal Longevity.description:
频率每天一次

你已经完善了你从你漫长寿命中学来的全部技能，所以你几乎不存在真正未受训的技能。你反思你的经历，可以改变你用 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WoLh16gyDp8y9WOZ]{长寿族裔 Ancestral Longevity} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vfuHVSuExvtyajkW]{长寿专家 Expert Longevity}选择的技能。

Universal Versatility.name: 万法归一 Universal Versatility
Universal Versatility.description: 你能够使用所有魔法学派的基础能力。你在日常准备时，可以选择一个八大学派中1级专精法师的学派法术。你可以使用这个学派法术直到妳下次的日常准备。当你重新聚能(refocus)时，你可以再次在八大学派中选择法术，取代先前的选择。你聚能池的聚能点加1。

Unmistakable Lore.name: 无错学识 Unmistakable Lore
Unmistakable Lore.description: 只要是你的专项研究范畴，你就决不可能犯错。当你使用任何一个你拥有受训等级的学识门类进行技能检定时，如果你的检定结果是大失败，你只会得到失败结果；如果你在一个学识门类上达到了大师级熟练等级，当你在技能检定上获得大成功结果时，你可以回想起比通常还要多的额外的信息和背景。

Unnerving Prowess.name: 威慑技巧 Unnerving Prowess
Unnerving Prowess.description:
触发 你使用奥多里决斗剑在一次打击(Strike)或卸武上大成功

你匪夷所思的剑术令你的敌人丧失勇气。你可以尝试对你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}或打击的目标进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。这种方式进行的挫败士气没有听觉特征，即便目标不懂你的语言，你也不会在检定上受到罚值。

Unravel Mysteries.name: Unravel Mysteries
Unravel Mysteries.description: You can understand the true meaning of texts quickly, and even when you get lost or hit a dead end, you aren't discouraged from making further attempts to get to the bottom of things. When you Decipher Writing, you need only half as long as usual (reducing the time from about 1 minute to about half a minute per page), and if you fail, you don't take the usual -2 circumstance penalty to further checks to decipher that text.

Unrivaled Builder.name: Unrivaled Builder
Unrivaled Builder.description: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done. You gain creation as a 5th-level innate primal spell. You must have an equivalent Bulk of material to create an item, such as wood or scrap metal to make a wheelbarrow. You can cast this spell once each day.

Unseat.name: Unseat
Unseat.description:
Requirements You are riding your mount and wielding a

jousting weapon.

You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount. Make a melee Strike against a mounted opponent. If your attack hits, attempt an Athletics check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. If you succeed, the foe is knocked off its mount into a space of its choice adjacent to its mount. If you critically succeed, it lands @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Unshakable Grit.name: Unshakable Grit
Unshakable Grit.description: You've become hardened by conflict after everything you've faced, and you possess a certain intractable stubbornness. If the reroll granted to you by your Grit and Tenacity reaction is a success, you get a critical success instead; if it's a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

Unshakable Idealism.name: Unshakable Idealism
Unshakable Idealism.description: Your faith and hope can't be shaken, and you won't flee when lives are at stake. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against fear effects and emotion effects that inflict despair. When you would gain the fleeing condition, you can choose to stand your ground and be stunned for the effect's duration as well, preventing you from running and allowing you to re-enter the fight more quickly when the effect ends.

Unstable Concoction.name: Unstable Concoction
Unstable Concoction.description:
You can create extraordinary-albeit volatile-alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NlEZ0piDxg9buXCL]{Quick Alchemy}, you can create an alchemical item from your formula book whose level is up to 2 higher than your advanced alchemy level. You can spend up to 3 additional batches of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Infused Reagents} when creating this item to stabilize it.

Upon activating the item, attempt a DC 10 flat check; for every additional batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Infused Reagents} you spent to create the item, reduce this DC by 2. On a success, the item functions normally. On a failure, the item explodes, dealing force damage to the user equal to twice the item's level (doubled on a critical failure).

Unstable Redundancies.name: 不稳定冗余 Unstable Redundancies
Unstable Redundancies.description:
触发 你即将为一个不稳定动作尝试纯骰检定，但你还没有投骰。

你在大发明内建造了三重冗余系统并添加了所有种类的缓冲器保护它不受你的不稳定实验的伤害。你自动在触发的纯骰检定中成功。

你无法再次依靠不稳定冗余Unstable Redundancies，直到你花费10分钟时间将其复位。如果你花费10分钟时间再调校你的大发明以让其再次使用不稳定动作，你可以在同样的时间内复位你的不稳定冗余Unstable Redundancies。

Unstoppable Juggernaut.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
Unstoppable Juggernaut.description:
You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease. You gain resistance equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier to all damage, and your resistance from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Raging} increases to 8 + your Constitution modifier.

In addition, if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points while raging, you can end your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Rage} as a reaction to stay at 1 Hit Point. If you do, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 2} (or increase your wounded condition by 2 if you are already wounded).

Untrained Improvisation.name: 即兴发挥 Untrained Improvisation
Untrained Improvisation.description: 即便你没有经验，你也知道怎么解决面前的问题。现在你在所有未受训技能检定时都可以使用你的人物等级的一般而非通常的+0来进行检定.当你达到至少7级时，你在这些检定上获得相当于你的人物等级的加值。拥有加值并不会允许你使用这些技能的受训技能动作。

Unusual Composition.name: 特殊组曲 Unusual Composition
Unusual Composition.description: 你可以将组曲蕴含的情感和力量转换为其他媒介。如果你的下一个动作是施展组曲法术，你可以使用一个不同种类的表演，以此将组曲的姿势成分和语言成分互相转化。通常使用组曲法术的情况下，这会改变组曲法术的视觉和听觉性质。

Unwavering Mien.name: 坚定不移 Unwavering Mien
Unwavering Mien.description: 你的超凡自制力和冥想帮助你抵抗针对你思维的外部影响。当你受到持续时间超过2轮的心灵效果影响时，你可以所见一轮持续时间。你仍然需要自然睡眠，但是你对抗使你入睡的效果时，豁免成功度提升1级。这只针对睡眠效果，对于其他形式的使你失去意识的效果无效。

Urgent Upwelling.name: Urgent Upwelling
Urgent Upwelling.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger An enemy reduces you to 0 HP, an enemy critically hits you, or you critically fail a saving throw against an enemy's effect.

Defeat lets you to tap into your wellspring. Attempt the flat check for wellspring magic. If you critically succeed, you can choose to forgo gaining a temporary spell slot to instead have the triggering enemy undergo a wellspring surge. This surge functions just as it would for you, the only difference being that it emits from the enemy.

Uzunjati Recollection.name: Uzunjati Recollection
Uzunjati Recollection.description: You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process. Recall Knowledge with a skill in which you have master proficiency, then use Uzunjati Storytelling with the same skill. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill check for Uzunjati Storytelling from the added details.

Uzunjati Storytelling.name: Uzunjati Storytelling
Uzunjati Storytelling.description: You tell a quick story or begin telling a longer tale. This is most useful when you want to prove your scholarly credibility or impress someone quickly. Roll a check with a skill that can be used to Recall Knowledge in which you have expert proficiency, using the result entry for the Perform action. Like Performing, Storytelling rarely has an effect on its own, but it might influence the DCs of subsequent Diplomacy checks against the observers-or even change their attitudes-if the GM sees fit. This action is not a Performance and cannot be used in place of anything that requires you to Perform.

Vacate Vision.name: Vacate Vision
Vacate Vision.description:
Trigger You fail (but don't critically fail) a saving throw against an effect with the visual trait.

You cause your eyes to liquefy and run out of your eye sockets, leaving them empty. You get a success on the save against the triggering effect, but you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for the duration the effect would have had on a failure. At that time, your eyes regrow and your normal vision returns.

Vampire Lore.name: Vampire Lore
Vampire Lore.description: You were raised by your vampiric parent, or you've invested substantial time and energy researching the secrets of your undead progenitors. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Religion and Society. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Vampire Lore.

Vandal.name: Vandal
Vandal.description: You have a knack for breaking and dismantling things. Putting them back together is the boring part, so you largely don't bother with that. You become trained in Thievery. If you would automatically become trained in Thievery (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. In addition, whenever you hit with a Strike against a trap or an unattended object, you ignore the first 5 points of the object's Hardness.

Vantage Shot.name: Vantage Shot
Vantage Shot.description: You and your spotter take advantage of each other's attacks to momentarily hide and throw your foes off-balance against your follow-up attack. When you successfully make a ranged Strike against a foe, your spotter can use a reaction to attempt a Stealth check against the foe's Perception DC. On a success, the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the spotter's next attack before the end of your spotter's next turn. Similarly, when your spotter successfully makes a ranged Strike against a foe, you can use a reaction to attempt a Stealth check against the foe's Perception DC. On a success, the foe is flat-footed against your next attack against them before the end of your next turn.

Vanth's Weapon Execution.name: Vanth's Weapon Execution
Vanth's Weapon Execution.description: You've trained in the finer points of dealing death. Whenever you critically hit using a bo staff, longbow, composite longbow, scythe, or staff, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Vanth's Weapon Expertise.name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
Vanth's Weapon Expertise.description: Vanths themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in bo staves, longbows, composite longbows, scythes, and staves.

Vanth's Weapon Familiarity.name: Vanth's Weapon Familiarity
Vanth's Weapon Familiarity.description: You seek to emulate vanth reapers' fighting styles. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hMYdSFmMWzidzHih]{Bo Staves}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MVAWttmT0QDa7LsV]{Longbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dUC8Fsa6FZtVikS3]{Composite Longbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.H74vYwHJ8XT4qOPI]{Scythes}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FVjTuBCIefAgloUU]{Staves}.

Variable Core.name: 可变核心 Variable Core
Variable Core.description:
你调整了大发明的核心，改变了它爆炸的方式。当你选择该专长时，选择强酸，寒冷或电击。你的大发明依赖该能量源来运作。当使用爆炸Explode动作时，或当你的大发明因大失败而发生爆炸并伤害你时，将伤害类型从火焰改成你所选的类型。

如果你有攻势增压Offensive Boost职业特性，并将可变核心Variable Core重训成别的伤害类型，如果愿意，你也可以切换攻势增压，使其造成相同的伤害类型。

Vehicle Mechanic Dedication.name: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication
Vehicle Mechanic Dedication.description:
You are adept at designing and maintaining mechanical vehicles, and you lavish your attention and ingenuity on one vehicle in particular. You become an expert in Crafting, and you choose one vehicle you own-or your party owns collectively-to be your signature vehicle: the vehicle you spend time customizing to grant it various advantages. You can spend 1 week of downtime with a new vehicle to designate it as your signature vehicle instead. Due to your amazing customizations and adjustments, pilots gain a +1 circumstance bonus to any piloting checks they make to control your signature vehicle. If you are a master in Crafting, this bonus increases to +2.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the mechanic archetype.

Veil May.name: Veil May
Veil May.description:
Born of a blood hag, a fiery blood drinker hidden behind a false skin, you have one blood-red eye and the ability to slough off your appearance in an instant.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Lie To Me} skill feat, and you can shed a disguise quickly by peeling off the outer layer of your skin.

Changing from a disguise used to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} back to your true appearance is a 3-action activity for you; if you're an expert in Deception, it's a 2-action activity, and if you're legendary in Deception, it takes only a single action. This doesn't allow you to don or remove armor or other equipment any faster, but your physical appearance otherwise returns to its normal state.

Velstrac Magic.name: 链魔魔法 Velstrac Magic
Velstrac Magic.description: 你知道痛苦的奥妙不止于起鞭子跟铁链的触感，但这俩也算是招牌了。每日各1次，你可以2环级神术内在法术的形式，施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{念动战技 Telekinetic Maneuver} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{蛛网术 Web} ，但你施放这些法术时将视觉效果改为幽影铁链。

Vengeful Hatred.name: Vengeful Hatred
Vengeful Hatred.description:
You heart aches for vengeance against those who have wronged your people. Choose one of the following dwarven ancestral foes when you gain Vengeful Hatred: drow, duergar, giant, or orc. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against creatures with that trait. If your attack would deal more than one weapon die of damage (as is common at higher levels than 1st), the bonus is equal to the number of weapon dice or unarmed attack dice. In addition, if a creature critically succeeds at an attack against you and deals damage to you, you gain your bonus to damage against that creature for 1 minute regardless of whether it has the chosen trait.

Special Your GM can add appropriate creature traits to the ancestral foes list if your character is from a community that commonly fights other types of enemies.

Vengeful Oath.name: 复仇誓约 Vengeful Oath
Vengeful Oath.description:
你立下誓约，追捕穷凶极恶的罪人并将其送去接受审判。将后述信条添加到你的准则中的其他信条之后： "只要有合理的机会取得成功，你必须追捕并根除那些犯下凶恶暴行的邪恶生物，并且你绝不接受会妨碍你的抓捕行动的任务。"

你能够使用 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 对那些你能够证实其伤害无辜者或善良盟友的生物造成伤害，如同他们是不死生物一般；在这种情况下，圣疗会造成善良伤害而不是正能量伤害，并且会获得善良特征。这种善良伤害也能够影响非邪恶的生物。这并不会妨碍你用圣疗治疗这些生物；你可以选择治疗或伤害他们。

Vengeful Strike.name: Vengeful Strike
Vengeful Strike.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach succeeds or critically succeeds at an attack against you.

Requirements You're under the effect of Come and Get Me

When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Verdant Metamorphosis.name: Verdant Metamorphosis
Verdant Metamorphosis.description: You transform into a plant version of yourself. You gain the plant trait and lose any trait that's inappropriate for your new form (typically humanoid for a PC, but also possibly animal or fungus). You can change from a form that looks mostly like your old self into a tree or any other non-creature plant as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This has the same effect as tree shape, except you can turn into any kind of non-creature plant and your AC is 30. If you rest for 10 minutes while transformed into a non-creature plant during daylight hours under direct sunlight, you recover half your maximum Hit Points. If you take your daily rest in this way, the rest restores you to maximum Hit Points and removes all non-permanent drained, enfeebled, clumsy, and stupefied conditions, as well as all poisons and diseases of 19th level or lower.

Verdant Presence.name: Verdant Presence
Verdant Presence.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You take damage or cast a primal spell.

The life-giving properties of the aeon orbs flourish within you. Small plants or fungi magically appear on all surfaces in a 60-foot emanation around you. This life withers after 1 day unless the environment can support it. You can choose one of the following options each time you use this feat.

  • You can cause any number of 5-foot squares in the area to be light undergrowth, which is difficult terrain and provides lesser cover.
  • You can cause a tree or giant mushroom to appear in any unoccupied location in the area; it occupies an entire 5-foot square and provides standard cover. The tree or mushroom has 5 Hardness and 50 Hit Points.

Verdant Weapon.name: Verdant Weapon
Verdant Weapon.description:
You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

You spend 10 minutes focusing primal energy into a seed, imprinting it with the potential of a single level 0 weapon you are trained with and that has no mechanical parts or metal components.

When holding the imprinted seed, you can spend a single @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to cause it to immediately grow into that weapon; a second Interact action returns it to seed form. Your verdant weapon functions as the imprinted weapon and can be etched with runes or affixed with talismans as normal, which are suppressed when the weapon is in seed form. It also becomes a primal focus.

You can have only one verdant seed at a time. If you prepare a second, your first verdant seed immediately becomes a mundane specimen; any runes on the previous seed that are valid for the new seed transfer between them at no cost, but you lose any inapplicable runes unless you transfer them to a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ev3F9qlMNlNdCOAI]{Runestone} or another weapon.

Vernai Training.name: Vernai Training
Vernai Training.description:
To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death. The DC of this check is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

In addition, add two 5th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook-both spells must be chosen from the following options:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.scTRIrTfXquVYHGw]{Drop Dead},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RCbLd7dfquHnuvrZ]{False Vision},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe}, or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{Sending}.

You gain a 5th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

Versatile Font.name: Versatile Font
Versatile Font.description: As you explore your deity's aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming. You can prepare either @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}in the spell slots gained from the harmful font or healing font.

Versatile Performance.name: 多样表演 Versatile Performance
Versatile Performance.description: 你可以在社交中依靠你精通的表演代替通常的社交技能。你可以使用表演技能代替交涉来留下印象或者代替威慑来挫败士气。你还可以使用表演技能代替唬骗来冒充他人impersonate。你可以使用你表演技能的熟练等级来满足唬骗、交涉或者威慑技能专长的熟练等级要求。

Versatile Signature.name: 多样化标志 Versatile Signature
Versatile Signature.description: 大多数诗人只知道特定的标志性表演和法术，你则总能对可用的法术库进行调整。当你进行每日准备的时候，可以将一个标志性法术换为另一个法术库当中的同级法术。

Versatile Spellstrike.name: 万用性法术打击 Versatile Spellstrike
Versatile Spellstrike.description:
你得以将法术书中全然的可能性所在灌注到一次攻击中。

在你每日准备时一次，你可以使用一个法术位承载无限的可能性，而不是准备一个法术。当你进行法术打击，你可以消耗这个法术位，从而立刻从你的法术书中准备并释放一个低于此法术位2环的法术。（就一如通常准备施法，你甚至可以使用一个更低环级的法术，然后升环施法）

直到你从此法术位施法前，你不需要在此法术位中准备任何法术。

Very Sneaky.name: Very Sneaky
Very Sneaky.description: Taller folk rarely pay attention to the shadows at their feet, and you take full advantage of this. You can move 5 feet farther when you take the Sneak action, up to your Speed. In addition, as long as you continue to use Sneak actions and succeed at your Stealth check, you don't become observed if you don't have cover or greater cover and aren't concealed at the end of the Sneak action, as long as you have cover or greater cover or are concealed at the end of your turn.

Very, Very Sneaky.name: Very, Very Sneaky
Very, Very Sneaky.description: You can move up to your Speed when you use the Sneak action, and you no longer need to have cover or greater cover or be concealed to Hide or Sneak.

Vestigial Wings.name: Vestigial Wings
Vestigial Wings.description: You possess small, weak wings that aid in balance. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CnqMJR8e9jqJR7MM]{Steady Balance} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Cat Fall} skill feats as bonus feats, even if you aren't trained in Acrobatics.

Vexing Tumble.name: Vexing Tumble
Vexing Tumble.description:
You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions. Stride up to half your Speed and roll an Acrobatics check. Compare the result to the Reflex DC of each foe whose reach you began in or enter during the movement, in sequence.

Critical Success This movement doesn't trigger reactions from the foe, the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to you until the end of your turn,

and you gain Panache.

Success This movement doesn't trigger reactions from the foe, and you gain panache.

Critical Failure Your movement immediately stops when you enter the creature's reach; if you began in the creature's

reach, you don't move.

Vibrant Display.name: Vibrant Display
Vibrant Display.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

Whereas most gnomes' coloration is static or changes slowly, you can cause your hair, eye, and skin color to scintillate in brief and disorienting bursts. Once every 10 minutes, when you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} action, you can compare your Deception check result to the Perception DCs of all adjacent creatures rather than just one creature within melee reach. It's possible to get a different degree of success for each target.

These changes are imprecise and usually short-lived, so while they allow you to periodically change your appearance in unpredictable ways, they are of little use in providing camouflage or aiding a disguise.

Vibration Sense.name: Vibration Sense
Vibration Sense.description: Your eidolon gains @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]{Tremorsense} as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. If aquatic, it gains @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.VdSMQ6yRZ3YXNXHL]{Wavesense} as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet instead. If amphibious, it gains both.

Vicious Debilitations.name: Vicious Debilitations
Vicious Debilitations.description:
The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

  • Debilitation The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.
  • Debilitation The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.

Vicious Evisceration.name: Vicious Evisceration
Vicious Evisceration.description: You make a vicious strike that maims your enemy. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical success.

Vicious Incisors.name: Vicious Incisors
Vicious Incisors.description: You've let your incisors grow long enough to serve as formidable weapons. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the finesse and unarmed traits. Unlike most creatures, you can file down your teeth and regrow them later on, enabling you to select this feat at any level, and to retrain into and out of this feat.

Vicious Snares.name: Vicious Snares
Vicious Snares.description: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries. You deal an additional 1d6 precision damage with damaging snares you craft. This increases to 2d6 additional precision damage if you're legendary in Crafting.

Vicious Vengeance.name: 险恶复仇 Vicious Vengeance
Vicious Vengeance.description: 虽然你的复仇对你跟敌人都带有莫大的痛苦，但大家都认为你的敌人更甚于你。你的 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.r5Uth6yvCoE4tr9z]{毁灭复仇} 伤害，会获得与此反应动作伤害骰数相同的伤害环境加值。这个伤害加值只对敌人生效，不会对你受的伤害或在使用此反应动作后获得的额外伤害上生效。

Victorious Vigor.name: 胜利活力 Victorious Vigor
Victorious Vigor.description:
触发 当你将敌人血量降低至0点时

你在战斗中的胜利给你带来了荣耀与能量，尽管身负重创，你还可以再战。你会获得等同于你体质调整的临时生命值直到你下一轮结束。

Vigil's Walls Rise Anew.name: Vigil's Walls Rise Anew
Vigil's Walls Rise Anew.description: As part of daily preparation, you can drill with a number of allies up to your Charisma modifier. These allies must be present and listening during this time, but this does not otherwise impede their own preparation. When you use this feat's benefit, you and all drilled companions within 30 feet who are wielding shields @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}. Allies who Raise their Shields keep them raised until the start of their next turn, as normal.

Vigilante Dedication.name: Vigilante Dedication
Vigilante Dedication.description:
You have two identities, each with its own name, alignment, and abilities. Your social identity is an upstanding member of society, while your vigilante identity is a skilled and cunning warrior. Neither of these identities is a false front; you really are both of these people, and as such, your two identities can be at most one alignment step from each other (for instance, you could be neutral in one identity and neutral evil in the other, but not chaotic evil in the other).

If someone attempts to discern your other identity, they must use a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to attempt a Perception check against your Deception DC, as if you were using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action. Your Deception DC against such attempts is 20 + your proficiency modifier instead of the normal DC. Unlike with Impersonate, you don't have to attempt a Deception check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with someone to conceal your other identity - a check happens only if someone else specifically tries to uncover your other identity.

Changing from one identity to the other takes 1 minute and must be done out of sight from other creatures. As this process involves both physical changes such as clothing and makeup along with an altered state of mind, other effects that change your appearance don't reduce the time required to change identities.

Your two identities are completely distinct. You have your current identity's alignment for effects that rely on alignment, though you are eligible for abilities that require a certain alignment (such as a cleric's deity) only if both of your identities qualify. Checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about one of your identities don't reveal information about the other unless the person attempting the check knows both identities are the same person. Effects that detect you based on your identity, such as the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.QnTtGCAvdWRU4spv]{Detect Alignment} spell, work only if you are currently in the identity the effect is trying to detect; otherwise, the effect fails as if the target didn't exist.

To maintain the separation between your identities, some of your abilities have one of two traits: social or vigilante. You can use social feats only while in your social identity. Your class feats and vigilante feats are associated with your vigilante identity, and using them while in your social identity risks exposing you as a vigilante. This means that if you were particularly meek or inconspicuous before you took this feat, your identity could be at greater risk of exposure. If your identity is exposed to the public, you lose the benefits of Vigilante Dedication to disguising yourself, but you can otherwise use both social and vigilante abilities in either identity unless they rely on your identity being a secret. You can use feats that don't have either trait regardless of your current identity.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the vigilante archetype.

Vigorous Health.name: Vigorous Health
Vigorous Health.description: Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well. Whenever you would gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don't gain the drained condition.

Vigorous Inspiration.name: 激发活力 Vigorous Inspiration
Vigorous Inspiration.description: 你在激励盟友进攻时，也在缓缓输送魔法的精力。如果你下一个动作是施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 组曲戏法，你和所有受影响的盟友会获得3+你魅力调整值得生命值，持续1分钟。

Viking Dedication.name: Viking Dedication
Viking Dedication.description:
Vikings spend long periods of time at sea, only to leap from their boats at a moment's notice, charge through the surf, and take their enemies by storm. You're trained in Sailing Lore. When moving through water using your land Speed, you ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water, such as in bogs or on beaches. In addition, if you roll a success for your Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, you get a critical success instead.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the viking archetype.

Viking Shieldbearer.name: Viking Shieldbearer
Viking Shieldbearer.description:
Access Ulfen ethnicity

You trained with shields and weapons as soon as you were old enough to hold them, eager to win honor and glory for yourself. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction and are trained in your choice of the battle axe or longsword.

Viking Weapon Familiarity.name: Viking Weapon Familiarity
Viking Weapon Familiarity.description:
From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle. Now, you can raid proudly alongside your fellows.

You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7tKkkF8eZ4iCLJtp]{Shortsword}. In addition, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction.

Viking Weapon Specialist.name: Viking Weapon Specialist
Viking Weapon Specialist.description:
You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people. You gain the critical specialization effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7tKkkF8eZ4iCLJtp]{Shortsword}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in the above four weapons.

Vile Desecration.name: Vile Desecration
Vile Desecration.description: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes. When you cast a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell, you can change the damage you deal to celestial creatures to evil damage instead of negative damage.

Virga May.name: Virga May
Virga May.description: Born of a storm hag, you have one crystal-blue or rain-gray eye. You share your mother's power over wind and storm. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc} as an occult innate cantrip. As normal, a cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Virtue-Forged Tattoos.name: Virtue-Forged Tattoos
Virtue-Forged Tattoos.description: Your tattoos are a work of eldritch genius, a masterpiece of art, magic, and skin. Choose a 3rd-level arcane spell from the same school as your Arcane Tattoos, either a common spell or another to which you have access, including a lower-level spell heightened to 3rd level if you wish. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate arcane spell.

Virtuosic Performer.name: 精湛演技 Virtuosic Performer
Virtuosic Performer.description: 你特别擅长一种表演类型。你在一种表演形式的演出上获得+1环境加值。当你在表演技能上达到大师级熟练度时，这个加值提升到+2。当你使用下表中的一种表演形式时获得本专长的加值。如果你的演出无法被归类到特定的表演类型时，GM决定你的具体表演类型。

Virtuosic Performer (Acting).name: Virtuosic Performer (Acting)
Virtuosic Performer (Acting).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when acting. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Drama, pantomime, puppetry

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Comedy).name: Virtuosic Performer (Comedy)
Virtuosic Performer (Comedy).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when performing comedy. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Buffoonery, joke telling, limericks

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Dance).name: Virtuosic Performer (Dance)
Virtuosic Performer (Dance).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when dancing. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Ballet, huara, jig, macru

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Keyboards).name: Virtuosic Performer (Keyboards)
Virtuosic Performer (Keyboards).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when playing an instrument with a keyboard. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Harpsichord, organ, piano

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Oratory).name: Virtuosic Performer (Oratory)
Virtuosic Performer (Oratory).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when orating. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Epic, ode, poetry, storytelling

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Percussion).name: Virtuosic Performer (Percussion)
Virtuosic Performer (Percussion).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when playing a percussion instrument. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Chimes, drum, gong, xylophone

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Singing).name: Virtuosic Performer (Singing)
Virtuosic Performer (Singing).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when singing. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Ballad, chant, melody, rhyming

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Strings).name: Virtuosic Performer (Strings)
Virtuosic Performer (Strings).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when playing a string instrument. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Fiddle, harp, lute, viol

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Virtuosic Performer (Winds).name: Virtuosic Performer (Winds)
Virtuosic Performer (Winds).description:
You have exceptional talent with one type of performance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus when playing a wind instrument. If you are a master in Performance, this bonus increases to +2.

Example performances Bagpipe, flute, recorder, trumpet

If it's unclear whether the specialty applies, the GM decides.

Vision Of Weakness.name: Vision Of Weakness
Vision Of Weakness.description: You can call upon divine insights to single out your foes' weak points. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NhNKzq1DvFxkvTEc]{Vision of Weakness} revelation spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Visual Fidelity.name: 视觉保真 Visual Fidelity
Visual Fidelity.description:
你找到一种方式将一大堆装置组合起来，在任何状况下都保证你所见为真。你获得黑暗视觉和昏暗视觉，你可以以半透明的形状看到 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形} 的生物和物品，但这种形状比较模糊，其对你而言是 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽} 状态。

如果一个效果会让你陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲} 状态，该效果必须尝试一次反制检定对抗你的职业DC，你的反制等级等于你职业的一半（取高）。如果反制检定失败，你不会目盲——你各种各样的设备弥补了你的视力。

Vitality-Manipulating Stance.name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
Vitality-Manipulating Stance.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4 negative damage}, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile positive traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

Vivacious Afterimage.name: Vivacious Afterimage
Vivacious Afterimage.description:
Requirements You have panache.

You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you. You Stride. At any point along your movement, you leave an afterimage of yourself behind. Alternatively, you can stop moving and send your afterimage forward instead, up to the remainder of your Speed. A creature that spends actions to engage with your afterimage can attempt to disbelieve it with a Will save against your class DC. Once an enemy has disbelieved any of your afterimages, they are temporarily immune to all of your Vivacious Afterimages for 10 minutes. As long as a creature has not disbelieved the afterimage, the afterimage counts as a creature for flanking. The afterimage lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until you use Vivacious Afterimage again, whichever comes first.

Vivacious Bravado.name: Vivacious Bravado
Vivacious Bravado.description:
Requirements You gained @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache} this turn.

Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Charisma modifier that last until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.T7AJQbfmlA57y625]{Effect: Vivacious Bravado}

Vivacious Conduit.name: Vivacious Conduit
Vivacious Conduit.description: Your connection to the First World has grown, and its positive energy flows into you rapidly. If you rest for 10 minutes, you gain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier × half your level. This is cumulative with any healing you receive from Treat Wounds.

Voice Of The Night.name: Voice Of The Night
Voice Of The Night.description: You hear and understand the words of creatures you share the darkness with. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use Diplomacy with bats, rats, and wolves. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on such animals.

Voice of Authority.name: Voice of Authority
Voice of Authority.description:
You easily command the attention of others, and when the time comes to turn threats into action, your authoritative voice causes foes to falter.

Your voice be heard easily by any creatures within 300 feet if you wish, regardless of the level of ambient noise, although your voice can't penetrate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} or similar effect. If you roll Intimidation for initiative, on the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to you.

Volatile Grease.name: Volatile Grease
Volatile Grease.description:
When you cast grease, you can modify its target to be 1 creature. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You splash the target with combustible grease. The target must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is splattered with grease and gains weakness 2 to fire until the end of your next turn. The target or an adjacent creature can rub off the combustible grease with an Interact action, ending the effect.

Failure As success, except the weakness to fire lasts for 1 minute.

Heightened (+2) The weakness increases by 1.

Walk The Plank.name: Walk The Plank
Walk The Plank.description:
You frighten a foe into moving where you want them, traditionally demanding they walk the plank. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} an opponent; this check gains the incapacitation trait.

On a success, in addition to the normal effects, you can also force the target to Stride up to its Speed. You choose the path the target takes, and it does so as part of your Walk the Plank action. You can't force the target to move into a harmful space (one where it will take damage, fall, provoke reactions, or similar) unless the result of your check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} was a critical success.

The target then becomes temporarily immune to Walk the Plank for 24 hours.

Wall Jump.name: 弹墙跳 Wall Jump
Wall Jump.description: 你可以蹬墙借力，连续跳几次。如果你在结束一次跳跃（跳高或是跳远）时邻接一个墙面，那么只要你的下一个动作仍然是尝试跳跃，那么你就不会因为身处高处而开始坠落。除此之外，因为你是借上一次跳跃的势能继续跳跃，你可以在下一次跳跃时只使用一个动作，但你不能在其中包括助跑的跑动动作。你每回合只能弹墙跳一次。当你在运动技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你只要你的回合中仍然还有剩余的动作，那么你就可以继续进行跳跃。

Wall Run.name: Wall Run
Wall Run.description:
You defy gravity, traversing vertical planes as easily as the ground. Stride up to your Speed. You must start your movement on a horizontal surface.

During this movement, you can run up vertical surfaces, like walls, at your full Speed. If you end the Stride off the ground, you fall after taking your next action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first (though you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge}, if applicable).

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6gLWr3xghsHSFwxc]{Water Step} or a similar ability, Wall Run lets you run along flimsy vertical surfaces, as well as vertical liquids, such as a waterfall.

Wandering Heart.name: Wandering Heart
Wandering Heart.description: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves. After spending a week in an environment associated with an elf heritage (such as snow for arctic elf, or a forest or jungle for woodland elf) your heritage automatically changes to become that heritage. This never causes you to change to an elf heritage that isn't related to an environment, such as @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Nd9hdX8rdYyRozw8]{Ancient Elf}, @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.jEtVesbqYcWGbBYk]{Seer Elf}, or @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.1wVDYY9Wue0G5R9Q]{Whisper Elf}.

Wandering Oasis.name: Wandering Oasis
Wandering Oasis.description: You're surrounded by soothing energy. You and allies within 60 feet of you are protected from severe environmental heat and cold. If you're legendary in Survival, you and those allies are also protected from extreme environmental heat and cold.

War Conditioning.name: War Conditioning
War Conditioning.description: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily. When you gain this feat, you can choose to gain either a climb Speed of 20 feet or a swim Speed of 20 feet.

Ward Against Corruption.name: Ward Against Corruption
